data.eng: Police fire tear gas at demonstrators outside the capital Manama ahead of the Grand Prix.
data.aaf: Poolis qerti ganaabil irol soolo gexisah yan marat bakqisse qaasima manama naba prix cankkaxalal.
data.amh: ከግራንድ ፕሪክስ ፊት ከዋና ከተማዋ ማናማ ወጣ ብለው በሰልፈኞች ላይ ፖሊስ አስለቃሽ ጭስ ተኮሰ።
data.orm: Dura piriksii guddichaa ala magaalaa guddittii manaamaatti, Poolisiin namoota hiriira ba'an irratti gaasii nama boosisu gad lakkise.
data.som: Booliiska ayaa sunta dadka ka ilmaysiisa ku ridaya Banaanbax balaadhan ku uruursanaa meel ka baxsan caasimadda Manama.
data.tir: ፖላዊስ እቲ ዓብዪ ቅድድም ማኪና ቅድሚ ምክያዱ ካብ ርእሰ ከተማ ማናማ ውፅእ ኢሉ ኣብ ዝረከብ ቦታ ኣብ ልዕሊ ዝተኣኻኸቡ ሰልፈኛታት ዘንብዕ ጋዝ ተኲሶም።

data.eng: In response to an outbreak of an unidentified fatal disease in Quang Ngai province, Vietnam, the Vietnamese government asks for help from the World Health Organization.
data.aaf: Vetnam kuang Ngai Rakaakayal Amidegewa Rabah Qida Lakimteh Dalka Gacsah VetnamDoolat Baadak Qafiyat Egalal Cato Esseran.
data.amh: በቬትናም ኩአንግ ንጋይ አካባቢ በተከሰተው ያልታወቀ ገዳይ በሽታ ምክንያት የቬትናም መንግስት የአለም የጤና ድርጅትን እርዳታ ጠየቀ።
data.orm: Veetinaam kutaa bulchiinsa Kuwaan Gaay keessatti sababa weerara dhukkuba nama ajjeesaa maalummaansaa hinbeekamnii walqabatee mootummaan Veetinaam dhaabbata fayya addunyaa irraa gargaarsa gaafate.
data.som: dawladda Vietnam ayaa gargaar weydiisata Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka, kadib marku gobalka Quang Nagai uu ka dilaacay cudur dilaa ah oo aan la garanayn.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣውራጃ ኳንግ ንጋይ፣ ቭየትናም፣ ዘይተፈልጠ ሞት ዘስዕብ ሕማም ምስ ተላበዐ፣ መንግስቲ ቭየትናም ካብ ዓለማዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ሓገዝ ሓቲቱ።

data.eng: A 30-year-old woman collapses and dies while running in the London Marathon.
data.aaf: Ledon Maraatonih Addal 30 sanatih Bara edde Rabte
data.amh: የ 30 ዓመቷ ሴት በለንደን ማራቶን በመሮጥ ላይ ሳለች ወድቃ ህይወቷ አለፈ።
data.orm: Dubartiin umrii 30 utuu Maraatoonii London irratti fiigduu dadhabdee duute.
data.som: Haweeney 30 jir ah ayaa dhulka ku dhacday kadibna dhimatay iyadoo ku gudo jirta tartan Marathon ah oo magalada london ka dhacayey.
data.tir: ኣብ ማራቶን ለንደን ኣብ ትጎየሉ እዋን ሓንቲ ዕድሚኣ 30 ዝገበረት ሰበይቲ ሃንደበት ወዲቓ ሞይታ።

data.eng: Burma's parliament opens without the party of Aung San Suu Kyi who boycotted the legislature over a disagreement on the wording of the oath of office.

data.orm: Haatii Assaanj Caaalbaasii seeraa qabeessa akka gara Siwiidiinitti dabrfamte kennamtuuf godhame isa xumuraa dursuun Landan seenan
data.som: Assange hooyadii ayaa timid London ka hor dalabkiisii ugu dambeeyay ee sharci ee ahaa in Sweden loo soo gacan geliyo.
data.tir: ናብ ስዊድን ተሓላሊፉ ከይዋሃብ ዝሙግት ናይ መወዳእታ ጥርዓን ቅድሚ ምስምዑ ኣዲኡ ንኣሳንጄ ለንደን ኣቲወን ።

data.eng: Viswanathan Anand defeats Boris Gelfand to win the World Chess Championship for the fourth consecutive time, and the fifth time overall.
data.aaf: Vaswananitani Anani Booris gelfinidun Aysuk Baadal sitalakleh Cheezi shambiyoona Fereyhaytoh Adda kee Amoladih Konoyhaytoh Addah Yeyse.
data.amh: ቪስዋናንታን አናንድ ቦሪስ ጌልፈንድን በማሸነፍ ለተከታታይ ለአራተኛ ጊዜ የአለም የቼዝ ሻምፒዮና አሸነፈ ፣ በአጠቃላይም አምስት ግዜ አሸንፏል።
data.orm: Viswaanaattaan Anaand, Booris Geelfaand injifachuun Chaampiyoonaa Cheezii Addunyaa yeroo walitti aanu afuriif akkasumas akka waliigalaatti yeroo shanaffaaf mo'ate.
data.som: Viswanathan Anand ayaa ka badiyay Boris Gelfand si uu ugu guuleysto Horyaalka jeess ka Adduunka afar jeer oo iskuxigta, iyo markii shanaad guud ahaan.
data.tir: ኣብ ግጥም ሻምፒዮን ዓለም ቼዝ ቬስዋናታን ኣናንድ ንቦሪስ ጌልፋንድ ብምስዓር ንተኸታታሊ ኣርባዕተ ግዜ ብሓፈሻ ድማ ንሓምሻይ ግዜ ተዓዋቲ ኮይኑ።

data.eng: A plane carrying 153 people on board crashes in a residential neighborhood in Lagos, Nigeria, killing everyone on board and 10 people on the ground.
data.aaf: Nageriyal geytimta buxa cafatih addal 153 num safrisak sigte tayira boodemih safara inkih baaxol 10num edderabe.
data.amh: በናይጄሪያ ሌጎስ በሚገኝ መኖሪያ ስፍራ ውስጥ 153 ሰዎችን አሳፍሮ የነበረ አንድ አውሮፕላን በመከስከሱ ሳቢያ ሁሉም ተሳፋሪዎችን ጨምሮ አስር መሬት ላይ የነበሩ ሰዎች ሞተዋል።
data.orm: Naaayjeeriyaa ganda jireenyaa leegos keessaatti xiyyaarri imaaltoota 153 fe'uun deemaa ture kufuu isaatiin lafaarra namoota turan 10 dabalatee imaltoonni hundi lubbuun darban.
data.som: Diyaarad ay saarnaayeen 153 qof oo ayaa ku burburtay xaafad ku taal magaalada Lagos ee dalka Nigeria, waxaana ku dhintay dhammaan dadkii saarnaa iyo 10 qof oo goobtaas daganaa.
data.tir: 153 ሰባት ዘሳፈረት ነፋሪት ኣብ ሌጎስ ናይጀሪያ፣ መንበሪ ገዛውቲ ኣብ ዝበዝሐሉ ሰፈር ወዲቓ ስለ ዝተሓምሸሸት፣ ኣብ ውሽጣ ዝነበሩ ኩሎም ተሳፈርትን ኣብ መሬት ዝነበሩ 10 ሰባትን ህይወቶም ሓሊፉ።

data.eng: Controversy is stoked after a video emerges of a U.S. religious minister outlining his plan to imprison the country's gay and lesbian population behind an electric fence until they die.
data.aaf: Ameerikak diini caagiidah malaak labha ittal baahaanamih taddeera caraamuy yalli niqba kinnim cedak akah akke wayta innah aben.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የሀይማኖት ሚኒስትር የሀገሪቱን ግብረሰዶማውያን እና ሌዝቢያን ነዋሪዎችን እስኪሞቱ ድረስ በኤሌክትሪክ አጥር ጀርባ የማሰር እቅዱን ሲገልጽ የሚያሳይ ቪዲዮ ከወጣ በኋላ ውዝግብ ተቀስቅሷል።
data.orm: Erga suur-sagaleen karoora ministeerri amantaa U.S kan garee hawaasaa bukkee ta'an kellaa elektirikii irratti hanga isaan du'anitti hidha jedhu ba'ee as jeequmsi uumameera.
data.som: Muran ayaa ka dhashay ka dib markii uu soo baxay muuqaal laga duubay wasiirka arimaha diinta Mareykanka, oo qeexaya qorshihiisa ku aaddan in dadka khaniisiinta ah iyo kuwa isku jinsiga laguso oodo dayr koronto leh ilaa ay ka naf baxaan.
data.tir: ሓደ ኣሜሪካዊ መራሒ ሃይማኖት ኣብታ ሃገር ዘለው ግብረ ሶዶማውያን ብኤሌትሪክ ኣብ ዝተሓፀረ ቀፅሪ ክሳብ ዝሞቱ ኣሲሩ ከሳቕዮም ትልሚ ከምዘለዎ ዝገለፀሉ ቪድዮ ድሕሪ ምውፅኡ ኣብቲ ጉዳይ ክትዕ ተጎሃሂሩ።

data.eng: The Solar Impulse, a solar plane, lands in Morocco, completing the world's first intercontinental flight powered by the Sun.
data.aaf: Amerikak Saruk GexohTadeera Illacaboh Addah Madma Space Shuttle Atlantis Mugaqisen.
data.amh: ሶላር ኢምፐልስ የተሰኘው እና በፀሃይ ሃይል የሚሰራው አውሮፕላን በአለማችን ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የተደረገውን የአህጉር አቀፍ በረራ በመጨረስ በሞሮኮ አረፈ።
data.orm: Xiyaarri humna aduu irra elektirikii maddisiisu fi xiyyaarri aduu balaliisa ardiilessa isa jalqabaa xumuruun boodaa Morookoo keessatti qubatee jira.
data.som: Solar Impulse, oo ah diyaarad qorraxda ku shaqaysa, ayaa ka degtay Morocco, iyada oo dhammaystirtay duulimaadkii ugu horreeyay ee qaaradaha isaga goosha ee ay qorraxda ku shaqayso.
data.tir: ሶላር ኢምፓልስ ዝተባህለት፣ ጸሓያዊ ነፋሪት እቲ ንፈለማ ግዜ በይነ-ክፍለ-ዓለማዊ ጉዕዞ ብጸሓያዊ ጸዓት እትሰርሕ ነፋሪት ድሕሪ ምፍጻማ ኣብ ሞሮኮ ክትዓልብ እያ።

data.eng: U.S. Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta makes an unannounced trip to Kabul and warns that his country is "reaching the limits of our patience here" with regard to Pakistan.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Qalali Qandeh Malaak Liyon Banteta Illa Kabul fanah Acsubewe Gexo Abbem kee Ken Baaxo Bakistanlih wagittamal “Tah Ni sabri Caddool Madetom” Axcuk Mabitiniseh.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የመከላከያ ሚኒስትር ሊዮን ፓኔትታ ወደ ካቡል ያልታሰበ ጉዞ አደረጉ፤ በዚህም ያልታሰበ ጉብኝታቸው ሀገራቸው ፓኪስታንን በተመለከተ የትዕግሥት ወሰን ጥግ ላይ እንደደረሰች አስጠንቅቀዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Ittisaa U.S. Liyoon Paanettaan imala hin beeksifamne gara Kaabulitti gochuun dhimma Paakistaaniin kan wal qabatu biyyi saa "asitti daangaa obsa keenyaa gahaa jirra" jechuun akeekkachiise.
data.som: Xoghayaha Difaaca Mareykanka Leon Panetta ayaa safar aan la sii shaacin ku tagay Kabul wuxuuna ka digay in dalkiisu “uu gaaray xadigii dulqaadka” marka la eego arimaha la xiriira Pakistan.
data.tir: ኣብ ባሕሪ ደቡብ ቻይና ኣብ ሃፍቲ ጋዝን ነዳድን ንዘሎ ውጥጥ ይገግብኣኒ ኣመልኪቱ ኣብ ቬትናም ንዝተኻየደ ሰልፊ ተቓውሞ ፖላዊስ በቲኖምዎ።

data.eng: Dangote Cement opens a new line of production at its Obajana facility in the Kogi State, making the plant the largest in Sub-Sahara Africa and one of the largest in the world.
data.aaf: Xangootih Sibinto Kaajah Cafatih Addal Yanih Yan Obaaja kee Ta Maktab Qusba Addah Murtisiyi Cogdal Fakimele፣ Ta Taklite Sacarak Gubal Tan Afrikak Nabam kee Baadal Kaxxam Abelem Kini.
data.amh: ዳንጎቴ ሲሚንቶ በኮጊ ክልል በሚገኘው የኦባጃና ምርት ተkም አዲስ የምርት መስመር ዘረጋ፤ ይህም ከሰሃራ በተች ትልቁ እንዲሁም በአለም ላይ ከሚገኙ ደግሞ እንደ አንዱ ያደርገዋል።
data.orm: Simmintoon Daangotee sarara oomishaa haaraa dhaabbata isaa Obajaanaa kan Isteetii Koogii keessa jiru keessatti bane, warshicha warshaa isa guddicha Sab-Saaharaa Afrikaa akkasumas gurguddoo addunyaa keessaa isa tokko gochuudhaan.
data.som: Warshada sibidhka ee Dangote ayaa jiho cusub oo wax-soo-saar ah ka furayaa xaruntiisa Obajana ee Gobolka Kogi, taasoo ka dhigaysa warshadda midda ugu weyn Afrikada Saxaraha ah hooseeya iyo kuwa ugu waweyn adduunkaba.
data.tir: ዳንጎቴ ሴመንት ኣብ ክልል ጎጂ ኦባጃና ኣብዝተብሃለ ትሕዝትኡ ሓድሽ ማእኸል ፍርያት ዝኸፈተ እንትኾን ብዚ’ውን ትሕቲ ሳሃራ ኣብዘሎ ክፋል ኣፍሪካ እቲ ዝገዘፈ፣ ኣብ ዓለም ድማ ሓደ ካብቶም ዝገዘፉ ትካላት ኮይኑ።

data.eng: A day after the arrest of opposition politicians, a mass anti-Putin protest takes place in central Moscow.
data.aaf: Sadi Misoynaani kak Yumuxiyen Inki Ayrok Lakal MoskohFanteenah Addal Inkih Butin Sadih Soolo Abelon.
data.amh: በመካከለኛ ሞስኮ ተቃዋሚ ፖለቲካኞች ከተያዙ አንድ ቀን በ|ላ ፑቲንን የሚያወግዝ ሰላማዊ ሰልፍ ተደረገ።
data.orm: Mormitootnii siyaasaa erga hidhamanii guyyaa tokko booda hiriirri mormii farra-putiin giddu gala Mooskootti ni geggeeffama.
data.som: Banaan bax ballaadhan oo looga soo hor jeedo Putin ayaa ka dhacaya bartamaha Moscow maalin kadib markii la xidhay siyaasiyiinta mucaaradka ah.
data.tir: ተቓወምቲ ፖሎቲከኛታት ድሕሪ ሓደ መዓልቲ ምእሳሮም፡ ኣብ ማእከል ከተማ ሞስኮ ኣንጻር ፑቲን ዓቢ ናይ ሓፋሽ ተቓውሞ ሰላማዊ ሰልፊ ተወዲቡ።

data.eng: The World Health Organization (WHO) concludes that diesel exhaust causes cancer.
data.aaf: Baadak Qafiyat (Egla) Nafta mawqah Kanser Katasele kak Dafeese.
data.amh: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት (WHO) የናፍጣ ጭስ ካንሰርን ያስከትላል ብሎ ደምድሟል።
data.orm: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa (WHO) aarri naafxaa Kaanserii akka fidu ibse.
data.som: Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) ayaa kusoo gabagabeeysay in qiiqa ka dhasha naaftada ay sababto kansar.
data.tir: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (ደብሊዩ:ኤች:ኦ) ካብ ናፍጣ ዝወፅእ ጋዝ መንሽሮ ከምዘስዕብ ኣብ መደምደምታ በፂሑ።

data.eng: Scientists announce creation of a new chemical compound, NOTT-202, capable of selectively absorbing carbon dioxide.
data.aaf: Saynis Tutaxago Karben Xayoksayix Yamrutenimih Duddi Leh Yan Kemikal Agle NOTT-202 Gintem Qadosen.
data.amh: ሳይንቲስቶች ኖት 202(NOTT-202) የተባለ አዲስ የኬሚካል ንጥረ ነገር በመፍጠር ካርቦን ዳይ ኦክሳይድን መጦ ማስቀረት ይቻላል ሲሉ ገለፁ።
data.orm: Saayintistoonni Kompaawundii Keemikaalaa Haaraa NOTT-202 jedhamu kan dandeetti Kaarnboondaay Oksaayidii addatti xuuxuu danda'u beeksisan.
data.som: Saynisyahannadu waxay ku dhawaaqeen abuurista kiimiko cusub, NOTT-202, oo awood u leh inay si gaar ah u nuugto kaarboon dhay ogsaydh.
data.tir: ካርቦን ዳይኦክሳይድ ማሚዩ ክስሕብ ዚኽእል፣ ኖት-202፣ ዝብሃል ሓድሽ ከሚካዊ ውሁድ ከም እተማህዘ ሊቃውንቲ ኣፍሊጦም ኣለዉ።

data.eng: Czech Republic goalkeeper Petr Čech drops a clanger in his country's game against 2004 champions Greece in a match that had the fewest shots in the European Championship since 1980.
data.aaf: Cheek Riboblik Gol yabixi biter cheek 1980 wadirih Aworobah Shambiyonah Addal DogomGirari edde yekke digir kay baaxo 2004 ShambiyonaGerikilih aben digiril waxaqah Qideh.
data.amh: የቼክ ሪፐብሊኩ ግብ ጠባቂ ፒተር ቼክ ሃገሩ ቼክ ከ2004 ሻምፒዮኖቹ ግሪክ ጋር በምትጫወትበትና ጥቂት የጎል ሙከራዎች በተደረጉበት ጨዋታ ስህተት ሰራ።
data.orm: Goolii eegaan Cheek Rippaabiliik,Piiter Cheek dorgommiin erga bara 1980 as Shaampiyoonshippii Awurooppaa keessatti marsaa muraasa qofa dorgomame biyyi isaa shaampiyoona bara 2014ii Greek waliin goote irraatti dogoggora hamaa raawwate.
data.som: Goolhayaha Czech Republic Petr Čech ayaa dhibic tuuray ciyaartii dalkiisa ee ay la ciyaareen kooxda heysata horyaalnimada 2004 ee Giriigga kulan ay ku jireen darbooyinkii ugu yaraa koobka qaramada Yurub tan iyo 1980kii.
data.tir: ሓላዊ ልዳት ሪፓብሊክ ቸክ ዝኾነ ፔተር ቸክ ኣንጻር ጎብለል 2004 ዝኾነት ግሪኽ ግጥም ኣብ ዘካይደሉ ዝነበረ እዋን ጭልው ጭልው እና በለ ወዲቑ፣ ካብ 1980 ኣትሒዙ ካብ እተገብረ ውድድር እቲ ዝወሓደ ቅላዓት እዩ ኣጋጢሙ።

data.tir: ናይ መጥምቁ ዮሃንስ ተብሂሉ ዝእመነሉን ኣብ ቡልጋሪያ ዝተረኸባን ቅሪተ ዓፅሚ ድሕሪ ልደተ ክርስቶስ ኣብ መጀመርታ ምእተ ዓመት ዝነበረ ምኻኑ ብሳይንሳዊ መንገዲ ተረጋጊፁ ።

data.eng: In Afghanistan, Taliban soldiers invade a hotel in Kabul, kill guests, and hold some hostages.
data.aaf: Afganistan Tanliban Qaskoora Kabul Addal Hutel Raddak Qabnaytit Qidak Inkiinki gicloaba Ibixeenih.
data.amh: በአፍጋኒስታን የታሊባን ወታደሮች በካቡል ውስጥ ሆቴል በመውረር እንግዶችን ሲገድሉ አንዳንድ ታጋቾችን ደግሞ ይዘዋል።
data.orm: Afgaanistaan keessatti, loltoonni Taalibaan hoteela Kaabul keessaa tokko weeraruun, keessummoota ajjeesanii, namoota muraasa hidhan.
data.som: Afgaanistaan, askarta Daalibaan ayaa weerar ku qaaday hoteel ku yaal Kabul, iyaga oo ku dilay martidii hotelka joogtay qaar kalena qafaashay.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣፍጋሃኒስታን ኣብ ከቡል ንሓደ ሆቴል ዝወረሩ ወታሃደራት ታሊባን ንኣጋይሽ ቀቲሎም ንገሊኦም ድማ ዓጊቶም ።

data.eng: The Syrian military shoots down a Turkish F-4 Phantom fighter jet after it had entered Syrian airpsace over the Mediterranean Sea.
data.aaf: Suriyah Qande Inki Turkiyah F-4 bantom Qeebi Jeti MexiterraneanBaddal illA Suriya qaran Rakaakay Culek Lakal Yogere.
data.amh: በሜዲትራኒያን ባህር ላይ ወደ ሶሪያ አየር ክልል ከገባ በኋላ የቱርክ ኤፍ-4 ፎንቶም ተዋጊ ጀት በሶሪያ ጦር ተመትቷል።
data.orm: Waraanni Siiriyaa Galaana Mediteraaniyaan irratti erga inni daangaa qilleensaa Siiriyaa seenee booda xiyyaara waraanaa Turkii F-4 Faantom rukutee buuse.
data.som: Milatariga Siiriya ayaa soo riday diyaarad dagaalka ee F-4 Phantom taas oo laga leeyahay Turkiga, kadib markii ay soo gashay hawada sare ee Siiriya iyadoo la sheegay in ay kasoo gashay dhanka iyo badda Mediterranean-ka.
data.tir: ኣብ ሜዲቴሪንያን ባሕሪ ንክልል ኣየር ሶሪያ ጥሒሳ ዝኣተወት ናይ ቱር ኪ F-4 ፋንቶም ተዋጋኢት ጄት ብወታደራት ሶሪያ ተወቒዓ ።

data.eng: A United States judge dismisses an injunction from Apple Inc. against Motorola for patent infringement.
data.aaf: US Garkure Wanini Gaar Cinak Motorola Apple Inc
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ዳኛ የአፕል ድርጅት በሞቶሮላይ ያነሳውን የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት ጥያቄ እንደማይቀበለው አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Abbaan Murtii Yunaytid Isteetis himannaa Appil Iink yakka mirga abba qabeenyummaa kalaqaa cabsuudhaan Motoroollaa himate kuffise.
data.som: Garsoore Mareykan ah aya kiiski xadgudubka ay kudacewaysay shirkada Motorola in ay kusamaysay xad gudubtay shati shirkadda Apple Inc aya la afjaray.
data.tir: ሓደ ዳይና ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኣፕል ኩባንያ ኣብ ልዕሊ ሞቶሮላ ንዘቕርቦ ናይ ምህዞ ዋንነት እገዳ ውድቂ ገይሩዎ ።

data.eng: Canadian-American game show personality Alex Trebek suffers a mild heart attack, but is expected to "fully recover".
data.aaf: Kanaday Ameerikah Digirih Mudaqinu kee Alekis Terike Dagoom Lubi Eclah Yaynukuse፣ “Takkay Inkiyah Qafotele” Axcuk Qambalan::
data.amh: በካናዳ-አሜሪካ ጨዋታ ትርኢት ላይ የሚታወቀው አሌክስ ትሬቤክ ዝቅተኛ የልብ ድካም ያጋጠመው ሲሆን ፣ “ሙሉ በሙሉ ይድናል” ተብሎም ይጠበቃል።

data.som: Ciyaarta kanada-Maraykanka ayaa waxay muujineysaa shaqsiyadda Alex Trebek oo wadnuhu istaagay, laakiin waxaa la filayaa inuu "si buuxda u bogsan doono".
data.tir: ኣሌክስ ትሬቤክ ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ ዜግነት ኣሜሪካን ካናዳን ዘለዎ ውሩይ ኣሰናዳኢ ፀወታ ብኮምፒዩተር ቀሊል ሕማም ልቢ ዘጓነፎ እኳ እንተኾነ ሙሉእ ብሙሉእ ክሕሾ ትፅቢት ተገይሩሉ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The University of Virginia reinstates President Teresa Sullivan after she was ousted without a formal vote earlier this month.
data.aaf: Verjiniya Jaamiqatih berezixanti Teresa suvanin ta alsat qimbol Xongolo miracinuk diriyimek wadiril Taama fanah Andabele.
data.amh: የቨርጂኒያ ዩንቨርስቲ በወሩ መጀመሪያ መደበኛ ባልሆነ መልኩ ከምርጫ ውጪ የሆኑትን ፕሬዜዳንት ቴሬሳ ሱሊቫንን ዳግም ወደቦታቸው መለሰ።

data.som: Jaamacadda Virginia ayaa dib u soo celisay Madaxweyne Teresa Sullivan ka dib markii xilka laga qaaday iyada oo aan cod rasmi ah loo helin horaantii bishan.
data.tir: እታ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ወርሒ ብዘይስሩዕ መረፃ ካብ መዘነታ ተላዒላ ዝነበረት ናይ’ቲ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፕሬዝዳንት ቴሬሳ ሱልቢያን ናብ ሓላፊነታ ክትምለስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ቨርጂንያ ወሲኑ።

data.eng: Former Pennsylvania State Representative Stephen Stetler is convicted of all six counts in his corruption case.

data.amh: የቀድሞው የፔንሲልቬንያ ግዛት ተወካይ እስቴፈን ስቴለር ክስ በቀረበባቸው በስድስቱ የሙስና ወንጀሎች በሁሉም ጥፋተኛ ሆነው ተገኝተዋል።

data.som: Wakiilkii hore ee Gobolka Pennsylvania Stephen Stetler ayaa lagu oogay dhammaan lixda dacwadood ee kiiskiisa musuqmaasuqa.
data.tir: ወካሊ መንግስቲ ነበር ግዝኣት ፔልሲልቬንያ ስቴፈን ስቴትለር ብዝቐረቦም ሽድሽተ ክስታት ግዕዝይና ብሙልኦም ገበነኛ ተባሂሎም ተፈሪዱዎም።

data.eng: Colombia evacuates towns near the Nevado del Ruiz volcano over concerns about a possible eruption.
data.aaf: Chayina In the Chayinah Tayara Takuqe Liaoning Qeebi Tayarah Obosiya kee Aqrufiyal Abeh Yan Namma Hadise Gibate Saqat Qideenih Inte.
data.amh: ኮሎምቢያ በኔቫዶ ዴል ሩዝ እሳተ ገሞራ አቅራቢያ ያሉ ከተሞችን ሊፈጠር ከሚችል የእሳተ ገሞራ ፍንዳታ ስጋት የተነሳ ነዋሪዎችን ከከተሞቹ አስወጥታለች።›
data.orm: Kolombiyaan magaalota naannoo volkaanoo Nevaadoo del Ruwiiz jiran sababa waa'ee yaaddoo dhuka'uu maluuf gara nagaa qabutti baaste.
data.som: Kolombiya ayaa faaruqisay magaalooyin ku dhow buuraha Nevado del Ruiz sababo la xidhiidha walwal laga qabo inuu foolkanuhu qarxo.

data.eng: GlaxoSmithKline settles the largest healthcare fraud case in US history for $3 billion dollars.
data.aaf: GlaxoSmithKline Ameerika Aydaadih Addal Nabba Qafiyat Umadoobisiyi Caagid 3 bilyoonih Dolaar Yifrige.
data.amh: ግላኮስሚትክላይን በአሜሪካ ታሪክ ውስጥ ትልቁን የጤና ጥበቃ ማጭበርበር ጉዳይ በ 3 ቢሊዮን የአሜሪካ ዶላር ፈቷል።
data.orm: GalaksoIsmiizKaayin yakka waliin dhahuu eegumsa fayyaa keessaa seenaa US keessatti doolaara biliyoona $3'n fure.
data.som: GlaxoSmithKline ayaa ku xalisay kiiska khiyaanada daryeelka caafimaadka ee ugu weyn taariikhda Mareykanka $ 3 bilyan oo doollar.
data.tir: ግላኮሶስሚዝክሊን ነቲ ኣብ ታሪኽ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ኣመሪካ ካብ እተፈጸመ ናይ ክንክን ጥዕና ምትላል እቲ ዝዓበየ ጕዳይ ብ3 ቢልዮን ዶላር ኣመሪካ መዕለቢ ገበረትሉ።

data.eng: Syrian President Bashar al Assad accuses neighboring Turkey of supporting "terrorists" and contributing to the bloodshed in Syria.
data.aaf: Soriyah Berexizanti Bashar Al Asad Cuggane ta Turkiya “Qarkakisa” Qokolak Suriyal Qabali Caxit Doori abte Axcuk Malkitise.
data.amh: በሽር አል አሳድ፣ የሶሪያ ፕሬዝዳንት ጎረቤት ቱርክን አሸባሪዎችን በመደገፍ በሶሪያ ደም መፋሰስ አስተዋፅኦ አድርጋለች በማለት ክስ አቅርበዋል።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Siiriyaa Bashar al Asaad ollaan isaa Turkiin "shororkeessitoota" deggeruun dhangala'uu dhiigaa Siiriyaa keessaatti dabalaa jirti jechuun himate.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Siiriya Bashaar Al Asad ayaa ku eedeynaya dalka ay jaarka yihiin ee Turkiga in ay taageeraan “argagixisada” ayna gacan ka geystaan daadinta dhiigga shacabka Suuriya.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ሶሪያ በሽር ኣልዓሳድ ጐረቤት ቱርኪ ‹‹ ንኣሽበርቲ ›› ኣናሓገዘት ንምፍሳስ ደም ሶሪያ ተጋድዶ ኣላ ክብሉ ከሲሶም ።

data.eng: Cambodian health officials identify Enterovirus 71 as a possible cause for an outbreak in which at least 64 children have died.
data.aaf: Kambooxiyak Qafiyat Miraciini wali 64 Canxawi Kah rabe Dalkay intertoviosu 71 Baxisak Yamixigeh.
data.amh: የካምቦዲያ የጤና ባለሙያዎች ለ64 ህፃናት ሞት የዳረገ ነው የተባለውን ወረርሽኝ ኤንትሮቫይረስ 71 ነው ሲሉ ለይተውታል።
data.orm: Aangawoonni fayyaa Kaamboodiyaa Intrirovaayiras 71'n sababa weeraraa kan yoo xiqqaate ijoolleen 64 itti du'anii akka tahuu danda'u adda baasan.
data.som: masuuliyiinta caafimaadka ee wadanka Kambodiya waxay ogaadeen in fayraska Enterovirus 71 ay suuragal tahay inuu dillaaco, kadib markay ugu yaraan 64 carruura ay u dhinteen.
data.tir: ሰበ ስልጣን ጥዕና ካምቦድያ ኣብ’ታ ሃገር ንዝተጋፍሐን ብውሑድ ን64 ህፃናት ሞት ጠንቂ ዝኾነን ኢንትሮቫይረስ 71 ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ኣመላኺቶም።

data.eng: South Africa cricket player Mark Boucher ends his career after sustaining an eye injury during the tour of England.

data.eng: The African Union choose Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma of South Africa as its leader, making her the first woman to occupy the post, in a hard fought battle with incumbent Jean Ping of Gabon.
data.aaf: Afrikah Inkiino Gabi Qaxi Afrika Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma Saqal Abak Doorak, Jean Ping of Gabon lih Abeh Yan Gibdi qeebit Abixuk Qimbo Say Num Hayte.
data.amh: የአፍሪካ ህብረት ደቡብ አፍሪካዊዋን ንኮሳዛና ዲያሚኒ ዙማን መሪው አድርጎ ሾመ፤ ይህም ግለሰቧን የመጀመሪያዋ ሴት ያደርጋታል፤ ይህን ስልጣን ለማግኘት ከጋቦኑ ዢን ፒነግ ጋር ከባድ ፉክክር አድርገዋል።
data.orm: Gamtaan Afirikaa falmii jabaa kan aangoorra ture Jiin Piingii Gaabon waliin godhame booda Kosazaanaa Jilamini-Zumaa Afrikaa Kibbaa akka hoogganaatti filachuun, dubartii jalqabaa bakkicha qabattu ishee taasise.
data.som: Ururka Midowga Afrika ayaa hoggaamiyahooda u doortay Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma oo u dhalatay Koonfur Afrika, taasoo ka dhigaysa haweeneydii ugu horreysay ee qabata jagadan, dagaal adag oo ay la gashay Jean Ping oo u dhashay Gabon.
data.tir: ኣፍሪቃዊ ሕብረት ንደቡብ ኣፍሪቃዊት ዝኾነት ንኮሳዛና ድላሚኒ-ዙማ ኣዶ መንበር እቲ ሕብረት ክትከውን ስለ ዝመረጸ ምስቲ ሕጂ ዘሎ ፕረዚደንት ጋቦናዊ ዣን ፒንግ ዝነበራ ሓያል ውድድር ናይ መጀመርታ መራሒት ጓል ኣንስተይቲ ኮይና።

data.eng: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration approves Truvada as the first drug shown to reduce the risk of HIV infection.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Maqqida kee Diwata Xiinise Teruvaxa HIV ADIS V Yabixemih qawlayla addah intuh tumbuluye Qimbo Diwaata kinim Faticisan.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ምግብ እና መድሃኒት አስተዳደር ትሩቫዳ የተሰኘው መድሃኒት በኤችአይቪ (HIV) የመያዝ እድልን ይቀንሳል ሲል አረጋገጠ።
data.orm: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Daawwaa U.S.,Tiruvaadaa akka daawwaa jalqabaa balaa dhibee HIV hir'isuu danda'utti mirkaneessan.
data.som: Maamulka Cuntada iyo Dawooyinka ee Maraykanka ayaa ansixiyay daawada Truvada inay tahay dawadii ugu horreysay ee muujisa yaraynta halista caabuqa HIV.
data.tir: ምምሕዳር ምግቢን መድሓኒትን ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ትሩቫዳ ንሓደጋ ረኽሲ ኤች.ኣይ.ቪ ኣብ ምቕናስ ርኡይ ለውጢ ዘምፅአ ፈላማይ መድሓኒት ገይሩ ኣፅዲቑ።

data.eng: The UK's Manchester Airport launches an inquiry after an 11-year-old boy boarded a plane to Rome unaccompanied, and without passport, tickets or boarding pass.

data.amh: የዩኬው ማንቸስተር አየርመንገድ የ11 አመት እድሜ ያለው ህፃን ልጅ ወደ ሮም በሚሄድ በረራ ላይ ፓስፖርተ፣ ትኬት እና የመሳፈሪያ ፍቃድ ሳይዝ ብቻውን በመሳፈሩ ከዚህ በ|ላ የሚተገበር የህጋዊነት መጠይቅ አምድ አዘጋጀ።

data.som: Madaarka Manchester ee UK ayaa bilaabay baadhitaan kadib markii wiil 11 jir ah uu diyaarad Rome u koray isaga oo aan lalasoconin, oo aan haysan baasaboor, sidanina tigidhkii diyaarada uu kukori laha.

data.eng: The opening ceremony for the 2012 Summer Olympics takes place at the London Olympic Stadium with Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom declaring the Games open. ,
data.aaf: 2012 bega Olombik Fakental Takuwayta lendol olombik Booxah addal Ingilizik Elzabet Takume Digiraba Digirite fakut tanim kinim Faticisemkini.
data.amh: የ 2012 የበጋ ኦሎምፒክ የመክፈቻ ሥነ -ስርዓት የሚከናወነው በለንደን ኦሎምፒክ ስታዲየም ውስጥ የእንግሊዟ ኤልዛቤት ዳግማዊ የጨዋታዎቹን መጀመር በማወጅ ነው።
data.orm: Qophiin baniinsa Olompikii Bonaa bara 2012 Istaadiyemii Olompikii London keessatti Elizaabet II'n Yunaayitid Kiingidem taphichi akka eegalamu labsuudhaan geggeeffame.
data.som: Xafladda furitaanka ciyaaraha Olombikada xagaaga ee 2012 waxay ka dhacayaan garoonka ciyaaraha Olombikada ee London iyadoo Elizabeth 2aad ee Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ay ku dhawaaqday in aay ciyaaruhu furan yihiin.
data.tir: ናይ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ኤልዛቤት ካልአይቲ ንዕላውነት እታ ፀዋታ ምስኣብሰራ ስነስርዓት ምኽፋት ኦሎምፒክ ሓጋይ 2012 ዓ.ም.ፈ ተጀሚሩ።

data.eng: The sudden death of writer Maeve Binchy, who sold more than 40 million books worldwide, is announced on Irish television by Vincent Browne.
data.aaf: Baad Caddol 40 milyonuuk Dagga Takke Kitooba Limoseh yan Kataab MaVi Binchi Cubuweyni Rabba Ayerlandi Baadal Yaysabil Vensente Berne Qadoose::
data.amh: በዓለም ዙሪያ ከ 40 ሚሊዮን በላይ መጻሕፍትን የሸጠው ጸሐፊ ሜቭ ቢንቺ ድንገተኛ ሞት በአየርላንድ ቴሌቪዥን በቪንሰንት ብሮን ተገለጸ።
data.orm: Oduun du'aatii tasaa barreessaa Meyiiv Binchii kan sadarkaa idil addunyaatti kitaabota milliyoona 40 ol gurguratee televizyoona Ayrish irratti viinsent Braawonin labsame
data.som: Geerida lama filaanka ah ee kudhacday qoraaga Maeve Binchy, oo iibiyay in ka badan 40 milyan oo buug oo adduunka oo dhan ah, ayaa waxaa shaaciyay talafeshika Irish Vincent Browne.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ሙሉእ ዓለም ልዕሊ 40 ሚልዮን መፃሕፍቲ ዝሸጠ ደራሲ ሜቭ ቢንቺይ ሃንደበት ከምዝሞተ ቪንሰንት ብራውን ኣብ ቴሌቪዥን ኣየርላንድ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Advertiser accuses Facebook of fraud after discovering that 80% of the clicks they're paying for are from bots, and not actual potential customers.
data.aaf: Taysaxaaxago Feecbuuk Meklo kah meklanmarak Dagoom 80% Awra Kalah Gitah takkem Dudam Maqmilwa Akewaytam Tekkek Lakal Umadobisaanamal Cigilele.
data.amh: በፌስቡክ ማስታወቂያ የሚያሰሩ አካላት ፌስቡክ እያጭበረበረን ነው ሲሉ ፌስቡክን ወቀሱ፤ ይህንንም ያሉት 80 በመቶ የሚሆነው የማስታወቂያ እይታ በእውነተኛ ደምበኞች ሳይሆን በሰው ሰራሽ ቦቶች እንደሚሸፈን ካረጋገጡ በ|ላ ነው።

data.som: Facebook ayay khiyaano kueedeyeen xayasiiyayasha adeegsada adeegoda iyo instagramka kadib marka ay ogaadeen in uu yahay 80% gujisyada aybixiyaan mid aanan macamiisa kaiman balse bots yahay.
data.tir: ሓደ ኣብ ምልላይ ዝሰርሕ ትካል ፌስቡክ ዝፍፅሞ ክፍሊት ምፍታው ናይ ሓቀኛ መፃኢ ዓማዊል ዘይኮኑስ ካብ ናይ ሕሶት ምንጭታት ዝምንጭው እዮም ብምባል ብምውቓዕ ከሲስዎ።

data.eng: In athletics, Oscar Pistorius of South Africa becomes the first amputee to compete at the Olympic Games in the 400 meters.
data.aaf: Eglal Ibi Koqsoh Addal reyal madrid K.Ronaldo Asamak Nuyer kee bayer monik Ariyon roben Aworobak Meqe digiraba Acwal tyso yekken.
data.amh: በአትሌቲክስ፤ የሳውዝ አፍሪካው ኦስካር ፒስቶሪየስ በ400 ሜትር በኦሎምፒክ ውድድሮች የተካፈለ የመጀመሪያው አካል ጉዳተኛ ሆነ።
data.orm: gama Atileetiksiin lammiin Afirikaa kibbaa Oskaar Piischurus fageenya meetira 400n qaamaa hir'uu dorgommii Oloompikii irratti hirmaate jalqabaa ta'e.
data.som: Dhinaca Atletikiska, Oscar Pistorius oo u dhashay dalka Koonfur Afrika ayaa noqday qofkii ugu horreeyey ee dhutiya oo ka qayb gala ciyaaraha Olombikada ee 400 mitir.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣትሌቲክስ፣ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃዊ ኦስካር ፒስቶሪዮስ ኣብ ናይ 400 ሜትሮ ውድድር ጒያ ኣብ ውድድር ጸወታ ኦሊምፒክስ ቀዳማይ በዓል ቆራጽ ኣካልት ተወዳዳሪ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: NASA's Mars Science Laboratory Curiosity rover lands safely on the surface of Mars.
data.aaf: NASA marsi saynis lablatory Yaxigemin fayxi Rover Marsi Exxal Salaamah Tuqrufe.
data.amh: የናሳው የማርስ ሳይንስ ላቦራቶሪ ኪሪዮሲቲ ሮቨር ወደ ማርስ በሰላም ደርሷል።
data.orm: Laaboratoriin Saayinsii Maarsii NASA konkolaataa Kiyuroositii irra keessa Maarsii irra nagaan qubachiise.
data.som: Haayada NASA ee Shaybaarka Sayniska iyo meeraha mars aya waxay sheegtay in dayax gacmeedka Curiosity rover si nabad ah ugu degay meeraha Mars.
data.tir: እታ ናይ ናሳ ቤተ ፈተነ ሳይንስ ማርስ ዝኾነት ኩየረሲቲ ሮቨር ኣብ ባይታ ማርስ ብሰላም ዓሊባ።

data.eng: A welding fire breaks out but is soon extinguished, with no injuries, on the 88th floor of One World Trade Center in New York City.
data.aaf: Inki Gabla Radewak Fanti Xamcin Baaxol Geytima Lee Calih Raceenah Xisne Inki Say Bara Edde Anuk Taban Kee Namma Vatikal Taama Abeenit Edde Yibixen.
data.amh: በኒው ዮርክ ከተማ በሚገኘው ዋን ወርልድ የንግድ ማዕከል 88 ኛ ፎቅ ላይ የብየዳ እሳት ተነስቶ ምንም ዓይነት ጉዳት ሳይደርስ በፍጥነት ጠፍቷል።
data.orm: Ibiddi ittiin sibiila hojjetan darbii 88ffaa Giddugala Daldalaa Waan Woorlid kan Magaalaa Niwu Yoork keessaa irratti nama harkaa bahuun garuu miidhaa utuu hin geessisin dafee dhaamsame.
data.som: Dabka alxanka ayaa kuufaafay laakiin isla markiiba la bakhtiiyey, iyada oo aan wax dhaawac ahi soo gaadhin, dabaqa 88aad ee One World Trade Center ee magaalada New York.
data.tir: ኣብ ኒዮርክ ኣብ ሓዲኡ መበል 88 ደብሪ ማእኸል ንግዲ ዓለም ብብየዳ ዝተፈጠረ ባርዕ ጉድኣት ከይበፅሐ ሽዑ ክጠፍእ ተገይሩ።

data.eng: German footballer Robert Huth is hospitalised with suspected meningitis.
data.aaf: Garmanakibi koqsoh digir abe Robert huut wagisak sugen Fil Lakimah hosbitalal inaqite.
data.amh: ጀርመናዊው የእግር ኳስ ተጫዋች ሮበርት ሁት በማጅራት ገትር በሽታ ተጠርጥሮ ሆስፒታል ገብቷል።

data.som: Ciyaaryahankii Jarmalka Robert Huth ayaa la dhigay dhakhtar isagoo looga shakisan yahay qoorgooyaha.

data.eng: Qatar is to deposit US$2bn at the Egyptian Central Bank in an effort to help support an economy battered by a year and a half of political turmoil, an Egyptian presidency statement reports.
data.aaf: Inki sanatak qaxa Siyaasah taqabit biyakite Maduur catimtuh Kuatar 2 bilyoonih Dolllar Masri Fanti bankil dafesem kinim masri berezixantih MaybalalaqaXayose.
data.amh: በአንድ ዓመት ተኩል የፖለቲካ ውዝግብ የተጎዳውን ኢኮኖሚ ለመደገፍ ኳታር 2 ቢሊዮን ዶላር በግብፅ ማዕከላዊ ባንክ ላይ ልታስቀምጥ መሆኑን የግብፅ ፕሬዝዳንት መግለጫ ዘግቧል።
data.orm: Akka gabaasni pirasdaantii Gibxii beeksisetti Kaataar diinagdee sababa jeequmsa siyaasaa waggaa tokkoof walakkaan miidhame deggeruuf akka gargaarutti US$2bn Baankii Giddugaleessaa Gibxii keessa kahachuufi.
data.som: Qatar ayaa ku shubi doonta Bangiga Dhexe ee Masar 2 bilyan oo doollar si ay gacan uga geysato taageeridda dhaqaale ay hal sano iyo badh kala kulmeen qalalaase siyaasadeed, sida lagu sheegay war ka soo baxay madaxtooyada Masar.
data.tir: ቤት ጽሕፈት ፕረዚደንት ግብጺ ኣብ ዘውጽኦ መግለጺ ነቲ ብሰንኪ ዓመትን መንፈቕን ዘጋጠመ ፖለቲካዊ ናዕቢ ዝዓነወ ቁጠባ ንምድጋፍ ቀጠር ንማእከላይ ባንክ ግብጺ 2 ቢልዮን ዶላር ኣመሪካ ክትህብ ኢያ።

data.eng: In Somalia, a new parliament is formed, with the new task of electing the country's president.

data.eng: At least 20 people in the Democratic Republic of the Congo die from the Ebola virus disease.
data.aaf: Ximokratik riboblik Kongolh Addalwali 20 num Iboolah vayrisih lakimah Rabele.
data.amh: በዲሞክራቲክ ሪፑበሊክ ኮንጎ በትንሹ 20 ሰዎች በኤቦላ በሽታ ለሞት ተዳርገዋል።
data.orm: Dhukkubni vaayirasii Iboolaa Rippaabilika Diimokiraatikii Koongoo keessatti yoo xiqqaate namoota 20 ajjeese.
data.som: Ugu yaraan 20 qof oo ku nool Jamhuuriyadda Dimuqraadiga ee Congo ayaa u dhinta cudurka fayraska Ebola.
data.tir: ኣብ ዴሞክራቲክ ሪፐብሊክ ኮንጐ ብውሑድ 20 ሰባት ብሕማም ቫይረስ ኢቦላ ሞይቶም።

data.eng: A South Korean court rules that Apple Inc. and Samsung Electronics infringed each other's patents on mobile computing technology.
data.aaf: Gabi kuriyah Garoyseh Buxa Abil inki kee Samesingi Gombodmali mobayilite Kombuter teknolojil Inikiti waninuh Gar Cineh.
data.amh: አፕል ኢንክ እና ሳምሰንግ ኤሌክትሮኒክስ በሞባይል ኮምፒዩተር ቴክኖሎጂ ላይ አንዳቸው የሌላውን የባለቤትነት መብት መጣሳቸውን የደቡብ ኮሪያ ፍርድ ቤት አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Manni murtii koriyaa kibbaa teekinoloojii komptiitara moobayilii irrattii Appil iinki fi Saamsang elektirooniksiin mirga ragaa abba qabeenyumma kalaqaa walii isaanii cabsuu isaniitiif manni murtichaa murtee nii dabarsa.
data.som: Maxkamad Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa xukuntay in Apple Inc. iyo Samsung Electronics ay midba midka kale ku xadgudbaan qishka sharcidarada ah ee teknolojiyadda xisaabinta moobiilka.
data.tir: ኩባንያታት ኣፕልን ሳምሰንግን ሞባይል ኮምፒዩተር ቴክኖሎጂታቶም ብዝምልከት ሰሳቶም ተሰራሪቖም እዮም ብምባል ሓደ ቤት ፍርዲ ደቡብ ኮርያ በይኑ።

data.eng: An outbreak of Legionellosis (Legionnaires' disease) in Quebec City, Canada, kills 8 people and infects 104.
data.aaf: Kanadak Kubik Citi Addal Ligiyusis (LigiyusisLakimi ) 8 num qadak 104numta lakimat dufumte.
data.amh: በካናዳዋ ኪዩቢክ ከተማ እየተስፋፋ ያለው የሌጊኦኔሎሲስ ወይም ሌጊኦኔይር በሽታ 104 ሰዎችን ይዞ ሰዎችን ለህልፈት አድርጓል።
data.orm: Weerarri Legiyooneloosis (dhibee Leegiyooners) Kiyuubek Siitii, Kanaadaa keessatti namoota 8 ajjeesee 104 dhukkubsachiise
data.som: Cudurka Legionnaires oo ka dillaacay Magaalada Quebec ee dalka Canada, ayaa dilay 8 qof halka u 104 kalena u haleelay.
data.tir: ኣብ ካናዳ ኣብ ከተማ ኩቤክ ዝተኸሰተ ለበዳ ሌግዮኔሎሲስ (ሕማም ቁሪ ሌግዮናየሬስ) 8 ሰባት ቀቲሉ ን104 ድማ ለኺፉ።

data.eng: Leslie Buckley, a close associate of Denis O'Brien, is elected chairman of Independent News & Media.
data.aaf: Xeenis Oberain Xayi Qekole Kinih Yan Lesili Bukileyi Curi kee Maadal Taybuli Kee Taysaabi Saqal Akuk Doorime.
data.amh: የዴንስ ኦብሬይን የቅርብ የስራ ባልደረባ የሆነው ሌስሊ በክሊ ለ ኢንዲፔንደንት ኒውስ እና ሚዲያ ሊቀ-መንበር በመሆን ተመረጠ።
data.orm: Leslii Buuklee, deggeraan Deenis O'Breeyinitti dhiyaatu, dura ta'aa Oduu fi Miidiyaa Indipppeendent ta'ee filatame.
data.som: Leslie Buckley ayaa loo doortay guddoomiyaha Warbaahinta Madaxa bannaan isgaadsinta lana leh xidhidh aad udhaw Denis O'Brien .
data.tir: ናይ ቀረባ መሓዛ ዴኒስ ኦብሪያን ዝዀነት ሌስሊ ባክሌይ ኣዶመንበር ኢንዲፐንደንት ኒውስ ኤንድ ሚድያ ክዀና ተመሪፀን።

data.eng: The Prime Minister of Pakistan Raja Pervez Ashraf appears in the Pakistani Supreme Court over his failure to reopen investigations of corruption against President Asif Ali Zardari.
data.aaf: Bakistanak Naharsi Malaak Raja Pervez Ashra Berexizanti Asif Qali Zardaril Umadoobi Fikaqooqa Wadirik Fakimewaytemih Bakistan Sangarah Buxal xayoowe.
data.amh: የፓኪስታኑ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር የሆኑት ራጃ ፔርቨስ አሽራፍ በፕሬዚደንት አሲፍ ዛርዳሪ ላይ የቡስና ቅሌት ላይ ምርመራ አላስከፈቱም በሚል በሃገሪቱ ጠቅላይ ፍርድ ቤት ቀረቡ።
data.orm: Mummichi ministeeraa Paakistaan Raajaa Parveez Ashraf irra deebiin qorannoo yakka malaammaltummaa pirezidaant Asiif Alii zerdaarii irratti banuu dhiisuu isaaniitiin mana murtii olaanaa Paakistaanitti dhiyaatan.
data.som: Ra'iisul wasaaraha Pakistan Raja Pervez Ashraf ayaa lasoo istaajiyay maxkamadda sare ee Pakistan isaga oo ku fashilmay in uu dib u furo baaritaannada kiisaka musuqmaasuqa ee madaxweyne Asif Ali Zardari.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ፓኪስታን፣ ራጃ በርዊዝ ኣሽረፍ፣ ኣንጻር ፕረዚደንት ኣሲፍ ዓሊ ዘርዳሪ ናይ ብልሽውና መርመራታ ንምኽፋት ብሰንኪ ምፍሻሉ ኣብ ቅድሚ ላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ፓኪስታን ቀሪቡ።

data.eng: The banana spider venom is found by Brazilian researchers in some cases to relieve erectile dysfunctions in less than 20 minutes.
data.aaf: Banana qaloh sumi inkiinki calootal 20 minitik Dagowesin waktih addat erectile dysfunctions xiqoonuh birazil kusaqisa geyteh.
data.amh: በአንዳንድ የምርምር ሂደቶች ውስጥ በ20 ደቂቃ ውስጥ ለወንዶች ስንፈት ወሲብ ችግር መፍትሄ ይሰጣል የተባለለትን እና የሙዝ ሸረሪት ተብሎ በሚታወቀው የሸረሪት ዝርያ ሚመነጨውን መርዝ የብራዚል ተመራመሪዎች አገኙ።

data.som: Cilmi baadhayaal u dhashay dalka Brazil ayaa waxay sheegeen Sunta caarada ee loo yaqaano Banana spider ay yarayso cilladaha dareenka wax ka yar 20 daqiiqo gudaheed.

data.eng: The ruling People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola wins the Angolan general election with a preliminary 74.46% of the vote.
data.aaf: Angoola miracisa Ayyunti Angagoyite Amoladi Doorol Akumuk 74.46% Xongolol Yeyse.
data.amh: በአንጎላ በተደረገው ጠቅላላ ምርጫ የገዢው የህዝብ እንቅስቃሴ ለነፃነት ፓርቲ 74.46 በመቶ የሚሆነውን ድምፅ በማግኘት አሸነፈ።
data.orm: Kan bulchiinsa irra jiru Sosochiin Ummataa Birmadummaa Angoolaa filannoo waliigalaa Angoolaa bu'aa duraa sagalee 74.46%'n mo'ate.
data.som: xisbiga hogaaminaya dalka Dhaqdhaqaaqa umada ee xoraynta Angoola ayaa kuguulaystay doorashadii guud ayagoo helay cod dhan 74.46%

data.eng: Mexican police officers discover 16 corpses with signs of torture inside a vehicle in the southern state of Guerrero.

data.amh: የሜክሲኮ የፖሊስ መኮንኖች በደቡባዊ ጉሬሮ ግዛት ላይ በተሽከርካሪ ውስጥ በስቃይ መሞታቸውን የሚያመላክቱ አስራ ስድስት አስከሬኖችን አገኙ።

data.som: Saraakiisha booliiska Meksiko ayaa helay 16 mayd oo ay ka muuqdaan jirdil, kuwaas oo laga helay gobolka Guerrero ee koonfurta meksiiko.

data.eng: At least 21 passengers on board an Indonesian ferry that sank last night on the Mahakam River in East Kalimantan are missing and presumed dead.
data.aaf: Ayrp mawqal kalimanta mahakamal amboyra tumunxuqe inxuniziyah huuril safarak sugte safara 21 safara bayeenim yakelen.
data.amh: በምስራቅ ካሊማንታን ማሃካም ወንዝ ላይ ትናንት ምሽት በሰመጠችው የኢንዶኔዥያ ጀልባ ላይ የተጓዙ ብዛታቸው ከ ሃያ አንድ የማያንሱ ተሳፋሪዎች የጠፉ ሲሆን ሳይሞቱም እንደማይቀሩ ይገመታል።
data.orm: Baha kaalimatan laga Mahakam kessaattii eeda galgala dhidhima doonii Indooneezhiyaa mudateen yoo xiqqaate imaltooni 21 achi buuteen isaanii dhabamuusaatiin akka du'anittii tilmaamama.
data.som: Ugu yaraan 21 qof oo rakaab ah oo saarnaa doon laga leeyahy dalka Indonesia oo xalay ku degtay wabiga Mahakam ee bariga Kalimantan ayaa la la’yahay waxaana loo malaynaya dadkii doonta saarna inay dhamaantood ay dhinteen.

data.eng: People in over 180 cities of China attend protests sparked by Japan's nationalization of the Senkaku Islands and the 81st anniversary of the Mukden Incident.
data.aaf: 180 Dagga Chayinah Magaloolih Addal Tanih Tan Marite Jabanak Senkakuh FordaadilAgat Im Abem kee Mukden Tekoka 81hytoh Waynabol Ugusenih Yanin Saditeetal Angalelon.
data.amh: በ180 የቻይና ከተሞች ውስጥ የሚገኙ ዜጎች የሴናካኩ ደሴቶች በጃፓን ብሄራዊ መደረጋቸውን እና የ81ኛ አመት የሙክደን ክስተት አመታዊ በአልን በማስመልከት ተቃውሞ አሰምተዋል።
data.orm: Namoonni magaalota Chaayinaa 180 ol keessaa mormii biyyaalessuu Odolawwan Senkaakuu Jaappaan fi ayyaanaa yaadannoo 81ffaa Taatee Mukden'n dhoye irratti hirmaatan.
data.som: Dadka ku nool in ka badan 180 magaalo oo Shiinaha ah ayaa ka qeybgalay banaan baxyo ka dhashay markii Japan ay qarameysay Jasiiradaha Senkaku iyo sannad -guuradii 81 aad ee Dhacdadii Mukden.

data.eng: A court in the Vatican finds Pope Benedict XVI's former butler Paolo Gabriele guilty of theft for stealing and leaking confidential documents and sentences Gabriele to 18 months' imprisonment.

data.orm: Manni murtii Vaatikan keessaatti argamu qopheessaa nyaataa duranii Phaaphaasii Benedikt XVI Paawuloo Gabreeliin yakka hannaatii fi galmeewwan iccitii baasuutiin irrattii mirkana'een hidhaa ji'a 18n adabe.
data.som: Maxkamad ku taalla Vatican ayaa ku xukuntay baadarigii hore ee Pope Benedict 16aad Paolo Gabriele dambi xatooyo iyo siidayn dukumiintiyo qsir ah waxana lagu xukuntay Gabriele xabsi 18 bilood ah.

data.eng: Serge Haroche and David Wineland win the 2012 Nobel Prize in Physics for their work on quantum optics.
data.aaf: Serju Harochi kee xevix winlandu kanitme Obetikesil Aben Taama fizikisil 2012 Nobil Acwal Yeyse.
data.amh: ሰርጄ ሃሮች እና ዴቪድ ዋይንላንድ ኩዋንተም ኦፕቲክስ ላይ በሰሩት ስራ የ2012 የኖቤል የፊዚክስ ሽልማት አሸናፊዎች ሆኑ።
data.orm: Serjee Harochee fi Deevid Waayinlaand hojii isaanii Ku'aantam Optiksiif Badhaasa Noobelii 2012 Fiiziksiidhaan injifatan.
data.som: Serge Haroche iyo David Wineland waxay ku guuleysteen abaalmarinta Nobel Prize 2012 ka ee Fiisigiska kadib markay hawl ka qabteen quantum optics.
data.tir: ሴርጌ ሃሮቼን ዴቪድ ዊንላንድን ኣብ ፊዚክስ ብስራሕቲ ኳንታም ኦፕቲክስ ናይ 2012 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሽልማት ኖቤል ተዓዊቶም።

data.eng: Seven prisoners from Amasya Prison in Turkey say that they began "indefinite and irreversible" hunger strikes on October 5, and their health is at serious risk.
data.aaf: Turkiyak Casbi Buxa Malcina Maxeenit Qunxa-Garabluk 5 “Acalesinim keeANkusesini” Qulul Fitna Qimbisem kee Ken Qafiyat Fayale Qawalyllat Yaninimit Yabben.
data.amh: በቱርክ ከአማሲያ እስር ቤት ሰባት እስረኞች ጥቅምት 5 “ማብቂያው የማይታወቅ እና የማይቀለበስ” የረሃብ አድማ መጀመራቸውን እና ጤናቸው ከፍተኛ አደጋ ላይ መሆኑን ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Hidhamtoonni torba Mana Hidhaa Amaasaa Turkii keessaa mormii beelaan godhamu "kan dhaabbii hin qabnee fi ofirra hin deebi'amne" Onkoloolessa 5 akka jalqaban dubbatan, fayyaan isaanii balaa hamaa irra jira.
data.som: Toddobo maxbuus oo ku jira Xabsiga Amasya ee Turkiga ayaa 5 tii oktoobar sheegay in ay bilaabeen cunto diidid aan "xad lahayn oo aan laga soo noqon karin", waxa kaloo ay sheegeen in caafimaadkoodu halis weyn uu ku jiro.
data.tir: ኣብ ቱርኪ ኣብ ቤት ማእሰርቲ ኣማስያ ዝርከቡ ሸውዓተ እሱራት "መዓልቱ ዘይነፀረን ዘይኽበስን" ኣድማ ምሕሳም ምግቢ ከምዝጀመሩ ብ5 ጥቅምቲ ዝገለፁ እንትኾን ብሰንኪ እዚ ጥዕንኦም ኣብ ኣስጋኢ ኩነታት ይርከብ።

data.eng: Chinese author Mo Yan, famous for working in the style of writing known as hallucinatory realism, wins the Nobel Prize in Literature.
data.aaf: Chaynah Katab MoYan Taamal Aytigexole Aktubiyal Yamixige Halustocinatory Yancalat, Kawisiyi Addal Nebel Acwal Yeyse::
data.amh: ሃሉሲኔታሪቲ ሪልዝም በመባል በሚታወቀው የአጻጻፍ ዘይቤ በመሥራት ዝነኛ የሆነው ቻይናዊው ደራሲ ሞ ያን በስነ ጽሑፍ ዘርፍ የኖቤል ሽልማትን አሸነፈ።
data.orm: Barreessaan lammii chaayinaa gosa barreeffamaa 'hilluusinatarii riyaalizim' jedhamu barreessuun beekamu Moo Yan badhaasa Noobelii ogbarruun enjifate.
data.som: Qoraaga Shiinaha ah ee Mo Yan, oo ku caanbaxay ka qaabka qoraalka loo yaqaanno xaqiiqada waxyabaha aan jirin, ayaa ku guulaystay abaalmarinta Nobel Prize ee Suugaanta.
data.tir: “ወድዓውነት ድቃስ ልቢ” ተባሂሉ ብዝፅዋዕ ቅዲ ኣፀሓሕፋ ዝተፈለጠ ቻይናዊ ደራሲ ሞ ያን ብስነ ፅሑፍ ተዓዋቲ ሽልማት ኖቤል ኮይኑ።

data.eng: An Africa Cup of Nations qualification match between Senegal and Ivory Coast is abandoned due to rioting at the Stade Leopold Senghor in Dakar.
data.aaf: Segegal kee Ayverikosti Afrikah kasih digir Dakar Istaxe liyobildu uguugus ugutemih tagah soliseenih.
data.amh: በሴኔጋል እና በአይቮሪ ኮስት መካከል የሚደረገው የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ የማጣሪያ ጨዋታ በዳካር በስታዴ ሊዮፖልድ ሴንጎር ሁከት በመነሳቱ ተትቷል።
data.orm: Taphni gulaallii Geeba Biyyoota Afirikaa Senegaalii fi Aayivorii Koost gidduutti geggeffamu sababa jeequmsa Isteed Liyooppoold Sengor kan Daakar keessaatti hambifame.
data.som: Ciyaar isreebreebka koobka Qaramada Afrika ah oo dhexmari lahayd Senegal iyo Ivory koast ayaa La iska daayay rabshado ka kacay Stade Leopold Senghor ee Dakar darteed.
data.tir: እቲ ንመፃረዪ ፅዋዕ ኣፍሪካ ዝካየድ ዝነበረ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ሴኔጋልን ኣይቨሪኮስትን ብሰንኪ ኣብ ዳካር ኣብ ስታድዮም ሊዮፖልድ ሴንጐር ዝተወልዐ ህውከት ተቋሪፁ።

data.eng: Senegal are disqualified from the 2013 Africa Cup of Nations after last Saturday's stadium riot in the game with Ivory Coast.
data.aaf: Dagardigih Magalgali Sangarah buxa Yolmataka cina tekkek wadiril rusiyak terake booxa booxa Ardabah riyo olombikih Digiritel Cashishite fokaqo abewanamah kah qalalan inah keenih mamrisan.
data.amh: ሴኔጋል ባለፈው ቅዳሜ ከ አይቮሪ ኮስት ጋር ካደረገቸው ሁከት የሞላበት ጨዋታ ከ2013 የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ተሰናበተች።
data.orm: Seenegaal tapha Ayivoorikoost waliin sanbata xiqqaa darbe taasisan irrattii jeequmsa uumameen walqabatee dorgommii Geepha saboota Afirikaa bara 2013 geggeeeffamaa jiru keessaa ari'amte.
data.som: Senegal ayaa lagareebay Koobka Qaramada Afrika ee 2013 taas oo ay sababtay rabshadihii Sabtidii la soo dhaafay garoonka kadhacay ciyaartii ay la yeesheen Ivory Coast.
data.tir: ሰኒጋል ድሕሪ እቲ ዝሓለፈ ቀዳም ምስ ኣቨሪ ኮስት ዝነበራ ግጥም ዘስዓበ ናይ ስታድዮም ናዕቢ ካብ ፍጻሜታት ውድድር ዋንጫ ሓድነት ኣፍሪቃ 2013 ተገሊፋ።

data.eng: Big Tex, a 52-foot statue and cultural icon in Dallas, Texas, is destroyed by fire during the final weekend of the 2012 State Fair of Texas.
data.aaf: Nabba Tex 52 wanynabo kee Qadda Uwaytite Dalas kee Tasesil Girat Tembexe Ayaamak Ilacabol 2012 Tases Rakaakayal
data.amh: በዳላስ ቴክሳስ ውስጥ የሚገኘውየባህል መገለጫ የሆነው ባለ 52 ጫማ ሐውልት ቢግ ቴክስ እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2012 የቴክሳስ ግዛት ፌስቲቫል የመጨረሻው ቅዳሜና እሁድ በተነሳው እሳት ተቃጠለ።
data.orm: Siidaan 'Biig Teeks' mallattoo aadaa ta'eefi dheerina kophee(tarkaanfii)52 qabu Daalaas Teeksaas kessattii argamu, Balaa ibiddaa dhuma torbanii bara 2012 gaafa guyyaa ayyaana feestivaala bulchiinsa Teeksaas mudateen barbada'eera.
data.som: Taalada Big Tex, oo ah taallo 52 joog ah iyo astaanta dhaqanka ee Dallas, Texas, ayaa dab baabiiyay intii lagu jiray dhamaadkii toddobaadkii ugu dambeeyay ee Bandhigga Gobolka Texas ee 2012.
data.tir: ኣብ ዳላስ፣ ቴክሳስ ዝርከብን መለለዪ ባህሊ እታ ከተማ ዝኾነን 52 ጫማ ዝቑመቱ ሓወልቲ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን ንግዳዊ ምርኢት ቴክሳስ 2012 ብምኽንያት ባርዕ ዓንዩ።

data.eng: The SpaceX Dragon capsule on a re-supply mission to the International Space Station returns to Earth.
data.aaf: Baadak Qaran Saynisih Fanteena QagitakXayos Madmal Space X garil kabeleli illa Baaxo fanah yaddren.
data.amh: ወደ አለም አቀፉ የህዋ ጣቢያ የድጋሚ አቅርቦት ተልእኮ ላይ የነበረው የስፔስ ኤክስ ድራገን መንኮራኩር ወደ ምደር ተመለሰ።
data.orm: Manneen Diraagonii Ispeeseks ergama irra deebii dhiyeessii gara Giddugala Addunyaalessaa Hawaatti godhame booda gara Lafaatti deebite.
data.som: dayax gacmeedka SpaceX Dragon ee hawlgalka dib-u-buuxinta Saldhigga Caalamiga ee Hawada sare ayaa si nabada ugu soo noqonayaa Dhulka.
data.tir: ቀረብ ናይ ምብፃሕ ተልእኮ ሒዛ ናብ ዓለምለኸ ጣብያ ህዋ ዝተበገሰት ስፔስ ኤክስ ድራጎን ዝስማ በራሪት ናብ መሬት ብሰላም ተመሊሳ።

data.eng: Five thousand people are evacuated from low-lying areas off the coast of Tamil Nadu state in India and two sailors die in heavy seas before Cyclone Nilam hits the coast.
data.aaf: Koona Alfin um hindih addal geytima tamil arrocal Baadi xaqul Geytimta Addah tan arooca ugutak namma doonik kaxam nabah badal raben.
data.amh: በሕንድ ውስጥ ከሚገኘው በታሚል ናዱ ግዛት የባህር ዳርቻ ዝቅተኛ ቦታዎች አምስት ሺህ ሰዎች ስፍራዎቹን ለቀው እንዲወጡ ተደርገዋል፤ እንዲሁም ሁለት መርከበኞች በሳይክሎም ኒላም አውሎ ነፋስ የባህር ዳርቻው ከመመታቱ በፊት በከባድ ማዕበሎች ሳቢያ ህይወታቸው አልፏል።
data.orm: Indiyaa keessaatti kan argamtu naannoo Taamil Naaduutti buufata doonii irrattii obomboleetii Niilaam mudachuusaan dura daaktoonni bishaanii lama battalumattii yoo du'an namoonnii daka buufata doonii keessaattii argaman kumni shan naannoo sanarraa baqataniiru.
data.som: Shan kun oo qof ayaa laga daadguraynayaa dhulka hoose ee xeebta gobolka Tamil Nadu ee Hindiya sidoo kalena laba badmaaxe aya ku dhintay badaha culus ka hor inta aysan Duufaanta Nilam ku dhicin xeebta.
data.tir: ኣብ ህንዲ ኣብ ወሰና ወሰን ግዝኣት ታሚል ናይዱ ኣብ ዝርከቡ ጎላጉል ማዕበል ኒላም ሓደጋ ቅድሚ ምስዓቡ 5000 ሰባት ካብ’ቲ ቦታ ክለቁ ተገይሩ። ዛጊድ ክልተ ባሕረኛታት ብቲ ብርቱዕ ማዕበል ከምዝሞቱ እውን ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: Former British Labour Party minister Denis MacShane resigns his House of Commons seat after he wrongfully claimed at least £7,500 in expenses.
data.aaf: Dumahi Biritaniyak taama-abeenit Misoynah Malaak Xinis makeshane wali 7.500 Bawunxi Awqenta hoxah esserimek lakal Malabuxak Dafeyna Cabeh.
data.amh: የቀድሞ የእንግሊዝ ሰራተኞች ፓርቲ ሚኒስተር ዴኒስ ማክሼን 7,500 ፓውንድ ወጪ እንዳደረገ እና ይገባኛል በሚል በስህተት ከጠየቀ በ|ላ ከጋራ ምክር ቤቱ መቀመጫ ተነሳ።
data.orm: Ministeerri Jaarmiyaa Labarii Biriitish duraanii Deenis MaakSheen erga karaa sirrii hin taaneen baasii isaaf yoo xiqqaate £7,500 akka kanfalamuuf gaafatee booda teessoo isaa Haawos of Koomonii keessaa irraa bu'e.
data.som: Wasiirkii hore ee Xisbiga Shaqaalaha Ingiriiska Denis MacShane ayaa iska casilay xilkiisi Aqalka Hoose kadib markii uu si khaldan u dalbaday kharash dhan ugu yaraan £ 7,500.
data.tir: ንሌበር ፓርቲ እንግሊዝ ብምውካል ናይ ሚኒስትርነት ቦታ ሒዙ ዝነበረ ዴኒስ ማክሼን ኣግባብነት ብዘይብሉ መንገዲ 7500 ዩሮ ከወራርዱ ድሕሪ ምፍታኖም ካብ ኣባልነት ፓርላማ ብፍቓዶም ለቒቖም።

data.eng: Bishop Tawadros is selected as the new 118th pope of the Coptic Orthodox Church.
data.aaf: Babas Tedros Katolik Kaliisak Qusba 118Hyto Babas Akuk Doorime::
data.amh: ጳጳስ ታዋድሮስ የኮፕቲክ ኦርቶዶክስ ቤተክርስቲያን አዲሱ 118 ኛ ጳጳስ ሆነው ተመርጠዋል።
data.orm: Phaaphaasiin Tewadiroos phaaphaasii haaraa 118ffaa mana amantaa ortodoksii kooptik ta'uun filataman.
data.som: Bishop Tawadros waxaa loo doortay inuu noqdo baadariga cusub ee 118aad ee Kaniisadda Orthodox koptik.
data.tir: ጳጳስ ታዋድሮስ መበል 118 ሓድሽ ርእሰ ሊቃነ ጳጳሳት ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋህዶ ቤተ ክርስትያን ግብፂ ኮይኖም ተመሪፆም።

data.eng: The UK's Secretary of State for International Development Justine Greening confirms Britain will cease giving financial aid to India by 2015.
data.aaf: Ingilizik Baad Dadoosih Sekreteri Jestin Geridinege biritaniya I.L.L. 2015 Hindi Mali Cato Abtam Solise.
data.amh: በእንግሊዝ መንግስት ለአለም አቀፍ እድገት ፀሃፊ የሆኑት ጀስቲን ግሪኒን እንግሊዝ ለህንድ የምታደርገውን የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በ2015 እንደምታቆም አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Ministeerri Haajaa Alaa Guddina Addunyaa UK Jastin Giriiniing, Biritiyeen bara 2015'tti Hindiif gargaarsa kennuu akka dhaabdu mirkaneesse.
data.som: Xoghayaha Horumarinta Caalamiga ah ee ingiriiska Justine Greening ayaa cadeeyay in ingriisku uu ay joojinayo caawimaadka dhaqaale ee ay siiso India marka la gaaro 2015 ka.
data.tir: ብሪጣንያ ኣብ 2015 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ንህንዲ እትህቦ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ጠጠው ከምተብል ሚኒስትር ጉዳያት ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ዩ ኬ ጀስቲን ግርኒንግ ኣረጋጊፆም።

data.eng: BP announces it will plead guilty to charges of manslaughter and obstruction of Congress, and will pay a total of US$4.5 billion to the US Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange Commission.
data.aaf: Bibi qidanam kee Kongires gexekalak kalti biyisiyal Akuk Aminuk Yascase፣ kee Amoladi 4.5 Bilyoon Dolaar USik Qadli Amnikee Malaagi Komision Exxa Meklelon.
data.amh: ቢፒ በነፍስ ማጥፋት እና ኮንግረስን በማደናቀፍ ወንጀል ጥፋተኛ መሆኑን አምኖ ለአሜሪካ ፍትህ እና ደህንነት እንዲሁም ለልውውጥ ኮሚሽን በአጠቃላይ 4.5 ቢሊዮን የአሜሪካ ዶላር እንደሚከፍል አስታውቋል።
data.orm: BP'n himannaa nama qaluu fi Koongiresii danquun yakkamaa akka ta'e akka amanu, akkasumas Qajeelcha Haqaa fi Nageenyaa US fi Koomishinii Waljijjiirraaf waliigalatti biliyoona US$4.5 akka kanfalu beeksise.
data.som: Shirkada BP ayaa ku dhawaaqaday inay qiranayaan dambiyada lagu soo oogay ee ah dilka iyo hor istaagga Congress ka, waxayna wadar ahaan bixin doonaan lacag dhan 4.5 oo bilyan oo doolar oo ay siinayaan Waaxda Caddaaladda iyo Amniga iyo Guddiga Sarrifka ee Mareykanka.
data.tir: ብሪቲሽ ፒትሮሊዮም (ቢ. ፒ.) ንክስታት ቅትለትን ስራሕ ኮንግረስ ብምዕንቃፍን ገበነኛ ምዃኑ ከም ዝኣምን፣ ንሚኒስትሪ ፍትሒ ኣመሪካን ኮሚተ ገንዘባዊ ሰነዳትን ቡርሳን ድማ ብድምር 4.5 ቢልዮን ዶላር ኣመሪካ ከም ዝኸፍል ገለጹ።

data.eng: A bronze statue of Sir Alex Ferguson, a most successful manager in Manchester United’s history, was unveiled outside Old Trafford.
data.aaf: Manchister Unitix Aydaadih Addal kaxam Tayseh yan Taama Gexsenah suge Ser Xlekese fergusen Nacas hawlti ortilafoxik Irol Dafesen.
data.amh: በማንቸስተር ዩናይትድ ታሪክ ውስጥ ስኬታማው አሰልጣኝ የሆነው የሰር አሌክስ ፈርጉሰን በነሃስ የተሰራው ሃውልት ኦልድ ትራፎርድ ደጃፍ ላይ ተመረቀ።
data.orm: seenaa Maanchister Yunaaytid keessatti leenjisaa milka'aa kan ta'an Ser Aleeks Fargusaniif siidaan Meetiirraa ijaarame bakkee mooraa Oldi Tiraaforditti agarsiifame.
data.som: Sir Alex Ferguson, oo ah tababaraha ugu guulaha badan taariikhda Manchester United, taalo loosameeyey oo naxass ah ayaa banaanka garoonka Old Trafford lagaga shaac qaaday.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣፍ ደገ ኦልድ ትራፎርድ፣ ነሓስ ሓወልቲ ናይ ኣዝዩ ዕዉት ኣሰልጣኒ ኣብ ታርኽ ማንቸስተር ዩናይትድ ዝነበረ ሴር ኣሌክስ ፈርጉሰን ጉልባቡ ተቐንጢጡ።

data.eng: The music video for South Korean pop singer Psy's "Gangnam Style" surpasses 808 million views, making it the most viewed video in the history of YouTube.
data.aaf: Gabbi Qaxih Kuriyak pop Gadabe Psy “Gangnam Style” Gaadi Vixiyo 808 Milyoonih Mabulitek Lafitak Yutyubul Aydaadi Addal Nagay Yumbuluye Vixiyo kini.
data.amh: የደቡብ ኮርያው ፖፕ ሙዚቃ አቀንቃኝ ፒኤስዋይ በጋንግናም ስታይል የሙዚቃ ቪድዮ በዩትዩብ 808ሚሊዮን እይታ በማግኘት ዩትዩብ ታሪክ በጣም የታየው ቪዲዮ ሆነ።
data.orm: Suursagaleen muuziqaa wellisaa poop Si "Gaanginam Istaayil" daawwannaa miliyoona 808 darbuun seenaa YouTube Keessatti suursagalee hedduu daawwatame ta'eera.
data.som: Fiidiyowga muusigga ee heesaha pop -ka Koonfurta Kuuriya ee Psy "Gangnam Style" aya dhaafay 808 milyan oo daawasho ah, taasoo ka dhigaysa fiidiyowga ugu daawashada badan taariikhda YouTube.
data.tir: እቲ ናይ ፖፕ ድምፃዊ ደቡብ ኮርያዊ ፒሲይ ዝኾነ ቪድዮ ሙዚቃ ልዕሊ 808 ሚሊዮን ተመልከቲ ስለ ዝራኣይዎ ኣብ ታሪኽ ዩቱብ ዝላዓለ ተመልከቲ ዝረኸበ ቪድዮ ኮይኑ ።

data.eng: The UK government is to create a new wave of universities both in the private and public sector, the first new universities in the country for two decades.
data.aaf: Ingiliz Doolat Cankal takkay Doolat ludal Ta abbaxoh Addal Qimboh Qusba Tabna sanotah Jaamiqatite Namma Tabna sanatite qusba jamiqatite Axcuk Ginanam Kini.
data.amh: የዩኬ መንግስት አዲስ ያለውን እና በሁለት አስርተ አመታት ውስጥ አዲስ የሆኑ የግል እና የመንግስት የዩንቨርሲቲዎችን ሊመሰርት ነው።
data.orm: Mootummaan UK dambalii unibarsiitotaa haaraa sektaroota dhuunfaanii fi kan ummataan uumuufi, waggoota kurnan lama keessatti unibarsitoota haaraa jalqabaa.
data.som: Dawladda UK ayaa samaynaysa mawjado cusub oo jaamacado ah kuwas oo iskugu jira kuwo gaar loo leeyahay iyo kuwa dawli ah, taas oo ka dhigaysa jaamacadaha ugu horreeya ee dalka laga furo muddo labaatan sano ah.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ብዘፈር መንግስትን ውልቀን ብዙሓት ዩኒቨርስቲታት ንምኽፋት እናሰርሐ’ዩ፤ እዚአን ድሕሪ ዒስራ ዓመታት ፈላሞት ሓደሽቲ ዩኒቨርሲቲታ እታ ሃገር ክኾና እየን።

data.eng: M23 rebels announce their withdrawal from territory captured from government troops after a pullout deal was reached in Uganda.
data.aaf: USik berezexentih Yan Barak Obama Xayih Maraatonul tekke Bukqa Sababah Bosten Magaalat Gune Abele.
data.amh: በዩጋንዳ የመውጣት ስምምነት ከተደረገ በኋላ የኤም23 አማፂዎች ከመንግስት ወታደሮች ላይ ይዘዋቸው ከነበሩ ቦታዎች ላይ እንዳፈገፈጉ አሳወቁ።
data.orm: Gareen diddaa M23 daangaa qabatanii turan gad lakkisuu isaanii walii galteen gad-lakkisanii ba'uu Yugaandaatti erga irra ga'ameen booda beeksisaniiru.
data.som: Jabhadda M23 ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay ka baxeen dhulkii ay ka qabsadeen ciidamada dowladda kaddib markii heshiis ka bixitaan ah lagu gaaray Uganda.
data.tir: ኣብ ዩጋንዳ ኤም-23 ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ ሓይሊ ዓማፅያን ብመሰረት ዝኣሰሮ ውዕል ካብ መንግስቲ ካብ ዝመንዘዖም ቦታታት ለቒቑ።

data.eng: New data from the NASA space probe MESSENGER indicate that Mercury, the closest planet to the Sun, almost surely has water ice buried beneath the surface at its north pole.
data.aaf: NASA Qaran kusaqih MESSENGER Qusba Oyti elle yascasenal Ayroh xayih tan Bilanet merkuri Kiblati waltal Baaxok secayak gubal Xayowre Barad barad kini.
data.amh: ከናሳ የህዋ ጣቢያ የመጣ አዲስ መልእክት ለፀሃይ የቀረበችው እና ሜርኩረ የተባለቸው ፕላኔት በሰሜን በኩል በሚገኘው ውስጣዊ ክፍሏ የውሃ በረዶ ሊኖራት እንደሚችል አመላከተ።
data.orm: Daataan haaraan qorannoo hawaa NASA, MESSENGER akka Merkuriin, pilaanetiin baayyee aduuttii dhiyaattu, dhugaamatti jechuun bifa danda'amuun gara poolii kaabaa isheetti cabbiin bishaanii dachii ishee jala awwaalamee akka jiru agarsiisa.
data.som: Xog cusub oo ka soo baxday baadhitaanka hawada sare ee NASA MESSENGER ayaa tilmaamaysa in meeraha ugu dhow Qorraxda ee Mercury, ay hubaal tahay in biyo barafa ku aasanyihiin dusha sare ee cirifka waqooyi.
data.tir: ናይ ናሳ ናይ ህዋ ምርምር ሜሴንጀር ሓዱሽ ኣዐሪዩ ዝተረጋገፀ ሳይንሳዊ መረዳእታ ከምዘመልክቶ ኣብ’ታ ንፀሓይ ኣዝያ ዝቐረበት ፕላኔት ሜርኩሪ ኣብ ሴሜናዊ ዋልታኣ ኣብ ትሕቲ ባይታ ዝተቐበረ ማይ ዝዓቖረ በረድ ኣሎ።

data.eng: NASA debunks rumors of new evidence of life on Mars, but its Curiosity rover continues to make many smaller discoveries.
data.aaf: NASAk Ayro Kusaqisoonuh Dafesenih yan Gibatewnih yanin Hawa Gexoh Barker Solar Boroboshin Qimbise.
data.amh: ናሳ በማርስ ላይ ህይወት አለ የሚለውን ሃሳብ ውሸት ነው ሲል ገለፀ፤ ነገር ግን የተላከው መንኩራኩር አዳዲስ እና ትንንሽ ግኝቶችን እያደረገ እንደሆነ አስታውkል።
data.orm: NASA'n kijiba ta'uu oduu ragaalee haaraa jireenyi akka maars irra jiru agarsiisan ni baasa, haa ta'uyyuu malee kiwuuriyosiiti roover jedhamuu argannoolee xixiqqoo argachuu itti fufe jira.
data.som: NASA ayaa ka been sheegta wararka xanta ah ee caddaynta cusub ee nolosha Mars, laakiin Rover Curiosity ayaa sii wadaa inuu daahfuro waxyaabo yaryar oo fara badan.
data.tir: ኣብ ፕላነት ማርስ ሂወት ንምህላው ሓደስቲ ጭብጥታት ዝብሉ ወረታት ጌጋ ክምዝኾኑ ናሳ ኣቃሊዑ፣ እንተኾነ ግን ናይ ጠፈር መሳርያ ክዮሪዮሲቲ ነተን ንኡሳን ርኽበታት ንምድህሳስ ስርሓ ትቕጽል ኣላ።

data.eng: NASA's twin GRAIL probes have revealed the surface of the Moon in unprecedented detail, showing unexpectedly-deep cracks, craters and tectonic structures.
data.aaf: Kusaqabba Arktik Addal kulum Yasckateenim Galimaroh elle Xayosenal 75 adda Fayaya yam kinimit kak yabak, Facafanah Osotinah Girisiyak Dumal Yucsubenih yanimin kinim xiqtam Yascasen.
data.amh: የናሳ መንታ ግሬል ፕሮግራሞች በጨረቃ የላይኛው ክፍል ላይ ስለሚገኙ ጉርጓዶች፣ ክሬተሮቸ እና በእሳተ ገሞራ የተፈጠሩ ገፅታዎች ተጨማሪ መረጃዎችን አሳዩ።
data.orm: Kutaan qorannoo NASA lakkuu GRAIL dirri ji'a balbalooma argamee hin beekneen, caccabuu hin eegamne, lafa gadi bu'a fi caasaa tektoonikii ifoomsan.
data.som: Baadhitaannada mataanaha ah ee NASA ee GRAIL ayaa dusha sare ee Dayaxa ku shaaciyey faahfaahin aan hore loo arag, oo muujinaya dillaacyo aan la filayn oo qoto dheer, dillaacyo iyo dhismayaal tectonic ah.
data.tir: ናይ ናሳ ማንታ መመርመሪ መሳርያ ግሬል ብቅድመ-ኩነታዊ ኣገባብ ዝርዝራት ብዛዕባ ጽፍሒ ወርሒ ኣቃሊዓ ኣብ ርእሲ ምህላዋ፣ እቲ ዝርዝር ዓሚቚ ጨዳዳትን ጎዳጒድን ቴክቶናዊ ቅርጽታትን ብዘይትጽቢታዊ ኣገባብ ብተወሳኺ ዘብርህ እዩ።

data.eng: The President of the Philippines Benigno Aquino declares a state of national calamity in the country following Typhoon Bopha, which has claimed over 450 lives.
data.aaf: Honxarus Berezixanti Porfirio Lobo Tekkeh tanimil “Inkihiy qidinule Fokaqoh” Xagana Culak Ta Dariifa Kee Agat Casbih Buxa Saqolti Soliseh.
data.amh: የፊሊፒንስ ፕሬዝዳንት ቤኒግኖ አኪኖ ከ 450 በላይ ሰዎችን ሕይወት የቀጠፈውን አውሎ ነፋስ ቦፋ ተከትሎ በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ ብሔራዊ የጥፋት ሁኔታ አዋጅ አወጁ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Filiphiinsi Beeninyoo Akuyiinoo Taayphoon Bopha kan lubbuu namoota 450 galaafate hordofuun labsii yeroo miidhamaa biyyaalessaa biyyattii keessatti labsan.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Filibiin Benigno Aquino ayaa sheegay xaalad masiibo qaran ah oo ka jirta dalka kadib duufaantii Bopha, oo galaafatay nolosha 450 qof in kabadan.
data.tir: ፕሬዝዳንት ፊሊፒንስ ቤንጂኖ ኣዂኖ ብሰንኪ ማዕበል ቦፋ 450 ህይወት ምጥፍኡ ምኽንያት ብምግባር ኣብታ ሃገር ብሄራዊ ኩነታት ሓደጋ ኣዊጆም።

data.eng: An inquest into the death of nurse Jacintha Saldanha hears that she died as a result of self-inflicted hanging.

data.eng: Ephraim Mirvis is announced as the next Chief Rabbi of the United Kingdom, replacing Dr. Jonathan Sacks who will step down from the role in 2013.
data.aaf: I.L.L 2013 luk sugeh Yan Doorik Ruubenih Yanin D/r Yonatan Bakisn Cigilisak Efrem mirvis Ingilizik Ciggilak Faticisen::
data.amh: ኤፍሬም ሚርቪስ እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2013 ከአገልግሎት የሚነሱትን ዶ / ር ዮናታን ሳክስስን በመተካት ቀጣዩ የእንግሊዝ ዋና ረቢ (መምህር) መሆናቸው ታወጀ።
data.orm: Bara 2013'ttii aangoo irraa kan bu'an D.r Joonattaan Saaks bakka bu'uun Efireem Maarvis dursaa Rabbii Yunaayitid Kiingidam kan itti aanu ta'uun isaa labsame.
data.som: Ephraim Mirvis ayaa lagu dhawaaqay inuu noqday Madaxa xiga ee Rabbi ee Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, isagoo beddeli doona Dr. Jonathan Sacks oo xilka iskawareejin doona 2013.
data.tir: ኤፍሬም ሚርቪስ ኣብ 2013 ዓ.ም.ፈ ካብ ሓላፍነቱ ንዝወርድዶ/ር ጆናታን ሳክስ ብምትካእ ቀፃሊ ዋና ራባይ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ከምዝኸውን ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: The New York Stock Exchange, the largest stock exchange in the United States and the world, is sold to Atlanta-based IntercontinentalExchange.
data.aaf: Ameerika Kee Baadak Nabbah yan Aksiyoon Tabaatabsah yanih Yan Niyorki Aksiyoon Tabatabsa Atlantal Xisiimeh yan Interkotenental Egzibishinil liimowele.
data.amh: ትልቁ የዩናይትድ ስቴትሱ የንግድ ገበያ ማእከል የሆነው የኒው ዮርኩ ንግድ ገበያ መቀመጫውን አትላናታ ላረገውና አህጉር አቀፈዊ የንግድ ገበያ ልውውጥ ለሚሰራው ኢንተርኮንቲነንታል ንግድ ገበያ ተሸጠ።
data.orm: Sharafi Aksiyoonaa Niwu Yoork, Yunaayitid Isteetis keessatti akkasuma addunyaa irratti sharafa aksiyoonaa inni guddichi, Atilaantaa keessatti kan argamu IntercontinentalExchange'tti gurgurame.
data.som: Isweydaarsiga saamiyada ee New York, oo ah isweydaarsiga saamiyada ugu wawayn ee Mareykanka iyo adduunkaba, waxaa laga iibiyay Intercontinental Exchange oo fadhigiisu yahay Atlanta.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዀነ ኣብ ዓለም እቲ ዝገዘፈ ናይ ጅምላ ዕዳጋ ኒውዮርክ ኤክስቼንጅ ማርኬት ማእኸሉ ኣትላንታ ንዝዀነ ኢንተርኮንቲኔንታል ኤክስቼንጅ ተሸይጡ።

data.eng: Vladimir Putin, the President of Russia, grants Russian citizenship to Gérard Depardieu who has renounced his French citizenship due to high taxes.
data.aaf: Rusiyah berezidentih yanih yan Vladimir Putin Fayale Qiso Sababah Faransah Baaxo baxiinu Cabak luk sugeh yan Gérard Depardieu Rusiyah baaxoh Baxiinu Yecen::
data.amh: የሩሲያ ፕሬዝዳንት ቭላድሚር ፑቲን በከፍተኛ ግብር ምክንያት የፈረንሣይ ዜግነቱን ለሰረዘው ለጄራርድ ዴፓርዴ የሩሲያ ዜግነት ሰጡ።
data.orm: Pireezidaantiin Ruusiyaa Vilaadimer Putiin sababa gibira humnaa oliin lammumma Faransaayummaa isa kan jijjiirrate Jeerard Dipaardiyo dhaaf lammummaa biyya Ruusiya kennan.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Ruushka, Vladimir Putin, ayaa wuxuu dhalashada Ruushka siiyaa Gérard Depardieu oo ka tanaasulay dhalashadiisa Faransiiska cashuur badan darteed.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ሩስያ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን ብምኽንያት ግብሪ ስለዝኸበዶም ናይ ፈረንሳይ ዜግነቶም ብፍቓዶም ንዝገደፉ ጀራርድ ዴፓርዲዩ ዜግነት ሩስያ ሂቦምዎም።

data.eng: Police in India charge five men with the murder of a 23-year-old woman who was gang-raped on a bus in Delhi on December 16, 2012.
data.aaf: Hindi Boliis Cigilta-Kudok 16 Ayro Xelhi Addal Atabusut Buttah Calisak 23 sanati say barah Qidimih Konna Labhal Melkis Aben.
data.amh: የህንድ ፖሊስ በታህሳስ 16 2012 በዴልሂ ከተማ በአውቶቢስ ውስጥ በቡድን በተደፈረችው የ23 አመቷ ወጣት የግድያ ወንጀል አምስት ወንዶች ላይ ክስ አቀረበ።
data.orm: Poolisoonni Indiyaa hagayya 16 bara 2012 New Deelii Baasii keessaatti dubartii umurii 23 taatee irratti namoota gudeeddii gurmuu erga raawwaataniin booda lubbuu ishee galaafatan shan irratti himanna bane.
data.som: Booliiska Hindiya ayaa shan nin ku xukumay dil loo geystay inaan 23 jir ah oo si wada jir ah loogu kufsaday bas dhex marayay Delhi bishii December 16, 2012.
data.tir: ኣብ ዴልሂ ኣብ ታሕሳስ 16/2012 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣውቶቡስ ንሓንቲ ጓል 23 ዓመት ብጉጅለ ገሲሶም ቐቲሎምዋ እዮም ብምባል ፖሊስ ህንዲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ሓሙሽተ ኣወዳት ክሲ መስሪቱ ።

data.eng: The Church of England drops its prohibition on gay clergy in civil partnerships becoming bishops, so long as they promise to be celibate.
data.aaf: Ingiliz Kanisa Sitacelta Naddoh Angarawal Soolo፣ Ayunti Shirkin Addal Babas Akuk፣
data.amh: በእንግሊዝ የሚገኙ ቤተ-ክርስትያናት በግብረሶማውያን ቀሳውስት ላይ አስቀምጦ የነበረውን ለጳጳስነት የመታጨት እገዳ ጋብቻ እስካልፈፀሙ ድረስ አነሳ።
data.orm: Waldaan Ingilaand luboota fedhii dhiira waliin walquunnamtii saalaa gochuu qaban haga isaan sababa amantiif gocha quunnamtii saalaa irraa akka fagaatan waadaa seenanitti waa'illummaa siivilii keessatti akka phaaphaasii hin taane ittisa irra godhe ni kaase.
data.som: Kaniisadda Ingriiska ayaa ka laabatay ka mamnuucidda wadaaddada khaniisiinta ah inay noqdaan hoggaamiyayaasha kaniisadaha, hadii ay ballanqaadayaan inaysan ku dhaqaaqayn fal khanisnimo ah.
data.tir: ቤተክርስቲያን ኢንግላንድ እቶም ኣብ ሲቨላዊ ጥምረት ዘለው ግብረሶዶም ካህናት ካብ መርዓን ፆታዊ ርክብን ንምዕቃብ ቃል እንተኣትዮም ጳጳስ ኮይኾኑ ዝገብሮ ክልከላ ኣትሪፍዎ ።

data.eng: Beijing's air pollution reaches levels judged as hazardous to human health.
data.aaf: Bejingink Qeti Bayiyih Sahdayti Baxih Qafiyatah taqabi kini Axcuk elle iyen Caddo madeh yan.
data.amh: የቤጂንግ የአየር ብክለት ለሰው ልጅ ጤና አደገኛ ነው ከሚባል ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ላይ ደረሰ።
data.orm: Faalamni qilleensaa Beejingi fayyaa namaatiif balaadha sadarkaa jedhamee murteeffamu gahe.
data.som: Wasakhowga hawada Beijing waxay gaartay heer lagu qiyaasay inay halis ku tahy caafimaadka aadanaha.
data.tir: ናይ ቬጂንግ ብኽለት ኣየር ንጥዕና ዘርኢ ሰብ ኣዝዩ ሓደገኛ ናብ ዝኾነሉ ብርኪ በፂሑ።

data.eng: Boeing 787 aircraft are grounded worldwide over concerns about the safety of their lithium-ion batteries.
data.aaf: Boyingi 787 Tayaroori litiyen-Aun xeetwawi Amni Wagittamal Baad Caadol yegiriqeh.
data.amh: ቦይንግ 787 አውሮፕላኖች የሊቲየም-አዮን ባትሪዎቻቸውን ደህንነት በተመለከተ በዓለም ዙሪያ እገዳ ተጥሎባቸዋል።
data.orm: Xiyyaaronni Booying 787 yaaddoo waa'ee nageenya baatiriwwaan litiyem-aayoniin walqabatee guutummaa addunyaa irratti dhaabbatan.
data.som: Diyaaraddaha Boeing 787 laga mamnuucay shaqada sababo laxidhiidha nabad qab darada baytariyada lithium-ion-ka.
data.tir: ቦይንግ 787 ነፈርቲ ብሰንኪ ድሕነት ሊትዩም-ኣዮን ባተሪታተን ዝተፈጥረ ሻቕሎት ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ደው ኢለን።

data.eng: NASA’s Curiosity rover finds calcium deposits on Mars similar to those seen on Earth when water circulates in cracks and rock fractures.
data.aaf: NASAk Kepler Hawa Taselelqo Mano Goldilocks Rasi Sidiica Bilanetwal Geytimem Qadoosen.
data.amh: የናሳ አሳሸ መንኩራኩር በምድር ላይ ውሃ በጠጣር ነገሮች ላይ ሲዘዋወር የምናየው አይነት የምናየው አይነት የካልሺየም ማእድንን በማርስ ላይም እንዳገኘ መረጃ ላከ።
data.orm: Kiwuriyoosiitii roveriin NASA ruqa kaalsiyeemii lafa irratti yeroo bishaan fi kattaan caccabu waliin wal fakkaatu maarsii irratti argateera.
data.som: NASA's Curiosity rover ayaa Mars ka helay kayd calcium ah kaas oo la mid ah kuwa laga helo Dhulka marka biyuhu ku wareegaan dildilaaca iyo jabka dhagaxa.
data.tir: መሳርያ ናሳ ዝኾነት ክዩሪዩሲቲ ኣብ ዝባን ፕላነት ማርስ ናይ ካልስዮም ኩምራታት ከምቲ ማይ ናብ ጨዳዳት ከውሕታት ምስ ዞረ ኣብ መሬት ዘሎ ተመሳሳሊ ባእታ ክትረክብ ክኢላ።

data.eng: The United States Department of State issues a travel warning to United States citizens for the country of Algeria in response to the In Aménas hostage crisis.
data.aaf: US, Kanaxa Kee UK Waraue Alsa Ryanair Gadul 4978 tabatabtem Libnanahl Kaltaxibix Ceeh Yan Xaagi Qawaytu Roman Protasevich Lowsis Gubat Hen.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው የስቴት ዲፓርትምነት በ አልጄሪያ የተፈጠረውን የአሜናስ እገታን ተከትሎ ወደ አልጄሪያ የሚደረጉ ጉዞዎች ላይ የደህንነት ማስጠንቀቂያ አስተላለፈ።
data.orm: Ministeerri Haajaa Alaa Yunaayitid Isteetis miidhaa hidhamtoota Amenaasiin walqabatee biyya Aljeeriyaaf lammiiwwan Yuunayitid Isteetis irra akeekkachiisa imalaa keesse.
data.som: Waaxda Arrimaha Dibedda ee Mareykanka ayaa soo rogtay digniin dalxiis oo ku socota muwaadiniinta Mareykanka ee ku socda waddanka Aljeeriya si ay uga jawaabto dhibaatada afduub ee In Aménas.
data.tir: ሚኒስትሪ ጉዳያት ወጻኢ ኣመሪካ ንዜጋታት ኣመሪካ ብምኽንያት ቅልውላው ጆሆታት ኣብ ኣሚናስ ከም ግብረ-መልሲ ናብ ሃገረ ኣልጀርያ ንኸይገሹ መጠንቀቕታ ሂባ።

data.eng: Rescuers from New Zealand and McMurdo Station looking for three Canadians aboard an airplane presumed to have gone down in Antarctica were grappling with bad weather conditions.
data.aaf: Bolanxi Laqen Alsak 10 Ayro 96 Miraacinu kee Tu Taxago Qideh Yan 2010 bolanxi Qaran Qandek 154ik Qawalaylla Hadiyi Oytih Katiteta Koriyal Tumutukeh.
data.amh: ከኒው ዚላንድ እና ከማክሞርዶ ጣቢያ የመጡ የአደጋ ግዜ ሰራተኞች አንታርክቲካ ላይ ወድቋል ተብሎ በሚገመት አውሮፕላን ውስጥ የነበሩ ሦስት ካናዳውያንን ከመጥፎ የአየር ሁኔታ ጋር እየታገሉ ፍለጋቸውን ቀጥለዋል።
data.orm: Lubbuu baraartonni Niw Zilaand fi Bufata MaakMurdoo irraa lammiiwwan Kanaadaa sadan xiyyaara Antarkaatikaa keessatti kufeen imalanii turan barbaadan haala qilleensaa hamaa wajjin wallaansoo walqabaa turan.
data.som: Kooxda badbaadada New Zealand iyo McMurdo Station oo raadinaya saddex qof oo reer Kanada ah oo saarnaa diyaarad loo malaynayo inay ku dhacday Antaarktika ayaa la la rafaadsan yahay xaalado cimilada oo xun awgeed.
data.tir: እቶም ኣብ ነፋሪት ተሳፊሮም ዝነበሩ ኣብ ኣንታርክቲካ ዓሊቦም ከምዝኾኑ ዝተገመቱን ብሕማቕ ኩነታት ኣየር ዝተቐርቐሩን ሰለስተ ካናዳዊያን ንምድሓን ካብ ኒውዚላንድን ካብ ጣብያ ማክሙርዶን ዝተበገሱ ኣለሻ እናካየዱ እዮም።

data.eng: A Ukrainian court sentences a former police chief Olexiy Pukach to life imprisonment for murdering journalist Georgiy Gongadze in 2000.
data.aaf: Yukneen Garoyse buxa Dumaahi Boliis Amrise Olekesi Baakani Xaagiqawayti Jorgi Gigagezen Qidak 2000 qumri yanim Casbi kal madaqen.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ በ 2000 ዓ.ም የቀድሞው የፖሊስ አዛዥ ኦሌክሲ ፑካክ ጋዜጠኛ ጆርጂ ጊንጋዴዝን በመግደል ወንጀል የዩክሬይን ፍርድ ቤት የዕድሜ ልክ እስራት ፈርዶበታል።
data.orm: Manni murtii yuukireen yakka ajjeechaa ajajaan Poolisii duraanii Oleeksii Pukaach gazexeessaa joorj Goongadzee irratti bara 2000 Rawwateef hidha umurii guutuutiin adabe.
data.som: Maxkamad ku taal Ukraine ayaa xabsi daa’in ku xukuntay taliyihii hore ee booliiska Olexiy Pukach oo lagu eedeeyay inuu dilay wariye Georgiy Gongadze sanadkii 2000.
data.tir: ሓደ ቤት ፍርዲ ዩክሬይን ኣብ 2000 ዓ.መ.ፈ. ጆርጂ ጎንጋድዜ ንዝተብሃለ ጋዜጠኛ ቀቲሉ እዩ ንዝበሎ ሓላፊ ፖሊስ ነበር ኦሌክሲይ ፑካች ብዕድመ ይፍታሕ ፈሪድዎ።

data.eng: A.C. Milan says it has reached an agreement with Manchester City F.C. to sign Italian striker Mario Balotelli.
data.aaf: Esi milan Manchister Sitik Af.Silih Siytigey madenih iyen. Taliyaanah ybuke focal digire Mariyobalatoli Mayfiriminon.

data.eng: The Kremlin announces that Russia will hold the 2014 G8 summit in its southern Black Sea resort of Sochi, the host of the 2014 Winter Olympics.
data.aaf: 2014 Karmah Olombik Xayoosa Tanih Tan Sochi, Gabik Datta Baddih Rizortih Addal Rusiya 2014 G8 የ 2014 summitil Gexsiiselem Kremlin Qadose.
data.amh: ከክሬመሊን የወጣው መግለጫ እንደሚያሳውቀው ሩሲያ የ2014ን የጂ8 ስብሰባ የ2014 የክረምት ኦሎምፒክ በምታዘጋው የደቡባዊ የጥቁር ባህር ማረፊያ ሶቺ ለማድረግ ወስናለች።
data.orm: Kiremiliin Qopheessituun Oloompikii gannaa bara 2014ii kan taate 'Saawuzern Bilaak Sii' resoortii 'Soochii' keessatti Raashiyaan Yaa'ii G8 kan bara 2014ii akka geggeessitu beeksiste.
data.som: Kremlin ayaa sheegey in Ruushku ku qaban doono shir madaxeedka G8 2014 ka koonfurta dalxiiska Black Sea resort ee Sochi, oo martigeliyey Olombikada Jiilaalka 2014.
data.tir: ርክብ ጉጅለ 8 ናይ 2014 ዓ.ም ኣብ ኣኣንጋዲ ናይ ሓጋይ ጸወታታት ኦሊምፒክስ 2014 ኣብ ደቡብ ጸሊም ባሕሪ ዝርከብ መዘናግዒ ማእከል ሱቺ ብራሽያ ክካየድ ምዃኑ ክረምሊን ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: Afzal Guru is hanged at Tihar Jail in New Delhi, India, for his role in the 2001 Indian Parliament attack.
data.aaf: Afzal Guru 2001 Hindih Barlamah Maysatakal Beyte Doori New Xelhi , tihar Casbih Buxal Takartimeh.
data.amh: አፍዛል ጉሩ ከ2001 የህንድ ፓርላማ ጥቃት ጋር በተያያዘ በኒው ዴልሂ በሚገኘው ቲሃር እስር ቤት ውስጥ በስቅላት ተገደለ።
data.orm: Hafzaal Guruun ga'ee haleellaa mana marii bakka bu'oota uummataa Indiyaa irraatti bara 2001 qabateen Indiyaa,Newdehlii mana amala sirreessaa Tihar keessatti Fannifame.
data.som: Afzal Guru ayaa lagu deldelay xabsiga Tihar ee New Delhi, India, taas oo ay sababtay gacantii uu ka qaatay weerarkii baarlamaanka Hindiya ee 2001 kii.
data.tir: ኣፍዛል ጉሩ ብ2001 ዓምፈ ኣብ ፓርላማ ህንዲ ኣብ ዝ ተፈፀመ መጥቃዕቲ ብዝነበሮ ግደ ኣብ ኒውዴልሂ ኣብ ዝርከብ ቤትማእሰርቲ ቲሃር ተሰቒሉ ።

data.eng: Tens of millions of Hindus bathe in the Ganges River in the Indian city of Allahabad during the Maha Kumbh Mela festival.
data.aaf: Maha Kumbh Mela Festival Wakti Tabna MilyoonulLowinta HInxute Ganxah Weeqaytuk Hindi Allahbad Magaalal Kaqalan.
data.amh: በአስር ሚሊዮኖች የሚቆጠሩ ሂንዱዎች በህንድ በምተገኘው አላህአባድ ከተማ በማሃ ኩምብ ፌስቲቫል አከባበር ላይ በጋንጀስ ወንዝ ውስጥ ታጠቡ።
data.orm: Hordoftoonnii amantii Hinduwizimii miliyoona kudhaniin lakkaa'aman Laga Gangisii isa magaalaa Hindii Allahabaad keessaatti yeroo festivaala Maha Kumb Mela dhaqna dhiqatan.
data.som: Tobanaan milyan oo Hindus ah ayaa ku maydhay Wabiga Ganges ee magaalada Allahabad ee dalka Hindiya, iyado lagu guda jiro xafladda Maha Kumbh Mela.
data.tir: ብዓሰርተታት ሚልዮን ዝቑፁሩ ሂንዱስ ኣብ ቅነ ፌስትቫል ማሃ ኩምብህ ሜላ ኣብ ህንዳዊት ከተማ ኣላሃባድ ኣብ ሩባ ጋንጂስ ተጠሚቖም ።

data.eng: In motorsport, Danica Patrick becomes the first woman to win pole position at the Daytona 500 and the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series.

data.som: Dhinaca ciyaraha motada, Danica Patrick ayaa noqotay gabadhii ugu horreysay ee ku guuleysata boosaska Daytona 500 iyo koobka NASCAR Sprint Series.
data.tir: ኣብ ውድድር መካይን፣ ዳኒካ ፓትሪክ ኣብ ዳይቶና 500 ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ ተኸታተልቲ ዋንጫ ስፕሪንት ናስካር ቀዳማይ ደረጃ ብምሓዛ ናይ ፈለማ ጓል ኣንስተይቲ ክትከውን በቒዓ።

data.eng: Eddie Maher, who spent almost 20 years as a fugitive in the United States, is jailed for five years for stealing a security van containing £1.2m in Suffolk, England.
data.aaf: USik Addal 20 Sanatih Gide Dabol Ayfaf Acayuk suge Eddie Maher Ingilizik Suffolk Addal 1.2 milyoonih Bawunxi Yabbixe Aytibuxah Vane Garaqemih Konna Sanatah Casbit Geytima
data.amh: በአሜሪካ ለ20 አመታት በስደት የቆየው ኤዲ ማሀር በእንግሊዝ ሰፎልክ የደህንነት ሰራተኞችን መኪና በመስረቁ ለአምስት አመት የሞቆይ የእስር ፍርድ ተፈረደበት።
data.orm: Yunaaytid Isteetis keessatti koolu galtummaan waggoota 20 kan jiraate Edii Maher Ingiliz ,Sanfolk keessatti konkolaataa Vaanii kan qaama nageenyaa ta'e miliyoona £1.2 waliin hatuu isaatiin hidha wagga shaniin adabame.
data.som: Eddie Maher, oo baxsad kujoogay Maraykanka mudo ku dhawaad 20 sano, ayaa lagu xukumay shan sano oo xadhig ah kadib markii uu xaday gaari amni oo ay ku jirto £ 1.2m Suffolk, Ingiriiska.

data.eng: Writer Ruth Prawer Jhabvala, the only person to have won both an Academy Award and a Booker Prize, dies at the age of 85.

data.som: Qoraa Ruth Prawer Jhabvala, oo ah qofka kaliya ee ku guuleystay Abaalmarinta Akadeemiyada iyo Abaalmarinta Buugga, ayaa ku dhinta da'da 85aad.

data.eng: Seven-time Prime Minister of Italy Giulio Andreotti dies in Rome at the age of 94 years.
data.aaf: Malcina addah Taliyanak Nahrsi Malaak Guliyu Anxureti 94sanatat roomul Rabasite.
data.amh: ለሰባት ጊዜ የጣሊያን ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ሆነው ያገለገሉት ጂውሊዎ አንደሮቲ በ94 አመታቸው በሮም ከተማ ከዚህ አለም በሞት ተለዩ።

data.eng: More than 150 scientists urge the Australian Government to slow development near the Great Barrier Reef.
data.aaf: 150 dagga takke Saynis tutaxago Awustaraliyah Doolat Nabah yan bariyer Xaqul Yanih yan Daddos Kakwadiritewanah Yescese.
data.amh: ከ 150 የሚበልጡ የሳይንስ ተመራማሪዎች የአውስትራሊያ መንግስት ወደ ባህር ዳርቻ አካባቢ ወደሆነው ግሬት ባሪየር የውቅያኖስ ዳርቻ የመሬት ክፍል እየተጠጋ የመጣውን እድገት እንዲቀስ አስጠነቀቁ።
data.orm: Saayintistoonni 150 ol ta'an Mootummaan Awustiraaliyaa naannoo Gireet Baariyer Riif'tti misooma akka hirisu akeekkachiisan.
data.som: In ka badan 150 saynisyahano ayaa ku boorinaya Dowladda Australia inay hoos u dhigto hawlgalka u dhow ee ay ka waddo xeebta wayn.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ኣውስትራሊያ ኣብ ጥቓ ግሬት ባርየር ሪፍ ዘካየዶ ዘሎ ልምዓት ከዛሕትሎ ልዕሊ 150 ሳይንቲስታት ተማሕፂኖም።

data.eng: Researchers describe the recently rediscovered Hula painted frog, long thought to be extinct, as a "living fossil".
data.aaf: Kusaq aba Xayih getimte inkih hula kalam yasukute Aqanti፣ mango waqdi Bayah Axcuk yacsuben aqanti “Coorile raqta exxa” Axcuk Yaskasen.
data.amh: ተመራማሪዎች በቅርቡ በድጋሚ የተገኘውን እና ለረጅም ጊዜ ጠፍቷል የተባለውን የሁላ የእንቁራሪት ስእል "በህይወት ያለ ቅሪተ አካል" ነው ሲሉ ገለፁ።
data.orm: Qorattoonni fatteewwan Hula dibamtee jirtu kan dhiyeenya irra deebiin argamte, kan dura raawwattee baddeetti jedhamee yaadame, akka "foosilii jiraattuutti" ibsan.
data.som: Cilmi baadhayaasha ayaa ku tilmaamay sawirka raha Hula ee dhawaan dib loo helay, oo muddo dheer loo malaynayay inuu dabar go'ay, sida "qalfoof nool".
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ቐረባ ዳግም ዝተረኸበ ሁላ ፐይንትድ ዝስሙ ጥንቁርባዕ ካብ ገፀ ምድሪ ከምዝጠፍአ ተገይሩ ይሕሰብ ምስ ምንባሩ ተኣሳሲሩ ተመራመርቲ “ህሉው ቅሪተ ኣካል” ክብሉ ሰይሞምዎ።

data.eng: A second case of Legionnaires' Disease in less than a week is confirmed in Australia, leading to fears of a possible outbreak of the rare disease.
data.aaf: Awostaraliyah Addal Bacaarak Dagowesini Gidde Addat Legionnaires' Dalka Nammeyhyto Caagid Yismiteenih, Ta Virisih Dalkah Takkem Bictah.
data.amh: በአውስትራሊያ ውስጥ ከሳምንት ባነሰ ጊዜ ውስጥ የሌጅኒየርስ በሽታ ሁለተኛ ታማሚ መገኘት በመረጋገጡ ይህ አልፎ አልፎ የሚከሰት በሽታ ወረርሽኝ ሊከሰት ይችላል የሚል ፍራቻን አስከትሏል።
data.orm: Namni Dhukkuba Leiyooneeriin qabame lammaffaan yeroo torban tokko hin geenye keessatti Awustiraaliyaa keessatti gabaasamuun, weerarri dhibee yeroo baayyee hin argamne mudachuu akka malu sodaa uume.
data.som: Kiis labaad oo ah Cudurka Legionnaires aya lagu helay in kayar todobaad gudeeheed oo laga xaqiijiyay Australia, taasoo keentay cabsi laga qabo inuu dillaaco cudurkan dhifka ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ሰሙን ከይመለአ ካልኣይሓልሓሊፉ ዝኽሰት ሕማም ለጂዮንየርስ ተረጋጊጹ ኣሎ፣ እዚ ድማ ሳሕቲ እንተ ዘይኰይኑ ሕማም ከላዕል ኣስጊኡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The United States and China agree to work together to reduce the use of hydrofluorocarbons which are thought to contribute significantly to global warming.
data.aaf: Baadal Laqna osisemik Fayale Doori digi Abale Axcuk yakalen Haxiro felorokarboniteeta intifaq Addah iyuh Ameerika kee Chayina Sitalih taamitonuh sitagen.
data.amh: ለዓለም ሙቀት መጨመር ከፍተኛ አስተዋፅኦ ያደርጋሉ ተብለው የሚታሰቡትን የሃይድሮ ፍሎሮካርቦኖችን አጠቃቀም ለመቀነስ አሜሪካ እና ቻይና በጋራ ለመስራት ተስማሙ።
data.orm: Yuunaayitid Isteetisii fi Chaayinaan itti fayyadama haayidroofiloorookaarbon kan caalmaan ho'a addunyaaf akka gumaachaa jirutti yaadamu hir'isuun waliin hojjechuuf waliigalan.
data.som: Maraykanka iyo Shiinaha ayaa isku raacay inay ka wada shaqeeyaan sidii loo yarayn lahaa adeegsiga hydrofluorocarbon -ka oo loo malaynayo inay wax weyn ka geystaan kulaylka adduunka.

data.eng: President of Nigeria Goodluck Jonathan announces a N3 billion fund to "intervene" in Nollywood.

data.som: Madaxweynaha Nigeria Goodluck Jonathan ayaa ku dhawaaqay in lacag dhan 3 bilyan oo nayra loo qorsheeyay sidii loogu faragelin laha shirkada aflaanta ee Nollywood.

data.eng: The Australian Dollar falls to its lowest level against the US Dollar since 2010.

data.amh: ከ 2010 በ|ላ የአውስትራሊያው ዶላር ከዩኤስ ዶላር ምንዛሪ ጋር ሲነፃፃር በጣም ዝቅተኛ ደረጃ ላይ ደረሰ።

data.eng: Pakistan condemns the latest deadly U.S. drone strike to violate its "sovereignty and territorial integrity".
data.aaf: Suriyinuk Inayta Magaalal Geytima Iro Dirab Biciseenuh wakti bayisan፣ Mangom Dafesan Uwaytete kee kalah Qaskariyo qilaamak Xerikel tan Silaalo Geyuh Yarde.
data.amh: ፓኪስታን ሉአላዊነቴን እና ድንበሬን አላከበረም በሚል የአሜሪካን የሰው አልባ ድሮኖችን ጥቃት አወገዘች።

data.som: Pakistan waxay cambaaraysay duqeyntii ugu dambeysay ee diyaaradaha aan duuliyaha laheyn ee Mareykanka, taas oo ay sheegtay inay tahay xadgudb ka dhan ah "madaxbanaanideeda iyo wadajirka dhuleed".

data.eng: Abu Qatada, a Palestinian Muslim cleric allegedly affiliated with al-Qaeda, is deported from the United Kingdom to Jordan to face charges of terrorism.
data.aaf: Alkaqidalih Angarowle Akak Iyan Falastin Islamit Kaysi Abbu Kataxa Qarkakis Galti Melkisak Yurxanosuk Diriyimreh.
data.amh: የፍልስጤሙ የእስልምና አስተማሪ አቡ ቃታዳ ከአልቃይዳ ጋር ግንኙነት እንዳለው በመጠርጠሩ ከ እንግሊዝ ተባሮ በጆርዳን ሽብር ክስ ተመሰረተበት።
data.orm: Garee Al-qaa'edaa waliin walitti dhufeenya qabachuudhaan kan himataman dursaan amantii Musliimaa Paalatayinii Abu-Qataadaan yakka shororkeessummaatiin adabamuuf Yunaaytid Kiingidamirra gara jordaanitti Ari'ataman.
data.som: Abu Qatada oo ah wadaad Muslim ah oo reer Falastiin ah oo la sheegay inuu xidhidh la leeyahay Al-Qaacida ayaa laga masaafuriyay dalka Ingiriiska oo loo qaaday dalka Urdun si loogu qaado dacwado la xidhidha argagixiso.
data.tir: ምስ ኣልቃይዳ ምትእስሳር ኣለዎ ዝብሃል ፍልስጤ ማዊ መራሒ ምስልምና ኣቡ ቃታዳ ብኽ ስታት ሽበራ ክሕተት ካብ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ናብ ሊባኖስ ተጠሪዙ።

data.eng: Prominent Russian opposition figure Alexei Navalny registers himself to stand in September's vote for Moscow mayor.
data.aaf: Yamixige Rusiyah Saduabeh Yan num alekis Navalani Gaxa-garablih Alsat Moskoh magaalah xinisoh Xongolo Yacuh Isih Uskutubeh.
data.amh: ታዋቂው የሩሲያ ተቃዋሚ አሌክስ ናቫልኒ ለመስከረሙ የሞስኮ ከተማ ከንቲባ ምርጫ ተመዘገበ።
data.orm: Hogganaan Mormituu beekamaan Raashiyaa Aleeks Naavaaliriin filannoo Fulbaanaa kantiibaa magaalaa Mooskoof dorgomuuf galmaa'e.
data.som: mucaaradka caanka ah Ruushka Alexei Navalny wuxu isku diiwaangeliyay inuu u istaago codaynta duqa magaalada Moscow bisha September.
data.tir: ውሩይ መራሒ ተቓዋሚ ፓርቲ ሩስያ ኣሌክሴይ ናቫልኒይ ኣብ ዝመፅእ መስከረም ኣብዝካየድ መረፃ ከንቲባ ሞስኮ ንምውድዳር ተመዝጊቦም።

data.eng: British Prime Minister David Cameron announces plans for every household in the UK to automatically have pornography blocked by their internet service provider, unless they choose otherwise.
data.aaf: Biritaniyak naharsi malaak Xavix Kameron Ingiliz Addal Kuli Buxah mari Baxsale gita dooroweh Akwaytek Internet Ayfaf Tacayo Leeda Focite isi gubat hak gubite Yeysexexege.
data.amh: በእንግሊዝ ያለ እያንዳንዱ ቤተሰብ በተለየ መንገድ ካልመረጠ በስተቀር የወሲብ ምስሎችን ወዲያውኑ ለማሳገድ ከፈለገ በበይነመረብ አገልግሎት አቅራቢው አማካኝነት መፈፀም ለማስቻል ማቀዱን የእንግሊዝ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ዴቪድ ካሜሮን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Ministirri muummee Biriteen Deevid Kaameruun yoo filataniin alatti jirattonni Ingiliiz hundi hatattamaan marsariitiilee suuraalee qunnamtii saalaa daddabarsan akka cufaniif waamicha taasisan.
data.som: Raiisel wasaaraha Ingiriiska David Cameron ayaa ku dhawaaqay qorshe ln qoys kasta oo ku nool ingiriiska ay si horle iskaga xannibaan muuqaalada galmada ay bixiyeen adeeggooda internetka, ilaa inayrabaan isticmaalo kooda mooye.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ብሪታንያ ዴቪድ ካሜሮን፣ ነፍስ ወከፍ ስድራ ምርጭኡ እንተዘይኮይኑ፣ ኢንተርኔት ዘቕርቡ ኩባንያታት ኣገልግሎት ቪድዮታት ግብረ ስጋ ክዓፅውዎ ዘኽእል ትልሚ ዕላዊ ገይሮም።

data.eng: Hercules 264, a Gulf of Mexico natural gas drilling rig, partially collapses off the coast of Louisiana after catching fire.
data.aaf: Meksiikok badi qande Gaaz foto herikulis 264 gira mademik lakal luwiziyah Badih xaqul baarluk rade.
data.amh: በሜክሲኮ ባሕረ ሰላጤ የሔርኩለስ 264 የተፈጥሮ ጋዝ ቁፋሮ ላይ እሳት አደጋ መድረስን አስመልክቶ በሉዊዚያና የባሕር ዳርቻ ላይ በከፊል ጉዳት አድርሷል ።
data.orm: Lolaa meeksiikoo qonna boolla boba'aa uumama Heerkulas 264 hojjetamaa ture irrattii bala abiddaa qaqabeen gartokkeen isaa gara buufata doonii Luuziyaanatti jige.
data.som: Hercules 264, oo ah riigga qodista gaaska dabiiciga ee gacanka mexico, ayaa qayb ahaan ku burburay xeebta Louisiana kadib markii uu dab qabsaday.
data.tir: ሄርኩለስ 264 ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ ኣብ ወሽመጥ ባሕሪ ሜክሲኮ ኣብ ጥቓ ገምገም ሉዊዚያና ዝርከብ መዐደኒ ተፈጥሯዊ ጋዝ ብዝበፅሖ ሓደጋ ባርዕ ብኽፋሉ ዓንዩ።

data.eng: Wells Fargo of the United States becomes the world's largest bank by market capitalisation, replacing the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China amid an economic slowdown in China.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Wlese farego Chayinak Maduuru Xacamowiyal ChayinahSanaqata kee Kabxah Banki Cagilisak Qadaga Kabitalayzeshion Baadak Naba Yan Banki Yekke.
data.amh: በቻይና በተፈጠረው የኢኮኖሚ ቀውስ ምክንያት የቻይናውን የኢንዱስትሪ እና ንግድ ባንክ በመተካት የአሜሪካው ዌልስ ፋርጎ በገበያ ካፒታላይዜሽን የዓለም ትልቁ ባንክ ሆኗል።
data.orm: Weels Fargoon Yuunaayitid Isteetis, gadi bu'uu diinagdee Chaayinaa keessaa hordofuun Baankii Industirii fi Daldalaa Chaayinaa bakka bu'uun, gabaaf kaappitaala dhiyeessuudhan baankii guddicha addunyaa ta'e.
data.som: Wells Fargo oo u lagaleeyahay dalka Mareykanka ayaa noqonaya bangiga ugu weyn adduunka marka la is weydaarsado suuqyada, isagoo beddelaya Bangiga Warshadaha iyo Ganacsiga Shiinaha wakhti uu hoos u dhac dhaqaale ka jiro Shiinaha.
data.tir: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ኣመሪካ ዝመደበሩ ዌልስ ቫርጎ ብሰንኪ ዝሕታለ ቁጠባ ቻይና ንኢንዱስትርያውን ንግዳውን ባንክ ቻይና ተኪኡ ብዕዳጋ ርእሰ-ማልነት ካብ ዓለም እቲ ዝዓበየ ባንክ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Oxford English Dictionary confirms that it will change the definition of the word "marriage" to include the LGBT community.
data.aaf: Okesforxi Ingilizih Afih Xikshineri “Digibi” Inta Qangara Tarjama LGB Ayyunta kah Edde Yasgalenah Yasamite.
data.amh: የኦክስፎርድ እንግሊዘኛ መዝገበ ቃላት "marriage" ወይም ጋብቻ በሚለው ቃል ስር ያለውን የቃል ፍቺ "LGBT" ማህበረሰብ እንዲያካትት አድርጎ እንደሚያስተካክል አረጋገጠ።
data.orm: Galmeen Jechoota Ingiliffaa Oksifoord hawaasa LGBT itti dabaluuf hiika jecha "gaa'ila" jedhuu akka jijjiiru mirkaneesse.
data.som: Qaamuuska Ingiriisiga Oxford wuxuu xaqiijinayay inuu beddeli doono qeexidda erayga “guur” si loogu so daro bulshada LGBT.
data.tir: መዝገበ ቃላት ኦክስፎርድ ነቲ መርዓ ዝብል ቃል ንከም ኤል ጂ ቢቲ ዝበሉ ማሕበረሰብ ብዝሓውስ ኣገባብ ትርጉሙ ከምዝልውጦ ኣረጋጊፁ ።

data.eng: A mass funeral is held near the southern Italian town of Pozzuoli for the 38 victims of Sunday's bus crash.

data.amh: በደቡባዊ ጣሊያን ፖዙሊ ከተማ አቅራቢያ ለ 38 ቱ የእሁድ አውቶቡስ አደጋ ተጠቂዎች የጅምላ ቀብር ተፈጸመ።
data.orm: Magaalaa kibba Xaaliyaanii Poozuulii keessatti namoota 38 kufuu baasii Dilbataan walqabatee du'aniif sirni awwaalcha jumlaa godhame.
data.som: 38 qof oo ku geeriyooday bas axadii magaalada Pozzuoli ee koonfurta Talyaaniga ayaa loosameeyey xabaa jilmadeed
data.tir: ኣብ ደቡባዊ ጣልያን ጥቓ ከተማ ፖዞሊ ናይቶም ግዳይ ምልታም ኣውቶብስ ዝኾኑ 38 ሰባት ሓባራዊ ቀብሪ ተፈፂሙ።

data.eng: The United States closes 22 embassies in the Middle East and North Africa due to intelligence of an Al-Qaeda attack.
data.aaf: Galimaro Qeebi Galtite Sangara Buxah Saqqal Kemikal Qeebi Aslaca Maysataka Yakaleenih Yanin14 Caagida kusaqaqisak geytimaanam Qadoose.
data.amh: አሜሪካ በሰሜን አፍሪካ እና በመካከለኛው ምስራቅ የሚገኙ 22 ኤምባሲዎቿን አልቃይዳ ጥቃት ሊፈፅም ይችላል በሚል ዘጋች።
data.orm: Odeeffannoo haleellaa Alqaayidaa sababeeffachuun yuunaytid Isteetis imbaasiiwwan 22 baha giddu galeessaa fi kaabaa Afrikaatti argaman cufte.
data.som: Mareykanka ayaa xiray 22 safaaradood oo u ku laha Bariga Dhexe iyo Waqooyiga Afrika kadib marku helay xog ku saabsan weerar ay Al-Qaacida qorshaynayso.
data.tir: ኣሜሪካ ኣልቃይዳ ከጥቅዕ ከም ዝኽእል ሓበሬታ ድሕንነት ስለዝበፅሓ ኣብ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕን ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ንዝርከቡ 22 ኤምባሲታታ ዓፅያ።

data.eng: A gas explosion in an apartment block kills five people and injures a dozen in the Argentine city of Rosario.

data.som: Qarax gaas oo ka dhacay guri dabaqa oo ku yaala magaalada Rosario ee dalka Argentine ayaa sababay dhimashada shan qof iyo dhaawaca tobaneeyo.
data.tir: ሮዛርዮ ተባሂላ ኣብትፅዋዕ ከተማ አርጀንቲና ኣብ ሓደ መንበሪ ህንፃ ብዘጋጠመ ሓደጋ ምንታጉ ጋዝ 5 ሰባት እንትሞቱ፣ ደርዘን ዝበፅሑ ድማ መቑሰልቲ በፂሑዎም።

data.eng: A hot Air Balloon carrying an American family crashes killing one person and injures four in the Swiss town of Montbovon.
data.aaf: Cigilta-Gudo 17 Yellowstone Weqaytih Addat Caxiteh kak Yan Sakuti Kemikal Kanser katasa.
data.amh: በስዊዘርላንድ ሞንትቦቮን ከተማ አንድ አሜሪካዊ ቤተሰብን የጫነ የሞቀ አየር ፊኛ ተከስክሶ አንድ ሰው ሲገድል አራት ደግሞ ቆስለዋል።

data.som: Buufinta hawada kulul ku kacada oo siday qoys Maraykan ah ayaa shil sababay dhimashada hal qof iyo dhaawaca afar kale magaalada Montbovon ee dalka Switzerland.

data.eng: Rochus Misch, the last witness to Adolf Hitler’s suicide in the Führerbunker dies at the age of 96.

data.amh: በፊውረር በንከር ውስጥ የአዶልፍ ሂትለር ራስን የማጥፋት የመጨረሻ ምስክር የነበረው ሮቹስ ሚሽ በ 96 ዓመቱ አረፈ።
data.orm: Roochus Miisch, ragaan dhumaa of ajjeesuu Adoolf Hiitilar Fuhreerbanker keessattii umrii 96tti du'e.

data.eng: The elusive Australian Central Rock Rat, not seen since 1960, is rediscovered in Central Australia.
data.aaf: 1960 Qimbisak Ambuluyesini Awustaraliyak Fanti Rookih Qandawa Fanti Awustaraliyah Addal Qagitak Geytimte.
data.amh: ከ 1960 ጀምሮ ያልታየው የአውስትራሊያ ማዕከላዊ ሮክ አይጥ በማዕከላዊ አውስትራሊያ ውስጥ እንደገና ተገኘ።
data.orm: Hantuuti Kattaa Giddugala Awustiraaliyaa kan baay'ee hin argamne, erga bara 1960 tii kan argamee hin beekne, Giddugala Awustiraaliyaa keessatti irra deebiin argame.
data.som: Jiirka dhagax galaha ee Australia, oo aan la arag tan iyo 1960, ayaa dib looga helay bartamaha Australia.
data.tir: እቲ ካብ 1960 ኣትሒዙ ዘይተራእየ፣ እቲ ንምርካቡ ኣጸጋሚ ዝኾነ ናይ ኣውስትራሊያ ኣንጭዋ ሴንትራል ሮክ፣ ኣብ ማእከላይ ኣውስትራልያ ዳግማይ ተረኺቡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: South Korea bans all fishery imports from eight Japanese prefectures, amid concern over leaks of radioactive water from the crippled Fukushima nuclear plant.
