data.amh: ህንድ ከ 100,000 በላይ ሰዎች አሁንም የማዳን እርዳታን በሚጠብቁበት የጃሙ እና ካሽሚር ግዛት ውስጥ ከባድ ዝናብ በመኖሩ ምክንያት የማዳን ሥራዎችን አስቆመች።
data.orm: Sababa rooba ulfaaataa naannoo Jammuu fi Kaashmir keessaaf Hindiin bakka namoonni 100,000 ammallee baafamuuf eeganitti hojii namoota baraaruu adda kutte.
data.som: Hindiya ayaa hakisay hawlihii badbaadadii kaas oo ay sababtay roobab xooggan oo ka da’ay gobolka Jammu iyo Kashmir halkaas oo in ka badan 100,000 ay weli sugayaan badbaadada.
data.tir: ዋላ እኳ ልዕሊ 100,000 ሰባት ናይ ምድሓን ሓገዝ እናተፀበዩ እንተኾኑ ህንዲ ኣብ ግዝኣታት ጅሙን ካሽሚርን ብሰንኪ ዝወቅዕ ዘሎ ብርቱዕ ዝናብ ነቲ ተካይዶ ዝፀንሐት ወፍሪ ምድሓን ኣቋሪፃቶ።

data.eng: Lawmakers from Ukraine ratify a landmark agreement with the European Union in tandem with a meeting of the European Parliament.
data.aaf: YukreenikTeemte Ganun tayaqo Awrobah inkiinolih Awrobah Inkiinoh Barlamalih Inik Aydaadule Sitigey Faticiselon.
data.amh: ከአውሮፓ ፓርላማ ስብሰባ በሚገኝ ትብብር ከዩክሬን የመጡ የሕግ አውጭዎች ከአውሮፓ ህብረት ጋር ታሪካዊ ስምምነትን ያፀድቃሉ።
data.orm: Seera baastonni Yukireen walgahii paarlaamaa Awurooppa hordofuun waliigaltee seene qabeessa Gamtaa Awurooppaa waliin raggaasisan.
data.som: Sharci -dejiyayaasha ka socda Ukraine ayaa ansixiyay heshiis taariikhi ah oo ay la galeen Midowga Yurub kadib kulanka Baarlamaanka Yurub.
data.tir: ባይቶ ወከልቲ ህዝቢ ዩክሬን ምስ ሕብረት ኣውሮፓ ዝተበፅሐ ታሪኻዊ ስምምዕ ፓርላማ ኣውሮፓ ኣኼባ ኣብ ዝፀወዐሉ ተመሳሳሊ ግዜ ኣፅዲቑዎ።

data.eng: Australia raises security for its Parliament after conducting raids that arrest dozens of suspected terrorists.
data.aaf: Kiblati Ayro Mawqah Nageeriyak Muubi Magaalak Xaqul atabus Fanteenal Wasimte Boombiit 5 taake Qaskar Edde anuk 40 taake sinam Edde Rabte.
data.amh: አውስትራሊያ ብዛት ያላቸው ሽብርተኛ ተጠርጣሪዎችን በመያዟ ምክንያት የደህንነት ጉዳዮችን በሚመለከት በፓርላማዋ በኩል ከፍተኛ አፅንኦት እንዲሰተጠው አደረገች።
data.orm: Awustiraaliyaan duula shororkeessummaa ballessuuf shakkamtoota hedduminaan hidhuu eegaluu isheetiin walqabatee eegumsa miseensota parlaamaa biyyattiif gootu ni fooyyeessiti.
data.som: Australia ayaa kor u qaadeysa amniga Baarlamaankeeda kadib markii ay fulisay hawlgallo lagu soo qabqabtay tobanaan qof oo looga shakisan yahay argagaxiso.
data.tir: ኦስትሬልያ ብደርዘናት ዝቑፀሩ ጥርጡራት ግብረ ሽበራ ብወፍሪ ድሕሪ ምእሳራ ኣብ ፓርላማኣ ዝግበር ሓለዋ ኣጠናኺራቶ።

data.eng: Students from more than 20 universities and colleges in Hong Kong are boycotting class in protest against Beijing’s decision to rule out fully democratic elections.
data.aaf: Hongo kongil 20 Dagga Takke Jaamiqatite kee Kolojite Temet Barteetenit Bejigik Inkih Ximikrasih Dooro Bayisuh Benih aynin margaqa Sadak kilas boykoting Abak geytimanam kini.
data.amh: በሆንግ ኮንግ ከሚገኙ ከ20 በላይ በሚበልጡ ዩንቨርሲቲ እና ኮሌጆች የሚማሩ ተማሪዎች በቤጂንግ መንግስት የተደረገውን የዴሞክራሲያዊ ምርጫ ክልከላ በመቃወም ክፍል ገብተው ባለመማር ተቃውሞ እያደረጉ ይገኛሉ።
data.orm: Barattoonni yuniversitii fi kolleejjii Hoong Koong keessaa 20 caalan keessaa murtii Beejingi filannoo diimokiraatawaa balleessuuf baaste mormuun daree hafaa jiru.
data.som: Ardayda iskasoo bahaysatay in ka badan 20 jaamacadood iyo kulliyadaha Hong Kong ayaa jaray wakhtigii waxbarashada iyaga oo ka soo horjeeda go'aanka Beijing ee ah in meesha laga saaro doorashooyin dimuqraadi ah oo buuxa.
data.tir: ኣብ ሆንግኮንግ ተምሃሮ ልዕሊ 20 ዩኒቨርስትታትን ኮሌጃትን ቻይና ሙሉእ ዴሞክራሲያዊ መረፃ ንምክያድ ውሕስነት ኣይሃበትን ብምባል ኣድማ ምቁራፅ ትምህርቲ የካይዱ ኣለው።

data.eng: NASA's MAVEN space probe successfully arrives in orbit over Mars.
data.aaf: NASA MAVEN Qaran kusaq yayse calatal maris orbit made.
data.amh: የናሳ ማቨን( MAVEN) የተሰኘው መንኩራኩር ወደ ማርስ በስኬታማ መልኩ ደረሰ።
data.orm: Meeshaan qorannoo Hawaa NASA, MAVEN ooribitii Maarsii keessa milkaa'inaan qaqqabe.
data.som: Baadhitaanka NASA ee MAVEN ayaa si guul leh u gaadhay meeraha Mars.
data.tir: መንኮራኹር ህዋ ዝኾነት ኤም.ኤ.ቪ.ኢ.ኤን (ማቬን) ኣብ ምህዋር ማርስ ብዓወት በፂሓ።

data.eng: The World Health Organisation says that the death toll from the Ebola virus is over 2,900.
data.aaf: Baadak Qafiyat Wgla elle Inteenal 2,900 dagga takkeme Iboolah Dalkah Rabte.
data.amh: በኢቦላ ቫይረስ የሞቱ ሰዎች ቁጥር ከ 2,900 በላይ መሆኑን የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa baay'inni du'a vaayirasii Eboolaan dhufe 2,900 ol akka tahe ibse.
data.som: Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa sheegay in tirada dhimashada fayraska Ebola ay kor u dhaaftay 2,900.
data.tir: መጠን ሞት ቫይረስ ኢቦላ ልዕሊ 2900 ከምዝበፅሐ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Fatah and Hamas agree to form a unity government on the Gaza Strip.
data.aaf: Fatca Kee Camas Gaazah Caagidil Inkitiini Doolat Bicisoonuh Sitagen.
data.amh: ፋታህ እና ሃማስ በጋዛ ሰርጥ ላይ የተዋሃደ መንግሰት ለመፍጠር ተስማሙ።
data.orm: Sulula Gaazaa irratti Hamaasii fi Faatahin motummaa waliinii hundeessuuf waliigalan.
data.som: Fatax iyo Xamaas ayaa ku heshiiyay inay dhisaan dowlad midnimo oo ku taal marinka Gaza.
data.tir: ሓማስን ፈትሕን ኣብ ወሽመጥ ቓዛ ናይ ሓድነት መንግስቲ ክቆማ ተሰማሚዐን።

data.eng: Pacific walruses unable to find sea ice on which to rest in Arctic waters are coming ashore in record numbers on a beach in north-west Alaska.
data.aaf: Kiblati Ayromawqah Al Aksah Baddih Xaqul Antartik Kaxxa Baddal Caxitah tan Baddi Baradite Geyanam Xiqewenim Basfik Weltoti.
data.amh: በአርክቲክ ውሃዎች ላይ ለማረፍያ የሚሆን የባህር በረዶ ግግር ማግኘት ያልቻሉ የፓስፊክ ዋልረሶች በሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ አላስካ ባህር ዳርቻ ላይ ሪከርድ በሆነ ቁጥር በመምጣት ላይ ናቸው ።
data.orm: Walrasoonni Paasifikii bishaanota Arkiitikii keessatti cabbii galaanaa irra boqotan argachuu dhaban baayyina addaatiin qarqara galaanaa kaaba lixa Alaaskaa keessaa dhufaa jiru.
data.som: Walruses ka Baasifigga oo aan awoodin inay helaan baraf badda ah oodhex fadhiya biyaha Arctic ayaa xeebta ku soo socda iyagoo tirooyin rikoodh ah ku leh xeebta waqooyi galbeed Alaska.
data.tir: ዋልሩስ ፓሲፊክ ኣብ ማያት ኣርክቲክ ዘዕርፋሉ በረድ ባሕሪ ክረኽባ ብዘይምኽኣለን ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ምዕራብ ኣላስካ ኣብ ዝርከብ ገምገም ባሕሪ ቍጽረን እናወሰኸ ይኸይድ ኣሎ።

data.eng: 18,000 Palestinians are facing life-threatening shortages of water in the Yarmouk Camp neighborhood of Damascus.
data.aaf: Yarmouk Cambih Damascus aracih Addal 18,000 Falastin Xaylo Manoh Taqabile tanih Tan Lee Dagna Ken Maadak Geytimta.
data.amh: በደማስቆ ያርሙክ ካምፕ ሰፈር ውስጥ 18,000 ሺህ ፍልስጤማውያን ለሕይወት አስጊ የሆነ የውሃ እጥረት እያጋጠማቸው ነው።
data.orm: Lammiiwwan Filisxeem 18,000 tahan Dunkaana Yaarmok ollaa Daamsqoo keessatti hanqina bishaanii miidhaa lubbuu qaqqabsiisuu danda'uutu isaan quunnamaa jira.
data.som: 18,000 oo Falastiiniyiin ah ayaa wajahaya biyo yari halis ah. kuwaas oo ku jira Xerada qaxootiga ee Yarmouk taas oo la daris ah Dimishiq.
data.tir: ኣብ ጥቓ ደማስቆ ኣብ ዝርከብ ያርሞክ መፅለሊ ዝነብሩ 18,000 ፍልስጤማውያን ንህይወቶም ዘስግእ ዋሕዲ ማይ ገጢምዎም ኣሎ ።

data.eng: British neuroscientist John O'Keefe and Norwegian scientists May-Britt Moser and Edvard Moser share the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.
data.aaf: Ingilizih yabuke Neurosaynisiti jon okeefe kee Norwey sanisiste may-Birrit morse kee Exwaexi moyze 2014 Noil Acwa bee fisikisil hinamay Cikiminal Baxiselon.
data.amh: ጆን ኦኬፍ የተባለ የብሪቲሽ ኒውሮሳይንቲስት፣ ሜይ ብሪ የተባለ ኖርዌያዊው ሳይንቲስት እና ኤድቫርድ ሞሰር የ2014 በ ፊዚዮሎጂ እና በህክምና ዘርፍ የኖቤል ሽልማት ተሸላሚ ሆነዋል።
data.orm: Niyuurosaayintistiin lammii Biriteeyin Joon O'Keefii fi saayintistoonni Noorwey Meey-Briit Mooserii fi Idvaard Mooser Badhaasa Noobelii 2014 kan Fiiziyoolojii yookaan Mediisinii qooddatan.
data.som: Dhakhtarka neerfaha ee Ingiriiska John O'Keefe iyo saynisyahannada May-Britt Moser iyo Edvard Moser ee reer norway, ayaa wadaagay Abaalmarinta Nobel Prize ka 2014 ee Fiisigiska ama Daawada.
data.tir: ቢሪታንያዊ ኒውሮ ሳይንቲስት ጆን ኦ ኪፌ፤ ኖርዌጂያዊያን ሳይንቲስታት ሜይ ቢሪት ሞሰርን ኤድቫርድ ሞሰርን ሽልማት ኖቤል ፊዚዮሎጂን ሕክምናን 2014 ዓ.ም.ፈ ብሓባር ተዓዊቶም።

data.eng: Albania's prime minister is embroiled in scandal after his brother is linked to the stunt.
data.aaf: Albaniyak Naharsi malaakih tobokoyti Ogolelih geytimek lakal Qaxumeh Addat Cule.
data.amh: የአልባኒያው ጠቅላይ ሚኒሰቴር የወንድማቸው የተለየ ድርጊት ቅሌት ውስጥ ከቷቸዋል።
data.orm: Muummichi ministeera Albeeniyaa obbeleessi isaanii mala kutuu waliin hidhata qabachusaatiin qaanii guddaa kessaa seenan.
data.som: Raiisel wasaaraha Albania ayaa fadeexad kumuquurtay ka dib markii walaalkii la xidhiidhay falka.
data.tir: ንቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ኣልባንያ ሓዉ ምስቲ ተግባር እቲ ምስ ተተሓሓዘ ኣብ ነውሪ ጥሒሉ።

data.eng: In North American Major League Baseball, the Kansas City Royals sweep the Baltimore Orioles in the 2014 American League Championship Series 4-0 to progress to the 2014 World Series.
data.aaf: Kiblati Ameerikal Mijre lik bezebool፣Kanses siti Royalese sweep Orioles 2014 Maeerikal ligih shambiyoon Aysuk 4-0 illa2014 Baadal Yeyse.
data.amh: በሰሜን አሜሪካ ሜጀር ሊግ ቤዝቦል፣ ካንሳስ ሲቲ ሮያሎች የባልቲሞር ኦርዮሌስን በ 2014 የአሜሪካ ሊግ ሻምፒዮና 4-0 በማሸነፍ ወደ 2014 ወርልድ ሲሪስ ተሸጋገሩ።
data.orm: Liigii Beezboolii Ameerikaa Kaabaa Keessatti, Rooyaalsiin Magaalaa Kansas Oriyoolsii Baaltimooriin Liigii Chaampiyoonii Ameerikaa bara 2014 keessattti 4-0'n injifachuun gara Woorlid Siriyesii 2014'tti tare.
data.som: Kubbadda Koleyga ee Waqooyiga maraykanka, Kansas sity Royals waxay kabadiyeen Baltimore Orioles ee taxanaha Horyaalka Mareykanka 2014 ee 4-0 si ay ugu gudbaan taxanaha adduunka ee 2014.
data.tir: ኣብ ግጥም ዋና ሊግ ቤዝቦል ሰሜን ኣሜሪካ፣ ጋንታ ካንሳስ ሲቲ ሮያልስ ንጋንታ ባልቲሞር ኣርዮልስ ኣብ ሊግ ሻምፕዮን ኣሜሪካ 2014፤ 4 ን0 ስዒራ፤ በዚ ድማ ንተኸታታሊ ግጥም ዓለም 2014 ምሕላፋ ኣረጋጊፃ።

data.eng: Mali confirms that a 2-year-old girl has tested positive for Ebola, marking the country's first documented case.
data.aaf: Maalil 2 Karmat Tan Awka Iboola Intiribexe. Ta Baaxo 1hytoh Addah Alcumul Dafese.
data.amh: ማሊ የ 2 ዓመቷ ህፃን በኢቦላ በሽታ መየዟን አረጋገጠች ፣ ይህም በሀገሪቱ የመጀመሪያው በሰነድ የተመዘገበች ታማሚ ያደርጋታል።
data.orm: Maaliin mucaan durbaa waggaa lamaa qorannoo iboolaaf posatiivii agarsiisuu, kan biyyattii keessatti nama dhukkubichaan qabamuun galmaa'e isa jalqabaa ta'uu mirkaneesse.
data.som: Mali waxay xaqiijisay in gabar 2 jir ah laga helay cudurka Ebola, taasoo calaamad u ah kiiskii ugu horreeyay ee laga diwaangaliyo dalka.
data.tir: ማሊ ጓል ክልተ ዓመት ብኢቦላ ከምዝተትሓዘት ኣረጋጊፃ፤ እዚ ኣብታ ሃገር ዝተመዝገበ ፈላማይ ኩነት ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Protesters in Iran call for increased security after four women are injured in acid attacks in Isfahan for allegedly not wearing veils.
data.aaf: Isfahanal Qusba Maysatakat Afara Sayyo Fooci Alif Masartinon Iyeenik Lakal Iranal Geytimta Sadi Marite Say Dacayri kah Yakke Inah Seeco Xayoosen.
data.amh: በኢራን ያሉ ተቃዋሚዎች ራሳቸውን ባለመሸፈናቸው ምክንያት አራት ሴቶች ላይ ከደረሰ የአሲድ ጥቃት በ|ላ በደህንነት እና በፀጥታው ዘርፍ ከፍተኛ እና ተጨማሪ ርብርብ እንዲደረግ ጠየቁ።
data.orm: Isfahaan keessatti dubartoonni Afur haguuggii qaamaa hin uffaanne jechuudhaan Asiidiidhaan irratti naqamanii miidhamuu isaaniin walqabatee mormitoonni Iraan akka eegumsi nageeenya jabaatuuf gafatan.
data.som: Banaan baxayaasha Iiraan ayaa ku baaqay in la kordhiyo amniga kadib markii afar dumar ah ay ku dhaawacmeen weerarro aashito ah oo ka dhacay Isfahan oo lagu eedeeyay in ay bila xijaab ahayeen.
data.tir: ብሰንኪ እቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣርባዕተ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ናይ ኣሲድ መጥቃዕቲ ምስ ወረደን ብምኽንያት ሒጃብ ምውዳይ ዝያዳ ጽጥታ ክልዕል ኣብ ኢራን ዝርከቡ ተቓወምቲ ጸዊዖም።

data.eng: The Temple Mount in Jerusalem was closed to all visitors for the first time since 2000, following the attempted assassination of Israeli activist Yehuda Glick.
data.aaf: Yulsalemil Geytima Betalmaqadas Israil Aktivistite Aycuxa Geliken qidoonuh gibatu abenimik ugutak 2000 Qimbisak Qimboh Addah Inkih wacaysir edde yakke Arooca Alfimteh.
data.amh: የእስራኤል ማህበረሰብ አንቂ አክቲቪስት ይሁዳ ግሊክ የግድያ ሙከራ ከተደረገበት በ|ላ ከ2000 በ|ላ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ በእየሩሳሌም የሚገኘው የተራራ ላይ መቅደስ ሉሁሉም ለጎብኚዎች ዝግ ተደረገ።
data.orm: Gaarri Mana sagadaa Yerussaalem keessaa yaalii ajjeechaa falmaa mirgaa lammii Isiraa'el Yihudaa Giliikki irratti godhame hordofuun erga bara 2000 tii as yeroo jalqabaaf daawwattoota hundumatti cufamee jira.
data.som: Buurta Macbadka ee Yeruusaalem ayaa la xiray dhammaan booqdayaasha markii ugu horreysay tan iyo 2000, ka marki laisku dayay dil ee u ololeeyaha Israel Yehuda Glick.
data.tir: ኣብ ልዕሊ እስራኤላዊ ኣበራባሪ ፖለቲከኛ የሁዳ ግሊክ ፈተነ ቕትለት ድሕሪ ምፍፃሙ፣ ቴምፕል ማውንት እናተብሃለ ዝፅዋዕ ቅዱስ ስፍራ እየሩሳሌም ካብ 2000 ንነዘ ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ንኹሎም ዑደተኛታት ዕፁው ኮይኑ።

data.eng: Mexican Federal Police arrest a mayor and his wife, the alleged masterminds of the kidnapping of 43 students in Iguala, Guerrero.
data.aaf: Meksiikok federal boliis Goarero Eguwalah Addal 43 takke Barttenit Aqaruk beenih Kaki yen Magala xinisoh saqal kee Kay buxah ina Lowsis gubat hen.
data.amh: በጓሬሮ ኢጉዋላ ውስጥ የ 43 ተማሪዎችን ጠለፋ አቀነባብረዋል ተብለው የተጠረጠሩትን ከንቲባን እንዲሁም ባለቤታቸውን ጨምሮ የሜክሲኮ ፌደራል ፖሊስ በቁጥጥር ስር አውሏል።
data.orm: Poolisiin Fedaraalaa Meeksiikoo magaalaa Gureero kutaa Iguwala kessatti yakka uggura barattoota 43 qindeessaniiru kan jedhamanii himataman kantiibaa magaalatti fi haadha warra isaanii to'annoo jala oolche.
data.som: Booliiska Federaalka Meksiko ayaa xabsi kutuuray duqa magaalada iyo xaaskiisa, oo la sheegay in ay agasimeen afduubista 43 arday oo ka dhacay Iguala, Guerrero.
data.tir: ፌዴራል ፖሊስ ሜክሲኮ ኢጓላን ጔሬሮን ኣብዝተብሃላ ከባብታት እታ ሃገር 43 ተምሃሮ እንትጭወዩ ቀንዲ ወጠንትን ኣተሓባበርትን ነይሮም ዝበሎም ሓደ ከንቲባን ባዓልቲ ቤቶምን ኣብ ትሕቲ ቁፅፅር ኣውዒሎም።

data.eng: Mali confirms that it has a new case of Ebola virus, this time in the capital Bamako.
data.aaf: Malil Qusba Iboolah Lakimi Bamakoh qasimal geytime.
data.amh: ማሊ በዚህ ጊዜ በዋና ከተማዋ ባማኮ አዲስ በኢቦላ ቫይረስ የተያዘ ሰው መኖሩን አረጋግጣለች።
data.orm: Maaliin yeroo kana magaalaa guddoo Bamaakoo keessatti namni haaraan dhukkuba vaayirasii Iboolaan qabame jiraachuu mirkaneesse.
data.som: Mali waxay xaqiijisay inuu jiro kiis cusub oo ah fayraska Ebola, markan wuxuu ku sugan yahay caasimadda Bamako.
data.tir: ማሊ ሓዱሽ ኩነት ቫይረስ ኢቦላ ኣረጋጊፃ፤ እዚ ኣብ ዋና ከተማኣ ኣብ ባማኮ ዘጋጠመ እዩ።

data.eng: The Church of England adopts legislation paving the way for the appointment of female bishops.
data.aaf: Ingiliz Kanisa Say Babas Hoonuh Gita Fiyt Madqa Faticisen.
data.amh: በእንግሊዝ የሚገኙ ቤተ-ክርስትያናት ሴት ጳጳሳትን ለመሾም የሚያስችል ህግ አወጡ።
data.orm: Waldaan Ingilaand seera phaaphaasii dhalaa akka muudamtu haala mijeessu baase.
data.som: Kaniisadda Ingriiska waxay qaadatay sharci u gogol xaaraya magacaabista hoggaamiyayaasha haweenka ee kiniisadaha.
data.tir: ቤተ ክርስቲያን ኢንግላድ ኣነስታይ ጳጳሳት ንምሻም ስልጣን ዝህቦ ሕጊ ኣውጺኡ ።

data.eng: UNESCO declares the Rizal Monument in Manila, Machu Picchu of Peru, Camino de Santiago of Spain, and the Dampier Archipelago of Australia as World Heritage Sites in Danger.
data.aaf: UNSCO Addal Manila Rizaleni Hawalti፣ beeru macho bichu፣ Isbenik Kamino x santiyago kee Awustraliyah Dampier Archipelago Qawalaylah Addal Baadak Uwatih Arooca Kinim Faticise.
data.amh: ዩኔስኮ በማኒላ የሚገኘውን የሪዛይ ቤተ መቅደስ፣ የፔሩውን ማቹ ፒቹ፣ የስፔኑን ካሚኖ ዴሳንቲያጎ እና የአውስትራሊያውን ዳመፒየር አርኪፔላጉ በአለማችን ከሚገኙ የቅርስ መገኛዎች አደጋ ላይ ያሉ ሲል ለይቷችዋል።
data.orm: UNESCO'n siidaa Riizaa Maanillaa keessaa, Maachu Pichuu Peeruu, Kamiinoo de Santiyaagoo Ispeenii fi Dampiyeer Arkipelaagoo Awustiraaliyaa akka Bakkeewwan Seena-qabeessa Addunyaa Balaa irra jiranitti labse.
data.som: UNESCO waxay ku dhawaaqday Taallada Rizal ee Manila, Machu Picchu ee Peru, Camino de Santiago ee Spain, iyo Dampier Archipelago ee Australia inay yihiin Goobaha Dhaxalka Adduunka ee Khatarta ku jira.
data.tir: ናይ ውድብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ትካል ትምህርቲ፣ ሳይንስን ባህሊን ናይ ናይ ዓለም ናይ ቅርሲ ቦታታት ዝኮና ናይ ማኒላ ሐውልቲ ሪዛል፡ናይ ፔሩ ማቹ ፒቹ ቦታ እምነት፡ናይ ስፔይን ካሚኖ ዴ ሳንቲያጎ ከምኡ እውን ናይ ኣውስትራሊያ ዳምፕዬር እኩባት ደሴታት ኣብ ሓደጋ ከም ዝወደቓ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Scottish Parliament elects Nicola Sturgeon as the first female First Minister of Scotland.
data.aaf: IskotlinaxihBarlama Nikola strejune Qimboh addah Malaak Abak dooren.
data.amh: የስኮትላንድ ፓርላማ ኒኮላ ስቱጂኦን የመጀመሪያዋ የስኮትላንድ ሚኒስትር አድርጎ መረጠ።
data.orm: Paarlaamaan Iskootilaand Ministeera dhalaa jalqabaa Iskootlaand gochuun Nikoola Sturjiyooniin filate.
data.som: Baarlamaanka Scotland ayaa u doortay Nicola Sturgeon inay noqoto haweeneydii ugu horreysay ee noqota Wasiirka Koowaad ee Scotland.
data.tir: ፓርላማ ስኮትላንድ ኒኮላ ስተርጂዮን ናይ መጀመርታ ኣንስተይቲ ቀዳመይቲ ሚኒስትር ገይሩ መሪፁወን።

data.eng: A roadside bomb planted at a bus station near the town of Mubi in northeastern Nigeria kills 40, including 5 soldiers.
data.aaf: Hindi Badal Oboreshio Addal tekkeh tan Xayi wakti Angagoyi Somaaliyah Doolat Caylite Amisom Qaskaral Catimak kiniwak Fanti Heran Driifah Addat Malciina Magaalolil Al-Shabaab Lwsis Gubat Heen.
data.amh: በሰሜን ምስራቅ ናይጄሪያ በምትገኘው ሙቢ ከተማ በአውቶቢስ ማቆሚያ አካባቢ በተጠመደ ፈንጂ መፈንዳት ምክንያት 40 ንፁሃን እና 5 ወታደሮች ህይወት አለፈ።
data.orm: Kaaba baha Naayijeeriya magaalaa Mubii keessatti moora buufata konkolaataa cina daandiitti boombiin awwalamee ture dhohuu isaatiin miseensota waraanaa 5 dabalatee waliigalatti lubbuun namoota 40 darbeera.
data.som: miino lagu aasay waddada dhinaceeda ayaa ku qaraxday goob basaska laga raaco oo u dhow magaalada Mubi ee waqooyi -bari Nigeria, waxaana ku dhintay 40 ruux oo ay ku jiraan 5 askari.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ምብራቕ ናይጀሪያ ኣብ ጥቓ ከተማ ሙቢ ኣብ ወሰን መንገዲ መዕረፊ ኣውቶቡሳት ዝተቐበረ ቡምባ ነቲጉ ሓሙሽተ ፖላዊስ ዝርከቡዎም 40 ሰባት ቀቲሉ።

data.eng: Greek labor unions begin a general strike to protest ongoing government austerity measures shuting down public medical, educational, and transportational services.
data.aaf: Giriik Taama Abeenit Luula Ayyunti Qafiyatay፣ Tu-Baritto kee Merayti Ayfaf daabiisiyal Yanik Doolatak Qiddao Maqatooti Sadak Amoladih Taama Soolisem Fitan Qimbisele.
data.amh: በግሪክ የሚገኙ የሰረታኛ ማህበሮች በመንግስት እየተካሄዱ ያሉ በ ህዝብ ጤና፣ ትምህርት እና ትራንስፖርት ዘርፎች ላይ የሚደረጉ ቁጥጥሮችን በመቃወም ተቃውሞ ማድረግ ጀመሩ።
data.orm: Waldaan hojjetoota Giriik tarkaanfii qusannaa mootummaa deemaa jiru mormuuf tarkaanfii hojii dhaabuu waliigalaa tajaajiloota fayyaa hawaasaa, barnootaa fi geejjibaa cufuun eegale.
data.som: Ururada shaqaalaha ee Giriiga ayaa bilaabaya shaqo joojin guud si ay uga mudaaharaadaan tallaabooyinka xadgudubka ee dowladda ee lagu joojinayo adeegyada caafimaadka, waxbarashada, iyo gaadiidka shacabka.
data.tir: ማሕበራት ሸቃሎ ግሪስ መንግስቲ ዝወስዶም ዘሎ ፅነኩራት ስጉምትታት ብምቅዋም ኣጠቓላሊ ኣድማ ስራሕ ዝጀመሩ እንትዀን ናይ ህዝቢ ኣገልግሎት ሕክምና፣ ትምህርትን መጎዓዓዝያን ጠጠው ኣቢሉ ኣሎ።

data.eng: France sets a new record for unemployment with 3.46 million recorded in October.
data.aaf: Fansa Qunxa-garblih Alsak 3.46 Milyoon maysaraqa kak tekke taama sinak maysaraqa tekke.
data.amh: ፈረንሣይ ከፍተኛ የሆነውን 3.46 ሚልዮን የሥራ አጥን በጥቅምት ወር በማስመዝገብ የመጀመሪያውን ደረጃ ይዛለች።
data.orm: Faransaayi namoota hojii hin qabne miliyoona 3.46 Onkoloolessa keessa galmeessuun rekordii haaraa qabatte.
data.som: Faransiiska ayaa tirada shaqo la’aanta kor Ugu qaaday tiro cusub u dhigay shaqo la’aanta iyadoo 3.46 milyan la diiwaan geliyey bishii Oktoobar.
data.tir: ፈረንሳ ኣብ ወርሒ ጥቅምቲ 3.46 ሚልዮን ሽቕለት ኣልቦነት ከም ዘለዋ ሓድሽ ክብሪ መዝገብ ሒዛ።

data.eng: The UN Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East declares a state of emergency on the Gaza Strip following heavy floods.
data.aaf: Bakistana shahid Benazir abba Gandal 5.o Baaxoh Angoyat 1 num rabe kalla 70 mudumeh.

data.som: Barnaamijka Cunnada Adduunka ee Qaramada Midoobay ayaa joojiyay gaadhsiinta raashinka oo loogu talagalay 1.7 milyan oo qaxooti Suuriyaan ah ka dib markii waddamada deeqda bixiya ay ka soo bixi waayeen ballanqaadyo ay galeen.
data.tir: ለገስቲ ሃገራት ዝኣተዎኦ መብጽዓታት ድሕሪ ምፍሻሉ ዓለማዊ መደብ ምቕራብ ምግቢ ውዱብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት ን1.7 ሚልዮን ሶርያውያን ስደተኛታት ዝተመደበ መግቢ ኣወንዚፉ።

data.eng: A South African judge rules that the prosecution can appeal the decision not to convict Oscar Pistorius for the murder of Reeva Steenkamp in 2013 to the Supreme Court of Appeal.
data.aaf: Gabi Qaxih Afrikah Garkure Madqa I.L.L. 2013 Steenkamp Qiddiyal Oscar Pistorius Ogolewayuh Margaqa Yolmatak Iyanam Duddanah Axcuk Fayale Nagarah Buxa Yolmataka Yecce.
data.amh: የደቡብ አፍሪካው የፍርድ ቤት ዳኛ ኦስካር ፒስተርየስ በሪቫ ስቲንካምፕ ግድያ ላይ ባስተላለፈው ፍርድ ላይ አቃቤ ህግ በጠቅላይ የይግባኝ ፍርድ ቤት ይግባኝ ማለት እንደሚችል አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Abbaan Murtii Afriikaa kibbaa Oskaar Piischeriyees bara 2013 ajjeechaa Riivaa Stiinkaampiin himanna irratti dhiyaate fudhachuu dhabuu isaatiin walqabatee mana murtii olaanaatti mirga oliyyaannoo akka egamuuf ibse.
data.som: Garsoore kasoo jeeda Koonfur Afrika ayaa xukumay in xeer ilaalintu ambil ka qaadan karto go'aanka ah inaan Oscar Pistorius dil lagu xukumin Reeva Steenkamp sannadkii 2013 kii Maxkamadda Sare ee Rafcaanka.
data.tir: ሓደ ደቡብ አፍሪካዊ ዳይና እቲ ብ 2013 ዓ.ምፈ ብዘካየዶ ቅትለት ሪቫ ስቲንካምፕ ዝተኸሰሰ ኦስካር ፒሰቶሪዮስ ከይቐፃዕ ዝተውሃበ ውሳነ ኣመልኪቱ ዓቃቢ ሕጊ ናይ ይግበአኒ ጥርዓኑ ናብ ላዕለዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ከቕርብ ከምዝኽእል በዪኑ።

data.eng: In the NBA, Kobe Bryant of the Los Angeles Lakers moves to third on the all-time point scorer list overtaking Michael Jordan.

data.eng: In the latest advance in Operation Indian Ocean, Somali government forces assisted by AMISOM troops capture seven towns in the central Hiran province from Al-Shabaab.

data.amh: በህንድ ውቅያኖስ እየተደረገ ባለው ወቅታዊ እንቅስቃሴ የሶማሊያ መንግስት ሃይሎች በአሚሶም እርዳታ በመካከለኛው ሂራን ግዛት ያሉ 7 ከተሞችን ከአልሸባብ ላይ ተቆጣጠሩ።

data.som: iyada oo laga soo waramayo Marxaladihii ugu dambeyay ee Hawlgalka Badweynta Hindiya, ayaa waxaa la sheegay in ciidamada dowladda Soomaaliya oo gacan ka helaya AMISOM ay Al-shabaab ka qabsadeen toddoba magaalo oo ku yaalla bartamaha gobolka Hiiraan.

data.eng: President of Gambia Yahya Jammeh remains in power after a failed coup attempt while he was travelling outside the country.
data.aaf: Gambiyah perisdent Yacya Jamahi Baaxok Iroh Gexewak Baxaqintan Tan Doolat koro Gibatuuk Lakal Miraciinul Raageh.

data.eng: Pope Francis announces the appointment of 20 new Cardinals, many of them coming from outside of Europe.

data.amh: ፖፕ ፍራንሲስ ለአዳዲስ 20 ካርዲናሎችን ሹመት ሰጡ፤ ከካርዲናሎቹ አብዛኛዎቹ ከአውሮፓ ውጪ የተመረጡ ናቸው።

data.som: Pope Francis ayaa ku dhawaaqay magacaabista 20 baadari oo horleh, kuwaas oo badankoodu ka yimaadeen meel ka baxsan Yurub.

data.eng: Ireland becomes the first European nation to be allowed to export beef to the United States since the mad cow disease scare 15 years ago.

data.eng: The Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report estimates the effectiveness of the influenza vaccination in 2014–2015 at 23% which is the lowest since 2006.

data.amh: የታማሚዎች እና የሟቾች ሳምንታዊ ዘገባ የኢንፍሉዌንዛ ክትባት በ 2014–2015 ውጤታማነት 23% እንደሆነ ይገመታል ይህም ከ 2006 ጀምሮ ዝቅተኛው ነው።
data.orm: Gabaasni Dhukkubsachuu fi Du'uu Torbanii bu'a qabeessummaan talaallii infiluweenzaa bara 2014-2015 keessa 23% irra akka jiruu fi erga bara 2006'tii isa gadaanaa tahuu tilmaame.
data.som: Warbixinta Toddobaadlaha ee Cudurrada iyo Dhimashada ayaa ku qiyaastay waxtarka tallaalka hargabka 2014–2015 inuu aha 23% taasoo ah ta ugu hoosaysa tan iyo 2006.

data.eng: Iran successfully puts the Fajr satellite in orbit using a Safir-B1 rocket.
data.aaf: Iran Safari B1 roketit antifiquk fajir satlayit Orbit Addal Dafese.
data.amh: ኢራን ሳፊር ቢ አንድ ሮኬትን በመጠቀም ፋጅር የተባለ ሳተላይቷን በምህዋር ላይ አሳረፈች።
data.orm: Iraan rooketii Saafir-B1 fayyadamuun satalaayitii Fajir milkaa'inaan orbitii keessa galchite.
data.som: Iiraan ayaa dayax-gacmeedka Fajr si guul leh u gaysay wareegga meeraha iyadoo adeegsanaysa gantaalka Safir-B1.
data.tir: ኢራን ንሳፊር ቢ1 ሮኬት ብምጥቃም ዘወንጨፈታ ፋጂር ሳተላይት ኣብ ምህዋር ብዓወት በፂሓ።

data.eng: Twelve people die of swine flu in the Indian state of Gujarat taking the death toll to 136 since January with 130 new cases reported.
data.aaf: Hindik Gujratih Rakaakayih Addal Casamah Gosonuh Taban Kee Namma num edde Rabteek Lakal 136 Rabtemih Loowo Illa 130 Madde.
data.amh: በህንድ ጉጃራት ከጥር ጀምሮ አስራ ሁለት ሰዎች በስዋይን ጉንፋን ምክኒያት በመሞታቸው የሟቾች ቁጥር 136 እንደደረሰ እናም 130 አዳዲስ ኬዞች ሪፖርት እንደተደረገ ተገለፀ።
data.orm: Indiyaa nannawaa Gujaraat keessatti dhibee Utaalloo Boyyeetiin namoonni kudha lama du'uun ji'a Amajjii irraa eegalee walii galatti bayyiinni namoota dhibee kanaan du'anii 136 yoo qaqqabuu namoonni haaraan 130 ammoo dhibechaan qabamuu isaanii gabaafameera.
data.som: Labo iyo toban qof ayaa u dhintay hargabka doofaarka gobolka Gujarat ee Hindiya taas oo tirada dhimashada ka dhigaysa 136 tan iyo bishii Janaayo iyada oo la soo sheegay 130 kiis oo cusub.
data.tir: ኣብ ህንዲ እትርከብ ግዝኣት ጉጃራት ዓሰርተ ክልተ ሰባት ብሰንኪ ናይ ሓሰማ ኢንፍሉወንዛ ከም ዝሞቱን ካብ ጥሪ ኣትሒዙ 130 ሓደስቲ መልከፍቲ ከም ዝተኸሰቱን/ዝተረኽቡን መጠን ሞት ናብ 136 ደይቡ ምህላዉ ተጸብጺቡ።

data.eng: The Prime Minister of Australia Tony Abbott issues a last-minute plea for Bali Nine drug smugglers Andrew Chan and Myuran Sukumaran facing the death penalty in Indonesia.
data.aaf: Awostaraliyak Naharsi Malaak Tony Abbott Indinusiya Rabi Digaala edde matartah Sagaleela cashishite Mekamekisa Andrew Chan and Myuran Sukumaran Ilacaboh Minitih Xaqintoh Xayoosen.
data.amh: የአውስትራሊያው ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ቶኒ አቦት በኢንዶኔዥያ የሞት ፍርድ ለተፈረደባቸውን አንድሪው ቻን እና ማዩራን ሱከማራንን የመጨረሻ የሆነውን ልመና ለባሊ አቀረቡ።
data.orm: Muummichi ministeeraa Awustiraaliyaa Toonii Aboot Indooneezhiyaa keessatti daldaltoota qoricha sammuu nama adoochuu Baali Naayin kan turan Andreew Chaan fi Muyuraan Shukumaraan irratti adabbii du'aa darbe akka hafuuf jaarsummaa daqiiiqaa dhumaa taasisan.
data.som: Ra’iisel wasaaraha Australia Tony Abbott ayaa codsi u wakhti dambe diray Bali Nine oo mukhalasiin daroogada Andrew Chan iyo Myuran Sukumaran oo ku wajahaya ciqaab dil ah Indonesia.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣውስተራሊያ ቶኒ ኣቦት ነቶም ኣብ ኢንዶኖዢያ መቕፃዕቲ ሞት ዝፅበዩም ዘሎ ኣንድሪው ቻንን ምዩራን ሱኩ ሚይራንን ዝርከብዎም ትሽዓተ ኣስገርቲ እፀፋሪስ ኣመልኪቶም ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰዓት ምሕፅንታ ኣቕሪቦም ።

data.eng: The 2015 Cricket World Cup begins with New Zealand playing Sri Lanka at Christchurch's Hagley Oval and Australia playing England at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
data.aaf: 2015 kiritik baad Kas qibimam newzwlaandi sirilanklih digirak kirsechreche hagile oval kee Awusteraliya melibrin kiriket Yasem Duudeh.
data.amh: የ 2015 ክሪኬት የዓለም ዋንጫ ኒውዚላንድ ከ ስሪላንካ በክራይስት ቸርች ሃግሌ ኦቫል እና አውስትራሊያ ከ እንግሊዝ በሜልበርን ክሪኬት ግራውንድ ላይ በሚየድርጉት ግጥሚያ ተጀምሯል።
data.orm: Geebni Kiriiketii Addunyaa bara 2015 Niw Ziilaand Sirii Laankaa wajjin Kiraayistcharch Hagley Oovaaliyitti akkasumas Awustiraaliyaan Ingilaand wajjin Meelboorn Kiriiket Giraawondiitti taphachuun eegalame.
data.som: Koobka Adduunka ee Cricket ka 2015 ayaa ka bilaaban doonaa New Zealand oo ay ku ciyaari doonaan Sri Lanka Hagley Oval ee Christchurch iyo Australia oo ku ciyaari doonta ingiriiska garoonka Melbourne Cricket Ground.
data.tir: ፅዋዕ ዓለም ክሪኬት 2015 ኒውዚላንድ ምስ ሲሪላንካ ኣብ ክራይስትቸርች ሃግሌ ኢቫል፣ ኣውስትራሊያ ምስ ኢንግላንድ ኣብ ሜልቦርን ሜዳ ክሪኬት ብዝገበረኦ ግጥም ተጀሚሩ።

data.eng: Cyclone Marcia is expected to strengthen to category 5 before making landfall in Central Queensland. ,
data.aaf: Ginimtam Dudah tan Taqabite Kolombiyak Nevado del Ruiz Boynah Xaqul Leh Tan Magaaloli Cabteh.
data.amh: አውሎ ነፋስ ማርሲያ በማዕከላዊ ኩዊንስላንድ መሬትላይ ከመድረሱ በፊት ኃይል ጨምሮ ወደ ምድብ 5 እንደሚያድግ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Bubbeen bishaan irraa Marshiyaa Giddugala Kuwiinsilaandii keessatti utuu lafa hin tuqin gara sadarkaa 5'tti akka olguddatu nii eegama.
data.som: Duufaanta Marcia ayaa la filayaa inay ku sii xoogeysato heerka 5 aad ka hor inta uusan ku dhicin Bartamaha Queensland.
data.tir: ሳይክሎን ማርሺያ ኣብ ማእኸላይ ኩዊንስላንድ ቅድሚ ምዕላቡ ናብ ደረጃ 5 ከምዝዓቢ ተገሚቱ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Israel is hit by the heaviest snow storm in a century causing the closure of schools and highways in high places throughout the country.
data.aaf: Falastiinik Ayro mawqal geytimta Dabo mari Galimarok Radata ke Taamomah ejensi Gaazah addal nabba weeqakugutak sisik wakti Kukta faticisen.
data.amh: እስራኤል በምዕተ ዓመቱ የከባድ የበረዶ አውሎ ነፋስ በመመታቷ በመላው አገሪቱ በከፍተኛ ቦታዎች ላይ ትምህርት ቤቶችን እና አውራ ጎዳናዎችን እንዲዘጉ ተደርጓል።

data.som: Israa’iil waxaa ku dhufatay duufaantii ugu cuslayd muddo qarni ah, taasoo sababtay in la xiro iskuulada iyo waddooyinka waaweyn ee meelaha jooga sare ee dalka oo dhan.
data.tir: ኣብ ሓደ ምእተ ዓመት እቲ ዝኸፍአ ብዝተብሃለ ህቦብላ በረድ ዝተጠቕዐት እስራኤል፣ ኣብ መላእ እታ ሃገር ኣብ በረኽቲ ቦታታት ዝርከቡ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ዓፅያ።

data.eng: Research published in the journal Nature claims that a large portion of the lithium in the universe was produced by novae.
data.aaf: Saynis Nabbah Yan Baddih Addat Mango Manoh Sitalakleh Warakit Yatbiqen, Tahhak AddakMangom Dumahiwak baxsimteh Sugewayte Tabna Alafatal Loowinta Tiyya Edde anuk.
data.amh: በተፈጥሮ ጉዳይ በሚሰራ ጋዜጣ ላይ የወጣ ጥናት እንደሚያመለክተው ከፍተኛ የሆነው የሊትየም ማእድን የሚመረተው በኖቫ ነው።
data.orm: Qorannoon maxxansa Nechar jedhamu irratti maxxanfame qabiyyeen litiyeemii hawaa keessatti argamuu harki caaluu noovaadhaan akka oomishame ibsa.
data.som: Cilmi baaris lagu soo daabacay joornaalka Nature ayaa sheeganaya in qayb weyn oo ka mid ah lithium ka aduunka ay soo saartay novae.
data.tir: ኣብ ጋዜጣ ነይቸር ዝተዘርገሑ መጽናዕትታት ኣብ ኣድማስ ዝርከብ ዓቢ ክፋል ሊትቲዮም ብመንገዲ ኮኸብ ኖቫ ከም ዝተፈጥረ ተገሊጹ።

data.eng: John Key, the Prime Minister of New Zealand, announces plans to deploy up to 143 New Zealand Defence Force personnel to Iraq on a training mission to last no more than two years.
data.aaf: Taamoma Karmal Geytimata Baxuw Bayeey Bayise Boombi Ayro Mawqa Nageerak baxamaturu Dariifal Koona Num qideenih kalah Fereey Muduumeh.
data.amh: የኒው ዚላንድ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስተር ጆን ኪይ በኢራቅ 143 የኒው ዚላንድ መከላከያ ወታደሮችን ለልምምድ ከሁለት አመት ለማይበልጥ ጊዜ ለማሰማራት እቅድ እንዳላቸው አሳወቁ።
data.orm: Muummichi ministeeraa Neewuzilaand Joon Kiin ergama leenjii waraanaatiif turtii waggoota lama hin caalleef loltuu humna ittisa Niiwuzilaand 143 ta'an gara Iraaqitti erguuf karoora qabaachuu beeksisan.
data.som: Ra'iisul Wasaaraha New Zealand John Key, ayaa ku dhawaaqay qorshe uu Ciraaq ugu dirayo illaa 143 askari oo ka tirsan Ciidamada Difaaca New Zealand, si ay u qaataan hawlo tababar ah oo socon doona wax ka badan laba sano.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኒውዚላንድ ጆን ኪይ ክሳብ 143 ዝበፅሑ ኣባላት ሓይልታት ምክልኻል እታ ሃገር ካብ ክልተ ዓመት ንዘይነውሕ ግዜ ንተልእኾ ስልጠና ናብ ዒራቕ ንምልኣኽ ዘለዎም ትልሚ ኣፍሊጦም።

data.eng: In rugby league, the Australian-based National Rugby League takes over control of the Gold Coast Titans following five current players being charged with supplying cocaine.
data.aaf: Ragibi ligih Adda Awustaraliyah Addal Xisimte Agat Liig Kokeyinil Xayoosak Koonoy takke Digiritek ugutak Golx kost baxaqisa lowsiisanamal lowsiisanah.
data.amh: በራግቢ ሊግ አውስትራሊያ ላይ የተመሠረተ ብሔራዊ ራግቢ ሊግ የጎልድ ኮስት ታይታኖች አምስት የወቅቱ ተጫዋቾች ኮኬይን በማቅረብ መከሰሳቸውን ተከትሎ ብድኑን ተቆጣጥሮታል።
data.orm: Liigii rabgii keessatti, Liigiin Rabgii Biyyaalessaa Awustiraaliyaa taphattoonni Goold Koost Taayitaan ammaa shan kokeenii dhiyeessuu hordofee to'annoo irraa fudhate.
data.som: Horyaalka rugby ga qaranka Rugby ee fadhigiisu yahay Australia ayaa la wareegaya maamulka Gold Coast Titans ka dib markii shan ciyaartoy oo hadda lagu soo oogay inay qaybiyaan kookayn.
data.tir: ኣብ ሊግ ራግቢ፣ ሓሙሽተ ተፃወቲ ጋንታ ጐልድ ኮስት ቲታንስ እፀ ፋሪስ ብምቕራብ ዝተኸሰሱ ምኳኖም ስዒቡ እቲ ጋንታ ኣብ ትሕቲ ቁፅፅር ብሄራዊ ሊግ ራግቢ ኣውስትራሊያ ኣትዩ።

data.eng: The Argentine National Congress approves installation of a Chinese satellite tracking station in Patagonia.

data.eng: Energy-rich Kazakhstan suspends Russian fuel and gas imports to protect its domestic market from a surplus due to a weakened ruble which has sent ripples of economic uncertainty through Central Asia.
data.aaf: Caylal Dadalte Kazakistanak Fanti Asiiyale Kabul Maduur AminewayiyiMawak taqabih Sababah Baaxoh Addah Qadaaga Ribci Dacriseenuh Ruusiyah Sukati kee gaaz Culuusanam Waaseh.
data.amh: በሀይል ማእድን ሀብታም የሆነችው ካዛኪስታን በሩብል ምንዛሪ መውረድ ምክንያት በመካከለኛው ኤዢያ ላይ በተፈጠረው የኢኮኖሚ አለመረጋጋት በሀገ[ ውስጥ ብክነትን ለመከላከል ከራሺያ የምታስገባውን ነዳጅ እና ጋዝ አቆመች።

data.som: Kazakhstan oo kamid ah dalalka hodanka ku ah tamarta dabiiciga ha ayaa hakisay soo dejinta shidaalka iyo gaaska ka imanaya Ruushka si ay suuqgeeda gudaha uga ilaaliso wax dheeraad ah sababtuna waa maadaam aya lacagta ruushku daciif ay noqotay oo u soo diray hubin la’aan dhaqaale iyada oo loo sii marayo Bartamaha Aasiya.
data.tir: ብፅዓት ኣዚያ ሃፍታም ዝዀነት ካዛኺስታን ብምኽንያት እቲ ኣብ መላእ ማእኸላይ ኤስያ ጠንቂ ቁጠባዊ ቅልውላው ዝኾነ ምድኻም ሩብል ዕዳጋ ውሽጢ ሃገራ ካብ ተረፍ ቀረብ ንምክልኻል ካብ ሩስያ እተእትዎ ነዳድን ጋዝን ንግዚኡ ደው ኣቢላ።

data.eng: U.S. President Barack Obama signs an executive order declaring Venezuela a national security threat to the U.S.
data.aaf: Ameerikah Berezixanti Barak Obama kee Rusiyah Berezixanti Filaxmir butin Suuriyak Isini kee Isini Qeebi Wagittamal Salaam Sitingeyil Sita Magenon.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ባራክ ኦባማ ቬንዚዌላ ለአሜሪካ ደህንነት ከሚያሰጉ አገራት ዝርዝር ውስጥ እንድትካተት የሚያደርጋትን ትእዛዝ በፊርማ አፀደቁ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Baaraak Obaamaan ajaja olaanaa Venezu'eellaa akka yaaddoo nageenyaa biyyaalessaa U.S.tti labsu mallatteesse.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Barack Obama ayaa saxiixay amar fulineed oo sheegaya in Venezuela ay tahay qatar amniga qaranka Mareykanka
data.tir: ኣመሪካዊ ፕረዚደንት ባራክ ኦባማ ቬነዝዌላ ንሃገራዊ ጽጥታ ኣመሪካ ስግኣት ምዃና ዝእውጅ ተግባራዊ ትእዛዝ ፈሪሙ።

data.amh: የአሜሪካው የምግብ እና የመድሃኒት ቁጥጥር ድርጅት በጄኔቲካዊ መንገድ ለተሻሻሉ የድንች እና የአፕል ምርቶችን ፍቃድ ሰጠ።
data.orm: Bulchiinsi nyaataa fi qorichaa US argannoo mosee fi aappilii sanyiin fooyya'ee mirkaneesse jira.
data.som: Maamulka Cuntada iyo Dawooyinka ee Maraykanka ayaa oggolaaday baradhada iyo tufaaxa hidde badalida lagu sameeyey.
data.tir: ምምሕዳር መግብን መድሃኔታትን ኣመሪካ ብስነ-ውርሻ ዝተዳቖለ ድንሽን ሜለን ንምፍራይ ኣፍቂዱ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Opportunity rover completes a Martian marathon, the first time any vehicle has traveled more than 26.2 miles on the surface of another world.
data.aaf: Samitte rovr marritayin marathon Selele፣ faxe tangagaye aki baadal bagul 26.2 mayil gexam qimbo kini.
data.amh: ኦፖርቹኒቲ ሮቨር ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ማንኛውን ተሸከርካሪ ከምድር ውጪ ያደረገውን እና 26.2 ማይል በላይ የሚሸፍነውን የማረቲያን ማራቶን ጨረሰ።
data.orm: Konkolaataan Opporchunitii maraatoonii Marshaal, konkolaataan yeroo jalqabaaf fuula addunyaa biraa irra maayila 26.2 caalaa imale xumure.
data.som: Fursada gaadiidka Rover wuxuu dhammaystay marathonkii Martian, waana markii ugu horraysay ee uu gaadiid ku safro in ka badan 26.2 mayl, oogada sare ee duni kale.
data.tir: ሮቨር ኦፖርቹኒቲ ልዕሊ 26.2 ማይል ኣብ ባይታ ካሊእ ዓለም ዝተጉዓዘት ፈላመይቲ ተሽከርካሪት ብምኳን ንናይ ማርስ ማራቶን ዛዚማ።

data.eng: An American sailor who was lost for 66 days in the Atlantic Ocean is found by a German tanker.
data.aaf: Giledivi ፣ Montana ta magaalah miraac losten weeqaytih Addal data 17 zeyti caxitemik ugutak lee xabax maqub amni Dacayrimeh yan tamixigeh.
data.amh: በአትላንቲክ ውቅያኖስ ውስጥ ለ 66 ቀናት ጠፍቶ የነበረ አንድ አሜሪካዊ መርከበኛ በጀርመን አጓጓዥ ተገኝቷል።
data.orm: Habuurtuun bishaanirraa lammiin Ameerikaa guyyaa 66f garba Atilaantik kessatti badee ture doonii boba'aa Jarmaniitiin argame.
data.som: markab shidaal oo Jarmalka laga leeyahy ayaa soo helay Badmaaxe Maraykana oo muddo 66 maalmood ku lunsanaa Badweynta Atlantikada.
data.tir: ኣብ ውቅያኖስ ኣትላንቲክ ን66 መዓልታት ጠፊኡ ዝነበረ ኣሜሪካዊ ባሕረኛ ብሓንቲ መርከብ ፅዕነት ነዳዲ ተረኺቡ።

data.eng: Burkina Faso culls 115,000 chickens over a bird flu scare.
data.aaf: Burkina Faso Goson Sababah 115,000 Dorahiiha Yircideenih.

data.orm: Burikinaafaasoon sababa sodaa dhibee utalloo sinbiraatiin handaqqolee biyyattii 115000 qaluufi.
data.som: Burkina Faso waxay gawracday 115,000 oo digaagadod cabsi ay ka qabto hargab shimbiraha awgeed.
data.tir: ቡርኪና ፋሶ ብሰንኪ ናይ ኣዕዋፍ ኢንፍሉወንዛ ዘስዓበ ፍርሂ 115,000 ደርሁ ቀቲላ።

data.eng: Kentucky U.S. Senator Rand Paul announces that he will seek the Republican nomination for the U.S. presidency in 2016.
data.aaf: Kentucky Ameerikah Saneter Rand Paul I.L.L.2016 US berezexentinih Riboblikan Nakartam Faxxam Qadose.
data.amh: የኪንታኪው የአሜሪካው ሴናተር ራንድ ፓወል በ2016 በሚደረገው ፕሬዚደንታዊ ምርጫ የሪፐብሊካን እጩ ለመሆን እንደሚፈልግ አሳወቀ።

data.som: Senator ka Kentucky ee Mareykanka Rand Paul ayaa sheegay inuu dalban doono musharax nimada xisbiga Jamhuuriga ee doorashada madaxweynenimada Mareykanka ee 2016 ka.
data.tir: ኣባል ሰነት ኣውራጃ ኪንታኪ ዝኾነ ራንድ ፑል ኣብ 2016 ዓምፈ ንፕሬዚዳንትነት ኣሜሪካ ንምውድዳር ዘኽእሎ ድምጺ ሪፓብሊካን ንምርካብ ከምዝጽዕር ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Benjamin Netanyahu demands that any final agreement on the Iranian nuclear program include a "clear and unambiguous Iranian recognition of Israel's right to exist."
data.aaf: BiyaminTenyaaho Iranak Nukeler Abtootal Faxeemik Ilacabo Sitingey “Israilik Mano Gaaih Qidiinu kee Baye siniiran Mamaxaga Edde kah haytanah Essera.
data.amh: ቤንጃሚን ኔታንያሁ በኢራን የኑክሌር መርሃ ግብር ላይ ማንኛውም የመጨረሻ ስምምነት “የእስራኤልን የመኖር መብት ግልፅ እና የማያሻማ የኢራን እውቅና” እንዲያካትት ይጠይቃል።
data.orm: Benjaamin Naatinaawuun waliigalteen dhumaa sagantaa Niwukilarii Iraan mirga jiraachuu "Isiraa'el Iraan ifaa fi bifa waliin nama hin dhoofneen fudhachuushee" akka dabalatu gaafate.
data.som: Benjamin Netanyahu ayaa dalbanaya in heshiis kasta oo kama -dambeys ah oo ku saabsan barnaamijka nukliyeerka Iiraan ay qasab tahy inay ku jirto "xaqa ay Israa'iil u leedahay jiritaanka."
data.tir: መደብ ኒዩክሌር ኢራን ብዝምልከት ዝብፃሕ ዝኾነ ይኹን ናይ መወዳእታ ስምምዕ፣ እስራኤል ንዘለዋ ናይ ምንባር መሰል ብግልፅን ብዘየማትእ መንገድን ኣፍልጦ ምሃብ ከጠቓልል ቤንያሚን ኔታንያሁ ሓቲቶም።

data.eng: A mystery disease that kills patients within 24 hours has killed at least 18 people within the past week in the Nigerian town of Ode-Irele in Ondo State.
data.aaf: 24 Saqatih Addat Lakmisa qidah tan Cuumi Lakimi Onxo dariifah Addal Nageeriyal Ox-Ereleh Magaalah Addal Waraye Ayaamih Addat Wali 18 Num Qideenih.
data.amh: በ 24 ሰዓታት ውስጥ በሽተኞችን የሚገድል ምስጢራዊ በሽታ በናይጄሪያ ኦንዶ ግዛት ኦዴ-ኢሬሌ ከተማ ውስጥ ባለፈው ሳምንት ቢያንስ 18 ሰዎችን ገድሏል።
data.orm: Dhibeen miizerii kan sa'atiiwwan 24 gidduutti dhukkubsatoota ajjeesu magaala Naayijeeriyaa Ode-Ireekee isa Isteetii Ondoo keessatti torban darbe keessatti yoo xiqqaate nama 18 ajjeese.
data.som: Cudur qarsoodi ah oo bukaannada ku dilaya 24 saac gudahood ayaa ugu yaraan 18 qof ku dilay toddobaadkii la soo dhaafay magaalada Ode-Irele ee gobolka Ondo.
data.tir: ኣብ ናይጄሪያ ኣብ ክልል ኦንዶ ኣብ ከተማ ኦዴ ኢሬሌ ኣበሩ ዘይፍለጥን ንሕሙማን ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ዝቐትልን ሕማም ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ጥራሕ 18 ሰባት ቀቲሉ።

data.eng: Blue Bell Creameries recalls all of its products in the United States due to a Listeria monocytogenes outbreak.
data.aaf: Qarancele Bell Kiremiwa Us Addal Listeria monocytogenes Dalka Sababah Inkih Tan Murtiteeta Aysexexegelon.
data.amh: ብሉ ቤል ክሬሞች በተስፋፋው የሊስቴሪያ ሞኖሳይቶግነስ በሽታ በአሜሪካ የተከፋፈሉ ምርቶቹን እንዲመለሱ ጥሪ አቀረበ።
data.orm: Kireemoonni Bluu beel' sababa weerara dhibee Liistiriyaa Monostoojensiin walqabatee Yuunaytid Isteetis keessatti oomishaaleen isaa hundi akka bakka isaaniitti deebi'aniif ajeja dabarse.
data.som: shirkada kareemka ee Blue Bell Creameries ayaa dib ugaso guratay dhammaan alaabtii ka taalay Mareykanka sababo la xiriira dillaaca Listeria monocytogenes.
data.tir: ብሉ ቤል ክሪመሪስ ብሰንኪ እቲ ዘጋጠመ ለበዳ ሊስተርያ ሞኖሳይቶጀነዝ ንኩሉ እቲ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ኣመሪካ ዝርከብ ፍርያት መሊሱ።

data.eng: Pope Francis accepts the resignation of Robert Finn as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Kansas City–Saint Joseph for failing to report a suspected child abuser.
data.aaf: Pop faransis Roberto finelanedune Kanses Sitiy Susef Romah baxoh babasa Abbak Yibixe.
data.amh: ጳጳስ ፍራንሲስ ልጆች ላይ ጥቃት በማድረስ የተጠረጠረን ሰው ሪፖርት ያላቀረቡትን የሮማ ካቶሊክ የካንሳስ ከተማ ቅዱስ የሴፍ ሃገረ ስብከት የሮበርት ፊንን ስንብት ተቀበሉ።
data.orm: Poop Firaansis kanneen ijoollee irratti miidhaa geggeessan gabaasuu dhabuu isaatiif hojii gadhiisuu Roobert Fiin kan phaaphaasii Kaatolikii Roomaa Kutaa Magaalaa Kansas-Qulqulluu Yoosef fudhatan.
data.som: Pope Francis wuxuu aqbalay istiqaalada Robert Finn oo ah hoggaamiyaha kiniisadda Roman katholik Diocese ee Magaalada Kansas Saint Joseph sababtoo ah ku guul daraystay inuu soo sheego qof looga shakisan yahay inuu ku xad-gudbay cunug.
data.tir: ናይ ሮማ ካቶሊክ ቤተ ክርስቲያን ጳጳስ ኣጥቢያ ቅዱስ ዮሴፍ ካንሳስ ሲቲ ዝኾኑ ሮበርት ፊን ብምግሳስ ቆልዓ ናይ ዝተጠርጠረ ሰብ ጉዳይ ፀብፃብ ብዘይምቕራቦም ካብ ሓላፍነቶም ብገዛ ፍቃዶም ክወርዱ ዘቕረብዎ ሕቶ ብኣቡነ ፍራንሲስ ተቐባልነት ረኺቡ ።

data.eng: Kenyan Eliud Kipchoge topped all male runners and Ethiopian Tigist Tufa won the women's elite event in the 35th running of the London Marathon.
data.aaf: Awustraliya kee jaban fanat 2011 Asiyah Kasih Ilacabo madanamak Afal Kuataral geytima kalifa estaxiyemil boliis baada caddoh teket leela maftac heenim warsan.
data.amh: በ35ኛው የለንደን ማራቶን የኬኒያው ኤሊዮድ ኪፕቺጌ ሁሉንም የወንድ [ጮች ቀደ፤ ኢትዮጲያዊቷ ትግስት ቱፋም የሴቶቹን እንደሁ።
data.orm: Lammiin Keeniyaa Eliid Keepchoogeen fiigdota dhiiraa mara yoo injifatu lammii Itiyoophiyaa kan taate Tigist Tufaa ammoo dorgommii fiigichaa Landan 32ffaa irratti badhaasa dubartii urjii ta'ii kanaa jedhamu mo'atte.

data.eng: State-owned gas company, Gazprom, loses 86 percent in net income due to ruble devaluation, plunge on oil prices, and Ukraine crisis.

data.som: Shirkadda gaaska ee dawlada, Gazprom, ayay soo gaadhay khasare boqolkiiba 86 Xaga dakhliga saafiga ah taas oo ay sababtay qiima dhaca ruble, hoos u dhaca qiimaha saliidda, iyo dhibaatooyinka kajira Ukraine.
data.tir: መንግስታዊት ኩባንያ ነዳዲ፣ ጋዝፕሮም፣ ብሰንኪ ምንካይ ክብሪ ባጤራ ሩብል፣ ዋጋታት ነዳዲ ከምኡ'ውን ብሰንኪ ቅልውላው ዩክረይን 86 ሚእታዊት ካብ ጽሩይ ኣታዊታት ከሲራ።

data.eng: The number of deaths from MERS in South Korea rises to six with 23 new cases reported.
data.aaf: MERS Rabah Yan mari Gabi Kuuriyal Osak leceeyit 23 Yakke geytimem Qadoosen.
data.amh: በደቡብ ኮሪያ በ መርስ (MERS) የሞቱ ሰዎች ቁጥር ወደ ስድስት ከፍ ብሏል፣ 23 አዳዲስ ታማሚዎችም ሪፖርት ተደርገዋል።
data.orm: Baayinni namoota MERS'n Kooriyaa Kibbaa keessatti du'ee gara 6'tti yeroo ol guddatu, namoonni dhukkubichaa qaban 23 gahuun gabaasame.
data.som: Tirada dhimashada MERS ee Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa gaartay lix, iyadoo 23 xaaladood oo cusub la soo sheegay.
data.tir: ኣብ ደቡብ ኮሪያ ብሰንኪ ናይ ማእኸላይ ምብራቕ መተንፈሲ ኣካል ዘጥቅዕ ቫይረስ (ኤም:ኢ:ኣር:ኤስ) ቁፅሪ ዘጋጠመ ሞት ናብ ሽዱሽተ ከምዝደየበን 23 ሓደሽቲ ዝተትሓዙ ከምዘለዉን ተፀብፂቡ።

data.eng: Spain gives the late writer Miguel de Cervantes, author of Don Quixote, a formal burial at a Madrid convent nearly 400 years after his death in 1616.
data.aaf: Isbenil 1616 Rabe 400 ligidak lakal Madridil Kanisal Magaq siirat Rabe numuh Kutbe Migul De Cervantes, Katab Xon Kuixote, madab Kabri buxa Limowteh::
data.amh: ስፔን የሟቹን ጸሐፊ ሚጌል ደ ሰርቫንቴስ ፣ የዶን ኪዮቴ ጸሐፊን በ 1616 ከሞተ ከ 400 ዓመታት ገደማ በኋላ በማድሪድ ገዳም ውስጥ የቀብር ሥነ ሥርዓቱን ፈፅማለች።
data.orm: Ispeen barreessaa buleessa Miiguel Deservantes,barreessaa kitaaba 'Doon Kiihotii' kanta'e bara 1616 du'e turtii waggaa 400 booda sirna awwaalchaa seera qabeessa kaawulaa Maadriditti goootefi jirti..
data.som: Isbaanishka ayaa wuxu sameeyey aas qaraneed qoraaga dhintay Miguel de Cervantes, oo ah qoraa Don Quixote, aas rasmi ah oo lagu aasay qasriga Madrid ku dhawaad 400 sano kadib dhimashadiisii 1616.
data.tir: ስፔይን ደራሲ ዶን ኪዮቴ ንዝኾነን ብ1616 ዓ.ም.ፈ ንዝሞተን ፀሓፊ ሚግዌል ዴ ሰርቫንቴስ ድሕሪ 400 ዓመት ሕልፈቱ ኣብ ማድሪድ ኣብ ዝርከብ ገዳም ዕላዊ ስነስርዓት ቀብሪ ገይራትሉ።

data.eng: The European Space Agency's Philae spacecraft wakes up after six months in hibernation as comet 67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko gets closer to the sun.
data.aaf: Awroppak qaran missoh ejensi,Philae lica alsaak lakal ugutak 67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko ayro fanah xayyoowen.
data.amh: የአውሮፓ የጠፈር ምርምር ኤጀንሲ ንብረት የሆነው የፊሌ መንኩራኩር ለስድሰት ወር ካዘገመ በ|ላ ኮሜት 67ፒ/ ቹረዩሞቭ ጌራሲሜንኮ ወደ ፀሃይ እየተጠጋ በመምጣቱ ተነሳ።
data.orm: Xiyaarri Faayilaayii Ejensii hawaa Awurooppaa muguu ji'a jahaa booda osoo koomeetiin 67P/kiyuriyumov-Geerasimeenkoo jedhamuu aduutti siqacha jiruu dammaqtee jirti.
data.som: Wakaaladda dayax gacmeedka Philae ee Hawada Sare ee Yurub ayaa soo toostay lix bilood oo hurdo la'aan ah markii majaajillada 67P/Churyumov Gerasimenko ay qorraxda u soo dhowaato.
data.tir: ናይ ትካል ጠፈር ኤውሮጳ ፊላ ዝተሰመየት መንኰርኰር ኮሜት 67P / Churyumov-Gerasimenko ናብ ጸሓይ ኣብ ዝቐርበሉ ዘሎ እዋን ድሕሪ ሽድሽተ ኣዋርሕ ንዋም ተበራቢራ ኣላ።

data.eng: Nepal announces plans to reopen heritage sites in the Kathmandu Valley two months after the April 2015 Nepal earthquake.
data.aaf: Maqidi xayoosul Asmat alewak alfaatal loowinta marite kamanxunuk Yambooqorenim kini.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ በ ሚያዝያ ወር 2015 ዓ.ም የኔፓል የመሬት መንቀጥቀጥ ከተከሰተ ከሁለት ወራት በኋላ በካታማንዱ ሸለቆ ውስጥ ያሉ የቅርስ ቦታዎችን እንደገና ለመክፈት ኔፓል እቅዶችን ይፋ አደረገች።
data.orm: Neepal balaa kikira lafaa bara 2015 ji'a Eebilaa keessaa mudatee ji'a lama booda nannolee hambaalee seenaa Katimunduu kessatti argaman irra deebiin banuuf karoorsite.
data.som: Nepal ayaa ku dhawaaqday qorshayaal dib loogu furayo goobihii dhaxal galka ahaa ee dooxada Kathmandu kadib markay kaso wareegtay 2 bilood dhulgariirkii ku dhacay Nepal bishii Abriil 2015.
data.tir: ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ ኔፓል ኣብ ማዝያ 2015 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ዘጋጠመ ሓደጋ ምንቅጥቃጥ መሬት ኣብ ጉህሚ ካትማንዱ ንዝርከቡ ቅርስታታ ንዑደተኛታት ክፉት ከምትገብር ኣፍሊጣ።

data.eng: Ninety-four people die, and 45 others are hospitalized, after drinking moonshine in Mumbai (Bombay), India.
data.aaf: NebalMiraacini ellle Iyenal Karma Rob Ta Baaxoh Addal Namma Tamixige Weeqaytite kee Weeqi Beyamih Taqabi Osimak Geytima.
data.amh: ሕንድ ሙምባይ (ቦምቤይ) ውስጥ ሙንሻይን የተባለ መጠጥ ከጠጡ በኋላ ዘጠና አራት ሰዎች ሞተው 45 ሰዎች ደግሞ ሆስፒታል ተኝተዋል።
data.orm: Mumbaayi (Bombay), Hindii keessatti erga muunshine dhuganii booda namoonni sagaltamii afur du'anii, 45 kan biroon ammoo hospitaala seenan.
data.som: Sagaashan iyo afar qof ayaa ku dhimatay, 45 kalena dhakhtar la dhigay, Mumbai (Bombay), India kadib markii ay cabbeen moonshine.
data.tir: ኣብ ህንዲ ኣብ ከተማ ሙምባይ ኣልኮላዊ ሙንሻይን ዝሰትዩ 94 ሰባት እንትሞቱ ካልኦት 45 ሰባት ኣብ ሆስፒታል ይሕከሙ ኣለዉ።

data.eng: Prime Minister of Greece Alexis Tsipras makes a new offer for reforms which could signal a late deal in the country's debt talks.
data.aaf: Giriik Naharsi Malaak Alexis Tsipras Ta Baaxok Abuud Yabiteetah Addal Ragte Sitingeyite Tascasem Xiqta Qusba Aysisiya Xayose.
data.amh: የግሪኩ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር አሌክሲስ ሲፕራስ የሃገሪቱ የብድር መጠን ሁኔታ ላይ ሚደረጉ ምክክሮች ያለፈበት ቢመስልም አዲስ የለውጥሃሳብ ይዘው መጡ።
data.orm: Mummichi ministeeraa Giriik Aleeksiis Siparaas sirreeffama haaraa dubbii Liqii biyyattii keessatti walii galtee boodatti harkifate ta'uunsaa mul'atu dhiyeessan.
data.som: Ra’iisel wasaaraha Giriigga Alexis Tsipras ayaa soo jeediyay dalab cusub oo dib u hagaajin ah taas oo astaan u noqon karta heshiis soo daahay wadahadaladii deynta ee dalka
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ግሪኽ ኣሌክሲስ ትሲብራስ ኣብቲ ሃገር ዝግበር ናይ ዕዳ ዝርርባት ዝእንፍት ድንጉይ ስምምዕ ሓድሽ ናይ ምትዕርራያት እማመ ኣቕሪቡ።

data.eng: India offers Nepal an additional billion dollars to help it recover from the April 2015 Nepal earthquake.
data.aaf: Hindinebaala Qado-dirik 2015 Baaxoh Angoyak urtuh Qagitak Bilyoniyatallowinta Dolaarite Tece.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ. በሚያዝያ ወር 2015 ዓ.ም በኔፓል የመሬት መንቀጥቀጥ መከሰቱን አስመልክቶ ሀገሪቷ ከጉዳቱ እንድታገግም ለማገዝ ህንድ ተጨማሪ ቢሊዮን ዶላር ሰጠች።
data.orm: Hindiin Neeppaal sochii lafaa bara 2015 ishee mudate irraa akka fooyyoftuuf akka ishee gargaruuf kennaa dabalataa doolara biliyoona tokkoo dhiyeessiteef
data.som: Hindiya waxay Nepal u fidinaysaa hal bilyan oo doolar oo dheeri ah si ay uga caawiso kaso kabashada dhulgariirkii ku dhacay bishii Abriil 2015.
data.tir: ህንዲ ኣብዝሓለፈ ማዝያ 2015 ብምንቅጥቃጥ መሬት ንዝተጠቕዐት ኔፓል ተወሳኺ ሓደ ቢልዮን ዶላር ሓገዝ ሂባታ።

data.eng: The European Union has reached agreement to share at least 40,000 migrants over two years. ,
data.aaf: Awrobah Inkiino Namma Sanatih Addat Walli 40,000 Dabo Xiina Catuh Sitingey Maaden.
data.amh: የአውሮፓ ህብረት በሁለት አመት ውስጥ በትንሹ 40000 ስደተኞችን ተቀብሎ ለመካፈል ስምምነት ላይ ደረሰ።
data.orm: Gamtaan Awurooppaa waggoota lama keessatti yoo xiqqaate godaantota 40,000 waliif qooduuf walii galte irra gahe.
data.som: Midowga Yurub ayaa gaaray heshiis ah in la wadaago ugu yaraan 40,000 oo tahriibayee yaal ah in muddo laba sano ah.
data.tir: ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረት ኣብ ውሽጢ ክልተ ዓመት ካብ 40 ሽሕ ዘይውሕዱ ስደተኛታት ክቕበል ናብ ስምምዕ በጺሑ።

data.eng: The Hellenic Parliament passes a package of economic reforms to end the current stage of the debt crisis.
data.aaf: Helenik barlama tawakih Abuud taqabih caddo soltuh Maduur Aysasite Carkooki Faxasimta.
data.amh: የሄሌኒክ ፓርላማ አሁን ያለውን የዕዳ ቀውስ ለማቆም የሚረዱ የኢኮኖሚ ማሻሻያ ፓኬጆች ላይ ፈቃድ ሰጠ።
data.orm: Paarlaamaan Heelenik sadarkaa rakkoo liqaa ammaa akka goolabamuuf sagantaa fooyya'iinsa diinagdee beeksise.
data.som: Baarlamaanka Hellenic ayaa soo gudbiyay guntimo dib u habeyn dhaqaale ah si loo soo afjaro heerka dhibatada deynta ee hada taagan.
data.tir: ባይቶ ግሪኽ ነቲ ሕጂ ዘሎ ናይ ዕዳ ቅልውላው ደው ንምባል ጥቕላል/እማመ ቍጠባዊ ምትዕርራያት ይሕሊፉ።

data.eng: Nominations for the 67th Primetime Emmy Awards are announced with Game of Thrones receiving 24 nominations.
data.aaf: 67Hytoh Qiboh Addah Emi Acwa Anakarak 24 Anakara Abixuk Digirbaeenitlih Baxaqisen::
data.amh: የ67 ኛው ኤሚ ሽልማቶች እጩዎች የፋ ሆኑ፤ “ጌም ኦፍ ስሮንስ” 24 እጩዎችን አግኝቷል።
data.orm: Kaadhimamtootni badhaasa Eemii jalqabaa 67ffaa Geem of Siroons kadhimama 24 argachuu isaa waliin ibsame.
data.som: Magacaabida Abaalmarinta Emmy ee 67aad Primetime ayaa lagu dhawaaqay iyadoo Game of Thrones ay heshay 24 magacaabis.
data.tir: “ጌም ኦቭ ትሮንስ” ንቲ ንመበል 67 ግዜ ዝካየድ ስነስርዓት ላዕለዋይ ሽልማት ኤሚ ብዕስራን ኣርባዕተን ነጥቢ ተሓፅዩ።

data.eng: The People's Republic of China releases 10 South African tourists held for allegedly distributing terrorist material.
data.aaf: chaynah ummattah 10 takke gabbi qaxih afrikak wacaysir maritte qarkakisah uwwaytiy waaseeni fikiikissem qaddosse.
data.amh: የቻይና ሕዝባዊ ሪፐብሊክ የሽብር ዕቃ አሰራጭተዋል ተብለው የተያዙ አስር የደቡብ አፍሪካ ጎብኝዎችን ከእስር ለቀቀች።
data.orm: Rippaabiliki Ummataa Chaayinaa Tuuristoota Afirikaa Kibbaa 10 kan meeshaalee shororkeessummaa raabsitu jechuun himatte gadi lakkisfte.
data.som: Dawlada Shiinaha ayaa siidaysay 10 dalxiisayaal ah oo Koonfur Afrikaa u dhashay, kuwaas oo loo haystay in ay qaybiyeen agab la xiriira argagixisada.
data.tir: ህዝባዊት ሪፐብሊክ ቻይና ናውቲ ግብረ ሽበራ ኣብ ምዝርጋሕ ተዋፊሮም ኢላ ንዝኣሰረቶም 10 ደቡብ ኣፍሪካውያን ዑደተኛታት ፈቲሓ።

data.eng: In golf, the final round of The Open Championship is played at the Old Course at St Andrews in Scotland with Zach Johnson winning a four hole playoff with Marc Leishman and Louis Oosthuizen. ,
data.aaf: Golfih Addal Ilacaboh Rounxil Oben Shambiyoona Qalayli iskotlanxih addal Tenebe inxirus biluy korsih Addal zaki Jonsen mariki leshiman kee luwois owuzuzenlih afara Boohak Ayaysem xiiqeh.
data.amh: በጎልፍ ፣ የመጨረሻው ዙር ኦፕን ሻምፒዮና በስኮትላንድ ሴንት አንድሪውስ ውስጥ በኦልድ ኮርስ ላይ ዛክ ጆንሰን፣ ማርክ ሌሽማን እና ሉዊስ ኦውቱዚየንን በአራት ቀዳዳ ለማሸነፍ ይጫወታል።
data.orm: Goolfii keessatti, marsaan xumuraa Dorgommii Ooppen Oold Koorsii Qulqulluu Andiruukan Iskootilaand keessaatti Zaak Joonsan, Maark Leyishmaanii fi Luwis Oostuuzeen wajjin tapha dabalataa boolla afurii injifachuun taphatame.
data.som: Kubbadda koleyga, wareegga ugu dambeeya ee The Open Championship waxaa lagu ciyaaraya Old Course ee St Andrews ee Scotland iyada oo Zach Johnson uu ku guuleystay afarta hog ee Marc Leishman iyo Louis Oosthuizen.
data.tir: ኣብ ጐልፍ፤ ናይ መወዳእታ ግጥም ኦፕን ሻምፕዮንሺፕ ኣብ ስኮትላንድ ቅዱስ ኢንድሩስ ኣብ ኦልድ ኮርስ ዝተኻየደ እንትኾን ምስ ማርክ ሌይስማንን ሉዊስ ኦስቱይዜንን ዝተጋጠመ ዛክ ጆንሰን ኣርባዕተ ሸቶ ብምምዝጋብ ተዓዊቱ።

data.eng: Two suicide bombings at a swimming pool in northern Iraq kill at least 12 people.
data.aaf: Kiblat Qirakal Giiri kalul Namma Baeyey Bayise Maysatakoki Wali 12 takke Marite Edde Rabte.
data.amh: በሰሜን ኢራቅ በመዋኛ ገንዳ ላይ ሁለት የአጥፍቶ ጠፊ ጥቃቶች ቢያንስ አስራ ሁለት ሰዎችን ገድለዋል።
data.orm: Boombii of wareeguun dhukaasamu lama bakka bishaan daakaa kaaba Iraaq keessaatti yoo xiqqaate namoota 12 ajjeese.
data.som: Labo qarax oo ismiidaamin ah oo ka dhacay barkad lagu dabaasho oo ku taala waqooyiga Ciraaq ayaa lagu dilay ugu yaraan 12 qof.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ዒራቕ ኣብ ሓደ መሐመሲ ብኽልተ ምፍንጃር ዓርሰ ቅትለት ብውሕድ 12 ሰባት ተቐቲሎም ።

data.eng: The Tunisian parliament approves a new anti-terror law that allows the death penalty for terrorists.
data.aaf: Tunuziya Barlama Qarkakisah Rabi Digaala Faticisa Qusba Qarkakisa sada Ganun Faticisen.
data.amh: የቱኒዚያ ፓርላማ ሽብርተኞች ላይ የሞት ቅጣትን የሚፈቅደውን አዲሱን የፀረ ሽብር ህግ አፀደቀ።

data.som: Si looga hortago argagaxisada baarlamaanka Tunisia ayaa ansixiyay sharci cusub oo ogolaanaya in dil lagu xukumo argagixisada.
data.tir: ፓርላማ ቱኒዥያ ንኣሸበርቲ ብፍርዲ ሞት ንምቕፃዕ ዝፈቅድ ሓድሽ ሕጊ ፀረ ግብረ ሽበራ ኣፅዲቑ።

data.eng: Debris found near the Indian Ocean island of Réunion is consistent with material from a Boeing 777 and is being examined to confirm whether it is from Malaysia Airlines Flight 370.
data.aaf: Hindik Kaxxa Badih Réunionih Xaqul Geytimte Tidigigile Boeingik 777 Uwaytulih Bicah yanim kinim Malaysia QaranGitih Hada 370 kinim Aysmitoonuh Fikqo Abak Geytiman.
data.amh: በሕንድ ውቅያኖስ ሬዩንዮን ደሴት አቅራቢያ የተገኘ ፍርስራሽ ከቦይንግ 777 ዕቃ ጋር ተመሳሳይ ሲሆን የማሌዥያ አየር መንገድ በረራ 370 መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ ምርመራ እየተደረገበት ነው።
data.orm: Hafteen naannoo Garba Hindii odola Riiyuuniyenitti argame qaama isa Booying 777 irraa wajjin wal fakkaata, akkasumas Daandii Qilleensaa Maleejiyaa Balalii 270 irraa tahuu mirkaneessuuf qoratamaa jira.
data.som: Burburka laga helay meel u dhow jasiiradda Badweynta Hindiya ee Réunion ayaa la lafilaya in waxyaabo ka yimid Boeing 777 waxaana loo baadhayaa si loo xaqiijiyo in ay ka timid Malaysia Airlines Flight 370.
data.tir: እቶም ኣብ ውቕያኖስ ህንዲ ኣብ ደሴት ሪዮንዮን ዝተረኸቡ ስብርባራት ምስ ኣቑሑት ቦይንግ 777 ሓደ ዓይነት ከምዝኾኑ ስለዝተፈለጠ ናይ ማሌዥያ መንገዲ ኣየር ቁፅሪ በረራ 370 ንምኳኖም ንምርግጋፅ ምርመራ እናተኻየደ እዩ።

data.eng: The Children's Hospital of Philadelphia announces that 8-year old Zion Harvey became the first pediatric patient to receive a double hand transplant earlier this month.
data.aaf: Alaaqa daktaar philippinik 8- karmat yan zion harvey naharsi ta vayresit yibbixtime xeyi alsih addat yekke.
data.amh: የፊላዴልፊያ የህጻናት ሆስፒታል የ 8 ዓመቷ ዛየን ሃርቪ በዚህ ወር መጀመሪያ ላይ የሁለቱንም እጆች ንቅለ ተከላ የተደረገላት የመጀመሪያ ታዳጊ ህመምተኛ መሆኗን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Hospitaalli Ijoollee Filaadelfiyaa, mucayyoon waggaa 8 Ziyoon Harveen dhukkubsattuu ijoollee jalqabaa dursa ji'a kanaa keessa harki lamaanuu nama biraa irraa dhaabateef ta'uu beeksise.
data.som: Isbitaalka Carruurta ee Philadelphia wuxuu ku dhawaaqay in Zion Harvey oo ah wiil 8 jir ah uu noqoday bukaan-socodkii ugu horreeyey oo ilmo yar ah, kasoo loo talaalay beddel gacmeed horaantii bishaan.
data.tir: ሆስፒታል ቆልዑ ፊላዴልፊያ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ወርሒ ዚዮን ሃርቬይ ዝተብሃለ ዝሓመመ ቆልዓ 8 ዓመት ክልቲኡ ኣእዳው ብመጥባሕቲ ዝተቐየረሉ ፈላማይ ቆልዓ ከምዝኾነ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Researchers from the University of California, Riverside discover that soybean oil and corn oil increase diabetes rates in mice more than coconut oil and fructose.
data.aaf: Kaliforniyah Jaamiqatih Kusaqabba, Riverside Kaxxa Qatir kee Qelbo Zeyti Qandoowah Addat Koconut Zeyti kee fructose Lafitak Sokar Caddo Kah Osanah CubetHen.
data.amh: በካሊፎርኒያ ዩንቨርስቲ ሪቨርሳይድ በአይጦች ላይ በተደረገ ጥናት ከኮኮናት ዘይት እና ከፍሩክቶስ በላይ የአኩሪ አተር ዘይት እና የበቆሎ ዘይት ለስኳር በሸታ እንደሚያጋልጥ ተረጋገጠ።
data.orm: Argannoon qorattoota Univarsitii Kaalifoorniyaa Riversaayid akka jedhutti Zeeyitni Ataraa fi boqqolloo Hantuuta keessatti kan Kookonaatii fi Fruktoosii caalaa hamma dhibee sukkaaaraa ni dabala jedhame.
data.som: Baarayaasha Jamacada California ee Riverside waxay ogaadeen in saliidda soybeanka iyo saliidda galleyda ay kordhiyaan heerka macaanaka jiirarka in ka badan saliidda qumbaha iyo fructoseka.
data.tir: ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ካሊፎርንያ፣ ሪቨርሳይድ፣ ዝርከቡ ተመራመርቲ ዘይቲ ሶያን ዘይቲ ዕፉንን ዝያዳ ካብ ዘይቲ ኮኮናትን ፍሩክቶስን ንላዕሊ መጠን ሽኮርያ ኣብ ኣናጹ ከም ዝውስኽ ፈሊጦም ኣለዉ።

data.eng: The death toll from an outbreak of legionnaires disease in New York City rises to eight with 97 people sick.

data.som: Tirada dhimashada cudurka legionnaires ee magaalada New York ayaa gaartay sideed iyadoo 97 qof ay la jiran yihiin.

data.eng: The United States announces that it is proposing sanctions against those connected to the South Sudan conflict, unless a ceasefire is reached promptly.

data.eng: Typhoon Goni leaves seven people dead and two people missing as it moves from the Philippines towards Taiwan and Okinawa, Japan.
data.aaf: Namma Qunxa algotariye (Langley Rakaakay Tayara boxak Ugutak) Ayro Mawqa Kanadak Missionuy, Biritish Kolobiyah Xaqul Wali Inki Num Rabe.
data.amh: አውሎ ነፋስ ጎኒ ከፊሊፒንስ ወደ ታይዋን እና ወደ ኦኪናዋ ፣ ጃፓን ሲዘዋወር ሰባት ሰዎች ሲሞቱ ሁለት ሰዎች ጠፍተዋል።
data.orm: Taayiphuun Gooniin akkuma Filiphiinsi irraa gara Taa'iwan fi Okinaawaa, Jaapaan qaxxaamureen namoota torba ajjeessee namoonni lama ammoo akka dhabaman godhe.
data.som: Duufaanta Goni ayaa sababay dhimashada 7 qof iyo laba qof oo la waayay markii ay ka soo bilawday Filibiin kuna sii jeeday Taiwan iyo Okinawa, Japan.
data.tir: ብጎኒ ዝስመ ማዕበል ካብ ፊሊፒንስ ተበጊሱ ናብ ኣንፈት ታይዋንን ኦኪናዋ ጃፓንን ኣብ ዝውንጨፈሉ እዋን ሸውዓተ ሰባት እንትሞቱ ክልተ ሰባት ሃለዋቶም ኣይተፈለጠን።

data.eng: Malaysia finds the bodies of more than 20 people believed to be victims of human trafficking in mass graves buried near the border with Thailand.
data.aaf: Malijiya Taylanxilih Cuduud Qaxul tan Kabritek Mango Kabritetah Addal Gitaak Iroh Takke Koblay maritet Biyaktem Kak Yakkalen 2o takke Mariteh Raysite Getimte.
data.amh: ማሌዥያ ከህገወጥ የሰው ዝውውር ጋር በተያያዘ ከታይላንድ ጋር ከሚያዋስናት ድንበር አካባቢ 20 የሚጠጉ የሰው ሬሳዎችን በጅምላ መቃብሮች ውስጥ አገኙ።
data.orm: MaleezjiYaan reeffaa namoota osoo daddabrsa namoota seeraan alaatiin imalaa jiranii lubbuun darban jedhamee shakkamu awwalcha guddaa reeffa namota 20 ol ta'anii qabatu nannoo daangaa Taayilanditti argatte.
data.som: Malaysia ayaa heshay meydad ka badan 20 qof oo lagu aasay xabaa wadareed ku yaala meel kudhaw xadka Thailand oo la aaminsan yahay inay yihiin dad kudulmana ganacsiga dadka.
data.tir: ማሌዢያ ግዳያት ዘይሕጋዊ ሰብኣዊ ዝውውር ከምዝኾኑ ናይ ዝግመቱ 20 ሰባት ኣስክሬን ኣብ ጥቓ ዶብ ታይላንድ ብሓባር ዝተቐበሩሉ መቓብር ረኺባ ።

data.eng: A teenage girl suicide bomber kills five people and injures fourteen others in the Damaturu area in northeast Nigeria.
data.aaf: Turkiyak Istabuul Addal Magaalak Fanti Mero Fanteenh Xaqul beeramibasa Tabseenal Bunba Boombi Bakaqak Koona Num muduume.
data.amh: በሰሜናው ምስራቅ ናይጄሪያ በምትገኘው ዳማቱሩ አካባቢ በአጥፍቶ አጥፊ ታዳጊ ሴት ልጅ በፈነዳ ቦምብ የአምስት ሰዎች ህይወት ሲያልፍ አስራ አራት ሰዎች ደግሞ ጉዳት ደርሶባቸዋል።
data.orm: Kaaba baha Naayijeeriyaa nannoo Damaturu jedhamutti shamarreen gocha bade balleessaa boombiin raawwatteen lubbuu namoota shanii yoo galaafattu namoonni kudha afur ammoo miidhamaniiru.
data.som: Gabar yar oo isku qarxisay Damaturu ee waqooyi bari Nigeria ayaa sabatay dhimashada shan qof iyo afar iyo toban dhaawac ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ምብራቕ ናይጀሪያ ዳማቱሩ ኣብዝተብሃለ ከባቢ ሓንቲ ትሕቲ ዕድመ ዝኾነት ጓል ብዓርሰ ቕትለታዊ ነታጒ ሓሙሽተ ሰባት እንትትቀትል ን14 ሰባት ድማ ኣቑሲላ።

data.amh: የሶሪያ ሰብዓዊ መብቶች ታዛቢ ድርጅት አይኤስአይኤል በፓልሚራ ጥንታዊውን የቤል ቤተመቅደስ አፈንድቷል አለ።
data.orm: Dhaabbatni taajjabdoota mirga namoomaa siiriyaa Ayisil Paalmiraatti mana sagadaa Beel durii barbadeessuu isa ibseera.
data.som: Kooxda la socodka xuquuqda aadamaha ee Siriya ayaa ku aanaynaysa in ISIL ay qarxisay macbudkii qadiimiga ahaa ee Bel ee Palmyra.
data.tir: ኣይ ኤስ ኣይ ኤል ኣብ ፓልሚይራ ንዝርከብ ጥንታዊ ቤተ መቅደስ ቤል ከምዘፍረሶ ተጣባቒ ሰብኣዊ መሰል ሶርያ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: South Africa will become the first African nation to host the Commonwealth Games as Durban is granted the rights to host the games in 2022.
data.aaf: Xerban 2022 Digirabeenit Ogolanamih Gaar teetih yecenimih tagah Gabi Afrikal Komenwelz Digirite gexsisuwata Qiboh Afarikah Baaxo Akelle.
data.amh: ደርባን በ 2022 ጨዋታዎችን የማስተናገድ መብት ስለተሰጣት ደቡብ አፍሪካ የኮመንዌልዝ ጨዋታዎችን የምታስተናግድ የመጀመሪያዋ አፍሪካዊት ሀገር ትሆናለች።
data.orm: Afirikaan Kibbaa, Daarban mirga taphoota bara 2022 keessaa geggeessuu argachuu ishiin biyya Afirikaa yeroo jalqabaaf Taphoota Koomonweelz geggeessitu taati.
data.som: Koonfur Afrika ayaa noqonaysa dalkii ugu horreeyay ee Afrikaan ah ee martigeliya Ciyaaraha Barwaaqo sooranka iyadoo hoteelka Durban la siiyay xuquuqda marti gelinta ciyaaraha 2022 ka.
data.tir: ከተማ ደርባን ነቲ ብ2022 ዝካየድ ግጥም ክተሰናድእ መሰል ስለዝረኸበት ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ንግጥም ኮመንዌልዝ ዘተኣናገደት ፈላሚት ኣፍሪካዊት ሃገር ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: BlackBerry Limited announces it will purchase Good Technology, a provider of mobile software, as part of its broader shift to a services role within the internet of things.
data.aaf: Belakebri limitix caagidal netwekil Illa baarle Ayfaf milagu Exak mobayil softiwer Xayos yanih yan Meqe tekinolojy xaamelem qadose.
data.amh: ብላክ ቤሪ ሊሚትድ የሞባይል ሶፍትዌር አቅራቢ የሆነዉን ጉድ ቴክኖሎጂን እንደሚገዛ አሳውቋል፤ ይህም በነገሮች በይነመረብ ውስጥ ያልውን ድርሻ ወደ አገልግሎት ሰጪነት ዘርፍ ለማሸጋገር የሚያደርገውን መጠነ ሰፊ የማስፋፊያ ለውጥ አካል ነው።
data.orm: Bilaakbeerii Limiitid akka gahee isaa bal'aa isaa tajaailaoota interneetii wantootaa keessaatti dhiyeessaa sooftiweerii mobaayilaa, Guud Tekinoolojiin akka bitu beeksise.
data.som: BlackBerry Limited ayaa sheegtay inay iibsanayaan Good Technology, oo bixisa softiweerka mobilada, taas oo kamimid ah isbeddelka balaadhan ee ay kusamaynayaan qaybtooda adeegyada internetka dhexdiisa.
data.tir: ብላክበሪ ሊሚትድ ንኣቕራቢት/ቀራቢት ሞባይል ሶፍትዌር ጉድ ተክኖሎጂ ከም እትዕድግ ገሊጻ ፣ እዚ ኻኣ ኣካል ናይቲ ሰፊሕ ለወጢ ኣብ ኢንተርነት ኣገልግሎታት ንምትእትታው ዝዓለመ እዩ ።

data.eng: The Delhi government defers elective surgery to free up 1000 hospital beds to treat a dengue fever outbreak.
data.aaf: Xengue Liqna Daylisonuh Xehih Doolat 1000 Hosbitalih Kaqadid Cabe Wan Giddah Dooroh Bagi Fakutut Mayso Abe.
data.amh: የዴልሂ አስተዳደር ለደንጌ በሽታ ህክምና ይረዳ ዘንድ 1000 የሆስፒታል የቀዶ ጥጋና አልጋዎችን እንዲለቀቁ አስደረገ።
data.orm: Mootummaan Delhi weerara dhibee qufaa deengee yaaluudhaaf wal'aansa baqaaqsanii yaaluu kan hatattamaa hin taane 1000 achi buuteera.
data.som: Xukuumadda Delhi waxay ka hortagtay qaliinadda qaar sii loo baneeyo 1000 sariirood taas oo lagu daweeynayo qandhada dengue.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ደልሂ ነቲ ተላቢዑ/ተባሪዑ ዘሎ ናይ ረስኒ ደንግ ንምሕካም 1000 ናይ ሆስፒታል ዓራት ናጻ ንምግባር ነቲ ናይ ምምራጽ መጥባሕቲ ኣመሓላሊፉ።

data.eng: Martin Winterkorn resigns as the CEO of Volkswagen as a result of an emissions cheating scandal.
data.aaf: Martin Wantrekoren Axagih Nabba Madobisiya sababah Voliswagan Lewanah Abinoose Cabeh.
data.amh: የቮልስዋገን ዋና ስራ-አስኪያጅ የሆነው ማርቲን ዊንተርኮርን ወደ ከባቢ አየር ከሚለቀቁ ልቀቶች ጋር በተገናኘ የማጭበርበር ቅሌት ከስራው ተነሳ።
data.orm: Sababa muffii gowwomsaa haara baasuun CEO'n VolkisWaagen, Maartin Wiinkerkoorn aangoo gad dhiise.
data.som: Martin Winterkorn ayaa iska casilay xilkii madaxa guud ee Volkswagen ka dib fadeexad sharafdhac ah markii lagu eedeeyey.
data.tir: ዋና ፈፃሚ ስራሕ ቮልስቫገን ማርቲን ዊንተርኮርን ብምኽንያት ገበን ምትላል ልቀት ካርቦን ካብ ሓላፍነቱ ብፍቓዱ ለቒቑ።

data.eng: England becomes the first host nation and first former finalist to be knocked out of the Rugby World Cup during the group stages following their defeat to Australia.
data.aaf: Ingiliz Awustaraliyak gactek lakal Ta butta caddoda ragebi baad kasak Qunxaneytak qimboh Xayose baxxo kee qimboh Illacaboh Qalala tekke.
data.amh: በራግቢ አለም ዋንጫ እንግሊዝ በአውስትራሊያ ሽንፈት ካስተናገደች በ|ላ ውድድሩን አዘጋጅታ እና ባለፈው የአለም ዋንጫ ለፍፃሜ ደርሳ በዚህኛው ገና ከምድቧ ሳታልፍ የቀረች የመጀመሪያዋ ሃገር ሆናለች።
data.orm: Ingilaand Awurooppaa dhaan injifatamuu iseetiin walqabatee sadarkaa gareetti dorgommii waancaa Raagbiitiin qopheessituu dorgommichaa fi hirmaattuu tapha xumuraa duraanii geggeeffamte isee jalqabaa taate.
data.som: Ingiriisak ayaa noqday dalkii ugu horeeyay ee marti qaada iyo dalkii ugu horeeyay ee ciyaaarta gunaanad ka hara koobka aduunka ee Rugby intii lagu jiray wareega kooxyada kadib guuldaradii ka soo gaartay Australia.
data.tir: ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ኣብ መድረኻት ጉጅለታት ድሕሪ እቲ ብኣውስትራልያ ዝወረዳ ስዕረት ካብ ዋንጫ ዓለም ራግቢ ዝተገለፈትን ኣቐዲማ ናብ ፍጻሜ ዝበጸሓተን ናይ ፈለማ ኣኣንጋዲት ሃገር ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: The World Health Organization announces that, since the Ebola outbreak began in March 2014, last week marked the first week of no new cases worldwide.
data.aaf: Ibolah Dalka Qado-Diri 2014 Qimbimtemik Qimbisak Waraye Ayaamah Baada Caddol Wali Qaynatih Qusaba LakimiAnbuluyewem Qimboh Ayam Kinim Baadak Qafiyat Egla Qadose.
data.amh: የአለም የጤና ድርጅት መጋቢት 2014 የኢቦላ ወረርሽኝ ከተከሰተ በኋላ ያለፈው ሳምንት ብቻ ምንም ታማሚ ያልተገኘበት የመጀመርያው ሳምንት ሆኖ አልፏል ሲል ገለፀ።
data.orm: Weerarri dhibee Iboolaa erga ji'a biootessaa bara 2014 irraa eegale as yeroo jalqabaaf akka idil addunyaatti torbeen darbe kan dhukkubsataan dhibee kanaa tokkollee hin gabaafamne ta'uu isaa Dhaabbanni Faayyaa Addunyaa gabaseera.
data.som: Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa ku dhawaaqay, tan iyo markii uu dillaacay cudurka Ebola bishii Maarso 2014, in toddobaadkii hore uu ahaa toddobaadkii ugu horreeyey oo aan kiisas cusub dunida oo dhan laga helin.
data.tir: ዓለማዊ ውድብ ጥዕና ከም ዝገለጾ፣ ሕማም ኢቦላ ኣብ መጋቢት 2014 ካብ ዝጅምር ንነጀው ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ሓድሽ መልከፍቲ ዘይተረኽበላ ቀዳመይቲ ሰሙን እያ ነይራ።

data.eng: The American Cancer Society recommends women at average risk of breast cancer should begin annual mammograms at age 45, and women 55 and older scale back screening to every other year.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Kanser Egla Amoladih Angu kanser Dufumtam Sayyok 45 sanotak sanati mamogiram Kah qimbisan inah Fayisa፣ kee Karmak 55 kee Tohuuk dagh Tan Sayyo Kuli Sanatal Wadirih Yadaare.
data.amh: የአሜሪካ የካንሰር ማህበር በአማካይ ለጡት ካንሰር ተጋላጭ የሆኑ ሴቶች በ 45 ዓመታቸው ዓመታዊ ማሞግራም እንዲጀምሩ ይመክራል ፣ 55 እና ከዚያ በላይ የሆኑ ሴቶች በየሁለት ዓመቱ እንዲመረመሩ የመክራል።
data.orm: Hawaasni Kaanserii Ameerikaa dubartoonni kaanserii harmaaf balaa giddugaleessaa irra jiran umrii waggaa 45'tti qorannoo maamogiraafii waggaatti tokkoo eegaluu akka qaban, akkasumas dubartoonni waggaa 55 fi isaa olii gara waggaa tokko gidduun oolchaa qoratamuutti akka gadi buusan gorse.
data.som: Ururka Kansarka Ameerika wuxuu kula taliyanayaa dumarka celcelis ahaan halis ugu jira kansarka naasaha inay bilaabaan raajada mammogram -ka sanadlaha ah markay gaadhaan 45 jir, sidoo kale dumarka 55 sano ka weyn ay dib u eegaan shaybaadhkooda sannad dhaaf.
data.tir: ማሕበር ሕማም መንሽሮ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ማእኸላይ ስግኣት መንሽሮ ዘለዋ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ 45 ዓመት ምስመልአን ዓመታዊ ምርመራ ማሞግራም ክጅምራ ከምዝግባእ ከምኡ እውን 55 ዓመትን ልዕሊኡን ዝገበራ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ በብኽልተ ዓመቱ ናብ ምምርማር ክቕንሳ መኺሩ።

data.eng: Lewis Hamilton wins a third World Drivers' Championship in Formula One, as his team Mercedes secures the Constructors' Championship.
data.aaf: Luwis hamelten mersexis konistirakterchin shabiyoona Yasmitewak ta foromul iniksidocayto Baada kokobiseenit shabiyoonal Yeyse.
data.amh: ሉዊስ ሃሚልተን በፎርሙላ አንድ የዓለም የአሽከርካሪዎች ሻምፒዮና ለሶስተኛ ግዜ ሲያሸንፍ ቡድኑ መርሴዲስ ደግሞ የኮንስትራክተሮችን ሻምፒዮና አሸንፏል።
data.orm: Liwiis Haamiltan Foormulaa Wanii irratti Dorgommii Konkolaachistoota Addunyaa sadaffaa mo'ate, gareen isaa Meerseedis Shaampiyoonaa Konistiraaktar injifachuudhaan.
data.som: Lewis Hamilton wuxuu ku guuleystay Horyaalnimada Darawalada Adduunka ee saddexaad ee Formula One, iyadoo kooxdiisa Mercedes ay xaqiijisay Horyaalkii Dhismayaasha.
data.tir: ኣብ ሳልሳይ ግጥም ዘወርቲ መኪና ዓለም ሌዊስ ሃሚልተን ብፎርሙላ ሓደ ተዓዊቱ፣ ጋንታኡ ሜርሴድስ ድማ ኣብ ኮንስትራክተርስ ሻምፕዮን ስዒራ።

data.eng: A new study by scientists finds that areas around the Persian Gulf could become uninhabitable to humans in less than 100 years due to rising temperatures.
data.aaf: Saynis maxagite qusba kusaq ele yescesenal Farasak badi gadirih xaqiqaltanih tan dariifal caylale liqna osotina sababah 100 sanotak addah yan waktih Addat Sahdayti baxi manol warewam kinim takkeh.
data.amh: አንድ በተመራማሪዎች የተደረገ አዲስ ጥናት በሙቀት መጨመር ምክኒያት በፐርሺያ ባህረ ሰላጤ አካባቢ ያሉ ቦታዎች ከ100 አመት ባነሰ ግዜ ውስጥ ለሰው ልጅ ኑሮ ምቹ ላይሆኑ እንደሚችሉ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Sababii olka'uu tempireecharaan yeroo waggaa 100 gaditti bakki naannoo Galfii Pershiyaa jireenya namaaf kan hin mijanne akka ta'uu danda'u qorannoon haaraan saayintistootaa argarsiise.
data.som: Daraasad cusub oo ay sameeyeen saynisyahannadu waxay ku ogaadeen in aagagga ku teedsan gacanka Faaris ay noqon karaan kuwo aan lagu noolaan karin wax ka badan 100 sano sababo la xiriira koradhka heerkulka.
data.tir: ኣብ ከባቢ ወሽመጥ ባሕሪ ፔርሺያ ዝርከቡ ቦታታት ትሕቲ 100 ዓመት ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ብሰንኪ እናወሰኸ ዝኸይድ ዋዒ ዘርኢ ሰብ ክነብረሎም ዘይኽእሉ ከምዝኾኑ ሓዱሽ መፅናዕቲ ሳይንቲስታት ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: A series of blasts at an ammunition depot in Svatove, Luhansk region of eastern Ukraine leaves four dead and eight injured.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Okilahoma kee takses caxah lasak Robti caddo Maysaraqa abak weqi Cuma Katase.
data.amh: በምሥራቅ ዩክሬን ሉሃንስክ ግዛት በስቫቶቭ በሚገኘው ጥይት መጋዘን ውስጥ ተከታታይ ፍንዳታዎች ሳቢያ አራት ሰዎች ሲሞቱ ስምንት ደግሞ ቆስለዋል።

data.som: Qaraxyo is xigxigay oo ka dhacay bakhaarka kaydka rasaasta ee magaalada Svatove, gobolka Luhansk ee bariga Ukraine ayaa sababay dhimashada afar qof iyo sideed dhaawac ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ምብራቕ ዩክሬይን ስቫቶቭ ሉሃንስክ ተባሂሉ ኣብ ዝፅዋዕ ከባቢ ኣብ ዝርከብ መኽዘን ኣፅዋር ብዘጋጠሙ ሓደጋታት ነተጉቲ 4 ሰባት እንትሞቱ 8 ቆሲሎም።

data.eng: Harvard Law School Professor Lawrence Lessig announces his decision, via a four-minute YouTube video, to end his campaign for the 2016 Democratic Party presidential nomination.
data.aaf: Haevrxik Ganun Barittoh Buxa Borofeser Lowurinese ligig 2016 Ximokratik Misoynah Berezixantih Qalaylih Uguugus sooluh Afara Minitil Yutyubul vixiyo Margaqa Yiysixige.
data.amh: በሃርቫርድ ዩንቨርሲቲ የህግ ትምህርት ቤት ፕሮፌሰር የሆኑት ፕሮፌሰር ላውረንስ ሌሲግ በዩቲውብ ባስተላለፉት የአራት ደቂቃ መልእክት በ2016 ለሚካሄደው ምርጫ የዴሞክራት ፓርቲን በመወከል ሲያደርጉ የነበረውን የምርጫ ዘመቻ ማቆማቸውን አሳወቁ።
data.orm: Pirofeeserri Muummee Seeraa Haarvaard Laawurense Leesig, karaa viidiyoo Yuutiyuubii daqiiqaa afur dheeratuu, duula kaadhimummaa pirasdaantii Paartii Diimokiraatikii bara 2016 akka dhaabu beeksise.
data.som: Professor Lawrence Lessig oo ka tirsan Dugsiga Sharciga ee Harvard ayaa ku shaaciyay go’aankiisa, isaga oo isticmaalaya muuqal afar daqiiqo uu soogaliyay isgaadhsiinta YouTubeka taas oo uu ku sheegay in uu joojinayo ololihiisa ku saabsan musharax nimadiisa xisbiga Dimuqraadiga ee 2016.
data.tir: ፕሮፌሰር ሕጊ ዩኒቨርስቲ ሃርቫርድ ሎውረንስ ሌሲግ ኣብቲ ውድድር ሕርያ ሕፁይ ዴሞክራቲክ ፓርቲ ንምስታፍ ከካይዱዎ ዝፀንሑ ወፍሪ ጠጠው ከምዘበሉ ብዩቲዩብ ኣብዘሕለፉዎ ናይ 4 ደቓይቕ መልእኽቲ ቪድዮ ኣፍሊጦም።

data.eng: U.S. airplane manufacturer Boeing unveils the first Boeing 737 MAX airplane at its factory in Renton, Washington.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Tayaara Bicisa Booyingi Bernton Washiginenil Gaytimta Fabrica Qimbo Booyingi 737 MAXI Xiqsita Tayaara Qusubih Baxaqisen.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው አውሮፕላን አምራች ኩባንያ ቦይንግ የመጀመሪያውን ቦይንግ 737 ማክስ አውሮፕላኑን በሬቶን ዋሽንግተን በሚገኘው ፋብሪካው ይፋ አደረገ።
data.orm: Oomishaan xiyyaaraa U.S. Booyingiin xiyyaara isaa Boeing 737 MAX isa jalqabaa warshaa isaa Reenton, Waashingitonitti agarsiise.
data.som: Shirkada maraykanka ee samaysa dayaaradaha ee Boeing ayaa daaha kaqaaday diyaaradii ugu horaysay ee Boeing 737 MAX warshaddeeda Renton, Washington daxdeeda.
data.tir: ቦይንግ ዝተብሃለ ኩባንያ ነፈርቲ ኣሜሪካ ቦይንግ 737 ማክስ ዝተሰመየት ዓይነት ነፋሪት ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ኣብ ሬንተን፣ ዋሺንግተን ኣብ ዝርከብ ፋብሪካኡ ኣመሪቑ።

data.eng: The United States Food and Drug Administration approves the Merck & Co. drug, Bridion, that reverses the effects of muscle relaxants used during surgery.
data.aaf: USik Maqqida kee Diwaata Xiinise Bagi Fakoot Wakti Intifaqal Ase Angul taqabi katasa Karki kee Kubaniya Diwaata birixun Faticise.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የምግብ እና የመድኃኒት አስተዳደር የመርክ እና ኩባንያ ምርት የሆነውን በቀዶ ጥገና ወቅት ጥቅም ላይ የሚውሉትን ጡንቻን ዘና የሚያደርጉ መድሃኒቶችን ተፅእኖ የሚቀለበስን ብሪዲዮን የተባለውን መድኃኒት አፀደቀ።
data.orm: Bulchiinsi Nyaataa fi Daawwaa Yuunaayitid Isteetis daawwaa Merk & Co., Biraayidiyooniin, isa dhiibbaa hiikamuu maashaa ofirra deebisu isa yeroo baqaqsanii yaaluu fayyadu mirkaneesse.
data.som: Maamulka Cuntada iyo Dawooyinka ee Maraykanka ayaa ansixiyay daroogada Merck & Co., Bridion, taas oo dib u celisa saamaynta dabciyeyaasha muruqyada ee loo isticmaalo xiliga qalliinka.
data.tir: ምምሕዳር ምግቢን መድሓኒትን ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ፣ ኩባንያ ሜርክን ተሓባበርቱን ዘፍረይዎን፣ ኣብ እዋን መጥባሕቲ ንዝፍጠር ኣሉታዊ ሳዕቤን ምፍትሕታሕ ጭዋዳ ዘቃንዕን መድሓኒት ብራይዶን ኣፍልጦ ሂቡ።

data.eng: Germany recruits 8,500 teachers to provide special German language lessons for 196,000 Syrian child refugees.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Gabiqaxih suudanalih Qeebilih geytimta maritel Kaltaxibix Xayosem Qadose፣ Gira solis SitingeyilSisiku madeweenik.
data.amh: ጀርመን ለ 196,000 የሶሪያ ሕፃናት ስደተኞች ልዩ የጀርመን ቋንቋ ትምህርት ለመስጠት በማሰብ 8,500 መምህራንን ቀጥራለች።
data.orm: Jarmaniin koolu-galtoota ijoollee Siiriyaa 196,000 ta'aniif barumsa afaan Jarman akka barsiisaniif barsiisota 8,500 qaxarte.
data.som: Jarmalku wuxuu shaqaaleysiinayaa 8,500 oo macallimiin ah si ay u bixiyaan casharro barashada luuqadda Jarmalka ah dad gaaraya 196,000 qaxootiga caruurta Suuriyaanka ah.
data.tir: ጀርመን 196 ሽሕ ሶርያውያን ህፃናት ስደተኛታት ፍሉይ ትምህርቲ ቋንቋ ንምምሃር 8500 መማህራን መልሚላ።
