data.eng: Reformist candidate Mohammad-Ali Najafi is unanimously elected Mayor of Tehran by the city council, ending the 12-year tenure of Principlist Mohammad-Bagher Ghalibaf.
data.aaf: Asqasabe Yasgayi Qalale Macammad –Qali Najafih Magaalah Xiinise 12 Sanatih Miraciinu ligidite Gabakalsisa Macammad-Bagher Ghalibaf Tahran Magaalah Xiniso Saqal Inki Xongolol Doorimeh.
data.amh: የተሃድሶ አማራጭ ሆኖ የቀረበው መሃመድ አሊ ናጃፊ ከ12 አመታት የ መሃመድ ባግሀር ጋሃሊባፍ የክንቲባነት ቆይታ በ|ላ በአንድ ድምፅ የቴህራን ከንቲባ እንዲሆን ተመረጠ።
data.orm: Xumuramuu bara hojii wagga 12 ''Seera-jabeessaa' Muhaammad Baghii Galibaaf ilaalchisuun Kaadhimamaan abbaa ilaalcha haaromsaa Mohammad Ali Najaafiin kantiibaa Tehraan haaraa ta'uun mana maree magaalichaatiin sagalee guutudhaan muudaman.
data.som: Musharraxa dib u habeynta Mohammad Ali Najafi ayaa si aqlabiyad leh loogu doortay Duqa Magaalada Tehran oo ay golaha magaaladu doorteen, taasoo soo gunaanadaysa muddadii 12 ka sano ahayd ee maamulaha Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf.
data.tir: እቲ ንኣስታት 12 ዓመት ዝነበረ ትሕዞ ካንቲባ ነበር መሐመድ ባቅር ቓሊባፍ፣ ብኣራሚ ሕጹይ መሐመድ ዓሊ ነጀፊ ተተኪኡ ብባይቶ ከተማ ቲህራን ካንቲባ ኮይኑ ክስየም ተመሪጹ።

data.eng: A mudslide triggered by heavy rain near Sierra Leone's capital Freetown, kills at least 350 people with the death toll expected to rise as high as 500.
data.aaf: Gabi Taliyanal Pozzuoli Magaalak Xaqul 38Hytut Acaadsah Atabus Qawalayllat Inikih tan Kabrie Edde Tekke.
data.amh: በሴራሊዮን ዋና ከተማ ፍሪታውን አቅራቢያ በከባድ ዝናብ የተነሳ የጭቃ መንሸራተት በትንሹ 350 ሰዎችን ገድሏል ፣ የሟቾች ቁጥር እስከ 500 ይደርሳል ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Magaala guddoo Seeraa Liyoon cinatti mucucaachuun lafaa sababa rooba ulfaataan mudate, yoo xiqqaate namoota 350 ajjeesuun hammi du'i eegamu akka gara 500'tti olka'u godhe.
data.som: Dhoobo siibatay oo uu sababay roob xoog leh oo ka dhacday meel u dhow caasimadda Sierra Leone ee Freetown, ayay ku dhinteen ugu yaraan 350 qof iyagoo la filayo in dhimashadu kor u dhaafto 500.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ርእሰ ከተማ ሴራልዮን ኣብ ፊሪታውን ዝወቕዐ ብርቱዕ ዝናብ ዘስዓቦ ሸታሕታ ምድሪ ብውሑድ 350 ሞይቶም፤ እዚ ቑፅሪ ናብ 500 ከምዝድይብ ተገሚቱ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Pakistan holds a state funeral for German-born Catholic nun Ruth Pfau, known as "Pakistan's Mother Teresa," who devoted her life to eradicating leprosy in the South Asian country.
data.aaf: Bakistan Gabi Qaxih Asiysah baaxok Cadoh Addah Barasih Biyak Bayisoonuh Isi Rooci fida Abte Garman Baaxoh Ubkale tan Katolik Mnkuste Rute Bafa Doolat Magaq Siirat Abte::
data.amh: ፓኪስታን በደቡብ እስያ ሀገር የሥጋ ደዌ በሽታን ለማጥፋት ትተጋ የነበረቸውን “የፓኪስታን ማዘር ትሬዛ” በመባል የምትታወቀውን የጀርመን ተወላጅ የካቶሊክ መነኩሲት ሩት ፓፋ የቀብር ሥነ ሥርዓት አከናወነች።
data.orm: Paakistaan kibba Eeshiyaa keessatti dubartii dhukkuba lamxii ballessuuf jireenya isee dabarsite dhalattuu lammii Jarman kan taate monokseen Kaatolikii Ruuts Paahifu 'Maazer terezaa" pakistaan jedhamuun beekamtuuf sirna awwaalcha mootummaa goote.
data.som: Pakistan ayaa aas qaran u samaynaysa wadaada Katoolika ahayd ee ku dhalatay Jarmalka Ruth Pfau, oo loo yaqaan “Pakistan’s Mother Teresa,” oo nolosheeda u hibeysay cidhibtirka baraska dalka Koonfurta Aasiya.,
data.tir: ፓኪስታን ብትውልዲ ጀርመናዊት ንዝኾነትን ኣብታ ሃገር ድውየት ንምጥፋእ ዕድሚኣ ልክዕ ብዘርኣየቶ ውፉይነት “ናይ ፓኪስታን ማማ ቴሬዛ” ተባሂላ ንትፍለጥን ካቶሊካዊት ፈላሲት ሩት ፕፋው ሃገራዊ ስነስርዓት ቐብሪ ኣካይዳ።

data.eng: Tropical depression Harvey becomes a hurricane, expected to make landfall on the Texas coast at Category 3, bringing life-threatening storm surge, rainfall, and wind hazards.
data.aaf: Tiroopikaal ardi radiyyaa kee fontoloolocitiyya texsas gammii kee 3 rooci wadih taama robti radiyyaa kee silay takawwaaso.
data.amh: ትሮፒካል ዲፕሬሽን ሃርቬይ ወደ የባህር አውሎንፋስነት አድጎ በምድብ 3 በቴክሳስ ባህር ዳርቻ ላይ መሬት ላይ እንደሚወድቅ የጠበቃል ፣ ለሕይወት አስጊ የሆነ ማዕበል ፣ ዝናብ እና የንፋስ አደጋዎችንም ያመጣል።
data.orm: Bubbeen galaanaa Tiroopikaalaa Harveey hobonboleettii tahe, qarqara galaanaa Teeksas irratti Sadarkaa 3 gahuun lafa rukutuu mala akkasumas qaqqawwee, roobaa fi balaa bubbee jireenyaaf sodaachisaa ta'e fiduu mala.
data.som: Niyad jabka kulaylaha Harvey ayaa noqonaya duufaan, oo la filayo inuu ku soo dhaco xeebta Texas ee Qaybta 3, taasoo keeni karta duufaan halis gelisa nolosha, roobabka, iyo khataraha dabaysha.
data.tir: እቲ ናብ ሃሪከን ዝተቐየረ ብትሮፒካል ዲፕሬሽን ሃርቬይን ዝስመ ብርቱዕ ሆቦብላ ብደረጃ-3 ኣብ ገምገም ቴክሳስ ከምዝዓልብ ከምዝግመትን ነዚ ስዒቡ ንህይወት ኣስጋኢ ዝኾኑ ማዕበል፣ ብርቱዕ ዝናብን ሓያል ንፋስን ከምዘጋጥመን ተሓቢሩ።

data.eng: Toronto's Sheraton Cadwell Orchestras closes and its management resigns following public backlash to a fat-shaming email that said only "physically fit and slim" singers would be featured in shows.
data.aaf: Torentoh Sharaton Kaxwale Orkeetra Alfitem kee “dagar Dudda kee Asgagoyi” Gadite Dibuk Ablusiyal Angalelon inta Ayyunti Solo ugutak Ta Xinise Taama Cabeh.
data.amh: በቶርንቶ ሸራተን የሚገኘው የካድዌል ኦርኬስትራ አስተዳደር ይፋ በወጣበት የሰውነት ገፅታን በሚያኮስስና አካለዋ ቁመና ያላሟላ ሙዚቀኛ መድረክ ላይ አይቀርብም በሚል የተሰራጨው መልእክት ስራውን እንዲለቅ አስገድዶታል።
data.orm: Oschestiraan Sheraaten Chaadwel Toroontoo muffii ummataa kan iimelii nama furdaa qaanessu kan "warra qaamaan mijatanii fi qal'aa" tahan qofatu qophiiwwan keessatti dhiyaata jedhu hordufuun dhufeen walqabatee cufame akkasumas bulchiinsi isaas hojii gadhiisan.
data.som: Kooxda Sheraton Cadwell Orchestras ee Toronto ayaa la xiray, kadib marku maamulkeedu iscasilay, taas oo ka dhalatay falcelin ka timid xaga dadwaynaha, kadib marku sheegay in ay xaflada musigada ay ka ciyaari doonaan dad jidh ahaan dhisan iyo ku caatada ah.
data.tir: ናይ ቶሮንቶ ሸራተን ካድዌል ኦርኬስትራ ንረጎድቲ ዘግልልን ኣብቲ ኦርኬስትራ ኣባላት ዝኽኑ "ቀጠንቲን ኣካላዊ ብቕዓት ዘለዎምን" ደረፍቲ እዮም ብምባል ብኢ ሜይል ብምግላጹ ህዝባዊ ተቃውሞ ስለ ዝወልዐ ብሰንኪ እዚ ተዓፅዩ፡እቶም ኣማሓደርቲ እውን ብፍቃዶም ለቒቆም።

data.eng: The opposition movement in Venezuela seeks help from France.
data.aaf: Venzuwelal Yan Saditeh Angagoyyite Faransak Catota Faxa.
data.amh: በቬንዚዌላ የሚደረገው የተቃዋሚዎች እንቅስቃሴ ከፈረንሳይ ድጋፍ እንደሚፈልግ ገለፀ።
data.orm: Sochiin mormitootaa Venezuweellaa keessaa gargaarsa Faransaayi irraa barbaadan.
data.som: Dhaqdhaqaaqa mucaaradka Venezuela ayy caawimaad ka codsanaya Faransiiska.

data.eng: Google is being sued over alleged inequality in the pay of male and female employees.

data.amh: ጉግል በወንድ እና በሴት ሰራተኞች መካከል ያልተመጣጠን ክፍያ በመክፈል ጠርጥሮ ተከሰሰ።

data.som: Google ayaa dacwad lagu soo oogayaa iyada oo loo aaneynayo sinnaan la’aan xagga mushaharka shaqaalaha ragga iyo dumarka.
data.tir: ጉግል ብሰንኪ ዘይማዕርነት ኣብ ደሞዝ ደቂ ተባዕትዮን ደቂ ኣንስትዮን ከም ዘሎ ምስ ተወርየ ተኸሲሱ ኣሎ።

data.eng: A journalist for the British newspaper Financial Times is killed by a crocodile in Sri Lanka.
data.aaf: lendenik kamidanal geytimta chikote istet koona mama bulokiteh Addal tanim inkih 800 qarwa kixanu gira amni gibatite mahirigiyo iyeek lakal cabak Yewqe.
data.amh: የእንግሊዝ ጋዜጣ ፋይናንሺያል ታይምስ ጋዜጠኛ በስሪ ላንካ በአዞ ተገደለ።

data.som: Wariye u shaqeeya wargeyska Financial Times ee Ingiriiska ayaa waxa la sheegay inuu yaxaas ku dilay wadanka Sri Lanka.
data.tir: ፋይናንሻል ታይምስ ናይ ዝተብሃለ ጋዜጣ ሓደ ጋዜጠኛ ኣብ ስሪላንካ ብሓርገፅ ተቐቲሉ።

data.eng: The World Health Organization says that hunger around the world has risen as a result of war and climate change.

data.som: Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka ayaa sheegay in gaajada adduunka ay kor u kacday taas oo ay sababeen isbedelka cimilada iyo dagaallada.

data.eng: Russian and Syrian warplanes carry out airstrikes in southern Idlib, killing three civilians and wounding others.
data.aaf: Rusiya kee Suriya Qeebi Awrobilanite Gabi Edilib Qaran Maysataka Abak 3 Takke Gabsaqa Qideenih Akim Mudumteh.
data.amh: የሩስያ እና የሶሪያ የጦር አውሮፕላኖች በደቡባዊ ኢድሊብ የአየር ድብደባ ሲፈፅሙ፣ ሶስት ሰላማዊ ሰዎችን ገድለው ሌሎችንም አቁስለዋል።
data.orm: Xiyyaaronni waraanaa Raashiyaa fi Siiriyaa kibba Idiib keessatti haleellaa qilleensarraa geggeessaniin, namoota nagaa sadii ajjeesanii kanneen biroo madeessan.
data.som: Diyaaradaha dagaalka ee Ruushka iyo Suuriya ayaa duqeymo cirka ah ka fuliyay koonfurta Idlib, waxaana ku dhintay saddex qof oo rayid ah, halka kuwo kalena ay ku dhaawacmeen.
data.tir: ነፈርቲ ወግእ ሩሲያን ሶሪያን ኣብ ደቡባዊ ኢድሊብ ብዝካየድዎ ደብዳብ ሰለስተ ሲቪላት ቀቲሎም ንካልኦት እውን ኣቑሲሎም ።

data.eng: U.S. President Donald Trump announces new sanctions on North Korea over its nuclear weapons program.
data.aaf: Kiblat kee gabi Kaxa Baxiteh Fordaadi Yagaloonuh Walal Qusbadah qimbisoonuh Siwzerlandil yongorowen.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ፕሬዚዳንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ በሰሜን ኮሪያ በኒውክሌር የጦር መሣሪያ መርሃ ግብሯ ላይ አዲስ ማዕቀብ አወጁ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Doonaald Tiraamp Kooriyaa Kaabaa irratti dhimma sagantaa meeshaa waraanaa niwukilaaraa ishii irratti qoqqobbiiwwan haaraa akka kaa'u beeksise.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Donald Trump ayaa ku dhawaaqay inu cunaqabateyn cusub kuso rogayo Kuuriyada Waqooyi kaaso la xiriira barnaamijkeeda hubka nukliyeerka.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ኣሜሪካ ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ብምኽንያት ሰሜን ኮርያ ተካይዶ ዘላ መደብ ኒዩክሌር ኣብ ልዕሊ እታ ሃገር ሓደሽቲ ማዕቀባት ከምዘንበሩ ኣፍሊጦም።

data.eng: The king of Saudi Arabia issues a decree allowing women to be issued driving licenses by June 2018.
data.aaf: Saqud Qarabiyah Amoyti Sayyo Illa 2018 Fanah Babu beyti Sumaqata kah Yacena Inah Amrisa Kukta Teyyeqe.
data.amh: የሳውዲ አረቢያው ንጉስ ሴቶች የመንጃ ፍቃድ እንዲያገኙ የሚያዘውን ደንብ በሰኔ 2018 አፀደቁ።
data.orm: Mootiin Saawud Arabiyaa hanga ji'a waxabajjii bara 2018 tiitti labsii akka dubartoonni eeyyama konkolaaachisummaa fudhatan deegaru baasan.
data.som: Boqorka Sacuudi Carabiya ayaa soo saaray sharci u oggolaanaya dumarka in la siiyo rukhsadaha baabuur wadidda marka la gaaro Juun 2018.
data.tir: ንጉስ ስዑዲ ዓረብ ካብ ሰነ 2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣትሒዙ ደቂ ኣነ ስትዮ ፍቓድ ምዝዋር ክረኽባ ዝፈቅድ ደንቢ ኣውፂኦም።

data.eng: The United Kingdom's Monarch Airlines goes into financial bankruptcy administration, suspending all flights, cancelling 300 thousand bookings, and leaving tens of thousands of passengers stranded.
data.aaf: UK Monereke Qaran Merayti Maliya kasara xinisoh Addat cule፣ Inkih tan Haditeeta Dukteh፣ 300 Alfih Arac mabuxute Bayisak፣ Taban Alfitel Lowinta Safaral Aylahiteenih
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ሞናርክ አየር መንገድ በደረሰበት የፋይናንስ ኪሳራ ምክንያት ሁሉንም በረራዎች ሲታገዱ ፣ 300 ሺህ የበረራ ጉዞዎች ምዝገባ እንዲሁም በአሥር ሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ በራሪዎች መንቀሳቀስ ባለመቻላቸው በመደረሰባቸው የመንገደኞች መጎሳቆል ሳቢያ የድርጅቱን አስተዳደር ለሶስተኛ ወገን አሳልፎ ለመስጠት ተገዷል።
data.orm: Daandiin Qilleensaa Yuunayitid Kiingidem Monaarch balalii hunda adda kutuun, galmee balalii imaltootaa kuma 300 haquun, akkasumas imaltoota kumoota kudhaniin lakka'aman akka danqaman gochuun bulchiinsa kisaaraa faayinaansiitti seene.
data.som: Shirkada diyaaradaha Boqortooyada Midowday ee Ingiriisaka ayaa gashay khasaare maaliyadeed, waxayna joojisay dhammaan duullimaadyadii, waxayna baajisay 300 kun oo ballan, ayan katagtay ka tagtay tobanaan kun oo rakaab ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ እትርከብ ሞናርክ ኤየርላይንስ ኣብ ምምሕዳር ቁጠባዊ ጥፈሻ ኣቲያ፣ ብሰንኩ ድማ ንኩሉ በረራታት ደው ኣቢላ፣ 300 ሽሕ መዝገብ መገሻታት ሰሪዛ፣ ከምኡ'ውን ብዓሰርተታት ኣሽሓት ዝቝጸሩ ተጓዓዝቲ ኣብታ ሃገር ሓዲግ ኮይኖም።

data.eng: The Federal Communications Commission approves Google's plan to restore some cell phone service in hurricane-hit Puerto Rico with Project Loon balloons.
data.aaf: Bangaleeshik xanahaddal Sari fabric boyler bakaqat 10 nmu qidak xarzanite mudumte.
data.amh: በአውሎ ንፋስ በተመታችው ፖርቶ ሪኮ ውስን የሞባይል ስልክ አገልግሎትን መልሶ ለማስጀመር ታስቦ በወጣው የሎን ባሉንስ የጉግል ፕሮጀክት እቅድን የፌዴራል ግንኙነት ኮሚሽኑ አፅድቋል።
data.orm: Koomishiniin koomunikeeshinii Federaalaa karoora Googiliin naannoolee Puwertoo Riikoo obombolettiin rukutamaniif pirojektii afuuffee Looniin bilbiloota socha'aa bakka deebisuuf jedhuuf eeyyama kenne.
data.som: Guddiga Isgaarsiinta Federaalka ayaa ansixiyay qorshaha shirkada Google ee dib loogu soo celinayo qaar ka mid ah adeegga taleefanka gacanta kadib markii ay duufaani ku dhufatay jasiirada Puerto Rico, iyado loo raacayo Mashruuca Loon balloon.
data.tir: ከማዕበል ኣብ ዝተጠቕዐት ፖርቶሪኮ ንዝተቛረፀ ኣገልግሎት ሞባይል ስልኪ ንምቕፃል ጉግል ብፕሮጀክት ሉንስ ባሉንስ ንዝሓዞ መደብ ኮሚሽን ፌዴራል ኮሚዩኒኬሽን ኣፅዲቑዎ።

data.eng: The New York Police Department and London's Metropolitan Police Service open investigations into alleged sexual assault allegations against the American film producer Harvey Weinstein.
data.aaf: Niyorkik Boliis mirac kee londanak Metreboloiyan Boliis Ayfaf Amerakal Filmi tamruto Harvey wanistayinil Nabsi faxi Digaalahweqa kal gacak fokaqo aba fakteh.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው የፊልም አምራች ሃርቬይ ዌይንስታይን ወሲባዊ ጥቃት ፈፅመዋል ተብለው በመጠርጠራቸው የኒው ዮርክ ፖሊስ መምሪያ እና የለንደኑ የሜትሮፖሊታን ፖሊስ አገልግሎት ምርመራዎችን ከፍተዋል።
data.orm: Kutaan poolisii magaalaa Niiyorkii fi Tajajjilli poolisii Mootiropolitani Landan dhimma himata gudeddii qopheessaa filmii lammii Ameerikaa Haarvey Winisten irratti dhiyaate irratti qorannoo geggessuu eegale.
data.som: Waaxda Boliska New York iyo Adeegga Boliska magaalladda London waxay ayaa bilaabay baadhitaano ku saabsan edeeynta kufsiga ee lagu eedeeyey filin soo saaraha Harvey Weinstein.
data.tir: ዲፓርትመንት ፖሊስ ኒው ዮርክን ኣገልግሎት ፖሊስ ለንደንን ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣሰናዳኢ ፊልሚ ሃርቬይ ዌይንስቴይን ንዝቐረቡ ጥርዓናት ፆታዊ መጥቃዕቲ ምፅራይ ጀሚሮም።

data.eng: The Board of Directors of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences decides to strip Harvey Weinstein of membership following several allegations of predatory sexual behavior.
data.aaf: Abgagoyi Tasawir fananen kee saynis Akaxamih Xayroterote borxi Mango Nabsi Fayxi Weloola Galtite Katayak Harvi Wastainen Adoytiinuk Ugutuh Argiqle::
data.amh: የእንቅስቃሴ ስዕል ስነ -ጥበባት እና ሳይንስ አካዳሚ የዳይሬክተሮች ቦርድ በርካታ የወሲብ ባህሪ ወንጀል ክሶችን ተከትሎ ሃርቪ ዋይንስቲንን ከአባልነት ለማውጣት ወስኗል።
data.orm: Boordiin daayirekterota akkaadaamii Aartii Mooshin pikcheersii fi sayinsii Haarveey Weenistan sababa himannaa hedduu amala quunnamtii saalaatiin walqabatee miseensumma irra kaasuuf murteesse.
data.som: Guddiga mamulka waxbarashada Farshaxanka Sawirrada iyo Sayniska ayaa go'aansaday inay ka xilwareejiyaan Harvey Weinstein xubinnimada ka dib dhowr eedooyin oo la xiriira habdhaqan galmo hore.
data.tir: ቦርድ ዳይሬክተራት ኣካዳሚ ስነ ጥበብ ፊልምን ሳይንስን ብርክት ብዝበሉ ተርእዮታት ፆታዊ መጥቃዕቲ ክስታት ንዝቐንዝቐረቦ ሃርቬይ ዌይንስታይን ካብ ኣባልነት ንምብራር ወሲኑ።

data.eng: President Nursultan Nazarbayev of Kazakhstan announces that the Kazakh language will begin using a Latin script, rather than the current Cyrillic script.
data.aaf: Kazakistan Berezixanti Nursultan Nazarbayev Kazike Af Awakleh yan sirilike Carfite Aysuk Latin Carfoofit Antifiquk Qimbiselem Yiysixige.
data.amh: የካዛኪስታን ፕሬዚደንት ኑርሱልጣን ናዛርባይቭ ካዛክ kንk ሲርሊክ ፊደላት በመተው የላቲን ፊደላትን እንደሚጠቀም አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Kaazaakistaan Nursulxaan Naazarbaayev afaan Kaazaak kan amma jiru qubee Saayirilik malee qubee Laatinii fayyadamuu akka eegalamu beeksise.
data.som: Madaxwaynaha Kazakhstan Nursultan Nazarbayev wuxuu ku dhawaaqay in luqadda Kazakh ay bilaabi doonto adeegsiga farta Laatiinka.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ካዛክስታን ኑር ሱልጣን ናዛርባዬቭ ቋንቋ ኮዛክ ፊደላት ሲይሪሊክ ምጥቃም ገዲፉ ብፊዳላት ላቲን ምስራሕ ክጅምር ዕላዊ ገይሮም ።

data.eng: A North Korean defector claims children are being born with deformities near North Korea's nuclear testing site.
data.aaf: Kilbti kuriyak nakusele Alaaqa kiblati kuriyak nukleer gibati Fanteenah xaqul Dagar Nakusi luk yoboke.
data.amh: ከሰሜን ኮሪያ ያመለጠው ግለሰብ በሰሜን ኮሪያ ኒውክለር ማብለያ መሞከሪያ አጠገብ እየተወለዱ ያሉ ልጆች ከአካላዊ ችግሮች ጋር እየተዎለዱ እንደሆነ ተናገረ።
data.orm: Biyya Kooriyaa Kaabaa ganee kan bahe tokko bakka qorannoo niyukilaaraa Kooriyaa Kaabaatti dhiyootti ijoolleen hir'ina qaamaa qaban dhalataa akka jiran dubbate.
data.som: Masuul ka goostay Kuuriyada Waqooyi ayaa ku andacoonaya in meesha u dhow goobta tijaabada nukliyeerka ee Kuuriyada Waqooyi ay ku dhashaan caruur naafaysan.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰሜን ኮሪያ ኣብ ጥቓ ነቑጣ ፈተነ ኑክሊየር ህፃናት ብልሹው ቅርፂ ሒዞም ከምዝውለዱ ሓደ ካብ ሰሜን ኮሪያ ሰሊሙ ዝመፀ ሰብ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: U.S. President Donald Trump visits South Korea amidst a crisis with North Korea.
data.aaf: Ameerikah Berezixanti Barak Obama Vezuula Ameerikah Amnisiyah Taqabi kinim Yascase Amri Yifrimen.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ዶናልድ ትረምፕ ከሰሜን ኮሪያ ጋር ያለው ቀውስ እንዳለ ሆኖ ወደ ደቡብ ኮሪያን ለጉብኝት ተገኙ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Doonaald Tiraamp waldhabdeen Kooriyaa Kaabaa wajjin utuu jiruu Kooriyaa Kibbaa daawwate.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Donald Trump ayaa booqday Kuuriyada Koonfureed wakhti ay xalad culus ay kala dhaxtaalo Kuuriyada Waqooyi.
data.tir: ኣመሪካዊ ፕረዚደንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ናብታ ምስ ሰሜን ኮርያ ቅልውላው ዘለዋ ደቡብ ኮርያ ዑደት ይፍጽም።

data.eng: 22 police agents are wounded in Brussels when celebrations for Morocco's 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification turn violent.
data.aaf: Morokko 2018 Baad kasih qalaylih Kasitoh Waynabo xayowte waqadi 22 Boliisite Awlisa birasilesil Mudumte.
data.amh: በብራሰልስ የሞሮኮ ደጋፊዎች ሃገራቸው ለ2018 የፊፋ የአለም ዋንጫ በመላፏ ሲያደርጉ በነበረው ፈንጠዚያ ወደ ረብሻ ተለውጦ 22 የፖሊስ አባላት ቆሰሉ።
data.orm: gammachuun tapha calallii waancaa FIFA Morokoo bara 2018'ii gara jeequmsaattii jijjiiramuu isatiin miseensonnii poolisii Braasels 22 mada'aniiru.
data.som: Magaalada Brussels ayaa lagu dhaawacay 22 askari kadib markii dabaaldaga guusha Morocco ee isreebreebka Koobka Adduunka ee 2018 ay iskubadashay qalalaase.
data.tir: ኣብ ብሮክሰል ብምኽንያት በዓላት ናይቲ ኣብ ሞሮኮ ንጽዋዕ ዓለም 2018 ተጋጣሚት ኮይና ብምሕላፋ ናብ ጎነጽ ድሕሪ ምቕያሩ 22 ኣባላት ፖሊስ ተጉዲኦም።

data.eng: Former Zimbabwe finance minister Ignatius Chombo, who was arrested during Operation Restore Legacy, is charged in Harare Magistrate’s Court with three counts of fraud, abuse of power, and corruption.
data.aaf: Dumahih Mozabikik Malliyah Malaak Ignatius Chombo obrershioni gitakIroh Qari Bicise waqadi Lowsis gubat aseh ya Hararek Majarat Sangarah Buxxal Sidiicamal Umadoobisak, Miraciinut Elle Facxintanal Atifiqe wayiya kee Atlaake Galtil Melkisime.
data.amh: ወደነበርንበት እንመለስ በሚል በተጀመረው ኦፕሬሽን የተያዘው የቀድሞ የዝምባብዌ የገንዘብ ሚኒስቴር ኢግናተስ ቾምቦ በሃራሬ ማጀስትሬት ፍርድ ቤት በሶስት ክሶች እንዲከሰስ ተደረገ፤ እነዚህም ክሶች ማጭበርበር፣ ስልጣንን ያለ አግባብ መጠቀም እና ሙስና ናቸው።
data.orm: Ministeerri Galiiwwanii Zimbaabuwee duraanii Iginaatiyoos Choomboo yeroo duula Duudha deebisu keessa kan To'atamanii turan yakkoota sadeen, burjaajessu,aangoo seeraan ala fayyadamuu fi malaammaltummaadhaan Hararee mana murtii Magistraatesitti himataman.
data.som: Wasiirkii hore ee maaliyadda Zimbabwe Ignatius Chombo, oo la xidhay intii lagu jiray Hawlgalkii soo celinta dhaxalka, ayay ku soo oogtay Maxkamadda Magaaladda Harare saddex dacwadood oo la xidhiidha khiyaano, ku isticmaak awoodeed, iyo musuqmaasuq.
data.tir: ብወፍሪ ሪስቶር ሌጋሲ ዝተኣሰረ ነበር ሚኒስትር ገንዘብ ዙምባቤዌ ኢግናትዮስ ቾምቦ ኣብ ታሕተዋይ ቤት ፍርዲ ሃራሬ ቀሪቡ ብምጭብርባር፣ ስልጣን ብዘ ይ ኣግባብ ብምጥቃምን ብግዕዝይናን ሰለስተ ገበ ናት ተኸሲሱ ።

data.eng: A European Union appeal committee votes to reauthorise the use of glyphosate as a herbicide for a five-year period.
data.aaf: Awrobah Inkiinok Yolmataka Mkaado glyphosate Coox Daylite Konna SanatihGidehQagitak Manfaqatan Kah Asanah Xongolo Aceele.
data.amh: የአውሮፓ ህብረት የይግባኝ ኮሚቴ ግላይፎሴትን እንደ ፀረ-አረም በአምስት ዓመት ጊዜ ውስጥ ለመጠቀም እንደገና ለመፍቀድ ድምጽ ይሰጣል።

data.som: Guddiga racfaanka ee Midowga Yurub ayaa u codeeyay in dib loo fasaxo isticmaalka glyphosate sida geedaha in muddo shan sano ah.
data.tir: ይግባይ ዝሰምዕ ኮሚተ ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረት ግሊፎሰት ንሓሙሽተ ዓመት ከም ጸረ-ባልዕ ጌርካ ክትጥቀመሉ ከም ብሓድሽ ክፍቀድ ድምጺ ሂቡ።

data.eng: Apple Inc. faces backlash and lawsuits after admitting to slowing down the speed on some of their older phones deliberately. ,
data.aaf: Inki inki telefuunitte fayayuh sisikuk Addahyiya aminuk Ogolak Apple Inc.
data.amh: አፕል ኢንክ አንዳንድ የድሮ ስልኮቻቸውን ፍጥነትን ሆን ተብሎ መቀነስን አምኖ መቀበልን አስመልክቶ የፍርድ ቤት ክሶች እንዲሁም ትችት ደርሶባቸዋል።
data.orm: Aappil Ink. beekaa bilbila isaanii durii muraasa ariitii gadi buusuu isaa amanuu isaan mormii fi himati seeraa isa quunname.
data.som: Shirkadda Apple Inc. ayaa wajahaysa falcelin iyo dacwado kadib markii ay si ukas ah ay xawaraaha kagaabiyeen taleefana ay soo saaraan qaar Kamid ah.
data.tir: ኩባንያ ኣፕል (ኣፕል ኢንክ) ደይ መደይ ኢሉ ንገሊኡ ናይ ቀደም ተሌፎናቱ ፍጥነቶም ከም ዝነከየ ድሕሪ ምእማኑ ተሪር ግብረ-መልስን ክስታትን ኣጋጢሙዎ።

data.eng: North Korea’s foreign ministry, in an official statement, says the latest United Nations sanctions are an act of war and are, in effect, a complete economic blockade.
data.aaf: Israil Miraacini Ayro mawqa ursalemil Geytimta Cafota Qarwa 153 Xisne Sumaqite Faticiselon. Qagitak kaddu katayta Alsitel Aki 11,000 faticisoonuh Ikraarisen.
data.amh: የሰሜን ኮሪያ የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር በይፋ በሰጠው መግለጫ የቅርብ ጊዜው የተባበሩት መንግስታት ማዕቀቦች የጦርነት ጥቃት መሆናቸውን እንዲሁም ሙሉ በሙሉ የኢኮኖሚ እገዳውን መተግበርን የሚያሳዩ ናቸው ብለዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri dhimma alaa Kooriyaa Kaabaa, ibsa isaa keessatti, qoqqobbiiwwan Mootummoota Gamtoomanii inni boodanaa, gochaadhaan, daangesuun guutummaa diinagdee, gochaa waraanaa ti waraanas jedhe.
data.som: Wasaaradda arrimaha dibadda ee Kuuriyada Waqooyi, ayaa war rasmi ah oo ay soo saartay ku sheegtay in cunaqabateyntii ugu dambeysay ee Qaramada Midoobay ay tahay fal dagaal, isla markaana ay tahay, xayiraad dhaqaale oo dhameystiran.
data.tir: ኣሜሪካ ዘንበረቶም ሓደሽቲ ማዕቀባት ስጉምቲ ኲናት ኢሉ’ውን ሙሉእ ቁጠባዊ ማዕገትቲ እዩ እንትብል ሚኒስቴር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ሰሜን ኮርያ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton are voted the most admired man and woman in the United States, according to Gallup's annual poll.
data.aaf: Globe Ligidi Ayuunti Ambalooli Elle Yascasenal Barak Obama kee Hirali kiliton Ameericah Inkinol Kaxaam asakatle Mara Akuk Doorimen::
data.amh: በጋሉፕ አመታዊ የህዝብ አስተያየት ባራክ ኦባማ እና ሂላሪ ክሊንተን በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ እጅግ የተደነቁ ወንድ እና ሴት ተደርገው ተመርጠዋል ።
data.orm: Akka dhaabatni galap yaada uummata irraa walitti qabeen ibsetti, Baarak Obaamaa fi Hilaarii kilintan namicha fi dubartii hunda caalaa ajaa'ibsifaman ta'uun filatamaniiru.
data.som: Barack Obama iyo Hillary Clinton ayaa loo codeeyay ninka iyo naagta loogu qadarinta badan inay kayihiin dalka Maraykanka, sida ay muujineyso codbixinta Gallup ee sanadlaha ah.
data.tir: ባራክ ኦባማን ሂላሪ ክሊንተንን ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ብዝለዓለ ደረጃ ዝነኣዱ ሰብኣይን ዝነኣዳ ኣንስተይትን ከምዝኾኑ ጋላፕ ዝተብሃለ መዐቀኒ ርእይቶ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Iran enforces a ban on teaching English in elementary schools, calling it a "cultural invasion" by the West.
data.aaf: Iraan Inikhyto Tu-Barittoh Buxaaxi IngilizAf Barisaanam wasaanam Abtol kah asanah Abte፣ Aroculma Baad “Qaadda Warara”” Axcuk Secte::
data.amh: ኢራን በአንደኛ ደረጃ ትምህርት ቤቶች እንግሊዝኛን የማስተማር ክልከላን ተግባራዊ አደረገች ፣ የምዕራቡ ዓለም “የባህል ወረራ” በማለትም ጠርታዋለች።
data.orm: Iraan dhorkaa barumsa Afaan Inglizii mana barnoota sadarkaa tokkoffaa irratti kennamuu hojiirra oolchiteetti, dhaala aadaa warra dhihaa jechuunis waamtetti.
data.som: Iiraan ayaa dhaqan galisay mamnuucidda luuqada Ingiriisiga in lagu barto dugsiyada hoose, waxayna ku tilmaamtay "duulimaad dhaqameed" oo reer galbeedku ku soo qaadeen.
data.tir: ኢራን ባህላዊ ወራር ምዕራባውያን ንዝበለቶ ኣስተምህሮ ቋንቋ እንግሊዝ ኣብ ቀዳማይ ብርኪ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ንኸይወሃብ ዝተገበረ እገዳ ኣተግቢራቶ።

data.eng: Zimbabwean politician Roy Bennett is killed in a helicopter crash near Raton, New Mexico, United States.
data.aaf: Zembabek siyaasa tuyaaxigi Roy Bennett helkopter abteh tan radimite rabeeh reetiyoon new meksiiko Ameerikak.
data.amh: የዚምባብዌ ፖለቲከኛ ሮይ ቤኔት በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኒው ሜክሲኮ ራቶን አቅራቢያ በሄሊኮፕተር አደጋ ህይወቱ አልፏል።
data.orm: Namni siyaasaa Zimbaabuwee Rooyi Beneet balaa kufaatiin caccabuu heelikoptera yunaaytid isteetis,new meeksiikoo nannawaa Raaton keessattii isa qaqqabeen lubbuun isaa darbe.
data.som: Siyaasiga reer Zimbabwe Roy Bennett ayaa ku dhintay shil diyaaradeed oo ka dhacay meel u dhow magaalada Raton, ee gobolka New Mexico, ee Mareykanka.
data.tir: ፖለቲከኛ ዚምባብዌ ሮይ ቤኔት ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ጥቓ ራኮን ዝተበሃለ ከባቢ ኒው ሜክሲኮ ኣብ ዝርከብ ብዘጋጠመ ሓደጋ ነፋሪት ህይወቱ ሓሊፉ።

data.eng: In American football, the Philadelphia Eagles win the National Football Conference, defeating the Minnesota Vikings 38–7.
data.aaf: Amerikal Ibi Koqsoh Addal Amerikak Agat Ibi koqsoh liigih Addak minisootah Vikings 38–7. tan digiraba Sahdayti baxih dadal hormone fokaqoqa Ascocite edde anuk Qusba sitalih walalalk sintigeyil faticisen.
data.amh: በአሜሪካን ፉትቦል የፊላደልፊያ ኤግልስ የ ሚኔሶታ ቫይኪንግን 38 ለ 7 በሆነ ውጤት የብሄራዊ ፉትቦል ኮንፍረንስን አሸነፉ።
data.orm: tapha kubbaa miilaa Ameerikaatiin gareen Filaadolfiyaa Iigils garee Minisootaa Vaayiking 38-7 injifachuun dorgommii kubbaa miilaa Koonfiransii biyyaalessa mo'atan.
data.som: Kubbadda cagta Mareykanka, Philadelphia Eagles waxay ku guuleystaan Shirka Kubadda Cagta Qaranka, iyagoo kaga badiyay Minnesota Vikings 38 - 7.
data.tir: ኣብ ጸወታ ክዑሶ እግሪ ኣመሪካ፣ ጋንታ ፊላደልፍያ ኢግልዝ ንጋንታ ሚነሶታ ቫይኪንግዝ 38 ብ 7 ድሕሪ ምርታዓ፣ ጎብለል ሃገራዊ ማሕበር ክዑሶ እግሪ ኮይኑ ተዓዊቱ።

data.eng: Seven people die in clashes between security forces and worshippers taking part in an Ethiopian Orthodox religious ceremony marking Timkat (Epiphany) in Woldiya, Amhara, Ethiopia, over the weekend.
data.aaf: Amcari Rakaakayak Welxiyah Magaalak Timkat (Epiphany) Elle Yasakaxen Itiyyobiyak Katolik Dinih Meqem kabanal Saay Cayliteeta kee SaqoltiFanal Yekkeh YanBoodut Malcina Marite Edde rabte.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ውስጥ በአማራ ክልል ወልዲያ ከተማ በሳምንቱ መጨረሻ የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ሃይማኖታዊ ሥነ ሥርዓት ጥምቀት በማክበር ላይ የነበሩ ምእመናንና በፀጥታ ኃይሎች መካከል በተፈጠረ ግጭት ሰባት ሰዎች ሞተዋል።
data.orm: Walitti bu'iinsa humnoota nageenyaa fi waaqeffattoota yaadannoo ayyaana Cuuphaa (Epiphany) amantii Ortoodoksii Itiyoophiyaa Waldiyaa, Amaara, Itoophiyaa keessatti guyyoota boqonnaa torbanii irra geggeeffame irratti hirmaatan gidduutti mudateen namoonni torba du'an.
data.som: Toddobo qof ayaa ku dhintay isku dhacyo dhex maray ciidamada ammaanka iyo dad cibaadeysanayay oo ka qeyb galay xaflad diimeedka Orthodox ka Itoobiya ee lagu xusayay Timkat (Epiphany) taas oo ka dhacday Woldiya, gobolka Amxaarada, Itoobiya, dhammaadkii toddobaadkan.
data.tir: ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ክልል ኣምሐራ ኣብ ወልዲያ ኣብ መወዳእታ ሰሙን በዓል ጥምቀት ሃይማኖት ኦርቶዶክስ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝኽበረሉ እዋን ኣብ መንጐ ሓይሊታት ፀጥታን ኣመንቲን ብዝትፈጠረ ጐንፂ ሸውዓተ ሰባት ሞይቶም ።

data.eng: A judge in Amsterdam delays the extradition of the man suspected of a lethal stabbing on the Bruges Market Square, citing concerns over the living conditions in Belgian jails.
data.aaf: Amesterxamal geytima inki Garkure belejuse casbih buxah Addat lehyan Mano calatih taqabite Ascasuk Bergul Qadaaga gasol Qideeni Gadanam kak wagisen num tabisak kah yacen inah Amrisa.
data.amh: በቤልጅየን እስር ቤቶች ውስጥ ባለው የኑሮ ሁኔታ ስጋቶችን በመጥቀስ በብሩግ የገበያ አደባባይ ላይ በግድያ ውጊያ የሰው ማጥፋት ወንጀል የተጠረጠረውን ሰው አሳልፎ የመስጠት ውሳኔ በአምስተርዳም የሚገኝ አንድ ዳኛ አዘግይቷል።
data.orm: Abbaan seeraa Amisterdaam keessaa dabarfamee kennamuu namicha waraansa hamaa Iskuweerii Gabaa Biruuges irraan shakkame, yaaddoo haalota jireenya manneen hidhaa Beeljiyeem caqasuun tursiise.
data.som: Garsoore ku sugan Amsterdam ayaa dib u dhigay in loo gacan geliyo ninka looga shakisan yahay in uu ka geystay fal dil ah oo ka dhacay fagaaraha suuqa Bruges, isaga oo sabab uga dhigay walaaca laga qabo xaalada nololeed ee xabsiyada Belgian.
data.tir: ሓደ ዳይና ኣምስተርዳም ኣብ ቤት ማእሰርቲ ቤልጂየም ንዘሎ ኩነታት መነባብሮ ብምጥቃስ ኣብ ኣደባባይ ዕዳጋ ብሩጌስ ብኻራ ሰባት ብምውጋእ ሓደጋ ኣስዒቡ እዩ ተባሂሉ ንዝተጠርጠረ ሰብ ናብታ ሃገር ንምምላስ ዝተገበረ ውሳነ ኣፅኒሕዎ።

data.eng: Scientists discover a large colony of more than 750,000 pairs of Adélie penguins on the Danger Islands in Antarctica.
data.aaf: Sanis tutagago Antartiikal Taqabik yan Fordal 750,000 tiyak addaaga Axeli hengiwan Rakaakayal genih.
data.amh: ተመራማሪዎች በአንታርክቲካ በዴንጀር ደሴት ላይ ከፍተኛና ቁጥራቸው ከ750000 ጥንድ በላይ የሆኑ አዴሌ ፔንግዊኖችን አገኙ።
data.orm: Saayintistoonni gurmuu guddaa pengiyuunii Addellee cimdii 750,000 caalan Odolaa Daanjerii Antarkaatikaa keessaa irratti argatan.
data.som: Saynisyahannadu waxay ogaadeen in ka badan 750,000 oo xayawanka lo yaqaano penguins Adélie ay halis ku haysato jasiirada Antarctica.
data.tir: ሳይንቲስታት ልዕሊ 750,000 ፅምዲ ዓልየት ኣዴሊያ ፔንጊዮን ኣብ ኣፀገምቲ ደሴታት ኣንታርክቲካ ረኺቦም።

data.eng: A UNICEF report says that 20% of girls under 18 are married, compared to 25% ten years ago, with an estimated 25 million marriages having been prevented in the past decade.
data.aaf: UNICEF Gbaaqi 18 Sanatak Adda 20 Sanatak Guba Baxuw 20% Digibanam Kini, Tabna Sanatak Afal 25% Lih Wagtinawak, Waraye Tabna Sanatih Addat Wali 25 Milyoon Tekke Digibite Waseenih.
data.amh: የዩኒሴፍ ዘገባ ከ 18 ዓመት በታች ልጃገረዶች 20% ያገቡ ናቸው ፣ ከአሥር ዓመት በፊት ከ 25% ጋር ሲነፃፀር ፣ ባለፉት አስር ዓመታት ውስጥ በግምት 25 ሚሊዮን የሚሆኑ ጋብቻዎች ከመፈፀም ተከልክለዋል።
data.orm: Gabaasni UNICEF ijooleen dubaraa umrii 18 gadii 20% ta'an akka heerumanii jiran, kan waggoota kudhan duraa 25% wajjin yeroo walbira qabamu, waggaa kurnan darbe keessa tilmaamaan gaa'iloonni miliyoona 25 ta'an hambifamaniiru.
data.som: Warbixin ay soo saartay hay’adda UNICEF ayaa lagu sheegay in 20% gabdhaha da’doodu ka yar tahay 18 sano la guursado, halka 25% ay ahaayeen toban sano ka hor, iyadoo lagu qiyaasay 25 milyan oo guur ah laga hortagay tobankii sano ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: ዩኒሴፍ ዘውጽኦ ጸብጻብ ከም ዝሕብሮ 20 ሚእታዊት ካብተን ትሕቲ 18 ዝዕድሚአን ኣዋልድ ምርዑዋት እየን፣ እዚ ከኣ ምስቲ ዓሰርተ ዓመት ይገብር ዝነበረ 25 ሚእታዊት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓሰርተ ዓመት ብገምጋም 25 ሚልዮን መርዓ ተኸልኪሉ እዩ።

data.eng: British music journalism magazine New Musical Express (NME) issues its final print edition after 66 years, becoming a purely digital medium.
data.aaf: BiritaniyalXaagi Qawaytisiyi majalatite Qusba Gaditel Asbires ( NME) 66 Sanotak Lakal Ilacabo Batbaqak Ayaqele፣ Inkihiy Xijitan fanteena Akkele.
data.amh: የብሪቲሹ የሙዚቃ ጋዜጥ የሆነው ኒው ሚውዚካል ኤክስፕረስ (NME) ከ66 አመት አገልግሎት በ|ላ የመጨረሻ እትሙን አወጣ፤ ከዚህ በ|ላም ሙሉ ለሙሉ በዲጂታል የሚወጣ ይሆናል።
data.orm: Barruun gaazexessummaa muuziqaa Biriitish Niwu Muzikal Eksipres (NME) guutummatti miidiyaa dijitaalawaa tahuun, waggoota 66 booda gulaallii maxxansamu isaa dhumaa kenne.
data.som: joornaalka muusigga ee British New Musical Express (NME) wuxuu soo saaray daabacaaddii ugu dambaysay 66 sano ka dib, isagoo noqday sootabiye casri ah.
data.tir: ናይ ብሪታንያ ናይ ሙዚቃ ጋዜጠኝነት መፅሄት ዝኾነ ኒው ሙዚካል ኤክስፕሬስ ( ኤን ኤም ኢ ) ድሕሪ ናይ 66 ዓመታት ሕትመት ነቲ ናይ መወዳእታ ዝኾነ ሕታሙ ዕላዊ ገይሩ ፤ ድሕሪ ደጊም ድማ ብዲጅታል መንገዲ ጥራሕ ክቕፅልዩ ።

data.eng: A second package presumed to have been sent by the bomber is discovered in a FedEx facility near Austin-Bergstrom International Airport.
data.aaf: Qarkakisa Rube Axcuk KakWadisen Nammeyhyto Nabba Austin-Bergstrom Baad Tayarah Booxah Xaqul Geytimta FedEx Aracih Addat Geytime.
data.amh: ፈንጂ በሚያፈነዳ ሰው እንደተላከ የሚገመት ሁለተኛ ጥቅል በኦስቲን በርግስትሮም አለም አቀፍ አየር መንገድ አቅራቢያ በሚገኝ የፌድኤክስ ተቋም ውስጥ ጊዜ ተገኘ።
data.orm: Shororkeessaa irraa ergame jedhame kan shakkamu baattoon mi'aa lammaffaan naannoo Awustiin buufata xiyyaaraa idil addunyaa Bergeesitiroom dhaabbata FeedEks jedhamu keessatti argame.
data.som: Guntin labaad oo loo malaynayo in uu soo diray qofka is qarxiyay ayaa laga helay xarun FedEx oo u dhow garoonka caalamiga ah ee Austin-Bergstrom.
data.tir: ካብቲ ነታጕ ዝፍፅም ከምእትሰደደ ዝግመት ካልኣይ ጥቕላል ኣብ ጥቓ መዕርፎ ነፈርቲ ኦስቲን በርግስቶርም ኣብ ቤትፅሕፈት ምቕባል ህፁፅ መልእኽቲ ተረኺቡ።

data.eng: U.S. graphics processing unit producer Nvidia suspends all its tests of self-driving cars.
data.aaf: Ameerikak giraafiksih bicih exxa Nvidia soolisseh inki yan gibbatu beyan makaayinik.
data.amh: የአሜሪካ ግራፊክስ ፕሮሰሲንግ ዩኒት አምራች ንቪዲያ ሁሉንም በራስ-ተሽከርካሪ መኪናዎች ሙከራዎችን አግዷል።
data.orm: Oomishaan grafik pirosesiingi yuunitii U.S. Nividiyaan yaalii isaa konkolaataa ofiin of oofuu hunda adda kute.
data.som: Soo saaraha qaybta naqshadeynta Mareykanka Nvidia ayaa joojisay dhammaan tijaabooyinkeedii baabuurta is wada.
data.tir: ናይ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኣፍራዪ ግራፊክስ ፕሮሰሲንግ ዩኒት ዝኾነ ኩባንያ ኒቫዳ ብዘይ ዘዋሪ ኣብ ዝሽክርከራ ማካይን ዘካየዶ ፈተነ ኣቋሪፁ።

data.eng: Polish President Andrzej Duda vetoes a bill that would have demoted all communist-era military officers who served between 1944 and 1990 to private.
data.aaf: Boolanxih Berezixanti Anxirex Xuxa 1944 tan tan waktiteh Addal Ayfaf tece Koministih udur qakar saqolti Inkih Illa Canka fanah Addah haam abah Kukta Faticisen.
data.amh: የፖላንድ ፕሬዚደንት የሆኑት አንድረዜጅ ዱዳ በኮሚኒስት ጊዜ የተደረጉ ያገለገሉ ባለስጣናትን ስልጣን ዝቅ የሚያደርገውን ህግ ድምፅ በድምፅ የመሻር ስልጣናቸውን ተጠቅመቀወ ሻሩ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Poolaand Andirzeej Duudaa labsii aangawoota waraanaa bara koomunistii kan 1944 fi 1990 gidduu tajaajilan hunda sadarkaa isaanii gara dhuunfaatti jijjiiru aangoo isaa fayyadamee morme.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Poland Andrzej Duda ayaa diidey hindise sharciyeed kaas oo hoos u dhigi lahaa dhammaan saraakiishii milatariga ee xilligii shuuciyadda shaqeeyay intii u dhexeysay 1944 iyo 1990 si gaar ahan.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ፖላንድ ኣንድርዘጅ ዱዳ ካብ 1944 ክሳብ 1990 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ኣብ ዘበን ዴስነት ንዘገልገሉ ኩሎም ወተሃደራዊ መኮንናት ናብ ተራ ወተሃደርነት ክመልስ ዓሊሙ ንዝተፅሓፈ ረቒቕ ሕጊ ኣውዲቖምዎ።

data.eng: A study in Nature shows species which are visually unusual or attractive go extinct at higher rates.

data.amh: አንድ በተፈጥሮ ላይ የተደረገ ጥናት እንደሚያሳየው ያልተለመደ መልክ ያላቸው ዝርያዎች በከፍተኛ ደረጃ የመጥፋት አደጋቸው ይጨምራል።

data.eng: 8,500 prisoners are granted amnesty in Myanmar by President Win Myint.
data.aaf: Meynamaral 8,500 Takke Raysite berezixanti Qafuta Aben Win Myin.
data.amh: በማይናማር ፕሬዚደንት ዊን ሚይንት ለ8500 እስረኞች ምህረት አደረጉ።
data.orm: Mayaanmar keessatti sirreeffattamnonni seeraa 8500 pireezidanti Wiyin Miintiin dhiifamni godhafameefi.
data.som: Madaxwayna Myanmar Win Myint yaa cafiyay 8,500 oo maxbuus.
data.tir: ናይ ማይናማር ፕሬዚዳንት ዊን ሚይነት ን 8,500 እሱራት ምሕረት ገይሮም።

data.eng: On the anniversary of the Columbine High School massacre, thousands of students across the United States walk out of school to protest against school shootings.

data.amh: የኮሉመቢያን ትምህርት ቤት ግድያ የማስታወሻ ፕሮግራም ላይ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ከተላየያ አሜሪካ ክፍል ከመጡ ተማሪዎች ከትምህርት ቤቱ በእግር ጉዞ በመውጣት በትምህርት ቤት ላይ እየተደረጉ ያሉ ግድያዎችን በመቃወም ሰልፍ አደረጉ።
data.orm: Yeroo ajjeechaa duguggii mana barnootaa sadarkaa lammaffa Kolombiin irratti rawwatameef yaadannoon waggaa godhamaa jirutti barattootni Yunaytid Isteetis kumaatamni dhukaasaa manneen barnootaa irratti godhamu mormuun manneen barnootaa gadilakkisanii bahan.
data.som: Sannad guuradii ka soo wareegtay xasuuqii dugsiga Sare ee Columbine, kumanaan arday oo ku nool daafaha Mareykanka ayaa ka soo baxay dugsiyada si ay uga mudaaharaadaan toogashooyinka dugsiyada.
data.tir: ኣብ ዝኽሪ ጃምላዊ ቅትለት ቤት ትምህርቲ ካልኣይ ደረጃ ኮሎምቢን፣ ኣብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ተኹሲ ምኽፋት ተማሃሮ ተቓውሞኦም ንምግላጽ ኣብ መላእ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ካብ ኣብያተ ትምህርቲ ወጺኦም።

data.eng: Thailand expresses its interest in hosting the planned summit meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un.
data.aaf: Taylanxi US Berezixanti Xonlxi Tirambi kee Kiblati Kuriyah Saqal Kim Jong-un Fanal Tekkuk Ikraarimteh Sugte Saqolti Dafeyna Gexsisewoonuh Lon Fayxi Yescese.
data.amh: ታይላንድ በአሜሪካው ዶናልድ ትረምፕ እና በሰሜን ኮሪያው መሪ ኪም ኮንግ ኡን መካከል ሊደረግ የታቀደውን ውይይት ለማድረግ ፍላጎቷን አሳየች።
data.orm: Taayilaand marii Pirasdaantii U.S. Doonaald Tiraampii fi Hogganaa Kooriyaa Kaabaa Kiim Joong-Un gidduutti karoorfame qopheessuf fedhii akka qabdu ibsite.
data.som: Thailand ayaa shaacisay xiisaha ay u qabto martigelinta kulanka shir madaxeedka la qorsheeyay ee dhexmaraya Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Donald Trump iyo hoggaamiyaha Kuuriyada Waqooyi Kim Jong un.
data.tir: ታይላንድ ኣብ መንጎ ኣ መሪካዊ ፕረዚደንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕን መራሒ ሰሜን ኮርያ ኪም ጆንግ ኦንን ርክብ ክልቴኦም መራሕቲ ንምእንጋድ ድልየታ ገሊጻ።

data.eng: The government of Guyana reports that pirates attacked fishermen off the coast of neighboring Suriname.
data.aaf: Cugaane Sunarmi Baddih Xaqul Baddi Roddo Aba Kulum tayaqo Maysataka Tekkem Guyanah Doolat Xayose.
data.amh: የአጎራባች ሱሪናም ባህር ዳርቻ ላይ የባህር ወንበዴዎች ዓሣ አጥማጆችን ማጥቃታቸውን የጉያና መንግሥት ዘግቧል።
data.orm: Mootummaan Guyyaanaa saamtonni galaana irraa naannoo ollaa Surineemitti namoota qurxummii qaban akka haleelan gabaase.
data.som: Dowladda Guyana ayaa ku warramaysa in burcad badeeddu ay weerareen kalluumeysatada xeebaha dalka ay dariska yihiin ee Suriname.
data.tir: ከተርቲ ባሕሪ ኣብ ገምገም ባሕሪ ጐረቤት ሱሪናም ንዘፈፍቲ ዓሳ ከምዘጥቅዑ መንግስቲ ጉያና ኣፍሊጡ ።

data.eng: A new outbreak of the Ebola virus disease kills at least 17 people in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.aaf: Ximikratik Riboblik Kongo Qusba Iboola Dalkah Walli 17 Num Edde Rabeh.
data.amh: በዲሞክራቲክ ሪፐብሊክ ኮንጎ አዲስ የኢቦላ ቫይረስ በሽታ ወረርሽኝ ቢያንስ 17 ሰዎችን ገድሏል።
data.orm: Weerarri dhukkuba vaayirasii Iboolaa haaraan Rippaanilika Diimokiraatawaa Koongoo keessatti yoo xiqqaate namoota 17 ajjeese.
data.som: Cudurka fayraska ee Ebola oo si cusub usoo Laba kacleeyey ayaa ugu yaraan 17 qof ku dilay Jamhuuriyadda Dimuqraadiga ee Congo.
data.tir: ሓድሽ ለበዳ ቫይረስ ኢቦላ ኣብ ደሞክራስያዊት ሪፓብሊክ ኮንጎ ብውሑዱ 17 ሰባት ቀቲሉ።

data.eng: Prime Minister designate Giuseppe Conte gives up trying to form a government after President Sergio Mattarella earlier vetoed the nomination of technocrat Paolo Savona as Minister of Finance.
data.aaf: Naharsi Malaak Giuseppe Conte Berexixanti Sergio Mattarella Duma technocrat Paolo Savona Maliyah MalaakAbak ka Hemiklakal Doolat Bicisuh Gibatem Kak Tumbuluye.
data.amh: ፕሬዚደንት ሰርጂዮ ማታሬላ የቴክኖክራቱን ፓውሎ ሳቮና ለገንዘብ ሚኒስቴርነት መታጨቱን በድምፃቸው መሻራቸውን ተከትሎ በጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴሩ የተሾሞት ጁሴፔ ኮንቴ መንግስት ለመመስረት ሚደረገው እንቅስቃሴ ላይ ተስፋ ቆረጡ።

data.eng: The heat-related death toll in the Canadian province of Quebec rises to 70, with 34 of those occurring in Montreal.
data.aaf: Kanadak Kubek Gandah Addat Liqnat Xakabah Rabteh tan Mariteh Loowo Illa 70 Fayata Iye, Tahak Addak 34 Monitariyah Addal Raqen.
data.amh: በካናዳ ኪዩቤክ አውራጃ ውስጥ ከሙቀት ጋር ተያይዞ የሞቱ ሰዎች ቁጥር ወደ 70 ከፍ ብሏል ፣ ከእነዚህ ውስጥ 34ቱ በሞንትሪያል ውስጥ ተከስቷል።
data.orm: Hammi du'aa ho'a wajjin walqabatee mudatu kutaa bulchiinsa Kanaadaa Kiyuubek keessatti gara 70'tti yoo ol guddatu, 34 kan Montiriyaal keessatti mudateedha.
data.som: Dhimashada tirada kuleylka la xidhiidha ee gobolka Quebec ee Kanada ayaa gaartay 70, iyadoo 34 ka mid ah ay ka dhaceen Montreal.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ኣውራጃ ኲበክ ካናዳ ብሰንኪ ዋዒ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ናብ 70 ደይቡ፣ ካብዚኣቶም እቶም 34 ኣብ ሞንትሪያል ዝርከቡ እዮም።

data.eng: France knocks out Belgium from the World Cup, with France moving on to the final against either Croatia or England.
data.aaf: Xanaldu tiranbi AgatSaare Saxih gexekal sababah suber bool LII shamibiyan felaxelifiya mininite Qadoqaril luksuge memqem kaban bayisem qadoose.
data.amh: ፈረንሳይ ቤልጂየምን ከአለም ዋንጫ ጥላ ያለፈች ሲሆን ክሮሺያን ወይም እንግሊዝን ለፍፃሜ ትገጥማለች።
data.orm: Faransaayi Kirooshiyaa yookaan Engilaand wajjin isa dhumaa morkachuuf Beljiyeemiin Geeba Addunyaan ala goote,
data.som: Fransiiska ayaa Belgium ka reebtay koobka adduunka, iyadoo Fransiisku u gudbay ciyaarta koobka oo ay la ciyaari doonaan kroatia ama ingiriiska midkood.
data.tir: ፈረንሳይ ንቤልጅየም ካብ ግጥም ፅዋዕ ዓለም ክትወፅእ ገይራታ፤ ብውፅኢቱ ፈረንሳይ ፅዋዕ ንምውሳድ ምስ ክሮሺያ ወይ ኢንግላንድ ግጥም ክተካይድ እያ።

data.eng: Pakistan, Iran, China, and Russia agree on joint efforts against the Islamic State group in Afghanistan, in an effort to ensure peace and eliminate terrorism from the region.
data.aaf: Paakistaanaay iraanaay chaynaa kee ruusiya ittallih islaamik buttay afgaanistaanal tangayyet carbi aboonuh ittingey aben.
data.amh: ፓኪስታን፣ኢራን፣ቻይና እና ሩሲያ በአፍጋኒስታን የእስላማዊውን መንግስት እንቅስቃሴ በጋራ ለመከላከል እና ሽብርተኝነትንም ለማጥፋት ከስምምነት ደረሱ።
data.orm: Paakistaan, Iraan, Chaayinaa fi Ruusiyaan dhamaati nageenya buusuufi shororkeessummaa balleessuuf godhamu deggaruuf jecha walii galteen garee mootummaa Islaamawaa Afgaanistaan irratti hojjechuuf waliigalan.
data.som: Pakistan, Iiraan, Shiinaha, iyo Ruushka ayaa ku heshiiyay dadaallo wadajir ah oo ka dhan ah kooxda dowladda Islaamiga ah ee Afghanistan, si loo xaqiijiyo nabadda loona ciribtiro argagixisada gobolka.
data.tir: ፓኪስታን፣ ኢራን፣ ቻይናን ሩስያን ኣብ ኣፍጋኒስታን ኣንፃር እስላማዊ መንግስቲ ብሓባር ብምቅላስ ሰላም ንምዕሳልን ካብቲ ዞባ ግብረ ሽበራ ንምጥፋእን ተሰማሚዐን።

data.eng: In data collected by NASA's Juno spacecraft, an INAF team discovers suggestions of a new volcano close to the south pole of Jupiter's moon Io.
data.aaf: NASA Juno Qaran saaruk teskete Oyti፣ inki INAF Butta Alsa Gabi lekatih waltah Xaqul Qusba Boyna Ascasiyi Geyan
data.amh: በናሳ የጁኖ መንኩራኩር በተሰበሰበው መረጃ መሰረት፣የአይኤንኤፍ( INAF) ቡድን አባላት በጁፒተር ጨረቃ ደቡብ ዋልታ ላይ አዲስ የእሳተ ጎመራ እንደተገኘ አስረድተዋል።
data.orm: Daataa xiyyaara hawwaa NASA, Juunoo'n walitti qabame keessatti, gareen INAF poolii kaabaa addeessa Juppiiter loo tti dhiyaatee volkaanoon haaraa akka jiru yaada argate.
data.som: Xogta uu ururiyay dayax gacmeedka NASA ee Juno, kooxda INAF ayaa daaha ka qaaday talooyinka foolkaano cusub oo u dhow cirifka koonfureed ee dayaxa Jupiter Io.
data.tir: ሓደ ጉጅለ ብሄራዊ ትካል ኣስትሮ ፊዚክስ ካብ ናይ ናሳ መንኮራኹር ጁኖ ዝተኣከበ መረዳእታ መሰረት ብምግባር ኣብ ጥቓ ደቡባዊ ዋልታ ቁፅሪ 10 ወርሒ ጁፒተር ሓዱሽ እሳተ ጐመራ ክኽሰት ከምዝኽእል ሓሳብ ኣቕሪቡ።

data.eng: Iranian police arrest 46 people in fresh crackdowns on models and associated colleagues posting "immoral images" on Instagram.
data.aaf: Iran Boliiswa Moxelwa kee Tahat akabah kataysisil Inistagramal በ Instagram ላይ “Umah Tan Focite” Takarak 46 takke Marite Lowsis Gubat Hayte.
data.amh: የኢራን ፖሊስ በጀመረው አዲስ ስራ ከ ሞዴሎችን እና ስነ ምግባር የጎደላቸው ፎቶዎች በሚሉ ክስች ጋር በተያያዘ 46 ሰዎችን በቁጥጥር ስር አዋለ።
data.orm: Poolisoonni Iraan Modeelotaafi namoota hojilee isaan walfakkaatan keessatti hirmaatan kan toora Instagiramii irratti suuraalee safuu hin qabne gadilakkisan adabuuf jecha namoota 46 to'annaa jala oolche.
data.som: Booliiska Iiraan ayaa xidhay 46 qof oo ku guda jira abaabul cusub oo lagu qaadayo moodooyinka iyo asxaabtii la shaqaynaysay oo barta Instagram ka ku soo daabacaya "sawirro anshax darro ah".
data.tir: ፖሊስ ኢራን ኣብ ኢንስታግራም ‹‹ ዘይ ስነምግባራዊ ምስሊ ›› ጠቂዕኹም ብምባል ን 46 ሰባት ኣሲሩ ፤ እዚ ተግባር መቐፀልታ ናይ ʼቲ ኣብ ልዕሊ ሞዴላትን ተሓባበርቶምን ዘካይዶ ዞሎ ሓዱሽ መጥቃዕቲ ምኻኑʼዩ ።

data.eng: The White House announces $12 billion in bailouts for farmers and ranchers affected by recently imposed retaliatory tariffs.
data.aaf: Qaddo Qari Xayi Uddur Qideenih Yanin Cane Gacsal Biyaakiteh Tan Buqreh Xiina Saqah Xiinah 12 Milyoonih Cato Abeem Qadoose.
data.amh: ኋይት ሀውስ በቅርቡ ከውጪ የሚገቡ እቃዎች ላይ በሚጣሉ የታሪፍ ክፍያዎች ለተጎዱ አርሶ አደሮች እና አርብቶ አደሮች የ 12 ቢሊዮን ዶላር የዋስትና እርዳታ ድጋፍ እንደሚያደርግ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Waayit Haawos taarifa ija bahumsaa dhiyeenya hojiirra ooleen qotee bultootaa fi horsiisee bultoota miidhamaniif deggersa maallaqaa biliyoona $12 beeksise.
data.som: Aqalka cad ayaa ku dhawaaqay lacag dhan 12 bilyan oo doollar oo loogu talagalay beeraleyda iyo xoolodhaqatada ay saameysay canshuurti aargoosiga ee dhowaan la soo rogay.
data.tir: ዋይት ሃውስ ኣብ ቀረባ ግዜ ብዝተነበሩ ናይ ባህ ኣይበሎ ግብሪ ንዝተጎድኡ ገባራትን ኣርባሕቲ እንስሳን ንምድጋፍ ናይ 12 ቢልዮን ዶላር ድጎማ ከምዝገብር ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: England's Local Government Association reports that approximately two-thirds of plastic objects which reach recycling facilities cannot be recycled, due to the mix of polymers used by producers.
data.aaf: Ingilizh Dariifa Xinisoh Saqal Tamtuto Edde Yantifiqen Barmilite Asagolite Illa Nammay sidichyto Qagitak Kahabanah Ayfaf taco madahTa Warkootah Uwaytite Uxih Nafaqil Asam Maduudina.
data.amh: የእንግሊዝ የአካባቢ መስተዳድር ማህበር እንደዘገበው አምራቾች በሚጠቀሙት ፖሊመሮች ድብልቅ ምክንያት በግምት ሁለት ሦስተኛ የሚሆኑት ወደ ሪሳይክል መገልገያዎች የሚደርሱ የፕላስቲክ ዕቃዎች እንደገና ጥቅም ላይ ሊውሉ አይችሉም።
data.orm: Waldaan Bulchiinsa Naannoo Engilaand lama sadaffaan wantoota pilaastikaa kan bakka irra deebiin haareffamuu gahan sababa makaa poolimerii oomishtootaan fayyadameef akka hin haaromsamne gabaase.
data.som: Ururka Dawladaha Hoose ee Ingiriiska ayaa sheegaya in qiyaastii saddex meelood laba meel weelasha caagga ah ee soo gaadha goobaha dib u warshadaynta aan dib loo warshadayn karin, taas oo ay sabatay isku darka polymer ka ay isticmaalaan soo saareyaashu.
data.tir: ማሕበር ዘቤታዊ መንግስቲ ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ኣብ ዝሃቦ ጸብጻብ እቶም ኣፍረይቲ ብሰንኪ ኣጠቓቕማ ፖሊመራት ተሓዋዊሱ ናብቲ ዑደት ዝካየደሉ መሳለጥያታት ዝበጽሕ ዳርጋ ክልተ ሲሶ ናይ ፕላስቲክ ኣቕሑ እንደገና ክዝውተር ኣይክእልን ኢዩ።

data.eng: NASA launches the Parker Solar Probe, an unpiloted spacecraft designed to study the sun.
data.aaf: NASAh Saynisiteta Marko Satlayitteetal፣ Nabah Yan Hawah Addal Tanih tan Namma Kubsatite Bilanit baxolih leh tan Angaaraw Weenim Xayos Abeen.
data.amh: ናሳ ፀሃይ ላይ ምርምር ለማድረግ የሚረዳውን ፓርከር ሶላር ፕሮብ የተሰኘውን ሰው አልባ መንኩራኩር አመጠቀ።
data.orm: NASA'n xiyyaara balaliisaa-maleessa Paarker Piroob jedhamu Aduu qorachuuf gad ni lakkifti.
data.som: NASA ayaa soo saartay Parker Solar Probe, oo ah dayax gacmeed bila ibniaadan duuli kara oo loogu talagalay in uu baaris ku sameeyo qorraxda.
data.tir: ናሳ ጸሓያዊ መርማሪት መሳርያ ፓርከር፣ መጽናዕቲ ብዛዕባ ጸሓይ እተሰነዐት ሰብ-ኣልቦ ናይ ጠፈር መሳርያ ኣወንጪፋ።

data.eng: Russian president Vladimir Putin attends the wedding of Austrian foreign minister Karin Kneissl (FPÖ) and businessman Wolfgang Malinger.
data.aaf: Rusiyah Berezixanti Vilaxmir Putinቲ Ostoriyak Iro Caagidah Malaak Karin Kneissl (FPÖ) kee Kabxaabe Wolfgang Malinger Digib Yengele.
data.amh: የራሺያ ፕሬዚደንት የሆኑት ቭላድሚር ፑቲን የኦስትሪያ የውጪ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር የሆኑትን ካሪን ከኔሰል እና የንግድ ሰው የሆኑትን ዎልፍጋንግ ማሊንገር የሰርግ ፕሮግራም ላይ ተገኙ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Raashiyaa Vilaadmir Puutin cidha ministeera dhimma alaa Ostiriyaa Kaarin Kineessii (FPÖ) fi daldalaa Woofgaang Maliinjer irratti argame.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Ruushka Vladimir Putin ayaa ka qeyb galaya arooska wasiirka arrimaha dibadda Austria Karin Kneissl (FPÖ) iyo ganacsade Wolfgang Malinger.
data.tir: ፕረዚደንት ሩሲያ ቪላድሚር ፑቲን ኣብ ስነስርዓት መርዓ ሚኒስትር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኦስትሪያ ካሪን ክኔሲልን ( ኤፍ .ፒ. ኦ ) በዓል ሃብቲ ዎልፍጋንግ ማሊንገርን ተረኺቦም ።

data.eng: Liu Xiang breaks the 50-metre backstroke swimming world record, setting it at 26.98 seconds, to win the women’s gold medal at the Asian Games.
data.aaf: Kiniyah baxi Aliyudu kibetoge labah Ardal inkih yakumi kiniwak Itiyyopiya tegist tufa maratonul 35 haytoh Ardal say bara teyse.
data.amh: ሊኡ ዚያንግ በኤዥያ ውድድሮች ላይ የ50 ሜትሩን የጀርባ ዋና በ26.98 ሰከንዶች በመግባት የወርቅ ሜዳልያ እና የሪከርድ ባለቤት ሆነች።
data.orm: Luu Zhaang dorgommii taphoota Eshiyaa irratti gosa dorgommii bishaan dugdaan daakkii meetira 50n Rikoordii haaraa sekondii 26.98 ta'e galmeessuun Meedaliyaa warqii dubartoota mo'atte.
data.som: Liu Xiang ayaa jabisay xidignimada dabaasha ee 50-mitir ee dabaasha dhabarka, iyaadoo ka dhitay 26.98 ilbiriqsi, si ay ugu guuleysto billadda dahabka ee haweenka Ciyaaraha Asia.
data.tir: ኣብ ጸወታታት ኤስያ ዝተኻየደ ውድድር ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ፣ ሊዩ ሽያንግ ኣብ ውድድር ምሕንባስ ሕቖ 50 ሜትሮ ብዝመዝገበቶ 26.98 ካልኢት፣ ናይ ወርቂ ሜዳልያ ተዓዋቲት ኮይና።

data.eng: The Spanish government passes a decree which amends the Historical Memory Law to allow the government to exhume Francisco Franco's remains from the Valle de los Caídos.
data.aaf: Isbeen Doolat Doolat Faransiskok Fareserash kavale x lose Kayxos kah yayaqenah xiqsisuh Aydaadi Kasitoh kah yasisen inah Kukta yeyeqe.
data.amh: የስፔን መንግስት የፍራነሲስኮ ፍራንኮን መቃብር ቆፍሮ ከቫሌ ዴሎሰ ካየዶስ ለማውጣት ያስችለው ዘንድ ታሪካዊውን የማህደር ህግ አዋጅ ማሻሻይ አፀደቀ።

data.som: Dawladda Isbaanish waxay soo saartay wareegto wax ka beddeshay Taariikhda Sharciga Xusuusta si loogu oggolaado dawladda inay ka soo saarto haraaga qalfoofka Francisco Franco ee ku aasan xabaasha Valle de los Caídos.

data.eng: A magnitude 6.0 earthquake strikes the western Iranian province of Kermanshah, killing at least two people and injuring more than 200 others.

data.som: Dhulgariir cabirkiisu yahay 6.0 ayaa ku dhuftay gobolka Kermanshah ee galbeedka Iiraan, halkaas oo ay ku dhinteen ugu yaraan laba qof ayna ku dhaawacmeen in ka badan 200 oo kale.

data.eng: American singer Taylor Swift wins four trophies, including Artist of the Year, and holds 23 American Music Awards, beating Whitney Houston.
data.aaf: Ameerikah Gadabe Tayler Swift ligidi Fanan Edde anuk Affara Kasiteta Aysuk Whitney Houstonuk Aysuk 23 Ameericah Gagiteh Acwa Yece::
data.amh: አሜሪካዊቷ ዘፋኝ ቴይለር ስዊፍት የዓመቱ አርቲስትን ጨምሮ አራት ዋንጫዎችን ያሸነፈች ሲሆን 23 የአሜሪካ የሙዚቃ ሽልማቶችን በማግኘት ዊትኒ ሂውስተንን በልጣለች።

data.som: Fanaanada Mareykanka ee Taylor Swift ayaa ku guuleystay afar koob, oo uu ku jiro Fanaanka Sanadka, waxaynaa ka qaaday 23 Abaalmarinta Muusikada Mareykanka, iyadoo kabadisa Whitney Houston.
data.tir: ን”ብሉፅ ከያኒ እዚ ዓመት” ሓዊሱ ኣርባዕተ ሽልማታት ዝዓተረ ኣሜሪካዊ ደራፊ ቴይለር ስዊፍት 23 ሽልማታት ሙዚቃ ኣሜሪካ ብምውሳድ ብዊትኒይ ሂውስተን ተታሒዙ ዝነበረ ክብረ ወሰን ኣመሓይሹዎ።

data.eng: Kepler 159d, a exoplanet with the same size as Saturn, is discovered by University of Western Ontario student Chris Fox and professor Paul Wiegert.
data.aaf: Kebler 159d, Satrane Inah Tan celole Erobilan, Ayromaqah Ontario Jaamiqat Barteeni Chris Fox Kee Brofessor Baul Wieger Geytimte.
data.amh: የዌስተርን ኦንታሪዮ ዩንቨርሲቲ ተማሪው ክሪስ ፎክስ እና ፕሮፌሰር ፓውል ዌገርት ኬፕለር 159ዲ የተሰኘውና ከሳተርን ጋር በመጠን የሚመሳሰለው ኤክዞፕላኔት ለማግኘት ቻሉ።

data.som: Kepler 159d, exoplanet oo la mid ah Saturn, ayaa ardayga Jaamacadda Western Ontario Chris Fox iyo professor Paul Wiegert yaa helay.
data.tir: ኬፕለር 159ዲ፣ ምስ ሳቶርን ተመሳሳሊ ግዝፊ ዘለዎ ናይ ገዳም ኮኾብ፣ ብተማሃራይ ዌስተርን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝኾነ ክሪስ ፎክስን ፕሮፈሰር ፑል ዌገርትን ተረኺቡ።

data.eng: Authorities arrest eight men after a gang rape in Freiburg, Germany on 14 October, with police seeking more men.
data.aaf: Miraciini Qunxa-garabluk 14 Ayro garmank Freiburg Addal Butta Calisenti Yeke lakal Bacra Marite Lowsis Gubat heenih, Boliis Gersim Gorisak Geytimta.
data.amh: በጥቅምት 14 በጀርመን ፍራይበርግ በተሰማው የቡድን አስገድዶ መድፈር ወንጀል ጋር በተያያዘ ፖሊስ ስምንት ግለሰቦችን በቁጥጥር ስር ያዋለ ሲሆን ተጨማሪ ሰዎችንም ለመያዝ ጥረት እያደረገ እንደሆነ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Jarmanii Fiirbarg keessatti ji'a onkolooleessa gaafa 14ii gudaddii yakka garmuun raawwatameen qaamoleen seeraa namoota saddeet yoo to'anna jala oolchan ammas yakkamtoonni hafan barbaadamaa jiru.
data.som: 14 kii Oktoobar yaa Freiburg masuliyintu kuxidheen sideed nin ka dib kufsi wadareed ay gaystaeen iyo boliska oo radinaya rag farabadan.
data.tir: ኣብ ጀርመን ፍሬይበርግ ብ 14 ጥቅምቲ ብጉጅለ ምሰዝተፈፀመ ፆታዊ ምግሃስ ብዝትዛመደ ሰበስልጣን ንሸሞንተ ሰባት ኣሲሮም ፤ ብዘይካ እዚ ፖሊስ ንካልኦት ተጠርጠርቲ እና ኣለሽ እዩ ።

data.eng: Research published in JAMA Internal Medicine describes that mothers should wait at least a year between giving birth and getting pregnant again to reduce health risks to mother and baby.
data.aaf: Jamah Addal Dayla Matbaq Kusaq Inioti Inonti kee Alaaqah Qafiyat Qawalaylla Yaynukusoonuh Xalay Kee Xalayak Fanah Wali Inki Sanat Qambalanam Keenik Faximtah Tanim Qadosa.
data.amh: በጃማ የውስጥ ህክምና የታተመ ምርምር ለእናት እና ለህፃን የጤና አደጋን ለመቀነስ እናቶች በወሊድ እና እንደገና በመፀነስ መካከል ቢያንስ አንድ ዓመት መጠበቅ እንዳለባቸው ይገልፃል።
data.orm: Qorannoon JAMA Internal Mediisinii keessatti maxxansame balaa fayyaa haadhaa fi daa'imatti dhufu hir'isuuf haadholiin ijoollee godhachuu gidduutti yoo xiqqaate waggaa tokko eeganii deebiyanii ulfaa'uu akka qaban ibse.
data.som: Cilmi baaris lagu daabacay JAMA Internal Medicine ayaa cadaynaysa in hooyadu ay tahay inay sugto ugu yaraan sanad inta u dhaxaysa dhalmada iyo uurka labaad si loo yareeyo halista caafimaad ee hooyada iyo dhallaanka.
data.tir: ኣብ ጃማ ኢንተርናል ሜዲስን እተሓትመ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ ሓደጋታት ጥዕና ኣደን ህጻንን ንምንካይ ኣዴታት ካብ ሕርሲ ክሳብ ዝጠንሳ እንተ ወሓደ ንሓደ ዓመት ክጽበያ ኣለወን።

data.eng: Denmark suspends future weapons export licenses to Saudi Arabia in response to the killing of Jamal Khashoggi and the Saudi Arabian-led intervention in Yemen.
data.aaf: Jamal Kashukdih Raba kee Saqud Qarabiya Firbyal Yaman Gabba Culusak Xenmarki Focafanih Qskar Aslacite illa Iro Fanah Ruubak Sumaqte waseh.
data.amh: ዴንማርክ ከጀማል ካሾጊ ግድያ እና የሳውዲ አረቢያ የመንን መውረር በ|ላ ለሳውዲ አረቢያ የጦር መሳሪያ ለመላክ የሚያስችለውን ፍቃድ መስጠት እንዳቆመች አስታወቀች።
data.orm: Ajjeefamuu Jamaal Kaashogii fi gidduugaltummaa Yemen keessaa kan Sawud-Arabiyaan durfameen walqabatee Denmaark heyyama alargee meeshaalee waraanaa gara Sa'ud Arabiyaa adda kutte.
data.som: Denmark ayaa joojisay ruqsadaha dhoofinta hubka mustaqbalka ee Sucuudiga iyadoo ka duulaysa dilkii Jamal Khashoggi iyo faragelinta uu Sacuudigu hoggaaminayo ee Yemen.
data.tir: ደንማርክ ከም ግብረ-መልሲ ናይቲ በስዑዲ ዝምራሕ ጣልቃ ምእታው ኣብ የመን ከምኡ'ውን መቕተልቲ ጀማል ካሹግጂ ነቲ ናብ ንግስነት ስዑዲ ዓረብ ይወሃብ ዝነበረ ፍቓድ ምልኣኽ ኣጽዋር ኣወንዚፋቶ ትርከብ።

data.eng: UEFA confirms that a new annual European football club competition called UEFA Europa League 2 will be introduced in 2021.
data.aaf: Basket bool Addal Dahable Rakaakayiteh giclaba Agatak Beszbool koqso Egla shambiyoon yakoonuh afara digirabenit kelihelanedu yeyseenih.
data.amh: ዩኢኤፍኤ በ 2021 ዩኢኤፍኤ ዩሮፓ ሊግ 2 የሚባል አዲስ ዓመታዊ የእግር ኳስ ክለቦች ውድድር እንደሚጀመር አሳወቀ።
data.orm: UEFA'n dorgommii haaraa waggaa waggaa kilabii kubbaa miilaa Awurooppaa, UEFA Awurooppaa Liig 2 jedhamu bara 2021 keessa akka jalqabu mirkaneesse.
data.som: UEFA ayaa xaqiijisay in tartan cusub oo sanadle ah oo naadiyada kubbadda cagta Yurub ah oo la yiraahdo UEFA Europa League 2 la soo bandhigi doono sannadka 2021 ka.
data.tir: ሕብረት ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣውሮፓ ኣብ 2011 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሊግ:2 ሕብረት ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣውሮፓ ብዝብል ስያሜ ሓዱሽ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ጋንታታት ከምዝጅመር ኣረጋጊፁ።

data.eng: The deputy governor of Sweden's central bank, the Riksbank, says that the country is likely to become a cashless society within the next three to five years.
data.aaf: Siwidik fanti bankih Liimo፣ Rikesebank፣ Ta baaxo Cigilta Sidicah kona Sanatiteh Addat Maaluk Alesini Ayyunta takkem dudam Axcuk Edde yaban.
data.amh: የስዊድን ማዕከላዊ ባንክ በሆነው ሪክስባንክ ምክትል ገዥ አገሪቱ በቀጣዮቹ ከሦስት እስከ አምስት ዓመታት ውስጥ የገንዘብ ኖተ አልባ ማኅበረሰብ (ዲጂታል በሆነ የክፍያ መንገድ የሚጠቀም ማህበረሰብ) ሊሆን እንደሚችል ይናገራሉ።
data.orm: Itti aanaan bulchaa baankii giddu galeessaa Iswiidinii, Riksibaank, waggoota itti aanan sadii haga shaniitti biyyattiin hawaasa maallaqa callaa hin fayyadamne ni taati jedhe.
data.som: Guddoomiye ku xigeenka Riksbank oo ah bangiga dhexe ee Sweden, ayaa sheegay in ay u badan tahay in dalku noqdo bulsho aan lacag ta warqadaa aan insticmaalin mudadda saddexda illaa shanta sano ee soo socota.
data.tir: ምክትል ኣመሓዳሪ ማእከላይ ባንክ ሽወደን፣ ሪክስባንክ፣ እታ ሃገር ኣብ ውሽጢ ሰለስተ ወይ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ገንዘብ ዘይብሉ ሕብረተሰብ ክትከውን ከም እትኽእል ገሊጹ።

data.eng: A beaver is seen in Northern Italy on camera, a species that has not been seen in the country since 1471.
data.aaf: Ankoreju; Alsak bilastik qadaaga Cashayinl maqarle Waaso kah tatrusa፣ kee Dukanal warkat shantooti antifiqiyal meklo dirkisa.
data.amh: በሰሜናዊ ጣልያን ከ1471 ጀምሮ በሃገሩ ታይቶ ያልታወቀ የፍልፈል ዝርያ በካሜራ ታየ።
data.orm: Biiveriin, Kaaba Xaaliyaanii keessatti kaameraa irratti argame, sanyiiwwan erga bara 1471 biyyattii keessatti argamanii hin beekne.
data.som: xayawaanka noociisu qariib yahay oo loo yaqaano Beaver ayaa lagu arkay Waqooyiga Talyaaniga, waana nooc aan horay loogu arag dalka tan iyo 1471 dii.
data.tir: እቲ ካብ 1471 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣትሒዙ ኣብታ ሃገር ተርእዩ ዘይፈልጥ ቢቨር ዝተብሃለ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ኣብ ሰሜናዊ ጣሊያን ብካሜራ ተርእዩ።

data.eng: Carlos Ghosn, formerly the chairman of Nissan, is arrested again on suspicion of shifting personal losses to the company.
data.aaf: Dumahih Nisan Saqal Karlos Gosone Isi Kasarat ill Kubaniya Fanah Korisak Wagisenih.
data.amh: የቀድሞ የኒሳን ሊቀመንበር ካርሎስ ጎስን የራሱን የግል ኪሳራ ወደ ድርጅቱ አዙ[ል በሚል ክስ በድጋሚ ተያዘ።
data.orm: Geggeessaan dhaabbata Niissaan duraanii Caarloos Goosan irra deebiin kasaaraa mataa isa gara kan dhaabbatichaati nanneessun shakkamuun to'annaa jala oole.
data.som: Carlos Ghosn, oo hore u ahaa guddoomiyaha Nissan, ayaa mar kale la xidhay isagoo looga shakisan yahay inuu khasaare shaqsiyeed uu u wareejiyay shirkadda.
data.tir: እቲ ነበር ኣቦ መንበር ኒሳን ዝኾነ ካርሎስ ጐን ናይ ውልቁ ኪሳራ ከም ናይʼቲ ኩባንያ ገይሩ ብምቕራብ ተጠርጢሩ ዳግም ተኣሲሩ።

data.eng: U.S. President Donald Trump and First Lady Melania Trump make an unannounced post-Christmas visit to troops at the Al Asad Airbase in Iraq, their first visit to a combat zone since taking office.
data.aaf: Ameerica Berezixent Donald Trump Kee Kay buxxah Ina Melania Trump Qiraakal Geytima Al-Asad Taayirah Booxa Addal Gena qiidih Qaskarawah Acsubewen Gufne Abelon፣ Taham Miraacinu Yibixeenik Lakal Illa Ta Dariifat Qimboh Gufne Kini::
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዝዳንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ እና ቀዳማዊት እመቤት ሜላኒያ ትራምፕ ኢራቅ ውስጥ በሚገኘው አል አሳድ አየር ኃይል ውስጥ ላሉ ወታደሮች ለገና ያልታሰበ ጉብኝት አደረጉ ፣ ይህም ስልጣን ከያዙ የመጀመሪያ የትግል ቀጠና ጉብኝታቸው ነው።
data.orm: Pireezidantii U.S Donaald Tiraampii fi giifti-dureen malaniyaa tiraamp daawwannaa qilleen-dura osoo hin beeksifamne gara looltoota humna waraanaa kan qilleensarraa Al Asaad Iraaqitti argamutti taasisaniiru, kunis erga aangoo qabataanin as daawaanna isaanii naannoo waraanaa jalqabaati.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Donald Trump iyo Marwada Koowaad Melania Trump ayaa booqasho lamafilaan ha kubooqday ciidammada kudhaqan saldhigga Al Asad ee Ciraaq Ciidi Masiixiga. Taas oo ah booqashadoodii ugu horreysay ee aagga dagaalka tan iyo markii uu xilka la wareegay.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ኣሜሪካ ዶናልድ ትራምፕን ቀዳመይቲ ወይዘሮ ሜላንያ ትራምፕን ድሕሪ በዓል ልደት ኣብ ኣብ መዋፈሪ ሓይሊ ኣየር ኣል ዓሳድ ንዝርከቡ ወተሃደራት ሃንደበት ዝበፅሑ እንትኾን እዚ ድማ ስልጣን ካብዝሕዙ ንነዘ ፈላማይ ምብፃሕ እዩ።

data.eng: After a 56-day trek, British Army captain Lou Rudd becomes the second person to cross Antarctica alone and unaided, over two decades after the first solo crossing by Norwegian Børge Ousland.
data.aaf: 56 Aurorah Gexok lakal biritaniyakqeebi kabten luxu rudxu Norweyik buju Owuselaneu Qimboh Dibuk tabena tabeksa Tabna sanootak lakal antartikak dibuh kee Nammeyhyto num yekke.
data.amh: የእንግሊዝ ጦር አዛዥ የሆነው ሎኡ ሩድ ከ56 ቀን የእግር ጉዞ በኋላ አንታርክቲካን ብቻውንና ያለእርዳታ በማቋረጥ ከ2 አስርተ አመታት በፊት ኖርዌያዊው ቦርገ ኦስላነድ ካቋረጠው በኋላ ለሁለተኛ ጊዜ በማቋረጥ ሁለተኛው ሰው ሆነ።
data.orm: Deemsa gaariin godhame guyyaa 56 booda, ajajaan Waraanaa Biriitish Luu Rud nama lammaffaa qofaa isaafi utuu gargaarsa hin argatin Antarkaatikaa qaxxaamure tahe, nama kophaasaa qaxxaamure jalqabaa lammii Noorwey Børge Ousland waggaa kurnan lama booda.
data.som: Socod 56 maalmood qaatay ka dib, kabtanka Ciidanka Ingiriiska Lou Rudd ayaa noqday qofkii labaad ee kaligiis ka gudba baraflayda Antarctica isaga oo aan helin wax gargaara, waxana hortii ka talaabay 20 sano ka hor nin u dhashay dalka norway oo la odhan jiray Børge Ousland.
data.tir: ናይ ቢሪታንያ ሰራዊት ካፒቴን ዝኾነ ሉዊ ሩድ ንኣንታርከቲካ በይኑን ብዘይሓገዝን ን 56 መዓልቲታት ብእግሩ ተጓዓዙ ዝሰገረ ካልኣይ ሰብ ኮይኑ ። ቅድሚ ክልተ ዓሰርተታት ዓመታት በይኑ ዝሰገረ ቀዳማይ ሰብ ኖርዎጂያን ቦርግ ኦስለንድ እዩ።

data.eng: Yemen's Shiite rebels say they have given control of the port of Hodeida to the coast guard and local administrators.
data.aaf: Yaman Shiqah rebels Ayhuda Fordak Baddi Xaqul Dacayri kee Dariifa xinisoh Necce Iyyen.
data.amh: የየመን ሺዓ አማፅያን የሆዴይዳን ወደብ ለባሕር ዳርቻ ጥበቃ እና ለአካባቢው አስተዳዳሪዎች ቁጥጥር መስጠታቸውን አስታውቀዋል።

data.eng: The death toll from floods and landslides in South Sulawesi, Indonesia, rises to 68, while six people are still missing.

data.eng: Joe Percoco, former aide to New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, is denied bail and is expected to start his six-year prison term for bribery.

data.eng: The second President of Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, is sworn into office, after the resignation of Nursultan Nazarbayev.
data.aaf: Nammeyhytoh Kazakistan Berexizanti Kazakhstan, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, Nursultan Nazarbayev Canbesara Illa Taama Fanah Culeh.
data.amh: የካዛኪስታን ሁለተኛ ፕሬዚደንት የሆኑት ካሲይም ጆማርት ቶካዬቭ ከኑርሱልታን ናዛረባዬቭ ስልጣን መልቀቅ በ|ላ ወደ ስልጣ በመምጣታቸው ቃለ መሃላቸውን ፈፀሙ።
data.orm: Aangoo gadilakkisuu Nuursultaan Nazaarbayev 'iin walqabatee Pireezidaantiin Kazaakistaan Lammaffan Kaasim Joomaart Tokaaye kakuu rawwachuun wajjira seenan.
data.som: Madaxweynihii labaad ee Kazakhstan, Kassym Jomart Tokayev, ayaa loo dhaariyay xafiiska, kadib markii uu is casilay Nursultan Nazarbayev.
data.tir: ኑር ሱልጣን ናዛርባዪቭ ካብ ስልጣኑ ድሕሪ ምውራድ፣ መበል ካልኣይ ፕረዚደንት ካዛኽስታን፣ ቃስም ጆማርት ቶካዪቭ ቃል ማሕላ ፈጺሙ።

data.eng: Elvis Luciano of the Toronto Blue Jays becomes the first person born in the 2000s to play in a Major League Baseball game.

data.tir: ኣባል ጋንታ ቶሮንቶ ብሉ ጀይዝ ዝኾነ ኤልቪስ ሉችያኖ ኣብ ዓቢ ጸወታ ውድድር ባይዝቦል ዝሳተፍ ድሕሪ 2000 ዓምፈ ዝተወለደ ፈላማይ ሰብ ኮይኑ።

data.eng: David Saint-Jacques becomes the fourth Canadian astronaut to take part in a spacewalk and the first in 12 years as he begins a roughly seven-hour mission.

data.amh: ለሰባት ሰአት ትንሽ በቀረው ተልእኮ የካናዳው የጠፈር ተመራማሪ ዴቪድ ሴንት ጃከስ በ12 አመት ውስጥ የመጀመሪያው እና ከአገሩ አራተኛው በህዋ ላይ እርምጃ ላይ የተሳተፈ የጠፈር ተመራማሪ አድረጎታል።

data.som: David Saint-Jacques waxa uu noqonayaa cirbixiyeenkii afraad ee Kanadiyaanka ah ee ka qaybqaata socodka hawada sare waana markii ugu horaysay muddo 12 sano ah isaga oo bilaabay hawl ku dhawaad todoba saacadood ah.

data.eng: Debenhams, one of the largest department stores in the United Kingdom which employs 25,000 people, collapses into administration.

data.eng: The last known female Yangtze giant softshell turtle, the world's largest species of freshwater turtle and one of the most endangered species on the planet, dies at Suzhou Zoo in China.

data.orm: Aappil Inc. fi Guugil erga manni murtii olaanaa Maadras keessaa aappiin Tiktok ijoollee qabiyyee saal-quunnamtii fi arrabsoo karaa interneetaan godhamuuf saaxila jedhee murteessee booda kuusaa aappii isaanii Hindii keessaa irraa aappicha balleessan.

data.orm: Yommuu hojjetoonni gargaarsaaa bakka baayyee miidhame qaqqabuuf carraaqaa jiranitti, hammi du'aa kaaba Moozaambiki kan bubbee bishaan irraan rukutamte keessatti mudate gara 38'tti ol guddate.
data.som: Tirada dadkii ku dhintay duufaantii ku dhufatay waqooyiga Mozambique ayaa gaadhay 38, iyadoo shaqaalaha gargaarka ay udadaalayaan sidii ay u gaadhi lahaayeen meelaha ugu daran ee ay saameeyeen.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ብሳይክሎን ዝተወቕዐ ሰሜን ሞዛምቢክ ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ቑፅሪ 38 በፂሑ ኣሎ፤ ሰራሕተኛታት ረድኤት ድማ ናብቶም ዝገደደ ዝተጎድኡ ቦታታት ንምብፃሕ ይቃለሱ ኣለዉ።

data.eng: Efforts begin in Solomon Islands to refloat a ship after an oil spill in what the government says will be a "very difficult operation."

data.som: Jasiiradaha Solomon ayuu ka bilaabmay in ay dib u rogaan markab ka dib markii shidaal ku daatay waxana ay dowladdu sheegeysa in uu noqon doono "hawlgal aad u adag."

data.amh: ቅዳሜ መገባደጃ በሄርሞን ተራራ ላይ ለተተኮሱ ሁለት ሮኬቶች ምላሽ በመስጠት በጎላን ሃይትስ በሶሪያ ወታደራዊ ኢላማዎች ላይ በተደረገ የአየር ጥቃት እስራኤል አስር ሰዎችን ገድላለች።

data.som: Israa’iil ayaa toban qof ku dishay duqeymo xagga cirka ah oo ay la beegsatay bartilmaameedyo milateri oo Suuriyaan ah oo ku yaalla buuraha Golan Heights, iyadoo ka jawaabaysay laba gantaal oo lagusoo tuuray buurta Hermon dabayaaqadii Sabtidan.

data.eng: Riviera Beach, Florida, is paying $600,000 to a hacker who took over local government computers three weeks ago.
data.aaf: Rivera Biche፣ Folorixa፣ Sidica Ayaamak Afal Ta Dariifah Doolat Kombuterwa beyteh tan radoh 600,000 Dolaar Mekelam kini.
data.amh: ሪቪዬራ ቢች ፣ ፍሎሪዳ ፣ ከሦስት ሳምንት በፊት የአካባቢውን መንግስት ኮምፒውተሮች ለተቆጣጠረ አንድ ጠላፊ 600,000 የአሜሪካ ዶላር ይከፍላል።

data.som: Riviera Beach, Florida, ayaa lacag dhan $ 600,000 siineysa jabsada la wareegay kombiyuutarrada dowladda hoose saddex toddobaad ka hor.
data.tir: ሪቬይራ ቢች ተባሂላ እትፅዋዕ ከተማ ፍሎሪዳ ቅድሚ ሰለስተ ሰሙን ንኮምፒዩተራት መንግስታዊ ኣብያተ ዕዮ እታ ከተማ ንዝተቖፃፀረን ሓደ ጎርጓሪ መረዳእታ ኮምፒዩተር 600 ሽሕ ዶላር ክትከፍል እያ።

data.eng: A ceremony is held at the former site of Germany’s Buchenwald concentration camp to remember people imprisoned there because they were thought to be gay.
data.aaf: Garamank Buchenewaledu gasol Dumahih Arac sitacela nadoh takke gidah tekkemih sinam kasitiyah elle akele.
data.amh: በጀርመን ግብረሰዶማዊ ናቸው ተብሎ ስለታመነባቸው ቡቸንዋለደ ካምፕ ታስረው ለነበሩ ሰዎች እዛው አካባቢ የማስታወሻ ስነ-ስርአት ተደረገ።
data.orm: Bakka mana hidhaa duraanii Jarman Buchenwaald'tti dhiirota fedhii dhiira waliin walquunamtii saalaa gochuu qaban jechuun shakkamanii achitti hidhaman yaadachuuf qophiin godhame.
data.som: Xaflad ayaa lagu qabtay goobtii hore ee xerada baadhitaanka Buchenwald ee dalka Jarmalka si loo xuso dadkii halkaas ku xidhnaa kuwaas oo loo malaynayay inay khaniisiin ahayeen.
