data.eng: Through Argentine Foreign Affairs Minister Jorge Faurie, the Lima Group say that "the use of force in Venezuela will be implemented when required".
data.aaf: Kiblati kuriyah Miraacini Amixigesini Ayro namma Baxooxah fanal takke tan guuba samuutil walaloonuh illa Ameerika gufelen Axcuk qambalanam gabi qaxih kuriya mangaafa rateema xayosele.
data.amh: የሊማ ቡድን በአርጀንቲና የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስትር ጆርጅ ፋሪ በኩል በቬንዙዌላ ውስጥ የኃይል አጠቃቀም አስፈላጊ በሚሆንበት ጊዜ ተግባራዊ እንደሚሆን ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Karaa Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Arjentiinaa Joorj Faawurii, Gareen Limaa "itti fayyadamni humnaa Venezuweellaa keessatti yeroo barbaadametti ni godhama" jedhe.
data.som: Iyadoo loo marayo Wasiirka Arrimaha Dibadda ee Argentine Jorge Faurie, Kooxda Lima waxay yiraahdeen "isticmaalka xoogga Venezuela waa la hirgelin doonaa markii loo baahdo".
data.tir: “ኣብ ልዕሊ ቬኔዝዌላ ሓይሊ ምጥቃም ኣድላዪ ኣብ ዝኾነሉ ግዜ ክትግበር እዩ” እንትብል ጉጅለ ሊማ ብመገዲ ሚኒስቴር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኣርጀንቲና ሆሄ ፉዋሬ ኣቢሉ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The death toll of the heat wave in Japan rises to 57, while 18,347 others are hospitalized.
data.aaf: Ayro korma iraanal kermanisaha gandal 6.0 Baaxo angoyi wuli namma num edde rabe 200 dgaa takkem kaddu mudumteh.
data.amh: በጃፓን የሙቀት ሞገድ ሳቢያ የሟቾች ቁጥር ወደ 57 ከፍ ብሏል፤ 18,347 ሌሎች ሰዎች ደግሞ ሆስፒታል ገብተዋል።
data.orm: Dambalii ho'aa Jaappaan kessattii mudateen lakkoofsi namoota lubbuun darbanii gara 57ti yeroo guddatu, namoonni 18,347 ta'an ammoo Hospitaala seenaniiru.
data.som: Tirada dhimashada kulaylka ka dhacay wadanka Japan ayaa gaartay 57, halka 18,347 kalena dhakhtarka la dhigay.
data.tir: ብሰንኪ’ቲ ኣብ ጃፓን ተኸሲቱ ዘሎ ብርቱዕ ሙቐት ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ቁፅሪ 57 እንትበፅሕ፣ 18,347 ሰባት ድማ ሕክምና ተገይሩሎም።

data.eng: The Department of Health of the Philippines declares a national dengue epidemic in the country, as cases spike to 622 deaths.
data.aaf: Ilicabo Yimixige Yangitze Geyin Softihil turtle, Baadak Nabba saytun leeh Turtle kee Bilaanetil Nagay Qawalayla t Dufumte Duriyak tiya Chayinak Suzhou zuuh Addal Rabbe.
data.amh: የፊሊፒንስ የጤና መምሪያ በብሄራዊ ደረጃ የደንጌ በሽታ ወረረሽኝ እንደተከሰተ እና የሟቾች ቁጥርም ወደ 622 እንደደረሰ ገለፀ።
data.orm: Qajeelchi Fayyaa Filiphiinsi akka lakkoofsi nama du'ee 622 tti ol guddateen, weerara biyyaalessa denguu biyyattii keessatti labse
data.som: Waaxda Caafimaadka ee dalka Filibiin ayaa ku dhawaaqday in cudurka xumada dengue uu yahay mid safmareen ah kadib markay gaadheen dadka u dhintay 622.
data.tir: ቁፅሪ ሞት ናብ 622 ብምብፅሑ ምኽንያት ትካል ጥዕና ፊሊፕንስ ኣብታ ሃገር ብሄራዊ ለበዳ ዴንግ ከምዘጋጠመ ኣዊጁ።

data.eng: California regulators announce a ban on chlorpyrifos, an organophosphate nerve agent used as a pesticide.
data.aaf: Koliforniyah Lowisita Durite Bayisa Nafqil Kah Asamak organophosphate Nerve Waklentit chlorpyrifosul Waso Tascase.
data.amh: የካሊፎርኒያ ተቆጣጣሪዎች እንደ ተባይ ማጥፊያ ጥቅም ላይ በሚውለው ኦርጋኖፎስፌት ነርቭ ኤጀንት ክሎሪፒሪፎስ ላይ እገዳን መደረጉን አስታወቁ።
data.orm: To'attoonni Kaalifoorniyaa kilorofaayirifos, ejentiin narvii orgaanofoosfeetii akka farra ilbiisaatti fayyadu irra uggurri kahamuu beeksisan.
data.som: Sharci dhawrka Kaalifoorniya ayaa sheegay in mamnuucidda chlorpyrifos, oo ah wakiilka dareemayaasha organophosphate oo loo isticmaalo sunta cayayaanka.
data.tir: ነደፍቲ ሕጊ ካሊፎርንያ ነቲ ኸም ፈውሲ ባልዕ ኰይኑ ዘገልግል ክሎርፒሪፎስ ዝበሃል፣ ናይ መትኒ ፈውሲ ከም እተኣገደ ኣፍሊጦም።

data.eng: Walgreens and CVS ask customers not to bring guns into their stores in response to several deadly mass shootings last month.
data.aaf: Walingens kee Asivias Qamiilwa Waraye Alsa Mango Caagidah Jumla Giraari Giraari Illa Arooca Fanah Kah Baahan inah Essera.
data.amh: ዋልግሪንስ እና ሲቪኤስ ባለፈው ወር በተከሰቱ የጅምላ ግድያዎችን ተከትሎ ደንበኞቻቸው ወደ መደብሮቻቸው በሚመጡበት ጊዜ መሳሪያዎችን ይዘው እንዳይመጡ ጠየቁ።
data.orm: Sababa dhukaasa hamaa nama heedduutti godhamu muraasa ji'a darbe keessa godhameef Walgriinsii fi CVS maammiltoonni qawwee baatanii akka gara kuusaawwan isaanii hin dhufne gaafatan.
data.som: Walgreens iyo CVS ayaa ka codsaday macaamiishooda inayna qoryo laimanin bakhaarradooda iyagoo ka kahortagaya dhowr toogasho oo dad badan lagu dilay bishii hore si ayna mardambe u dhicin.
data.tir: ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ወርሒ ብምኽንያት ዘጋጠሙ ህይወት ብዙሓት ሰባት ዝቐዘፉ መቕተልትታት ዋልግሪንስን ሲ ቪ ኤስን ዝተብሃሉ ትካላት ዓማዊሎም ኣፅዋር ሒዞም ናብ መደብራቶም ከይኣትው ከልኪሎም።

data.eng: The California State Senate approves Assembly Bill 5, a bill to regulate gig economy work, introducing a formal test to classify workers as independent contractors or employees.
data.aaf: Kaliforniyah Rakaakayih Senete Taaba-Abeenit Qidiinul Taama Targiqo AwTaama-abeenit Culsoonum Madab Aqayaare Aysexexeguk Alifit Tan Maduur Taama kah Lowsisanah Madqa kautak 5 Faticisen.
data.amh: የካሊፎርንያ ስቴት ምክር ቤት አሴምብሊ ቢል 5 ያለውን እና አንዳንድ ሰራተኞችን በግላቸው ኮንትራክት እንዲሰሩ የሚፈቅድ ህግ አፀደቀ።
data.orm: Seeneetiin Kaalifoorniyaa Labsii hojiilee diinagdee hammeentaa-yeroon hojjetaman sirreessuuf hojjettoonni qormaata seera qabeessaan madaalamuun gara hojjettoota dhabbataafi hojettoota walii galteetti akka qoqqoodaman taasisu labsii Yaa'ii 5 raggaasise.
data.som: Golaha Guurtida Gobolka California ayaa ansixiyay Golaha 5, oo ah gole lagu tartiibinayo shaqada dhaqaalaha gig, taas oo imtixaan loogaqaadayo si loogu kala saarayo qandaraaslayaal madaxbannaan ama shaqaale.
data.tir: ግዝያዊ ቁጠባዊ ስራሕ ንምውህሃድ፣ ከምኡ ድማ ሰራሕተኛታት ከም ተዃናተርቲ ወይ ግላውያን ሰራሕተኛታት ንምምዳብ ወግዓዊ ፈተና ንምትእትታው ዝተኣመመ ሕጊ ባይቶ ቁጽሪ 5 ብባይቶ ኣውራጃ ካሊፎርንያ ጸዲቑ።

data.eng: Donald Trump says the U.S. military is "locked and loaded" after the attacks on its ally Saudi Arabia, but is awaiting confirmation from Riyadh on who launched the strikes before taking action.
data.aaf: Xolanxi Tirambi Kayinah Yano Saqud qarabiyal Tekkeh tan Maysatakookik Lakal US Qasakar “Alifeenim kee Yerrenih ” Iyyamah Maqata Beyanamak Afal Uguugus Miyin qimbisem Riyaadak asmitiya Qambalan.
data.amh: ዶናልድ ትራምፕ በአጋርዋ ሳዑዲ አረቢያ ላይ ከተፈጸሙ ጥቃቶች በኋላ የአሜሪካ ጦር ጥቃት ለመክፈት ወታደራዊ ትእዛዝ ለመስጠት ዝግጁ ነው ብለዋል፤ ነገር ግን እርምጃ ከመውሰዱ በፊት አድማዎቹን በማን እንደተጀመረ ከሪያድ ማረጋገጫ ይጠብቃሉ።
data.orm: Doonaal Tiraamp erga haleellaan michuuwwan isaanii Sawud Arabiyaa irratti ta'ee booda, humni waraanaa U.S. "hidhamee fe'ameera" garuu utuu tarkaanfii hin fudhatin dura eenyu akka haleellaa sana raawwate Riyaad irraa mirkaneeffannaa eeggataa jirra jedhe.
data.som: Donald Trump ayaa sheegay in milatariga Mareykanku ay diyaargarobeen ka dib weeraradii lagu qaaday Sacuudiga, laakiin ay ka sugayaan Riyaad xaqiijinta cida weerarka qaaday ka hor inta aysan qaadin wax tallaabo ah.
data.tir: ድሕሪ እቲ ኣብ መሓዛ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ስዑዲ ዓረብ ዝተፈፀመ መጥቃዕቲ ሰራዊት ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ብረቱ ከምዝዓመረ ክሕሰብ ከምዘለዎ ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ገሊፆም ፤ ከምኡ ኮይኑ እውን ግና ቅድሚ ስጉምቲ ምውሳድ እቲ መጥቃዕቲ መን ከምዝፈነዎ ካብ ሪያድ መረጋገፂ ከምዝደልዩ ኣገንዚቦም ።

data.eng: Over 12 miles (19 km) of roads are closed for traffic in central London.
data.aaf: Fanti Londonih Addal 12 Meal (19 K.M) Gitite Tarafikih Alfimteh.
data.amh: በማዕከላዊ ለንደን ውስጥ ከ 12 ማይል (19 ኪ.ሜ) በላይ መንገዶች ለትራፊክ ተዘግተዋል።
data.orm: Giddugala Londonitti karaan maayila 12 (19 km) sababa tiraafikiim cufame.
data.som: In ka badan 12 mayl (19 km) oo waddooyinka bartamaha London ah ayaa laga xiray isku socodka.
data.tir: ኣብ ማእከላይ ለንደን ልዕሊ 19 ኪሎ ሜተር ዝኾና ጽርግያታት ተዓጽየን ኣለዋ።

data.eng: Doctors Without Borders alleges the World Health Organisation is rationing vaccines for Ebola in the Democratic Republic of the Congo despite adequate resources.
data.aaf: Filibiinik Qafiyat ludi Ta baaxok Agatak Xengue Dalka Qadqa yeyeqe, Ta lakimah 622 edde rabe.
data.amh: ድንበር የለሽ ዶክተሮች የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት በዲሞክራቲክ ሪፐብሊክ ኮንጎ ለኢቦላ ክትባቶች በቂ ግብአት ቢኖርም በራሽን እየሰጠ ነው ሲሉ ከሰዋል።
data.orm: Dooktors Wizaawut Boorders, Dhaabbanni Fayyaa Addunyaa utuu galteen gahaan jiruu dhiyeessii talaallii Iboolaa Rippabilika Diimokiraatikii Koongoo keessatti daangesse jechuun himate.
data.som: Dhakhaatiirta Aan Xudduudda Lahayn waxay ku eedeeyeen Ururka Caafimaadka Adduunka inuu tallaalka cudurka Ebola u ku yaraynayo Jamhuuriyadda Dimuqraadiga ee Congo inkasta oo ay haystaan talaal ku filan.
data.tir: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኣብ ዴሞክራክቲክ ሪፐብሊክ ኮንጐ እኹል መጠን እናሃለወ ግን ድማ ንክትባት ኢቦላ ብመቑነን ክዋሃብ ይገብር ኣሎ እንትብል ትካል ኣልቦ ዶብ ሓካይም ከሲሱ።

data.eng: Japan and South Korea fail to make progress toward resolution, but agree to continue dialogue.
data.aaf: Xakak way osimak yemetek iran ameerikah xaylo iro caagida buxak iro sado yaysaben.
data.amh: ምንም እንኳን ጃፓን እና ደቡብ ኮሪያ መፍትሔ ላይ ለመድረስ ማያሻሻያ ማሰየት ባይችሉም ውይይቱን ለመቀጠል ተስማምተዋል።
data.orm: Jaappaanii fi Kooriyaan Kibbaa araaraaf fooyya'iinsa agarsiisuu dadhaban, garuu akka marii itti fufan waliigalan.
data.som: Japan iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa ku guuldareystay inay horumar ka gaaraan xallinta khilaafadka, laakiin waxay ku heshiiyeen inay sii wadaan wadahadalka.
data.tir: ጃፓንን ደቡብ ኮርያን ጎንፀን ክፈትሓ እንተዘይከኣላ’ኳ ዘተ ክቕፅላ ተሰማሚዐን።

data.eng: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reports the number of deaths caused by vaping-associated pulmonary injury has risen to 27, with an additional 1,299 cases of non-fatal injuries.
data.aaf: Dalka Lowsisi kee Kalali Fantee eele tiysixigenal 27 Rabeeh, tohilih 1,299 biyakite.
data.amh: የማእከላዊ የበሽታ መከላከያ እና መቆጣጠሪያ መምሪያ ከእንፋሎት ጋር በተገናኘ በተከሰተ የሳምባ ላይ ችግር 27 ሞቶች እና 1299 ተ¹ዳኝ እና ለሞት ማያበቁ ጉዳቶች መከሰታቸውን አሳወቀ።
data.orm: Giddugalli To'annoo fi Ittisa Dhibee baay'inni du'a miidhama pulmoonerii veepiingiin walqabatee dhufu gara 27'tti akka olka'e, baay'nni dhukkubsataa miidhaa hamaa hin taane 1,299 dabalataas akka jiru gabaase
data.som: Xarumaha Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada ayaa soo tebinaya tirada dhimashada ee ay sababtay uumiga laxiriira sambabada ayaa gaartay 27, waxa kalo laso tabiyay 1,299 xaaladood oo dheeri ah oo dhaawacyo aan dhimasho lahayn ah.
data.tir: ማእኸል ምቁፅፃርን ምክልኻልን ሕማም ምስ ምሙዓግ ሺሻ ዝመስል ትምባኮ ብዝተኣሳሰረ መጉዳእቲ ሳንባ ናይ ዝሞቱ ሰባት ቑፅሪ ናብ 27 ከምዝዓበየን ካልኦት 1,299 ድማ ናብ ሞት ዘየብፅሕ ጉድኣት ከምዘጋጠሞምን ፀብፂቡ።

data.eng: In a men's football match attended by women supporters for the first time in decades, Iran beats Cambodia 14–0.
data.aaf: Faransa beljim baad kasak teysem kiniwak faransa ill kiroshiya takkay ingilizlih illa ilacabi fanah taturteh.
data.amh: በአሥርተ ዓመታት ውስጥ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ሴቶች ደጋፊዎች በታደሙበት የወንዶች የእግር ኳስ ጨዋታ ኢራን ካምቦዲያን 14-0 አሸነፈች።
data.orm: Dorgommii kubbaa miilaa dhiirotaa deggertoota dubartootaan hirmaatame isa waggootaa kurnan muraasa kessatti yeroo jalqabaaf tahe keessati, Iraan kamboodiyaa 14-0 dhaan injifatte.
data.som: Ciyaarta kubadda cagta ee ragga oo ay ka soo qeybgaleen haween taageerayaal ah markii ugu horreysay muddo tobanaan sano, Iran ayaa 14 - 0 ku kaga badisay kambodia.
data.tir: ንፈላማይ ጊዜ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ደገፍቲ ኣብ ስታዲዮም ኣብ ዝኣተዋሉ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ተባዕትዮ ኢራን ንካምቦድያ 14 ን0 ስዒራ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed wins the 2019 Nobel Peace Prize for his efforts to make peace between Ethiopia and neighbouring Eritrea.
data.aaf: Itiyyipiak Naharsi Mallak D/r Abiyi Acmad Itiyyopiya kee Cugaaneh Tan Eretriyah Fanal Salaam Giniimuh Abeh Yan Macal 2019 Noobil Salaam Acwa Yeyse::
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ዐቢይ አሕመድ በኢትዮጵያና በአጎራባች ሀገር ኤርትራ መካከል ሰላም ለመፍጠር ባደረጉት ጥረት የ 2019 የኖቤል የሰላም ሽልማት አሸነፉ።
data.orm: Ministeerri muummee Abiy Ahimed dhamaatii nageenya Etiyoophiyaa fi ollaashee Ertiraa gidduutti uumuuf taasiseef badhaasa Nobeeli nageenyaa kan 2019 mo'ateera.
data.som: Ra'iisul Wasaaraha Itoobiya Abiy Ahmed ayaa ku guuleystay abaalmarinta Nobel Peace Prize ee sannadka 2019 taas oo uu kuhelay dadaalkii uu galiyaya nabadeynta Itoobiya iyo dalka jaarka ah la ah ee Eritrea.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኢትዮጵያ ኣቢይ ኣሕመድ ኣብ ሞንጎ ኢትዮጵያን ጎረቤት ሃገር ኤርትራን ሰላም ንኽህሉ ብዝገበርዎ ፃዕሪ ተዓዋቲ ሽልማት ሰላም ኖቤል 2019 ኮይኖም።

data.eng: In golf, Tiger Woods wins the inaugural Zozo Championship in Japan by three shots over Hideki Matsuyama for his 82nd career PGA Tour title, tying him with Sam Snead atop the all-time list.
data.aaf: Golfi Addal፣ nbere wuxes 82 hytoh Miratli BiJia Gufne Amontal Jabah Addal qimboh Zoza Shambiyona sidica Girat yeyse፣ ksame Senadulih Kuliwak lowot yuxuyenih.
data.amh: በጎልፍ ውድድር፤በጃፓን በተደረገው የኢናኡጎራል ዞዞ ሻምፒዮንሺፕ ታይገር ዉድስ ለ82 ጊዜ ባደረገው የፒጂኤ ውድድር ሂድኪ ማሱያማን በሶስት ምቶች አሸነፈ፤ ይህም ከሳም ሰኔድ ጋር ተመሳሳይ ውጤት እንዲጋራ ያስችለዋል።
data.orm: gama tapha Goolfiin Taayiger Wuuds tapha baniinsaa Chaampiyeenshippii Zoozoo jappaan keessatti geggeeffama jiru irratti Hideekii Maatisiyaama qabxii sadiin dursuun injifate kunis seena dorgommii badhaasa PGA TOUR kan mataa isaa yeroo 82ffaaf dursaa galmee dorgommichaa yeroo maraa kan ta'e Saam Sneed waliin taphata.
data.som: Golf-ka, Tiger Woods wuxuu ku guuleystey horyaalk Zozo Championship ee Japan isagoo saddex xabbadood ku dhuftay Hideki Matsuyama horyaalkiisii 82 aad ee PGA Tour, isagoo ku xiray Sam Snead liiska ugu sarreeya.
data.tir: ኣብ ጸወታ ጎልፍ፣ ታይገር ዉድስ ኣብቲ ኣብ ጃፓን እተኻየደ መመረቕታ ውድድር ዞዞ ኣብ መበል 82 ጸወታኡ ፒጂኣ ቱር ብዚብል መዓርግ ድሕሪ እቲ ንሂደኪ ማትሱያማ ብሰለስተ ግላዓት ምስዓሩ ምስ ሳም ስናድ ናይ ኩሉ ግዜ ብሉጻት ተጻወትቲ ዝሓዘ ዝርዝር ኣተሓሒዝዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: An archaeologist discovers a 25 m (82 ft)-wide ring cairn dating back to the Bronze Age near Tidenham, Gloucestershire.
data.aaf: Inki Akiolojiyih tuyaxigi Gloucestershire Tidenham Xayikel Qimbimte 25 Mitir (82 Kabela) Baadak Feranto Qari Gee.
data.amh: አንድ አርኪዮሎጂስተ በቲድነሃመ ግሉኬስትሻየር 25 ሜትር(82 ጫማ) የሆነና በነሃስ ዘመን ነበር የተባለ ቀለበትማ የድንጋይ ቦታ አገኘ።
data.orm: Arkiyoolojistiin tokko naannoo Tidenhaam, Giluusestershaayir'tti amartii awaalame 25 m (82 ft) bal'atu kan barri isaa gara Bara Biroonziitti lakkaa'amu argate.
data.som: Khabiir ku takhasusay raadadka qadiimiga ah ayaa helay goob wareega oo baxadeedu dhantahy 25 m (82 ft) oo lo malynayo inay jirtay tan iyo Xilligii Maarta, taas oo laga helay meel u dhow tuulada Tidenham, ee magaalada Gloucestershire.
data.tir: ሓደ በዓልሞያ ስነ ኳዕቲ ኣብ ዘመነ ነሓስ ዝተሰርሐ 25 ሜትሮ ( 82 ጫማ ) ዝስፍሓቱ ካሪን ቀለበት ኣብ ከባቢ ቲደንሃም ኣብ ግሎስተር ሻያር ረኺቡ ።

data.eng: The United States notifies the United Nations of its formal withdrawal from the Paris Agreement.
data.aaf: US I.L.L. 2016 Tekkeh tan Berezixantini Dooroh Udur Ruusiyah Kaba Culal 35 takkeRusiyah Xiblomasite Diriyteh.
data.amh: አሜሪካ ራሷን ከፓሪሱ ስምምነት ማውጣቷን ለተባበሩት መንግስታት ገለፀች።
data.orm: Yunaayitid Isteetis Waliigaltee Paaris keessaa ifaan bahuu ishee Mootummoota Gamtooman beeksifte.
data.som: Mareykanka ayaa ogaysiyay Qaramada Midoobay ka bixitaankeeda rasmiga ah ee heshiiska Paris.
data.tir: ካብ ስምምዕ ፓሪስ ብወግዒ ከም ዘንሰሓበት ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ንውዱብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ሓቢራ።

data.eng: Five Malaysian men are sentenced to six months in jail, fined, and caned for "attempting gay sex".
data.aaf: Konna MaliZiyah Labha “Sitacelta Naddol Fido Fayxi Gibatak”, Mali Digaala kee Coox Keenil Madaqen.
data.amh: አምስት የማሌዥያ ሰዎች ግብረ ሰዶም ለመፈፀም በመሞከራቸው ለስድስት ወር እንዲታሰሩ እና ተጨማሪ ቅጥተ እንዲከፍሉ ተወሰነባቸው።
data.orm: lammiileen Maaleeziyaa shan yakka walqunnamtii saala walfakkataa yaaluu isaaniitiin hidha ji'a ja'aa, adabbii qarshii fi Uleen itti murtaa'eera.
data.som: Shan nin oo reer Malaysia ah ayaa lagu xukumay lix bilood oo xabsi ah, ganaax, iyo garaacid kadib markay isku dayeen galmo khaniisnimo ah.
data.tir: ፈተነ ግብረ ሰዶም ገይርኩም ዝተበሃሉ ሓሙሽተ ማሌዢያውያን ሰብኡት ሽዱሽተ ወርሒ ክእሰሩ፣ብገንዘብ ክቕፁዑን ክግረፉን ተፈሪዶም።

data.eng: The Supreme Court of India rules in favor of Hindus over a place of worship that has been the center of disputes between them and the Muslim community in the country.
data.aaf: Hindik Dagga Raqa Sangara ken kee Ta baaxoh Addal tanih tan muslimin Ayuntih Anakar Fantenal tekke tan salat Aroocal Hindi Xaylo Catah.
data.amh: በሂንዱ እና በአገሪቱ ውስጥ ባለው የሙስሊም ማህበረሰብ መካከል የግጭት መንስኤ በሆነው የአምልኮ ቦታ ላይ የሕንድ ጠቅላይ ፍርድ ቤት ለሂንዱዎች ይደግፋል።
data.orm: Manni murtii olaanaa Indiyaa iddoo waaqeffanna giddu gala waldhabdee hordoftoota amantaa muslimaa fi Hinduu kan taate irratti warra hordoftoota amantaa Hinduutiif Looga.
data.som: Maxkamadda Sare ee Hindiya ayaa u xukuntay dadka Hinduuga goob cibaado oo xudun u ahayd heshiis la’aan u dhexeeysay iyaga iyo bulshada Muslimiinta ah ee dalkaas.
data.tir: ጠቕላሊ ቤት ፍርዲ ህንዲ ንሂንዱን ሙስሊማትን እታ ሃገር ከዋጥጥ ዝፀንሐ መካነ እምነት ንሂንዱ ፈሪዱሎም።

data.eng: An explosion at a fireworks factory in the town of Barcellona Pozzo di Gotto, Sicily, Italy, kills five people and injures two others.
data.aaf: Namma longi Fordal Qiyta baabur giti wastibri፣ niwwork ፣ USik addal makinat boodak addat sugte Sidiica safara tedeeni.
data.amh: በጣሊያን ሲሲሊ ባርሴሎና ፖዞ ዲ ጎቶ ከተማ በርችት ፋብሪካ ውስጥ የተፈጠረ ፍንዳታ አምስት ሰዎች ሲሞቱ ሌሎች ሁለት ሰዎች ደግሞ ቆስለዋል።
data.orm: Xaaliyaanii, Siisilii ,magaalaa Baarseloona Poozzoo di Goottoo keessatti balaa Dhihiinsa warshaa oomisha dhodhotuu irraatti qaqqabeen namni shan yeroo du'an namoonni lama ammoo miidhamniiru.
data.som: Qarax ka dhacay warshadda rashka magaalada Barcellona Pozzo di Gotto, ee deegaanka Sicily, ee wadanka Taliyaaniga, ayaa waxaa ku dhintay shan qof halka laba kalena ay ku dhaawacmeen.
data.tir: ኣብ ጣልያን ባርሴሎና ፖዞ ዲ ጎቶ ተባሂላ ኣብትፅዋዕ ከተማ ሲሲሊይ ኣብ ሓደ ፋብሪካ ርችት ብዝበፅሐ ነታጒ 5 ሰባት እንትሞቱ 2 ድማ ቆሲሎም።

data.eng: The Shanghai police department says that Wang is a conman who was convicted for fraud in 2016 and is being investigated for another case of fraud since April 2019.
data.aaf: Aljentinak iroh caagidah malaak goregu fari lekatuk Limah Butta “Vexzulah Addal Cayliantifiqiya Faximtam elle takkeh tan udur Abtol Asele” Iye.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2016 ዓ.ም ዋንግ በማጭበርበር ተፈርዶበት የነበረ ሲሆን፣ እ.ኤ.አ ከሚያዝያ ወር 2019 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ በሌላ የማጭበርበር ጉዳይ ምርመራ እየተደረገበት መሆኑን የሻንጋይ ፖሊስ መምሪያ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Qajeelchi Poolisii Shaangaayi Waangaan nama nama gowomsu kan bara 2016 keessa hanna waliin dha'uun itti murtaa'ee fi hanna waliin dha'uu kan biraafis Ebla 2019 irraa kaasee kan qoratamaa jirudha jedhe.
data.som: Waaxda bilayska Shanghai ayaa sheegaysa in Wang uu yahay danbiile lagu helay khiyaano sannadkii 2016 -kii waxaana lagu baadhayaa kiis kale oo khiyaano ah tan iyo bishii Abriil 2019 -kii.
data.tir: ዋንግ ብ2016 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ብገበን ምትላል ዝተፈረዶ መዋቕዒ ምዃኑን ካብ 2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ንነዘ ብኻሊእ ተግባር ምትላል ተጠርጢሩ ይፃረይ ከምዘሎን ክፍሊ ፖሊስ ሻንጋይ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: A Camair-Co plane is fired upon while attempting to land at Bamenda Airport, but the pilot manages to safely land the plane with no casualties reported.
data.aaf: Bamanxa Tayara Booxa Yagiluh Gbate Inki Kamair-Ko Tayara Yotoke, Takkay ImmayHadise Wali Taqabi geekal at Tayara Salaamah Tuqrufe.
data.amh: በባሜንዳ አውሮፕላን ማረፊያ ለማረፍ የሞከረ አንድ የካሜር ኮ አውሮፕላን በእሳት ተያያዘ፣ ነገር ግን አብራሪው ምንም አይነት የሞት አደጋ እንዲሁም በሰው ላይ ከባድ ጉዳት ሳይደርስ አውሮፕላኑን በሰላም ማሳረፍ ችሏል።
data.orm: Xiyyaarri Kamaa'ir-Ko Buufata Xiyyaaraa Baameendaatti qubachuuf utuu yaaluu ibiddi qabate, garuu balaliisaan miidhaan tokko utuu hin qaqqabin nagaan xiyaaricha qubachiise.
data.som: Diyaarada Camair-Co ayaa la rasaaseeyay mar ay kusodagaysay garoonka diyaarada ee Bamenda, hase yeeshe duuliyihii ayaa ku guulaystay in uu si nabad ah u soo cago dhigo diyaaradda iyada oo aan la sheegin wax khasaare ah oo ka dhashay.
data.tir: ንብረት መንገዲ ኣየር ካሜሩን ዝኾነት ነፋሪት ኣብ ባሜንዳ መዕርፎ ነፈርቲ ንምዕራፍ ኣብ ትፍተነሉ እዋን መጥቃዕቲ ተኲሲ እኳ እንተገጠማ እቲ ኣብራሪ ነታ ነፋሪት ዋላ ሓደ ጉድኣት ከይበፅሓ ብዳሓን ኣዕሪፋዋ ።

data.eng: Former President of Bolivia Evo Morales lands in Argentina after being granted asylum.
data.aaf: Jaban kee gabi kuriya Cali afkanite Yaysisenim Maxiqinon፣ takkam imay ta walal bisoh cenuh sitagen.
data.amh: የቀድሞው የቦሊቪያ ፕሬዝዳንት ኢቮ ሞራሌስ ጥገኝነት ከተሰጣቸው በኋላ አርጀንቲና ገብተዋል።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin duraanii Boliiviyaa Evoo Moorales erga koolu galtummaa argatee booda Arjentiinaa keessa qubate.
data.som: Madaxweynihii hore ee Bolivia Evo Morales ayaa ka degay Argentina kadib markii la siiyay magangalyo.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ቦሊቪያ ነበር ኢቮ ሞራሌስ ዕቑባ ናብዝሃበቶ ኣርጀንቲና ኣቲዩ።

data.eng: Despite the boycott attempt by Democratic Tsunami, El Clásico is played in Camp Nou, Barcelona, with important security measures.
data.aaf: Awropah Iroba Lig 2 iyan qusba Sanatih Awrobakibi koqsoh kilebite I.L.L. 2021 Aysexeexegek UAFA Tasmite.
data.amh: በዴሞክራቲክ ሱናሚ የአድማ ሙከራ ቢደረግም ኤል ክላሲኮ ወሳኝ የደህንነት እርምጃዎችን በመውሰድ በካምፕ ኑ ባርሴሎና ይካሄዳል።
data.orm: Yaalii uggura Diimokiraatik Tsunaamii malee, El Kilaasikoon Kaamp Nuu, Baarseloonaa keessatti tarkaanfilee nageenyaa barbaachisootiin taphatame.
data.som: Inkastooy iskudayday gooynta dimoqradiyada sunaami, haddana ciyaaraha El Clásico ayaa kadhacaya kamp Nou, Barcelona, iyadoo la qaadayo tallaabooyin ammaan oo muhiim ah.
data.tir: ዋላ እኳ ናይ’ቲ ብዲሞክራስያዊ ሱናሚ ዝፍለጥ ምንቅስቓስ ደገፍቲ ፈተነ ኣድማ እንተገበሩ እቲ ብኤል ክላሲኮ ዝፍለጥ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ግና ኣብ ባርሴሎና ኣብ ስታድዮም ካምፕ ኑ ኣብ ትሕቲ ፅኑዕ ሓለዋ ተኻይዱ።

data.eng: Twitter bans almost 6,000 accounts, alleging that they were "amplifying messages favourable to Saudi authorities" in a Saudi state-backed coordination.
data.aaf: Tiwiter saqudiah Doolatih Catol Takke sitalih : saqudiyah Miraciini edde bicanam farmooma Yaktubem kini” Axcuk 6,000 madah tan Akawuntite soliseh.
data.amh: ትዊተር በሳውዲ መንግስት በተቀነባበረ መልኩ ለሳውዲ ባለስልጣናት መልክትን በማጋነን ወግነዋል ብሎ ያስተዋላቸውን 6000 የሚጠጉ ገፆችን አገደ።
data.orm: Tiwiiter adda-baastota 6,000 guutuu gahu qindeeffama mootummaa Saa'udiin deggeramu keessatti "ergawwan aanga'oota Sa'udiif mijatu guddisu" jechuun uggure.
data.som: Twitter ku wuxuu mamnuucay ku dhawaad 6,000 oo akoon, isagoo ku eedeeyay inay "kordhinayeen farriimaha u wanaagsan mas'uuliyiinta Sacuudiga" ee isku xirka dowladda Sacuudiga.
data.tir: መንግስቲ ስዑዲ ብዘዋደዶ ወፍሪ ዝተሳተፉን ንሰበ ስልጣን ስዑዲ ዝድግፉ መልእኽቲታት ዘጋውሑን 6,000 መፍለዪ ገፃት ትዊተር ኣጊዱ።

data.eng: China announces the reduction of tariffs on 850 products and measures to open markets in several industries.
data.aaf: Chayinal 850 takke Murtitel Meri Aynukusiya kee mango sanaqatootih addal Qadaga fakimtuh Maqatoti elle belem qadose.
data.amh: ቻይና በ 850 ምርቶች ላይ የታሪፍ ቅነሳን በማካሄድ በበርካታ ኢንዱስትሪዎች ላይ ገበያዎችን ለመክፈት እርምጃዎችን እንደምትወስድ አስታውቃለች።
data.orm: Chaayinaan oomishawwan 850 irratti taarifa akka hir'istuufii industiriiwwan muraasa keessatti tarkaaanfii gabaa banuu beeksifte.
data.som: Shiinaha ayaa ku sheegay in ay qiimo dhimis canshuur usamaynayaan 850 alaabooyin iyo tallaabooyinka lagu furayo suuqyada dhowr warshadood.
data.tir: ቻይና ኣብ ልዕሊ 850 ፍርያት ዝኽፈል ቀረጽ ከም እትንኪ ኣብ እተፈላለየ ኢንዱስትሪታት ዕዳጋ ንምኽፋት ስጕምቲ ከም እትወስድን ኣፍሊጣ/ኣላ።

data.eng: Canada's Chief of the Defence Staff General Jonathan Vance announces that some of its military personnel in Iraq will be moved to neighboring Kuwait over safety reasons.
data.aaf: Shangay boliis xinise wange I.L.L. 2016 umadoobah weeqa kak xayowtem kee Qasa-dirik 2019 qimbisak aki umadoobi caadigah fokaaqo kat akuk geytimtam kini.
data.amh: የካናዳ የመከላከያ ሠራተኛ አዛዥ ጄኔራል ቫንታን በኢራቅ የሚገኙ አንዳንድ ወታደራዊ ሠራተኞቻቸው በደህንነት ምክንያት ወደ ጎረቤት ኩዌት እንደሚዛወሩ አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Ajajaan waliigalaa humna waraanaa Kaanaadaa Jeneraal Joonaattaan Vaansee sababa sodaa nageenyaan loltoonni isaa Iraaq keessaa tokko tokko gara biyya ollaa Kuweet akka deeman beeksise.
data.som: Taliyaha Ciidanka Difaaca Kanada General Jonathan Vance ayaa ku dhawaaqay in qaar ka mid ah ciidamadeeda jooga Ciraaq loo rari doono dalka Kuwait ee dariska la ah sababo ammaan dartood.
data.tir: ኤታ ማጆር ሹም ካናዳ ጀነራል ጆናታን ቫንስ ኣብ ዒራቕ ዘለው ዝተወሰኑ ወተሃደራት ካናዳ ንድሕንኘቶም ክበሃል ናብ ጎረቤት ኩዌይት ከምዝጎዓዓዙ ኣፍሊጦም።

data.eng: Japan issues an arrest warrant for former Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn's wife Carole for allegedly lying during testimony.
data.aaf: Jabal Dumaahi Nisan Saqal Karlos gosen Bara Karole mingiriniwakti iyanamal Casbi warkat tece.
data.amh: የውሸት የምስክርነት ቃል ሰታለች በሚል ክስ ጃፓን ለቀድሞው የኒሳን ሊቀመንበር ካርሎስ ጎሰን ሚስት ካሮል የእስር ማዘዣ ሰጠች።
data.orm: Jaappaan haadha warraa duraa taa'aa Niisaan duraanii Kaarloos Ghoosans sababa yeroo ragaa ba'ummaa irrattii sobuu isheetiif ajaja to'annoo jala oolchuu irratti baase.
data.som: Japan ayaa soo bixisay xadhig oo ku aadan guddoomiyihii hore ee Nissan karlos Ghosn xaaskiisa Karole oo lagu eedeeyey inay been kumarkhaati furtay.
data.tir: ካሮል ዝተብሃለት ባዓልቲ ቤት ኣቦወምበር ኒሳን ካርሎስ ጎስን ቃል ምስክርነት እንትትህብ ሓሲዋ እያ ብምባል ንኽትተሓዝ ጃፓን ኣዚዛ።

data.eng: The U.S. Department of the Interior halts its civilian drone program indefinitely out of concerns that China manufactured the fleet via the SZ DJI Technology Company for espionage.
data.aaf: Ameerikak adda caagiidah issi xiroonitteh barnaamiji chayna bicissah tan SZ DJI teknoloojih kampany.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው የውስጥ ጉዳዮች ዲፓርትመንት የሲቪል ድሮኖችን የቻይናው ኤስዜድ ዲጄአይ ቴክኖሎጂ ድርጅት ለስለላ ጥቅም አውሏል ከሚል ጥርጣሬ ጋር በተያያዘ የግል ድሮን ተጠቃሚዎችን አገደ።
data.orm: Kutaan dhimma keessoo U.S yaaddoo Chaayinaan karaa SZ DJI Teekinooloojii basaasaaf seenteetti jedhuun sagantaa dirooniin lammiilee hordofuu dhaabeera.
data.som: Waaxda Arrimaha Gudaha ee Mareykanka ayaa joojineysa barnaamijkeeda diyaaradaha aan duuliyaha lahayn ee rayidka si aan xad lahayn iyada oo laga walwalsan yahay in Shiinuhu soo saaray diyaaradaha iyada oo loo marayo Shirkadda Teknolojiyadda SZ DJI ee basaasnimada.
data.tir: ክፍሊ ውሽጣዊ ጕዳያት ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ነቲ ብሰንኪ ቻይና ብመንገዲ ኩባንያ ስለያ SZ DJI Technology ዝሰነዓቶ ነፈርቲ ዝተላዕለ ስግኣት ፕሮግራም ሲቪላዊ ሰብ-ኣልቡ ነፋሪት ንሓዋሩ ደው ኣቢላቶ ኣላ ።

data.eng: Apple says it is helping authorities in the Pensacola shooting investigation but refuses to unlock their phones.
data.aaf: Apil Elle Iyenal bensakola sisk fokaqoh addal Miraacinu Catam qadosam takaky imay fakuh fayxi kah malon.
data.amh: አፕል የፔንሳኮላ ተኩስ በተመለከተ የህግ አካላትን እየረዳ እንደሆነ ሲገልፅ ስልኮቻቸውን ግል ለመክፈት ፍቃደኛ አይደለም።
data.orm: Aappil qorannoo dhukaasa Pensaakoolaa irratti anga'oota akka gargaaraa jiru garuu bilbiloota isaanii akka hin banne beeksise.
data.som: Apple waxa ay sheegtay in ay ka caawinayso maamulka baaritaanka toogashada Pensacola balse waxa ay diiday in ay furto taleefanadooda.
data.tir: ኣፕል ኣብ ምርመራ ጉዳይ ተኲሲ ፔንሳኮላ ንሰበስልጣን ሓገዝ ይገብር ከምዘሎ ኮይኑ ግና ነቶም ዝተዓፀዉ ስልኪታት ከምዘይኸፍቶም ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Vatican appoints Francesca Di Giovanni undersecretary for multilateral affairs in the Secretariat of State, the first woman to hold a management position in this office.
data.aaf: Vatikan tan Kutbeh buxa Xiniseh Arac Tibixem Qimbo say bara Doolat kutbeh buxat mangomariteh Caagida faranechseka Xi Jovanine Cagila kutbeabenak Hele.
data.amh: ቫቲካን ፍራንሴስካ ዲ ጂኦቫኒን በሚኒስተር ማእረግ ባለብዙ ወገን ጉዳዮች ስራ አስፈፃሚ አድርጎ ሾመ፤ ይህም የመጀመሪያዋ የአስተዳደር ቦታዎችን የያዘች እንስት ያደርጋታል።
data.orm: Vaatikaan Firaanseskaa Di Jiyoovaanii gargaartuu dhimmoota garaagaraa Bulchiinsa Mootummaa, dubartii jalqabaa waajjira kanatti sadarkaa bulchiinsaa argatte godhee muude.
data.som: Vatican -ka aya waxay u magacabeen haweenay lagu magacaabo Francesca Di Giovanni ku -xigeenka xog -hayaha arrimaha dhinacyada badan ee Xoghaynta Dawladda, taaso ka dhigaysa haweeneydii ugu horreysay ee qabata jago maamula oo xafiiskan ah.
data.tir: ቫቲካን ንፍራንሴስካ ዲ ጂዮቫኒ ዝተፈላለዩ ጉዳያት ኣብ ዝጥምት ሴክሬታሪያት ምምሕዳር ሓጋዚት ሴክሬታሪያት ኮይና ክትሰርሕ ሸይማ።ንሳ ኣብቲ ቤት ጽሕፈት ነቲ መዝነት ዝረኸበት ፈላሚት ኣንስተይቲ ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: The NFL's Oakland Raiders officially relocate to Las Vegas, and are now known as the Las Vegas Raiders.
data.aaf: Labha Ibi koqsoh Digir Sayyo Aydukumusal Qimboh Addah Edde yengele Tabna sanati addatIraan Kamboxiyalih 14-0 Teyse.
data.amh: የ ኤንኤፍኤል ኦክላንድ ሬይደርስ በይፋ ወደ ላስ ቬጋስ በመዛወራቸው አሁን የላስ ቬጋስ ሬይደርስ በመባል ይጠራሉ።
data.orm: Ooklaand Raayidersiin NFL ifaan gara Laas Veegas jijjiiramee, amma Laas Veegas Raayideers jedhamuun beekama.
data.som: NFL's Oakland Raiders ayaa si rasmi ah ugu guuray Las Vegas, waxaana hadda loo yaqaan Las Vegas Raiders.
data.tir: ናይ ኣሜሪካ ብሄራዊ ሊግ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ዝኾነ ጋንታ ኦክላንድ ራይደርስ ማእኸሉ ናብ ላስ ቬጋስ ብስሩዕ ብምቕያሩ ካብ ዳጊም ስያሜኡ ላስ ቬጋስ ሪይደርስ ኮይኑ።

data.eng: COVID-19 pandemic in Spain The Ministry of Health of Spain confirms the first case of coronavirus in the country in La Gomera, Canary Islands, from a German tourist.
data.aaf: Koovid-19 lakimi spain addal Qaafiyat malaak naharsi vayresi ta baaxok LA Gomera, canary island germanak wacaysir num baahe.
data.amh: የመጀመሪያው የኮቪድ-19 ተጠቂ በ ካናሪ ደሴተች ላጎመራ በተባለ አካባቢ እንደተገኘ እና ከጀርመን የመጣ ጎብኚ እንደሆነ በስፔን የጤና ሚኒስተር አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Weerara COVID-19 Ispeen keessatti: Ministeerri Fayyaa Ispeen biyyattii keessatti namni dhukkuba vaayirasii koronaan qabame inni jalqabaa Laa Goomera, Odola Kaanaarii keessatti, tuuristii Jermanii tokko irraa tahuun isaa mirkanaa'eera.
data.som: Faafida COVID-19 ee Spain Wasaaradda Caafimaadka ee Spain ayaa xaqiijisay kiiskii ugu horreeyay ee coronavirus ee dalka laga helay La Gomera, jasiiradda Canary, oo ka yimid dalxiise Jarmal ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ስፔይን ብዛዕባ ዝኒሀ ለበዳ ኮቪድ 19 ኣመልኪቱ ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ስፔይን ኣብ ዘውፆኦ ሓበሬታ ኣብታ ሃገር ፈላማይ በቲ ቫይረስ ዝተትሓዘ ሰብ ኣብ ደሴታት ካናሪ ኣብ ላጐሜራ ከምዝተረኸበን ንሱ ድማ ጀርመናዊ ዑደተኛ ከምዝኾነን ኣረጋጊፁ።

data.eng: Winds gusting up to 100 miles per hour have been recorded over much of the United Kingdom and Ireland, causing widespread damage and disruption.
data.aaf: Jabaanal laqanah rabtemi qadad illa 57 faya iye፣ 18,347 kalah kadu hosbital culen.
data.amh: በአብዛኛዎቹ በዩናይትድ ኪንግደም እንዲሁም በአየርላንድ አከባቢዎች ላይ ሰፊ ጉዳት እና መስተጓጎል ያስከተሉ በሰአት እስከ 100 ማይል ፍጥነት ያላቸው ነፋሶች ተመዝግበዋል።
data.orm: Yunaytid Kiingidamii fi Aayerlaand keessatti bubbee furgugifamaa sa'a tokko kessatti maayila 100 fiigu galmaa'een diigamsa fi badii guddaan qaqqabeera.
data.som: Dabaylo ku socda xawaare ilaa 100 mayl saacaddii ayaa laga diiwaan geliyey inta badan Boqortooyada Ingiriiska iyo Ireland, taasoo sababtay burbur baahsan iyo carqalad.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰዓት ክሳብ 100 ማይል ዝሕምበብ ንፋስ ኣብ ዝበዝሑ ክፋላት ዩናይትድ ኪንግደምን ኣየርላንድን ከምዝተመዝገበን ከቢድ ዕንወት ከምዘስዓበን ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: Israel blocks all Palestinian export of agricultural products from the occupied West Bank following Palestinian limitations on imports of Israeli cattle.
data.aaf: Dumaahi Boliviyah berezixant Avo Morales Qokol kah yecenik sara Argentiinal rabe.
data.amh: ወደ አገር ውስጥ በሚገቡት የእስራኤል ከብቶች ላይ የፍልስጤም ውስንነት ተከትሎ በምዕራብ ባንክ የተያዙ ወደ ውጭ የሚላኩ ሁሉም የፍልስጤም የግብርና ምርቶችን እስራኤል ወደ ሀገሯ እንዳይገቡ አግዳለች።
data.orm: Filisxeem horii gaanfaa Isiraa'el gara biyya ishee galchuu daangesuun, Isiraa'el alargee oomisha qonnaa Filisxeem kan Weest Baank isa qabame irraa dhufu hundumaa dhorkite.
data.som: Israa’iil ayaa xannibtay dhammaan wax soo saarka beeraha Falastiin ee ay ka dhoofin jirtay Daanta Galbeed ee la haysto kaddib xaddidaadyada Falastiiniyiinta ee soo dejinta lo'da Israa'iil.
data.tir: ፍልስጥኤም ኣብ ልዕሊ ካብ እስራኤል እተእትወን ከፍቲ ወሰን ድሕሪ ምግባራ እስራኤል ብወገና ካብእትቆፃፀሮ ምዕራባዊ ገማግም ኩሉ ዓይነት ሰደድ ፍርያት ሕርሻ ፍልስጥኤም ኣጊዳ።

data.eng: A court in Israel sentences Sheikh Raed Salah to 28 months in prison for "inciting to terror".
data.aaf: Israilil geytima Sangara buxa Toki Rayix sala : Qarkakis Ugusak: 28 Asliteh Casbi Kal Madaqen.
data.amh: ሸኪህ ራይድ ሳላ ሽብርን በማነሳሳት ክስ በ ሃያ ስምንት ወራት እስራት እንዲቀጣ በእስራኤል የሚገኝ ፍርድ ቤት ወስኗል።
data.orm: Manni murtii Isiraa'el Sheek Reeid Salah yakka shororkeessummaa kakaasuutiin hidha ji'a 28tiin adabe.
data.som: Maxkamad ku taalla Israa’iil ayaa Sheekh Raed Saalax ku xukuntay 28 bilood oo xabsi ah kadib markii lagu eedeeyay “kicinta argagixisada”.
data.tir: ሓደ ቤት ፍርዲ እስራኤል ንግብረ ሽበራ ኣለዓዒሎም እዮም ንዝበሎም ሸኽ ራኢድ ሳላሕ 28 ዓመት ክእሰሩ ፈሪዱዎም።

data.eng: General Motors pulls out of right-hand drive markets, ending the Holden brand in Australia.
data.aaf: Jerneral motoris Awusraraliyah Addal Holden Xiqsita Murti migaq Maqarluk Migdi Kokobise Qadaagak yeyeqeh.
data.amh: በአውስትራሊያ የሚገኘውን ሆልደን የተባለውን የምርት ስም በማቆም የቀኝ መሪ ካላቸው የመኪና ምርት ገበያ ጄኔራል ሞተርስ ወጥቷል።
data.orm: Jeneraal Motors gabaa konkolaataa harka mirgaa keessaa Awustiraaliyaa keessatti maqaa oomishaa Holden dhaabuun ba'eera.
data.som: Shirkada General Motors ayaa ka baxday suuqa baabuurta shookaanta midigta ah, iyagoo soo afjaraya sumaddii Holden ee Australia
data.tir: ጀነራል ሞተርስ ካብቲ ብየማናይ ኢድ ዝምረሓ መካይን ካብ ዕዳጋ ብምውጻእ ነቲ ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ዝርከብ ሆልደን ዝብሃል ምልክት-ንግድ ኣቋረጻ።

data.eng: Lesotho PM Tom Thabane is granted sick leave until 27 February when he is due to appear in court for the murder of his former wife.
data.aaf: Lesothok Naharsi Malaak Tom Thabane Dumah Buxahinah Qidimih Sangara buxal Xayoowak Illa qodo-Dirik 27 Fanah Lakimi Rabo Kah Amcawele.
data.amh: የሌሶቶ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ቶም ትሃባኔ አስከ ከቀድሞ ባለቤታቸው ሞት ጋር በተያያዘ ለሚከታተሉት የፍርድ ቤት ሂደት እስከ የካቲት 27 ድረስ የህክምና የፍቃድ ተሰጣቸው።
data.orm: MM lesettoo Tom Tabaneen yeroo yakka ajjeechaa hadha warra isaanii duraaniitiin mana murtiitti dhiyaachuuf jedhanitti sababa dhukkubaatiin yeroon boqonnaa hanga Onkoloolessa 27tti eyyamameef.
data.som: Raiisel wasaaraha Lesotho Tom Thabane ayaa la siiyay fasax xanuun ilaa 27ka Febraayo kadib oo maxkamad la hor istaajin doono dilka xaaskiisii hore darteed.
data.tir: ናይ ሌሴቶ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ቶም ትባኔ ብቅትለት ሰበይቱ ዝነበረት ተኸሲሱ ናብ ቤት ፍርዲ ክሳብ ዝቕርበሉ 27 የካቲት ናይ ሕማም ዕረፍቲ ተውሂብዎ ።

data.eng: The Carnival of Aalst in Belgium goes ahead despite UNESCO withdrawing its recognition of the event as a Masterpiece of the Oral and Intangible Heritage of Humanity because of Jewish caricatures.
data.aaf: Beljim Addal Aalst Carnival Koros Suwarite Sababah UNISCO Xagesinon Sahdayti Baxih Weelo Asakatle Acwa kee Bayaamah Bisoh Axcele::
data.amh: ዩኔስኮ በቃል እና በማይዳሰስ የሰው ልጅ ቅርስ በአይሁድ የካርቱን ሥዕሎች ምክንያት ቤልጅየም ውስጥ የሚካሄደውን የአልስት ካርኒቫል ዕውቅና ቢሰረዝም ዝግጅቱ ግን ይቀጥላል።
data.orm: Sababa kiraakchara yihuudotaatin UNESCO'n beekamtii akka taatee addaa kan afoolaa fi hambaa afuuraa namoomaatti kenneef irraa mulquyyuu ayyaaneffannaan Karnivaalaa Alist kan beeljiyeemitti gaggeeffamu itti fufa.
data.som: Carnivalka Aalst ee Belgium ayaa sii socda inkasta oo UNESCO ay ka laabatay aqoonsigii ay siisay dhacdadan oo ahayd Heer sare oo ah Hiddaha iyo Dhaqanka Aadamaha ee aan la taaban karin taas oo ay sababtay sawirrada Yuhuudda.
data.tir: ዩኔስኮ ኣብ ቤልጂየም ዝካየድ ምርኢት ጎደና ኣልስት ድንቂ ዘይድህሰስ ቅርሲ ደቅሰባት ብምባል ሂቡዎ ንዝነበረ ኣፍልጦ ብምኽንያት ንኣይሁዳውያን ዘናእሱ ምስልታት እንተልዐሎ’ኳ እቲ በዓል ተፀምቢሉ ውዒሉ።

data.eng: A 300-bed isolation ward has been set up in Islamabad for Chinese citizens returning to Pakistan after vacations.
data.aaf: Rabo Wakti Illa Bakistan Fanah Tandabe Chayinah Xaylo Islambad Addal 300 Kaqada Baxisa Qari Xisime.
data.amh: ከሽርሽር ወደ ፓኪስታን ለሚመለሱ የቻይና ዜጎች በኢስላማባድ 300 አልጋ ያለው የማግለያ ክፍል ተቋቁሟል።
data.orm: Kutaan siree 300 adda baafamanii tursiifamuu lammiiwwan Chaayinaa boqonnaa booda gara Paakistaanitti deebi'aniif Islaamaabaad keessatti qophaa'e.
data.som: Qeyb go’doon ah oo ka kooban 300 oo sariirood ayaa loogu sameeyay Islamabad muwaadiniinta Shiinaha ee ku soo laabanaya Pakistan fasaxyada kadib.
data.tir: ኣብ ኢስላማባድ ንዕረፍቲ ድሕሪ ምጽናሕ ናብ ፓኪስታን ዝምለሱ ቻይናውያን ዜጋታት 300 ዓራት ዘለዎ ግሉል ክፍሊ ተሃኒጹ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Former Santo Domingo mayor Roberto Salcedo Sr. resigns from the government and the Dominican Liberation Party.
data.aaf: Dumaahi Santo Domingo Magaalah Xinisoh Saqal Doolat Kee Roberto Salcedo Sr. Xominican Amobaxaqah Misoynah Miraciinu Cabeh.
data.amh: የቀድሞ የሳንቶ ዶሚንጎ ከንቲባ የነበሩት ሮቤርቶ ሳልቼዶ ከመንግስት ስልጣናቸው እና ከዶሞኒካን ሊብሬሽን ፓርቲ አባልነት ተነሱ።
data.orm: Kantiibaan Santa Domeengoo duraanii kan ta'e Roobeertoo Saalseedoo Siniyor mootummaafi Paartii bilisummaa Dominikaanota keessaa ofbaase.
data.som: Duqii hore ee magaalada Santo Domingo Roberto Salcedo Sr. ayaa iska casilay xilkii dawladda iyo Xisbiga Xoraynta Dominican.
data.tir: ከንቲባ ሳንቱ ዶሚንጎ ነበር ሮቤርቶ ሳልሴዶ ካብ መንግስትን ሰልፊ ሓርነት ዶሚኒካንን መዘነቱ ኣረኪቡ።

data.eng: The Committee on the Rights of the Child of the United Nations condemns the government of the Cook Islands for criminalizing homosexual sex.
data.aaf: Galimaro Alaaqa Gaarih Makaado Sitacelta Naddoh Angaraw Galti Abak Kuki Fordaadi Doolat Waseh.
data.amh: በተባበሩት መንግስታ ስር ያለው የልጆች መብቶች የሚመለከተው ኮሚቴ የኩክ አይስላንድ በግብረሰዶማዊያን ላይ እየወሰደ ያለውን የወንጀል እርምጃ ኮነነ።
data.orm: koreen hojii geggeesituun Mirgoota Daa'immanii Motummoota Gamtoomanii bulchiinsi odola Cook walqunnamtii saala walfakkaataa gosa yakkatti ramaduu isaatiif qeeqan.
data.som: Guddiga Xuquuqda Carruurta ee Qaramada Midoobay ayaa ku cambaareeyey dowladda Jasiiradaha Cook oo dembi ka dhigtay galmada qaniisiinta.
data.tir: ኮሚቴ መሰል ህፃናት ውድብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ናይ ኩክ ደሴታት መንግስቲ ግብረሰዶምነት ብገበን ዘሕትት ክኽውን ብምግባሩ ኮኒንዎ።

data.eng: Astronomers discover 139 new "minor planets" in the Solar System that are beyond the orbit of Neptune, which helps boost odds of finding Planet Nine.
data.aaf: Astoromers Tuyaxigi Bilanet Sagal Gayaamih Saami faya hak bilanetik kalah 139 qusba “ qunxa Bilanet” solar sistemaddal gen.
data.amh: የሥነ ጠፈር ተመራማሪዎች ከኔፕቲውን ምህዋር ያለፉ እና ዘጠነኛውን ፕላኔት የማግኘት እድል በሰፋበት ሁኔታ 139 አዳዲስ "ትናንሽ ፕላኔቶች" በስርዓተ ፀሃይ ውስጥ አገኙ።
data.orm: Qorattoonni hawwaa "pilaanetoota xixiqqoo" haaraa 139 kan orbitii Neeptiyuun ol ta'an, kan barbaacha Pilaanetii Sagalii dhibaa ta'e fooyyessuuf gargaaran, Sirna Soolaarii keessatti argatan.
data.som: Ciidanka Ilaalada Kacaanka Islaamiga ee Iran ayaa geeyay dayax -gacmeedkii ugu horreeyay ee milateri oo uu dalkaasi leeyahy, iyagoo adeegsanaya dayax -gacmeed cusub oo lagu magacaabo “Ghased” (“fariin side”).
data.tir: ተመራመርቲ ህዋ ካብ ምህዋር ኔፕቶን ንነየው ግን ድማ ኣብ ስርዓተ ፀሓይ 139 ሓደሽቲ ኣናእሽቱ ፕላኔታት ዝረኸቡ እንትኾን እዚ ክስተት ነታ ታሽዐይቲ ፕላኔት ንምርካብ ዝሕግዞም እዩ።

data.eng: Fans attend the Vive Latino festival in Mexico City despite coronavirus concerns.
data.aaf: Korenavayiris Taqabite Tanimih Qakol Aba Meksikoh Sitih Addal Vive Latino Festivalat Angalelon.
data.amh: የኮሮና ቫይረስ ስጋት ቢኖርም የቪቬ ላቲኖ ፌስቲቫል ታዳሚዎች በተገኙበት በሜክሲኮ ሲቲ ተደረገ።
data.orm: Yaaddoo vaayirasii koronaa utuu jiruu deggertoonni festivaala Vive Latiinoo Meeksikoo Siitii keessatti hirmaatan.
data.som: Taageerayaal aya ka soo qeyb galay xafladda Vive Latino oo lagu qabtay Magaalada Mexico in kasta oo walaac laga qabo coronaviruska.
data.tir: ሻቕሎት ኮሮና ቫይረስ ዘየገደሶም ኣድነቕቲ ኣብቲ ኣብ ሜክሲኮ ዝተሳለጠ ፌስትቫል ቫይቭ ላቲኖ ተረኺቦም።

data.eng: The Jerusalem Islamic Waqf announces the closure of the Al-Aqsa Mosque and Dome of the Rock to upend contamination of the holy sites from COVID-19.
data.aaf: Covix- 19 isbeenil isbeenik Qafiyat Malak cugane baaxok Gomeray, ganary islandic illa Garman wacaysir fanah korenaviyrisih yintiribixenim warse.
data.amh: እየሩሳሌም ኢስላሚክ ዋክፍ የአል-አቅሳ መስጊድ እና የሮክ ጉልላት የተቀደሱ ቦታዎችን በኮቪድ-19 መበከል ለመከላክለ መዘጋቱን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Waaqif'n Isilaamaa Yerussaalem, bakkeewwan qulqullaa'oo COVID-19 faalamuun irraa hambsiuuf cufamuu Masjiida Al-Aqsaa fi Doom of Rookkii beeksise.

data.eng: 64 Ethiopian illegal immigrants are found dead and 14 alive inside a cargo container on a lorry in Tete Province, Mozambique, apparently having died of asphyxiation.

data.orm: Moozaambik kutaa bulchiinsa Teente keessatti baqattota seeraan alaa lammii Itiyoopiyaa ta'an konteeynarii fe'umsaatiin konkolaataa kessatti fe'amuun imalaa turan sababa qilleensa ga'aa dhabuun ukkaamamanii namoonni 14 lubbuun yoo bararaman namoonni 64 ammoo lubbuun darbaniiru.
data.som: 64 tahriibayaal sharci -darro ah oo Itoobiyaana oo ay qaar mayd yihiin iyo 14 naftu ku jirto aya laga dhex helay konteenar gaadhi xamuula saaran, Gobolka Tete, ee dalka Mozambique, sida muuqata waxa la sheegay inay u dhinteen cabudh.

data.eng: Swedish auto manufacturer Volvo Cars resumes full production at its plant in Torslanda, Sweden, which had been shut down due to the COVID-19 pandemic since March 26, 2020.

data.amh: የስዊድን አውቶሞቢል አምራች የሆነው ቮልቮ መኪናዎች እ.ኤ.አ ከመጋቢት 26 ቀን 2020 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ በ ኮሮናቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ ምክንያት ተዘግቶ በነበረው በቶርላንዳ ፣ ስዊድን ባለው ፋብሪካ ውስጥ ሙሉ ምርቱን እንደገና ጀምሯል።
data.orm: Oomishaan konkolaataa Iswiidin Konkolaataan Voolvoo warshaa isaa Torsilaand, Iswiidin keessaa kan Bitootessa 26, 2020 irraa kaasee sababa weerara COVID-19'n cufamee turetti humna guutuun oomisha jalqabe.
data.som: Shirkada Volvo Cars soo saarta gawaadhida iswiidhishka ayaa si buuxda u bilaawday wax soo saarka warshaddeeda ku taal Torslanda, Sweden, oo loo xidhay masiibada COVID-19 tan iyo 26 kii Maarso, 2020.

data.orm: Weerara COVID-19 Madagaasakaar: Madagaaskaar du'a COVID-19'n dhufe isa jalqabaa gabaaste; kan hojjetaa fayyaa umrii 59 kan dhibee sukkaaraa fi dhiibbaa dhiigaa olaanaan miidhamu tokkoo.
data.som: Faafida COVID-19 ee Madagascar, Madagascar ayaa sheegtay dhimashadii ugu horreysay ee COVID-19; kaas oo aha57 jir la il-darnaa sonkorow iyo dhiig-kar.
data.tir: ማዳጋስካር ብኮቪድ:19 ዘጋጠመ ናይ መጀመርታ ሞት መዝጊባ፤ እቲ ህይወቱ ዝስኣነ ሰብ ብሕዱር ሕማም ሽኮሪያን ፀቕጢ ደምን ዝሳቐ ዝነበረ ዕድምኡ 57 ዓመት ዝኾነ ሰራሕተኛ ጥዕና እዩ።

data.eng: NASCAR becomes the first major American sports league to resume its season since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States.

data.som: NASCAR ayaa noqonayaa horyaalkii ugu horreeyay ee ciyaaraha Mareykanka ee dib u bilowda xilli ciyaareedkiisii tan iyo bilowgii masiibada COVID-19 ee Mareykanka.

data.eng: In a Europe-wide operation, police penetrate EncroChat, a top-secret communications system used by criminals to sell drugs and plan attacks.

data.amh: በአውሮፓ ሰፊ እንቅስቃሴ አማካኝነት አደንዛዥ እጾችን ለመሸጥ እና ጥቃቶችን ለማቀድ ወንጀለኞች የሚጠቀሙበት ከፍተኛ ምስጢራዊ የግንኙነት ስርዓት ኤንክሮቻትን ፖሊስ ይጥሳል።

data.som: Kuguulaystay inay jabiyaan EncroChat, oo ah nidaam isgaarsiineed oo qarsoodi ah oo ay dembiilayaashu u adeegsadaan iibka daroogooyinka iyo qorshaynta weerarrada.

data.eng: Indian Minister of Power R. K. Singh announces that India will halt the importation of US$2.8 billion worth of Chinese power equipment due to heightened tensions between the two nations.

data.amh: የህንዱ የሃይል አቅርቦት ሚኒስቴር የሆኑት አር ኬ ሲንግ ህንድ እና ቻይና በገቡበት እየከፋ በመጣው ውጥረት ምክንያት ህንድ በ2.8 ቢሊዮን የአሜሪካ ዶላር ወጪ በማድረግ ከቻይና ልታስገባ የወሰነችውን የሃይል አቅርቦት መሳሪያዎች ግዢ ታስቆማለች ሲሉ አስታወቁ።

data.som: Wasiirka Korontada Hindiya R. K. Singh ayaa ku dhawaaqay in Hindiya ay joojin doonto soo dejinta qalab koronto ee Shiinaha uuga yimaada oo ay qiimihiisu yahay US $ 2.8 bilyan taas oo ay sababtay tkhuurada labada dal ay isku khuurinayaan oo sii kordhaysa.

data.eng: Several Beirut port officials are placed under house arrest as an investigation starts into how 2,750 tons of ammonium nitrate was left unsecured at a warehouse at the port for six years.
data.aaf: 2,750 Ton ammonium nitrate Fordal Tanih Tan Kaxxa Qarih Addat Lica Ligidih Sita Aminewayiyal manal Dafeytem Fokaqo Qimbimtewak mango Libnan Miraciini Buxa Casbih Addat Yitiribixen.
data.amh: በርካታ የቤሩት ወደብ ባለሥልጣናት 2,750 ቶን የአሞኒየም ናይትሬት ወደብ ላይ በሚገኝ መጋዘን ውስጥ ለስድስት ዓመታት እንዴት ደህንነቱ ሳይጠበቅ ሊገኝ እንደቻለ ምርመራ በመጀመሩ በቤት እስራት ላይ ናቸው።
data.orm: Aangawoonni buufata doonii Beeruut muraasi akkamiin amooniyeem naayitireetiin tooniin 2,750 mankuusaa bakka buufata doonichaa keessatti waggaa ja'aaf utuu hin eegamin akka ture adda baasuuf akkuma qorannoon eegaleen hidhaa mana keessaa jala galan.
data.som: Dhowr sarkaal oo ka tirsan dekedda Beirut ayaa xabsi guri lagu haya iyagoo baaritaan lagu bilaabay iyagoo 2,750 tan oo amooniyam ah lagu cidleeyey bakhaar ku yaal dekedda muddo lix sano ah.
data.tir: 2,750 ቶን ኣሞንየም ናይትሬት ኣብ መኽዝን ወደብ ብዘይጥንቓቐ ንሽዱሽተ ዓመት ናይ ዝተኸዘነሉ ኩነታት ምርመራ ንምጅማር ብርክት ዝበሉ ሰበ ስልጣን ወደብ ቤይሩት ቅውም እሱር ኮይኖም።

data.eng: The MSC Grandiosa disembarks from Genoa, Italy, on a seven-day cruise in the Mediterranean Sea, the first major cruise ship to sail in the Sea in almost five months because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
data.aaf: Coovid-19 Dalka Sababah Amises giraduyus Jenwal፣ Taliyaanal፣ Qasabadi Addal Malcina Ayro Doonik Gexo፣ Badak Addal DoonikikAddal Koona Alsahih Addat Qimboh Addah Doonikil Gexe.
data.amh: ከኮቪድ 19 ወረርሺኝ ከተከሰተ በ|ላ ለአምስት ወረት ጉዞ ሳይደረግ የነበረ ቢሆንም የኤምኤስሲ ግራንዲዮሳ መርከብ ከጄኖዋ ጣልያን በመነሳት ለሰባት ቀን ጉዞ በማድረግ ሜድትራኒያን ባህር ደርሳለች።
data.orm: MSC Giraandiyosaan Jenoyaa, Xaaliyaanii irraa Galaana Medetireeniyaanii keessa guyyaa torbaaf imala jalqabe, sababa weerara COVID-19 gara ji'oota shanii keessatti doonii geejjiba namaa isa jalqabaa guddicha galaanicha keessa imale.
data.som: Markabka MSC Grandiosa wuxuu ka soo baxay Genoa, Talyaaniga, isagoo badda Mediterraneanka ku safri jiray mudo toddobaad ah ayaa masiibada COVID-19 ayaa kukalifay inuu noqdo markabkii ugu weynaa badda ay kudhaaftay muddo ku dhow shan bilood.
data.tir: ኤም ኤስ ሲ ግራንዷሳ ተባሂላ እትፅዋዕ መርከብ ኣብ ባሕሪ ሜዲትራኒያን ጉዕዞ ሸውዓተ መዓልቲ ንምክያድ ካብ ጀኖዋ ዝነቐለት ኰይኑ ብምኽንያት ለበዳ ኮቪድ 19 ኣብቲ ባሕሪ ዳርጋ ኣብ ሓሙሽተ ኣዋርሕ ትጓዓዝ ዘላ ፈላመይቲ መርከብ ኰይና ኣላ።

data.eng: The daily number of new COVID-19 cases in France tops 3,000 for the first time since lockdown eased.
data.aaf: Faransah Addal Waaso Heenik Lakal KOVIX-19 AyrookAyro Ixximak 3,000 Dagga yekkem kini.
data.amh: የእንቅስቃሴውን ገደብ ከላላ በ|ላ በፈረንሳይ በየቀኑ አዲስ በኮቪድ-19 የሚጠቁ ሰዎች ቁጥር 3000 መድረሱ ተነገረ።
data.orm: Erga labsiin mana turuu kaafamee booda Faransaayi keessatti lakkoofis namoota haaraa COVID-19 qabamanii guyyuu gara 3,000'tti ol guddate.
data.som: Tirada maalinlaha ah ee kiisaska cusub ee COVID-19 ee Faransiiska ayaa kor u dhaafaya 3,000 markii ugu horreysay tan iyo fududayntii xayiraadda.
data.tir: ኣብ ፈረንሳይ ተነቢሩ ዝነበረ ዕፅዋ ክልሕልሕ ካብ ዝግበር ንነዘ መዓልታዊ ቁፅሪ ምትሓዝ ኮቪድ-19 ናብ 3,000 ከምዝደየበ ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: Antifa militants, far-right groups, and pro-Confederacy groups clash at Stone Mountain, near the city of Stone Mountain, Georgia.
data.aaf: Afantih Culekala፣ Migdi Buttati kee Konfixireshion qokola Buttati Gorjiyal Xeet Qalel Bodisan.
data.amh: የአንቲፋ ታጣቂዎች ፣ ከፍተኛ የቀኝ ክፍል ቡድን አባላት እና የኮንፌዴሬሽን ደጋፊ ቡድኖች በጆርጂያ ስቶን ማውንቴን ከተማ አቅራቢያ በሚገኘው በስቶን ማውንቴን ውስጥ ግጭት ፍጥረዋል።
data.orm: Joorjiyaa naannoo magaalaa 'Istoon Maawunteen' kessatti hidhattoonni Antifaa,gareen mirga fagoo fi gareen deeggartoota Confedereeshinii walitti bu'an.
data.som: Kooxaha Antifa, kooxaha midigta fog, iyo kooxaha kale ee taageersan Confederacy ayaa dagaal ku dhemaray Buurta Stone, oo u dhow magaalada Stone Mountain, Georgia.
data.tir: ኣብ ጆርጅያ ስቶን ማውንቴን ኣብዝተብሃለ ቦታ ኣንቲፋ ዝተብሃሉን የማናውያንን ፅንፈኛ ጉጅለታት ከምኡ እውን ደገፍቲ ኮንፌዴራሲዮን ዝኾኑ ጉጅለታት ሰሳቶም ተጋጪዎም።

data.eng: The UK's national debt exceeds £2 trillion ($2.61tn) for the first time, according to data from the Office for National Statistics.
data.aaf: Biritaaniyak Agat Abuud Qimboh Addah 2 Tiriliyoon Baawuxi (2.61Ba) Faya Axcelem Agatak Istatistikis KUtbeh Buxak Geutime Oyti Yascase.
data.amh: ከዩኬ የብሔራዊ ስታቲስቲክስ ቢሮ በተገኘ መረጃ የዩኬ ብሄራዊ የብድር እዳ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ከ 2 ትሪሊዮን ፓውንድ ወይም ከ 2.61 ትሪሊዮን ዶላር አለፈ።
data.orm: Akka daataa Waajjira Istaatistiksii Biyyaalessaa irraa argameetti, liqaan biyyaalessaa UK yeroo jalqabaaf tiriiliyoona £2 ($2.61tn) caale.
data.som: Sida xafiiska tirakoobka qaranka ingiriisku uu sheegay deynta qaranka ayaa markii ugu horaysay kor u dhaaftay £2 tiriliyan ($ 2.61tn).
data.tir: ሃገራዊ ዕዳ ዩኬ ካብ 2 ትሪልዮን ፓውንድ (2.61 ትሪልዮን ዶላር) ከምዝዛየደ ቤት ፅሕፈት ሃገራዊ ስታቲስቲክስ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: 2020 NFL season The National Football League will require all coaches and staff in bench areas to wear masks.
data.aaf: 2020 NFL Dahab Agatak Ibi koqsoh Liig Inkih tan Aydakanakisa kee Taama abenit dafeytnah Arooca Addal santi saro kah saritan inah Essere.
data.amh: በ2020 ኤንኤፍኤል የውድድር አመት የብሄራዊ ፉትቦል ሊጉ አሰልጣኞች እና ሌሎች የቡድን ሰራተኞች በተቀያሪ ወንበር አካባቢ በማስክ እንዲንቀሳቁ ጠየቀ።
data.orm: yeroo NFL'ii 2020 Liigiin kubbaa miilaa biiyyalessaa leenjistoonni fi hijjeettoonni nannoo barcumaa hundi akka haguugduu funyanii uffataniif ni ajaja.
data.som: Horyaalka Kubadda Cagta Qaranka ee NFL aya faraya in ay dhamaan ciyaartooyhada iyo tababarayaashu ay xidhaan hagooga afka iyo sanka marka ay fadhiyan goobta ciyaartooyada badalaka xiliga ciyaaraha 2020 ka.
data.tir: ኣብ ናይ ሃገራዊ ማሕበር ክዑሶ እግሪ (NFL) ዓመተ ስፖርት 2020 ኵሎም ኣሰልጠንትን ሰራሕተኛታትን ኣብቲ ኾፍ መበሊ ማስክ ኺገብሩ ኺሓትቶም እዩ።

data.eng: Tropical Storm Nana is expected to strengthen into a strong tropical storm before it makes landfall in Belize tomorrow.
data.aaf: Bangaledesh qasama daakah xaqul beriganigah weqaytih addal hurite akikek dinikitelih boodak wuli 32 namma num rabeh.
data.amh: ሞቃታማ አውሎ ነፋስ ናና ነገ ቤሊዝ ውስጥ ከመድረሱ በፊት ወደ ኃይለኛ ሞቃታማ አውሎ ነፋስ ይጠነክራል ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Obomboleettiin naannoo bantii lafaa Naanaan bor osoo daka Beeliiz hin qaqqabiin dura gara obomboleettii bantii lafaa hamaattii ni guddata.
data.som: Duufaanta Nana ayaa la filayaa inay isku badasho duufaan xoog leh ka hor inta aysan berri ku dhicin dalka Belize.
data.tir: ናና ተባሂሉ ዝተፀወዐ ማዕበል ትሮፒክ ፅባሕ ኣብ በሊዝ ቅድሚ ምዕራፉ ናህሩ ወሲኹ ክጓዓዝ ትፅቢት ተገይሩሉ ኣሎ።

data.eng: COVID-19 pandemic in Slovenia Slovenia registers its highest number of new cases since April 1, with 55 new cases reported in the last 24 hours.
data.aaf: Solviniyal KOVIX-19 Dalka Qasadirik 1 Wadiril Fayale Ixximaleh Tan Qusba Marite Tunkutube, warayte 24 Saqatih Addat 55 takke Qusba Caagidak Gabaaqi Xayoowe.
data.amh: ኮቪድ-19 በስሎቬንያ- በስሎቬንያ ባለፉት 24 ሰአታት ውስጥ ከሚያዚያ ወር መጀመሪያ አንስቶ ከፍተኛ የተባለውን በበኮቪድ-19 የተጠቁ ሰዎችን ቁጥር 55 በመሆን መዝግባለች።
data.orm: Weerara COVID-19 Silooveniyaa: Silooveeniyaan lakkoofsa namoota haaraa dhukkubichaa qaban erga Ebla 1 as isa guddicha, sa'atii 24 darban keessatti lakkoofsa namoota haaraa dhukkubichaan qaban 55 gabaase.
data.som: Faafida COVID-19 ee Slovenia, Slovenia waxay diiwaangelisay tiradii ugu badneyd ee kiisas cusub ah tan iyo 1 dii Abriil, iyadoo 55 xaaladood oo cusub la soo sheegay 24 kii saac ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: ለበዳ ኮቪድ:19 ኣብ ስሎቬኒያ ብዝምልከት ካብ ሚያዝያ ንነዘ ስሎቬኒያ ዝለዓለ ቁፅሪ ሓደሽቲ ዝተትሓዙ ዝመዝገበት እንትኾን ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ጥራሕ ሓደሽቲ 55 ሰባት ከምዝተለኸፉ ፀብፂባ።

data.eng: Turkish Volkan Bozkır becomes the new President of the United Nations General Assembly.
data.aaf: Turkiya Qas-Dirih Gazak flotilla Gadulel Fokaqo Abtuh Turkiyah Miraciinu kee bureaucratite Kommishoinite Xisimte.
data.amh: የቱርኩ ቮልካን ቦዝኪር አዲሱ የተባበሩት መንግስታት ጠቅላላ ጉባኤ ፕሬዚደንት ተደርጎ ተሸመ።
data.orm: Lammiin Turkii Voolkaan Boozkir Pirasdaantii haaraa Walitti-qabama Waliigalaa Mootummoota Gamtoomanii ta'e.
data.som: Volkan Bozkır oo Turki ah ayaa noqday Madaxweynaha cusub ee Golaha Guud ee Qaramada Midoobay.
data.tir: ቱርካዊ ቮልካን ቦዝኪር ሓድሽ ፕረዚደንት ጠቕላሊ ባይቶ ውዱብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: 2020 Stanley Cup Finals The Tampa Bay Lightning win the Stanley Cup for the first time since 2004 following their game 6 victory against the Dallas Stars.
data.aaf: 2020 Stanley kaasih ellacabol tampaa baey lightning teyse ta kaas qemmoh addah 2004 lakal 6 adda geyteh tan mayso dallas sitaaritte luk.
data.amh: የ 2020 በስታንሊ ዋንጫ ፍፃሜ ታምፓ ቤይ ላይቲንግ ከዳላስ ስታርስ ጋር ያደረገውን 6 ጨዋታ ተከትሎ ከ 2004 ወዲህ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የስታንሊ ዋንጫን አሸነፈ።
data.orm: Goolabdoonni Geeba Istaanlii bara 2020, Ze Taampaa Beey Laayitiniing tapha isaanii Daalas Istaars wajjin morkatan si'a 6 mo'ichuu hordofuun erga bara 2004 tii yeroo jalqabaaf Geeba Istaanlii injifatan
data.som: Ciyaarta gunaanadka ee Koobka Stanley 2020, The Tampa Bay Lightning ayaa ku guuleysatay koobka Stanley markii ugu horeysay tan iyo 2004 kadib ciyaartii 6aad ay ka badiyeen Dallas Stars.
data.tir: ንፅዋዕ ስታንሌይ ናይ መወዳእታ ግጥም ዘካየደ ጋንታ ታምፓ ላይቲንይንግ ኣብ ፀዋታ 6 ንጋንታ ስታርስ ስለዝስዓረ ድሕሪ 2004 ዓ.ም.ፈ ንፈለማ ግዜ ፅዋዕ ስታንሌይ ወሲዱ።

data.eng: The U.S. Department of Justice announces the seizure of 92 domain names believed to be used by the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps to "spread pro-Iranian disinformation".
data.aaf: ISrail Awra ill Baaxoh Addah elle cutamal falastin Adatinok ugut abak israil falastinik mawyanan Buqre kee murti Tabixek Ayro korma banki wasisa.
data.amh: “የኢራን ደጋፊ መረጃን ለማሰራጨት” በእስላማዊ አብዮታዊ ጥበቃ ሃይሎች ጥቅም ላይ እንደዋሉ የሚታመኑ ዘጠና ሁለት የጎራ ስሞችን መወገድ የአሜሪካ የፍትህ መምሪያ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Dippaartmentiin Haqaa U.S maqaa doomenii 92 kan Garee Eegduu Warraaqsa Isilaamummaa Iraaniin fayyadamamu jedhamee amanamu kan "oduu doggogoraa Iraaniin deggeru facaasu" f oolan qabachuu isaa beeksise.
data.som: Waaxda cadaaladda ee Mareykanka ayaa ku dhawaaqday qabashada 92 magac domain oo la rumeysan yahay in ay isticmaalayeen Ilaalada Kacaanka Islaamiga ah si ay "faafiyaan macluumaadka taageersan Iran".
data.tir: ኮር ዋርድያ እስላማዊ ወያነ ዝተበሃለ ጉጅለ ንኢራን ዝወገነ ግጉይ ሓበሬታ ንምንዛሕ ከምዝጥቀመሎም ዝተኣመነሎም 92 ኣስማት ድረ ገፅ ከምዝሓዘ ሚኒስቴር ፍትሒ ኣሜሪካ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Multiple skeletons of Oksoko avarsan are discovered in the Gobi Desert in Mongolia.
data.aaf: NASA marisil Qusba Manoh Oytih Yabbite Bayisah, Takkay Iammay Yaxxigenimih Fayxi Rover Mango Qunxah tan Geyentit Abbak Gettima.
data.amh: በሞንጎሊያ ጎቢ በረሃ ውስጥ ብዛት ያላቸው የኦክሶኮ ኣቫርሳን አፅሞች ተገኙ።
data.orm: Lafee hedduun Oksookoo Avaarsan gammoojjii Goobii Mongooliyaa keessatti argamaniiru
data.som: Qalfoofyo badan oo Oksoko avarsan ayaa laga helay Lamadagaanka Gobi ee Mongolia.
data.tir: ኣብ ሞንጎልያ ኣብ ምድረበዳ ጎቢ ብዙሕ ክፋላት ኣስከሬን ናይ Oksoko avarsan ተረኺቡ።

data.eng: Rwanda legalizes the production of medical cannabis for export, but the Health Ministry states that cannabis consumption of any kind in the country will remain illegal.
data.aaf: Ruwanaxa Dayli kanabise Illa iro ruubak Ganun Abte፣ Takakay imay Ta abaxoh Addal waliqaynatih kanabise bayisiyi ganuun akuk sugelemQafiyat Dacarih Malaak qadose.
data.amh: ሩዋንዳ የካናቢስ የህክምና ምርትን ወደ ውጭ ለመላክ ሕጋዊ አደረገች ፤ ነገር ግን በአገሪቱ ውስጥ ማንኛውንም ዓይነት የካናቢስ አደንዛዥ እፅ ፍጆታ ሕገ-ወጥ ሆኖ እንደሚቆይ የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትሩ ገልፀዋል።
data.orm: Ruwaandaan kanaabisii fayyaa alergeef oomishuu heyyamte, garuu Ministeerri Fayyaa, biyyattii keessatti kanaabisii gosa kamiiyyuu fudhachuun seeraan ala akka tahe eere.
data.som: Rwanda waxay sharciyeysay soosaarka xashiishadda caafimaadka ee loo dhoofiyo dalka dibadiisa, laakiin Wasaaradda Caafimaadka ayaa sheegeysa in isticmaalka xashiishadda dalka gudeheeda ay sii ahaan doonto sharci darro.
data.tir: ሩዋንዳ ንወጻኢ ሰደድ ዝኸውን ሕክምናዊ ካናቢስ/ሓሺሽ ምፍራይ ሕጋዊ እኳ እንተ ገበረቶ ሚኒስትሪ ጥዕና ከም ዝገለጸቶ ግን ኣብታ ሃገር ዝኾነ ይኹን ዓይነት ምግቢ ካናቢስ ዘይሕጋዊ ክኸውን እዩ።

data.eng: The Gambia announces that they have submitted a lawsuit against Myanmar for their role in the Rohingya genocide at the International Court of Justice in The Hague.
data.aaf: Gambiya Hedil Geytima Baad Caadoh Sangarah Buxa Hohiniyah kititifih Addat Abeenih Yannin Doori Meynamaral Meklis Xayosem Qadose
data.amh: ጋምቢያ ከሮሂነግያ የዘር ጥፋት ጋር በተያያዘ ማይናማር ላይ በሄግ ለሚገኘው የአለም አቀፉ የፍትህ ጉዳዮች ፍርድ ቤት ክስ እንዳቀረበች አስታወቀች።
data.orm: Gaambiyaan himannaa Mayaanmaar duguuggaa sanyii Rohingyaa keessaa ga'ee qabdi jedhu Mana Murtii Haqaa Addunyaa kan Haguwe kessatti argamutti galfachuu beeksiste.
data.som: Gambia ayaa sheegtay inay Myanmar ku dacweeyeen Maxkamadda Caalamiga ah ee Hague gacantii ay ka gaysteen xasuuqii Rohingya.
data.tir: ማይናማር ኣብ ምፅናት ዓሌት ሮሂንጋ ዝነበራ ተራ ብዝምልከት ክትሕተተሉ ኣብ ሄግ ኣብ ዝርከብ ዓለም ለኸ ቤት ፍርዲ ክሲ ከምዝመስረተት ጋምቢያ ኣፍሊጣ ።

data.eng: The Greek Navy's mine countermeasures vessel HS Kallisto is cut in two in a collision with a container ship.
data.aaf: 100 mayilik/saqatak dagga silaytite lehtan caylale xireko fanti macak Usik afara bool 11 milyoon dolaarih taqabi madise.
data.amh: ኤች ኤስ ካሊስቶ የግሪክ ባሕር ኃይል የማዕድን ማውጫ መርከብ ከሌላ የእቃ መጫኛ መርከብ ጋር በመጋጨቱ ለሁለት ተከፍሏል።
data.orm: Dooniin albuuda humna ittisa bishaanirraa Giriik, Kaallistoo HS doonii fe'umsaa waliin walitti bu'uu isaatiin bakka lamatti adda bahe.
data.som: Markabka miinooyinka ee milateriga ee Giriigga HS Kallisto ayaa laba u kala jabay kadib markay isku dhaceen markab konteenar ah.
data.tir: ኤች ኤስ ካሊስቶ ዝተብሃለት ነታጒ እተፅሪ መርከብ ግሪስ ምስ ሓንቲ ኣቑሑት እትፅዕን መርከብ ተላቲማ ኣብ ክልተ ተገሚዓ።

data.eng: FIFA announces that the President Gianni Infantino tests positive for COVID-19.
data.aaf: Fifa berezixanti Jiyaneni Enefanetino kovix-19 yintiribixem Qadose.
data.amh: ፊፋ ፕሬዚዳንቱ ጂያኒ ኢንፋንቲኖ ኮቪድ-19 እንደተገኘባቸው አስታወቀ።
data.orm: FIFAn pireezidaanti Jiyaanii Infaantiinoon dhibee Covid-19 qabamuu isaanii ifoomse.
data.som: FIFA ayaa ku cadaysay in Madaxweynaha Gianni Infantino laga helay COVID-19.
data.tir: ፕረዚደንት ፊፋ ጅያኒ ኢንፋንቲኖ ዘካየዶ መርመራብኮቪድ 19 ከምዝተትሓዘ ፊፋ ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: The Czech Police Forces announce that they will carry out random border checks with Austria as a preventive measure against terrorism.
data.aaf: Czech Boliis Cayliteta Qarkakisa Kalaloonuh Inki Kalali Qandeh Maqata Ostiriyalih Isinifaxenik Cuduud Taftish BaeloonumQadose.
data.amh: የቼክ ፖሊስ ኃይሎች ሽብርተኝነትን ለመከላከል የሚስችል እርምጃን ከኦስትሪያ ጋር ድንገተኛ የድንበር ፍተሻ እንደሚያካሂዱ አስታውቀዋል።
data.orm: Humnoonni Poolisii Cheek tarkaanfii ittisa shororkeessummaaf darbee darbee to'annoo daangaa Ostiriyaa irratti akka geggeessu beeksise.
data.som: Ciidamada Booliiska Czech waxay ku dhawaaqayaan inay si aan kala sooc lahayn u baari doonaan xuduudaha Austria si ay uga hortagaan argagixisada.
data.tir: ሓይሊታት ፖሊስ ቼክ ግብረ ሽበራ ንምክልኻል ዝዓለመ ሃንደበታዊ ተፍትሽ ኣብ ዶብ ኦስትሪያ ከምዘካይዱ ዕላዊ ገይሮም ።

data.eng: Baby Shark Dance, produced by Pinkfong, surpasses "Despacito" as the most-viewed video on YouTube.
data.aaf: Genekefonege Yekke Quxa Awkih Shikera Xansi Yutyubul Nabam Yumbuluye Vixiyo ‹ xesebesito> Lafitah
data.amh: በዩትዩብ እይታ ብዛት በፒንክፎንግ የተዘጋጀው ቤቢ ሻርክ የተባለው ዳንስ ዴስፓሲቶ የተባለውን ቪዲዮ በለጠው።
data.orm: Sirbi Beebii Shaark, Pinfong'n kan hojjetame, Yuutiyuubii irratti "Despacito" darbuudhaan viidiyoo hunduma caalaa ilaalame ta'e.
data.som: Qoob-ka-ciyaarka Shark Baby, oo ay soo saartay Pinkfong, ayaa la dhaafay heesta "Despacito" oo ah muuqaalka loogu daawashada badan yahay YouTube-ka.
data.tir: ፍርያት ፒንከ ፎንግ ዝኾነ ቤቢ ሻርክ ዳንስ ነቲ ዴስፓክቶ ብዝብል ዝፍለጥ ብምብላፅ ኣብ ዩቲዩብ ብበዝሒ ሰብ ዝረኣዮ ቪድዮ ኮይኑ ።

data.eng: The Egyptian Football Association announces that Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah has tested positive for COVID-19 shortly before Egypt's 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier match against Togo.
data.aaf: NFL Okilanidu Rado aba Ambuluyuk Illa Las Vegas fanah taturen፣ kee Tawak Las Vegas Radoaba Iyanamal Tamixige.
data.amh: የግብፅ እግር ኳስ ማህበር በ 2021 ግብፅ ከቶጎ ጋር የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ማጣሪያ ጨዋታ ከማድረጓ በፊት የሊቨርፑል የፊት መስመር ተጫዋች ሞሃመድ ሳላህ በቅርቡ ኮቪድ -19 ተመርምሮ እንደተገኘበት አስታውቋል
data.orm: Waldaan Kubbaa Miilaa Gibxii dorgommii gulaallii Geeba Biyyoota Afirikaa bara 2021 kan Gibxi Toogoo waliin taphattu xiqqoo dursee taphataan sarara duraa Liiverpuul Mohaammed Saalaan qorannoo COVID-19'f posatiivii akka tahe beeksise.
data.som: Xidhiidhka Kubadda Cagta Masar ayaa ku dhawaaqay in weeraryahanka Liverpool Maxamed Saalax laga helay COVID-19 waxyar ka hor kulanka isreeb-reebka Koobka Qaramada Afrika ee 2021 ay Masar la yeelan lahaayd Togo.
data.tir: ግብፂ ኣብ 2021 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ዝካየድ ግጥም ፅዋዕ ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ንምስታፍ ዘኽእል ፀዋታ ምስ ቶጐ ንምግባር ኣብ ዝተዳለወትሉ ቅድሚ ውሱን ግዚያት እቲ ናይ ሊቨርፑል ኣጥቓዓይ መሓመድ ሳሊሕ ብኮቪድ:19 ከምዝተትሓዘ ማሕበር ኩዕሶ እግሪ ግብፂ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Kosovo's parliament unanimously approves deploying the Kosovo Security Force on international peacekeeping missions, following a formal request by the United States Central Command.
data.aaf: Kosovoh Barlama USi Fanti Izik Madab Essero Kosovo Say Caylih Baadal Salaam Dacayril Madamal kah gacanah Xongolo Faticisen.
data.amh: የኮሶቮ ፓርላማ ከአሜሪካ መአከላዊ ትእዛዝ የመጣለትን ጥያቄ በመቀበል የሃገሪቱን የድህንነተ እና የፀጥታ ሃይል በአለም አቀፍ የሰላም ማከበር ተልእኮ ላይ እንዲሳተፍ ሲል በአንድ ድምፅ አፀደቀ።
data.orm: Paarlaamaan Kosoovoo gaaffii karaa seera qabeessa Ajaji Giddugaleessaa Yuunaayitid Isteetis dhiyeesse hordofuun Humna Nageenyaa Kosoovoo ergama naga eegdummaa addunyaaf akka bobba'an mirkaneessan.
data.som: Codsi rasmi ah oo ka yimid taliska dhexe ee Maraykanka kadib baarlamaanka Kosovo ayaa si aqlabiyad leh u ansixiyay in ciidanka ammaanka Kosovo la geeyo hawlgallada nabad ilaalinta ee caalamiga ah.
data.tir: ባይቶ ኮሶቮ ካብ ማእከላይ እዚ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ወግዓዊ ሕቶ ምስ ቀረበሉ ሓይሊ ጸጥታ ኮሶቮ ኣብ ተልእኮ ኣህጉራዊ ምዕቃብ ሰላም ክሳተፍ ብሓደ ድምጺ ኣጽዲቑ።

data.eng: Twitter says that they have suspended over 70,000 accounts linked to the QAnon conspiracy since the Capitol storming.
data.aaf: I.L.L. 1986 Awustaraliyah Baddih Qaxal Geytimteh Tan Namma dendrogramma DuruyaFaxeaynatih Sgte Filmiteh Addal Madabah Gacewanam Akkuk Geytime.
data.amh: ትዊተር ከካፒተል ቀውስ በ|ላ 70000 የሚጠጉ አካውንቶችን ከቃኖን ቅሌት ጋር በተያያዘ እንዳገደ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Tiwiteer akkaawuntii 70,000 oduu QAnon waliin hidhata qabanii mormii cimaa Kaapitooliin as akka ugguran ifoomse.
data.som: Twitter ka ayaa sheegay inay joojiyeen in ka badan 70,000 oo cinwaano ah oo lala xidhidhiyay shirqoolkii QAnon tan iyo markii Capitol ay duufaanta gashay.
data.tir: ትዊተር ኣብ ልዕሊ ህንጻ ካፒቶል ድሕሪ እቲ ዝተፈጸመ መጥቃዕቲ ልዕሊ 70,000 ምስ ውዲት QAnon ርክብ ዝነበሮም ሕሳባት ደው ከም ዘበለ ጠቒሱ።

data.eng: United States Vice President Mike Pence congratulates incoming Vice President Kamala Harris, 73 days after the presidential election.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Cigiila Berezixenti Mayik bensi Tamaateh Tan Cigiilta Berezixanti Kamala Carisih Gadda Gacise. Berezixantiini Dooro 73 Ayrook Lakal.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ምክትል ፕሬዚደንት ማይክ ፔንስ የፕሬዚደንታዊው ምርጫው ከተጠናቀቀ 73 ቀናት በ|ላ ለሚመጡት ምክትል ጠቅላይ ሚኒስቴር ካማላ ሃሪስ የእንኳን ደስ አለሽ መልእክተ አስተላለፉ።
data.orm: Itti Aanaan Pirezidaantii Yunaaytid Isteetis Maayik Peens erga filannoon xumuramee guyyoota 73 booda itti aantuu haaraa dhufaa jirtu Kamaalaa Haarisiif erga baga gammadde dabarsan.
data.som: Madaxweyne ku xigeenka Mareykanka Mike Pence ayaa u hambalyo u diray madaxweyne ku xigeenka imanaysa ee Kamala Harris, 73 maalmood kadib doorashadii madaxwane nimada.
data.tir: ኣሜሪካዊ ምክትል ፕረዚደንት ማይክ ፐንስ፣ ድሕሪ ዝተኻየደ 73 መዓልታት ፕረዚደንታዊ ምርጫታት ንእትመጽእ ምክትል ፕረዚደንት ዝኾነት ካማላ ሃሪስ ደስታኡ ገሊጹ።

data.eng: Polish biotechnology company Mabion S.A. signs an agreement with Novavax to begin commercial-scale production trials for Novavax's future vaccine.
data.aaf: Bolanxih Bio-Technologih Kubaniya Mabion S.A Novavax's Sari Diwata Kabxah Aqikiniyih Kibatite Qimbisoonuh Novavaxlih Sitingey Yifrimen.
data.amh: የፖላንድ የባዮቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ማቢዮን ኤስ.ኤ ለኖቫቫክስ የወደፊት ክትባት ለንግድ የሚሆን የምርት ሙከራ ለመጀመር ከኖቫቫክስ ጋር ስምምነት ተፈራረመ።
data.orm: Dhaabbanni baayootekinoolojii Poolaand, Maabiyoon S.A'n Noovaavaaks wajjin talaallii Novaavaaks fuulduraa oomisha yaalii iskeelii daldalaatiin akka eegalan waliigaltee mallatteessan.
data.som: Shirkadda teknolojiyadda cilmiga bayoolajiga ee Mabion S.A. waxay heshiis la saxiixatay Novavax si loo bilaabo tijaabooyinka wax soo saarka baaxadda leh ee tallaalka mustaqbalka Novavax.
data.tir: ፖላንዳዊት ኩባንያ ባዮተክኖሎጂ ማብዮን ኤስ.አይ ኣብ መጻኢ ንኖቫቫክስ ዝኸውን ክታበት ናይ ንግዲ ፈተናታት ንምጅማር ምስ ኖቫቫክስ ስምምዕ ፈሪማ።

data.eng: YouTube suspends channels run by Myanmar's military and removes junta propaganda videos for "violating its community guidelines and terms of service".
data.aaf: Yuttiyub Xinqista Mangaafa Maynamar Qandeh Gubat Raqta Chanalite gexegak kee Ta Juntah Boroboganxooxih Vixiyooya "Ayyuntiteetah Edde Xinteeta kee Ayfaafite Ganasaqo Cinak Bayisah".
data.amh: ዩትዩብ በማይናማር ወታደራዊ ድርጅት ባለቤትነት የሚዘወረውን እና የጁንታ ፕሮፓጋንዳ ቪድዮወችን በመልቀቅ የማህበረሰብ ህግ እና ደንቦቸን የጣሰውን ቻናል ዘጋ።
data.orm: Yuutiyuubin chaanaalii humna waraanaa maayanmaarin hoogganamu uggure, akkasumas suur-sagalee piroopagaandaa abbaa hirree 'walii galtee tajaajila hawaasaa isaatii cabsuu' kan jedhuun haqeera.
data.som: YouTube ayaa joojiyay kanaallada ay maamulaan milatariga Myanmar waxayna ka saareen muuqaalada dacaayadda junta “ku xadgudubka tilmaamaha bulshada iyo shuruudaha adeegga”.
data.tir: ዩትዩፕ ብሰንኪ "ጥሕሰት ማሕበራዊ መምርሒታትን ኩነታት ኣጠቓቕማን" ነተን ብሰራዊት ሚያንማር ዝመሓደራ ቻነላት ኣወንዚፉ ብወተሃደራዊ ባይቶ ጁንታ ዝተዘርገሑ ናይ ፕሮፖጋንዳ ቪድዮታት ኣሊዩ።

data.eng: Gujarat reports a record 12,553 new cases of COVID-19 in the past 24 hours.
data.aaf: Gujrat Waraye 24 Saqatih Addat 12,553 Qusba Kovix-19Caagida Tunkutube.
data.amh: ጉጃራት ባለፉት 24 ሰዓታት ውስጥ ሪከርድ የሆነ 12,553 አዲስ የ COVID-19 ታማሚዎችን ሪፖርት አደረገች።
data.orm: Gujaraat sa'atiiwwan 24 darban keessatti namoota COVID-19'n qabaman haaraa 12,553 galmeessite.
data.som: Gujarat ayaa sheegay in 12,553 xaaladood oo cusub oo ah COVID-19 lahelay 24 tii saacadood ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: ጉጃራት ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 24 ሰዓታት 12,553 ሓደስቲ መልኸፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ከም ዘጋጠመ ጸብጻብ ሂባ/ኣላ።

data.eng: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky invites his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin to a face-to-face meeting on the front line in the war-torn Donbas to negotiate an end to the conflict.
data.aaf: Fayale Kiblati Kuriyah Yabukeh yan Hwang Jang-yobut Rabi Gibatu Abnisak Namma KiblatiKuriyah Xaylo Casbih Digalimeh.
data.amh: የዩክሬኑ ፕሬዚደንት ቮሎዲመር ዜልንስኪ ለሩሲያ አቻቸው ቭላድሚር ፑቲን በጦርነት እጅጉን በተጎዳቸው በዶንባስ ተገናኝተን ስለ ግጭቱ ማብቂያ ፊት ለፊት እንወያይ ሲሉ ግብዣ አቀረቡ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Yukiriyeen Voloodimir Zeleniskii gita isaa Raashiyaa Vilaadmir Puutiniin bakka waraanaan diigamte Doonbas keessatti fuuldura waraanaatti mareen akka rakkoo xumuraniif marii fuulaa fuulattiif afeere.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky ayaa ku casuumay dhiggiisa Ruushka Vladimir Putin kulan Waji iyo waji ah oo ka socda jiidda hore ee dagaalka Donbas si looga xaajoodo joojinta colaadda.
data.tir: ፕረዚደንት ዩክረይን ቮሎዲሚር ዘለንስኪ ነቲ ሩስያዊ ብጻዩ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን ኣብቲ ብውግእ ዝዓነወት ግንባር ዶንባስ ውግእ ደው ንምባል ገጽ ንገጽ ክራኸብ ዓዲሙዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The United States Navy announces that it has seized a shipment of thousands of weapons in a stateless dhow on the Arabian Sea believed to be en-route to Yemen.
data.aaf: USik Navy Baddi Qande Illa Yaman Gexelon Axcuk Minuk Qarab Baddal Alafaatal Lowinta Qeebi Aslacooci Tibixem Qadose.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ባሕር ኃይል ወደ የመን ይጓዛል ተብሎ በሚታመን በአረብ ባህር ላይ ሀገር አልባ በሆነ ጀልባ ውስጥ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ የጦር መሣሪያዎችን በቁጥጥር ስር መዋሉን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Humni Galaanaa Yunaayitid Isteetis meeshaaleen waraanaa kumootaan lakkaa'amu doonii abbaa hin qabnetti fe'amee gara Yemen deemaa jiru galaana Arabiyaa irratti akka too'ate beeksise.
data.som: Ciidamada badda ee Maraykanka ayaa ku dhawaaqay in ay qabteen shixnad hub ah oo kumannaan hub ah oo saarnaa doon aan wadan oo marayey badda Carabta oo la rumeysan yahay in ay ku sii jeeday dalka Yemen.
data.tir: ሓይሊ ባሕሪ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ናብ የመን ተፃዒኑ ዝጓዓዝ ከምዝኾነ ዝግመት ኣሽሓት ኣፅዋራት ኣብ ባሕሪ ዓረብ ኣብʼታ መንግስቲ ኣልቦ ዝኾነት ዳው መርከብ ከምዝሓዘ ኣፍሊጡ ።

data.eng: Eid al-Fitr, the "Feast of Breaking the Fast" that marks the end of the month-long dawn-to-sunset fasting of Ramadan, is celebrated in Istanbul's Hagia Sophia for the first time in 87 years.
data.aaf: Ramadan Som Ilacabol Som Gabakalem Elle yaxigen “Qidi Ayroh Waynabo” Istanbuuluk Hgiya Sofiya 87 sanootahAddal Qimbo Adah Yeskexen.
data.amh: ወሩን ሙሉ ፀሃይ እስክትገባ የሚፆምበት የረመዳን ፆምን መጨረስ ተከትሎ የሚመጣውና "ፆምን በድግስ ማፍረስ" የሚባለው የኢድ አል ፈጥር በአል በኢስታንቡል ሀጌ ሶፊያ ከ87 አመት በ|ላ ተከበረ።
data.orm: Id al-Fitir, "Dhangaan Sooma Ittiin Hiikan" kan xumura soomana Ramadaanaa baatii guutuu kan bariiirraa kaasee hanga aduun lixxuuttii agarsiisu, waggoota 87 keessatti yeroo jalqabaaf Hagi'aa Soofiyaa kan Istaanbul keessaatti kabajame.
data.som: Ciidul Fidriga, oo astaan u ah dhammaadka soonka bisha Ramadaan, ayaa markii ugu horreysay muddo 87 sanadood lagu xusay masjidka taarikhiga ah ee Hagia Sophia ee magaalada Istanbul.
data.tir: እቲ በዓል መፍትሒ እታ ፆም ዝኾነን ሓደ ወርሒ ምስተፆመ አብ ዝሕሉ ወጋአታ ብራቕ ፀሓይ ፆመ ሮመዳን ዝውዕልን ኢድ አልፈጥር ድሕሪ 87 ዓመታት ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ኣብ ኢስታንቡል ሃጊያ ሶፍያ ተኾቢሩ ።

data.eng: Pro-Palestinian protesters storm the Queensway tunnel in the United Kingdom, disrupting traffic.
data.aaf: Falastin Qokolah Sadimarite UKek Queensway Galbah Addat Culah Tarafik Agaguluseenih.
data.amh: በእንግሊዝ ክዊንስዌይ ድልድይ ላይ የፍልስጤም ደጋፊዎች ባደረጉት ሰልፍ የትራፊክ መጨናነቅ ተፈጠረ።
data.orm: Hirmaattonni hiriira deeggartoota Palastaayinii ujummoo daandii Kuwwiins wey Yunaaytid Kiingidam keessatti argamu weeraruun sochii konkolaattotaa daangessan.
data.som: Banaan baxayaasha taageersan Falastiin ayaa xoog ku galay hoga Queensway ee Boqortooyada Ingiriiska, iyagoo hakad geliyay isu socodkii gaadiidka.
data.tir: ደገፍቲ ፍልስጤም ዝኾኑ ሰልፈኛታት ኣብ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም ንበዓቲ ኩዊንስ ወይ ብምዕፃዎም ምትሕልለፍ ተሸከርከርቲ ተኣጓጕሉ ።

data.eng: President Jovenel Moïse postpones the constitutional referendum, originally scheduled for June 27, to an unknown date citing rising COVID-19 cases in the country.
data.aaf: perisdent Jovenel Moïse Ta Baaxoh Adda Kovix-19 Osimak Yemetimik Qimbol kay Baxal 22 Ikraarimte Doolat Ganunih Ayyuntih Margaqa Aki Wakti Fanah Yayxereh.
data.amh: ፕሬዚደንት ጆቭኔል ሞይዝ ቀድሞ ሰኔ 27 ላይ እንዲደረግ የታቀደውን የህገመንግስታዊው ህዝበ ውሳኔ በሃገሪቱ እየጨመረ የመጣውን የኮቪድ-19 ወረርሽኝ ምክንያት በማድረግ ላልታወቀ ቀን እንዲተላለፍ አደረጉ።
data.orm: Pirezidaant Jooveel Mooseen biyattii keessatti dhukkubsattootni Koovid 19 walqabatan guddachaa dhufuu isaatiin rifarandamii Heeraa kan Gurraandhala 27 tti karoorfame ture gara yeroo hin beekamniitti dheerachuu isaa ibsan.
data.som: Madaxweyne Jovenel Moïse ayaa dib u dhigay aftida dastuurka, oo markii hore loo qorsheeyay 27ka Juun, ilaamaalin aan la cadaynin isagoo tixraacaya kiisaska COVID-19 ee dalka ku sii kordhaya.
data.tir: ብሰንኪ ኣብቲ ሃገር ተኸሲቱ ዝርከብ ልዕሉ መልከፍቲ ኮሮና ቫይረስ፣ እቲ ብቀንዱ ኣብ 27 ሰነ ተወጢኑ ዝተሓስበ ረፈረንደም ቅዋም፣ ናብ ዘይተወሰነ ዕለት ክፍጸም ፕረዚደንት ጆቪኔል ሞየስ ኣመሓላሊፉ።

data.eng: U.S. President Joe Biden signs a law that would make Juneteenth a federal holiday, thereby making it the first federal holiday since the 1983 establishment of Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
data.aaf: USik Berezexaniti Jo baden federal Waynabobi Abah yan Mdaqh Yiyfirime፣ thak 1983 Martin luterkingi Juner Ayro Ximemik lakal Qimboh federl Waynabo Abe.
data.amh: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዚደንት ጆ ባይደን ጁንቲንዝን አገር አቀፋዊ በአል ለማድረግ የሚያስችል ህግ በፊርማቸው አፀደቁ፤ ይህም በአል ከ1983 የማርቲን ሉተር ኪንግ ቀን በአል በ|ላ የተሰየመ የመጀመሪያው ሀገር አቀፍ በአል ነው።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin U.S. Joo Baayiden erga hundeeffama Guyyaa Maartin Luuter Kiing Jr. isa 1983 tii guyyaa ayyaana federaalaa isa jalqabaa kan isa godhu seera Juuntiinth guyyaa ayyaana federaalaa godhu mallatteesse.
data.som: Madaxweynaha Mareykanka Joe Biden ayaa saxiixay sharci ka dhigaya in munasabada Juneteenth -ka laga dhigo fasax federaal ah, taaso ka dhigaysa fasaxii ugu horreeyay ee federaal ah tan iyo markii la aasaasay maalinta Martin Luther King Jr. 1983 dii.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ዩ ኤስ ኣሜሪካ ጁንቲንዝ ብፌዴራል ደረጃ ዝኽበር በዓል ክኸውን ዝገብር ሕጊ ፈሪሞም።እዚ ክብረ በዓል ድሕሪ እቲ ብ1983 ዓ ምፈ ዝተሐገገ መዓልቲ ማርቲን ሉተር ኪንግ ጄ ኣር ዝኽበር ፈላማይ ፌዴራላዊ ክብረ በዓል ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Germany bans the flag of Hamas after it was used during protests over the 2021 Israel–Palestine crisis.
data.aaf: 2021 Israil Kee Falastin Taqbil Uguteh Sadite Garman Camas Simbilwaaseh.
data.amh: ጀርመን በ2021 የእስራኤል እና ፍልስጤም ቀውስ ውስጥ የሃማስ ባንዲራ በተቃውሞወች ላይ ታይቷል በሚል የሃማስ ባንዲራ እንዲከለከል አደረገች።
data.orm: Jarmaniin bara 2021 jeequmsa Isiraa'el fi Filisxeemiin walqabatee hiriira mormii ka'e irratti qabatanii ba'uu isaaniitiin alaabaa Hamaas dhorkite.
data.som: Jarmalka ayaa mamnuucay calanka Xamaas ka dib markii loo adeegsaday banaanbaxi 2021 ee dhibatooyinka Israel iyo Falastiin.
data.tir: ጀርመን ነቲ ኣብ 2021 ዓ.ምፈ ኣብ ግዜ ግርጭት እስራኤልን ፍልስጤምን ዝተምበልበለ ባንዴራ ሃማስ ኣጊዳቶ ።

data.eng: The United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom impose sanctions against Belarus for last month's diverting of Ryanair Flight 4978, which led to the arrest of journalist Roman Protasevich.
data.aaf: Xelhil Geytima Jamah Masgidik Irol Namma Taywan Wacasir Aba Gira Yogorenimik Gexamah US kee Awutaraliya Hindi Gexo Mabitina Yecen.
data.amh: አሜሪካ፣ ካናዳ እና እንግሊዝ ቤላሩስ የራይንኤር በረራ ቁጥር 4978 አቀጣጫ ማስቀየር ተከትሎ ጋዜጠኛ ሮማን ፕሮታሴቪች በቁጥጥር ስር እንዲውል በመርዳቷ ቤላሩስ ላይ ማእቀብ ላይ ጣሉ።
data.orm: Yunaayitid Isteetis, Kanaadaa, fi Yunaayitid Kiingidem karaa irraa jal'isuu Balalii Riyaanee'ir 4978 kan hidhamuu gaazexeessaa Roomaan Pirootaasevichiitti geesse hordofuun Belaarus irra qoqqobbii kaa'an.
data.som: Mareykanka, kanada, iyo Boqortooyada Ingiriiska ayaa cunaqabateyn ku soo rogay Belarus bishii hore markii loo sheegay duulimaadkii Ryanair ee 4978, taasoo keentay in la xidho wariye Roman Protasevich.
data.tir: ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፣ ካናዳ፣ ከምኡ'ውን ዓዲ እንግሊዝ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ወርሒ ራያንየር በረራ 4978 ጉዕዞኣ ናብ ካልእ ቦታ ድሕሪ ምቕያራ ኣንጻር ቤላሩስ እገዳ ኣንቢረናላ፣ እዚ ድማ ጋዜጠኛ ሮማን ንምእሳር ነታ ነፋሪት ብኣስገዳድ ክትዓርፍ ብምግባራ ተገይሩ።

data.eng: The United Nations' World Meteorological Organization confirms that a record high temperature of 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) has been recorded in Antarctica at the Esperanza Base.
data.aaf: Galli maroh egla baadak metroloojih eglak elle diggosseh tan innal fayya le niqna 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) gufta antartiikak Esperanza aracal
data.amh: የተባበሩት መንግስታት ድረጅት የአየር ንብረት ጉዳዮች ድርጅት በእንታርክቲካ ኤስፕራንዛ 18.3 ዲግሪ ሴንቲግሬድ ወይም 64.9 ዲግሪ ፋራናይት የሆነ ከዚህ በፊት ተመዝግቦ የማያውቅ ከፍተኛ የሙቀት መጠን እንደተመዘገበ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Dhaabbatni meetirooloojii mootummoota gamtoomanii ho'i ol ka'aan 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) Antarkitikaaa keessatti Espeeraanzaa Beeziitti galmaa'uu isaa mirkaaneessee jira.
data.som: Ururka Saadaasha Hawada ee Qaramada Midoobey ayaa xaqiijiyay in heer kulayl aad u sarreeya oo ah 18.3 °C (64.9 °F) laga helay Antarctica ee Saldhigga Esperanza.
data.tir: ኣህጉራዊ ትካል ሜትሮሎጂ ውዱብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት ኣስታት 18.3 ዲግሪ ሰንቲግሬድ (64.9 ዲግሪ ፋህረንሃይት) ዝለዓለ ምቖት ኣብ ኣንታርክቲካ መዓስከር ኤስፐራንዛ ከም ዝተመዝገበ ኣረጋጊጹ።

data.eng: Two prison riots in Ecuador leave at least 18 people dead and dozens more injured.
data.aaf: Akuaxor Namma Casbih Buxaaxi weeqa Wali 18 num rabeh xarzaniyatal lowima mari Kaddu Muduumeh.
data.amh: በኢክዋዶር በሁለት እስር ቤቶች ውስጥ በተፈጠረ ረብሻ 18 ሰዎች ሲሞቱ ሌሎች ብዙዎች ለጉዳት ተዳረጉ።
data.orm: Manneen amala sirreessaa Ekuwaadoor keessatti argaman lama keessatti jeequmsa ka'een yoo xiqqaate namoonni 18 yoo du'an namoonni hedduun ammoo mada'aniiru.
data.som: Laba qalalaaso xabsi oo ka dhacay dalka Ecuador ayaa sababay dhimashada ugu yaraan 18 qof iyo dhaawacay tobonaan kale.
data.tir: አብ ኤኳዶር ኣብ ክልተ ቤት ማእሰርቲ ብዝትወልዐ ዓመፅ ብውሑድ 18 ሰባት እንትሞቱ ብደርዘን ዝቑፀሩ ቖሲሎም ።

data.eng: The Plumas County Sheriff's Office orders mandatory evacuations in the area amid the spread of the Dixie Fire.
data.aaf: Catota Taama Abeenit Kaxam Nabah Yan Taqabi Madeh yan Dariifa madoonuh yingicilenwak Naba Silyatuk Gexamah Kiblati Mozambikil Rabe Mari Loowo 38 Madde.
data.amh: የፕሉማስ ካውንቲ የሸሪፍ ጽ / ቤት የዲክሲ እሳት በሚዛመትባቸው አካባቢዎች አስገዳጅ የመልቀቂያ ትዕዛዝን አስተላልፏል።
data.orm: Waajjirri Bulchaa Kaawuntii Piluumaas akkuma abiddi Diksii tatamsa'een naannicha keessaa baafamuu namootaa dirqama ta'e ajaje.
data.som: Xafiiska Sheriff deegaanka ee Plumas ayaa amar kubixiyay faaruqinta khasabka ah ee aagga uu ku fiday Dabka Dixie.
data.tir: ብሰንኪ እቲ ዝላበድ ዘሎ ዲክሲ ባርዕ ሓዊ ምምሕዳር ዞባ ፕሉማስ ሰባት ካብቲ ከባቢ ግድን ክገልሱ ኣዚዙ።

data.eng: Cuba recognizes cryptocurrency as legal tender, becoming the second nation to do so after El Salvador.
data.aaf: Kuuba eli Salevadrre lakal tah abeh yan Namehaytoh Baaxo Akuk cryptocurrency Ganun inah Anakar hangit Ayte.
data.amh: ኩባ ክሪፕቶ ከረንሲን (ምስጢራዊ መረጃን የያዘ ዲጂታል ምንዛሬን) ለህጋዊ ጨረታ መገበያያነት ለመጠቀም እውቅና በመስጠት ከኤል ሳልቫዶር ቀጥሎ ይህንን ለማድረግ ሁለተኛዋ ሀገር ሆናለች።
data.orm: Kiyuubaan kiriptookaarensii akka karaa kanfaltii seera qabeessaatti fudhachuun, El Salvaadoritti aanuun biyya kana goote lammaffaa taate.
data.som: Cuba ayaa u aqoonsatay cryptocurrency inay tahay hindise sharci, waxayna noqotay dalkii labaad ee sidaas samaysa El Salvador ka dib.
data.tir: ኩባ ንክሪፕቶካረንሲ ከም ሕጋዊ ባጤራ ስለ እትቕበለቶ በዚ ድማ ድሕሪ ኤል ሳልቫዶር መበል ካልአይቲ ሃገር ኰይና/ኣላ።

data.eng: India's economy rebounded at a record rate of 20.1% in the three months to the end of June even as a devastating second wave of COVID-19 hits the country.
data.aaf: Umah yan Nammeyhayto Covix-19 qawalyalla Ta Baaxol tamutukewak Hindi Maduur Sidica Alsat illa Waysi Alsih illacabo fanah 20.1% xayowte.
data.amh: ምንም እንኳን አስከፊው የኮቪድ -19 ሁለተኛ ዙር መነሳት አገሪቱን ቢጎዳትም የሕንድ ኢኮኖሚ ላይ በሦስት ወራት እስከ ሰኔ መጨረሻ ድረስ የ 20.1% ማሻሻያ ተመዝግቧል።
data.orm: Diinagdeen Hindii yeroodhuma dambalii COVID-19 lamataa hamaan biyyattii rukutetti ji'oota sadii keessatti hanga dhuma Waxabajjitti hamma seena qabeessa 20.1% tiin fooyya'e
data.som: Dhaqaalaha Hindiya ayaa dib ugu soo noqday 20.1% sedexdii bilood ilaa dhammaadkii Juun xitaa iyadoo mowjad labaad oo COVID-19 ah ay ku dhufatay waddanka.
data.tir: ቊጠባ ህንዲ ወላ'ኳ ነታ ሃገር ብካልኣይ ማዕበል ኮቪድ-19 ዓኒያ ትኹን ደኣ ምበር፣ ኣብተን ክሳዕ መወዳእታ ወርሒ ሰነ ዘለዋ ሰለስተ ኣዋርሕ ብ20.1% ዕብየት ኣመዝጊባ።

data.eng: The Joint Committee on Vaccination and Immunisation announce a recommendation that half of million people with severe immunosuppressed will receiving a third dose of the COVID-19 jabs.
data.aaf: Aftabu kee Aftabi Inki Makaado InkiMilyoon Qaxi Gibdi lakima Kalaloonuh Matarteh tan Maritek Sidochyti Kovix-19 Jabeh Aftabu Kah Geyan inah Margaqa Mabla Baxaqise.
data.amh: የክትባት እና በሽታን የመቋቋም አቅምን መጨመር የጋራ ኮሚቴ ግማሽ ሚሊዮን ከባድ የበሽታ መከላከያ ድክመት ያጋጠማቸው ሰዎች ሦስተኛውን የ ኮቪድ-19 ክትባት እንዲያገኙ የሚል ሃሳብ ይፋ አድርጓል።
data.orm: Koreen Waliinii Talaallii fi Madiinummaa gorsa isa namoonni walakkaa miliyoonaa kan immiwunosappireesdii hamaa qaban doozii sadaffaa COVID-19 fudhatan beeksise.
data.som: Guddiga Wadajirka ah eeTallaalka ayaa ku dhawaaqay talo ah in nus milyan oo qof oo qaba tallaal aad u daran ay heli doonaan qiyaasta saddexaad ee tallaallada COVID-19.
data.tir: ሓባራዊ ኮሚተ ክታበትን ውሕስነትን ካብቶም ከቢድ ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ዘለዎም ፍርቂ ሚልዮን ዝኾኑ ሰባት ሳልሳይ ዓቐን ናይ COVID-19 ክታበት ክወሃቦም ሓሳብ ቀሪቡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Protests broke out in front of hospitals across Greece to oppose compulsory vaccination for healthcare workers which takes effect today that risk dismissal of 10,000 unvaccinated workers.
data.aaf: 10 Alafiy Aftabu bewayte Taama Abeenit Taamak Diriyanamih Qawalaylat Qidah Tan Qafiyat Dacayrih Taabaabeenit Dirkih Aftabu Sadak Giriik Hosbitalitetak Foocal Saddu Yublusen.
data.amh: በግሪክ የጤና ባለሞያዎች በግዴታ ክትባት እንዲወስዱ የሚያደርገው እና ዛሬ በተግባር ላይ በሚውለው ባለመውሰዳቸውም 10000 ሰራተኞችን ክሰራ የመባረር ሰጋት ወስጥ በሚከተው ህግ የተነሳ ሆስፒታሎች ፊት ለፊት የሚደረገው ተቃውሞ በርትቷል።
data.orm: Hospitaalota Giriik keessatti argaman duratti mormiin talaalli dirqamaan hojjettoota fayyaatif kennamuu har'a ka'eera, kunis hojiirra ari'atamu hojjeettota fayyaa hin talaalaman 10,000 fida.
data.som: Banaan baxyo ayaa ka dhacay dhakhtarada Griiga hortiisa taas oo lagagasoo horjeedo tallaalka qasabka ah ee shaqaalaha daryeelka caafimaadka kaas oo dhaqan galaya maanta oo halis ugu jira in shaqada laga eryo 10,000 oo shaqaale oo aan la tallaalin.
data.tir: ስራሕተኛታት ጥዕና ብኣስገዳድ ክቡ ንዝገብር እንተዘየለ 10,000 ዘይተኸተቡ ሰራ ሕተኛታት ካብ ስራሕ ዝባረሩሉ ሓደጋ ዝፈጥርን ደንቢ ብምቅዋም ኣብ መላእ ግሪክ ኣብ ቅድሚ ሆስፒታለት ዓመፅ ተኻይዱ ።

data.eng: The band announced a new tour in a funny video on Tuesday, filled with double entendres, in which fans expressed their desire to see the group come together.
data.amh: ቡድኑ በማክሰኞ እለት በአስቂኝ ቪዲዮ አዲስ ጉብኝት አሳውቋል ፣በሁለት ግጥሚያዎች የተሞላ ፣በዚህም ደጋፊዎቹ ቡድኑ አንድ ላይ ሲሰባሰቡ ለማየት ያላቸውን ፍላጎት ገለፁ።
data.orm: Baandichi Kibxata darbe daawwannaa haaraa viidiyoo qoosaa ta'een, taphoota lama waliin guutuu, deeggartoonni baandichi akka deebi'ee walitti makamu arguuf fedhii qaban ibsaniiru.
data.tir: እታ ባንድ ትማሊ ሰሉስ ብድርብ ኢንተር ዝተመልአት መስሓቕ ቪድዮ ሓድሽ ዑደት ከምዘካየደት ኣፍሊጣ፡ ኣድነቕታ እታ ጉጅለ ክትጥርነፍ ክርእያ ድሌት ከምዘለዎም ገሊጾም።

data.eng: Covid-19 boosters could prevent about 90,000 US deaths this winter, but only if more people get them, analysis suggests.
data.amh: የኮቪድ-19 ማበረታቻዎች በዚህ ክረምት ወደ 90,000 የአሜሪካ ሞትን ሊከላከሉ ይችላሉ፣ ነገር ግን ብዙ ሰዎች ካገኛቸው ብቻ ነው ሲል ትንታኔ ይጠቁማል።
data.orm: Onnachiiftuu Covid-19 ganna kana du'a Ameerikaa gara kuma 90 ittisuu danda'a, garuu namoonni hedduun yoo argatan qofa jedha xiinxalli.
data.tir: ኮቪድ-19 ዘዕብዩ መድሃኒታት ኣብዚ ክረምቲ ኣስታት 90 ሽሕ ኣሜሪካ ሞት ክከላኸሉ ይኽእሉ እዮም፡ እንተኾነ ግን ዝበዝሑ ሰባት ምስ ዝረኽብዎም ጥራይ ምዃኑ ትንታነታት ይሕብሩ።

data.eng: India is one of the countries worst hit by what doctors call "antimicrobial resistance" - antibiotic-resistant neonatal infections alone are responsible for the deaths of nearly 60,000 newborns each year.
data.amh: ህንድ ዶክተሮች "ፀረ ተህዋሲያን መቋቋም" በሚሉት በከፋ ከተጠቁ ሀገራት አንዷ ነች - አንቲባዮቲክን የሚቋቋም የአራስ ሕፃናት ኢንፌክሽን ብቻ በየዓመቱ ወደ 60,000 የሚጠጉ አራስ ሕፃናት ሞት ምክንያት ነው።
data.orm: Hindiin biyyoota waan hakiimonni "antibaayootikii ofirraa ittisuu" jedhaniin haala hamaadhaan miidhaman keessaa tokkodha — dhukkuba daa'immanii antiibaayootikii dandamatan qofa, kunis waggaatti gara 60,000tti siqan du'a reefuu dhalatan.
data.tir: ህንዲ ሓንቲ ካብተን ሓካይም "ጸረ-ረኽሲ ተጻዋርነት" ዝብልዎ ዝኸፍአ ዝተሃስያ ሃገራት እያ - ጸረ-ነፍሳት ዝጻወር ረኽሲ ህጻናት ጥራይ ኣብ ዓመት ኣስታት 60 ሽሕ ሓደስቲ ዝተወልዱ ህጻናት ንሞት ተሓተትቲ እዮም።

data.eng: A BBC investigation has found evidence that doctors from Nigeria are being recruited by a British healthcare company and expected to work in private hospitals under conditions not allowed in the National Health Service.

data.eng: Loza, who has joined the Malta based Football Club, Birkirkara on a one year contract a couple of months ago, is making history once again pushing her dream and international football career a step further.
data.aaf: Loza, Miyay Yengele Melta Ibi koqsoh Dokonu, Birkirkara Inki Sanatih Ellesuge Alsiteh Qabna kee qarusuh, Aydaadu aboonuh Qagitak dufuqan Tet soono kee Baad Koqosoh Caagida caddoh sarah.
data.amh: ማልታ ላይ የተመሠረተውን የእግርኳስ ክለብን Birkirkara ከጥቂት ወራት በፊት በአንድ ዓመት ውል የተቀላቀለችው ሎዛ ህልሟን እና ዓለም አቀፍ የእግር ኳስ ህይወቷን አንድ እርምጃ ወደፊት እየገፋች እንደገና ታሪክ እየሰራች ነው።
data.orm: Loozaa, Garee Kubbaa Miilaa Maltan hundaa'e Birkirkaratti kontiraataa waggaa tokkootin ji'oota lama dura kan makamte, ammas abjuu ishee dhugoomsuu fi ogummaa kubbaa miilaa internaashinaalii gara fulduraatti butuun seenaa dalagaa jirti.
data.som: Loza, oo ku biirtay Naadiga Kubadda Cagta Malta ee fadhigeedu yahay, Birkirkara heshiis hal sano ah laba bilood ka hor, ayaa mar kale samaynaysa taariikh cusub oo sii riixaysa riyadeeda iyo xirfadeeda kubbadda cagta caalamiga ah.

data.eng: Africa’s first black woman to receive an Olympic gold medal, Derartu Tulu, has been elected to lead the Ethiopian athletics Federation on Thursday November 15, 2018.
data.aaf: Afrikak Data Bara Qimboh Addah olobikik Dahal Lakqo Hirigte, Xerartu Tulu, Itiyyobiyak Ardi Fexeresion/IAF/EAF/ miracisuh kamesiy Naharsi Gudok 15, 2018 Dooromteh.
data.amh: በአፍሪካ የመጀመሪያው ጥቁር ሴት የኦሎምፒክ የወርቅ ሜዳሊያ ያገኘችው ደራርቱ ቱሉ ሐሙስ ኅዳር 15 ቀን 2018 የኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽንን እንድትመራ ተመረጠች።
data.orm: Meedaliyaa warqee Olompikii fudhachuun dubartiin-gurraattin jalqabaa Afiriikaa, Daraartuun Tulluu federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa hogganuuf Kamisa Sadaasa 15, 2018 filatamte.
data.som: Haweeney da madow ugu horreysay Afrika inay bilada dahab oo Olombikada hesha, Derartu Tulu, ayaa loo doortay inay hogaamiso xiriirka ciyaaraha fudud ee Itoobiya Khamiista November 15, 2018.
data.tir: እታ ፈላመይቲ ፀላም ኣፍሪካዊት ተዓዋቲት ወርቂ ሜዳሊያ ኦሎምፒክ ደራርቱ ንፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ ኢትዮጵያ ክትመርሕ ብሓሙስ 15 ሕዳር 2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ተመሪጻ ።

data.eng: In an emergency meeting, the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) elected Derartu to replace Haile Gebreselassie after he announced his resignation on Monday.
data.aaf: Sisik Dafenah Addat, Itiyyobiyak Ardi Fexeresion/IAF/EAF/ doorenih Xarartu Haile gebresilasse Cigilisonuh usuk Itleni taamacabti Yiysexegek lakal.
data.amh: በአስችኳይ ስብሰባ የኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽን (ኢአፌ) ደራርቱ ሀይሌ ገብረስላሴን ሰኞ ዕለት ሥራውን መልቀቁን ተከትሎ ተመርጣለች።
