data.eng: The 2018 Total CAF Women’s African Cup of Nations will be held in Ghana from November 17 to December 1, 2018.
data.aaf: 2018 Inkih Yan Caf Afrikak Agatak Sayyo Kub Elle Yakuwaam Naharsigudok 17 - Cigitagudok 1, 2018 Ghana Kini.
data.amh: የ2018 ጠቅላላ የካፍ የሴቶች የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ በጋና ከህዳር 17 እስከ ታህሳስ 1 ቀን 2018 ይካሄዳል።
data.orm: Geeba Dubartootaa Biyyoota Afirikaa Tootaal CAF bara 2018 gaafa Sadaasa 17 hanga Mudde 1, 2018 tti Gaanaa keessatti geggeeffama.
data.som: 2018 Wadarta guud ee Koobka Haweenka Afrika ee CAF ayaa lagu qaban doonaa Ghana laga bilaabo Noofambar 17 ilaa Diseembar 1, 2018.
data.tir: ናይ 2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ናይ ቶታል ካፍ (ሲ.ኤ.ኤፍ) ግጥም ፅዋዕ ኣፍሪካ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ካብ 17 ሕዳር ክሳብ ባሕቲ ጥሪ 2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ኣብ ጋና ክካየድ እዩ።

data.eng: The tournament also doubles as the African qualifiers to the 2019 Women FIFA World cup.
data.aaf: Ta Qalaylil Kaddu Osotinah Afrikax Xaylok Taysem 2019 sayyok Baadak fifah Cub Fanah Gexelon.
data.amh: ለ2019 የሴቶች የፊፋ የዓለም ዋንጫ የአፍሪካ ማጣሪያዎች ውድድር ውድድሩ በእጥፍ ይጨምራል።

data.som: Tartankan ayaa sidoo kale ku laba jibaarmaya isreeb reebka Afrika ee Koobka Adduunka Haweenka 2019.

data.eng: The 2017/18 Ethiopian Premier League (EPL) defending champions, Jimma Aba Jiffar, is all set to use online mobile system for its day to day activities which enables fans get relevant information regarding the club.
data.aaf: 2017 Itiyoppiyah Birimer liig(EPL) Shambiyoon kalaltuwatam Jimma Aba jifar, Ikih Tan Dafeyna Olayin mobayil Sistem fan Ayrook Ayroh Angagoya Ta Dokla Wagsissam tet qokola faximtam Elle Geyanagida kini.
data.amh: የ2017/18 የኢትዮጵያ ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ቻምፒዮን የሆነው ጅማ አባ ጅፋር ደጋፊዎች ክለቡን በሚመለከት ተገቢውን መረጃ እንዲያገኙ የሚያስችል የኦንላይን ሞባይል ሲስተም ለእለት ተእለት እንቅስቃሴ ሊጠቀም ነው።
data.orm: Pirimiyeer Liigiin Itoopiyaa (EPL) bara 2017/18 kan injifate, Jimmaan Abbaa Jifaar, hojiilee isaa guyyaa guyyaa kan deggertoonni waa'ee kilabichaa odeeffannoo barbaachisu akka argatan godhu sirna mobaayilaa sarara irraa fayyadamuuf qophii hunda xumure.
data.som: Kooxda difaacanaysa horyaalka Itoobiya ee Jimma Aba Jiffar 2017/2018 ayaa dhamaan lagu wadaa inay adeegsato nidaamka mobilada ee onlineka ah hawl maalmeedkeeda taasoo u sahlaysa taageerayaashu inay helaan macluumaadka la xidhiidha kooxda.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ 2017/2018 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሻምፒዮና ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ኢትዮጵያ ዝኾነ ጂማ ኣባ ጂፋር ንመዓልታዊ ንጥፈቱ ዘቃልሕን ደገፍቱ ብዛዕባ እቲ ጋንታ ኣገዳሲ ሓበሬታ ክረኽቡ ዝገብርን ስርዓት ኦንላይን ሞባይል ንምዝርጋሕ ተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The service will help to easily exchange updated live scores, fans registration, monthly payments and allowing voting for best player’s award.

data.amh: አገልግሎቱ የዘመኑ የቀጥታ ውጤቶች፣ የደጋፊዎች ምዝገባ፣ ወርሃዊ ክፍያ እና ለተሻለ ተጫዋች ሽልማት ድምጽ ለመስጠት በቀላሉ ለመለዋወጥ ይረዳል።

data.eng: The 70th edition of FIFA congress, scheduled to be held in Addis Ababa, has been rescheduled due to coronavirus (COVID-19) fears.
data.aaf: 70-htyoh FIFah Kongiress, Tadeera Heenih Addiss Ababal Takkuh, Qagitak Tadeera kah Osisen Korenavayrisik (KOVIX-19) Meysih.
data.amh: በአዲስ አበባ ሊካሄድ የነበረው 70ኛው የፊፋ ኮንግረስ በኮሮና ቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ስጋት ምክንያት ለሌላ ጊዜ ተላልፏል።
data.orm: Kongiresiin FIFA 70ffaan, Addis Ababaa keessatti geggeeffamuuf karoorfame, sababa sodaa vaayirasii koronaa (COVID-19)'f irra deebiin saganteeffame.
data.som: Shirweynaha 70 aad ee FIFA, oo loo qorsheeyay in lagu qabto Addis Ababa, ayaa dib loo qorsheeyay sababo la xiriira coronavirus (COVID-19).
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ክካየድ ተሓሲቡ ዝነበረ መበል 70 ጉባኤ ፊፋ ብምኽንያት ስግኣት ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ንኻሊእ ግዜ ክካየድ ተወሲኑ።

data.eng: FIFA stated that, on account of the spread of COVID-19, numerous international bodies and public bodies have advised against the organization of international events.
data.aaf: FIFA inteemih, KOVIX-19 Loowoh Barimiyah, Mango Baad Caddoh Dagorti kee Ayyunti Dagorti Baad Caddoh Waynabobi Yankateenim Kah Sadan Inah Fayiseenim.
data.amh: ፊፋ በኮቪድ-19 ስርጭት ምክንያት በርካታ አለም አቀፍ አካላት እና የህዝብ አካላት አለም አቀፍ ዝግጅቶችን እንዳይደራጁ መክረዋል።
data.orm: FIFA'n ragaan faffaca'iinsa COVID-19 irratti, qaamonni addunyaalessaa fi qaamonni hawaasaa baayyeen qophiilee addunyaalessaa dhaabbatichaa akka hin geggeffamne gorsan.
data.som: FIFA ayaa sheegtay, iyadoo loo eegayo faafitaanka COVID-19, shirkado badan oo caalami ah iyo hay'ado dowli ah ay ku taliyeen in la joojiyo abaabulka dhacdooyinka caalamiga ah..

data.eng: President of the Ethiopian Football Federation, Esayas Jira, has been elected as vice president of the Council for East and Central Africa Football Associations (CECAFA).
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Ibi Koqosoh Fexeresionih Berezixanti, Isayas Jira, Ayroculama kee Fantqaxih Afrikah Malabuxak Ibi Koqosoh Eglak Cigiila Berezixanti Akuk Doorime.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ፌዴሬሽን ፕሬዝዳንት ኢሳያስ ጅራ የምስራቅ እና መካከለኛው አፍሪካ እግር ኳስ ማህበራት ምክር ቤት (ሴካፋ) ምክትል ፕሬዝዳንት ሆነው ተመረጡ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Federeeshinii Kubbaa Miilaa Itoopiyaa, Isaayyaas Jiraa, akka itti aanaa pirasdaantii kaawunsilii Waldaalee Kubbaa Miilaa Bahaa fi Giddugala (CECAFA) tahuun filatame..
data.som: Madax waynaha fadareeshinka kubada cagta ee Itobiya, Esayas Jira, ayaa loo doortay madaxwayne kuxigeenka golaha xidhiidhka kubada cagta bariga iyo badhtamaha Africa ee CECAFA.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ ኢሳያስ ጂራ ምኽትል ፕሬዚዳንት ቤት ምኽሪ ማሕበር ኩዕሶ እግሪ ምብራቕን ማእኸላይን ኣፍሪካ ኮይኑ ተመሪፁ።

data.eng: Mekelle November 29/2018 A cycling tournament that starts from Mekelle and extends to Asmara and Mitswa in Eritrea will begin tomorrow, according to Tigray Region Youth and Sports Affairs Bureau.
data.aaf: Mekellel Naharsigudok 29/2018 A saykil Qalayliy mekellek Qimbise kee Illa Asmara kee Musuwaq Eretriyah Adda Fan Beera Qimbimele, Tigray Rakaakayak Qunxaneyta kee Dagar Diig Caagidah Biiro Elle Iyenal.
data.amh: መቀሌ ህዳር 19/2011 ከመቀሌ ተጀምሮ እስከ አስመራና ምፅዋ በኤርትራ የሚደርስ የብስክሌት ውድድር ነገ እንደሚጀመር የትግራይ ክልል ወጣቶችና ስፖርት ጉዳይ ቢሮ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Maqalee Sadaasa 29/2018: Akka Biiroo Dhimmoota Dargaggoo fi Ispoortii Naannoo Tigraayitti, dorgommiin biskileettii Maqalee irraa jalqabee gara Asmaraa fi Mitsawaa Eritraa keessatti dheeratu boor eegala.
data.som: sida uu sheegay xafiiska arrimaha dhalinyarada iyo ciyaaraha ee gobolka Tigray. Mekelle Tartanka baaskiillada oo ka bilaabmaya magaalada Mekelle ilaa Asmara iyo Mitswa ee dalka Eritrea ayaa maalinta berri ah bilaaban doona, Nofeembar 29/2018

data.aaf: Ta Qalylik Hadaf Ayyuntaak Illa Ayyunti Qala Maqarosaanam Itiyoppiya kee Eretriyah Ayyuntih Fanal, Tah Iyeh.

data.eng: Seifu Tura Abdiwak of Ethiopia and Ruth Chepngetich of Kenya won Sunday in the return of the Chicago Marathon, which was scrapped last year amid the coronavirus pandemic.
data.aaf: Seifu Tura Abadiwak Itiyyobiya kee Kiniyak Ruut Chebngetich Gaceh Acadah Chkagoh Marathonuh Uduurewak. Waraye Sanat Casbik Fakimeh Koronavayris Dalkah.
data.amh: ባለፈው አመት በኮሮና ቫይረስ ምክንያት የተሰረዘው የቺካጎ ማራቶን የመልስ ውድድር ኢትዮጵያዊቷ ሰይፉ ቱራ አብዲዋዋ እና ኬንያዊቷ ሩት ቼፕንጌቲች አሸንፈዋል።
data.orm: Seeyifuu Turaa Andiwaaq Itoopiyaa fi Ruut Chepingetich'n Keeniyaa deebii Maraatoonii Chikaagoo, kan waggaa darbe sababa weerara vaayirasii koronaan haqame ture keessatti Dilbata injifatan.
data.som: Seifu Tura Abdiwak oo u dhashay Itoobiya iyo Ruth Chepngetich oo Kenya ah ayaa Axaddii ku guulaystay soo laabashada Marathon ka Chicago, kaas oo la baabi'iyay sannadkii hore iyada oo uu jiro cudurka faafa ee coronavirus.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያዊ ሰይፉ ቱራ ኣብዲዋክን ኬንያዊት ሩት ቼፕንጌችን እቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓምት ብምኽንያት ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተሰረዝን ብለውጡ ብሰንበት ኣብ ቺካጐ ኣብ ዝተኻየደን ማራቶን ተዓዊቶም።

data.eng: Abdiwak, who placed sixth in the Chicago race in 2019, finished in 2 hours, 6 minutes, 12 seconds.
data.aaf: Abdiwak, Chkagol lica Addah Dafeye 2019 Addat, Seleh 2 Saqatay, 6 dagiiy, 12 sekoxih.
data.amh: በ2019 በቺካጎ ዉድድር ስድስተኛ ደረጃን ያስመዘገበዉ አብዲዋክ 2 ሰአት ከ6 ደቂቃ ከ12 ሰከንድ ላይ በመግባት አጠናቋል።
data.orm: Abdiwaaq, kan dorgommii Chikaagoo 2019 keessatti ja'affaa kahame, sa'atii 2, daqiiqqaa 6, sekondii 12'tti xumure.
data.som: Cabiwaaq, oo kaalinta lixaad ka galay tartanka Jikago 2019, ayaa uu ku dhamaystiray 2 saacadood, 6 daqiiqo iyo 12 ilbiriqsi.
data.tir: እቲ ብ2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ሻድሻይ ወፂኡ ዝነበረ ኣብዲዋክ 2 ስዓትን 6 ደቒቓን 12 ሴኮንድን ብምፍፃም እዩ ስዒሩ።

data.eng: Written and directed by Moges Tafesse, Quragnaye addresses the question: “How far would you take punishment into your own hands or wait for the system to levy the appropriate punishment?”.
data.aaf: Kattabay Kee Saqal Moges Tafesse, Yi kurayna Maadeh Essero: " Anininal Issi isi Gabat Bayaktam kee Bicaleh Meri caagida fanah isi Mabiyakinay Qambal?".
data.amh: በሞገስ ታፈሰ ተፅፎ እና ዳይሬክት የተደረገው ቁራኛዬ በረእጅህጥያቄ መልስ ይሰጣል፦"ቅጣትን በራስህ እጅ ለመውሰድ ምን ያህል ትሄዳለህ ወይስ ስርዓቱ ተገቢውን ቅጣት እስኪጥል ድረስ ትጠብቃለህ?"
data.orm: Mogos Tasfaayeetin barraa'ee kan qindaa'ee, Quraanyaayeen gaaffii:" hangam adaba harka keetti fudhatta yookin sirnichi murtee sirnaawaa kennuuf eegda?" jedhu heera.
data.som: "Qoray oo uu agaasimay Moges Tafesse, Quragnaye wuxuu qeexayaa su'aasha: "Intee in le'eg ayaad ciqaabta gacantaada ku qaadan kartaa ama sugi kartaa nidaamka si uu kuugu soo saaro ciqaabta ku habboon?"."
data.tir: እቲ ብሞገስ ታፈሰ ዝተፅሓፈን ዝተመርሐን ቁራኛዬ ፊልም ''ብወነንኻ መቕፃዕቲ ምዉሳን ዶ እቲ ስርዓት ተመጣጣኒ መቕፃዕቲ ክሳብ ዝውስን ምፅባይ?'' ንዝብል ሕቶ ዝምልስ እዩ።

data.eng: The story takes place in Ankober, an old town located 174kms north of Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Istot yelle Yanim Ankeberi, Dumahi Magaala Kiblati Addiss Ababak 17kms Geytimta.

data.som: Taarikhdu waxay ka dhacday Ankober, oo ah magaalo qadiimi ah oo kutaala 174km dhinaca waqooyi kaga beegan Addis Ababa.

data.eng: The most charming Meskerem Abera that plays the love interest of Mesfin and daughter of the king of Gojam brightens the tension brought on by Endalk.
data.aaf: Nagay Qaxmeqeh Meskerem Abera Toohuh Digireh mesfin kee Gojam Amoytih Baxxah Kacanih Fayxih Ifoytite Gibdabini Enxakik Yemette.
data.amh: የመስፍን የፍቅር ፍላጎት እና የጎጃም ንጉስ ልጅ ሆና የምትጫወተው እጅግ ማራኪ መስከረም አበራ እንዳልክ ያመጣውን ውጥረት ታደምቃለች ።

data.som: “Shir ay isugu yimaadeen gelinkii dambe ee Jimcihii, Wasaaradda Ganacsiga iyo Warshadaha (MOTI) ayaa kala tashatay mulkiilayaasha ganacsiga iyo maamulayaasha gobolka Tigreega, sidii wax looga qaban lahaa dhibaatooyinka ay shirkaduhu la kulmeen intii uu socday hawlgalkani.
data.tir: ሚንስቴር ንግድን ኢንዱስትሪን ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓርቢ ምሸት ኣብዘዳለዎ ኣኼባ ኣብ ትግራይ ዝርከቡ ወነንትን ኣካየድቲ ስራሕን ኩባንያታት ኣብ ከይዲ እቲ ወፍሪ እተን ትካላት ዘጋጥሙወን ፀገማት ንምፍታሕ ኣብዝከኣለሉ መገዲ መኺሩ።

data.eng: Officials of the Ministry noted that 93 giant enterprises and nearly 6700 small and medium enterprises are found in the region, and that a task force has been established to conduct a survey and investigate the cost of damages to reinvigorate factories into normal production.
data.aaf: Ta malaakih miraciini tohuk iyem Osotinah 93 Interbiraiyzwa kee 6700 gabab bahta Qunxah Fanti Caddoh Iterbirayiz ta Rakaakayal geytimtam, kee Taskiforsi Xisenih Servery yakku kee baye Uwaytih Awqenta kee Ta sanaqatoti Abak sugte Amrutiya kah abtanah.
data.amh: በክልሉ 93 ግዙፍ ኢንተርፕራይዞችና 6700 የሚጠጉ አነስተኛና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች መኖራቸውን እንዲሁም ፋብሪካዎችን ወደ መደበኛ ምርት ለማጎልበት የሚያስችል የዳሰሳ ጥናትና የጉዳት ወጪን የሚያጣራ ግብረ ሃይል መቋቋሙን የሚኒስቴሩ የስራ ኃላፊዎች ጠቅሰዋል።
data.orm: Aanga'oonni Ministeerichaa interpiraayizootni gurguddoon 93 fi interpiraayizootni xixiqqoo fi giddu-galeessaa 6700 akka naannoocha keessatti argaman, akkasumas gareen duulaa warshaalee oomishaa duraatti deebisuuf sassaabbii odeeffannoo fi gatii miidhaa qaqqabee qorachuuf hundaffamuu isaa yaadachiisee jira.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta Wasaaradda ayaa sheegay in 93 shirkadood oo waaweyn iyo ku dhawaad 6700 oo ganacsi oo isugu jira kuwa yar yar iyo kuwa dhexe ay ku daqan yihiin gobolka, waxaana la sameeyay guddi loo xil saaray baaritaanka iyo baarista qarashka ku baxaya khasaaraha ka dhashay sidii dib loogu soo celin lahaa wax soo saarka caadiga ah ee warshadaha.
data.tir: ሰበስልጣን እቲ ሚንስቴር ከምዝገለፁዎ ኣብቲ ክልል 93 ገዘፍቲ ከምኡ’ውን 6700 ኣናእሽተይን ማእኸለዎትን ትካላት ዘለው እንትኾን ፋብሪካታት ናብ ስሩዕ ዕዮ ምፍራይ ክኣትዋ ዝሕግዝ ንቲ ዝበፅሐ መጠን ዕንወት ዘፅንዕ ግብረ ሓይሊ ተጣይሹ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Ethiopia and France signed a military cooperation accord in March 2019 during President Emmanuel Macron’s visit to Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Laqeni alsak 2019 Berezixanti amonuyel Makron addiss Ababa Gufneh yemettewak Itiyyobiya kee faransa Qaskariyoh Sitaluk taimitiy femat hen.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ. በመጋቢት ወር 2011 ዓ.ም ፕሬዝዳንት ኢማኑኤል ማክሮን አዲስ አበባን በጎበኙበት ወቅት ኢትዮጵያ እና ፈረንሳይ የወታደራዊ ትብብር ስምምነት ተፈራርመዋል።

data.eng: Three international oil trading firms bidding to supply fuel to the Ethiopian Petroleum Supply Enterprise (EPSE) in the 2019 fiscal year.

data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2019 በጀት ዓመት ሦስት ዓለም አቀፍ የነዳጅ ዘይት ንግድ ኩባንያዎች ለኢትዮጵያ ነዳጅ አቅራቢ ድርጅት (ኢፒኤስኢ) ነዳጅ ለማቅረብ ይጫረታሉ።

data.tir: ሰለስተ ዓለምለኸ ትካላት ንግዲ ነዳዲ ኣብ 2011/12 ዓ.ም. ናብ ትካል ቀረብ ነዳዲ ኢትዮጵያ ነዳዲ ንምቕራብ ይጫረታ ኣለዋ።

data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ. ከጥር ወር 2019 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ ለሚቀርበው የነዳጅ አቅርቦት ዓለም አቀፍ የነዳጅ ንግድ ኩባንያዎችን የሚጋብዝ ጨረታ ባለፈው መስከረም ወር ኢፒኤስኢ አቅርቧል።

data.tir: ትካል ቀረብ ነዳዲ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ መስከረም ኣብዘውፀኦ ጨረታ ዓለምለኸ ትካላት ንግዲ ነዳዲ ካብ ጥሪ 2011 ዓ.ም. ጀሚሩ ነዳዲ ከቕርባ ዓዲሙ ነይሩ።

data.eng: It is recalled that Ethio Telecom has recently announced the launching of 4G LTE service in 92 towns nationwide and in the capital, Addis Ababa as phase-I 4G LTE service expansion strategic plan for the 2020/21 budget year.
data.aaf: Ethio Tellokom Qagitak Iyem Xayi saku elle Yiysixigen Baaxo Caddol 92 magaalal 4G LTE Ayfaf Yeysexexeginih, Addiss Ababak fesz-1 4G LTE Ayfaf Barisanamih Istratejih Ikraaro 2020/21 Ligidih Mizaniyatal.
data.amh: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም የ 2020/21 በጀት አመት የመጀመሪያውን ዙር የ4ጂ ኤል.ቲ.ኢ አገልግሎት ማስፋፊያ ስልታዊ ዕቅዶችን በቅርቡ በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ በ 92 ከተሞች እና በመዲናዋ አዲስ አበባ የ4ጂ ኤል.ቲ.ኢ አገልግሎት መጀመሩን ማስታወቁ ይታወሳል።
data.orm: Itiyoo Telekoom dhiyeenya kana tajaajila 4G LTE magaaloota 92 guutuu biyyaa keessatti argamanii fi magaala guddutti keessatti akkasumas karoorri tarsiimawaa tajaajila 4G LTE sadarkaa-I bara bajataa 2020/2021 jalqabuun isaa ni yaadatama.
data.som: Waxa la xusuustaa in Ethio Telecom ay dhawaan ku dhawaaqday in 92 magaalooyin oo dalka siguud ah iyo caasimadda Addis Ababa laga hirgeliyey adeegga 4G LTE oo ah qorshaha istaraatiijiyadeed ee balaadhinta adeegga wejiga 1aad ee 4G LTE ee sannad miisaaniyadeedka 2020/21.
data.tir: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ኣብዝርከባ 92 ከተማታትን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባን 4ጂ ኤል ቲ ኢ ኣገልግሎት ከምዘተኣታተወ ኣብዚ ቐረባ ግዜ ከምዘፍለጠ ይዝከር። እዚ ድማ ኣካል ናይቲ ን2020/21 ዓ.ም.ፈ. ዝተለሞ ቀዳማይ ብርኪ ስትራቴጂያዊ ትልሚ ምስፋሕ ኣገልግሎት 4ጂ ኤል ቲ ኢ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethio Telecom also promised to expand the service in the remaining towns of the country as we have been immensely working on to finalize phase -Il network upgrading and expansion to meet the ever-growing data demands of customers.
data.aaf: Ethio Tellekom Xagana cule Baaxol Raqteh Tan Magaalolul Barisuh Nagay Meqe tan Taamitak fez-II Gabakaltuh Maqmilwa Fayxih kuli Daddalta Xatta Fayxi Newoki Osisanam kee Barisanama.
data.amh: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ከጊዜ ወደ ጊዜ እያደገ የመጣውን የደንበኞችን የመረጃ ፍላጎት ለማሟላት ሁለተኛውን ዙር የኔትዎርክ ማሻሻያ እና የማስፋፊያ ስራዎችን እየሰራ በመሆኑ በቀሪዎቹ የሀገሪቱ ከተሞች አገልግሎቱን ለማስፋፋት ቃል ገብቷል።
data.orm: Itiyoo Telekoom tajaajilicha magaalota biyyattii hafan irratti babal'isuuf akkuma ciminaan sarara bilbilaa ol-guddisuu fi fedha daataa mamiltootaa haalaan guddachaa jiruu guutuuf sadarkaa-II xumuruuf waadaa galeera.
data.som: Ethio Telecom ayaa sidookale balan qaaday in ay ku baahin doonto adeega magaalooyinka dalka ka hadhsan anagoo si mug leh uga shaqaynaynay dhamaystirka wejiga Il khad tayeynta iyo balaadhinta si loo daboolo baahida xogeed ee macaamiisha ah ee sii kordheysa.
data.tir: ንቲ ካብ ግዜ እናወሰኸ ዝመፀ ድልየት ኣገልግሎት ዳታ ዓማዊል ንምዕጋብ ካልኣይ ብርኪ ምምሕያሽን ምስፋሕን ኔትወርክ ንምዝዛም ኣበርቲዑ ከምዝሰርሕ ዘሎ ዝገለፀ ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ንዚ ኣገልግሎት ናብተን ዝተረፋ ከተማታት እውን ንምብፃሕ ቃል ኣቲው።

data.eng: Ethiopia has earned $1.33 billion from exports during the past five months, attaining 94% of the $1.41 billion target.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya $1.33 Bilyoonih Geyte Iro Baaxo Rubtamak Waraye Koona Alsah, $1.41 Biyoonih Madmak 94 Gabba Madonuh.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ ባለፉት አምስት ወራት 1.33 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ከኤክስፖርት ገቢ ስታገኝ ከታቀደው 1.41 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ውስጥ 94 በመቶውን ማሳካት ችላለች።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan biliyoona $1.33 biyya alaatti fe'uu irraa ji'oota shanan darban keessatti argatteetti, kaayyoo ishee biliyoona $1.41 keessa 94% galmaan geesseetti.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa 1.33 bilyan oo dollar ka heshay alaabaha ay dibadda u dhoofiso shantii bilood ee la soo dhaafay, taas oo gaadhay 94% oo ah $1.41 bilyan oo la rabay.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ኣብዝሓለፋ ሓሙሽተ ኣዋርሕ ካብ ሰደድ 1.33 ቢልዮን ዶላር ዘእተወት እንትትኮን እዚ ድማ ናይቲ ክተእትዎ ዝተለመቶ 1.41 ቢልዮን ዶላር 94 ሚኢታዊ እዩ።

data.eng: The revenue increased by $224.5 million or 20% compared to the same period last year, according to the Ministry of Trade and Industry.
data.aaf: Culenti 22.4 Milyoon Aw 20% Osiseh Ta bisle Ligidal qalalisanawak, Kabxa kee Sanaqata Malaak Elle Iyenal.
data.amh: ገቢው ካለፈው ዓመት ተመሳሳይ ወቅት ጋር ሲነፃፀር በ 224.5 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ወይም በ 20 በመቶ ብልጫ እንዳለው የንግድና ኢንዱስትሪ ሚኒስቴር አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Akka ministeera Daldalaa fi Industiriitti galiin miliyoona $224'n yookin 20%'n bara darbee waliin yeroo wal bira qabamu dabaleera.
data.som: Dakhliga ayaa kordhay $224.5 milyan oo u dhiganta 20% marka loo eego isla muddadaas sannadkii hore, sida ay sheegtay wasaaradda ganacsiga iyo warshadaha.
data.tir: ሚንስቴር ንግድን ኢንዱስትሪን ከምዝበሎ እዚ እቶት ካብቲ ዓሚ ዝነበረ ተመሳሳሊ እዋን ብ224.5 ሚልዮን ወይ ድማ በ20 ሚኢታዊ ይዛይድ።

data.eng: The Saudi Arabian Government and business delegation led by Minister of State for African Affairs Ahmed bin Abdul Aziz Qattan arrived in Addis Ababa on Sunday.
data.aaf: Saqud Qarabiyah Doolat kee Teelemo Buttay Afrikah Caagidah Malaak Acmad Bin Abdul Aziz Kattanm Acadah Addiss Ababa Madde.
data.amh: የአፍሪካ ጉዳዮች ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ አህመድ ቢን አብዱል አዚዝ ቃታን የተመራ የሳዑዲ አረቢያ መንግስት እና የቢዝነስ ልዑካን ቡድን እሁድ አዲስ አበባ ገብቷል።
data.orm: Mootummaa Saawudii Arabiyaa fi jiilli daldalaa ministeera biyya dhimmootaa Afiriikaa Ahimed biin Abdul zii Qaattaaanin durfamu dilbata Addis Ababa seenaniiru.
data.som: Waxaa maanta oo Axad ah magaalada Addis Ababa ee dalka Itoobiya gaaray wafdi ka socda dowladda Sacuudi carabiya iyo wafdi ganacsato ah oo uu hoggaaminayo wasiiru dowlaha arrimaha Afrika Axmed Bin Cabdul Casiis Qattan.
data.tir: ብሚኒስትር ዲኤታ ጉዳያት ኣፍሪካ ኣሕመድ ቢን ዓብዱል ዓዚዝ ቃታን ዝምራሕ ጉጅለ ልኡኽ መንግስትን ማሕበረሰብ ንግድን ስዑዲ ዓረብ ብሰንበት ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣትዩ።

data.eng: In his opening remarks, Dr Aklilu Hailemichael, Ethiopia’s State Minister of Foreign Affairs, said such kinds of events are necessary to further cement the age-long and historical ties between the peoples of the two countries.
data.aaf: Kay Yabti Fakental, Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaak Dr Aklilu Haylemikeyel, Iyemih Ta weole Gudgud Xex Wakti kee Aydaadule Angaarow Namma Baaxoh Ayynti Fanal Sarah Sibintol Faxiimta.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ ዶ/ር አክሊሉ ኃይለሚካኤል በመክፈቻ ንግግራቸው እንደተናገሩት በሁለቱ ሀገራት ህዝቦች መካከል ያለውን የዘመናት እና ታሪካዊ ግንኙነት የበለጠ ለማጠናከር እንደዚህ ያሉ ዝግጅቶችን አስፈላጊነት ጠቅሰዋል።
data.orm: Dubbii saqiinsaa isaa irratti, Ministeerri ministeera dhimma alaa Itoophiyaa Dr Akiliiluu Hayilemikaa'el qophiileen akkasi walitti dhufeenya umurii-dheeraa fi seena-qabeessaa ummattoota biyyoota lamaanii gidduu jiru cimsuuf barbaachisaadha jedhaniiru.
data.som: Dr Aklilu Hailemichael oo ah Wasiiru Dowlaha Arrimaha Dibadda ee Itoobiya oo khudbad ka jeediyay furitaanka, ayaa sheegay in dhacdooyinka noocan oo kale ah ay lagama maarmaan u yihiin in la sii xoojiyo xiriirka soo jireenka ah iyo kuwa taariikhiga ah ee ka dhaxeeya shucuubta labada dal.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ዲኤታ ጉዳያት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ዶክተር ኣክሊሉ ሃይለሚካኤል ኣብ መኽፈቲ ዘረበኦም ከምዚኦም ዝበሉ ፍፃመታት ንቲ ነዊሕ ዝፀንሐን ታሪኻውን ምትእስሳር ህዝብታት ክልቲአን ሃገራት ዝያዳ ንምድልዳል ረብሓ ኣለዎ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Sugar Corporation which was selected Chair of the International Council for 2018 at the last conference held in London 2017 made the announcement today.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Sokar Korborasion Doorimeh Baadak 2018 Malah Buxa Ilacabo Konferensiy 2017 Londanal Tekke Mayssaxxaga Talqo.
data.amh: እ.ኤ.አ በ 2017 ዓ.ም በለንደን በተካሄደው የመጨረሻው ጉባኤ ላይ የ 2018 የአለም አቀፍ ምክር ቤት ሊቀመንበር ሆኖ መመረጡን የኢትዮጵያ ስኳር ኮርፖሬሽን ዛሬ ይፋ አድርጓል።
data.orm: Konfiransii darbe kan Landan 2017tti gaggeeffame irratti dursaa Mana maree Idil Aduyaa t2018 a'uun kan filatame Korporeeshiniin Sukkaaraa Itoophiyaa har'a ifooma taasise.
data.som: Shirkadda Sonkorta ee Itoobiya oo loo doortay Guddoomiyaha Golaha Caalamiga ah ee 2018 shirweynihii ugu dambeeyay ee London 2017 ayaa maanta ku dhawaaqay.
data.tir: ኣብ 2017 ዓ.መ.ፈ. ኣብ ለንደን ኣብዝተኻየደ ጉባኤ ን2018 ንቲ ዓለምለኸ ቤት ምኽሪ ብኣቦመንበርነት ክመርሕ ዝተመረፀ ኮርፖሬሽን ሽኮር ኢትዮጵያ እዩ ንዚ ዘፍለጠ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Sugar Corporation Communication Director Gashaw Aychiluhem told ENA that the nation will benefit from hosting the international conference.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Sokar Korborasion Angaaraw Saqal Gashaw Aychiluhem ENAak Iyeh Baaxo Baad Caddoh Konferensi Gexsisamat Tantifiqeh.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ስኳር ኮርፖሬሽን የኮሙዩኒኬሽን ዳይሬክተር አቶ ጋሻው አይችሉህም ለኢዜአ እንደተናገሩት ሀገሪቱ አለም አቀፍ ጉባኤውን በማዘጋጀት ተጠቃሚ ትሆናለች።
data.orm: Dayireekteerri koominikeeshinii korporeeshinii sukkaaraa Itiyoophiyaa Gaashaaw Ayichiluhim biyyattin konfirensii adunyaaawaa kana qopheessuu irra akka fayyadamaa taatu ENAtti himaniiru.
data.som: Agaasimaha Isgaadhsiinta ee Shirkada Sonkorta Itoobiya Gashaw Aychiluhem ayaa u sheegay ENA in qaranku uu ka faa’iidaysan doono marti galinta shirka caalamiga ah.
data.tir: ዳይሬክተር ኮሚዩኒኬሽን ኮርፖሬሽን ሽኮር ኢትዮጵያ ጋሻው ኣይችሉህም ንኣገልግሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፅዎ እታ ሃገር ንቲ ዓለምለኸ ጉባኤ ብምትእንጋድ ተጠቃሚት ክትከውን እያ።

data.eng: Ethiopia and South Korea have signed an agreement that could enable to jointly work on issues tied with urban land development.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya kee GabiQaxih Kuriya Fermat Sitingey Aben MagaalaH Ardih Daddosul sitalih Kah tamitan Inah.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እና ደቡብ ኮሪያ ከከተማ መሬት ልማት ጋር በተያያዙ ጉዳዮች ላይ በጋራ ለመስራት የሚያስችላቸውን ስምምነት ተፈራረሙ።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa fi Koriyaan kibbaa waliigaltee dhimmoota guddina lafa magaalaa waliin walqabatu irratti hojjechuuf dandeessisu mallatteessan.
data.som: Itoobiya iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed ayaa kala saxiixday heshiis awood u siinaya in si wadajir ah looga wada shaqeeyo arrimaha la xidhiidha horumarinta dhulka magaalooyinka.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ደቡብ ኮርያን ምስ ልምዓት መሬት ከተማ ኣብዝተኣሳሰሩ ጉዳያት ብሓባር ንምስራሕ ዘኽእለን ስምምዕ ተፈራሪመን።

data.eng: The agreement was signed between Solomon Kebede, Head of the Federal Urban Land and Land Related Issues Registration Agency, and his Korean counterpart Biki Chaw.
data.aaf: Ta Sitigey fanat Kak Yekkem Solomun Kebexe, Federalak Magaalah Ardi kee Ardit Xakabuh Tan Caagidah Masaqaray Agensi, kee Kay Kuriyak Baaxo Caagidak Biki Chaw.
data.amh: የፌዴራል ከተማ መሬትና መሬት ነክ ጉዳዮች ምዝገባ ኤጀንሲ ኃላፊ የሆኑት አቶ ሰለሞን ከበደ እና የኮሪያ አቻቸው ቢኪ ቻው መካከል ስምምነቱ ተፈርሟል።
data.orm: Waliigaltechi dura-ta'aa Ejensii galmeessa lafa magaalaa fi dhimmoota lafaan walqabatanii federaalaa Solomoon Kabbadaa fi gita isaanii kooriyaa Bikii Chaaw gidduutti mallattaa'e.
data.som: Heshiiska waxaa u saxiixay Solomon Kebede oo ah Madaxa Hay’adda Diiwaangelinta Arrimaha Dhulka iyo Dhulka Federaalka, iyo dhiggiisa Kuuriya Biki Chaw.
data.tir: እቲ ስምምዕ ኣብ ሞንጎ ሓላፊ ፌዴራል ኤጀንሲ መሬት ከተማን መሬት ተንከፍ ጉዳያትን ሶሎሞን ከበደን ኮርያዊ መዘነኦም ቢኪ ቻውን እዩ።

data.eng: Everest Textile Co, which makes fabrics and garments, said two new plants in Ethiopia and the US are scheduled to start operations in the first half of this year.
data.aaf: Eversti Sarite Sara Ko, Saro kee Sariteeta, Iyeh Namma qusba Koxite Itiyyobiya kee Ameerika Dafesen Ligidak Qimbo Rubqil Taama Qimbimele.
data.amh: ጨርቃ ጨርቅና አልባሳትን የሚያመርተው ኤቨረስት ጨርቃ ጨርቅ ኩባንያ በኢትዮጵያ እና በአሜሪካ ሁለት አዳዲስ ፋብሪካዎች በዚህ ዓመት የመጀመሪያ አጋማሽ ላይ ስራን ለማስጀመር ቀጠሮ መያዙን ድርጅቱ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Korporeshiniin Teekistaayilii Everest kan kafanaa fi huccuuwwan oomishu iddoowwan omishaa haarawaan lama Itoophiyaa fi Ameerikaatti hojii ji'oota jahan jalqabaa bara kana keessatti ni eegalu jedheera.
data.som: Shirkadda Everest Textile Co, oo samaysa maryaha iyo dhar, ayaa sheegtay in laba warshadood oo cusub oo Itoobiya iyo Maraykanka ah loo qorsheeyay inay bilaabaan hawlahooda qaybta hore ee sanadkan.
data.tir: ፈትልታትን ዓለባን ዘፍርይ ኩባንያ ዓለባ ኤቨረስት ኣብ ኢትዮጵያን ዩ ኤስን ዝርከባ ክልተ ሓደሽቲ ፋብሪካታት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርታ መንፈቕ እዚ ዓመት ስራሕ ከምዝጅምራ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: The plant in Ethiopia is to manufacture garments for the company’s brand name customers from Europe, while the US facility is to supply knitted fabrics and garments to customers in the US, the firm said.
data.aaf: Ta Coxite Itiyyobiyal Sarite Bicsanama Kambani Astal Maqmilwa Migaqal Illa Awrobay, Kalah Kaddu Amerikak Arac bXambaqinta Saro kee Sarite Bicisanama Maqmilway Ameerikal Tanih, Ta Firmi Iye.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ የሚገነባው ፋብሪካ በአውሮፓ ላሉ የኩባንያው የብራንድ ምርት ተጠቃሚ ደንበኞች ልብሶችን ማምረት ሲሆን፣ የአሜሪካው ተቋም ደግሞ በአሜሪካ ለሚገኙ ደንበኞች የጥልፍ ጨርቆች እና አልባሳትን ለማቅረብ መሆኑን ድርጅቱ ተናግሯል።
data.orm: Iddoon oomishaa Itoophiyaa huccuuwwan maqaa dhaabbatichaa qaban maamiltoota Awurooppaatif yeroo dhiyeessu, iddoon oomishaa Ameerikaa immoo kafanawwan qophaa'anii fi huccuulee maamiltoota Ameerikaatiif akka dhiyeessu dhaabitichi dubbateera.
data.som: Warshada ku taal Itoobiya ayaa ah in ay soo saarto dharka macaamiisha magaca shirkadda ee ka imanaya Yurub, halka xarunta Maraykankuna ay tahay in ay siiso dhar tolsan iyo dharka macaamiisha jooga Maraykanka, ayay shirkaddu sheegtay.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዘሎ ፋብሪካ ኣብ ኣውሮፓ ንዝርከቡ ዓማዊል ብራንድ እቲ ኩባንያ ዓለባ ዘፍርይ እንትኾን እቲ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ዘሎ ድማ ኣብ ዩ ኤስ ንዘለው ዓማዊሉ ፈትልታትን ዓለባን ከምዘቕርብ እቲ ትካል ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Human Rights Council (EHRCo) called for legal and operational amendments for future elections based on its observation outcomes of the elections conducted on September 30, 2021.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Adam Baxi Cskih Malah Buxa In the Takuwayta Dooroh Madqa kee abniso Kaxxagarabluy30, 2021 Tekke Doorok Ilacabo Aseleleqiyak Ugutak.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ሰብአዊ መብቶች ጉባኤ (ኢሰመጉ) በሴፕቴምበር 30 ቀን 2021 በተደረገው ምርጫ ምልከታ ውጤት መሠረት ለወደፊት ምርጫዎች የህግ እና የአሰራር ማሻሻያዎችን ጠይቋል።
data.orm: Manni Maree Mirga Namoomaa Itoopiyaa (EHRCo) bu'aalee taajjabbii isaa filannoo Fulbaana 30, 2021 geggeeffame irratti hundaa'uun filannoowwan fuulduraaf fooyya'iinsi seeraa fi adeemsaa akka godhamu waamicha dhiyeesse.
data.som: "Golaha Xuquuqul Insaanka Itoobiya (EHRco) ayaa ku baaqay in wax laga beddelo dhanka sharciga iyo shaqada ee doorashooyinka mustaqbalka iyadoo lagu salaynayo natiijadii indha indheyneed ee doorashooyinkii la qabtay Sebtembar 30, 2021."
data.tir: ጉባኤ ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብቲ 30 መስከረም 2014 ዝተሳለጠ መረፃ ዘለዎ ትዕዝብቲ መሰረት ብምግባር ንቐፃሊ መረፃ ዝሕግዙ ሕጋውን ግብራውን ምምሕያሻት ክግበሩ ፀዊዑ።

data.eng: According to a preliminary report issued by the Council on Thursday October 21, 2021 at Saphire Addis Hotel, irregularities were observed both in the elections and the Southwestern Peoples’ Region referendum.
data.aaf: Ta Malah buxa Kamiisih Qunxa garablu 21,2021 Sabhire Kalqatih Addal Bicisse Qimbo GabaqiElle yascasenal toowak Baxssa Nuble Neseleleqewak Nammam Dooro kee gabik Ayromawqah Ayyuntih Rakaakayak Ayyunti Margaqal.
data.amh: ምክር ቤቱ ሐሙስ ኦክቶበር 21 ቀን 2021 በሳፊሬ አዲስ ሆቴል ባወጣው የመጀመሪያ ሪፖርት መሰረት በምርጫውም ሆነ በደቡብ ምዕራብ ህዝቦች ክልል ህዝበ ውሳኔ ላይ ስህተቶች ተስተውለዋል።
data.orm: Akka gabaasa duraa Mana marichaan gaafa Kamisaa Onkoloolessa 21, 2021 Hoteela Saafir Addisitti dhiyaateetti, filannoowwanii fi rifireendamii Naannoo Ummattoota Kibba-Lixaa lamaanuu keessatti wanti seera malee tahe taajjabameera.
data.som: Sida lagu sheegay warbixin horudhac ah oo uu Goluhu soo saaray Khamiistii Oktoobar 21, 2021 Hotel Saphire Addis, ayaa lagu arkay wax isdabamarin ah xaga labada doorasho iyo aftida dadka Koonfur Galbeed.
data.tir: እቲ ጉባኤ ኣብዝሓለፈ ሓሙስ 11 ጥቅምቲ 2014 ኣብ ሳፋየር ሆቴል ዕላዊ ብመሰረት ዝገበሮ ፀብፃብ ኣብቲ መረፃን ኣብ ውሳነ ህዝቢ ክልል ህዝብታት ደቡብ ምዕራብን ሓላፍ ዘላፍ ተራእዮም እዮም።

data.eng: Speaking to The Reporter, the Amhara regional state police commissioner, Abere Adamu reaffirmed the readiness of the regional police force to go into operation in Benishagul region if the federal government is busy handling other matters.
data.aaf: Riborterlih Yaabak, amaara rakaakayak poolis komishiinik komishiner abera adamu poolis caylih abnisso Abnisoh fanah Gexonuh Gulguluh yaninim benishangul Rakaakay Adda federal Doolat Ta Caagidih Gaba gewaytek.
data.amh: የአማራ ክልል ፖሊስ ኮሚሽን ኮሚሽነር አበረ አዳሙ ከሪፖርተር ጋር ባደረጉት ቆይታ የፌደራል መንግስት ሌሎች ጉዳዮችን በማስተናገድ ላይ ከሆነ የክልሉ ፖሊስ በቤንሻጉል ክልል ወደ ስራ ለመግባት ዝግጁነታቸውን እንዳጠናቀቁ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Komishinariin poolisii mootummaa naannoo Amaaraa, Abberee Addaamuu, Ze Ripporteritti dubbachuun yoo mootummaan federaalaa dhimmoota biraa keessumeessuutti kan qabamu tahe humni addaa poolisii naannichaa naannoo Benishaangul keessatti opireeshinii geggeesuuf qophaa'aa akka tahe mirkaneesse.
data.som: “Isagoo la hadlaya The Reporter, taliyaha booliska deegaanka Axmaarada Abere Adamu ayaa xaqiijiyay in ay diyaar u yihiin in ciidanka booliska deegaanka in ay ka hawlgalaan deegaanka Benishagul hadii ay dawlada federaalku ku mashquulsan tahay hawulo kale.
data.tir: ኮሚሽነር ፖሊስ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ኣምሓራ ኣበረ ኣዳሙ ፌዴራላዊ መንግስቲ ብኻልኦት መደባት ተፀሚዱ እንተዳኣ ኾይኑ፣ ሓይሊ ፖሊስ እቲ ክልል ናብ ክልል ቤንሻንጉል ጉምዝ ወፍሪ ንምክያድ ድሉው ምዃኑ ንሪፖርተር ኣብዝሃቦ መግለፂ ደጊሙ ኣረጋጊፁ።

data.eng: “When one regional state fails to protect the safety and security of citizens, the federal government is responsible to act,” said Abere, stressing the need for maintaining rule of law in the area where the killings are taking place.
data.aaf: "Inki Rakaakayih Doolat Baaxo Xaylok Amni kee Saay Dacrisam Duudewa Saqat, Federal Doolat Abinoosuh Diki Kini," Abere Iyeh, Aysukuqiyi Fayxi Dariifay Rabi Elle yakkek Madqa Dagaraqiso Sugusoonuh.
data.amh: አንድ ክልል የዜጎችን ደህንነት ማስጠበቅ ካቃተው የፌደራል መንግስት እርምጃ መውሰድ አለበት" ያሉት አቶ አበረ ግድያ በሚፈፀምበት አካባቢ የህግ የበላይነትን ማስከበር እንዳለበት አሳስበዋል።
data.orm: "Yeroo mootummaan naannoo tokkoo eegumsaa fi nageenyaa lammiiwwanii eeguu dadhabu, mootummaan federaalaa hojjechuuf itti gaafatamummaa qaba," jechuun Abbereen, naannoo ajjeechaan keessatti raawwataa jiru keessatti olaantummaa seeraa mirkaneessuun barbaachisaa akka tahe jabeesse hime.
data.som: "Markii hal maamul degaaneed uu ku guuldareysto inuu ilaaliyo nabad galyada iyo amniga muwaadiniinta, dowladda federaalka ayaa mas'uul ka ah inay wax ka qabato," ayuu yiri Abere, isagoo ku nuux nuuxsaday baahida loo qabo ilaalinta sharciga deegaanka ay dilku ka dhacayaan.
data.tir: “ሓደ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ድሕንነትን ፀጥታን ዜጋታት ክሕሉ እንተዘይክኢሉ ፌዴራላዊ መንግስቲ ስጉምቲ ክወስድ ሓላፍነት ኣለዎ” ይብሉ ኣበረ ኣብቲ ቅትለታት ዝፍፀሙሉ ዘለው ቦታ ሕጊ ናይ ምኽባር ኣድላይነት ብምጥንኻር።

data.eng: The Houses of Peoples' Representatives (HPR) is expected to elect a new Supreme Court president to replace the outgoing Tegene Getaneh, who resigned from his post citing health problems that render him unable to carry out his duties.
data.aaf: Ummattah Awlaytiitih Malah buxa (HPR) Ciggiilak Qusba Daga Raqta Sangarah perezendet Doorelonu Axcuk Qambalan Cabeh Gexeh yan Tegene Getaneh, Qafiyat Taqabi Qadosak Ka Gacisan Kaa tekkek Issi Qaqak Yawqem Maduuda.
data.amh: የሕዝብ ተወካዮች ምክር ቤት ፕሬዚዳንቱን የሚተካ አዲስ የጠቅላይ ፍርድ ቤት ፕሬዚዳንት ይመርጣል ተብሎ ይጠበቃል ከጤና ጋር ተያይዞ ስራቸውን መፈፀም ባለመቻላቸው ስራቸውን የለቀቁት ተሰናባቹ ተገኔ ጌታነህ ናቸው።
data.orm: Manni Maree Bakka Bu'oota Ummataa (HPR) kan bahaa jiru Tegenee Getaanee, isa rakkoon fayyaa akka hojii isaa hin geggeessine isa dhorkuu himuun bakka isaa irraa gadhiise kan bakka bu'u pirasdaantii Mana Murtii Waliigalaa filachuuf ni eegama.
data.som: “Golaha Shacabka ayaa laga sugayaa inay doortaan Guddoomiyaha Maxkamadda Sare ee cusub oo bedeli doona Tegene Getaneh , kaasoo xilkaas iska casilay sababo la xiriira dhibaatooyin caafimaad oo sababay inuu gudan kari waayo shaqadiisa.

data.eng: Two weeks ago, House Speaker, Abadulla Gemeda told Members of Parliament that his office has received a letter from the Office of the Prime Minister stating that the Prime Minister Hailemariam has accepted Tegene’s letter of resignation.

data.amh: ከሁለት ሳምንት በፊት የምክር ቤቱ አፈ-ጉባዔ አባዱላ ገመዳ ለፓርላማ አባላት ፅህፈት ቤታቸው ከጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ፅህፈት ቤት ደብዳቤ እንደደረሳቸው አሳወቀዋል። ይህም ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ኃይለማርያም የአቶ ተገኔን የስራ መልቀቂያ ደብዳቤ መቀበላቸውን የሚገልጽ ደብዳቤ ነው።

data.eng: The Addis Ababa Water and Sewerage Autority (AAWSA) has hired a contractor to relocate the pipeline by April 2013, according to ERC’s deputy CEO, Debo.

data.amh: የአዲስ አበባ ውሃና ፍሳሽ ባለስልጣን (አአውፍባ) እንደ ኢአርሲ ምክትል ዋና ሥራ አስፈፃሚ ዴቦ ሀሳብ የቧንቧ ዝርጋታውን እስከ ሚያዝያ 2013 ድረስ ለማዛወር ኮንትራክተር ቀጥሯል።
data.orm: Akka ittaanaa CEO ERC, Debo'tti, Abbaan Taayitaa Bishaanii fi Dhangala'aa Addis Ababaa (AAWSA) bara 2013tti ujummootti bakka jijjjiiruuf kontiraaktera qaxare.
data.som: Madaxa biyaha iyo bulaacada Addis Ababa (AAWSA) ayaa qandaraasl bixisay si ay u rarto tuumbooyinka ugu dambayn Abriil 2013, sida uu sheegay ku xigeenka madaxa ERC, Debo.
data.tir: ምኽትል ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ኢ ኣር ሲ ዴቦ ከምዝበልዎ ባዓል ስልጣን ፍሳስ ማይ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ክሳብ ማዝያ 2005 ዓ.ም. ኣብዘሎ ግዜ ንቲ መስመር ቡምባ ማይ ንምልዓል ተኾናታሪ ቆፂሩ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Some representatives from the warring factions in South Sudan have arrived in Ethiopia’s capital, Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Gabbi Qaxih Sudaanak Qeebi Butta Itiyoppiyah Qaasima Addiss Ababah adda Madde.
data.amh: አንዳንድ የደቡብ ሱዳንተዋጊ ቡድን ተወካዮች የኢትዮጵያ ዋና ከተማ አዲስ አበባ ገብተዋል።
data.orm: Bakka buutonni qaamota Sudaan Kibbaa keessatti wal lolaa jiranii muraasi magaala guddoo Itoopiyaa, Addis Ababaa gahan.
data.som: Qaar ka mid ah wakiilada dhinacyada isku haya Koonfurta Suudaan ayaa gaaray magaalada madaxda Addis Ababa ee xarunta dalka Itoobiya.
data.tir: ገለ ተዋጋእቲ ውድባት ደቡብ ሱዳን ናብ ርእሰ ኸተማ ኢትዮጵያ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ምእታው ጀሚሮም።

data.eng: They will soon begin negotiations as part of a regional effort to end the conflict, according to Dina Mufti, Ethiopia’s foreign ministry spokesman.
data.aaf: Oson Tawak Makabana Abelon Rakaakay Luditel Qeebi Kah soolanah, Dina Mofti Elle Iyenal, Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaakih Afak Yabe.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር ቃል አቀባይ ዲና ሙፍቲ እንዳሉት ግጭቱን ለማስቆም በሚደረገው አህጉራዊ ጥረት በቅርቡ ድርድር ይጀምራሉ።
data.orm: Akka Diinaa Muftii, dubbi himaa ministeera haajaa alaa Itoopiyaatti, isaan yeroo dhiyootti haala tattaaffii naannichaa kan walitti bu'iinsa xumuruutti marii nii eegalu.
data.som: Waxay dhawaan bilaabi doonaan wadahadalo qayb ka ah dadaalka gobolka ee lagu soo afjarayo colaadda, sida uu sheegay Dina Mufti, afhayeenka wasaaradda arrimaha dibadda Itoobiya.
data.tir: ኣቐባሊ ቓል ሚኒስቴር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ዲና ሙፍቲ ከምዝበልዎ ጎንፂ ንምፍታሕ ናይዝግበር ዞባዊ ፃዕሪ ዝኾነ ሽምግልና ኣብ ሞንጎ እቶም ተዋጋእቲ ሓይልታት ኣብ ቀረባ እዋን ክጅመር እዩ።

data.eng: The Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam (GERD) will regulate the water flow of Nile River and reduce flooding risks and sedimentation in downstream countries, Arba Minch University Water Resource Research Center Director Samuel Degalo said.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Asqasabe Karawad(IAK)GRED) Abay Weeqaytuk Leecaxitiya Masooselem kee Weeqwi Taqabi Yanukusoyay Baaxot abay yan Caxit, Arabamichih Jaamiqatak Lee Gaddih kusaqih Fanteenah Saqal Samuel Xagelo Iyeh.
data.amh: ታላቁ የኢትዮጵያ ህዳሴ ግድብ የአባይ ወንዝን የውሃ ፍሰት ይቆጣጠራል እናም በታችኛው የተፋሰስ ሀገራት ላይ ሊደርስ የሚችለውን የጎርፍ እድል እና ደለል ይቀንሳል ሲል የአርባ ምንጭ ዩኒቨርሲቲ የውሃ ሃብት ጥናትና ምርምር ማዕከል ዳይሬክተር ሳሙኤል ድጋሎ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Hidhi Haaromsaa Guddichi Itoophiyaa(GERD) ya'a bishaanii laga Abbayyaa ni to'ata, akkasumas lolaa fi dhiqama biyyee biyyoota gadii akka hir'isu, Daayiriketeerri giddugala qorannoo Yuuniversitii Arbaa Mincii Saamu'el Digaaloo dubbataniiru.
data.som: Biyo xidheenka Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam (GERD) ayaa nidaamin doonaa qulqulka biyaha webiga Niil wuxuuna yareynayaa halista fatahaada iyodaadqaadida wadamada hoose, Agaasimaha Xarunta Cilmi baarista Kheyraadka Biyaha ee Jaamacadda Arba Minch Samuel Degalo ayaa sidu sheegay.
data.tir: ዓብዪ ግድብ ህዳሴ ኢትዮጵያ ዋሕዚ ሩባ ናይል ንምቁፅፃር ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ ሃገራት ታሕተዋይ ተፋሰስ ሓደጋ ውሑጅን ምምላእ ደለልን ንምንካይ ከምዝጠቅም ኣብ ዩኒቨርስቲ ኣርባምንጭ ዳይሬክተር ማእኸል ምርምር ሃፍቲ ማይ ሳሙኤል ዴግሎ ገሊፆም።

data.eng: The director told ENA that the dam will benefit the downstream countries, especially Sudan, by regulating the water flow and sediments.
data.aaf: ENA Saqal Iyem Karawad Ta Baaxol Caxitawaqdi Yantifiqeh, Baxsaluk Sudan, Leecaxitiya kee Ograt.
data.amh: ዳይሬክተሩ ለኢዜአ ግድቡ የውሃ ፍሰቱንና ደለል በመቆጣጠር የታችኛውን ተፋሰስ ሀገራት በተለይም ሱዳንን ይጠቅማል ብሏል።
data.orm: Daayirekteerichi biyyoonni gadii keessumaa Sudaan hidhicha irraa ya'a bishaanii fi biyyee to'achuun akka fayyadaman ENA'tti himaniiru.
data.som: Maareeyuhu waxa uu ENA u sheegay in biyo xidheenkan ay ka faa’iidaysan doonaan dalalka hoose, gaar ahaan Suudaan, iyadoo la nidaaminayo qulqulka biyaha iyo daad yaraynta.
data.tir: እቶም ዳይሬክተር ንኣገልግሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፅዎ፣ እቲ ግድብ ዋሕዚ ማይን ደለልን ኣብምቁፅፃር ንሃገራት ታሕተዋይ ተፋሰስ ብፍላይ ድማ ንሱዳን ረብሓ ኣለዎ።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Commissioner Yinager said the drought and civil unrests in some part of the country has not barred the economy from growing.
data.aaf: ENAluk Tekke Sero kee Gacsal , Kommissionar Yinager Iyeh Qabar kee Xakak Inkim Kini ta Baaxol Maduur Dadda Mawasa.
data.amh: ከኢዜአ ጋር በተደረገው ልዩ ቃለ መጠይቅ ኮሚሽነር ይናገር በሀገሪቱ አንዳንድ ክፍሎች የተከሰተው ድርቅ እና አመፅ ኢኮኖሚውን ከማደግ አላገደውም ብሏል።
data.orm: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliin godhaniin, Komishiner Yinaager hongee fi jeequmsi kutaalee biyyatti muraasa keessaa dinagdeen akka hin guddanneef hin ittisne jedhaniiru.
data.som: “Wareeysi gaar ah oo uu siiyey ENA, Komishaneer Yinager ayaa sheegay in abaaraha iyo kacdoonada shacabka ee ka jira qeybo ka mid ah dalka aysan u diidin dhaqaalaha inuu kobco.
data.tir: ኮሚሽነር ብፍላይ ንኣገልግሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ኣብዝሃብዎ ቃለመጠይቕ እቲ ኣብ ገለ ክፋላት እታ ሃገር ተኸሲቱ ዘሎ ድርቅን ዕግርግርን ንቲ ኢኮኖሚ ካብ ምዕባይ ኣይኣገዶን።

data.eng: “When we look at the past two years GTP-II performance, expected and unexpected things have happened such as drought and unrest which were unexpected, but if the prevailing peaceful situation remains unchanged and we do more in the two and half years left, the planned economic growth will be achieved,” the Commissioner said.
data.aaf: " Waraye Ligidih DTI-II (GTP-II) Abniso Waginawak, Qambalimtem kee Qambaalimewatem EddebTekke Toh Qabar kee Xakakway Qambalimak masugina, Takkay Imay tamixe Salaa Caalota Mamilagiminam kee Nanu Abneh Nammah sanat kee Qaxi Raqewak, Ikraarimte Maduur Daddalite Arac xagkteh," Kommiosiioner Iyeh.
data.amh: “የባለፉት ሁለት ዓመታት የጂቲፒ 2 አፈጻጸምን ስንመለከት፣ የተጠበቁና ያልተጠበቁ ነገሮች ተከስተዋል እንደ ድርቅና አለመረጋጋት ያሉ ያልተጠበቁ ነገሮች፤ ነገር ግን ሰፍኖ የነበረው ሰላማዊ ሁኔታ ካልተቀየረና በቀሩት ሁለት ዓመታት ተኩል ጊዜ ውስጥ የበለጠ ከሰራን የታቀደው የኢኮኖሚ ዕድገት ይሳካል” ብሏል ኮሚሽነሩ።
data.orm: "Raawwii GPT-II waggoota lamaan darbanii yeroo ilaallu, wantootni eegamanii fi hin eegamne raawwataniiru kanneen akka hongee fi jeequmsaa kan hin eegamne yeroo ta'an, garuu haalli nagaa duraa ture yoo hin jijjiramu ta'e waggoota lamaa fi walakka hafanitti caalaa ni hojjenna, karoorri guddina diinagdee ni milkaa'a" Komiishinerichi jedhaniiru.
data.som: “Markaan eegno labadii sano ee la soo dhaafay waxqabadkii GTP-II, waxaa dhacay waxyaabo la filanayay sida abaaro iyo qalalaase aan la filayn, laakiin haddii xaaladdii nabadeed ee jirtay aanay waxba iska beddelin oo aynu wax badan ka qabanno labada sannadood iyo badhkii hadhay. kobac dhaqaale oo qorsheysan ayaa la gaari doonaa,” ayuu yiri Guddoomiyaha.
data.tir: ኣፈፃፅማ ጂፒቲ 2 ዝሓለፉ ክልተ ዓመታት ምስንርእይ፣ ዝተገመቱን ዘይተገመቱን ነገራት ተራእዮም እዮም። ንኣብነት ድርቅን ዕግርግርን ዘይተገመቱ ነይሮም። ይኹን እምበር እቲ ሕዚ ዘሎ ሰላም እንተቐፂሉ'ሞ ኣብተን ዝሓለፋ ክልተ ዓመትን ፈረቓን ዝያዳ እንተሰሪሕና እቲ ዝተተለመ ቁጠባዊ ዕብየት ክገሀድ እዩ ኢሎም እቶም ኮሚሽነር።

data.eng: Ethiopia has been taking “very strong engagement” on land restoration, AU Great Green Wall Initiative Coordinator Elvis Paul Tangem said.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya "Baaxo qagitak Bicisaanamal" Gabat Agle Abak Geytimta, AU Nabah Tan Anxax Sigiqa Uguugusih Koobahise Elvis Baul Tangem Iyeh.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ በመሬት ልማት ላይ “በጣም ጠንካራ ተሳትፎ” እያካሄደች ነው ሲል የአፍሪካ ህብረት ግሬት ግሪን ዎል ኢንሽዬቲቭ አስተባባሪ ኤልቪስ ፖል ታንግም ተናግሯል ።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan "xiyyeeffannoo hedduu cimaa" haaromsa lafaa irratti fudhachaa jirti qindeessaan Keenyan magariisa guddicha AU Elvis Pawul Taangem dubbataniiru.
data.som: "Itoobiya waxay qaadaysay “ka qaybgal aad u xooggan" oo ku saabsan dib u soo celinta dhulka, Isku duwaha Hindisaha Darbiga Weyn ee cagaaran ee Midowga Afrika Elvis Paul Tangem ayaa yidhi."
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ሕውየት መሬት ንምርግጋፅ ኣበርቲዓ ክትሰርሕ ከምዝፀንሐት ኣተሓባባሪ ተበግሶ ዓብዪ ሓምለዋይ መንደቕ ሕብረት ኣፍሪካ ኤልቪስ ፖል ታንገም ገሊፆም።

data.eng: “I think Ethiopia has done a lot,” he said, adding that some 15 million hectares of land have been under restoration in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: :Anu Elle Akalenal Itiyyobiya Mangom Abte," Usug Iyeh, Osisak 15 Miyoonih Hiktaar Ardik Itiyyobiyah Addal Bicisak Geytiman.
data.amh: “ኢትዮጵያ ብዙ የሰራች ይመስለኛል” ሲል በኢትዮጵያ ወደ 15 ሚሊዮን ሄክታር የሚጠጋ መሬት ሲለማ ቆይቷል ብሎም ጨምሯል ።
data.orm: "Itoophiyaan hedduu hojjetteetti jedheen yaada" jedhe, itti dabaluunis heektaarotni miliyoona 15 Itoophiyaa keessatti haaromfama keessa turan.
data.som: "Waxay ila tahay in Itoobiya ay wax badan qabatay," ayuu yidhi, isaga oo intaa ku daray in ilaa 15 milyan oo hektar oo dhul ah lagu soo celinayo Itoobiya.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ብዙሕ ስራሕ ዝዓመመት ይመስለኒ ድሕሪ ምባል ኣብታ ሃገር ኣስታት 15 ሚልዮን ሄክታር መሬት ኣብ ሕውየት ከምዘሎ ሓቢሮም።

data.eng: According to Wordy, “Ethiopia has the natural resources to generate all the clean energy it needs and to decouple its economy from the fluctuating prices and unsustainable nature of the oil-based economy.”
data.aaf: Wordy Elle iyenal, " Itiyyobiya Gino Gaddale Saytun Inerji Hirigtuh Ta Faxam kee Tah Maduur Limoh kee saeimane alesini Sukatul rakuh Tan Maduur Gino Addah Itamak Osisekalt."
data.amh: በወርዲ መሰረት "ኢትዮጵያ የሚያስፈልጋትን ሁሉ ንፁህ ሃይል ለማመንጨት እና ኢኮኖሚዋን ከዋጋ መዋዠቅ እና ዘላቂነት ከሌለው ዘይት ላይ ከተመሰረተ ኢኮኖሚ ለማላላቅ የሚያስችል ተፈጥሮአዊ ሀብት አላት።"
data.orm: Akka Woorditti, "Itoophiyaan anniisaa barbaachisu hunda maddisiisuf akkasumas diinagdee jeeqamaa fi itti fufaa hin taane kan boba'a irratti hundaa'e dachaan dabaluuf qabeenya uumama qabdi.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigtay Wordy, "Itoobiya waxay leedahay kheyraad dabiici ah si ay u soo saarto dhammaan tamarta nadiifka ah ee ay u baahan tahay iyo in ay dhaqaalaheeda ka saarto qiimaha isbedbeddelaya iyo dabeecadda aan joogtada ahayn ee dhaqaalaha ku salaysan shidaalka."

data.amh: የካርበን ግብይትን ለማስተዋወቅ በተዘጋጀው መድረክ ላይ የኦሮሚያ ደንና ዱር እንስሳት ልማት ኢንተርኘራይስ ዳይሬክተር አራርሳ ረጋሳ ለኢዜአ ህብረተሰቡን ከተፈጥሮ ሀብት ተጠቃሚ ለማድረግ ሁለንተናዊ ስራ እየተሰራ ነው ሲል ተናግሯል።

data.amh: ፕሮጀክቱ ከደን ጭፍጨፋና የደን መራቆት የሚመጣው ልቀትን በመቀነስ በተጨማሪም የደንን ዘላቂነት ያለው አያያዝ እና የደን የካርበን ክምችትን በመጠበቅና በማጎልበት በተፈጥሮ ሀብት ልማትና ጥበቃ ላይ ከፍተኛ አስተዋፅኦ ማድረጉን ጨምሮ ገልጿል።

data.som: Waxa uu intaa ku daray in mashruuca yaraynta qiiqa ka dhasha xaalufinta dhirta iyo xaalufka kaymaha, iyo maaraynta joogtada ah ee kaymaha, ilaalinta iyo tayeynta kaydka kaarboonka kaynta (REDD+) ay saamayn wayn ku yeelatay horumarinta iyo ilaalinta khayraadka dabiiciga ah.

data.eng: Light rainfall less than 30mm is expected over parts of northern and southern Somalia, western Kenya, parts of western Rwanda, much of Uganda, eastern South Sudan, southern Sudan, and eastern Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Kilabt kee gabi Qaxih Somaliyale katuy, Ayro cula Kiniyay, ayrocumale Ruwanaxy, Uganxa Aysuk, Ayrokormak gabi Sudanay, kee Ayromawqa Itiyyobiyal 30mm Addah Yan Ifoytale Rob qambalima.
data.amh: በአንዳንድ ሰሜን እና ደቡብ ሶማሊያ ክፍሎች፣ በደቡብ ኬንያ፣ በምዕራብ ሩዋንዳ ክፍሎች፣ በአብዛኛው ኡጋንዳ፣ በምስራቅ ደቡብ ሱዳን፣ በደቡብ ሱዳን እና በምስራቅ ኢትዮጵያ ከ30 ሚሊ ሜትር ያነሰ ቀላል ዝናብ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Rooba salphaan 30mm gadi ta'e kutaalee kaabaa fi kibba Somaaliyaa, dhiha Keeniyaa, kutaalee dhiha Ruwaandaa, kutaalee Yugaandaa gara caalu, baha Sudaan Kibbaa, kibba Sudaan fi baha Itoophiyaatti ni eegama.
data.som: Roobab fudud oo ka yar 30mm ayaa la rajaynayaa inay uu ka da'o qaybo ka mid ah waqooyiga iyo koonfurta Soomaaliya, galbeedka Kenya, qaybo ka mid ah galbeedka Rwanda, in badan Uganda, bariga Koonfurta Suudaan, koonfurta Suudaan, iyo bariga Itoobiya.
data.tir: ኣብ ሰሜንን ደቡብን ሶማሊያ፣ ምዕራብ ኬንያ፣ ገለ ክፋላት ምዕራብ ሩዋንዳ፣ ዝዓበየ ክፋል ዩጋንዳ፣ ምብራቓዊ ደቡብ ሱዳን፣ ደቡባዊ ክፋል ሱዳንን ምብራቕ ኢትዮጵያን ትሕቲ 30 ሚሊ ሜትሮ ዝመጠኑ ፈኲስ ዝናብ ክህሉ ትፅቢት ተገይሩ ኣሎ።

data.eng: “To be one of the best institutes in Africa, EEFRI needs legal procedure, active involvement of the people and the concerned bodies as well as capital and human resources,” he added.

data.amh: "በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ካሉ ምርጥ ተቋማት አንዱ ለመሆን ኢኤፍሪአይ ህጋዊ አሰራር፣ የህዝቡ እና የሚመለከታቸው አካላት ንቁ ተሳትፎ እንዲሁም ካፒታል እና የሰው ሃይል ያስፈልገዋል" ሲል ጨምሯል።
data.orm: "Giddugala akka Afirikaatti sadarkaa dursaa ta'uuf EEFRI'n hojimaata seera-qabeessi, dammaqinaan hirmaannaan uummataa fi qaamota xiyyefannoo kennan akkasumas kaappitaala fi humna namaa ni barbaada" jechuun dabaleera.
data.som: "Si uu u noqoto mid ka mid ah macadyada ugu wanaagsan ee Afrika, EEFRI ayaa u baah nidaam sharci ah, ka qaybgalka firfircoon ee dadka iyo hay'adaha ay khusayso iyo sidoo kale raasumaalka iyo kheyraadka aadanaha," ayuu raaciyay.

data.eng: Ethiopia has encountered some 2,800 cyber-attack attempts during the last Ethiopian fiscal year (2020/21), according to the Director-General of Information Network Security Agency (INSA), Dr. Shumete Gizaw.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyat 2,800 Sayber Masattaka Gibati teetit Boode Itiyyobiyak Waraye Ligida (20202/21), Xaagi nitworkik Saay Ajensi Sanaqa jeneral, Dr. Shumete Gizaw.
data.amh: የኢንፎርሜሽን መረብ ደህንነት ኤጀንሲ (ኢንሳ) ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዶ/ር ሹመቴ ግዛው በተናገሩት መሰረት ኢትዮጵያ ባለፈው(2020/21) በጀት ዓመት 2,800 ያህል የሳይበር ጥቃት ሙከራዎች አጋጥሟታል።
data.orm: Akka Daayirekteera Olaanaa Ejensii Nageenya Odeeffannoo (INSA), Dr. Shuumatee Gizawutti, bara Baajataa Itoopiyaa darbe (2020/21), Itoopiyaan yaalii haleellaa saayiberii 2,800 tahantu ishee mudatee ture.
data.som: "Itoobiya waxa ay la kulantay ilaa 2,800 oo isku day weerar xaga khadka ah intii lagu jiray sanad xisaabeedkii u dambeeyay ee Itoobiya (2020/21), sida uu sheegay Mareeyaha Guud ee Hay'adda Amniga Shabakadda Warfaafinta (INSA), Dr. Shumete Gizaw."
data.tir: ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ኤጄንሲ ድሕንነት መረዳእታ ዶክተር ሹመቴ ግዛው ከምዝገለፆ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓመት በጅት (2020/21 ዓ.ም.ፈ) ኢትዮጵያ 2,800 ዝኾኑ መጥቃዕቲታት ሳይበር መኪታ።

data.eng: The Director-General made the remark at a ceremony organized to launch the month-long cyber security program under the title “Cyber Security Shared Responsibility, Let’s Know & Be Cautious”.
data.aaf: Ta Saqal Jeneral Gaboyna Fakentol Abeh Biciseh Yaysexexeguh Alsi Giddeh Alsi Gideh Sayber Saayih Tadeera "Sayber Saayak Dirki Tabsa, Naxagay Inam kee Nambiday" Iya taytilil.
data.amh: ዋና ዳይሬክተሩ ይህን ያሉት "የሳይበር ደህንነት የጋራ ኃላፊነት፣ እንወቅ እና እንጠንቀቅ" በሚል ርዕስ ለአንድ ወር የሚቆየውን የሳይበር ደህንነት ፕሮግራም ለመጀመር በተዘጋጀ ስነ ስርዓት ላይ ነው።

data.som: Agaasimaha guud ayaa hadalkan ka sheegay xaflad loo soo diyaariyay oo lagu daahfurayay barnaamijka amniga khadka oo socon doona muddo bil ah, kaasoo cinwaan looga dhigay “Aminiga khadku waa Mas’uuliyadda guud , aan ogaano oo ka digtoonaado”.
data.tir: እቲ ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ነዚ ዝገለፀ ''ሓበራዊ ሓላፍነት ድሕንነት ሳይበር ፥ ንፍለlጥን ንጥጠንቀቕን'' ኣብ ትሕቲ ዝብል ኣርእስቲ ንሓደ ወርሒ ዝፀንሕ መደብ ድሕንነት ሳይበር ዕላዊ ንምግባር ኣብ ዝተዳለወ ስነስርዓት እዩ።

data.eng: Nokia signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Addis Ababa Science and Technology University and Addis Ababa Institute of Technology in order to collaborate and provide high-level technical skills to students in line with rapidly changing market needs.
data.aaf: Nokiya Fermat MOUl hayte Addiss Ababak Saynis kee teknolojih Jaamiqat kee Addiss Ababak teknolojih Istitutilih sitaluk catimoonu kee Fayale caddoh Metibani Dudditeh Barttenitih Xayoosak Sisikuk Qadaga Fayxi milagaanama.
data.amh: ኖኪያ በፍጥነት እየተለዋወጠ ካለው የገበያ ፍላጎት ጋር ለመተባበር እና ለተማሪዎች ከፍተኛ የቴክኒክ ችሎታዎችን ለማቅረብ ከአዲስ አበባ ሳይንስና ቴክኖሎጂ ዩኒቨርሲቲ እና ከአዲስ አበባ የቴክኖሎጂ ኢንስቲትዩት ጋር የመግባቢያ ስምምነት ተፈራረመ።
data.orm: Nookiyaan tumsuu fi dandeetti teekinikaa sadarkaa olaanaa barattoota haala fedhii gabaa ariitiin jijjiiramaa deemuu wajjin walsimaniif kennuuf Waligaltee Walhubannoo (MoU) Yuunivarsitii Saayinsii fi Teekinooloojii Addis Ababaa fi Institiyuutii Teekinooloojii Addis Ababaa wajjin mallatteesse.
data.som: “Nokia ayaa heshiis Is afgarad ah (MoU) la saxeexatay Jaamacadda Sayniska iyo Tignoolajiyada ee Addis Ababa iyo Machadka Tignoolajiyada ee Addis Ababa si ay isaga kaashadaan oo ay ardayda u siiyaan xirfado farsamo oo heer sare ah oo la jaan qaadaya baahida suuqa ee sida degdega isku badalaya”.
data.tir: ኖኪያ ምስ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ሳይንስን ቴክኖሎጂን ዩኒቨርስቲን ምስ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ቴክኖሎጂ ኢንስቲትዩትን ምስቲ ብቕልጡፍ ዝልወጥ ዘሎ ጠለብ ዕዳጋ ዝመጣጠን ዝላዓለ ብርኪ ክእለት ቴክኒክ ንተምሃሮ ንምቕራብን ብሓባር ንምስራሕን ዘኽእል መባእታዊ ስምምዕነት (ኤም.ኦ.ዩ) ተፈራሪሙ።

data.eng: As part of the agreement, Nokia will work with the two universities to provide tailored training and coaching programs and share the latest technical and business practices in the ICT sector in line with global developments and market demands.
data.aaf: Tasitingeyik , nokiya taamitele Namma jaamiqatlih masowte Aydakaakan kee Aydakaaknise Tadeera Xayosanam kee Xaagi Angaarawih teknolojih sekteril (XAT/ICT/) Mtibanu kee Tellemoh Abnisoh Tabaatabisanamy Baad Daddosite kee Qadaaga Fayxitelih Gacak.
data.amh: በስምምነቱ መሰረት ኖኪያ ከሁለቱ ዩኒቨርስቲዎች ጋር በመተባበር ብጁ የስልጠና እና የአሰልጣኝነት መርሃ ግብሮችን በመስጠት እና በአይሲቲ ዘርፍ አዳዲስ ቴክኒካል እና የንግድ ልምዶችን ከአለም አቀፍ ልማት እና የገበያ ፍላጎቶች ጋር በማካፈል ይሰራል።
data.orm: Akka waliigaltichaatti, Nookiyaan Yuunivarsiitii lamaan wajjin leenjii mijataa fi sagantaalee leenjisuu ni kenna akkasumas sektera ICT keessatti barteewwan teekinikaa fi biizinisee dhiyeenyaa kan guddina addunyaa fi fedhii gabaa wajjin walsimatu nii qooda.
data.som: Iyadoo qayb ka ah heshiiska, Nokia ayaa la shaqayn doontaa labada jaamacadood si ay u bixiyaan tababaro iyo barnaamijyo tababarnimo oo ku habboon oo ay wadaagaan farsamooyinkii ugu dambeeyay ee farsamada iyo ganacsiga ee qaybta ICT ga si waafaqsan horumarka caalamiga ah iyo baahida suuqa.
data.tir: ብመሰረት ኣካል እቲ ስምምዕነት ኖኪያ ንዓለማዊ ምዕባለን ጠለብ ዕዳጋን ዝምጥን እዋናዊ ቴክኒካዊን ንግዳዊን ተሞክሮ ንምቕራብ ዝጠመተ ዕላማ ተኮር ትምህርቲን ስልጠናን ንምሃብ ምስ ክልቲኦም ዩኒቨርስቲታት ክሰርሕ እዩ።

data.eng: Sophia is quite a celebratory, attracting much attention as she travels the world But Getahun Mekuria, Ethiopia’s science and technology Minister, told BBC Amharic that Sophia would still appear at Saturday’s MCIT International Expo.
data.aaf: Sofiya Dago Massakaxy, Nagay Hangi hirigtemi Is Baad Gexewak takay imay Getehun Mekuria, Itiyyobiyak Saysin kee Teknilojih Malaak, Warse, BBC Amcari Afah Ta Sofya Taham fanah Buka inte sabtih, MCIT Baad Caddoh Exbol.
data.amh: ሶፊያ በጣም ታዋቂ ነች፣ አለምን ስትዞር የብዙዎችን ትኩረት ስባለች። የኢትዮጵያ ሳይንስ እና ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስትር ጌታሁን መኩሪያ እንደተናገሩት ሶፊያ አሁንም ቅዳሜ በሚካሄደው MCIT ኢንተርናሽናል ኤክስፖ ላይ ትገኛለች።
data.orm: Soofiyaan baayyee beekamtuudha, akkuma addunyaa irra imalteen xiyyeeffannoo guddaa argatte, garuu, Ministeerri Saayiinsii fi Teekinoolojii, Geetahun Makuriyaa, Soofiyaan Eksipoo Addunyaalessaa MCIT irratti gaafa Sanbataa akka argamtu BBC Amhaariffaatti dubbate.
data.som: "Sophia waa caan, taas oo soo jiidanaysa dareenka inta ay u ku wareegayso adduunka, Laakiin Getahun Mekuria, Wasiirka Sayniska iyo Tignoolajiyada ee Itoobiya, ayaa BBC da Axmariga u sheegay in Sophia ay wali ka soo muuqan doonto Bandhigga Caalamiga ah ee MCIT ee Sabtida."
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ሳይንስን ቴክኖሎጂን ኢትዮጵያ ንቢቢሲ ኣምሓርኛ ከምዝሓበሮ ኣብ'ቲ ብቀዳም ዝካየድ ናይ ኤም.ሲ.ኣይ.ቲ (ሚኒስቴር ኮሚኒኬሽንን ቴክኖሎጂን) ዓለምለኸ ምርኢት እታ ብሶፊያ ዝተሰየመት ሮቦት ክትቐርብ እያ።

data.eng: Getnet Asefa, the manager of Icog Labs – the engineering firm behind her Amharic programming, explained that Sophia was fixable and they would find alternative parts for her.
data.aaf: Genet Asefa, Icog Labs Saqal, Injineringih firmi kay Amaarah Afih Tadeerak Daret, baxaqisak Sofiya Aracal tanim kee Oson geelon Faximtah Tan Arooca.
data.amh: የ አይኮግ ላብስ ስራ አስኪያጅ ጌትነት አሰፋ ከአማርኛ ፕሮግራሚግዋ ጀርባ ያለው የምህንድስና ተቋም ሶፊያን ማስተካከል እንደሚቻል እና አማራጭ ክፍሎችን እንደሚያገኙላት አስረድቷል።
data.orm: Geetineet Aseffa, hoogganaan Icog Laabs - dhaabbata injiinaringii pirograamiingii Amaariffa ishee duuba jiru, Soofiyaan kan suphamu dandeessu akka turtee fi isaan qaamota kan biroo isheef barbaadaa akka jiran ibse.
data.som: Getnet Asefa, maareeyaha Icog Labs shirkadda injineernimada ee ka dambeysa barnaamijkeeda Amxaariga, ayaa sharraxday in Sophia ay ahayd mid la hagaajin karo oo ay u heli doonaan qaybo kale.
data.tir: ናይ'ቲ ናይ ኣምሓርኛ ፕሮግራሚንግ ኩባንያ ኣኮግ ላብስ ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ዝኾነ ኣይተ ጌትነት ከምዝገለፆ፡ ሶፊያ ተዓፃፃፊት ስለዝኾነት ንዓኣ ዝኸውን ኣማራፂ ግደ ኣይሳኣንን።

data.eng: An Ethiopian-American Plant Breeder, Geneticist and Professor at Purdue University, Gebisa Ejeta (PhD) has received 5 million dollars from Purdue University, West Lafayette, Indiana State, USA to promote his contributions and achievements in sorghum breeding research.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyaa kee Amerikah Baxxi Coox Xayoose, Genetik Tuyaxiyi kee Brofeseri Purder Jaamiqatl,Gebisa Ejeta(PHD) purdueh jaamiqatak 5 milyoonih Xolaar Hirige, Ayrokormah Lafayette, Inxiyanah Rakaakayay, Ameerikal Yeysexexegeh Isi Doori kee Arac Xagiyal Dookari Asdorih Kusaaqal.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያዊው አሜሪካዊ የዕፅዋት አርቢ፣ የጄኔቲክስ ባለሙያ እና የፑርዱ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፕሮፌሰር ገቢሳ ኤጄታ (ዶክትሬት) በማሽላ መራቢያ ምርምር ያበረከተውን አስተዋጾ እና ያስገኘውን ውጤት ለማስተዋወቅ 5 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ከፑርዱ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዌስት ላፋይቴ፣ ኢንዲያና ግዛት ዩኤስኤ አግኝቷል።
data.orm: Sanyii Biqilaa kan horsiisu Lammiin Itoopiyaa-Ameerikaa, Jeenestiin Profeeserri Yuuiversitii Parduu, Gabbisaa Ejjetaa (PhD) galchii isaa fi milkaa'insa isaa qorannoo sanyii bisingaa irratti godhe beeksisuuf Yuuivarsitii Parduu, Weest Lafayette, Isteetii Indiyaanaa, USA irraa doolaara miliyoona 5 irraa fudhate
data.som: Itobiyan-Maraykanka ah ee ku takhasusay iskudarka dhirta, hidde yaqaanka iyo borofisar ka tirsan Jaamacadda Purdue, Gebisa Ejeta (PhD) ayaa 5 milyan oo doolar ka helay Jaamacadda Purdue, West Lafayette, Gobolka Indiana, USA si uu ugu dhiirrigeliyo wax qabadkiisa iyo guulaha uu ka gaadhay cilmi baadhista taranka haruurka.
data.tir: እቲ ትውልደ ኢትዮጵያዊ ኣሜሪካዊ ኣራባሒ ተኽሊታት፣ክኢላ ጄኔቲክስን ኣብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፐርዱ ፕሮፌሰር ዝኾነን ገቢሳ ኢጄታ (ፒ.ኤች.ዲ) ኣብ መፅናዕቲ ምርባሕ ምሸላ ዘበርከቶ ኣስተዋጽኦን ዘመዝገቦ ውፂኢትን ንምስላጥ ምእንታን ክሕግዝ ኣብ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ክልል ኢንዲያና ኣብ ዌስት ላፍያቴ ካብ ዝርከብ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፐርዱ 5 ሚልዮን ዶላር ተሸሊሙ።

data.eng: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation has handed over the award to Gebisa.
data.aaf: Bill kee Melinda Getis Fawunxesion Gebisah Acwa Gabal Kak Tabise.
data.amh: የቢል ኤንድ ሜሊንዳ ጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን ሽልማቱን ለገቢሳ አስረክቧል።
data.orm: Faawundeeshiniin Biilii & Melindaa Geets badhaasicha Gabbisaaf kenneera.
data.som: Hay’adda Bill & Melinda Gates ayaa abaal marintanta gudoonsiiyay Gebisa.
data.tir: ፋውንዴሽን ቢልን ሜሊንዳን ድማ ነቲ ሽልማት ንገቢሳ ኣረኪቡ።

data.eng: The research of the Ethiopian award-winning researcher, Dr. Martha Zewdie was on regulatory T cells in pulmonary tuberculosis patients.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Acwah Beya Kusaqabe Kusaqise,Dr. Martha Zewxe Gabuulol Geytimta Lakimiteh Sugte.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያዊቷ ተሸላሚ ተመራማሪ ዶ/ር ማርታ ዘውዲ ያደረጉት ጥናት በሳንባ ነቀርሳ ህመምተኞች ላይ በሚደረጉ የቁጥጥር ሴሎች ላይ ነው።
data.orm: Qorannoon, qorattuu badhaasa mo'attuu lammii Itoopiyaa, Dr. Maartaa Zewudee to'annoo seeliiwwan T dhukkubsattoota pulmonarii tiyuuberkiloosis irrattidha.
data.som: Cilmi baadhista ay samaysay cilmi-baadhaha Itoobiya ku guulaysatay, Dr. Martha Zewdie waxay ku saabsanayd nidaaminta unugyada T ee bukaannada qaaxada sambabada.
data.tir: ናይ'ታ ኢትዮጵያዊት ተዓዋቲት ሽልማት ዝኾነት ተመራማሪት ዶክተር ማርታ ዘውዴ መፅናዕቲ ኣብ ሳምቡእ ሕሙማን ነቐርሳ ሳምቡእ ተቖፃፃሪነት ሴልስ ኣብ ዝህልዎ ውፃኢታዊነት ዘተኮረ እዩ።

data.eng: She told ENA that the research was part of her PhD work and basically looked at immune responses of patients and infected individuals in tuberculosis.
data.aaf: Is Intem ENAk Ta Kusaq Tet PHD Taama kee Baxsaluk Lakmisah Aftabi Gacsa kee Numtin Amol Gabulo Biyakah xagimtemi wagitta.
data.amh: ለኢዜአ እንደገለፁት ጥናቱ የፒኤችዲ ስራዋ አካል ሲሆን በመሰረቱ በሳንባ ነቀርሳ የተያዙ ታማሚዎችና የተጠቁ ግለሰቦችን በሽታውን ስለመከላከል ምላሽ የሚሰጥ ነው።
data.orm: Qorannichi qaama hojii PhD ishee akka ta'ee fi deebii madiinummaa dhukkabsattootaa fi namoota tuberkiloosisiidhaan qabamanii hundeedhaa akka ilaalu Isheen ENA tti himte.
data.som: Waxay u sheegtay ENA in cilmi baadhistu ay qayb ka ahayd shaqadeeda PhD ga oo ay asal ahaan eegtay jawaab bixinta difaaca ee bukaannada iyo dadka qaba cudurka qaaxada.
data.tir: ንሳ ንግልጋሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፀቶ እቲ መፅናዕቲ ኣካል ናይ'ቲ ንፒኤችዲ ዝገበረቶ ስራሕ ከምዝኾነን ብመሰረቱ ኣብ ምላሽ ዓቕሚ ምኽልኻል ብነቀርሳ ሳምቡእ ዝሓመሙን ዝተጠቕዑን ውልቀሰባት ዘተኮረ እዩ።

data.eng: According to the Minister, Ethiopia set to have thousands of technology centered micro and small enterprises that could produce various technological products expected to join the global market.
data.aaf: Ta Malaak Elle iyye innal, Itiyoppiya Laafatal Lowinta Maykiro kee Qunxa Interbirayizih Teknolojih Fanteenani Dafese To Mangom Xayosah Teknolojih Murtite bbad Qadagal Angalelem Qambalan.
data.amh: እንደ ሚኒስትሯ ገለጻ፤ ኢትዮጵያ አለም አቀፍ ገበያን ይቀላቀላሉ ተብሎ የሚጠበቁ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ቴክኖሎጂን ያማከሩ የጥቃቅንና አነስተኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች ሊኖሯት ነው።

data.som: Sida uu sheegay wasiirku, Itoobiya waxaa lagu wadaa in ay yeelato kumanaan xarumood oo teknoolajiyadeed oo udub dhexaad u ah ganacsiyada yaryar kuwaas oo soo saari kara alaabooyin kala duwan oo tiknoolajiyadeed oo la filayo inay ku soo biiraan suuqyada caalamka.

data.eng: Information Communication Technology Sector Director-General at the ministry, Abiyot Sinamo told ENA that the national strategy designed to digitalize key public services has been well underway and being implemented as per the plan.
data.aaf: Xaagi Angaarawak Teknolojih sekterih Saqal Jeneral Ta maalakih Addal, Abiyot Sinamo Iyeh ENAk Agat Istirateji Dafeyteh maftacah Yanih Yan Ayyunti Ayfaf Xijitalyzi abaanam kee Kuli Ikraarol Abnowteh.
data.amh: በሚኒስቴሩ የኢንፎርሜሽን ኮሙኒኬሽን ቴክኖሎጂ ዘርፍ ዋና ዳይሬክተር አቶ አብዮት ሲናሞ ለኢዜአ እንደተናገሩት ቁልፍ የህዝብ አገልግሎቶችን ወደ ዲጂታላይዝ ለማድረግ የተነደፈው ሀገራዊ ስትራቴጂ በጥሩ ሁኔታ እየተካሄደ ሲሆን በእቅዱ መሰረትም ተግባራዊ እየተደረገ ነው።
data.orm: Ministeerichatti Daayirekterri Olaanaan Sektera Odeeffannoo Quunnamtii Teekinoolojii, Abiyot Sinaamoo tajaajiloota hawaasaa murteesoo tahan gara digitaalaatti jijjiiruuf tarsiimoon biyyaalessaa saxaxame hojiirra akka jiruu fi akka karoorichaatti hojiirra oolaa akka jiru ENA'tti dubbate.
data.som: Agaasimaha Guud ee Tignoolajiyada Isgaarsiinta Warfaafinta ee Wasaaradda, Abiyot Sinamo ayaa u sheegay ENA in istiraatijiyadda qaranka ee loogu talagalay in lagu dhijitaal gareeyo adeegyada bulshada ee muhiimka ah ay si habsami leh u socoto, isla markaana loo hirgeliyay sidii qorshuhu ahaa.
data.tir: ኣብ'ታ ሚኒስቴር ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ዘፈር ኢንፎርሜሽን ኮሚኒኬሽን ቴክኖሎጂ ዝኾነ ኣብዮት ሲናሞ ንግልጋሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፆ እቲ ንቁልፊ ግልጋሎት ህዝቢ ዲጂታል ንምግባር ዝተሓንፀፀ ሃገራዊ ስትራቴጂ ፅቡቕ ይሳለጥ ከምዘሎን በቲ ዝወፀሉ ትልሚ ይፍፀም ከምዘሎን እዩ።

data.eng: Digital Transformation Program Director General at Ministry of Innovation and Technology, Dr. Abiyot Bayou said, “The grant will support our ministry in guiding and enabling digital reform under the EoDB Programme.”

data.amh: በኢኖቬሽን እና ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስቴር የዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ፕሮግራም ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዶክተር አብዮት ባዩ "ድጋፉ ሚኒስቴራችንን በኢኦዲቢ ፕሮግራም ውስጥ የዲጂታል ማሻሻያዎችን ለመምራት እና ለማስቻል ያግዛል" ብለዋል።
data.orm: Ministeera Innoveeshinii fi Teekinoolojiitti Daayirekterri Olaanaan Sagantaa Tiraanisformeeshinii Dijitaalaa, Dr. Abiyot Baayyuu, "Gargaarsi maallaqichaa Sagantaa EoDB jalatti rifoormii dijitaalaa geggeessuu fi raawwachuu keessatti ministirii keenya ni deggera" jedhe.
data.som: Agaasimaha Guud ee Barnaamijka Isbeddelka Dhijital ka ee Wasaaradda Hal abuurka iyo Tiknoolajiyada, Dr. Abiyot Bayou ayaa yidhi, "Deeqdan ayaa ka taageeri doontaa wasaaradeena hagidda iyo suurta gelinta dib u habaynta dhijitaalka ee hoos timaada Barnaamijka EoDB."
data.tir: ኣብ ሚኒስቴር ኢኖቤሽንን ቴክኖሎጂን ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ መደብ ስግግር ዲጂታል ዶክተር ኣብዮት ባዩ ''እቲ ዝትውሃብ ሓገዝ ሚኒስቴር ኣብ ትሕቲ መደብ ኢ.ኦ.ዲ.ቢ ንዘካይዶ ዲጂታል ተሃድሶ ኣብ ምምራሕን ምዕዋትን ንዝገብሮ ፃዕሪ ዝድግፍ እዩ'' ብምባል ገሊፁ።

data.eng: He also stated that besides adding Bahirdar and Diredawa cities to the national business portal, the support will enable the ministry to facilitate the implementation of EoDB reform by allowing further digitalization and reform ownership of the project.
data.aaf: Usuk Elle Baxaqisenal Osotinah Bahrixar kee Dedaabah Magaalal Agat Tellemoh Bortal, ta Malaakah Catele kobahisiyi Abinosiyih EoBD Reformih Sari Sumaqih Xijitatiz Abaanam kee reformi lewaniinu Ta Cugaysok.
data.amh: ድጋፉ የባህር ዳርና የድሬዳዋ ከተሞችን ወደ ሀገር አቀፍ የቢዝነስ ፖርታል ከመጨመር በተጨማሪ ሚኒስቴሩ የኢ.ኦ.ዲ.ቢ ማሻሻያ ግንባታን የበለጠ በዲጂታላይዜሽንና በባለቤትነት እንዲሻሻል በመፍቀድ ለማመቻቸት ያስችላል ብለዋል።
data.orm: Poortaalii biiziness biyyaalessaatti magaalota Bahirdaarii fi Dirredawaan dabaluun alatti, deggersichi dijitalaayizeeshinii dabalataa heyyamuunii fi abbummaa pirojektichaa haaressuun ministiricha hojiirra oolmaa rifoormii EoDB akka mijeessu ni deggeras jedhe.
data.som: Waxa kale oo uu sheegay in marka laga soo tago in magaalooyinka Bahirdar iyo Diridhaba lagu daro marinka ganacsiga qaranka, taageeradani ay wasaaradu u sahli doonto in ay fududayso hirgalinta dib u habaynta EoDB iyada oo ogolaanaysa in la sii casriyeeyo oo dib loo habeeyo lahaanshaha mashruuca.
data.tir: ንሱ ወሲኹ ከምዝገለፆ እቲ ሓገዝ ንከተማታት ባህርዳርን ድሬዳዋን ናብ'ቲ ሃገራዊ ፖርታል ንግዲ ንምውሳኽ ዝጠቅም ኣብ ርእሲ ምኻኑ እቲ ሚኒስቴር ንመደብ ምምሕያሽ ኢ.ኦ.ዲ.ቢ ንምትግባርን ካልኦት ናይ ዲጂታልን ምምሕያሽን መደባት ንምውናን እውን ዘፍቅደሉ እዩ።

data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ብቸኛው የእንስሳት ህክምና ክትባት ማምረቻ ማዕከል የሆነው ኢንስቲትዩቱ በያዝነው አመት መጨረሻ መድሀኒት ማምረት እንደሚጀምር የኢንስቲትዩቱ ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዶክተር ማርታ ያሚ ለኢዜአ ተናግረዋል።

data.eng: AIC Deputy Director-General Taye Girma told ENA that the center which aims to become a national center of excellence by establishing AI policy and creating conducive ecosystem for the private and public sector is facing two major challenges in general.
data.aaf: AIC Cigiila Saqal- jeneral Taye Girma ENAh Warse Ta Fanteena Hadafahlem Agatak Massakaxxale Fanteenah Yamaatenimi Al Bolisi bicisanam kee Meqeh Tan Ekosistem Canka kee Ayyunti Sekterway Amobeyak Mangom Ambuluyuk Geytimta Namma Taqabite.
data.amh: የመኢአድ ምክትል ዋና ዳይሬክተር አቶ ታዬ ግርማ ለኢዜአ እንደገለፁት የኤአይ ፖሊሲን በመቅረፅ ለግሉ እና ለመንግስት ሴክተር ምቹ የሆነ ስነ-ምህዳር በመፍጠር ሀገራዊ የልህቀት ማዕከል ለመሆን ያለመው ማዕከል ባጠቃላይ ሁለት ዋና ዋና ተግዳሮቶች ተጋርጠውበታል።
data.orm: Itti aanaan Daayirekteera Olaanaa AIC Taayyee Girmaa giddugalichi dambiilee AI hundeessuunii fi sekteroota dhuunfaa fi hawaasaaf haala mijataa uumuun giddugala kabajamaa biyyaalessaa tahuufi kan kaayyeefate akka waliigalaatti rakkoolee gurguddaa lamatu isa mudachaa jira jedhe.
data.som: Ku xigeenka agaasimaha guud ee AIC Taye Girma ayaa u sheegay ENA in xaruntan oo ujeedadeedu tahay in ay noqoto xarun heer qaran ah oo lagu dajiyo sharciyada AI iyo abuurista nidaamka deegaanka ku habboon ganacsiga gaarka loo leeyahay iyo kuwa dawliga ah ay wajahayaan laba caqabadood oo waaweyn guud ahaan.
data.tir: ምኽትል ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ማእኸል ስራሕ ሰብ ኢንቴሌጄንስ ንግልጋሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝሓበሮ ነቲ ማእኸል ሃገራዊ ንምግባር ተተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: President of the Association, Meaza Kitaw, said the association is now providing integrated sexual and reproductive health services including maternal and child health, family planning, screening and treatment.
data.aaf: Ta Eglah Berezixanti, Maqazakitaw, Iyeh ta Egla TawakTengele Angariwiya kee qafiyat murtusa Ayfafite Misinkaca kee Alaaqaqafiyatay, Buxamarih Ikraaroy, Fokaqo kee Dacayri Xayosam Abta.
data.amh: የማህበሩ ፕሬዝዳንት ወይዘሮ መዓዛ ቅታው ማህበሩ አሁን ላይ የተቀናጀ የወሲብ እና የስነ ተዋልዶ ጤና በተጨማሪም የእናቶች እና ህፃናት ጤና፣ የቤተሰብ ምጣኔ፣ የማጣሪያ እና ህክምና አገልግሎቶችን እየሰጠ ነው አሉ።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin Waldichaa, Me'aazaa Qitawu, waldichi yeroo ammaa fayyaa haadhaa fi daa'imaa, karoora maatii, calallii fi yaala dabalatee tajaajiloota fayyaa walquunnamtii saalaa fi walhormaataa walqabataa kennaa jira jedhan.
data.som: "Madaxwaynaha Ururka, Meaza Kitaw, ayaa sheegtay in ururku uu hadda bixinayo adeegyo caafimaad oo isuugu jira galmada iyo taranka oo ay ku jiraan caafimaadka hooyooyinka iyo caruurta, qorsheynta reerka, baadhista iyo daaweynta."
data.tir: ፕሬዝደንት እቲ ማሕበር መዓዛ ቅጣው ከምዝገለፀቶ እቲ ማሕበር ሕዚ ጥሙር ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ዖታን ስነ-ተዋልዶን እንኮላይ ጥዕና ኣዴታትን ቆልዑን፣ ትልሚ ቤተሰብ ከምኡ እውን ምርመራን ሕክምናን እናሃበ እዩ።

data.eng: Fifty years ago the association was established with three members and now has 18,000 members.
data.aaf: kontom Sanatih Gideh Ta egla Sidiica Adoytit Xiseem kee Tawak 18,000 Adoytale.
data.amh: ማኅበሩ ከ50 ዓመታት በፊት ሦስት አባላት ያሉት ሲሆን አሁን 18,000 አባላት አሉት።
data.orm: Waggoota shantama dura waldichi miseensota sadiin hundaa'e yeroo amma miseensota 18,000 qaba.
data.som: Sadex Xubin ayaa asaastay ururkan konton sano kahor, hadana waxu leeyahay 18,000 oo xubnood
data.tir: እቲ ቅድሚ ሓምሳ ዓመት እንትምስረት ሰለስተ ኣባላት ዝነበርዎ ማሕበር ሎሚ 18000 ኣባላት ኣለውዎ።

data.eng: Close to six million people have received reproductive health service only in 2015 alone, it was noted.
data.aaf: 2015 Addat Dibuuk Illa lica Miyoonuh Gaba Bahtam Qafiyat Amrutiyih Ayfaf Hirigte, Tah Qadoosenih.
data.amh: በ2015 ብቻ ወደ ስድስት ሚሊዮን የሚጠጉ ሰዎች የስነ ተዋልዶ ጤና አገልግሎት አግኝተዋል ተብሎ ተወስኗል።
data.orm: Bara 2015 qofa keessa, namoonni miliyoona ja'atti dhiyaatan tajaajila fayyaa walhormaataa akka argatan hubatame.
data.som: lix milyan oo qof in kudhaw ayaa heshay adeegga cafimadka taranka 2015 kaliya, Wana ladiwaan galiyay.
data.tir: ኣብ 2015 ዓ.ም.ፈ ጥራሕ ናብ ሽዱሽተ ሚልዮን ዝፅግዑ ሰባት ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ስነ-ተዋልዶ ከምዝረኸቡ ተፈሊጡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Ministry of Health has announced that it is spraying anti-malaria chemicals in 160 Woredas in order to wipe out mosquito following the rainy season the country has been experiencing.
data.aaf: Qafiyat Malaak Elle Qadosenal Bagge-Gexo Daylih kemikalih buufiyya 160 Daqqortih Addal Kayniqe kah Bayisana ciggilta widdiira baaxo Abak Raag Kak Beyak Geytiman.
data.amh: የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር በሀገሪቱ የዝናብ ወቅትን ተከትሎ የወባ ትንኝን ለማጥፋት በ160 ወረዳዎች የፀረ ወባ ኬሚካሎችን እየረጨ መሆኑን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Eegumsa Fayyaa waqtii roobaa biyyattii keessa jirtu hordofuun bookee balleessuuf keemikaalota farra malaariyaa Aanaalee 160 keessatti biifaa akka jiru beeksise.
data.som: “Wasaaradda caafimaadka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in 160 ka degmoyin ay ku buufinayso kiimikooyinka ka hortagga duumada si loo baabiiyo kaneecada ka dib wakhti roobaadka uu dalku soo maray."
data.tir: እታ ሃገር ሕዚ ዘላትሉ ወቅቲ ዝናብ ስዒቡ ጣንጡታት ንምጥፋእ ኣብ 160 ወረዳታት ፀረ ዓሶ ኬሚካል እናተነፀገ ከምዝኾነ ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Ministry’s Malaria Programs Officer, Dereje Dilu, told Walta Information Center that over 916,000 kilograms of anti malaria chemicals and spraying materials have been distributed in 160 malaria prone Woredas of the country.
data.aaf: Malaakak Bagge-Gexo Tadeerah makkoabe, Xereje Xilu, Walta xaagi Fanteenak Iyemih 916,000 kilogramiteh Bagi Gexo solo Kemikal kee Uwaytite buufak Bagge-gexole 160 Daqqorti Kureenih ta Baaxok.
data.amh: የወባ ፕሮግራም ሚኒስቴር አለቃ አቶ ደረጀ ዲሉ ለዋልታ ኢንፎርሜሽን ማዕከል እንደገለጹት በ160 ለወባ በተጋለጡ የሀገሪቱ ወረዳዎች ከ916,000 ኪሎ ግራም በላይ የፀረ ወባ ኬሚካልና የርጭት እቃዎች ተሰራጭተዋል።
data.orm: Ogeessi Sagantaa Malaariyaa Ministeerichaa, Darajjee Diluu, keemikaalotnni farra malaariyaa kiilogiraama 916,000 ol tahuu fi meeshaaleen ittin biifan Aaanaalee 160 biyyattii kanneen malaariyaan hubamuu malaniif akka raabsame Giddugala Odeeffannoo Waaltaatti hime.
data.som: Madaxa Barnaamijyada Duumada ee Wasaaradda, Dereje Dilu, ayaa u sheegay Xarunta isgaadhsiinta Walta in ka badan 916,000 kiilogaraam oo kiimikooyinka ka hortagga duumada iyo aaladaha buufinta laga qaybiyay 160 degmoyin oo u nugul duumada.
data.tir: ኣብ’ቲ ሚኒስቴር መኮነን መደባት ዓሶ ዝኾነ ደረጀ ቱሉ ንማእኸል ኢንፎርሜሽን ዋልታ ከምዝገለፆ 916,000 ኪሎ ግራም ፀረ-ዓሶ ኬሚካላትን መሳርሒታት መንፀጊን ናብ 160 ንዓሶ ዝተቓልዑ ወረዳታት እታ ሃገር ተባፂሑ እዩ።

data.eng: Out of the three hospitals, the referral hospital under construction in Gnignag has been completed only 75 percent of its construction phase so far according to the head of the regional health bureau, Oman Amelu (MDr.)
data.aaf: Sidiicah Hosbitaalak Iroh, kaxxa/Referral/ Hosbital Xisnet Geytima Jnignag 75 gaba kaleeh kat xisneh Caddo Kaxxam Xeera ta Rakaakayak Qafiyat Birro Saqal, Oman Amelu (MDr.)
data.amh: የክልሉ ጤና ቢሮ ኃላፊ ኦማን አመሉ እንዳሉት ከሶስት ሆስፒታሎች በግንጋግ ውስጥ እየተገነባ ያለው ሪፈራል ሆስፒታል 75 በመቶው ብቻ ግንባታው ተጠናቋል።
data.orm: Akka hogganaa biiroo eegumsa fayyaa naannichaa, Omaan Amelu (MDr.)'tti, hospitaalota sadan keessaa, hospitaalli rifeeraalaa Giniginaag keessatti ijaarsa irra jiru haga ammaatti sadarkaa ijaarsa isaa dhibeentaan 75 qofa xumurame.
data.som: "Saddexda dhakhtar, dhakhtarka gudbinta ee laga dhisayo Gnignag ayaa la dhamaystiray 75 boqolkiiba oo keliya qaybtiisa dhismihiisa ilaa hadda sida uu sheegay madaxa xafiiska caafimaadka ee deegaanka, Oman Amelu (MDr.)."
data.tir: ካብቶም ሰለስተ ሆስፒታላት ሓደ ዝኾነን ኣብ ትሕቲ ህንፀት ዝርከብን ግኒግናግ ሪፈራል ሆስፒታል ዛጊድ 75 ሚእታዊ ህንፀቱ ከምዝተወደአ ሓላፊ ቢሮ ጥዕና እቲ ክልል ኦማን ኣመሉ (ኤም.ዲ.ኣር) ገሊፁ።

data.eng: According to the head, the reason behind the delay is related to the fleeing the contactor from the area.
data.aaf: Saqal elle Iyenal Taham Wadirih Kah Intamak Sababa Xiso Taama Beeh Yannum/Kontrater/ ta Dariifak Yamboqoremi
data.amh: እንደ ኃላፊው ከሆነ ከመዘግየቱ በስተጀርባ ያለው ምክንያት የኮንተራክተሩ ከአካባቢው መሸሽ ጋር የተያያዘ ነው።
data.orm: Akka hogganichaatti, sababni turuu isaa duuba jiru kontiraacterri naannoo sanaa irraa baqachuun walqabatee akka tahedha.
data.som: Sida uu sheegay madaxu, sababta ka dambeysa dib u dhaca ayaa la xidhiidha in uu goobta ka baxsasay qandaraasluhu.
data.tir: እቲ ሓላፊ ከምዝገለፆ ምኽንያት ምጉታት እቲ ህንፀት እቲ ኮንትራክተር ካብ’ቲ ከባቢ ብምህዳሙ እዩ።

data.eng: Red Crescent Society of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) has provided the Ethiopian Health Ministry with 50 ambulances.
data.aaf: Tengele qarab imaratak (QII/UAE/) Qasa Alsa Ayyunti Itiyyobiyak qafiyat Malaakah 50 Ambolance xayoose.
data.amh: የተባበሩት አረብ ኤመረትስ የቀይ ጨረቃ ማህበር ለኢትየፐፒያ ጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር የ 50 አምቡላንሶች ድጋፍ አደረገ።
data.orm: Hawaasni Addeessaa Diimaa Tokkummaa Emireetota Arabaa (UAE) Ministeera Eegumsa Fayyaa Itiyoopiyaaf ambulaansota 50 dhiyeesse.
data.som: Hay’adda Bisha Cas ee dalka Imaaraadka Carabta ayaa wasaaradda caafimaadka Itoobiya ugu deeqday 50 baabuur oo nooca gurmadka ah.
data.tir: ማሕበር ቀይሕ ወርሒ ኢሜሬት ሕቡራት ዓረብ (ዩ.ኤ.ኢ) ንሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ኢትዮጵያ 50 ኣምቡላንሳት ኣውፊዩ።

data.eng: The ambulances worth 250 million Birr and seven of them are said to have arrived in Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Ta Ambolansite Kah Xaamimtem 250 Milyoonih Birri Kee malciin Keenik Addiss Ababab Adda Madeh.
data.amh: እንደ ኃላፊው ከሆነ ከመዘግየቱ በስተጀርባ ያለው ምክንያት የኮንተራክተሩ ከአካባቢው መሸሽ ጋር የተያያዘ ነው።
data.orm: Ambulaansonni kunneen Birrii miliyoona 250 akka baasanii fi torban isaanii Addis Ababaa seenanii akka jiran himame.
data.som: Baabuurta gurmadka degdega ah oo qiimahoodu yahay 250 milyan oo Birr iyo 7 ka mid ah ayaa la sheegay inay gaadheen Addis Ababa.
data.tir: ካብተን 250 ሚልዮን ቕርሺ ዝዋግአን ኣምቡላንሳት እተን ሸውዓተ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ከምዝኣተዋ ተሓቢሩ።

data.eng: Some 200,000 residents of Addis Ababa living in extreme poverty are going to be provided with support in the second phase of the food security program which will start tomorrow.
data.aaf: 200,000 Addiss Ababah Magaalah Ayyuntak tu kaxxa Baacah Addat Tn Nameyhaytoh caddoh Maqqidi Kobalisoh Tadeerah Xawoyteeh Beerak Xabahanam Cato Qimbimele.
data.amh: በነገው እለት በሚጀመረው ሁለተኛው የምግብ ዋስትና ፕሮግራም 200,000 ለሚሆኑ በአዲስ አበባ ውስጥ በአስከፊ ድህነት ውስጥ ለሚገኙ ነዋሪዎች ድጋፍ ሊደረግላቸው ነው።
data.orm: Jiraattota Addis Ababaa 200,000 ta'an kanneen hiyyummaa garmalee keessa jiraachaa jiraniif marsaa lammaffaa sagantaa nageenya nyaataa kan boor eegalu keessatti deggersi godhamuufi.
data.som: Ilaa 200,000 oo qof oo ku nool magaalada Addis Ababa ee ku nool faqriga daran ayaa lagu wadaa in lagu taageero qaybta labaad ee barnaamijka sugitaanka cuntada kaas oo berri bilaaban doona.
data.tir: ካብ’ቲ ፅባሕ ዝጅምር ካልኣይ ዙሪያ መደብ ውሕስነት ምግቢ 200,000 ዝኾኑ ኣብ ሕሱም ድኽነት ዝነብሩ ነበርቲ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ሓገዝ ክርኽቡ እዮም።

data.eng: In his media briefing today, Mayor Diriba Kuma said 200,000 citizens in 55 woredas of Addis Ababa will benefit from the program.
data.aaf: Usuk Mangafah Elle Qadosenal Talqo, Magaala Xinnsoh Saqal (Mayor) dirriba Kuuma Iyeh 200,000 Ayyuntak Addiss Ababal 55 Daqqorti Ta Tadeerat Catimelon.
data.amh: ከንቲባ ድሪባ ኩማ ዛሬ በሰጡት የመገናኛ ብዙሃን መግለጫ በአዲስ አበባ 55 ወረዳዎች 200,000 ዜጎች የፕሮግራሙ ተጠቃሚ ይሆናሉ ብለዋል።
data.orm: Ibsa miidiyaaf har'a kenne keessatti, Kantiibaa Dirribaa Kumaa lammiiwwan 200,000 tahan aanaalee 55 Addis Ababaa keessa jiraatan sagantichaa irraa fayyadaman dubbate.
data.som: Duqa magaalada Diriba Kuma oo maanta warfaafinta la hadlay ayaa sheegay in 200,000 oo muwaadiniin ah oo ku nool 55 degmoyin oo Addis Ababa ah ay ka faa’iidaysan doonaan barnaamijkan.
data.tir: ከንቲባ ድሪባ ኩማ ሎሚ ንመራኸቢ ሓፋሽ ኣብ ዝሃቦ መብርሂ ኣብ 55 ወረዳታት ዝነብሩ 200,000 ዜጋታት ካብ’ቲ መደብ ተጠቀምቲ እዮም።

data.eng: Following the outbreak of the fatal Novel Coronavirus – now renamed COVID-19 by the World Health Organization (WHO) – Ethiopian Airlines announced that it has stepped up passenger screening and aircraft disinfection process at the Addis Ababa Bole International Airport.
data.aaf: Katayak Raba Katasa Novel Koronavayris Dalka - Baadak Qafiyat Egla (BQE/WHO/) Kovix-19 Aki migaq Hayte- Itiyyobiyak Qaran Merati Elle Qaddosenal Safara Fokaqak Meysitakay awrobilan Fayanamih Gexsisna Addiss Ababak Baad Tayarah Booxal.
data.amh: በአለም ጤና ድርጅት ኮቪድ-19 ተብሎ የተሰየመው ገዳይ የኖቭል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ መከሰቱን ተከትሎ የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ በአዲስ አበባ ቦሌ አለም አቀፍ አውሮፕላን ማረፊያ የመንገደኞችን የማጣሪያ እና የአውሮፕላን ብክለትን የመከላከል ስራ ማጠናከሩን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Weerara hamaa Koronaa Vaayirasii Haaraa - yeroo amma COVID-19 jedhamuun Dhaabbata Fayyaa Addunyaan (WHO) irra deebiin mogga'e - hordofuun Daandiin Qilleensaa Itoopiyaa calallii imaltootaa fi adeemsa xiyyaara irra jarmii dhabamsiisuu Buufata Xiyyaaraa Addunyaalessaa Addis Ababaa Booleetti akka olguddise beeksise.
data.som: Ka dib markii uu dillaacay cudurka dilaaga ah ee Novel Coronavirus oo hadda loo beddelay COVID-19 Hay'adda Caafimaadka Adduunka (WHO) Ethiopian Airlines ayaa ku dhawaaqday inay kordhisay baaritaanka rakaabka iyo habka jeermiska dila ee Garoonka Diyaaradaha ee calamiga ah ee Addis Ababa Bole.
data.tir: ንምግፋሕ እቲ ቀታሊ ዝኾነ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ማለት እቲ ብውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኮቪድ፡19 ተባሂሉ ሕዚ ዝተሰየመ ምኽንያት ብምግባር መንገዲ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ መንገደኛታት ናይ ምፅራይ ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣውሮፕላን ድማ ፀረ ረኽሲ ናይ ምንፃግ ስራሕቲ ከምዝጀመረ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Officials of Ethiopian Airlines and Ethiopian Airports organized a tour for the local media on Thursday.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Qaran Meraytu kee Itiyoppiyak Tayaraboxakamesih Wacaysir Bicise Adda mangafiteh.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ እና የኢትዮጵያ ኤርፖርቶች የስራ ኃላፊዎች ሃሙስ ለሀገር ውስጥ መገናኛ ብዙሃንን ጉብኝት አዘጋጅተዋል።
data.orm: Aangawonni Daandii Qilleensaa Itoopiyaa fi Buufata Xiyaaraa Itoopiyaa gaafa Kamisaatti daawwii miidiyaa naannoo qindeessan.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta Shirkadda Diyaaradaha ee Ethiopian Airlines iyo Garoomada Diyaaradaha ee Itoobiya ayaa maanta oo Khamiis ah soo qaban qaabiyay socdaal ay ku soo mareen warfaafinta dalka.
data.tir: ሰበ ስልጣን መንገዲ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያን መዕረፎ ነፈርቲ ኢትዮጵያን ብሓሙስ ንጋዜጠኛታት ዉሽጢ ዓዲ መደብ ዑደት ኣዳሊዎም።

data.eng: According to a letter issued by Tsigereda Kifle, deputy director of EPHI, HIV Kits including First Response HIV 1-2.0, Uni-Gold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beijing Wanta HIV-1/2 are said to be under evaluation.
data.aaf: SigerexaKifle Bicise Ayuftal, EBHI(EPHI), Each ay vii nammayhayto Saqal Kits edde Anuk Qimbo Raddi Gacsa HIV 1-2.o, Uni Dahab HIV, VIKIR HIV-1/2, Bejingi Wantah HIV-1/2 Agaradisit tan Iye.
data.amh: የኢ.ፒ.አይ. ምክትል ዳይሬክተር ወ/ሮ ፅጌረዳ ክፍሌ በጻፉት ደብዳቤ መሰረት የኤችአይቪ ኪትስ የመጀመሪያ ምላሽ ኤችአይቪ 1-2.0፣ ዩኒ-ጎልድ ኤችአይቪ፣ ቪኪኤ ኤችአይቪ-1/2፣ ቤጂንግ ዋንታ ኤችአይቪ-1/2 በግምገማ ላይ ናቸው ተብሏል።
data.orm: Akka xalayaa Tsigeredaa Kifilee, itti aantuu daarikteeraa EPHI tiin qophaa'eetti, Deebii Jalqabaa HIV 1-2.0, Yuuni-Goold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beejing Waantaa HIV-1/2 dabalatee Meeshaaleen HIV qorannoo jala akka jiran hiamame.
data.som: Sida lagu cadeeyey warqada aay soo saarray Tsigereda Kifle, agaasime ku xigeenka EPHI, Qalabka HIV oo ay ku jiraan Jawaabta Koowaad ee HIV 1-2.0, Uni-Gold HIV, VIKIA HIV-1/2, Beijing Wanta HIV-1/2 ayaa la sheegay in lagu qiimaynayo.
data.tir: ምኽትል ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ኢንስቲትዩት ጥዕና ማሕበረሰብ ኢትዮጵያ ፅጌሬዳ ክፍሌ ዝፃሓፈቶ ደብዳቤ ከምዘመልከቶ ናይ ኤች ኣይ ቪ ኪታት (መመርመሪታትን) ቀዳማይ ምላሽ ኤች ኣይ ቪ 1-2.0፣ ዩኒ ጎልድ ኤች ኣይቪ-1/2፣ ቤጂንግ፡ ዋንታ፡ ኤች ኣይ -1/2 ፅሬቶም እናተገምገመ እዩ።

data.eng: Beijing Wanti was registered by the Food, Medicine, Healthcare Administration and Control Authority on July 5, 2016 representing by a local company called GeZ Chemicals and Pharmaceutical PLC.
data.aaf: BejingiWanti elle Tonkutubem Maqqiday, Diway Qafiyat Dacayrih Xinnisoy Kee Lowsis Miraac Ditelik 5, 2016 Adda Kambaniteh Xayosa GeZ kemikalite kee Farmatikal NAC(PLC)
data.amh: ቤጂንግ ዋንታይ በምግብ፣ መድኃኒት፣ የጤና እንክብካቤ አስተዳደር ባለስልጣን ግዝ ኬሚካል እና መድሃኒትበተባለ አገር በቀል ኩባንያን በመወከል ሐምሌ 5, 2016 ተመዝግቧል።
data.orm: Beejing Wanti'n Abbaa Taayitaa Bulchiinsaa fi To'annoo Nyaataa, Qorichaa, Eegumsa Fayyaan gaafa Adoolessa 5, 2016 kampaanii naannoo PLC Keemikaalotaa fi Pharmasitikaalii GeZ jedhamuun bakka buufamee galmaa'e.
data.som: Beijing Wanti ayaa ka diiwaan gashan Maamulka Cuntada, Daawada, Maamulka Daryeelka Caafimaadka iyo Maamulka Xakamaynta July 5, 2016 oo ay matasho shirkad maxalli ah oo lagu magacaabo GeZ Chemicals and Pharmaceutical PLC.
data.tir: ቤጂንግ ዋንቲ ኩባንያ ገዝ ኬሚካላትን ፋርማቲካልን ብዝተብሃለ ናይ ዓዲ ውሽጢ ውልቀ ትካል ተወኪሉ ብሓምለ 5/2016 ዓ.ም.ፈ ብብዓል መዚ ምግቢ፣ መድሓኒት፣ ምምሕዳር ሓለዋ ጥዕናን ቁፅፅርን ተመዝጊቡ እዩ።

data.eng: The United States Agency for International Development (USAID), the development arm of America’s Department of State has completed its seven-year-long strengthening of Human Resources for Healthcare projects in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Ameerikak Baad Daddosih ejensii (/USAID/) Amerikah Exak Qaskar Daddos Itiyyobiyal malcina Sanatih gidde Sahdayti Gaddak Qafiyat Dacayrih Maqarossanamih Cugayso Kabakalteh.
data.amh: የአሜሪካ የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር የልማት ክፍል የሆነው የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ዓለም አቀፍ ልማት ኤጀንሲ (ዩኤስኤአይዲ) በኢትዮጵያ ለሰባት ዓመታት የፈጀውን የሰው ኃይል ለጤና አጠባበቅ ፕሮጄክቶችን አጠናቋል።
data.orm: Ejensiin Guddina Addunyaa Yunaayitid Isteetis (USAID), dameen guddinaa Ministeera Haajaa Alaa Ameerikaa pirojektoota isaa Qabeenya Humna Namaa Eegumsa Fayyaa Itoopiyaa keessaa jabeessuu waggaa torba dheeratu xumure.
data.som: Hay’adda Maraykanka ee Horumarinta Caalamiga ah (USAID), oo ah garabka horumarinta ee Waaxda Arrimaha Dibedda ee Maraykanka ayaa soo gebagebaysay 7sano oo ay ku xoojinaysay mashaariicda daryeelka caafimaadka ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ኤጄንሲ ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ (ዩ.ኤስ.ኤይድ) ማለት ልምዓታዊ ክንፊ ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኣሜሪካ፣ ሰብኣዊ ሃብቲ ሓለዋ ጥዕና ኢትዮጵያ ንምጥንኻር ክካይዶ ዝፀንሐ ናይ ሸውዓተ ዓመት ፕሮጄክት ዛዚሙ።

data.eng: The Tewodros Ashenafi Foundation was established by founder and CEO of SouthWest Holdings Ltd.
data.aaf: Texros Ashenafih Fawunxeshion Xiseh bicisem CEO Gabiy Ayro culma Mabaxenti Ltd.
data.amh: የቴዎድሮስ አሸናፊ ፋውንዴሽን የተመሰረተው በሳውዝ ዌስት ሆልዲንግስ ሊሚትድ መስራች እና ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ነው።
data.orm: Faawundeeshiniin Tewodiros Ashennaafii hundeessaa fi CEO SawuthWeest Hooldingis Ltd dhaan hundeeffame.
data.som: Tewodros Ashenafi Foundation waxaa aasaasay aasaasaha iyo maareeyaha guud ee SouthWest Holdings Ltd.
data.tir: ፋውንዴሽን ቴድሮስ አሸናፊ ብመስራቲን ዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕን ውልቀ ኩባንያ ሳውዝ ዌስት ሆልዲንግስ ዝተጣየሸ እዩ።

data.eng: The Reproductive Health Innovative Fund (RIF) project founded and being implemented by the Ethiopian Public Health Institute, is attaining encouraging fruits in various ways.
data.aaf: Asdoriyyi Qafiyatih Asqasabeh Fenxi (RIF) Cugayso Geytimtem kee Itiyyobiyak Qafiyat Istitut Abinosa, Mango katite kah Madisanah Aytikumusam Kini.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ የህብረተሰብ ጤና ኢንስቲትዩት የተመሰረተውና እየተገበረ ያለው የስነ ተዋልዶ ጤና ፈጠራ ፈንድ (RIF) ፕሮጀክት በተለያዩ መንገዶች አበረታች ፍሬዎችን እያገኘ ነው።
data.orm: Pirojektiin Fandii Kalaqa Fayyaa Walhormaataa (RIF) kan Inititiyuutii Fayyaa Hawaasaa Itoopiyaan hundeeffameef ittiin geggeeffamu, karaalee adda addaan bu'aalee nama jajjabeessuu argataa jira.
data.som: Mashruuca maalgalinta Hal abuurka Caafimaadka Taranka (RIF) oo uu aasaasay oo uu fulinayo Machadka Caafimaadka Dadweynaha ee Itoobiya, ayaa siyaabo kala duwan u helay midho dhiirigelinaya.
data.tir: እቲ ብኢኖቨቲቭ ፈንድ ጥዕና ስነተዋልዶ (ኣር፡ኣይ፡ኤፍ) ዝሕገዝን ብኣካያዲ ስራሕ እቲ ፕሮጄክት ብኣጥሌ ባህሩ እዩ ተመስሪቱ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Women’s U-20 national team is set take part in the CECAFA Senior Challenge Cup hosted by Uganda.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyah Sayyo G-20 Agat Dokon Abeh yan CECAFAh Naharsi Gexekaliteh kub Uganxlih Gexsiise.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ሴቶች ከ20 አመት በታች ብሄራዊ ቡድን በኡጋንዳ አስተናጋጅነት በሚካሄደው የሴካፋ ከፍተኛ ውድድር ላይ ሊሳተፍ ነው።
data.orm: Gareen biyyoolessaa dhalaa U-20 Itoophiyaa dorgommii waancaa buleeyyii CECAFA Yugaandaadhaan qophaa'e irratti ni hirmaata.
data.som: "Xulka qaranka haweenka Itoobiya ee 20 jirada ayaa lagu wadaa inay ka qaybg qaataan koobka CECAFA Koobka Tartanka Sare oo lagu qabanayo Uganda."
data.tir: ዕድመአን ትሕቲ 20 ናይ ዝኾና ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ሃገራዊት ጋንታ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዩጋንዳ ንፅዋዕ መን ወሰደ ኣብ ዝካየድ ግጥም ኩዕሶ እግሪ ሴካፋ ክትሳተፍ እያ።

data.eng: Ethiopia, Burundi, Eritrea, Djibouti, Tanzania and Uganda have been preparing for the tournament, which will take place from October 30 to November 9, 2021.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyah, Burunxiy, Ertriyay, Gabutiy, Tanzaniya kee Uganxa Qalaylih Biceenih yanin, qunxagarabluk 30 illa naharsikudok 9, 2021 fanah Gexsituwal.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ፣ ብሩንዲ፣ ኤርትራ፣ ጅቡቲ፣ ታንዛኒያ እና ዩጋንዳ ከጥቅምት 30 እስከ ህዳር 9 ቀን 2021 ለሚካሄደው ውድድር ዝግጅት ሲያደርጉ ቆይተዋል።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa, Burundii, Ertiraa, Jibuutii,Taanzaaniya fi Yugaandaan dorgaa dorgee Onkoloolessa 30 hanga Sadaasa 9,2021tti raawwatuuf qophii gochaa turaniiru.
data.som: Dalalka Itoobiya, Burundi, Eritrea, jabuuti, Tanzania iyo Uganda ayaa si weyn isugu diyaarinayay tartankan oo socon doona inta u dhaxaysa 30 ka Oktoobar ilaa 9 ka November 2021 ka.
data.tir: ኣብ እቲ ካብ ጥቅምቲ 30 ክሳብ 9 ሕዳር 2021ዓ.ም.ፈ ዝካየድ ግጥም ንምስታፍ ኢትዮጵያ፣ ብሩንዲ፣ ኤርትራ፣ ጅቡቲ፣ ታንዛንያን ዩጋንዳን ምድላዋት እናገበራ ፀኒሐን እየን።

data.eng: The well experienced Yalemzerf is the first woman in history to run a half marathon in under 65 minutes.
data.aaf: Yayseh yan Abak Raag Yalemzerf Qaxi Marathonih Ardal 65 minitih Addal culte Qimboh Aydaadul Saynum kini.
data.amh: ጥሩ ልምድ ያላት ያለምዘርፍ በታሪክ የግማሽ ማራቶን ውድድርን ከ65 ደቂቃ በታች የሮጠች የመጀመሪያዋ ሴት ነች።
data.orm: Muxannoo ga'aa kan qabdu Yaalemzarf dubartii jalqabaa seenaa keessatti ywalakkaa maaraatoonii daqiiqaa 65 gaditti fiigdeedha.
data.som: Yalemzerf oo khibrad fiican leh waa haweeneydii ugu horreysay taariikhda ee ku orda maaratoon nuskii wax ka yar 65 daqiiqo.

data.amh: የሰሜን አየርላንድ አንትሪም ኮስት የግማሽ ማራቶንን በነሀሴ መጨረሻ በ63፡43 የሮጠች ሲሆን በተለያዩ አህጉራዊ ውድድሮች በተለይም በግማሽ ማራቶን ውድድር ኢትዮጵያን ወክላለች።
