data.eng: According to CAF’s statement, to be discussed are the amendments to the law of the game, which takes effect starting from June 1, 2019 and will be implemented during the tournament.
data.aaf: CAF Elle Baxaqisenal, Addah Yan Digiril Misos Abaanamal walaleenih, illa Waysuk 1,2019 fanak kah Qimbimana kee Qalayli Udur Abinowetele.
data.amh: እንደ ካፍ መግለጫ ለውይይት የሚቀርበው የጨዋታው ህግ ማሻሻያዎች ናቸው፣ ይህም ተግባራዊ የሚሆነው ከጁን 1 ቀን 2019 ጀምሮ ሲሆን በውድድሩ ወቅትም ተግባራዊ ይሆናሉ።
data.orm: Akka hima CAF'tti, wantootni irratti mari'ataman foyya'iinsa seera taphaa kan Waxabajjii 1, 2019 irraa ka'ee dhiibbaa uumuu eegaluu fi yeroo dorgaa dorgeetti hojirra ooluuti.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigteeyeye war bixin kasoo baxay CAF, ayaa lagaga hadli doonaa wax ka bedelka sharciga ciyaarta, kaasoo dhaqan galaya laga bilaabo June 1, 2019, waxaana la dhaqan gelin doonaa inta uu socdo tartanku.
data.tir: ከም መግለፂ ካፍ ኣብቲ ስልጠና ምይይጥ ዝግበረሎም ዛዕባ እቲ ካብ ባሕቲ ሰነ 2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣትሒዙ ተግባራዊ ዝኸውንን ኣብቲ ግጥም ኣብ ስራሕ ዝውዕልን ዝተመሓ የሸ ሕጊ ፀዋታ ብዝምልከት እዩ።

data.eng: Elsewhere, Ethiopian cup winner Defense is set to face the Nigerian side Enugu Rangers in the preliminary return leg fixture on Wednesday in Addis Ababa stadium.
data.aaf: Aki aracal,Itiyyobiya Kubal yeyse Kalale dafeseh Focal Niyjeriyale kattuk Enugu Rangers Qimbo Mandabah Liigil Ugutma Arbaqah Addiss Ababa koqosoh Booxal Akkele.
data.amh: በሌላ መዳረሻ የኢትዮጵያ ዋንጫ አሸናፊ መከላከያ ከናይጄሪያው ኢኑጉ ሬንጀርስ ጋር በደርሶ መልስ ጨዋታ የፊታችን እሮብ በአዲስ አበባ ስታዲየም ይገጥማል።
data.orm: Gama biraatin tapha deebiitiin mo'aan geepha Itoophiyaa Ittisni garee Inuuguu Reenjers Naayijeeriyaa Roobii istaadiyoomii Finfinneetti ni quunnama.
data.som: dhanka kale, kooxda difaacanaysa koobka itobiya ayaa lagu wadaa inay wajahdo kooxda Nigeria ee Enugu Rangers kulanka lugta labaad ee horudhaca ah Arbacada garoonka Addis Ababa.
data.tir: እቲ ተዓዋቲ ፅዋዕ ኢትዮጵያ ዝኾነ ጋንታ ምክልኻል ሃገር ብሮቡዕ ኣብ ስታድዮም ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ዝካየድ ቀዳማይ ዙሪያ ካልኣይ እግሪ ግጥም ምስ ናይ ናይጄሪያ ጋንታ ኢኑጉ ሬንጄርስ ክፃወት እዩ።

data.eng: After the appointment of a new coach, Seyoum Kebede, the army side seems to be in a good run of form.
data.aaf: Qusba Saqal heniik sara, Seyoum kebexe, Qaskarle katuk fomitek meqenal Yerde.
data.amh: አዲስ አሰልጣኝ ስዩም ከበደ ከተሾሙ በኋላ የሰራዊቱ ቡድን በጥሩ ሁኔታ ላይ ያለ ይመስላል።
data.orm: Muudama leenjisaa Siyyum Kabbadee booda gamni ittisaa haala gaarii waan jiru fakkaata.
data.som: Kadib markii la magacaabay tababaraha cusub ee Seyoum Kebede, dhanka ciidamada ayaa u muuqda mid ku jira qaab ciyaareed wanaagsan.
data.tir: ድሕሪ እቲ ስዩም ከበደ ሓዱሽ ኣሰልጣኒ ኮይኑ ዝተሸመሉ ኩነታት ጋንታ ምክልኻል ኣብ ፅቡቕ ቁመና ከምዘሎ ተገሊፁ።

data.eng: Defense has won its ninth cup in the Ethiopian cup competition. However, the army side were beaten 2-0 in first round via two penalty goals.
data.aaf: Kalali yeyseh Nagla addah kub Itiyyobiyah Kabite Qalylitel, Faxenal, Qaskarle katuk Yasenih 2-0 Qimbo Caddoh Namma Bilantil goolitel.
data.amh: መከላከያ በኢትዮጵያ ዋንጫ ውድድር ዘጠነኛ ዋንጫውን አሸንፏል። ሆኖም ሰራዊቱ በ2-0 በመጀመሪያው ዙር በሁለት የፍፁም ቅጣት ምቶች ተሸንፏል።
data.orm: Gareen Ittisaa geepha salgaffaa dorgommii geepha Itoophiyaa mo'eera. Haa ta'u malee marsaa jalqabaatti gamni Ittisaa goolii dikooree lamaan 2-0 dhaan injifatamee ture.
data.som: Difaaca ayaa ku guuleystay koobkii sagaalaad ee tartanka koobka Itoobiya. Si kastaba ha ahaatee, kooxda ciidanka ayaa lagaga guulaystay 2-0 wareegii koowaad ee ciyaarta iyadoo labo gool ku laad loo dhigay.
data.tir: ኣብ ውድድር ፅዋዕ ኢትዮጵያ ንታሽዓይ ግዜ ፅዋዕ ዝወሰደ ጋንታ ምክልኻል ኣብዚ ግጥም ብኽልተ ፍፁም ቅላዕ 2ን 0 ተሳዒሩ እዩ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) is scheduled to celebrate the ‘global running day’ with a one-mile race on Wednesday, June 6, 2018.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiyak Ardi Fexeresion (IAF/EAF/) Tadeera Yibixeh 'Qaran Gubak Ardi Ayroh Massakaxxa' Inki mayilih Caddol Arbaqah, wasuk 6, 2018.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽን ‘ዓለም አቀፋዊ የሩጫ ቀን’ን በአንድ ማይል ውድድር ሊያከብረው ረቡዕ ሰኔ 6 ቀን 2018 ቀጠሮ ይዟል።
data.orm: Federeeshiniin Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa (EAF) 'guyyaa figicha adunyaa' dorgommii maayila tokkootin kabajuuf Roobii, Waxabajjii 6, 2018 beellameera.
data.som: Xidhiidhka Ciyaaraha Fudud ee Itoobiya oo u dabaaldagaya maalinta Orodka Caalamiga ah ee orodka hal mayl maalinta Arbacada, June 6, 2018.
data.tir: ፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ ኢትዮጵያ ንመዓልቲ ጉያ ዓለም ብሮቡዕ 6 ሰነ 2018ዓ.ም.ፈ ብዝካየድ ናይ ሓደ ማይል ውድድር ጉያ ከኽብሮ ተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Elite athletes will take part in the race which covers a distance of 1.6kms.
data.aaf: Tuyaxigi Arda Abe Abele Caddoh Addal 1.6mk Takkem xexarah.
data.amh: ታዋቂ አትሌቶች 1.6 ኪሎ ሜትር ርቀት በሚሸፍነው ውድድር ይሳተፋሉ።
data.orm: Atileetonni beekamoon dorgommii fageenya 1.6km haammatu irratti ni hirmaatu.
data.som: Ciyaartoyda caanka ah ayaa ka qayb qaadan doona tartankan oo gaaraya masaafo dhan 1.6km.
data.tir: ምስዚ ሓቢሩ 1.6 ኪሎ ሜትሮ ርሕቐት ዝሽፍን ውድድር ጉያ ምሩፃት ኣትሌታት ክካየድ እዩ።

data.eng: Partnering with sport ministers, city governments, race organizers and member federations around the world, the IAAF’s initiative incorporates the race to be held in a dozen cities across 15-time zones.
data.aaf: Dagar Diig Malaakitey, Magaala Miraciinuy, Qalaysi Bicisa kee Baadal Fexeresion Adotitiluk Catimak, IAAF Ugugusa sitalik gacak ta digir 15 waqlah Rasitek Xozen Magaalah Gambil Akkele.
data.amh: በዓለም ዙሪያ ካሉ የስፖርት ሚኒስትሮች፣ የከተማ መስተዳድሮች፣ የውድድር አዘጋጆች እና አባል ፌዴሬሽኖች ጋር በመተባበር የአይኤኤኤፍ ኢኒሼቲቭ ሚያካትተው ውድድር በ15 ጊዜ ዞኖች ውስጥ በደርዘን ከተሞች ይካሄዳል።
data.orm: Ministeera ispoortii, bulchiinsota magaalaa, qindeessitoota dorgommii fi minseensota federeshinii guutuu adunyaa waliin michoomuun, dhaabbatni IAAF dorgommichi magaalota kudha lama zoonii yeroo 15 keessatti akka geggeffamu qindeesseera.
data.som: Iyadoo lala shaqaynayo wasaradaha ciyaaraha, dawladaha hoose, qabanqaabiyayaasha tartanada iyo xidhiidhada xubnaha ka ah aduunka oo dhan, hindisaha IAAF waxa ka mid ah tartanka lagu qabanayo dhawr iyo toban magaalo oo ku yaala 15 wakhti.
data.tir: ሚኒስቴራት ስፖርት፣ ኣመሓደርቲ ከተማታት፣ ኣሰናዳእቲ ውድድራትን ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከቡ ኣባላት ፌዴሬሽናትን ብዝገብርዎ ምትሕብባር እቲ ተበግሶ ማሕበር ዓለምለኸ ፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ ዝኾነ ውድድር ጉያ ኣብ ኩለን 15 ክፋላት ሰዓት ኣብ ዝርከባ ደርዘን ከተማታት ክካየድ እዩ።

data.eng: Officials of the Ethiopian Football Federation (EFF) announced that Ethiopia has not made any formal bid to host the 2018 African Nations Championships (CHAN) after the Confederation of African Football (CAF) made a decision to strip the hosting duties from Kenya.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Ibi koqsoh Fexeresion (IIF/EFF/ Elle Yiysixigenal Itiyyobiya Waliqaynatih gital Anakar Mabina 2018 Afrikah Agtiteh Shambiyonshibite Gexsisuh (AAS/CHAN/) Ibi Koqosoh Konfexeresion (IKK/CAF/) Lakal Abenih Magaqa Kah Obanah Bicisiyi Dirki Kiniyak.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ፌዴሬሽን ባለስልጣናት የአፍሪካ እግር ኳስ ኮንፌዴሬሽን (ካፍ) የአስተናጋጅነት እድል ከኬንያ እንዲነጠቅ ከተወሰነ በኋላ ኢትዮጵያ የ2018ቱን የአፍሪካ ሀገራት ሻምፒዮና (ቻን) ለማዘጋጀት ምንም አይነት መደበኛ ጥያቄ እንዳላቀረበች አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Aanga'oonni Federeeshinii Kubbaa Miilaa Itoophiyaa(FKI) akka Itoophiyaan erga Konfedireeshiniin Kubbaa Miilaa Afiriikaa(KKA) ga'ee qopheessuu Keeniyaa irra fuudheen booda gaaffii seera qabeessa Shaampiyoonshippi Biyyoota Afirikaa(SBA) 2018 qopheessuuf hin goone beeksisaniiru.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta xidhiidhka kubbada cagta Itoobiya (EFF) ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in aanay Itoobiya wax dalab ah oo rasmi ah ka keenin marti gelinta tartanka qaramada Afrika ee CHAN 2018 ka dib markii xidhiidhka kubbada cagta Afrika ee CAF ay go’aan ku gaadheen in ay Kenya ka xayuubiyaan martigelinta ciyaaraha.
data.tir: ሓለፍቲ ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ ነቲ ኣብ 2018 ዓ .ም.ፈ ዝካየድ ሻምፕዮን ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ (ቻን) ንምትእንጋድ ዘኽእል ስሩዕ ሕቶ ብወገን ኢትዮጵያ ከምዘይቐረበ ዝገለፁ እንትኾን ኮንፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣፍሪካ ነቲ ናይ ምትእንጋድ ሓላፍነት ካብ ኬንያ ከምዝወሰዶ እውን ዝፍለጥ እዩ።

data.eng: CAF announced that three countries – Ethiopia, Equatorial Guinea and Morocco – have requested to replace Kenya as host countries.
data.aaf: CAF Elle Baxaqisenal, Sidiica Baxooxa-Itiyyobiyay, Ikuatoriyal guinea kee Moroco Esserenih Kiniyah Arac kah Cigilan inah Bicisa Baxooxak.
data.amh: ካፍ ሶስት ሀገራት ማለትም ኢትዮጵያ፣ ኢኳቶሪያል ጊኒ እና ሞሮኮ - ኬንያን በአስተናጋጅነት ለመተካት ጥያቄ ማቅረባቸውን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: CAF biyyoonni sadii - Itoophiyaa, Ekuwaatoriyaal Giinii fi Moorookoon - keeniyaa akka biyya qopheesitootti bakka bu'uuf gaafachuu isaani beeksise.
data.som: CAF ayaa ku dhawaaqday in saddex waddan oo kala ah Ethiopia, Equatorial Guinea iyo Morocco – ay codsadeen in lagu badalo Kenya si ay unoqdaan wadamada marti galinaya.
data.tir: ካፍ ሰለስተ ሃገራት ማለት እውን ኢትዮጵያ፣ ኢኳቴሪያል ጊኒን ሞሮኮን ንኣታኣናጋዲት ኬንያ ክትክኣ ሕቶ ከምዘቕረባ ዕላዊ ገይሩ እዩ።

data.eng: Kenenissa, who is double Olympic gold medalist, will return to the championship by competing in the marathon after two years of injury.
data.aaf: Kenenissa, Sitalakleh Olombik Dahab Laqo beye kini. Tohuk Adaruk Shambiyoshibih Marathonuh Qalalak Namma Sanatih Biyakaakwadiril.
data.amh: የኦሎምፒክ ድርብ የወርቅ ሜዳልያ ባለቤት የሆነው ቀነኒሳ ከሁለት አመታት ጉዳት በኋላ በማራቶን በመሳተፍ ወደ ሻምፒዮናው ይመለሳል።
data.orm: Qananiisaa, badhaafamaa meedaliyaa warqee Olompikii yeroo lamaa kan ta'e, gara shaampiyoonummaatti miidhama waggaa lamaa booda maaraatoonii dorgomii ni deebi'a.
data.som: Kenenissa, oo laba jeer ku guuleystay biladood oo dahab ah ee Olombikada, ayaa dib ugu soo laaban doona horyaalka isagoo ka qeyb galaya tartanka marathon ka dib labo sano oo dhaawac ah.

data.eng: He began his musical career in Addis Ababa in the 1940s and was a member of Ethiopia’s famous Police Orchestra.

data.eng: Near the city of Dire Dawa, Porc-Epic has long been a focus of study because of the variety of rocks characterized by a red or yellow color or streak, known as ochre, found there.
data.aaf: Der Dabak xayikel, Broc-Ebic Dumak Qimbisak Kusaql Hangi Cayuk suge sababah Qissi aw Qaddo kalam aw Cekawlil yamixige Baxaabaxsale Qalebagitay, Ocher Iyanaml Tamixige.
data.amh: በድሬ ደዋ ከተማ አቅራቢያ፣ ፖርክ-ኤፒክ ኦክር በመባል የሚታወቀው ቀይ ወይም ቢጫ ቀለም ወይም ጅረት የሆኑ የተለያዩ ድንጋዮች በመገኘታቸው ለረጅም ዓመታት የጥናት ትኩረት ሲሆን ቆይቷል።
data.orm: Naannoo magaalaa Dirre Dawwaatti, Poork-Epik sababa gosa dhagoota garaagaraa halluu diimaa fi keelloon qabanii yookaan halluu addda addaa, ochiree jedhamuun beekamu achitti argamuu xiyyeeffannnaa qorannoo ture.
data.som: Meel u dhow magaalada Diridhaba, Porc-Epic ayaa muddo dheer diiradda saarey daraasadda sababtoo ah noocyada kala duwan ee dhagaxyada lagu garto midab casaan ama jaalle ah, oo loo yaqaan 'ocher', ayaa laga helay halkaas.

data.eng: The social media platform, TikTok, owned by a Chinese company ByteDance, is used to make a variety of short-form videos of different genres and is getting popularity, including in Africa.

data.som: Fagaaraha bulshada ee TikTok, oo ay leedahay shirkad Shiinaha ah oo lagu magacaabo ByteDance, ayaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu sameeyo muuqaalo kala duwan oo gaagaaban oo noocyo kala duwan leh, ayaa caan nimo helah, oo ay ku jirto Afrika.

data.eng: Ministry of Trade and Industry discloses that 42.75 million USD has been garnered in a quarter of the Ethiopia’s fiscal year from exporting manufactured goods.

data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ በሩብ አመት 42.75 ሚሊየን ዶላር በፋብሪካ የተመረተ ምርት ወደ ውጭ በመላክ መገኘቱን የንግድ እና ኢንዱስትሪ ሚኒስቴር አስታወቀ።

data.som: Wasaaradda ganacsiga iyo warshadaha ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in 42.75 milyan oo doolar laga helay dhoofinta alaabaha la warshadeeyay rubuc sanad maaliyadeedka Itoobiya.

data.eng: As the leading air cargo service provider in Africa, Ethiopian Airlines, coupled with the competitive geo-strategic advantage Djibouti has, this project, when fully operational, will double the cargo operation of the Airlines and make Djibouti a hub for sea-Air cargo logistics.

data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ በአፍሪካ ቀዳሚ የአየር ጭነት አገልግሎት አቅራቢ እንደመሆኑ መጠን ጅቡቲ ካላት ተወዳዳሪ የጂኦ-ስትራቴጂክ ጠቀሜታ ጋር ተዳምሮ ይህ ፕሮጀክት ሙሉ በሙሉ ወደ ስራ ሲገባ የአየር መንገዱን የጭነት አገልግሎት በእጥፍ ያሳድገዋል እና ጅቡቲን የባህር አየር ጭነት ሎጂስቲክስ ማዕከል ያደርገዋል።

data.som: Shirkadda Ethiopian Airlines oo ah hormuudka bixisa adeegga xamuulka hawada ee Afrika, oo ay weheliso faa'iidada xeelada qaab dhuleed ee ay Djibouti leedahay, mashruucani, marka uu si buuxa u shaqeeyo, waxa uu laba jibaari doonaa hawlaha xamuulka ee diyaaradda, waxaanu Djibouti ka dhigi doonaa xudunta saadka hawada ee badda.

data.amh: የባህር እና የአየር ካርጎ ጭነት ፕሮጀክት ከባህር ጭነት በሁለት እጥፍ ፈጣን እና ከአ ጭነት በእጥፍ ርካሽ የሆነው የሁለቱን ሀገራት እና የሁለቱን አህጉራት የንግድ ግንኙነቶችን በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ይጨምራል ። አፍሪካ እና እስያ; በተለይም ቻይና።
data.orm: Pirojektiin fe'umsaa galaanaa-qilleensaa kan galaana qofaa irra dachaan saffisu fi kan qilleensa qofaa irra dachaan bushaa'u hanga olaanaa ta'en walitti dhufeenya daldalaa biyyoota lamaan gidduu akkasumas ardiilee lamaan Afirikaa fi Eshiyaa keessumaa Chaayinaa gidduu ol guddisa.
data.som: Mashruuca xamuulka badda-Air oo laban laab ka dheereeya badda oo keliya, laba jibaarna ka jaban kan Hawada oo keliya gaadiidka ayaa si weyn kor ugu qaadi doona xiriirka ganacsi ee labada dal iyo sidoo kale labada qaaradood; Afrika iyo Aasiya; gaar ahaan Shiinaha.
data.tir: ፕሮጀክት ካርጎ ባሕርን ኣየርን ካብቲ ብባሕሪ ጥራሕ ዝግበር ምንቅስቓስ ክልተ ዕፅፊ ዝሰልጥን ካብ ናይ ኣየር ጥራሕ ድማ ክልተ ዕፅፊ ዝሓስርን ስለዝዀነ ርክብ ንግዲ ክልቲአን ሃገራት አዕርዩ ክዓብይን ኣብ ሞንጎ ክልቲአን ክፍላተ ዓለም ብፍላይ ድማ ምስ ቻይና ዘሎ ዝምድና ክጠናኸር ዝገብር እዩ።

data.eng: The U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) and Awash Bank have announced a new partnership that will make up to $6.4 million in financing available to microfinance institutions and small- and medium-sized agricultural businesses in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Amerikak Baad Caddoh Daddosih Ejensi (USAID) kee Awash Banki Elle Tiysixigenal Qusubih Sitaluk Catimak $6.4 Miyoonih Xolaar Maliya Miykirofinansih Institutionwa kee Qunxah Fanti-Caddoh Buqreaba Tellemoh Itiyyobiyal kah takkenah Aben.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ዓለም አቀፍ ልማት ኤጀንሲ (ዩኤስኤአይዲ) እና አዋሽ ባንክ አዲስ አጋርነታቸውን አስታውቀዋል በኢትዮጵያ ላሉ የማይክሮ ፋይናንስ ተቋማት እና አነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ የግብርና ቢዝነሶች እስከ 6.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የሚደርስ ፋይናንስ ድጋፍም አዘጋጅቷል።
data.orm: Ejeensiin Ameerikaa Guddinaa Adunyaatiif(USAID) fi Baankiin Awaash michummaa haaraa hanga dolaara miliyoona 6.4 ga'u dhiyeessu kan dhaabbilee maayikiroofaayinaansii fi daldaloota qonnaa xiqqaa fi giddu galleessaa Itoophiyaa keessatti argamaniif oolu beeksisan.
data.som: Hay’adda Maraykanka ee Horumarinta Caalamiga ah (USAID) iyo Bangiga Awash ayaa ku dhawaaqay iskaashi cusub oo samayn doona ilaa 6.4 milyan oo doolar oo maalgelin ah oo loo diyaariyay hay'adaha maaliyadda yar yar iyo ganacsiyada yaryar iyo kuwa dhexdhexaadka ah ee beeraha ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ትካል ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ኣሜሪካን ባንኪ ኣዋሽን ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ንዝርከቡ ትካላት ማይክሮ ፋይናንስን ኣናእሽተይን ማእኸለዎትን ዓውድታት ሕርሻን ናይ 6.4 ሚልዮን ልቓሕ ከቕርቡ ዘኽእሎም ሓድሽ ምትሕብባር ዕላዊ ገይሮም።

data.eng: Under a USAID Development Credit Authority (DCA) agreement, this program will expand commercial bank lending into underserved areas and provide the private capital needed to help farmers and businesses intensify production, and support Ethiopia’s efforts to modernize its agricultural sector.
data.aaf: USAIDik Doddos Abuudih Miraacih (DCA) Gubat Sitingey, Ta Tadeera Qambalintam Kabxxa Banki Dafete Duyeyah Arooca Miracisiya kee Canka Gadda Kah Xayosana faxahyan cato Zarqen kee Tellemoma Maqarleh yan Murtil, kee Itiyyobiya Qasri Buqreh sekterih Qokolanama.
data.amh: በዩኤስኤአይዲ ልማት ብድር ባለስልጣን (ዲሲኤ) ስምምነት መሰረት ይህ ፕሮግራም የንግድ ባንኮችን ብድር ወደ ላልተዳረሰባቸው አካባቢዎች በማስፋፋት አርሶ አደሩና ቢዝነሶች ምርቱን እንዲያጠናክሩ ለመርዳት የሚያስፈልገው የግል ካፒታል ያቀርባል እንዲሁም ኢትዮጵያ የግብርናውን ዘርፍ ለማዘመን የምታደርገውን ጥረት ይደግፋል።
data.orm: Walii galtee Abbaa Taayitaa Liqii Misoomaa USAID(DCA) jalatti, sagantaan kun baankiiwwan daldalaa iddoowwan hin qaqabneef liqeessuu fi kaappitaalaa dhuunfaa barbaachisa ta'e qonnaan-bultoota fi daldaloota oomisha guddisuuf gargaaruu fi dhiibbaa Itoophiyaan sektara qonnaa ammayyeessuuf gootu ni gargaara.
data.som: Sida uu dhigayo heshiiska Hay’adda Horumarinta ee USAID (DCA), barnaamijkani waxa uu balaadhin doonaa daymimnta bangiyada ganacsiga ee meelaha isticmaalka yar iyo bixinta raasumaalka gaarka ah ee loo baahan yahay si looga caawiyo beeralayda iyo ganacsiyada xoojinta wax soo saarka, iyo taageerada dadaalka Itoobiya ee lagu casriyeynayo qaybteeda beeraha.
data.tir: ኣብ ትሕቲ ትካል ዓለምለኸ ልምዓት ኣሜሪካ ምስ ዝተጣየሸ ብዓል ስልጣን ልምዓት ልቓሕ ዝተገበረ አዚ ውዕል እዚ መደብ ልቓሕ ባንኪ ንግዲ ኣገልግሎት ናብ ዘይበፅሖም ከባብታት ብምብፃሕ ገባራትን ኣናእሽተይ ኣፍረይትን ኣድላዪ ደገፍ ገንዘብ ረኺቦም ፍርያቶም ከዕብዩ ብኡ ኣቢልካ ድማ ኢትዮጵያ ሕርሻኣ ዘበናዊ ንምግባር እተካይዶ ፃዕሪ ንምድጋፍ ዝዓለመ እዩ።

data.eng: Wang Jun for his part said The Chinese Government would provide the necessary support to Ethiopia’s move towards digitized tax collection and tax administration services.
data.aaf: Wang Jun Issi Aracal iyem Chaynah Doolat Faximtah Tan Qokolite Itiyyobiyah Xayosele Xijitalayzik yan Qisoh Askota kee Qiso Xannisiyih Ayfafal.
data.amh: ዋንግ ጁን በበኩላቸው ኢትዮጵያ ወደ ዲጂታል የታክስ አሰባሰብ እና የታክስ አስተዳደር አገልግሎት ለምታደርገው እንቅስቃሴ የቻይና መንግስት አስፈላጊውን ድጋፍ ያደርጋል ብለዋል።
data.orm: Waan Juun gama isaatiin mootummaan Chaayinaa Itoophiyaa gara gibira sassaabuu fi itti fayyadamaa gibiraa dijitaalaatti deemsisuuf deggarsa barbaachisa ta'e ni godha jedheera.
data.som: Wang Jun ayaa dhankiisa sheegay in dawladda Shiinuhu ay siin doonto taageerada muhiimka ah ee ku aaddan tallaabada Itoobiya ee ku wajahan adeegyada canshuur ururinta digitizedka iyo maamulka canshuuraha.
data.tir: ዋንግ ጁን ብወገኑ ኢትዮጵያ ናብ ዲጂታል ስርዓት ምእካብን ምምሕዳርን እቶት ንምእታው ኣብትገብሮ ፃዕሪ መንግስቲ ቻይና ኣድላዪ ደገፍ ከምዝገብር ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian delegation is on an official visit to China since December, 16.

data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ልዑካን ከታህሳስ 16 ጀምሮ በቻይና ይፋዊ የስራ ጉብኝት እያደረገ ነው።

data.som: Wafdiga Itoobiya ayaa booqasho rasmi ah ku jooga Shiinaha tan iyo bishii 16 kii December.
data.tir: እቲ ጉጅለ ልኡኽ ኢትዮጵያ ካብ 7 ታሕሳስ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ቻይና ወግዓዊ ዑደት እናገበረ እዩ።

data.eng: Shangtex Holding Co. Ltd has signed a lease agreement with the Ethiopian Industrial Parks Development Corporation to invest at Bole Lemmi II Industrial Park.
data.aaf: Shangtex tabixi Co. Ltd Sitingey Firmat Itiyyobiyak Sanaqata Barkih Daddosih Korboresionlih Bole Lemmih Sanaqatah Barkih investimenti takkuwaytamah.
data.amh: ሻንግቴክስ ሆልዲንግ ሊሚትድ በቦሌ ለሚ II ኢንዱስትሪያል ፓርክ ኢንቨስት ለማድረግ ከኢትዮጵያ የኢንዱስትሪ ፓርኮች ልማት ኮርፖሬሽን ጋር የሊዝ ስምምነት ተፈራርሟል።
data.orm: Dhaabbatni Shaangiteks Co. Ltd Korporeeshinii Ijaarsa Paarkiiwwan Industirii Itoophiyaa waliin Paarkii Industirii Boolee Lammii II tti dhangalaasuuf walii galtee liizii mallatteesse.
data.som: Shangtex Holding Co.Ltd ayaa la saxeexday heshiis kiro ah oo uu la saxeexday Koorboreeshinka Industriiga Itobiya si uu u maal galiyo xerada warshadaha bole lemmi II.
data.tir: ሻንግቴክስ ሆልዲንግ ኩባንያ ኣብ ቦሌ ለሚ 2 ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ኢንቨስት ንምግባር ምስ ኮርፖሬሽን ልምዓት ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ኢትዮጵያ ውዕል ክራይ ተፈራሪሙ።

data.eng: Shangtex is the second largest textile company in China.
data.aaf: Shangtex Kaxxam Nabbah Tan Sariteta Kambani kini Chaynah Addal.
data.amh: ሻንግቴክስ በቻይና ውስጥ ሁለተኛው ትልቁ የጨርቃ ጨርቅ ኩባንያ ነው።

data.eng: The agreement was signed here by Lelise Neme, CEO of the Corporation and representative of the Chinese company.
data.aaf: Ta sitingey Fermat Takkel Abtem Lelise Neme, CEO Korborrsion saqalay Chaynah Kambaniteh Awlaytuk sugte.
data.amh: ስምምነቱን የፈረሙት የኮርፖሬሽኑ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ እና የቻይና ኩባንያ ተወካይ ሌሊሴ ነሜ ናቸው።

data.som: Heshiiska waxaa halkan u saxiixay Lelise Neme, oo ah madaxa shirkadda iyo wakiilka shirkadda Shiinaha.
data.tir: ንቲ ውዕል ዝፈረሙ ዋና ፈፃሚ ስራሕ እቲ ኮርፖሬሽን ሌሊሴ ነሚን ወካሊ እቲ ኩባንያ ቻይናን እዮም።

data.eng: Ethiopian and Kuwait held discussion on the draft memorandum of understanding (MoU) on the employment of domestic workers.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiya kee Kuwet walal Abte Sitaluk Elle Tamitonuwanamal (MoU) Baaxoh Addah Taaama Abeenitil takuwaytamal.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድና ኩዌት በቤት ሰራተኞች ቅጥር ላይ የመግባቢያ ሰነድ ረቂቅ ላይ ተወያይተዋል።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa fi Kuweet gumee yaadachiistuu wal hubannaa (MoU) sirna qacarrii hojjeettoota biyya keessaa irratti marii taasisan.
data.som: Dowladaha Itoobiya iyo Kuwait ayaa yeeshay wada hadal ku saabsan qabyo qoraalka heshiiska (MoU) ee ku saabsan shaqaalaysiinta shaqaalaha guryaha.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ኩዌይትን ኣቆፃፅራ ከደምቲ ብዝምልከት ኣብዝተዳለወ መረዳድኢ ሰነድ ዘትየን።

data.eng: In the discussion held from 21-22 January 2020 at Sheraton Hotel in Kuwait city, the two sides concluded the negotiations with promising progress.
data.aaf: Ta Walal yekkem 21-22 caxah Alsak 2020 Shareton kalqat Kuwet Magaalak, Mamqal Daddalal Elle faxintanal Tamitelonum Namma katuk Xagana Culen.
data.amh: ከጥር 21 እስከ 22 ቀን 2020 በኩዌት ከተማ ሸራተን ሆቴል በተደረገው ውይይት ሁለቱ ወገኖች ተስፋ ሰጪ እንቅስቃሴ በማድረግ ድርድሩን አጠናቀዋል።
data.orm: Marii Ammajji 21-22 2021 magaalaa Kuweet Hoteela Sharaatanitti ta'etti, gam-lameenu wal galteecha haala abdachiisa ta'en xumuraniiru.
data.som: Wadahadalkii 21-22 Janaayo 2020 ka dhacay Hotel Sheraton ee magaalada Kuwait, labada dhinac waxay ku soo gabagabeeyeen wada xaajoodka horumar rajo leh.
data.tir: ኣብ ኩዌይት ሲቲ ኣብ ሆቴል ሸራተን ካብ 12-13 ጥሪ ኣብዝተኻየደ ዘተ ክልቲኦም ወገናት ሽምግልናኦም ተስፋ ብዝህብ ኣገባብ ዛዚሞም።

data.eng: They also agreed to finalise the remaining issues soon, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ethiopia (MFA).
data.aaf: Raqtah Tan Cagiidal Xayi Waktit gaba Kalelonum sitagen, Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaak (IICM/FAE/) Elle Yiysixegenal.
data.amh: ቀሪዎቹን ጉዳዮችም በቅርቡ ለማጠናቀቅ ተስማምተዋል ሲል የኢትዮጵያ ውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር (ኤምኤፍኤ) አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Akkasumas dhimmoota hafan dhiyootti akka xumuran walii galaniiru, akka Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Itoophiyaatti (MDA)
data.som: Sidoo kale waxaa la isku afgartay in dhawaan la dhameystiro arrimaha hadhsan sida ay sheegtay Wasaaradda Arrimaha Dibadda Itoobiya (MFA).
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝበሎ ንቶም ዝተረፉ ጉዳያት እውን ብቕልጡፍ ንምፍታሕ ተሰማሚዖም።

data.eng: “Ethiopian is responding to COVID-19 outbreak effectively with extra cargo flights and is shouldering its continental responsibility by shipping masks and testing kits where those supplies are being used in the fight against COVID-19 in Africa,” Tewolde noted.
data.aaf: " Itiyoppiya Osotina Kargo beyak KOVIX-19 Baxcimamak Nagayan Raddi Acayuk Geytimtam kee Sunku Gaysesa Dirki kini Maskite Qaranah Beytam kee Fokaqtah Tanimi Ta Xayoosanah yanin Uwatite Edde yintifiqenim kee Afrikal Bayisak Gexama KOVIX-19," Tewolde yiysixige.
data.amh: "የኢትዮጵያ አየር መንገድ ለኮቪድ-19 ወረርሽኝ ተጨማሪ የጭነት በረራዎች ውጤታማ በሆነ መንገድ ምላሽ እየሰጠ ሲሆን ጭንብል እና የፍተሻ መሳሪያዎች በአፍሪካ ኮቪድ-19ን ለመዋጋት ጥቅም ላይ የሚውሉበትን አህጉራዊ ኃላፊነቱን እየተወጣ ነው" ብለዋል አቶ ተወልደ።
data.orm: "Itoophiyaan balalii xiyyaara fee'umsaa dabaluu fi itti gaafatamummaa aardii fudhachuun haguugduu-fuulaa fi meeshaalee qorannoo bakkeen dhiyeessiin kunneen COVID-19'in Afiiriikaa keessatti ittisuuf fayyadamamaa jiranitti geessuun weerara COVID-19tiif haala gaariin deebii kennaa jira," Tawoldeen yaadachisaniiru.
data.som: "Ethiopian ayaa si wax ku ool ah uga jawaabeysaa faafitaanka COVID-19 duulimaadyo xamuul ah oo dheeri ah waxayna garab siisay mas'uuliyadeeda qaaradaha iyadoo soo rarysa maaskaro iyo xirmooyinka baaritaanka halkaasoo sahaydaas loogu isticmaalo dagaalka ka dhanka ah COVID-19 ee Afrika," Tewolde ayaa xusay.
data.tir: መገዲ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያ ተወሰኽቲ በረራታት ካርጎ ብምምዳብ ኣብ ምክልኻል ኮቪድ-19 ውፅኢታዊ ግብረ መልሲ ይህብ ኣሎ ዝበሉ ኣይተ ተወልደ መሸፈኒ ኣፍን ኣፍንጫን መመርመሪ ናውትን ናብ ዝተፈላለያ ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ብምጉዕዓዝ ክፍለ ዓለማዊ ሓላፍነቱ ተዋፂኡ እዩ ኢሎም።

data.eng: In March alone, the carrier transported donations made to Africa by the Chinese business mogul Jack Ma in six days for all 54 African countries, the CEO stated, adding that “many African countries were surprised how the airlines distributed the medical equipment in a very short period of time.”
data.aaf: Qado dirrih Dibuk, Merayti Cato Illa Afrika fanah Chaynak Tellemoh Mogul Jack Ma Lica Ayrot inkih tan 54 Baxooxah yece, CEOh saqal yesceseh, tahat osotinah " Mango Afrika Duwalite Kaxxam rufate Qaran merayti Xayi wakti Addat Diwata Uwaytiteh Kurabiyal."
data.amh: በመጋቢት ወር ብቻ በ6 ቀናት ውስጥ በቻይናው የቢዝነስ ባለቤት ጃክ ማ ለ54 የአፍሪካ ሀገራት ወደ አፍሪካ ያቀረበውን ልገሳ ሲያሳልጡ የነበሩት ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚው አክለውም “አየር መንገዱ በአጭር ጊዜ የህክምና መሳሪያዎቹን እንዴት እንዳከፋፈሉ ለብዙ የአፍሪካ ሀገራት አስገራሚ ነው ።
data.orm: Bitootessa qofaatti, baataan kun kennaa daldalaa gameessa Chaayinaa Jach Ma'dhaan Afirikaaf guyyaa jaha keessatti biyyoota Afiriikaa 54'n hundaaf godhame geejjibeera, hoji-geggeessaan kun tuquun, "biyyoonni Afiriikaa hedduun akka itti daandiin xiyyaaraa kun yeroo baayye gabaabadu kana gidduutti meeshaalaa fayyaa rabseen dinqamaniiru" jechuun dabalaniiru.
data.som: Bishii Maarso oo keliya, shirkadda xamuulka qaada ayaa ku daabushay deeqo uu Afrika ugu deeqay maalqabeenka ganacsiga Shiinaha ee Jack Ma lix maalmood gudahooda dhammaan 54 ta waddan ee Afrika, maamulaha ayaa yiri, isagoo raaciyay "wadamo badan oo Afrikaan ah ayaa la yaabay sida shirkaduhu u qaybisay qalabka caafimaadka muddo gaaban.”
data.tir: ኣብ መጋቢት ጥራሕ እቲ መገዲ ኣየር ቻይናዊ ብዓል ሃፍቲ ጃክ ማ ንኣፍሪካ ዝሃብዎ ሓገዝ ኣብ ሽድሽተ መዓልታት ናብ ኩለን 54 ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ከምዘጎዓዓዘ ዝገለፁ እቶም ዋና ፈፃሚ ስራሕ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ እቲ መገዲ ኣየር ንቶም ናውቲ ሕክምና ኣብ ሓፂር ግዜ ምብፅሑ ከምዝተደነቓ ሓቢሮም።

data.eng: US Acting Assistant Secretary for African Affairs Donald Yamamoto said US needs to have a significant contribution for the industrial park development of Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Amerikah taama koobahise Afrikah Caagida Sekretari Xonald Yamamoto Iyeh Amerik itiyyobiya Sanaqata Barkih Daddositel Nagay yan Doori Digirele.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የአፍሪካ ጉዳዮች ተጠባባቂ ረዳት ሚኒስትር ዶናልድ ያማሞቶ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ለኢትዮጵያ የኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ልማት ከፍተኛ አስተዋፅኦ ማበርከት አለባት ብለዋል።
data.orm: Gargaara barreessaan raawwii dhimmoota Afirikaa Amerikaa Donaald Yamamootoon Ameerikaan gumaachaa guddaa babal'ina paarkii industirii Itoophiyaatiif gochuu qabdi jedhaniiru.
data.som: Ku simaha Xoghayaha Arrimaha Dibedda ee Maraykanka u qaabilsan Arrimaha Afrika, Donald Yamamoto, ayaa sheegay in Maraykanka looga baahan yahay inuu gacan weyn ka geysto horumarinta goobaha warshadaha ee Ethiopia.
data.tir: ተጠባባቒ ምኽትል ሚኒስትር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ጉዳያት ኣፍሪካ ዶናልድ ያማሞቶ ሃገሮም ኣብ ልምዓት ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ኢትዮጵያ ርኡይ ኣስተዋፅኦ ክህልዋ ይግባእ ኢሎም።

data.eng: Secretary Yamamoto made the remark following the discussion with Ethiopia’s Foreign Minister Workneh Gebeyehu in Addis Ababa on Friday.
data.aaf: Kutbe abeyni Yamamoto Abeh yan Mablal Kataytah tan walalilte Itiyyobiyak Iroh Caagidah Malaak Workineh Gebeyuh Jumqatah Addiss Ababah Addal.
data.amh: ፀሃፊ ያማማቶ ይህን ያሉት ከኢትዮጵያ ውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስትር ወርቅነህ ገበየሁ ጋር በአዲስ አበባ ያደረጉትን ውይይት ተከትሎ ነው።
data.orm: Barreessaa Yamamootoon dubbii kana maree Ministeera Dhimma Alaa Itoophiyaa Warqina Gabayyoo waliin Jimaata godhan booda taasisan.
data.som: Xoghaye Yamamoto ayaa hadalkan jeediyay ka dib wadahadal uu Jimcihii kula yeeshay Addis Ababa Wasiirka Arrimaha Dibadda Itoobiya Workneh Gebeyehu.
data.tir: ያማሞቶ ንዚ ዝገለፁ ምስ ሚኒስትር ዝምድናታት ወፃኢ ኢትዮጵያ ወርቅነህ ገበየሁ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓርቢ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ድሕሪ ምዝርራቦም እዩ።

data.eng: She mentioned the increasing Moroccan investment in Ethiopia since the past two years including investments by Anwar Invest Group and Holmarcom Group, the country’s top investors.
data.aaf: Is Qadoseh Namma Ligidih Addat Morokoh Xayloh Investmenti itiyyobiyal Osimak Geytimata Anwar Investih Butta Edde Tanim kee Holmarcom Butta, ta Baaxol Dagga Raqta Invsterwa kinon.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ካለፉት ሁለት ዓመታት ወዲህ እየጨመረ የመጣውን የሞሮኮ ኢንቨስትመንት አንዋር ኢንቨስት ግሩፕ እና የሀገሪቱ ከፍተኛ ባለሀብቶች የሆኑት ሆማርኮም ግሩፕ ኢንቨስትመንቶችን ጠቅሳለች።
data.orm: Dabaliinsa investimentii Itoophiyaa keessatti lammiilee Morookootiin waggaa lamaan darbanii as investimentoota investaroota dursoo biyyatti Garee Investiimentii Anuwaar fi Garee Holmaarkoomii dabalatee jiru kaasteetti.
data.som: Waxa ay xustay maalgashiga sii kordhaya ee Morokko ee Itoobiya ilaa labadii sano ee la soo dhaafay oo ay ku jiraan maalgashiga Anwar Invest Group iyo Holmarcom Group, maalgashadayaasha ugu sarreeya dalka.
data.tir: ንኣንዋር ኢንቨስት ግሩፕን ሃልማርኮም ግሩፕን ሓዊሱ ኣብ ዝሓለፋ ክልተ ዓመታት ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ እናወሰኸ ዝመፅእ ዘሎ በዝሒ ኢንቨስተራት ሞሮኮ ጠቒሰን።

data.eng: According to her, the agreement signed between the two countries has helped to improve the tie in the economic sector.
data.aaf: Iss Elle Baxaqisenal, Sitigeyfermat Fanal kak Yekkem Namma Baaxoxa Maduur Sekter Barimuh Cato takkem kini.
data.amh: በሁለቱ ሀገራት መካከል የተፈረመው ስምምነት በኢኮኖሚው ዘርፍ ያለውን ግንኙነት ለማሻሻል አስችሏል ነው ያሉት ወይዘሮዋ።
data.orm: Akka isheetti, waliigalteen biyyoota lamaan gidduutti mallattaa'e hidhaa sektara diinagdeetin jiru fooyyessuuf gargaareera.
data.som: Sida ay sheegtay, heshiiska ay kala saxiixdeen labada wadan ayaa gacan ka qaatay wanaajinta xidhiidhka dhanka dhaqaalaha.
data.tir: ንሰን ከምዝበለኦ ኣብ ሞንጎ ክልቲአን ሃገራት ዝተፈረመ ስምምዕ ቁጠባዊ ምትእስሳር ንምምሕያሽ ሓጊዙ እዩ።

data.eng: According to the Hub, apparel continues to dominate East African exports across countries, accounting for 84.4 percent of all AGOA exports during the reported period.
data.aaf: Ta Hub Elle Baxaqisenal, Sartan bison inte Mangom Ayromawqah Afrikak Iro Gexa Murtite Baaxoh Addal, Loowok 84.4 Gabba Ikih tan AGOAk Iro Gexa Murtite Gabbaqu Xayose wakti.
data.amh: እንደ ሀብ ዘገባ ከሆነ አልባሳት በምስራቅ አፍሪካ ወደ ውጭ የሚላኩ ምርቶች በሪፖርቱ ወቅት 84.4 በመቶውን ይሸፍናሉ ።
data.orm: Akka giddugalichaatti, waqtii gabaafameetti ekispoortii AGOA hundaa keessaa dhibbbentaa 84.4 qabaachuun huccuun ekispoortii biyyoota Baha Afiriikaa to'achuu itti fufa.
data.som: Sida uu dhigay the Hub, dharka ayaa sii qabsanaya dhoofinta Bariga Afrika ee guud ahaan dalalka, taasoo ka dhigan 84.4 boqolkiiba dhammaan dhoofinta AGOA muddada warbixinta ah.
data.tir: እቲ ማእኸል ከምዝገለፆ ኣብቲ ዝተጠቐሰ ግዜ ኣልባሳት ካብ ጠቕላላ ሰደድ ኣጎዋ 84.4 ሚኢታዊ ብምሓዝ ኣብ ቀዳማይ ደረጃ ዝተሰርዐ ሰደድ ምፍራቕ ኣፍሪካ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: East African countries have made sustained efforts to take advantage of their AGOA eligibility in recent years.
data.aaf: Ayro mawaqah Afrika Baxooxa Sarimanele Giclo abte AGOA fanah Cultuh Xayi Ligida Tayse gaba geytuh.
data.amh: የምስራቅ አፍሪካ ሀገራት ባለፉት አመታት የአጎዋ ብቁነታቸውን ለመጠቀም ያልተቋረጠ ጥረት አድርገዋል።
data.orm: Biyyoonni baha Afiriikaa waggoota dhiyoo keessatti itti fayadamummaa AGOA fayyadamuuf carraaqaniiru.
data.som: Waddamada Bariga Afrika ayaa sameeyey dadaallo joogto ah si ay uga faa'iideystaan u qalmitaanka AGOA sannadihii u dambeeyay.
data.tir: ሃገራት ምፍራቕ ኣፍሪካ ብኣጎዋ ንዘለወን ተቐባልነት ብዝያዳ ንምምዝማዝ ኣብዚ ቐረባ እዋን ዘይተሓለለ ፃዕሪ ኣካይደን እየን።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Petroleum Supply Enterprise (EPSE) is the sole government body for the importation of petroleum products while the Ministry of Trade sets retail petroleum prices upon the recommendations of the enterprise.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak siragle lee Sukatih Xayoosih Interbirayiz (INSXI/EPSE/) Doolat Dagar Xaamel/Liomoseh/ Naxaj Sukati Murtiteta Culanamih kalah Kabxxah Malaak Dafeeseh Tiya tiya Naxaj Sukatih limo ta Interbirayiz Aydukumusam Abem Kini.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ነዳጅ አቅርቦት ኢንተርፕራይዝ (ኢ ፒ ኤስ ኢ) የፔትሮሊየም ምርቶችን ወደ አገር ውስጥ ለማስገባት ብቸኛ የመንግስት አካል ሲሆን የንግድ ሚኒስቴር ደግሞ በኢንተርፕራይዙ ምክር መሰረት የችርቻሮ ፔትሮሊየም ዋጋ ያወጣል።

data.amh: ባልተጠበቀ ሁኔታ የፓርላማ አባላት (ኤም ፒስ)፣ 100 በመቶ የኢትዮጵያ ሕዝቦች አብዮታዊ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ግንባር (ኢህአዴግ) እና በኢትዮጵያ ፓርላማ ቁጥጥር ሥር ያሉ ድርጅቶች በቅርቡ ከቻይና መንግሥት ጋር የገቡትን አዲስ የውል ብድር ስምምነቶች ከመፅደቁ በፊት የአገሪቱን የውጭ ዕዳ የመክፈል አቅም እንዲረጋገጥ ጠይቀዋል።
data.orm: Deemsa hin talmaamneen, Miseensonni Paarlaamaa (MP), Addi Diimokiraatawaa Warraaqsa Ummata Itoopiyaa (EPRDF) dhibbantaa 100 fi kan isatti hidhata qabu Paarlaamaa Itoopiyaa qabatanii jiran, waliigaltee liqa haaraa dhiyeenya Mootummaa Chaayinaa wajjin seename mirkaneessuun dura mirkan dandeettii liqa alaa deebisanii kanfaluu biyyattii mirkaneessuu gaafatan,
data.som: “Tallaabadan aan lafilaynun, Xubnaha Baarlamaanka (MPs), 100% Jabhadda Dimuqraadiga Dimuqraadiga Shacabka Itoobiya (EPRDF) iyo xulafadooda gacanta ku haysa Baarlamaanka Itoobiya, ayaa dalbaday in la hubiyo awoodda dib u bixinta deynta dibadda ee dalka, ka hor intaanay ansixin heshiisyo deyn cusub oo dhawaan la galay. iyo dowladda Shiinaha."

data.eng: The loan agreements in question are signed recently with the Chinese Export-Import (EXIM) Bank, which agreed to avail an aggregate outlay of USD 332.7 million for a highway road construction and power transmission projects envisaged to relieve the traffic congestions as well the fluctuating electric power supply in parts of Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: tasitigeyih esseroh addat firawaga xayiwak chaynak iro kee Addah Uwaytiteh xayosah (EXIM) banki, sitageenih sitat 332.7 milyoonih dolaar qiytababur gitih xisne kee cayli tabatabsih cugayso, Manosanama tarafik kaddu kee tahalih Addiss Ababak koran caylih xayoosih gadisiya.
data.amh: ጥያቄ ውስጥ ያሉት የብድር ስምምነቶች የአዲስ አበባን የትራፊክ መጨናነቅ እንዲሁም በአዲስ አበባ አንዳንድ አካባቢዎች የሚቆራረጠውን የኤሌክትሪክ ሃይል አቅርቦት ለመቅረፍ ለታሰበው የአውራ ጎዳና መንገድ ግንባታና የኃይል ማስተላለፊያ ፕሮጀክቶች 332.7 ሚልዮን ዶላር ለመስጠት ከተስማማው የቻይና ኤክስፖርት-ኢምፖርት (ኤክስ አይ ኤም) ባንክ ጋር በቅርቡ ተፈርሟል።
data.orm: Waliigalteen liqaa gaaffii keessa jiru dhiyeenya Baankii Eksipoort- Impoort (EXIM) Chaayinaa wajjin kan mallatteeffame, kan hamma maallaqaa waliigalaa miliyoona USD 332.7 ijaarsa daansii saffisaa fi pirojektoota daddabarsa humna ibsaa kan walitti heddumachuu tiraafikaa akkasumas ciccituu dhiyeessii humna ibsaa kutaalee Addis Ababaa keessaa furuuf yaadame dhiyeessuuf.
data.som: Heshiisyada daymaha ah ee su'aasha keenay ayaa dhowaan la saxeexay Bangiga Dhoofinta iyo soo dajinta Shiinaha (EXIM), kaas oo ku heshiiyey inuu ka faa'iidaysto wadar ahaan 332.7 milyan doolarka maraykanka oo loogu talagalay dhismaha waddooyinka iyo mashaariicda gudbinta korontada Korontada qaybo ka mid ah Addis Ababa.
data.tir: እቲ ውዕል ልቓሕ ኣብዚ ቀረባ እዋን ምስ ባንኪ ሰደድን ኣታውን ቻይና ዝተገበረን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ንዝረአይ ምጭንናቕ ትራፊክን ምቁርራፅ ቀረብ ሓይሊ ኤሌትሪክን ንምቅላል ንዝስራሕ ጎደናን ፕሮጀክታት ዝርገሐ ሓይሊ ኤሌትሪክን ዝውዕል 332.7 ሚልዮን ዶላር እቲ ባንኪ ከለቅሕ ዝተሰማመዐሉን እዩ።

data.amh: ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር አብይ አህመድ (ፒ ኤች ዲ) ወደ አገራቸው ከተመለሱ የተቃዋሚ ፖለቲካ ፓርቲ አባላትና አመራሮች እና ጠ/ሚ ባለፈው ሚያዝያ በምርቃት ንግግሩ ያደረጉትን ጥሪ ተከትሎ በሀገሪቱ የፖለቲካ እንቅስቃሴያቸውን እያካሄዱ ካሉ ጋር ተገናኝተው ተወያይተዋል።

data.eng: The main materials being procured internationally, according to Soleyana, are voter registration book (voter list books), voter cards book, and plastic boxes with seals, to be used in the transport of materials to a secured storage facility at polling stations for overnight stays, voter registration forms, and voter registration stationary kits.

data.som: Agaabka ugu muhiimsan ee si caalami ah loo soo iibinayo, sida ay sheegtay Soleyana, waa buugta diiwaan gelinta codbixiyayaasha (buuga liiska codbixiyayaasha), buugta kaadhadhka codbixiyayaasha, iyo sanaadiiqda caaga ah ee shaabadu ku xidhan tahay, si loogu qaado agabka kaydka sugan ee goobaha codbixinta si ay habeen u hoydaan , foomamka diwaan galinta codbixiyayaasha, iyo xidhmooyinka joogtada ah ee diiwaangelinta codbixiyayaasha.

data.eng: Ethiopia has done much in protecting biodiversity after the signing of the Rio Agreement in 1992, according to Ethiopian Biodiversity Institute.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya Mango monotota dacrisanamal Taysem Abte Sitingey Abtek Lakal Rio Sitigey 1992 Addal, Itiyyobiyak Mango Monotiyih Institut Elle Qadosenal.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ በ1992 የሪዮ ስምምነት ከተፈራረመች በኋላ በብዝሀ ህይወት ጥበቃ ላይ ብዙ ሰርታለች ሲል የኢትዮጵያ ብዝሃ ህይወት ኢንስቲትዩት አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan baayoodaayiversitii kunuunsuuf erga walii galtee Riyoo 1992tti mallatteesiteen booda hojiilee hedduu hojjetteetti, akka Giddugala Baayoodaayiversitii Itoophiyaatti.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa wax badan ka qabatay dhawrida kala duwanaanshaha noolaha ka dib markii la saxeexay heshiiskii Rio 1992, sida uu sheegay macadka noolaha kala gadisan ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ትካል ብዝሃ ህይወት ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፆ፤ ድሕሪ ምፍራም ስምምዕ ርዮ 1992፤ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ምዕቃብ ብዝሃ ህይወት ብዙሕ ሰሪሓ እያ።

data.eng: The NFSDP will ensure an increase in Ethiopia`s forest coverage to 20 percent in 2020 and 30 percent in 2025 and make forest a core sector in economic structural reforms.
data.aaf: NFSDP itiyoppiya leh tan garboh guddus 20% gaba 2020 kee 30% 2025 kee garbok naharsi maddurtiinoh riiformih abaanama
data.amh: ነፈሰደፒ የኢትዮጵያን የደን ሽፋን በ2020 ወደ 20 በመቶ እና በ2025 ወደ 30 በመቶ ለማሳደግ እና ደን በኢኮኖሚ መዋቅራዊ ማሻሻያ ዋና ዘርፍ ያደርገዋል።
data.orm: NFSDP'n Itoophiyaa keessatti uwwisa bosonaa 2020tti dhibbentaa 20tti fi 2025tti dhibbentaa 30tti akka guddatuu fi rifoormii caasaa diinagdee keessatti seektara bosonaa giddugaleessa akka ta'u ni mirkaneessa.
data.som: NFSDP ayaa xaqiijin doonta korodhka daboolka kaymaha Itoobiya oo la gaarsiin doono 20 boqolkiiba 2020 iyo 30 boqolkiiba 2025 waxayna kaynta ka dhigi doontaa qayb udub dhexaad u ah dib u habaynta qaabdhismeedka dhaqaalaha.
data.tir: ሃገራዊ ፕሮግራም ልምዓት ሃፍቲ ዱር ኣብ 2020 ሽፋን ዱር ኢትዮጵያ 20 ሚኢታዊ፣ ኣብ 2025 ድማ 30 ሚኢታዊ ዕብየት ብምርግጋፅ ዱር ቁልፊ መዳይ ናይቲ ኢኮኖሚን መሓውራዊ ለውጥን ንክኸውን ክሰርሕ እዩ።

data.eng: Bureau Natural Resources Development and Safety Net Sector Coordinator Desta Gebreselassie told ENA that tree planting holes are being prepared at various nurseries.
data.aaf: Gino Gaddih Daddos kee Seftinet Sekerwah Biiro Koobahise Xesta Gebresilase Iyeh NEAik too Coox Dabisoh Buxddadi Bicteh tan Mango Coox bicisiyi Aroocal.
data.amh: የቢሮው የተፈጥሮ ሃብት ልማትና ሴፍቲኔት ዘርፍ አስተባባሪ አቶ ደስታ ገብረስላሴ ለኢዜአ እንደገለጹት በተለያዩ ችግኝ ጣቢያዎች የችግኝ ተከላ ጉድጓዶች እየተዘጋጁ ነው።
data.orm: Qindeessaan Biiroo Kunuunsa Qabeenya Uumamaa fi Sektara Sefti neetii Dastaa Gabrasillaaseen akka bolli biqilaa dhaabuu iddoowwan biqilaa hedduutti akka qophaa'a jiran ENA'tti himaniiru.
data.som: kormeeraha Waaxda Horumarinta Khayraadka Dabiiciga ah iyo Badbaadada ee Xafiiska Desta Gebreselassie ayaa u sheegay ENA in hogaga dhir beerista laga diyaarinayo xarumaha kala duwan ee xanaanada.
data.tir: ኣተሓባባሪ ቢሮ ልምዓት ሃፍቲ ተፈጥሮን ሴክተር ሴፍቲ ኔትን ደስታ ገብረስላሴ ንኣገልግሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝገለፅዎ መትከሊ ፈልሲ ዝዀኑ ጎዳጉዲ ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ጣብያታት መራብሒ ፈልሲ ይዳለው ኣለው።

data.eng: Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed called on the people of Ethiopia to duplicate the milestones achieved in the planning and implementation of the annual green legacy initiative in various sectors, facilitating Ethiopia’s inevitable prosperity.
data.aaf: Naharsi Malaak Abiyi Acmah Seeceh itiyyobiyah Ayyunta Qagita Dariifa Ikraaro kee Abinoso Arac Kah Xagtanah Ligidak Axaxin Raatit Uguugus Mango Sekteritel, Koobahisanam Itiyyobiyah Lediso Raqlemhina.
data.amh: ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር አብይ አህመድ የኢትዮጵያን ብልፅግና በመምራት ዓመታዊ አረንጓዴ ሌጋሲ በተለያዩ ዘርፎች በማቀድና በመተግበር የተመዘገቡትን ድሎች እንዲደግሙ ጠይቀዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Muummee Abiy Ahimad milkoomina karoora fi hojiirra oolmaa ashaaraa magaariisaa waggaa sektara hedduu keessatti bira ga'ame dachaan dabaluu fi badhaadhina carraa egeree Itoophiyaa ta'e mijeessuuf waamicha uummata Itoophiyaaf dabarsan.
data.som: Ra’iisul Wasaare Abiy Axmed ayaa ugu baaqay shacabka Itoobiya inay soo nuqulaan guulihii laga gaaray qorsheynta iyo hirgelinta hindisaha dhaxalka cagaaran ee sannadlaha ah ee qaybo kala duwan, taasoo fududeynaysa barwaaqada lama huraanka ah ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣቢይ ኣሕመድ ኣብ ምትላምን ምትግባርን ተበግሶ ዓመታዊ ሓምለዋይ ልምዓት ዝተመዝገቡ ዓወታት ብምድንፋዕ ንቲ ዘይተርፍ ምዕባለ ኢትዮጵያ ከረጋግፁ ንህዝቢ እታ ሃገር ፀዊዖም።

data.eng: The 2021 Green Legacy edition was officially closed in Adama today in the presence the Prime Minister and other senior government officials.
data.aaf: 2021 Axxin Raati Caddo Baxaqaluk Alifen Axamal Naharsi Malaak edde anuk Kalah tan Doolatak Fayale Miraacini Dagorti.
data.amh: የ2021 አረንጓዴ ሌጋሲ እትም ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትሩ እና ሌሎች ከፍተኛ የመንግስት ባለስልጣናት በተገኙበት በአዳማ በይፋ ተዘግቷል።
data.orm: Ashaaraa Magaariisni marsaa kanaa kan 2021 har'a Adaamaatti bakka Ministeerri Muummee fi aanga'onni gameeyyii mootummaa biroon argamanitti cufame.
data.som: Waxaa maanta si rasmi ah magaalada Adama loogu soo xidhay madbaca Green Legacy 2021, iyadoo ay goobjoog ka ahaayeen Ra’iisul Wasaaraha iyo mas’uuliyiin kale oo ka tirsan dowladda.
data.tir: ናይ 2013 ተበግሶ ዓመታዊ ሓምለዋይ ልምዓት ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣቢይ ኣሕመድን ካልኦት ላዕለዎተት ሰበ ስልጣን መንግስትን ኣብ ዝተረኸቡሉ ሎሚ ኣበ ኣዳማ ብዕሊ ተዛዚሙ።

data.eng: Heavy to very heavy rainfall (top 10-5% on record) is expected in western Oromia (Western and Eastern Welega and Illubabor) and southern Benishangul Gumu in Ethiopia, and localized areas of central and south-western Sudan.
data.aaf: Ayriculmah Oromiyay (Ayroculma kee Ayromawqah Welegay illibabu) kee Kabaqaxih Benishagul Gumuz Itiyyobiyah Addak, Kee Addah Aroocik Fanti Qaxa kee Gabik Ayrohulmah Sudanl Gibdiih Kaxxam Gibdi Robite ( ill 10-5 gaba Quliyal) Radele Axcuk Qambaalan.
data.amh: በምዕራብ ኦሮሚያ (በምእራብ እና ምስራቅ ወለጋ እና ኢሉባቦር) እና በደቡብ ቤንሻንጉል ጉሙዝ በኢትዮጵያ እና በመካከለኛው እና በደቡብ ምዕራብ ሱዳን በሚገኙ አከባቢዎች ከከባድ እስከ በጣም ከባድ ዝናብ (ከ10-5 በመቶ ከፍተኛ መጠን ያለው) ዝናብ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Roobni cimaa gara baayyee cimaa ta'e (olaanaa 10-5% galmaa'e) Itoophiyaa keessatti dhiha Oromiyaa(Dhihaa fi Baha Wallaggaa fi Illuubbabor) fi kibbaa Benishaangul Gumuz, fi naannoowwan giddugaleessaa fi kibba dhiha Sudaanitti ni eegama.
data.som: Roobab culus ama aad u culus (ugu sarreeya 10-5% ee diwaanka ah) ayaa la filayaa deegaanka Oromada (Galbeed iyo Bariga Welega iyo Illubabor) iyo koonfurta Benishangul Gumuz ee Itoobiya, iyo meelo ku yaala bartamaha iyo koonfurta galbeed ee Suudaan.
data.tir: ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ምዕራብ ኦሮሚያ ማለት’ውን ኣብ ምዕራብን ምብራቕን ወለጋን ኢሉባቡርን፣ ኣብ ደቡባዊ ቤንሻንጉል ጉሙዝ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ ዉሱናት ከባብታት ማእኸላይን ደቡባዊ ምዕራብን ሱዳን ካብ ብርቱዕ ክሳብ የመና ብርቱዕ ወይ ድማ ካብ 10-5 ሚኢታዊ ዝመጠኑ ዝናብ ክወቅዕ ትፅቢት ተገይሩ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Moderate rainfall between 50 – 100 mm is expected in the Darfur region in Sudan; western and northern regions of South Sudan, central and western Ethiopia, and a few areas in central Uganda and western Kenya.
data.aaf: Sudanak Darfur Rakaakayay, Gabi Sudanak Ayroculma kee Kiblati qaxih Rakaakayay, Itiyyobiyak Fanti Qaxa kee Ayrocumah Rakaakay, kee Dagoo Arooca Uganxa kee Ayrocuma Keniyal Fanti Robite fanal 50-100 mm Yakkeh iya Qambalima
data.amh: በሱዳን፣ በደቡብ ሱዳን ምዕራባዊ እና ሰሜናዊ ክልሎች፣ መካከለኛው እና ምዕራብ ኢትዮጵያ፣ እና በማዕከላዊ ኡጋንዳ እና በምዕራብ ኬንያ ጥቂት አካባቢዎች ላይ ከ50 - 100 ሚሜ መካከል መካከለኛ ዝናብ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Roobni giddugaleessaa 50 - 100mm Sudaan keessatti naannoo Daarfuritti; naannoo dhiha fi kaabaa Kibba Sudaan, giddugaleessaa di dhiha Itoophiyaa, fi giddugaleessa Yugaandaa fi dhihaa Keeniyaatti naannoo muraasatti ni eegama.
data.som: Roobab dhexdhexaad ah oo u dhexeeya 50 - 100 mm ayaa laga filayaa gobolka Darfur ee Suudaan; gobollada galbeedka iyo waqooyiga ee Koonfurta Suudaan, bartamaha iyo galbeedka Itoobiya, iyo meelo kooban oo ku yaala bartamaha Uganda iyo galbeedka Kenya.
data.tir: ኣብ ሱዳን ክልል ዳርፉ፣ ኣብ ምዕራባውን ሰሜናውን ደቡብ ሱዳን፣ ኣብ ማእኸላውን ምዕራባውን ኢትዮጵያ፣ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብ ውሑዳት ከባብታት ማእኸላይ ዩጋንዳን ምዕራብ ኬንያን ካብ 50 ክሳብ 100 ሚሜ ዝመጠኑ ማእኸላይ ዝናብ ክወቅዕ ትፅቢት ይግበር።

data.eng: Federal Government Procurement and Property Administration Agency announced that it has finalized preparations to start electronics procurement system technology (e-GP).
data.aaf: Federal Doolatak Limoy, Ikko kee Asfara Xinnisoh Ejensi elektironik Teknolojih Sistemit Limo Bicak Kaba Kalteh tanim Qadose (eGP)
data.amh: የፌዴራል መንግሥት ግዥና ንብረት አስተዳደር ኤጀንሲ የኤሌክትሮኒክስ ግዥ ሥርዓት ቴክኖሎጂ (ኢ-ጂፒ) ለመጀመር ዝግጅቱን ማጠናቀቁን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Ejensiin Bulchiinsa Bittaa fi Qabeenyaa Mootummaa Federaalaa teekinooloojii sirna abbaa qabeenyummaa elektirooniksii (e-GP) jalqabuuf qophii akka xumure beeksise.
data.som: "Hay'adda maamulka iibka iyo hantida dowladda federaalka ayaa ku dhawaaqday in ay soo gabagabeysay diyaar garowgii ugu dambeeyay ee lagu bilaabi doono tignoolajiyada nidaamka wax iibsiga ee elektaroonigga ah (e-GP)."
data.tir: ኤጄንሲ ዕደ ጋን ምምሕዳር ንብረትን መንግስቲ ፌደራል፣ ስርዓት ቴክኖሎጂ ኤሌክትሮናዊ ዕደ ጋ (ኢ-ጂፒ) ንምጅማር ዘኽእሎ ምድላው ዛዚሙ።

data.eng: In an Exclusive interview with ENA Acting General- Director of the Agency, Jonse Gedefa said that the agency has been running the e-GP technology system project that would help to clear the government procurement activities from human error and misappropriation.
data.aaf: Baxsale Maxcoh Essero ENAlih Taama Jeneralah Ta Ejensik Saqal, Jose Gedefa Iyeh Ta Ejensi e-GP teknolojih sistemih Cugayso Asgayuk geytimtam kee Ta kadduk Saytun Doolat Limoh Abtooti Sahdati Baxih Hoxa kee Uwaytu Yaysisenil Cato Takke,
data.amh: ከኢዜአ ጋር ባደረጉት ልዩ ቃለ ምልልስ የኤጀንሲው ተጠባባቂ ዋና ዳይሬክተር አቶ ጆንሴ ገደፋ ኤጀንሲው የመንግስትን የግዥ ተግባራት ከሰዎች ስህተትና ምዝበራ ለማፅዳት የሚረዳውን የኢ-ጂፒ ቴክኖሎጂ ስርዓት ፕሮጀክት ሲሰራ ቆይቷል።
data.orm: Afgaaffii addaa ENA fi Daayirekteera-Olaanaaa Ejensichaaa irratti, Joonsee Geddefaa ejensichi hojiiwwan bittaa meeshaa mootummaa dogongora namaa fi mulqa seeraan alaa irra bilisa akka ta'uuf gargaaruuf pirojektii sirna teekinooloojii e-GP adeemsisaa jira jedhaniiru.
data.som: Wareysi gaar ah oo uu la yeeshay ku simaha agaasimaha guud ee ENA Jonse Gedefa ayaa sheegay in wakaaladdu ay wadeen mashruuca nidaamka tignoolajiyada e-GP ga kaas oo gacan ka geysan doona in dowladda laga sifeeyo khaladaadka bini’aadamka iyo lunsashada howlaha wax soo iibsiga ee dowladda.
data.tir: ግዚያዊ ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ እቲ ኤጀንሲ ጆንሴ ገደፋ ምስ ግልጋሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ብፍሉይ ኣብ ዝገበሮ ቃለ መሕተት ከምዝገለፆ፣ እቲ ኤጀንሲ መንግስቲ ኣብ ዘካየዶ ዕደጋ ንዘጋጥሙ ሰብኣዊ ጌጋታትን ዘይግቡእ ኣጠቓቕማን ንምዕራይ ፕሮጀክት ስርዓት ኢ-ጂፒ እናሳለጠ እዩ።

data.eng: This robot is currently available in Ethiopia for ICT Week sponsored by Ethio-Telecom.
data.aaf: Ta Robot Tawaqdi Ityyobiyah Addal getima ICTih Ayaamah Itiyyo-Telokom Isbomseril.
data.amh: ይህ ሮቦት በአሁኑ ጊዜ በኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ድጋፍ ለሚደረግ የአይሲቲ ሳምንት በኢትዮጵያ ይገኛል።
data.orm: Roobootin kun yeroo ammaatti Itoophiyaa keessatti torbee ICT Etiyoo-telekoomin deeggarame irratti ni argama.
data.som: Robot kan ayaa hadda laga heli karaa Itoobiya toddobaadka ICT ga oo ay maal gelisay Ethio-Telecom.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ብሓልዮት ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዝተዳለወ ሰሙነ ኢንፎርሜሽን ኮሙኒኬሽን ቴክኖሎጂ (ኣይ.ሲ.ቲ) እቲ ሮቦት ክቐርብ እዩ።

data.eng: Designed by Hong Kong firm Hanson Robotics, Sophia has been programmed to speak Amharic, Ethiopia’s official language.
data.aaf: Hongi Kongih Fimiy Hanson Robotic Bicise, Sofiya Amcari afkee Itiyyibiyak Taamah Afat kah Yabtanah Tadeera kah Tantiribixe.
data.amh: በሆንግ ኮንግ ኩባንያ ሃንሰን ሮቦቲክስ የተነደፈችው ሶፊያ፣ የኢትዮጵያ ይፋዊ ቋንቋ የሆነውን አማርኛ እንድትናገር ፕሮግራም ተደርጋለች።
data.orm: Dhaabbata Roobootiksii Hong Koongin kan wixineeffame, Sofiyaan afaan hojii Itoophiyaa Afaan Amaaraa akka dubbattuuf saganteeffamtee jirti.
data.som: Waxaa naqshadaysay shirkadda Hong Kong ee Hanson Robotics, Sophia ayaa loo qorsheeyay inay ku hadasho Amxaariga, luqadda rasmiga ah ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ናይ ሆንግ ኮንግ ትካል ብዝኾነ ሃንሰን ሮቦቲክስ ዝተሓንፀፀ ሶፊያ ሮቦት ነቲ ወግዓዊ ቋንቋ ኢትዮጵያ ዝኾነ ኣምሓርኛ ክዛረብ ተገይሩ ዝተቓነየ እዩ።

data.eng: India is committed to further deepen its partnership with Ethiopia to support its development with innovation and technology.
data.aaf: Hindiya Sitaluk Aliyal Itiyyobiya Dadddos Qusba gino kee Teknolojil Catelemih Fayxile.
data.amh: ህንድ ያላትን አጋርነት ይበልጥ በማጠናከር የኢትዮጵያን እድገት በፈጠራና በቴክኖሎጂ ለመደገፍ ቁርጠኛ ነች።
data.orm: Hindiin guddina kalaqaa fi tekinooloojii deggaruuf Itoophiyaa michummaa ishee dabalataan gadi-fageessuuf kutattee jirti.
data.som: Hindiya ayay ka go’an tahay inay sii xoojiso iskaashiga ay la leedahay Itoobiya si ay horumarkeeda uga taageerto hal abuur iyo teknoloji.
data.tir: ህንዲ ኣብ ልምዓት ምህዞን ቴክኖሎጂን ንኢትዮጵያ ንምሕጋዝ ዘኽእል ምሕዝነት ንምስጣም ዘለዎ ቅሩብነት ገሊፃ።

data.eng: The exhibition at the headquarters of Ministry of Innovation and Technology will remain open until December 14, 2019.
data.aaf: Ta Maybalah Qusba Gino kee Teknolojih malaakih Qasimah Addal qagitak NaharsiKudok 14,2019 fanah Fakimele.
data.amh: በኢኖቬሽን እና ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስቴር ዋና መስሪያ ቤት ያለው ኤግዚቢሽን እስከ ታህሳስ 14 ቀን 2019 ክፍት ሆኖ ይቆያል።
data.orm: Agarsiisni teessoo Ministeera Kalaqaa fi Tekinooloojiitti geggeefama jiru hanga Mudde 14, 2019tti banaa ta'ee ture.
data.som: Bandhigga oo ka dhacaya xarunta Wasaaradda Hal abuurka iyo Tignoolajiyada ayaa sii furnaan doona ilaa December 14, 2019.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ዋና ቤት ፅሕፈት ሚኒስቴር ምህዞን ቴክኖሎጂን ዝተዳለወ ምርኢት ክሳብ 14 ታሕሳስ 2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ክፉት ኮይኑ ክፀንሕ እዩ።

data.eng: The MoU was signed at the Ethiopia and China Industrial Matchmaking Conference held in Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyah kee Chaynak Sanaqatahlih Gexambicisa Konferensih Sitalu Taamitiya (MoU) Hen Daddiss Ababah Adddal.
data.amh: የመግባቢያ ሰነዱ የተፈረመው በአዲስ አበባ በተካሄደው የኢትዮጵያ እና የቻይና የኢንዱስትሪ ተዛማጅ ኮንፈረንስ ላይ ነው።
data.orm: MoU'n konfiransii michoomsuu Industirii Itoophiyaa fi Chaayinaa Finfinneetti geggeeffame irratti mallattaa'e.
data.som: Is afgaradka ayaa lagu kala saxiixday Shirkii Is barbar dhigga Warshadaha ee Itoobiya iyo Shiinaha oo lagu qabtay Addis Ababa.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ዝተኻየደ ደመር ምሕዝነት ኢንዱስትሪ ኢትዮጵያን ቻይናን መባእታዊ ስምምዕነት ተፈሪሙ።

data.eng: At the conference, Trade and Industry State Minister Teka Gebreyesus said Ethiopia and China have good historical foundation to bring the current industrial cooperation into higher level.
data.aaf: Ta Konferensil, Kabxxa kee Sanaqat Malaak Teka Gebreyesus Iyeh Itiyyobya kee Chayna Tawaki Sanaqatah Qoksimiyi Fayale Caddo Fanah Gexuh Meqeh yan Aydaadi Ukuma Alele.
data.amh: በኮንፈረንሱ ላይ የንግድና ኢንዱስትሪ ሚኒስትር ዴኤታ አቶ ተካ ገብረየሱስ እንዳሉት ኢትዮጵያ እና ቻይና አሁን ያለውን የኢንዱስትሪ ትብብር ወደ ላቀ ደረጃ ለማድረስ ጥሩ ታሪካዊ መሰረት አላቸው።
data.orm: Konfiransicha irratti, Ministeerri Ministeera Industirii fi Daldalaa Takkaa Gabreyesuus walta'iinsa industirii yeroo amma kana gara sadarkaa olaanaatti fiduuf Itoophiyaa fi Chaayinaan walitti dhufeenya seenaa gaarii qabu jedhaniiru.
data.som: Shirka, wasiirka ganacsiga iyo warshadaha Teka Gebreyesus ayaa sheegay in Itoobiya iyo Shiinaha ay leeyihiin aasaas taariikhi ah oo wanaagsan si ay iskaashiga warshadaha ee hadda jira u gaarsiiyaan heer sare.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ዝተኻየደ ደመር ዝተረኸበ ሚኒስትር ድኤታ ንግዲን ኢንዱስትሪን ተካ ገብረየሱስ ከምዝበሎ ኢትዮጵያን ቻይናን ነቲ ሕዚ ዘሎ ኢንዱስትሪያዊ ምሕዝነት ናብ ዝልዓለ ብርኪ ንምዕባይ ዘኽእል ሰናይ ታሪኻዊ መሰረት ኣለወን።

data.eng: He is expected to meet with Ethiopia’s ‘Tech Queen’ Betlhem Dessie, Project Manager at ‘ICog’, a tech firm dedicated to advancing the frontier of artificial intelligence research and application quality products to customer based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Usuk Qambaalah Ityyobiyak ' Xag Molta' Betelhem Dessie Angorowelem, Cugayso Saqala'Icog' Addal, ta Xag firmi Yexegenim Illa Yayse Cuduudite Artifeshal Intelejensih Kusaq kee Abinosi Maqarle Xayos Illa Maqamilwa Fanteena Abta Addiss Ababay, Itiyyobiyal.
data.amh: በአዲስ አበባ ኢትዮጵያ የሚገኘውን የአርቴፊሻል ኢንተለጀንስ ምርምርና አፕሊኬሽን ጥራት ያላቸውን ምርቶች ወደፊት ለማራመድ ቁርጠኛ ከሆነው የአይኮግ ኩባንያ የፕሮጀክት ስራ አስኪያጅ የኢትዮጵያ 'ቴክ ንግስት' ቤተልሄም ደሴ ጋር ይገናኛሉ ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: "Mootitti Teekinooloojii" Itoophiyaa Beteliheem Dassee, hoji-geggeesituu 'Icog', dhaabbata teekinooljii gama teekinooloojii qorannoo artifishaal intelligensii fi oomisha mosaajii sadarkaa olaanaatti fiuuf maamiloota Finfinnee, Itoophiyaatti argamaniif dhiyyeessu hojjetu waliin ni mari'ata jedhamee eegama.
data.som: Waxa la filayaa in uu la kulmo Itoobiya ‘Tech Queen’ Betlhem Dessie, Maareeyaha Mashruuca ee ICog, oo ah shirkad tignoolajiyadeed oo u heellan horumarinta xudduudda cilmi-baarista sirdoonka macmalka ah iyo badeecadaha tayada codsiga macaamiisha fadhigoodu yahay Addis Ababa, Itoobiya.
data.tir: ንሱ ምስታ "ንግስቲ ቴክኖሎጂ"ምስ ቤተልሄም ደሴ ኣካያዲት ስራሕ ኣይ.ሲ.ኦ.ጂ ማለት እውን መፅናዕቲ ስራሕ ሰብ ኢንቴሌጄንስን ንዓሚላት ብሉፅ ፍርያት ንምቕራብ ውፉይ፣ ቅድመ ግንባርን ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ማእኸል ዝገበረን ትካል ምስ እትመርሕ ክራኸብ ትፅቢት ይግበር።

data.eng: He will also meet with Noel Daniel, who is a cofounder at Africa ‘Tech Next’, a global series of panel events on African tech entrepreneurship and market opportunities in the continent’s unfolding digital revolution.
data.aaf: Usuk Nole Xaneilit Kaddu Ongoroweh, Usuk kinim 'Xag Qagitak' Bicise Afrikah Addal Qarangubal Numak Benel Dafeyna Afrikal Xak Taama Ginsisiya Kee Qadaga Samiteh Ta Gaysesal Xijital Gadite Faanama.
data.amh: በተጨማሪም በአፍሪካ ቴክኖሎጂ ቀጣይነት ያለው ዓለም አቀፋዊ የፓናል ዝግጅቶች በአፍሪካ የቴክኖሎጂ ስራ ፈጣሪነት እና በአህጉሪቱ የዲጂታል አብዮት ውስጥ የገበያ እድሎችን ከሚያመቻቸው ቴክ ኔክስት አንዱ መስራች ከሆኑት ኖኤል ዳንኤል ጋር ይገናኛሉ።
data.orm: Akkasumas Naa'ol Daani'el, hundeessaa Afirikaatti 'Teek Nekist', jijjiramaa dijitaalaa itti fufaa Afiriikaa keessatti sagantaa walitti fufaa qophii panaalii hojii-uumuu gama tekinooloojii Afiriikaa fi caarraa gaabaa waliin ni mari'ata jedhamee eegama.
data.som: Waxa kale oo uu la kulmi doonaa Noel Daniel, oo ah aasaasaha kale ee Afrika 'Tech Next', oo ah taxane caalami ah oo ku saabsan hal abuurka teknoolajiyada Afrika iyo fursadaha suuqyada ee kacaanka dhijitaalka ah ee qaaradda.
data.tir: ብዘይካ እዚ ንሱ ምስ ኖኤል ዳንኤል ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ተሓጋጋዚ መስራቲ ቴክ ኔክስት ማለት እውን ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ኣብቲ ሕዚ ተፈጢሩ ዘሎ ዲጂታል ወያን ቴክኖሎጂያዊ ምህዞ ስራሕን ኣማራፂታት ዕዳጋን ንምንዳይ ዓሊሙ ናይ ዝካየድ ተኸታታሊ መድረኽ ምይይጥ ተሓጋጋዚ ምስዝኾነ ክራኸብ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopians on Sunday morning witnessed the solar eclipse after the moon is moving between the sun and the earth obscuring the planet Earth.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiya Acadah Sakku Tubleh Soolar Rebo Alsa Tangayem Ayro kee Ardi Fanal Uqrat Bilanet Ardil.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያውያን እሁድ ጠዋት ጨረቃ በፀሐይ እና በምድር መካከል በመሆን ምድር ፕላኔትን ከሸፈነች በኋላ ያለውን የፀሐይ ግርዶሽ አይተዋል።
data.orm: Dilbata lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa erga ji'I aduu fi lafa gidduu galuun lafa golgiteen booda golgaa sirna aduu ilaalaniiru.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa subaxnimadii Axadda argtay cadceed madoobaad ka dib markii dayaxu u kala wareegayo qorraxda iyo dhulka oo qarinaya meeraha dhulka.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያዊያን ብሰንበት ንጉሆ ወርሒ ኣብ መንጎ ፀሓይን መሬትን ብምእታው ንመሬት እተፀልምተሉ ክስተት ግርዶሽ ፀሓይ ተመልኪቶም።

data.eng: The solar eclipse was visible in several cities across Ethiopia, including the historical town of Lalibela and the capital Addis Ababa starting from 6:50 a.m to 9:30 a.m.
data.aaf: Ta Soolar Rebo elle Ifowtem Mongo Magaaloli Itiyyobiyal, Aydadule Lalibela kee Addiss Ababa Edde Anuk 6:50 a.m Qimbisak Ila 9:30 a.m Fanah.
data.amh: የፀሀይ ግርዶሹ በተለያዩ የኢትዮጵያ ከተሞች የታየ ሲሆን ከነዚህም መካከል በታሪካዊቷ የላሊበላ ከተማ እና በዋና ከተማዋ አዲስ አበባ ከጠዋቱ 6፡50 እስከ 9፡30 ሰአት ጀምሮ ነበር።
data.orm: Golgaan sirna aduu kun magaalaa garagaraa guutummaa Itoophiyaa keessatti magaalaa seena qabeettii Lalibalaa fi magaalaa gudditti Addis Ababaa dabalatee sa'atii 6:50 a.m hanga 9:30tti ni argama ture.
data.som: Cadceed madoobaadkan ayaa laga arkay dhowr magaalooyin oo ku yaalla Itoobiya, sida magaalada taariikhiga ah ee Lalibela iyo caasimadda Addis Ababa laga bilaabanaysa 6:50 subaxnimo ilaa 9:30 subaxnimo.
data.tir: እቲ ግርዶሽ ፀሓይ ኣብ ብዙሕ ከተማታት ኢትዮጵያ እንኮላይ ኣብታ ታሪኻዊት ከተማ ላሊበላን ኣብ ርእሰ ከተማ ኣዲስ ኣበባን ካብ ወጋሕታ 12:50 ክሳብ 3:30 ከምዝተኸሰተ ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: State Minister of Education Dr. Geremew Huluka told journalists during the event that the government has changed the curriculum to encourage science and innovation in schools starting from the lower classes.
data.aaf: Barittok Cigiila Malaak Dr. Geremew Huluka Xaagiqawak iyem Ta Wayanabol Doolat Malgteh Baritto karikulem Saynis kee Qusam Ginayah Aydukumisiyah Baritto Buxa Addah Yan Caddoh Exaxil.
data.amh: የትምህርት ሚኒስቴር ዴኤታ ዶክተር ገረመው ሁሉቃ በዝግጅቱ ላይ ለጋዜጠኞች እንደተናገሩት መንግስት ከታችኛው ክፍል ጀምሮ ባሉ ትምህርት ቤቶች ሳይንስና ፈጠራን ለማበረታታት የስርዓተ ትምህርት ለውጥ አድርጓል።
data.orm: Ministeerri ministeera Barnootaa Dr. Garramaw Hulluuqaa qophicha irratti mootummaan sayiinsii fi kalaqa jajjabeessuuf manneen barnoota keessatti kutaalee gadii irraa eegalee sirna barnootaa jijjiiruu isaa gaazexesittootatti himaniiru.
data.som: “Wasiirka wasaaradda waxbarashada Dr. Geremew Huluka oo saxaafadda la hadlay intii ay socotay munaasabadda ayaa sheegay in dowladdu ay wax ka bedeshay manhajka waxbarashada si loo dhiirigeliyo cilmiga iyo hal abuurka dugsiyada laga soo bilaabo fasallada hoose.
data.tir: ኣብ እቲ ኩነት ዝተረኸበ ሚኒስተር ድኤታ ትምህርቲ ዶክተር ገረመው ሁለቃ ንጋዜጠኛታት ከምዝበሎ ካብ ታሕተዋይ ብርኪ ትምህርቲ ኣትሒዙ ሳይንስን ምህዞን ምእንታን ክተኣታቶ መንግስቲ ነቲ ስርዓት ትምህርቲ ቀይርዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: “The education system at present highly encourages science and innovation starting from the bottom; and through this we can establish and find many scientists in every child that can help our day to day life in a scientific way,” he stated.
data.aaf: "Tu-Baritto Sistem Ta wakti Fayaluk Aydukumusah Saynis keee Qusbam giniya Gubak Qimbisak, Kee Tanal Nanu Xisnam kee Kuli Alaaqat Mango Saynis tu-taxago Gorisnama tah Ayrook Ayro Manoh saynisle Gitan Catah," Usuk elle Dafesenal.
data.amh: “በአሁኑ ጊዜ የትምህርት ስርዓቱ ከስር ጀምሮ ሳይንስን እና ፈጠራን በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ያበረታታል፤ በዚህም የዕለት ተዕለት ሕይወታችንን በሳይንሳዊ መንገድ የሚረዱ ብዙ ሳይንቲስቶችን በእያንዳንዱ ሕፃን ማቋቋም እና ማግኘት እንችላለን።” ብለዋል።
data.orm: "Sirni barnootichaa caalmaatti saayinsii fi kalaqa yeroo ammaa godaa eegalee jajjabbeessa, dabalees karaa kanaan daa'ima hunda keessatti saayintistoota hedduu jiruu guyyuu keenya karaa saayinsawaa ta'een gargaaran ni arganna" jedheera.
data.som: "Nidaamka waxbarashadu hadda wuxuu aad u dhiirigeliyaa sayniska iyo hal abuurka oo ka bilaabma hoosta; Taasna waxaan ku aasaasi karnaa oo aan ka heli karnaa saynisyahano badan oo ilmo kasta ah oo inaga caawin kara nolol maalmeedkeena si cilmiyeysan, "ayuu yidhi.
data.tir: ንሱ ብተወሳኺ "እቲ ሕዚ ዘሎ ስርዓት ትምህርቲ ሳይንስን ቴክኖሎጂን ካብ መሰረት ክጅምር ዘተባብዕን ገና ካብ ቁልዕነቶም ኣትሒዞም ብዙሓት ሳይንቲስታት ብምፍራይ ንዕለታዊ ናብራ ብሳይንሳዊ መንገዲ ንምምራሕ ዘኽእል ትውልዲ ዝፈጥር እዩ" ክብል ገሊፁ

data.eng: China Ecology and Environment Vice Minister, Liu Hua commended Chinese and Ethiopian professionals for doing their level best to see the satellite project succeed and meet its objectives.
data.aaf: Chaynak Arddi Iro kee Dariifak Cigiila Malaak, Lui Hua Gaddagacsenih Chayniyun kee Itiyyobiyun Tutaxxago Isini Caddol Tayse Yablenimi Satelayit Cugayso Arac xagisanam kee Tet Hadaf Geysinanama.
data.amh: የቻይና ኢኮሎጂ እና አካባቢ ጥበቃ ምክትል ሚኒስትር ሊዩ ሁዋ የሳተላይት ፕሮጀክቱ ስኬታማ እንዲሆን እና የተቋቋመበትን ዓላማ ለማሳካት ቻይናውያን እና ኢትዮጵያውያን ባለሙያዎች የቻሉትን ያህል ጥረት ማድረጋቸውን አመስግነዋል።
data.orm: Itti aanaan Ministeera Sirna Naanoo fi Naannoo, Li'uu Huhaan ogeessota Chaayinaa fi Itoophiyaa hojii gaarii piroojektiin saatalayitii milkaa'ee fi kaayyoo isa galmaan ga'ee arguuf gumaachaniif galata galchan.
data.som: "Wasiir ku xigeenka deegaanka Shiinaha Liu Hua ayaa ku ammaanay khubarada Shiinaha iyo Itoobiya sida ay ugu dadaaleen heerka ugu wanaagsan si ay u arkaan mashruuca dayax gacmeedka oo lagu guuleystay in uu gaaro ujeeddooyinkiisa."
data.tir: ምኽትል ሚኒስትር ስነ ምህዳርን ንብረት ኣየርን ቻይና፣ ሊዮ:ሁ እቲ ፕሮጄክት ሳተላይት ክዕወትን ሽቶኡ ክወቅዕን ዝካኣሎም ኩሉ ንዝገበሩ ቻይናዊያንን ኢትዮጵያዊያንን ሰብ ሞያ ኣሞጊሱ ።

data.eng: Ambassador Teshome and Vice Minister Liu Hua noted that the two countries need to give impetus to their relationship with multifaceted bilateral and multilateral engagements in the future.
data.aaf: Ambasaxer Teshome kee Cigiila Malaak Lui Hua Yuybuluenih Namma Baaxo Faxah Tacem Danantam Isini Qalah mangoh Ta welolah Namma Baaxoh kee Multilateral Kabatagle Foca Fanah.
data.amh: አምባሳደር ተሾመ እና ምክትል ሚንስትር ሊዩ ሁዋ ሁለቱ ሀገራት ከተለያየ የሁለትዮሽ እና የባለብዙ ወገን ግንኙነት ጋር ለሚኖራቸው ግንኙነት የበለጠ ተነሳሽነት ሊሰጡ ይገባል ብለዋል።
data.orm: Ambaassadar Tashoomee fi Itti aanaa Ministeerri Li'u Huhaan gara fulduraatti biyyoonni lamaan walitti dhufeenya isaaniitiif xiyyeeffannoo walitti dhufeenya gam-lamee fi gam-hedduu gam hedduun kennuu akka qaba qabsiisaniiru.
data.som: Danjire Teshome iyo wasiir ku xigeenka Liu Hua ayaa xusay in labada wadan looga baahan yahay inay xoojiyaan xidhiidhka ay la leeyihiin iskaashi dhinacyo badan leh oo labada dhinac ah mustaqbalka.
data.tir: ኣምባሳደር ተሾመ ቶጋን ምኽትል ሚኒስትር ሊዮ ሁን ክልቲአን ሃገራት ክልቴኣዊን ሓባራዊን ርክበን ናብ ኩሉሜዳያዊ ምትሕብባር ከጎልብትኦ ከጎልብትኦ ከምዝግባእ ገሊፆም።

data.eng: Finance Minister Ahmed Shide and a Safaricom delegation led by CEO Peter Ndegwa held discussion today.
data.aaf: Maliyah Malaak Acmad Shide kee Safarikom Miracise CEO Peter Ndewga Talqo walal Aben.
data.amh: በገንዘብ ሚኒስትሩ አህመድ ሺዴ እና በዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ፒተር ንዴግዋ የተመራ የሳፋሪኮም የልዑካን ቡድን ዛሬ ተወያይተዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Maallaqaa Ahimaad Shidee fi Jilli Safarikom hoji-gaggeessaa Piter Nidegiwaan durfamu har'a maree taasise.
data.som: Wasiirka maaliyadda Axmed Shide iyo wafdi ka socday Safaricom oo uu hoggaaminayay agaasimaha guud ee shirkadda Peter Ndegwa ayaa maanta wada tashi yeeshay.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ገንዘብ ኣሕመድ ሺዴን ብዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕ ሳፋሪኮም ብፔተር ንዴግዋ ዝምራሕ ልኡኽን ሎሚ መዓልቲ ተመያይጦም።

data.eng: Safaricom Ethiopia delegation provided updates on its operations in the country, it was learned.
data.aaf: Safarikom Itiyyobya Miracise Xayoseh Tawak AbanahYan Taamoma ta Baaxoh Adda, Teetik Bariteh.
data.amh: የሳፋሪኮም ኢትዮጵያ የልዑካን ቡድን በሀገሪቱ ስላለው እንቅስቃሴ ወቅታዊ መረጃ መስጠቱን ለማወቅ ተችሏል።
data.orm: Jilli Safarikom Itoophiyaa biyyatti keessatti hojiilee isaa irratti foyya'iinsa akka dhiyeesse, hubatameera.
data.som: Weftiga Safaricom ee Itoobiya ayaa ka warbixiyey hawlaha ay dalka ka wadaan, sida la ogaaday.
data.tir: ልኡኽ ሳፋሪ ኮም ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ብዛዕባ ዘካይዶ ዘሎ ወፍሪ እዋናዊ ሓበሬታ ከምዝሃበ እውን ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: The annual Innovation Africa Digital Summit that focuses on accelerating national ICT agendas, supporting African countries as they look to improve ICT maturity rankings, and laying foundations for achieving Sustainable Development Goals is underway here in Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Ligidak Qusbam Ginanamak Afrikah Xijital Sammit Hangi Kah Yecem Yexerenih yanimi ICTih Ajexaaxiy, Catanah Yaninimi Afrikah Baxooxa Yabloonuh Barimtuh ICT Alaysole Caddol, kee elle Xinen rikek Kah ugutan Inah Sarimale Daddos Madma Arac Xagtuh Gitat Geytimta Adddiss Ababah Addal.
data.amh: ዓመታዊው የኢኖቬሽን አፍሪካ ዲጂታል የመሪዎች ጉባኤ ሀገራዊ የአይሲቲ አጀንዳዎችን በማፋጠን፣ የአፍሪካ ሀገራት የአይሲቲ ብስለት ደረጃን ሲያሻሽሉ ለመደገፍ እና ዘላቂ የልማት ግቦችን ለማሳካት መሰረት በመጣል ላይ በማተኮር በአዲስ አበባ እየተካሄደ ነው።
data.orm: Walga'iin Dijitaalaa kalaqa Afiriikaa wagga waggaan adeemsifamu kan dhimmoota ICT biyyooleessa saffisiisuu, biyyoota Afiriikaa sadarkaa ga'oominaa ICT foyyeessuuf yaalan deeggaruu, fi dhagaa bu'uuraa guddina walitti fufaa fiduu irratti xiyyeefatu as Finfinneetti adeemsifamaa jira.
data.som: "Shirka sannadlaha ah ee Innovation Africa Digital Summit kaas oo diiradda lagu saarayo dardargelinta ajandayaasha ICT ga qaranka, taageerida wadamada Afrikaanka ah ee doonaya inay horumariyaan darajada ICT ga, iyo aasaaska u ah xaqiijinta Yoolalka Horumarineed ee Joogtada ah ayaa ka socda halkan Addis Ababa."
data.tir: እቲ ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ ኣብ ኣይሲቲ ዘለወን ሃገራዊ ዛዕባ ከዕብያ ፣ዓቕሚ ኣጠቓቕማ ኢንፎርሜሽን ኮምኒኬሽን ቴክኖሎጂአን (ኣይ.ሲ.ቲ) ከማሓይሻ ዝሕግዘን ሽቶታት ውሑስ ልምዓት ኣብ ምዕዋት መሰረት ዘንብርን ዓመታዊ ኣኼባ ዲጂታል ምህዞ ኣፍሪካ ኣብ እዚ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ እናተኻየደ እዩ።

data.eng: Opening the two-day summit, Innovation and Technology Minister Belete Mola said Ethiopia is working to transform its economy using digitization as a key instrument.
data.aaf: Namma Ayroh Sammitih Fakental, Qusbam Kinanam kee Teknolojih Malaak Melete mola Iyeh Itoyyobiya taamtah Tabatabisuh Isi Baaxo Xijitawat Yantifiqenim Lafale Aslaca kini.
data.amh: ሁለት ቀናት የሚቆየውን የመሪዎች ጉባኤ የከፈቱት የኢኖቬሽንና ቴክኖሎጂ ሚኒስትሩ አቶ በለጠ ሞላ እንዳሉት ኢትዮጵያ ኢኮኖሚዋን ለመቀየር ዲጂታይዜሽንን እንደ ቁልፍ መሳሪያ በመጠቀም እየሰራች ነው።
data.orm: Walga'ii guyyaa-lamaa banuun, Ministeerri Tekinooloojii fi Kalaqaa Ballaxaa Mollaa Itoophiyaan jijjirama gara dijitaalaa akka meeshaa furtuutti diinagdee ceesisuuf hojjeechaa jirti jedhaniiru.
data.som: Wasiirka hal abuurka iyo tignoolajiyada Belete Mola oo furay shirkan oo socon doona muddo laba maalmood ah ayaa sheegay in Itoobiya ay ka shaqaynayso sidii ay dhaqaalaheeda ugu beddeli lahayd iyada oo adeegsanaysa dijitaalka oo ah aalad muhiim ah.
data.tir: ነቲ ንኽልተ መዓልቲ ዝፀንሕ ኣኼባ ዝኸፈተ ሚኒስትር ምህዞን ቴክኖሎጂን በለጠ ሞላ ከምዝበሎ ኢትዮጵያ ንዲጂታላዊ ኣሰራርሓ ብምጥቃም ቁጠባዊ ስግግር ንምክያድ እናሰርሐት እያ።

data.eng: Ministry of Health has signed a trilateral agreement with the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) and the China Atomic Energy Authority (CAEA).
data.aaf: Qafiyat Malaak Sidica Katih Sitengey Abe Baad Caddok Atomik Caylih Ejensilih (BCACE/IAEA/) kkee Chaynak Atomik Calih Maracalih (CACM/CAEA/).
data.amh: የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር ከዓለም አቀፉ አቶሚክ ኢነርጂ ኤጀንሲ (አይ ኢ ኤ) እና ቻይና አቶሚክ ኢነርጂ ባለሥልጣን (ሲ ኤ ኢ ኤ) ጋር የሶስትዮሽ ወገን ስምምነት ተፈራርሟል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Fayyaa waliigaltee qaama sadii Ejensii Humnaa Atoomawaa Addunyaa (IAEA) fi Abbaa Taayitaa Humna Atoomawaa Chaayinaa (CAEA) wajjin mallatteesse.
data.som: Wasaaradda Caafimaadka ayaa heshiis saddex geesood ah la saxiixatay Hay’adda Tamarta Atoomikada ee Caalamiga ah (IAEA) iyo Hay’adda Tamarta Atoomikada ee Shiinaha (CAEA).
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ምስ ዓለምለኸ ኤጄንሲ ሓይሊ (ኣይ.ኤ.ኢ.ኤ) ምስ በዓል መዚ ሓይሊ ኣቶሚክ ቻይናን ስሉስ ስምምዕነት ተፈራሪሙ።

data.eng: The agreement is to jointly implement an extra-budgetary in-kind contribution for a project titled “strengthening capabilities of member states in building, strengthening and restoring capacities and services in case of outbreaks, emergencies, and disasters”.
data.aaf: Ta sitigey Sitnah Abnisanah ya Osotinah Mizaniyatih Uwayti Catoh Doori Cugaysoh Amotak " Adoytitih tanih tan Rakaakaiyel Duddusiteta Xisiya Maqroosanamay, Qagisiya Dudditetay, Maqarosiya kee Ayfaf Baxcimiyay, Cubewaynu kee Qawallayla".
data.amh: ስምምነቱ "የአባል ሀገራት ወረርሽኝ፣ ድንገተኛ ሁኔታና አደጋ በሚከሰትበት ጊዜ አቅምን የመገንባት፣ የማጠናከርና አቅምን ለማደስ ያላቸውን አቅም ማጠናከር" በሚል ርዕስ ለተዘጋጀ ፕሮጀክት ከበጀት ውጭ የሆነ የአይነት አስተዋፅኦ በጋራ መተግበር ነው።
data.orm: Waliigaltichi pirojektii matadureen "yeoo weerara dhibeetti, yeroo tasaa fi balaawwaniitti dandeettii ijaaruu, cimsuu fi bakkatti deebisuu biyyoota miseensotaa guddisuu" jedhuuf tokkummaan baajata dabalataa meeshaadhaan dhiyeessuu hojiirra oolchuufi.
data.som: Heshiisku waa in si wadajir ah loo dhaqan geliyo tabarucaad ka baxsan miisaaniyada nooceeda ah ee mashruuca loogu magacdaray "xoojinta awoodaha dawladaha xubnaha ka ah dhismaha, xoojinta iyo soo celinta awoodaha iyo adeegyada haddii ay ka dillaacaan, xaalado degdeg ah, iyo masiiboyin".
data.tir: እቲ ስምምዕነት ካብ በጀት ወፃኢን ብዓይነት ብዝግበር ኣስተዋፅኦን ብሓባር ዝትግበር ኮይኑ "ኣብ ግዜ ሃንደበት፣ ህፁፅን ሓደጋን ዝዋሃብ ግልጋሎትን ዓቕሚ ንምጥንኻርን ምዕቃብን ዘኽእል ተኽእሎን ብቅዓትን ኣባል ሃገራት ምጉልባት" ብዝብል ርእሲ ንዝትሓንፀፀ ፕሮጄክት ዝውዕል እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Health Minister Dr. Lia Tadesse has met with the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (US-CDC) Ethiopia’s new country director, Dr. Caroline Rayan.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Qafiyat Malaak Dr Liya Taxese Amerikak Likimi Lowsis kee Kallli Fanateena ( A-DLKF/US_CDC/) Itiyyobiyak Qusba Baaxo Saqal, Dr Karoline Rayanat Tongoorowe.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ዶ/ር ሊያ ታደሰ ከዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የበሽታ መቆጣጠሪያና መከላከያ ማዕከል (ዩኤስ ሲዲሲ) የኢትዮጵያ አዲሱ የሀገር ዳይሬክተር ዶ/ር ካሮላይን ራየን ጋር ተገናኝታለች።
data.orm: Ministeerri Fayyaa Itoopiyaa Dr. Liyaa Taaddesee daayirekteera biyyaa Giddugala Ittisaa fi To'annoo Dhibee Yuunaayitid Isteetis (US-CDC) Itoopiyaa haaraa, Dr Kaaroliine Raayaan wajjin mari'atte.
data.som: Wasiirada caafimaadka Itoobiya Dr. Lia Tadesse ayaa la kulantay xarunta Maraykanka ee Xakamaynta iyo Kahortagga Cudurrada (US-CDC). Agaasimaha cusub ee dalka Itoobiya, Dr. Caroline Rayan.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ጥዕና ኢትዮጵያ ዶክተር ሊያ ታደሰ ኣብ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ማእኸል ምቁፅፃርን ምክልኻልን ሕማም (ዩ.ኤስ.ሲ.ዲሲ)ናይ ኢትዮጵያ ሓዱሽ ዳይሬክተር ምስ ዝኾነት ዶክተር ካሮላይን ራያን ተራኺባ።

data.eng: The two discussed ongoing partnerships around HIV, immunization, Public Health Emergency Response including lab capacity as well as on potential new areas of partnerships.
data.aaf: Ta Namma Walal Sitaluk abak geytiman Taamomak HIV, Aftabuy, Ayuunti Qafiyatih Cubewaynu Radi Kacsi Gubatleh Lab Daddite kalah Qusba Aroocah Sitaluk taimitiyi Bicitetah.
data.amh: ሁለቱ በኤች አይ ቪ፣ በክትባት፣ በህብረተሰብ ጤና የቤተ ሙከራ እንዲሁም ሊሆኑ የሚችሉ አዳዲስ የትብብር መስኮች ዙሪያ ጨምሮ በሂደት ላይ ያለውን ጥምረት ተወያይተዋል።
data.orm: Lameen isaanii michummaa HIV, Madiinummaa, Deebii Tasaa Fayyaa Hawaasaa dandeettii laabraatorii dabalatee godhamaa jiru akkasumas kallattii michummaa haaraa uumamuu malu irratti waliin mari'atan.
data.som: Labaduba waxay ka wada xaajoodeen iskaashiga joogtada ah ee ku saabsan HIV, tallaalka, Waxka qabadka Xaaladda Degdegga ah ee Caafimaadka Dadweynaha oo ay ku jiraan awoodda shaybaadhka iyo sidoo kale meelaha cusub ee suurtagalka ah ee iskaashiga.
data.tir: ክልቲአን ኣብ ዙሪያ ኤች.ኣይ.ቪ ፣ ክትባት ምክልኻል፣ድልውነት፣ ሃንደበታዊ ጥዕና ህዝቢ እንኮላይ ዓቕሚ ቤተ ፈተነ ከምኡ እውን ኣብ ካልኦት ዘይተዳህሰሳ ሓደሽቲ ጉዳያት ክህሉ ኣብ ዝግባእ ምሕዝነት ኣመልኪተን ዘትየን።

data.eng: As COVID-19 in Ethiopia has been consistently on the rise and triggering calls for more robust measures to halt the spread of the virus, the government is taking various measures to prevent the spread of the pandemic, it was indicated.
data.aaf: KOVIX-19 Itiyoppiyah Addal Madabiino Osimiya kee Tagagaye Ramoda Mangom Maqqarle Aqakan MangoVarisiteh Baxcimiyi Sooleh, Doolat Mango Aqakane Dalka Baxcimiyih Kalalu Abanamay, Tah tekkeh.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ኮቪድ 19 ያለማቋረጥ እየጨመረና የቫይረሱን ስርጭት ለመግታት ተጨማሪ ጠንካራ ዕርምጃዎች እንዲወሰዱ እያሻ በመሆኑ መንግሥት ወረርሽኙ እንዳይዛመት ለማድረግ የተለያዩ ዕርምጃዎችን እየወሰደ መሆኑ ተጠቆመ።
data.orm: Akkuma COVID-19'n Itoopiyaa keessaa walitti fufiinsaan dabalaa deemuun tarkaanfii cimaa babal'ina vaayirichaa hir'isu gochuuf kakaasaa jiru, mootummaan tarkaanfilee adda addaa babal'ina weerarichaa hambisu fudhachaa jira, jedhamee ibsame.
data.som: Iyada oo COVID-19 ee Itoobiya uu si joogto ah u kordhay isla markaana kicinaya baaqyada ku saabsan tallaabooyin adag oo lagu joojinayo faafitaanka fayraska, dawladda ayaa qaadaysaa tallaabooyin kala duwan si looga hortago faafitaanka masiibada, ayaa la tilmaamay.
data.tir: ኮቪድ:19 አብ ኢትዮጵያ ብቐፃልነት እናወሰኸ ኣብ ዝመፀሉ ዘሎ እዋን ንምስፍሕፋሕ እቲ ቫይረስ ዝዓግቱ ጠንካራ ስጉምቲታት ክወስዱ ፃውዒት እናቐረበ እንትኾን ነዚ ስዒቡ መንግስቲ ንምስፍሕፋሕ እቲ ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ዝተፈላለዩ ስጉምቲታት እናወሰደ ምኳኑ ተፈሊጡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Following the first confirmed case of COVID-19 in Ethiopia in March 2020, the Government of Ethiopia took several public health measures and protocols to prevent increased levels of infection.
data.aaf: Katayak Qimbo Addah Itiyyobiyah Addal KOVIX-19 Geytimeh Laqeni 2020, Itiyyobiyah Doolat Yabte Ayyunti Qafiyatih Aqakane kee Boetokolih Kalalimte Osimiyi Caddo Ta Infekshionik,
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ መጋቢት 2020 የመጀመሪያው የተረጋገጠ ኮቪድ 19 የተያዘ ሰዉን ተከትሎ የኢትዮጵያ መንግሥት የጨመረውን የኢንፌክሽን መጠን ለመከላከል በርካታ የህዝብ ጤና እርምጃዎችንና ፕሮቶኮሎችን ወስዷል።
data.orm: Nama Itoopiyaa keessatti dhukkuba COVID-19'n qabamuun isaa mirkanaa'e isa jalqabaa Bitootessa 2020 keessaa hordofuun, hamma infeekshinii dabalaa deemu hambisuuf Mootummaan Itoopiyaa tarkaanfii fi pirotokolii fayyaa hawaasaa muraasa fudhate.
data.som: Ka dib kiiskii ugu horreeyay ee la xaqiijiyey ee COVID-19 ee Itoobiya bishii Maarso 2020, dawladda Itoobiya ayaa qaadday dhowr tallaabooyin oo caafimaadka bulshada ah iyo habmaamuus si looga hortago heerarka caabuqa ee kordhay.
data.tir: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዝተኸሰተ ፈላማይ ኩነት ኮቪድ: 19 ስዒቡ መንግስቲ ኢትዮጵያ ዝውሰኹ ደረጃታት ረኽሲ ንምክልኻል ብዙሓት ስጉምቲታትን ፕሮቶኮላትን ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ተግቢሩ እዩ።

data.eng: General Health Director with MoH, Dr. Yibeltal Mekonnen, on his part said that the ministry has acknowledged and will provide necessary support to the center so that it will spearhead a private health sector’s social responsibility engagements in responding to people in need.
data.aaf: Fanti Qafiyatih Saqal QM lih, Dr Yibeltal Mekonnen, isi Fakental Iyem Malaaka Gadda Gacisam kee Faximtah Tan Cato Xayoselem Ta Fanteenah ta Moya Canka sekteritel Ayyunti Dirkih Gabatable AyyuntiFayxil Radi Kah Yadarenah Abele.
data.amh: ጤና ሚንስቴር አጠቃላይ የጤና ዳይሬክተር ዶ/ር ይበልጣል መኮንን በበኩላቸው ሚኒስቴሩ ለተቸገሩ ሰዎች ምላሽ ለመስጠት የግል የጤና ዘርፍ የማህበራዊ ሃላፊነት ተሳትፎ በግንባር ቀደምትነት እንዲመራ ለማዕከሉ እውቅና መስጠቱንና አስፈላጊውን ድጋፍ እንደሚያደርግ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Daayirekterri Fayyaa Waliigalaa MoH, Yibelxaal Mekonnin, gama isaatiin ministichi beekamtii kennuun giddugaleessichi namoota gargaarsa barbaadan qaqqabuuf hirmaannaa itti gaafatamumma hawaasaa sektera fayyaa dhuunfaa akka dursuuf deggersa barbaachisu akka dhiyeessu dubbate.
data.som: Agaasimaha guud ee caafimaadka ee Wasaaradda Caafimaadka Dr. Yibeltal Mekonnen, ayaa dhankiisa sheegay in wasaaraddu ay garwaaqsatay ayna bixin doonto taageerada lagama maarmaanka ah ee xaruntan si ay hormuud u noqoto waaxda caafimaadka ee gaarka loo leeyahay ka qayb qaadashada mas’uuliyadda bulsho ee wax u qabashada dadka u baahan.
data.tir: ኣብ ሚኒስቴር ጥዕና ዳይሬክተር ሓፈሻዊ ጥዕና ዶክተር ይበልጣል መኮነን ብወገኑ ከምዝበሎ፣ እቲ ሚኒስቴር ኣብቲ ጉዳይ ኣፍልጦ ኣለዎ ስለዝኾነ ድማ ነቲ ማእኸል ኣድላዪ ሓገዝ ብምግባር ዘፈር ጥዕና ውልቀ ንጠለባት ህዝቢ ኣብ ምምላእ ማሕበራዊ ሓላፍነቶም ምእንታን ክፍፅሙ ክመርሕ እዩ።

data.eng: Regular training for the health professionals is according to him, a basic assistance the ministry had gave to improve the efficiency treatment.
data.aaf: Kuliwqadi yamcawe Aydakaakan Qafiyat Tu-Taxxagoh Usuk elle Iyenal, Mohimik yam Kusaq Ta malaak Yeceh Cayrimite Maxatite Kah Barimtanah.
data.amh: እሱ እንዳለው ሚኒስቴሩ የሰጠው መሠረታዊ እርዳታ የአገልግሎቱን ውጤታማነት ለማሻሻል ለጤና ባለሙያዎች በየጊዜው የሚሰጠው ሥልጠና ነው።
data.orm: Akka inni jedhetti leenjiin idilee hojjetoota fayyaa, deggersa bu'uuraa ministirichi waldhaansa gahaa fooyyessuuf kenneedha.
data.som: Tababarka joogtada ah ee xirfadlayaasha caafimaadka ayaa ah sida uu sheegay, kaalmada aasaasiga ah ee wasaaraddu ay siisay si kor loogu qaado waxtqabadka daaweynta.
data.tir: ንሱ ወሲኹ ከምዝገለፆ በቲ ሚኒስቴር ንሰብ ሞያ ጥዕና ዝዋሃብ ስሩዕ ስልጠና ኣብ ምምሕያሽ ብቅዓት ግልጋሎት ሕክምና መሰረታዊ ሓገዝ ዘበርክት እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopia began accelerated Maternal and Neonatal Tetanus Elimination (MNTE) efforts in 1999.
data.aaf: Itiyyobiya Qagitak Sisikuk Inonti kee Alaaqa Tentanos Biyisaya ( IATB/MNTE/) Macalite Qambiseh 1999 ligidih Addat.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ የተፋጠነ የእናቶችና የአራስ ህፃናት ቴታነስ ማጥፋት (ኤም ኤን ቲ ኢ) ጥረቶችን በ1999 ነበር የጀመረችው።
data.orm: Itoopiyaan tattaaffii Titaanasii Haadhaa fi Ijoollee Reefuu Dhalatanii Dhabamsiisuu (MNTE) bara 1999 keessa jalqabde guddisteetti.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa bilawday dardargelinta dadaallada Hooyada iyo Dhallaanka Tirtiritaanka Tetanus ka (MNTE) 1999kii.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ኣዴታትን ሓደሽቲ ውላዳትን ዘጋጥም ረኽሲ ቴታነስ (ኤም.ኤን.ቲ.ኢ) ብቕልጡፍ ንምክልኻል ፃዕሪ ዝጀመረት ብ1999ዓ.ም.ፈ እዩ።

data.eng: In 2011, all the regions in the country except the Somali Region were validated for MNTE. The 2011 validation mission made recommendations that would see the Somali Region progress to MNTE over time.
data.aaf: 2011 Addat, Inkih tan Rakaakayite Ta Baaxol Somali Edde anekalah ( IATB/MNTE/)Yismiteenih. 2011 Addt Asmitiyi Madma Aydukumuseenih Somali Rakaakay ( IATB/MNTE/) Addal Ablusk Geytima Waktil.
data.amh: በ2011 ከሶማሌ ክልል በስተቀር ሁሉም የሀገሪቱ ክልሎች ለኤም ኤን ቲ ኤ እውቅና ተሰቷቸው ነበር። የ2011 የእውቅና ተልዕኮ የሶማሌ ክልል በጊዜ ሂደት ወደ ኤም ኤን ቲ ኤ እንዲያድግ የሚያስችሉ ሀሳቦችን አቅርቧል።
data.orm: Bara 2011 keessa, Naannoo Somaalee irraa kan hafe naannoleen biyyattii keessa jiran hundi MNTE'f mirkaneeffaman. Ergamni mirkaneessa bara 2011 gorsawwan Naannoon Somaalee yeroo keessa gara MNTE'tti akka guddatu gargaaru kenne.
data.som: Sannadkii 2011, dhammaan deegaabada dalka marka laga reebo deegaanka Soomaalida ayaa loo ansixiyay MNTE. Hawlgalka ansixinta ee 2011 wuxuu soo jeediyay tallooyin lagu eedgi doono in deegaanka Soomaalidu uu u socdo MNTE ka wakhti ka dib.
data.tir: ብ2011 ዓ.ም.ፈ ብዘይካ ክልል ሶማሊ ኣብታ ሃገር ዝርከባ ኩለን ክልላት ኣብ ኣዴታትን ሓደሽቲ ውላዳትን ዘጋጥም ረኽሲ ቴታነስ (ኤም.ኤን.ቲ.ኢ) ንምኽልኻል ብቕዓት ከምዘለወን ተረጋጊፁ እዩ። እቲ ብ2011ዓ.ም.ፈ ናይ ብቕዓት መረጋገፂ ዝሃበ ተልእኾ፣ ክልል ሶማሊ ኣብ ኣዴታትን ሓደሽቲ ውላዳትን ረኽሲ ቴታነስ ንምክልኻል ክኽተሎ ብዛዕባ ዝግባእ ምኽሪ ሓሳብ ሂቡ እዩ።

data.eng: Meat production today is nearly five times higher than in the early 1960s – from 70 million tonnes to more than 330 million tonnes in 2017.
data.aaf: Caddo Murtisiyi Talqo Koona Adda Yase 1960t-70 milyoonih Tonite Dagga 330 Milyoonih Tonite 2017 Addal.
data.amh: በዛሬው ጊዜ የስጋ ምርት በ1960ዎቹ መጀመሪያ ላይ ከነበረው በአምስት እጥፍ ይበልጣል። በ2017 ከነበረው 70 ሚሊዮን ቶን ወደ 330 ሚሊዮን ቶን ሁኗል።
data.orm: Oomishi foonii harraa isa bara 1960 jalqabaa keessaa gara dachaa shaniin caala - toonii miliyoona 70 irraa bara 2017 keessa gara toonii miliyoona 330 olitti.
data.som: Soo saarka hilibka maanta ayaa ku dhawaad shan jeer ka sareeya horraantii 1960 meeyadii - laga soo bilaabo 70 milyan oo tan ilaa in ka badan 330 milyan oo tan sanadka 2017.
data.tir: ፍሪያት ስጋ ካብቲ ኣብ መጀመርታ 1960ታት ዓ.ም.ፈ ዝነበሮ ሎሚ ጥቓ ሓሙሽተ ዕፅፊ ከምዝዓበየን ካብ 70 ሚልዮን ቶን ኣብ 2017ዓ.ም.ፈ ናብ ልዕሊ 330 ሚልዮን ቶን ክብ ከምዝበለን ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: A big reason for this is that there are many more people to feed.
data.aaf: Tahak kah tekkemik Sabab Mango Ayyunti edde yantifiqem kini.
data.amh: ለዚህ ትልቁ ምክንያት ብዙ የሚመገቡ ሰዎች መኖራቸው ነው ።
data.orm: Sababni guddaan kanaa namoonni sooratan baayyee caalmaan waan jiraniif.
data.som: Sababta ugu weyn waa in ay jiraan dad badan oo dheeraad ah oo la quudiyo.
data.tir: እዚ ዝኾነሉ ዓብዪ ምኽንያት ቁፅሪ ተመገብቲ ሰባት ስለዝዓበየ እዩ።

data.eng: According to UNICEF, disposable sanitary products are expensive and often unavailable. As a result nearly 75% of Ethiopian women and girls do not have access to the menstrual supplies they need to manage their periods.
data.aaf: UNICEF Elle tiysixigenal, Tamehtan Saytunanteh Uwatite Gaali kinim kee Geytimewaytama. Tahak Maxat 75 Gabbah Itiyyobiyah Sayyo kee Baxxuw Tah Takkemih Bicite Malon Nadafata XayosiyihFaxanah Keenit Yamatewak Hooranagidah.
data.amh: ዩኒሴፍ እንዳለው ከሆነ የሚጣሉ የንፅህና መጠበቂያ ምርቶች ውድ እና ብዙ ጊዜ ተደራሽ አይደሉም። በዚህም ምክንያት 75% የሚደርሱ ኢትዮጵያውያን ሴቶችና ልጃገረዶችየወር አበባቸውን ለመቆጣጠር የሚያስፈልጋቸውን የወር አበባ አቅርቦት ማግኘት አይችሉም።
data.orm: Akka UNICEF jedhetti, oomishaaleen qulqullinaa itti fayyadamanii gataman qaalii fi yeroo baayyee kan hin argamne dha. Sababa kanaan dubartoonnii fi durboonni Itoopiyaa meeshaalee ministireeshinii marsaa laguu isanii itti to'achuuf isaan barbaachisan hin qaban.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigteeyey UNICEF, alaabta nadaafadda ee la tuuri karo waa qaali oo inta badan lama heli karo. Taas ayaa keentay in ku dhawaad 75% haweenka iyo gabdhaha Itoobiya aysan helin agabka caadada ee ay u baahan yihiin si ay u maareeyaan caadadooda.
data.tir: ከም ፀብፃብ ዩኒሴፍ፣ ተጠቒምካ ዝድርበዩ ኣቁሑት ፅርየት ክባራት ኣብ ርእሲ ምኳኖም ኩሉግዜ ኣይርከቡን። ብሰንኪ እዚ ጥቓ 75 ሚእታዊ ዝኾና ኣንስቲን ኣዋልድን ንፅግያት ዝከላኸላሉ ጉዝጓዝ ዝረኽባሉ ዕድል የብለንን።

data.som: Dhiiranaanta Mebrahtu ayaa ka timid khibrad shakhsiyeed.
