data.eng: The WHO Representative to Ethiopia, Dr. Boureima Hama Sambo, thanked Canada for the available funding to support the continuity of essential health services. He said, “The grant will not only strengthen the provision of quality, gender-responsive essential health services at primary care level but also boost health system resilience by building the capacity of regional and city health authorities to deal with current and future crises.”
data.aaf: BQE/WHO/ Awlise Itiyyobiyah Fanah, Dr Boureim Hama Sambo, Gaddagacise Kandah Faximah Yan Fenxi Catoh Ta Geyseesal Meqeh tan Qafiyat Ayfaafiteh. Usuk Iyeh, "Ta kibaliso Dubuk hina Maqarosanam Barisanama Maxatle, Naddo- Gacsayakke Meqeh yan Qafiyat Ayfafite Qimboh Dacayrih Caddoh takkay imay Qafiyat Sistemih Qasqasabe Yaysisenim Duddite Xisanama Rakaakayite kee Magaalak Qafiyat miraciinuhTawakihim kee Sara booduwayta Taqabiteh.
data.amh: የጤና ድርጅት ኢትዮጵያ ተወካይ ዶ/ር ቡሬማ ሃማ ሳምቦ አስፈላጊ የጤና አገልግሎት ቀጣይነትን ለመደገፍ ከካናዳ ላለው የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ምስጋና አቅርቧል። "እርዳታው ጥራት ያለው፣ ጾታዊ ምላሽ የሚሰጡ አስፈላጊ የጤና አገልግሎት መስጠትን ከማጠናከሩም ባሻገር የአካባቢና የከተማ ጤና ባለስልጣናት አሁን ያሉና ወደፊት የሚከሰቱ ቀውሶችን የመፍታት አቅም በመገንባት የጤና ስርዓት የመቋቋም አቅምን ያሳድጋል" ብለዋል።
data.orm: Itoopiyaatti bakka bu'aan WHO, Dr. Boori'emaa Haamaa Saamboo, tajaajilli fayyaa murteessaa tahe akka itti fufu deggeruuf deggersa maallaqaa dhiyeesuu isheef Kanaadaa galateeffate. "Deggersi maallaqichaa dhiyeessii tajaajila fayyaa murteessaa sirna koorniyaaf deebii kennuu qulqullina qabu waldhaansa sadarkaa jalqabaatti kennuu jabeesuuf kana malees hanqina ammaa fi fuulduraa furuuf aanga'oota fayyaa sadarkaa naannoo fi magaalaaf dandeettii ijaaruun cimina sirna fayyaa guddisuuf."
data.som: Wakiilka WHO ee Itoobiya, Dr. Boureima Hama Sambo, ayaa uga mahadceliyay Kanada maalgelinta diyaarka ah ee lagu taageerayo sii wadida adeegyada caafimaad ee muhiimka ah. Waxa uu yidhi, "Deeqaddu kaliya ma xoojin doonto bixinta tayada, adeegyada caafimaadka lagama maarmaanka u ah jinsiga ee heerka daryeelka aasaasiga ah laakiin sidoo kale waxay kor u qaadaysaa adkeysiga nidaamka caafimaadka iyada oo la dhisayo awoodda maamulka caafimaadka ee deegaanka iyo magaalada si ay ula tacaalaan dhibaatooyinka hadda iyo mustaqbalka."
data.tir: ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ተወካሊ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ዶክተር ቢሪማ ሃማ ሳምቦ ቐፃልነት መሰረታዊ ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ክጠናኸር ካናዳ ዘበርከተቶ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ኣመስጊኑ። ንሱ ወሲኹ ከምዝበሎ እቲ ሓገዝ ንፅርየት ግልጋሎት ንትኹረት ስነፆታ፣ ኣብ መባእታዊ ደረጃ ክንክን ንዝዋሃብ መሰረታዊ ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ዘጠናኽር ጥራሕ እንተይኮነስ ሰበ ስልጣን ጥዕና ክልልን ከተማን ዓቕሞም ኣዕቢዮም እዋናዊን መፃኢን ቅልውላዋት ክምክቱ ዘኽእሎም ስርዓት ጥዕና ክድልድል ዝገብር እዩ።

data.eng: This grant will benefit approximately 6.5 million Ethiopians in need, of which 50 percent are expected to be women.
data.aaf: Ta Kibaliso Faxa tan Itiyyobiyak 6.5 Milyoonuh Takkemih Gabba Bahtam Edde Antifiqele, tahak 50 Gabba sayyo Akkele Axcek Qambaalan.
data.amh: ይህ እርዳታ ወደ 6.5 ሚሊዮን የሚጠጉ የተቸገሩ ኢትዮጵያውያንን ተጠቃሚ የሚያደርግ ሲሆን ከእነዚህ ውስጥ 50 በመቶ የሚሆኑት ሴቶች ይሆናሉ ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Pirojektiin kun tilmaamaan lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa miliyoona 6.5 ni fayyada, kanneen keessaa dhibbantan 50 dubartoota akka tahan ni eegama.
data.som: Deeqdan waxaa ka faa'iidaysan doona ku dhawaad 6.5 milyan oo Itoobiyaan ah oo u baahan, kuwaas oo boqolkiiba 50 la rajaynayo inay dumar noqdaan.
data.tir: እዚ ሓገዝ ንኣስታት 6.5 ሚልዮን ረድኤት ዘድልዮም ኢትዮጵያዊያን ተጠቀምቲ ዝገብር እንትኾን ካብዚኦም እተን 50 ሚእታዊ ደቂ ኣንስትዮ ክኾና ትፅቢት ይግበር።

data.eng: Eka Kotebe General Hospital, which incorporates a mental institution in its premises, has been officially inaugurated today by Deputy Prime Minister Demeke Mekonnen and Health Minister Amir Aman.
data.aaf: Eka Kotebe Amoladi Hosbital, Misinkaca Institutionluk Catmak Tahat Tangalo, tanlqo Cigiila Naharis Malaak Xemeke Mokonnen Qafiyat Malaak Amir Aman elle Geytimekel Baxaqaluk Gabataglet Dooqaysimte.
data.amh: በግቢው ውስጥ የአእምሮ ተቋምን ያካተተው ኤካ ኮተቤ አጠቃላይ ሆስፒታል ዛሬ በምክትል ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ደመቀ መኮንን እና በጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር አሚር አማን በይፋ ተመርቋል።
data.orm: Hospitaalli Waliigalaa Eekkaa Kotebee, kan dhaabbata sammuu haalduree isaa keessatti galche, har'a Itti aanaa Mummicha Ministeeraa Dammaqee Mokonninii fi Ministeera Fayyaa Amiir Amaaniin ifaan eebbifame.
data.som: Dhakhtarka guud ee Eka Kotebe oo ka mid ah xarumaha lagu xanaaneeyo dadka dhimirka ka jiran ayaa maanta si rasmi ah xariga looga jaray, waxaana xariga ka jaray Ra’iisul Wasaare kuxigeenka Demeke Mekonnen iyo Wasiirka Caafimaadka Amir Aman.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ቀፅሩ ንትካል ሕክምና ኣእምሮ ዘካተተ ኤካ ኮተቤ ሓፈሻዊ ሆስፒታል ሎሚ መዓልቲ ብምኽትል ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ደመቀ መኮነንን ብሚኒስትር ጥዕና ኣሚር ኣማንን ብወግዒ ተፀምቢሉ።

data.eng: Since it began operation in 2017, the hospital has provided health services for 116, 029 patients, of which 25 percent are mental disabled persons, it was learned.
data.aaf: Tah Qimbisem 2017, Hosbital 116,029 yakke lakmisa Marah Qafiya Ayfafite Xayoose, Tahak 25 Gabba Misinkica biyakle marite kini.Tahak Barittenih.
data.amh: ሆስፒታሉ ስራውን ከ2017 ከጀመረ ጀምሮ ለ116,029 ህሙማን የጤና አገልግሎት ሲሰጥ ከነዚህም ውስጥ 25 በመቶ የሚሆኑት የአዕምሮ ህሙማን መሆናቸውን ለማወቅ ተችሏል።
data.orm: Erga bara 2017 keessa hojii eegalee, hospitaalichi tajaajila fayyaa dhukkubsatoota 116, 026 tahaniif kenneera, kanneen keessaa dhibbantaan 25 namoota qaama miidhamummaa sammuu qaban tahuun hubatameera.
data.som: Tan iyo markii uu bilaabay shaqada 2017, dhakharku wuxuu adeegyo caafimaad uu siiyay 116,029 bukaan, kuwaas oo 25 boqolkiiba ay yihiin dadka dhimirka ka jiran ah, sida la ogaaday.
data.tir: ስርሑ ካብ ዝጅምር ካብ 2017 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣትሒዙ ን 116,029 ሕሙማን ግልጋሎት ጥዕና ዝሃበ እንትኾን ካብ እዚኦም እቶም 25 ሚእታዊ ሕሙማን ኣእምሮ ከምዝኾኑ ተፈሊጡ።

data.eng: A cornerstone has been laid today, to build the Ethiopia’s first specialized cardiac care center in the capital at a cost of 40 million Euro.
data.aaf: Ukumaxxa talqo Dafeyeh, 40 Miyoonih Awqentih Urot Qimboh Baxsale Afaqado baxi Biyakih Caharih Fanteena Itiyyobiyah Qasimal Xuisimuh.
data.amh: በመዲናዋ የኢትዮጵያን የመጀመሪያ ልዩ የልብ ህክምና ማዕከል በ40 ሚሊዮን ዩሮ ወጪ ለመገንባት ዛሬ የመሰረት ድንጋይ ተጥሏል።
data.orm: Giddugala Ispeeshaalitii waldhaansa onnee isa jalqabaa Itoopiyaa magaala guddittii keessatti baasii Yuuroo miliyoona 40'n ijaaruuf har'a dhagaan bu'uura kahame.
data.som: Waxaa maanta la dhagax dhigay dhismaha xaruntii ugu horaysay ee lagu daryeelo wadnaha ee Itoobiya oo ay ku baxayso 40 milyan oo Yuuro.
data.tir: እቲ ህንፀቱ 40 ሚልዮን ዩሮ ዝውድእ ፈላማይ ፍሉይ ማእኸል ክንክን ልቢ ሎሚ መዓልቲ እምነ ኩርናዕ ተነቢሩሉ።

data.eng: Minister of Health, Dr. Amir Aman and The Netherland’s Ambassador to Ethiopia, Bengt Van Loosdrecht have laid the cornerstone to build the cardiac care center at Black Lion hospital.
data.aaf: Qafiyat Malaak , Dr Amir Aman Kee Nezerlaxih Ambasaxer Bengt Van Loosxrechet Dafesenih Ukumaxxa Afaqado baxi Biyakih Caharih Fanteena Datta Lubakih Hosbitalih Addal.
data.amh: የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ዶ/ር አሚር አማን እና በኢትዮጵያ የኔዘርላንድ አምባሳደር ቤን ግቫን ሉስሬት በጥቁር አንበሳ ሆስፒታል የልብ ህክምና ማዕከልን ለመገንባት የመሰረት ድንጋይ አስቀምጠዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Fayyaa, Dr. Amiir Amaanii fi Itoopiyaatti Ambassadarri Neezerlaand, Beengit Vaan Loosdirecht, giddugalicah waldhaansa Onnee Hospitaala Leenca Gurraachaatti ijaaruuf dhagaa bu'uuraa ka'an.
data.som: Wasiirka Caafimaadka Dr. Amir Aman iyo Safiirka Netherlands u fadhiya Itoobiya, Bengt Van Loosdrecht ayaa dhagax dhigay dhismaha xarunta daryeelka wadnaha ee dhakhtarka Black Lion.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ ውሽጢ ጥቁር ኣንበሳ ሆስፒታል ዝህነፅ ማእኸል ክንክን ልቢ እምነ ኩርናዕ ዘንበሩሉ ሚኒስትር ጥዕና ዶክተር ኣሚር ኣማንን ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣምባሳደር ኔዘርላንድስ ቤንግት ቫን ሉስድሬችን ብሓባር እዮም።

data.eng: Gudaf Tsegay broke the women’s world record for the indoor 1500 metres on Tuesday after posting a time of three minutes, 53.09 seconds during a meeting in Lievin, France.
data.aaf: Guxxaf segay talaatah ayro faransayak livan magaalal gexsite koboxul sidooca Minit kee 53.09 Sekonxil culak saymarak baad caddoh record buxah addal 1500 mitir tiggile.
data.amh: ጉዳፍ ጸጋይ ማክሰኞ እለት በፈረንሳይ ሊቪን በተካሄደው ውድድር ላይ ሶስት ደቂቃ ከ53.09 ሰከንድ በመግባት የሴቶችን የቤት ውስጥ የ1500 ሜትር ክብረወሰን ሰበረች።
data.orm: Gudaaf Tseeggay rikoordii adunyaa dorgommii dubartoota mana keessaa meetira 1500 Kibxata yeroo daqiiqa sadii erga maxxanfameen booda cabsiteetti, sekondii 53.09 yeroo walga'ii Liiven, Faransaayitti.
data.som: Gudaf Tsegay ayaa jabisay horyaalka dumarka aduunka ee orodka 1500 ee mitir Talaadadii ka dib markii ay soo dhigtay 3 daqiiqo iyo 53.09 ilbidhikhsi kulan ka dhacay magaalada Lievin ee dalka France.
data.tir: ጉዳፍ ፀጋይ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሉስ ኣብ ሊየቫ፣ ፈረንሳይ ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ናይ 1500 ሜትሮ ቅድድም ጉያ ውሽጢ ገዛ ብ3 ደቓይቕ 59 ሰከንድን 9 ካልኢትን ብምእታው ብደቀንስትዮ ተታሒዙ ዝነበረ ክብረ ወሰን ዓለም ሰቢራ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Tsegay beat by more than two seconds the previous record set by her compatriot Genzebe Dibaba in Karlsruhe in 2014.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiah baxa segay 2014 karlsruheil duma wo baaxol genzebe Xibaba tuskutube record namma minitik dagal teyse.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያዊቷ ፀጋይ በ2014 የአገሯ ልጅ ገንዘቤ ዲባባበካርልስሩ ያስመዘገበችውን ሪከርድ ከሁለት ሰከንድ በላይ በማሻሻል አሸንፋለች።
data.orm: Lammiin Itoophiyaa Tseggay rikoordii michuu ishee Ganzabee Dibaabaatin Kaarlisruheetti 2014ttin ta'e sekoondii lamaan caaluun mooteetti.
data.som: Tsegay Itobiyanka ah ayaa kaga guulaysatay in ka badan laba ilbiriqsi horyaalka hore ee ay dhigatay gabadha ay isku dhalashada yihiin ee Genzebe Dibaba ee Karlsruhe 2014kii.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያዊት ጉዳፍ ፀጋይ ቅድም ክብል ብጓል ሃገራ ገንዘቤ ዲባባ ብ2014 ኣብ ካርልስሩሄ ንዘመዝገበቶ ሰዓት ክብረ ወሰን ብልዕሊ ክልተ ሰከንድ ኣመሓይሻቶ።

data.eng: “I’m very happy to set a world indoor record. I have been training really hard and I set myself a target to break the world indoor record,” Gudaf Tsegay told the World Athletics website.
data.aaf: baad caddok buxah addih record uskutubemih kaxxam ruffa exce,kaxxam digga exceh baritak geytimam kee baadak buxah caddoh record aggiluh qalaama kah heeh suge axcuk guxxafa segay baadak athletikis guubul qaddosse.
data.amh: “የአለም የቤት ውስጥ ሪከርድ በማስመዝገቤ በጣም ደስተኛ ነኝ። በጣም ጠንክሬ ተለማምጃለሁ እናም የአለምን የቤት ውስጥ ክብረ ወሰን ለመስበር አልሜ ነበር።” ስትል ጉዳፍ ጸጋይ ለአለም አትሌቲክስ ድረ-ገጽ ተናግራለች።
data.orm: "ikoordii dorgommii mana keessa adunyaa fudhachuukoof hedduun gammadee jira. Ciminaan shaakalaan ture fi ofiikoo rikoordii dorgomii mana keessa adunyaa cabsuuf of qopheessan ture," jechuun Gudaaf Teggay toora marsariitii Atileetiksii Adunyaatti himteetti.
data.som: "Aad ayaan ugu faraxsanahay inaan dhigo horyaalka gudaha adduunka. Runtii aad ayaan u tababaranayay, waxaanan naftayda ka dhigay bartilmaameed si aan u jabiyo horyaalka gudaha ee adduunka,” Gudaf Tsegay ayaa u sheegtay mareegta ciyaaraha fudud ee Adduunka.
data.tir: ብቅድድም ጉያ ውሽጢ ገዛ ክብረ ወሰን ዓለም ምምዝጋበይ ኣእዚየ ሕጉስቲ እየ። ብርቱዕ ልምምድ ክገብር ፀኒሐ እየ። ብቕድድም ውሽጢ ገዛ ክብረ ወሰን ዓለም ንምስባር ዓሊመ እውን ነይረ” ብምባል ጉዳፍ ንድረ ገፅ ኣትሌቲክስ ዓለም ገሊፃ።

data.eng: Athlete Lena Hailu also won the French Indoor Championships in the 3000 meter while Athlete Habtam Alemu finished second in the French 800 meter.
data.aaf: athlet lena haylu 3000 mitir faransayak buxah addih shampionul aysuuk athlet habtam alemu faransayak 800 mitiril nammeyhaytu akkuk gabakalte.
data.amh: አትሌት ሌና ሀይሉ በ3000 ሜትር የፈረንሳይ የቤት ውስጥ ሻምፒዮና አሸናፊ ስትሆን አትሌት ሀብታም አለሙ በፈረንሳይ 800 ሜትር ሁለተኛ ሆና አጠናቃለች።
data.orm: Atileet Liinaa Hayiluu shaampiyoonaa mana keessaa Faransaay meetira 3000 yeroo Atileet Habtam Alamuu dorgomicha irratti meetira 800tiin lammaffaa baatetti injifatteetti.
data.som: Orodyahanada Lena Hailu ayaa sidoo kale ku guuleysatay Horyaalada gudaha ee Faransiiska ee 3000 mitir halka Oradyahan Habtam Alemu uu ku dhameystay kaalinta labaad ee 800 mitir ee Faransiiska.
data.tir: ኣትሌት ሌና ሃይሉ እውን ኣብቲ ናይ ፈረንሳይ ናይ 3000 ሜትሮ ቅድድም ጉያ ውሽጢ ገዛ ዝተዓወተት ኮይና ኣትሌት ሃብታም ኣለሙ ብወገኑ ብ800 ሜትሮ ካልኣይ ወፂኡ።

data.eng: The first Great Ethiopian Run in North America is scheduled to take place in Minnesota, USA, on the 4th of July 2020.
data.aaf: Kilbatti ameerikal gexsittuwayta qimboh addah itiyoppiyak nabah yan Erdi minnesota USA ditelik 4 sanat 2020 gesitele
data.amh: የመጀመሪያው የሰሜን አሜሪካ ታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በሚኒሶታ ዩኤስኤ ሃምሌ 4 ቀን 2020 ሊደረግ ነው።
data.orm: Fiigichi guddicha Itoophiyaa Ameerikaa Kaabaatti yeroo jalqabaatiif Minisootaa, Ameerikaa, Adoolessa 4ffaa 2020tti gaggeffamuuf beellamame.
data.som: Orodkii ugu horeeyay ee Great Ethiopian ayaa dhici doona Waqooyiga Maraykanka, ayaa loo qorsheeyay inuu ka dhaco Minnesota, USA, 4ta Luulyo 2020.
data.tir: ዓብዪ ጉያ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካ ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ኣብ መፃኢ 4 ጁላይ 2020 ኣብ ሚኒሶታ፣ ኣሜሪካ ንምክያድ ተተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The Great Ethiopian Run scheduled to take place for the first time outside Africa is also the 1st edition in the US.
data.aaf: Qimboh addah afrikak iroh aboonuh ekraariseenih yanin itiyoppiyak nabah yan Erdih qalayli 1 haytoh addah ameerika.
data.amh: ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ከአፍሪካ ውጪ ሊደረግ የታቀደው የታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በአሜሪካም ሲካሄድ የመጀመሪያው ነው።
data.orm: Figichi Guddichi Itoophiyaa yeroo jalqabaatiif Afiriikaa alatti tasifamuuf beellamame akkasumas Ameerikaa keessatti marsaa jalqabaati.
data.som: Orodka weyn ee Itoobiya oo la qorsheeyay inuu markii ugu horeysay ka dhaco meel ka baxsan Afrika ayaa sidoo kale ah daabacaaddii 1 aad ee Mareykanka.
data.tir: ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ካብ ኣፍሪካ ወፃኢ ዝካየድ ዓብዪ ጉያ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ እውን ፈላማይ እዩ።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Great Ethiopian Run General Manager Ermias Ayele said preparations are being finalized to celebrate the event together with the Ethiopian Diaspora residing in USA and around the world.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak nabah yan erdak taama gexseeni Irmiyas Ayyale iziyah yece yaabal iyyeemih ameerika kee inkih yan baadal tan itiyoppiyah xiyaspoora lluk cattimak qiid yassakaxxonuh bcitte abak geytiman.
data.amh: የታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ ዋና ስራ አስኪያጅ ኤርሚያስ አየለ ለኢዜአ በሰጡት ልዩ ቃለ ምልልስ በአሜሪካ እና በአለም ዙሪያ ከሚኖሩ ኢትዮጵያውያን ዳያስፖራዎች ጋር በመሆን በዓሉን ለማክበር ዝግጅት እየተጠናቀቀ ነው።
data.orm: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliin taasifameen, Hogganaa Olaanaan Figicha Guddaa Itoophiyaa Ayyaleen ta'icha waliin Diyaaspoora Itoophiyaa Ameerikaa fi naannawaa ishee jiraatu waliin kabajuuf qophiin xumuramaa jira jedhe.
data.som: Maamulaha guud ee orododka weyn ee Itobiya Ermias Ayele oo waraysi gaar ah siiyay ENA ayaa sheegay in loo diyaar garoobayo sidii loogu dabaal degi lahaa xafladan si wada jir ah qurbajoogta Itobiya ee degan USA iyo daafaha caalamka.
data.tir: ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ዓብዪ ጉያ ኢትዮጵያ ኤርሚያስ ኣየለ ምስ ኣገልግሎት ዜና ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝገበርዎ ቃለመጠይቕ ከምዝገለፅዎ ንቲ ፍፃመ ኣብ ኣሜሪካ ኢሉ እውን ኣብ ሙሉእ ዓለም ምስ ዝርከቡ ዲያስፖራ ኢትዮጵያውያን ንምኽባር ምድላዋት እናተዛዘመ እዩ።

data.eng: The International Federation of Association Football (FIFA) will hold its 70th congress in Addis Ababa next year.
data.aaf: Baadak ibi koqosoh egla (FIFA) 70 heele ciggila sanat addis ababal gexsitele
data.amh: የአለም አቀፉ የእግር ኳስ ማህበር (ፊፋ) 70ኛ ጉባኤውን በሚቀጥለው አመት በአዲስ አበባ ያካሂዳል።
data.orm: Federeshiniin Waldaa Kubbaa Miilaa Adunyaa(FIFA)'n konngirasii isaa 70ffaa bara dhufuu Finfinneetti gaggeessa.
data.som: Fadareeshinka Caalamiga ah ee Kubadda Cagta (FIFA) ayaa shirweynihiisii 70 aad ku qaban doona Addis Ababa sanadka soo socda.
data.tir: ዓለምለኸ ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ (ፊፋ) መበል 70 ጉባኤኡ ኣብ ዝመፅእ ዘሎ ዓመት ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ከካይድ እዩ።

data.eng: The FIFA Congress, the most-critical gathering of international football’s governing body, used to assemble every two years.
data.aaf: FIFA congress kulli namma sanatak yakke kobox baad caddok ibi koqoshoh xiinissol kaxxam muhummik yan koboxu
data.amh: የዓለም አቀፍ የእግር ኳስ አስተዳዳሪ አካል እጅግ ወሳኝ የሆነው የፊፋ ኮንግረስ በየሁለት ዓመቱ ይሰበሰብ ነበር።
data.orm: Kongirasiin FIFA, walitti qabama baayyee barbaachisaa qaamolee kubbaa miilaa hoggananii adunyaa, wagga lama lamaan ta'a ture.
data.som: Koongareeska FIFA, oo ah kulanka ugu muhiimsan ee maamulka kubbadda cagta caalamiga ah, ayaa la kulmi jiray labadii sanaba mar.
data.tir: ጉባኤ ፊፋ ናይቲ ንጉዳያት ፀወታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ዓለም ዘመሓድር ኣካል ወሳኒ ኣኼባ እንትዀውን በብክልተ ዓመቱ ክካየድ ፀኒሑ እዩ።

data.eng: According to chief of staff of the African Union chairperson, Ambassador Abdoulaye Diop the next congress will take place at the AU’s headquarters in Addis Ababa in May 2020.
data.aaf: Au Afrikah Eglak saqal ambasadder abdoulaye Diopih elle qaddosennalaay ciggiila kongerass laqin alsak 2020 addis ababal geytima afrikah inkittiinoh eglak kutbeh buxal gexsitelem qaddose.
data.amh: የአፍሪካ ህብረት ሊቀመንበር አምባሳደር አብዱላዬ ዲዮፕ እንደገለፁት ቀጣዩ ኮንግረስ በግንቦት 2020 በአዲስ አበባ በሚገኘው የአፍሪካ ህብረት ዋና ፅህፈት ቤት ይካሄዳል።
data.orm: Akka dura ta'aa dura bu'oota Gamtaa Afiriikaa Ambaasaaddar Abdolaayee Diyoop'tti kongirasiin itti aanuu Caamsaa 2020tti Finfineetti teessoo AU'tti ta'a.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigtay madaxa shaqaalaha ee guddoomiyaha Midowga Afrika, Ambassador Abdoulaye Diop shirweynaha soo socda ayaa ka dhici doona xarunta AU ee Addis Ababa May 2020.
data.tir: ሓላፊ ቤት ፅሕፈት ኣቦ መንበር ሕብረት ኣፍሪካ ዓብዱላዬ ዲዮፕ ከምዝገለፅዎ እቲ ጉባኤ ኣብ መፃኢ ሜይ 2020 ኣብ ዋና ቤት ፅሕፈት እቲ ሕብረት ክካየድ እዩ።

data.eng: This year’s 18th Great Ethiopian Run has grown to become a major street festival in Africa attracting thousands locals and foreign tourists every year.
data.aaf: Asanatah 18 hayto kaxxa erdi afrikak nabah yan shariiqal festival akkuk alaafaatal loowimta baaxoh adda kee iro baaxoh turustitte hirigtam akkele.
data.amh: የዘንድሮው 18ኛው ታላቁ ሩጫ በኢትዮጵያ በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ታላቅ የጎዳና ላይ ፌስቲቫል በመሆን በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ የሀገር ውስጥ እና የውጭ ሀገር ቱሪስቶችን የሚስብ ነው።
data.orm: Fiigichi Guddaan Itoophiyaa 18ffaan bara kanaa wagga waggaan jiraattootaa fi tuuristoota biyya alaa kumaataman lakkawaaman harkisuun Afiriikaa keessatti feestivaala daandii irraa isa guddicha gara ta'uutti guddatee jira.
data.som: Orodkii 18 aad ee Itoobiya ayaa sanadkan noqday mid aad u weyn oo ka dhaca qaaradda Afrika oo ay sanad walba soo jiitaan kumanaan qof oo gudaha iyo dibadda ah.
data.tir: ኣብዚ ዓመት ዝተኻየደ መበል 18 ዓብዪ ጉያ ኢትዮጵያ በብዓመቱ ኣሽሓት ደቂ ሀገርን ዑደተኛታት ወፃኢ ሃገርን ዝስሕብ ኣውራ በዓል ጎደና ኣፍሪካ ናብ ምዃን ተሰጋጊሩ ኣሎ።

data.eng: On today, thousands people have taken to the streets of Addis Ababa to take part in Africa’s biggest road race, a challenging 10km run at 10,000ft above sea level.
data.aaf: Asaaku afrikak nabah tan shaariiqah erdal alaafaatal loowimta maritte addis ababah shaariqal akah yewqen Sissik Erdi 10 Kilo Mitirih Erdal 10000 Kabella baadak Dagal
data.amh: ዛሬ በአዲስ አበባ ጎዳናዎች በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች ከባህር ጠለል በላይ በ10,000 ጫማ ርቀት በ10 ኪሎ ሜትር ፈታኝ በሆነው የአፍሪካ ትልቁ የጎዳና ላይ ውድድር ላይ ለመሳተፍ ወጥተዋል።
data.orm: Har'a irratti, uummatni kumaan lakkaawwaman gara daandiiwwan Finfinneetti dorgommii daandiirra guddicha Afiriikaa fiigicha rakkisaa 10km sirrii irra galaanaa irraa faana 10,000 irratti argamu irratti qooda fudhachuuf deemaniiru.
data.som: Maanta, kumannaan qof ayaa isugu soo baxay waddooyinka Addis Ababa si ay uga qaybgalaan tartanka ugu weyn qaaradda Afrika ee waddooyinka, orod wayn oo 10km ah oo 10,000ft ka sarreeya cabirka badda.
data.tir: ሎሚ ኣብቲ 10 ሽሕ ጫማ ልዕሊ ፀፍሒ ባሕሪ ኣብ ዝካየድን 10 ኪሎ ሜትሮ ኣብ ዝሽፍንን በዳሂ ዝዓበየ ጉያ ጎደና ኣፍሪካ ንምስታፍ ብኣሽሓት ዝቑፀሩ ሰባት ናብ ጎደናታት ኣዲስ ኣበባ ውሒዞም።

data.eng: On the day, a huge variety of runners from all age groups and fitness levels participated, it was indicated.
data.aaf: Too saaku baxabaxsalekarmat tan butta kee xagar duddih caddok tewqe kaxxam mango erdaabeenit edde tengele.
data.amh: በእለቱ በተለያየ የእድሜ ክልል እና የአካል ብቃት ደረጃ የሚገኙ እጅግ በጣም ብዙ አይነት ሯጮች መሳተፋቸው ተጠቁሟል።
data.orm: Guyyicha irratti, gartuun fiigdotaa baayyee olaanaa garee umurii hundaa fi gahumsa qaamaa sadarkaa hunda hirmaataniiru, jedhamuun ka'ameera.
data.som: Maalintaas, orodyahanno aad u tiro badan oo ka kala socda kooxaha da' kasta iyo heerarka jirdhiska ayaa ka qaybqaatay, waa la tilmaamay.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ዕለት ካብ ኩሉ ዕድመን ብርኪ ብቕዓትን ዝተዋፅኡ ዝተፈላለዩ ጎየይቲ ከምዝተሳተፉ ተሓቢሩ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian National Football Team has qualified for the Africa Cup of Nations (CAF) today.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Agatak Ibi Koqosoh Dokon Asaaku Afrikah Kaas Nations (CFA)Tatureenim Diggooseenih.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ብሔራዊ ቡድን ዛሬ ለአፍሪካ ዋንጫ (ካፍ) ማለፉን አረጋግጧል።
data.orm: Har'a Gareen Kubbaa miilaa Biyyoolessaa Itoophiyaa Waancaa Biyyoota Afiriikaatif(CAF) darbe.
data.som: Xulka Kubadda Cagta ee Itoobiya ayaa maanta u soo baxay Koobka Qaramada Afrika ee CAF.
data.tir: ሃገራዊት ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ ሎሚ ናብ ግጥም ፅዋዕ ኣፍሪካ ሓሊፋ።

data.eng: Ethiopia qualified for CAF after the match between Niger and Madagascar ended in a draw, while Cote d’Ivoire beat Ethiopia 3 to 1.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiya niger kee madagascar fanat tekke digiritte inki gideh gaba kalewak kaafah taturtemik muluytewak Kotdevar etyoppiyak 3 kee 1 teyse
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ በኒጀር እና ማዳጋስካር መካከል የተደረገው ጨዋታ በአቻ ውጤት በመጠናቀቁ ወደ ካፍ ስታልፍ፤ ኮትዲቯር ኢትዮጵያን 3 ለ 1 አሸንፋለች።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan CAF'dhaaf taphni Nijeer fi Madagaaskaar gidduu walqixaan erga dhumeen booda osooma Ayivorikost Itoophiaa 3 fi 1 mootee jirtuu dabarte.
data.som: Itobiya ayaa u soo baxday CAF kadib ciyaartii dhex martay Niger iyo Madagaskar oo ku dhamaatay barbaro, halka Cote d’Ivoire ay 3 iyo 1 kaga guulaysatay Itobiya.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ናብ ግጥም ፅዋዕ ኣፍሪካ ዝሓለፈት ግጥም ኒጄርን ማዳጋስካርን ብማዕረ ውፅኢት ድሕሪ ምፍልላየን ኰይኑ ኮት ዲቭዋ ድማ ንኢትዮጵያ 3 ብ 1 ስዒራታ።

data.eng: Letesenbet smashed the world record at the Valencia Half Marathon Trinidad Alfonso EDP, clocking 1:02:52 on her debut at the distance at the World Athletics Elite Label road race on Sunday.
data.aaf: Lettesenbet acaadah baad athletikisik elite label shaariq erdal 1:02:52 tekke saaqatat xexxar valencia qaxi maratahon trinidad alfonso EDP baad caddoh record tiggile.
data.amh: ለተሰንበት በቫሌንሲያ የግማሽ ማራቶን ትሪኒዳድ አልፎንሶ ኢዴፒ 1፡02፡52 በሆነ ሰአት በዚህ ርቀት የመጀመርያዋ በሆነው እሁድ እለት በተካሄደው የአለም አትሌቲክስ ኢሊት ሌብል የጎዳና ላይ ውድድር የአለም ክብረወሰንን ሰብራለች።
data.orm: Letesanbat rikoordii adunyaa dorgommii walakkaa Maaraatonii Vaalenshiyaa Tiriindaad Alfoonsoo EDPtti, galmee 1:02:52 jalqaba ishee irratti fageenya Atileetiksii figicha karaa irraa Ilaayit Label Sanbataa galmeessun cabsiteetti.
data.som: Letesenbet ayaa jebisay horyaalka adduunka ee Valencia Half Marathon Trinidad Alfonso EDP, saacada 1:02:52 kulankeedii ugu horeeyay ee masaafada ay ka dhacday tartanka orodka wadada Elite Label ee ciyaaraha fudud Axadii.
data.tir: ለተሰንበት ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰንበት ኣብ ቫሌንሲያ ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ውድድር ፍርቂ ማራቶን ትሪኒዳድ ኣልፎንሶ ብሓደ ሰዓት ክልተ ደቓይቕን 52 ሰከንድን ብምእታው ክብረ ወሰን ዓለም ዝሰበረት ኰይና ብቲ ርሕቐት ጉያ ጎደና ኤሊት ሌበል ኣትሌቲክስ ዓለም እናተብሃለ ናይ ዝፅዋዕ ቅድድም ብልጫ ሒዛ።

data.eng: Competing in the same Spanish city where she broke the world 5000m record last year, Gidey took more than a minute off the previous mark of 1:04:02 set by world marathon champion Ruth Chepngetich earlier this year.
data.aaf: Tatre sanat baadak 5000 mitirih record edde tiggilem ta speen magalal qalalte gidey baad maaraatoonuk champion ruth chepangrtich asanat qimbo akkuk gabakltewak 1:04:02 teysewak inki minitiik daga teetik beyte.
data.amh: ባለፈው አመት የአለምን የ5000ሜ. ሪከርድ በሰበረችበት በዚሁ የስፔን ከተማ የተወዳደረችው ግደይ የበፊቱን በአለም የማራቶን ሻምፒዮና ሩት ቼፕንገቲች በዚህ አመት መጀመርያ የተመዘገበውን 1፡04፡02 ነጥብ ከአንድ ደቂቃ በላይ አሻሽላለች።
data.orm: Magaalaa walfakkaataa Ispeen bakka itti bara darbe rikoordii 5000m cabsitetti dorgomuun, Gidey qabxii yeroo darbee irraa rikoordii 1:04:02 Ruut Cheptingeetiin jalqaba bara darbee irratti taa'ee irra daqiiqa tokko dursiteetti.
data.som: Gidey oo ku tartamaysay isla magaalada Isbaanishka ee ay jabisay horyaalka 5000m ee aduunka sanadkii hore, Gidey ayaa wax ka badan hal daqiiqo ka qaatay horyaalkii hore ee 1:04:02 oo ay dhigatay horyaalka marathon ka aduunka ee Ruth Chepngetich horaantii sanadkan.
data.tir: ግደይ ኣብታ ዓሚ ናይ 5000 ሜትሮ ክብረ ወሰን ዓለም ዝሰበረትላ ከተማ ስፔይን ተወዳዲራ፣ ካብቲ ኣብ መጀመርታታት ሎምዘበን ብሻምፒዮና ማራቶን ዓለም ሩት ቼፕኝጌቲች ተታሒዙ ዝነበረ ሓደ ሰዓት ኣርባዕተ ደቓይቕን 2 ሰከንድን ብልዕሊ ሓደ ደቒቓ ኣመሓይሻቶ።

data.eng: Ethiopian-Israel golfer Asher Iso, without taking anything away from the extraordinary achievements of the other winners this week, has championed Israel Men’s Masters Tournament at the Caesarea Golf Club.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyayti -israailik golfer digiraabe asher iso ayyaaamat kalah tan teyse marittek qajaaibik tan maysoosa hebeltohim beekalah israail labhak master tornamentil kaesarea golfi dokonuk yeyse.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እስራኤላዊው ጎልፍ ተጫዋች አሸር ኢሶ በዚህ ሳምንት ከሌሎቹ አሸናፊዎች አስደናቂ ድሎች ምንም ሳይወስድ የእስራኤል ወንዶች ማስተርስ ቶርናመንትን በሴዛርያ ጎልፍ ክለብ አሸንፏል።
data.orm: Taphataa Goolfii lammii Itoophiyaa fi Isiraa'el Asher Isoo, osoo milkaa'ina aja'ibsiisaa mo'attoota biroo irra hin fudhatiin torbe kana dorgommii maasterii dhiiraa Isiraa'elif kilabii Goolfii Qisaariyaatti shaampiyoona ta'eera.
data.som: Gool dhaliyaha Itoobiya-Israa’iil Asher Iso, isaga oo aan waxba ka soo qaadin guulaha aan caadiga ahayn ee guuleystayaasha kale usbuucan, ayaa ku guuleystey tartanka ragga ee Israel Men’s Masters Tournament ee Naadiga Golf ee Caesarea.
data.tir: ብትውልዲ ኢትዮጵያዊ ዝዀነ እስራኤላዊ ተፃዋቲ ጎልፍ ኣሸር ኣይሶ ኣብዚ ቕነ ናይ ዝተዓወቱ ካልኦት ዕዙዝ ውፅኢታት እንተየህሰሰ ኣብ ክለብ ጎልፍ ቄሳር ናይ ዝተኻየደ ውድድር ማስተር ደቅተባዕትዮ እስራኤል ሻምፒዮና ኰይኑ።

data.eng: Asher, a dedicated staff member of the club, immigrated to Israel from Ethiopia in 1991 and first came to the golf club 27 years ago.
data.aaf: Ta Dokonuk Assakat Afteenah Suge Asher 1991 Ityoppiyak Ila Israili Fanah Gexem Kee Qimboh Addah Golfi Dokon Yemeetem 27 Sanatak Nahara
data.amh: የክለቡ ታማኝ ሰራተኛ የነበረው አሸር በ1991 ከኢትዮጵያ ወደ እስራኤል የተሰደደ ሲሆን ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ወደ ጎልፍ ክለብ የመጣው ከ27 አመት በፊት ነው።
data.orm: Asher, miseensi of kennoon hojjetaa kilabicha, Itoophiyaa gara Isiraa'elitti godanee fi gara kilabii golfiitti waggaa 27 dura dhufe.
data.som: Asher, oo ah xubin ka mid ah shaqaalaha naadiga, ayaa Israel uga soo haajiray Itoobiya 1991 kii, wuxuuna markii ugu horreysay yimid naadiga Golf ka 27 sano ka hor.
data.tir: ውፉይ ሰራሕተኛ እቲ ክለብ ዝዀነ ኣሸር ካብ ኢትዮጵያ ናብ እስራኤል ብ1991 ዝተሰደደ ዀይኑ ናብቲ ክለብ ጎልፍ ዝተፀምበረ ድማ ቅድሚ 27 ዓመት እዩ ነይሩ።

data.eng: In Betking Ethiopia Premier League match, happened in Hawasa, the champions Fasil Kenema beat Hadiya Hosaena 3 to 1.
data.aaf: Betking ityioppiyah premilligik Hawaasa magaalah champion fasil kanama Hadiyya Hosanak 3 kee 1 teyse.
data.amh: በሀዋሳ ከተማ በተካሄደው ቤቲኪንግ ኢትዮጵያ ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ቻምፒዮኑ ፋሲል ከነማ ሀዲያ ሆሳዕናን 3 ለ 1 አሸንፏል።
data.orm: Tapha Pirimeer Liigii Itoophiyaa Betkiing Hawaasaatti ta'etti, shaampiyoononni Faasil Hadiyyaa Hosaanaa 3 fi 1'n injifatan.
data.som: Ciyaartii Betking Itobiya Premier League oo ka dhacday magaalada Hawasa ayaa kooxda Fasil Kenema ee horyaalka difaacanaysa ay 3 iyo 1 kaga badisay Hadiya Hosaena.
data.tir: ኣብ ሃዋሳ ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ፀዋታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ፕሪምየር ሊግ ቤትኪንግ ኢትዮጵያ ሻምፒዮን ፋሲል ከነማ ንጋንታ ሃዲያ ሆሳእና 3 ን 1 ስዒራታ።

data.eng: Fekadu Alemu has got a hat-trick in the game by scoring all the three goals for Fasil Kenema while Baye Gezahegn netted the only goal of Hadya Hosaena.
data.aaf: Tama Digiril Fikaxu Alemu Fasil Kanamah Goolitte Culusem Kee Baye Gezahegn Hadiyya Hosanah Inki Goal Culuse
data.amh: በጨዋታው ፍቃዱ አለሙ ለፋሲል ከነማ ሶስቱንም ጎሎች በማስቆጠር ሀትሪክ ሲሰራ ባዬ ገዛኸኝ ለሀዲያ ሆሳዕና ብቸኛ ጎል አስቆጥሯል።
data.orm: Fikaaduun Alamuu Faasil Kanamaadhaaf galii sadii galchuun hatrikii yoo hojjetu Baayyee Gezzahany ammoo gaalii tokkicha Hadya Hosaa'inaadhaaf galcheera.
data.som: Fekadu Alemu ayaa kulankan saddexley ka dhaliyay kadib markii uu saddexda gool u dhaliyay kooxda Fasil Kenema halka Baye Gezahegn uu dhaliyay goolka kaliya ee uu dhaliyay Hadya Hosaena.
data.tir: ፈቃዱ ኣለሙ ንፋሲል ከነማ ሰለስቲአን ሸቶታት ብምእታው ሃትሪክ ዝሰርሐ እንትዀን ባዬ ገዛኸኝ ድማ ንሃዲያ ሆሳእና ብሕታዊት ሸቶ ኣእቲው።

data.eng: In the league’s closing encounter of the first week, Sebeta Ketema and St. George drew nil.
data.aaf: Tama liigik qimboh ayyaamak alfenti digiril sabbata katama kee kidus gorgis inki gidieh sittak baxsmisen
data.amh: በሊጉ የመጀመሪያ ሳምንት የመዝጊያ ጨዋታ ሰበታ ከተማ እና ቅዱስ ጊዮርጊስ አቻ ተለያይተዋል።
data.orm: Cufaa liigii torbee jalqabaa irratti, Katamaan Sabbataa fi Qulqulluun Goorgisiin qixxee bahanii jiru.
data.som: Xidhitaanka horyaalka ee todobaadkii ugu horeeyay, Sebeta Ketema iyo St. George ayaa bar baro galay.
data.tir: ኣብ መዕፀዊ ቀዳማይ ሰሙን እቲ ሊግ ከተማ ሰበታን ቅዱስ ጊዮርጊስን ባዶ ብባዶ ማዕረ ውፅኢት ተፈላሊዮም።

data.eng: The Ethiopian national anti-doping office said it has begun doping tests on athletes.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyah agatak cayla tacee dawah kutbeh buxa atletwal cayla tace diwah fokkaqo abaanamaay qimbisen.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ብሄራዊ ፀረ-አበረታች መድሃኒት ፅህፈት ቤት በአትሌቶች ላይ የአበረታች መድሃኒት ምርመራ መጀመሩን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Waajjira farra qoricha nama jajjabeessuu Itoophiyaa qorannoo qoricha nama jabeessuu atileetota irratti akka eegale hime.
data.som: Xafiiska heer qaran ee la dagaalanka doping ka ee Itoobiya ayaa sheegay in uu bilaabay tijaabooyin lagu sameeyo ciyaartooyda.
data.tir: ቤት ፅሕፈት ሃገራዊ ፀረ ዘይሕጋዊ መደንፍዒ ጉልበት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣትሌታት ምርመራ ዘይሕጋዊ መደንፍዒ ጉልበት ከምዝጀመረ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: More than 150 elite athletes are undergoing the two-day tests being done in partnership with world athletics integrity unit, it said.
data.aaf: 150 daga takke tamixxige athletwa baadak athletics integrity egla sittallih abak geytimta namma ayroh inticaanittel geytiman.
data.amh: ከ150 በላይ ታዋቂ አትሌቶች ከአለም አትሌቲክስ ኢንቴግሪቲ ዩኒት ጋር በመተባበር ለሁለት ቀናት የሚቆየውን ምርመራ እየወሰዱ ነው ብሏል።
data.orm: Atileetotni gameeyyin 150 ol ta'an qoranno guyyaa lamaa michummaa yuunitii amanamummaa atileetiksii adunyaa waliin gaggeeffamaa jiru irratti hirmaataa jiru, jedhameera.
data.som: In ka badan 150 ciyaartoy oo caan ah ayaa maraya tijaabooyinka labada maalmood ah ee la samaynayo iyada oo lala kaashanayo qaybta daacadnimada ciyaaraha fudud ee adduunka, ayay tidhi.
data.tir: ልዕሊ 150 ምሩፃት ኣትሌታት ኣብቲ ምስ ክፍሊ ምልኣተ ምግባር ኣትሌቲክስ ዓለም ብምትሕብባር ኣብ ዝካየድ ዘሎ መደብ ምርመራ ይግበረሎም ኣሎ።

data.eng: According to EBC, more than 22 Ethiopian experts are taking part in the anti-doping tests.
data.aaf: Cayla tace dawah fokkaaqot 22 yaak daga Takke ityoppiyah mihrat leela edde angaluk geytimtam EBC qaddosse.
data.amh: በጸረ ዶፒንግ ምርመራው ከ22 በላይ ኢትዮጵያውያን ባለሙያዎች በመሳተፍ ላይ መሆናቸውን ኢቢሲ ዘግቧል።
data.orm: Akka EBD'tti, ogeessotni Itoophiyaa 22 ol ta'an qorannoo farra qoricha nama jabeessuu irratti hirmaataa jiru.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigtay EBC, in ka badan 22 khabiir oo Itoobiyaan ah ayaa ka qayb qaadanaya tijaabooyinka ka hortagga doping ka.
data.tir: ኢቢሲ ከምዝገለፆ ኣብዚ ምርመራ ዘይሕጋዊ መደንፍዒ ጉልበት ልዕሊ 22 ኢትዮጵያውያን ክኢላታት ይሳተፉ ኣለው።

data.eng: Hadijah Nandago gave Uganda a 1-0 lead after 26 minutes before skipper Fauzia Najjemba made it 2-0 on 40 minutes when substitute goalkeeper Demelash Banchayehu failed to hold the ball.
data.aaf: 26 Minitiik Lakal Hadijah Nandago Kee Uganda 1-0 Miraacisak Gabakaltewak Fauzia Najjemba 40 Hayto Minitil 2-0 Yekken Wak Milaagenih Culusen Hadaf Wase Demelash Banchayehu Koqoso Xabba heeh Awqekkak Raaqe.
data.amh: ከ26 ደቂቃ በኋላ ሀዲጃ ናንዳጎ ለዩጋንዳ 1-0 መሪነትን ሲሰጥ ተቀይሮ የገባው ግብ ጠባቂ ደመላሽ ባንቻየሁ ኳሷን መያዝ ባለመቻሉ አምበል ፋውዚያ ናጄምባ በ40 ደቂቃ ላይ 2-0 አድርጎታል።
data.orm: Iskipper Fawuziyaan daqiiqaa 40 irratti waqtii manii-eegaan jijjiramee seene Dammallaash Banchayehu kubbaa qabuu hin dandeenyetti 2-0 gochuun dura Hadijah Nandaagoon daqiiqaa 26 booda dursa Yugaandaaf 1-0'n kennee jira.
data.som: Hadijah Nandago ayaa hogaanka u dhiibay Uganda 26’daqiiqo ka dib ka hor inta aysan 2-0 ka dhigin kabtan Fauzia Najjemba 40 daqiiqo markii uu goolhayaha bedelka ku soo galay ee Demelash Banchayehu uu ku guuldareystay inuu kubada qabto.
data.tir: ሃዲያ ናንዳጎ ድሕሪ 26 ደቓይቕ ብዘእተዋ ሸቶ ዩጋንዳ 1 ብ 0 ክትመርሕ ፀኒሓ ኣብ መበል 40 ደቓይቕ ሓላፋይ ፋውዚያ ናጄምባ ንዝወቕዓ ኩዕሶ ተቐይሩ ዝኣተወ ሓላዊ ማዕፆ ደመላሽ ባንቺአየሁ ክሕዛ ብዘይምኽኣሉ 2 ን 0 ኰይነን።

data.eng: After the break, Ethiopia’s Ridet Assrasahang pulled one back on 50 minutes.
data.aaf: Rabbok gaceeniik lakal ityoppiyayti rixet assrashang 50 hayto minitil goal culuse.
data.amh: ከእረፍት መልስ ኢትዮጲያዊው ረድኤት አስረስ በ50ኛው ደቂቃ ጎል አስቆጥሯል።
data.orm: Boqonnaa booda, taphattuun Itoophiyaa Radi'eet Asrassaaheny daqiiqaa 50 irratti goolii tokko galchiteetti.
data.som: Markii layskugu soo laabtay badhkii danbe ee ciyaarta ayuu Ridet Assrasahang ee Itoobiya udhaliyay hal gool 50 daqiiqo markay marayasay
data.tir: ድሕሪ ዕረፍቲ ኢትዮጵያዊ ረድኤት ኣስረሳሀኝ ኣብ መበል 50 ደቓይቕ ሓንቲ ሸቶ ኣመዝጊቡ።

data.eng: Substitute Ariet Odong made it 2-2 after the 78th minutes before the referee sent off Ethiopia’s coach Firew Hailegebral.
data.aaf: Digiril milaagenih culusen Ariet Odangi digirik 78 hayto minitiik lakal 2-2 ken abe mackam ityoppiyah aydakaakanise Firew Hailegebral qasa cartit yayyaaqeemik nahark sugte.
data.amh: በጨዋታው ተቀይሮ የገባው አሪየት ኦዶንግ ዳኛው የኢትዮጵያውን አሰልጣኝ ፍሬው ኃይለገብርኤልን በቀይ ካርድ ከማስወጣቱ በፊት ጨዋታውን ከ78ኛው ደቂቃ በኋላ 2-2 አድርጎታል።
data.orm: Jijjirraan kan seente Ariyeet Odoong daqiiqaa 78 booda abbaan murtii leenjisaa Itoophiaa Fireew Haayilegabreeliin gaggeessuun dura 2-2 goteetti.
data.som: Ariet Odong oo bedel ku soo galay ayaa ciyaarta ka dhigay 2-2 ka dib daqiiqadii 78aad ka hor inta uusan garsooraha ciyaarta ka saarin ciyaarta tababaraha Itoobiya ee Firew Hailegebral.
data.tir: እቲ ዳይና ንኢትዮጵያዊ ዓላሚ ፍሬው ሃይለገብርኤል ቅድሚ ምብራሩ ተቐይሩ ዝኣተወ ኣርየት ኦዶንግ ድሕሪ 78 ደቓይቕ ብዘእተዋ ሸቶ 2 ን 2 ብዝዀነ ውፅኢት ማዕረ ክዀና ገይሩ።

data.eng: But the Ethiopian team did not give up and scored the winning goal through Turist Lema on 82 minutes.
data.aaf: Laakin ityoppiyah dokon niya argiqekal 82 hayto minitil mayso hadaf turusti lemma keenih geysisse.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ቡድን ግን ተስፋ ሳይቆርጥ በ82 ደቂቃ ላይ የድል ጎል በቱሪስት ለማ አስቆጥሯል።
data.orm: Garuu garee Itoophiyaa abdii hin kutanne fi goolii mo'annaa gama Tuurist Lammaatin daqiiqaa 82 irratti galmeessisaniiru.
data.som: Laakin kooxda Itobiya ma ayna quusan, waxaana goolka guusha u dhaliyay Turist Lema daqiiqadii 82aad.
data.tir: ይኹን እምበር ጋንታ ኢትዮጵያ ተስፋ ከይቆረፀት ስለዝተፃወተት ኣብ መበል 82 ደቒቓ ብቱሪስት ለማ ኣቢላ ንዓወት ዘብቀዐታ ሸቶ ኣመዝጊባ።

data.eng: The South African National Football team has arrived in Bahir Dar for FIFA 2022 World Cup Qualifiers match they have tomorrow with their Ethiopian counterpart.
data.aaf: Gabbi Afrikak Agat Dokon FIFA 2022 Baad Kaasih Saffosiyyal Itiyoppiyak Agat Dokon Lih Aboonu Waan Digirih Bahri Xaar Fanah Culen.
data.amh: በፊፋ 2022 የአለም ዋንጫ ማጣሪያ የደቡብ አፍሪካ ብሄራዊ ቡድን ከኢትዮጵያ አቻው ጋር ለሚያደርገው ጨዋታ ባህር ዳር ገብቷል።
data.orm: Gareen biyyalessaa kubbaa miilaa Afrikaa kibbaa tapha calallii waancaa addunyaa FIFA 2022 Gita isaanii Itoophiyaa waliin qaban irratti boru hirmachuuf Baahirdaaar seenan.
data.som: Xulka Qaranka kubada Koonfur Afrika ayaa soo gaaray magaalada Bahir Dar si ay uga qeyb galaan cayaarta isreeb-reebka Koobka Adduunka ee FIFA 2022 oo ay berri la yeelan doonaan dhiggooda dalka Itoobiya.
data.tir: ሃገራዊት ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ኣብ መፃረዪ ግጥም ፅዋዕ ኣፍሪካ 2022 ምስ ናይ ኢትዮጵያ መዘናኣ ንምፅዋት ባህርዳር ኣቲዋ።

data.eng: As goal.com reported a few days ago, their Belgian Coach, Hugo Broos, said that their game with Ethiopia is “crucial.”
data.aaf: Goal.com dagoo ayrooraak naharat elle yiysixxigennah belgem aydakaakanise Hugo bross ityoppiyallih aban digiri "faxxima" digiri iyye,

data.som: Sida goal.com ay qortay maalmo ka hor, Belgian tababarohooda, Hugo Broos, ayaa sheegay in kulanka ay la leeyihiin Itoobiya uu yahay “muhiim”.

data.eng: For much of the race – which doubled as the Ethiopian trials – she churned out 72-second laps before powering home in a final lap of 63 seconds, despite having to weave between other runners, to finish in 29:01.03.
data.aaf: Erda abeenitik taysegaba- ityoppiyal intican uddur mango gaba edde osisem -72 second mermeritil acaluk 63 sekonxil illicabo mermeritik gabakltewak :kalah tan erdaabenitih fanat despite taalleemih ; 29:01:03 gabakalte
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያውያኑ ሲሮጡ በእጥፍ በጨመረው በአብዛኛው የውድድሩ ግዜ – በ72 ሰከንድ ዙሮችን ካጠናቀቀች በኋላ ምንም እንኳን በሌሎች ሯጮች መካከል መሹለክለክ ቢኖርባትም፣ የመጨረሻውን ዙር በ63 ሰከንድ በማጠናቀቅ ውድድሩን በ29፡01.03 ጨርሳለች።
data.orm: Dorgommicha harka caalu - kan yaalii lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa dachaan dabale - seekondii 72 dursitee of humneeessun humneessa sekoondii 63 dura dhiibbaa fiigdota biroo waliin qabaachuun osoo hin ittifamne, 29:01.03tti xumuruuf
data.som: Inta badan tartanka oo laba jibaarmay sida tijaabadii Itoobiya - waxay ku badisay 72 ilbiriqsi ka hor inta ayna ku xoogaysanin guriga iyada oo ku jirta wareeggii ugu dambeeyay ee 63 ilbiriqsi, inkastoo ay ku qasbanaatay inay dhex dhigto orodyahannada kale, si ay ugu dhameysato 29:01.03.
data.tir: ንዝበዝሐ ክፋል እቲ ርሕቐት ንሓደ ዙር ብ72 ሰከንድ ዝጎየየት ኰይና ንሕልኽላኻት ካልኦት ተወዳደርቲ እናሰገረት ምኻድ ግድን ኣብ ዝነበረ ናይ መወዳእታ ዙርያ ግን ብ63 ሰከንድ ብምጉያይ ብ29 ደቒቓ 01 ሰከንድን 03 ካልኢትን ዛዚማ።

data.eng: Following the qualification of the Ethiopian men's national team (Walias) to the 2022 African Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Cameroon after an eight year absence from the tournament, over 500 fans and 25 sports journalists are set to attend the event to be held from January 9 – February 6, 2022 in Cameroon.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Labha Agatih Dokon(Waliyas) 2022 Afrikah Kaasah Butta (AFCON) Taturtemik Amakkaquk Qalaylih Kameeron bacra Sanat Sugteek Lakal 500 daga yakke qokoleenit kee 25 takke xagar dir xaagu qawa edde Angalelem Kee Agda baxissok 9 Ilaa Caxah Alsak 6,2022 Kameeroul
data.amh: ከውድድሩ ከራቁ ስምንት አመታት በኋላ የኢትዮጵያ ወንዶች ብሄራዊ ቡድን (ዋልያዎቹ) ለ2022 የካሜሩን የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ማለፉን ተከትሎ ከ500 በላይ ደጋፊዎች እና 25 የስፖርት ጋዜጠኞች በካሜሩን ጥር 9 - የካቲት 6, 2022 ውስጥ የሚካሄደውን ዝግጅት ሊታደሙ ነው።
data.orm: gareen biiyyaleessa Itiyoophiyaa dhiirotaa (waaliyoonni) waggoota saddeetiif dorgommii irraa hafuun booda dorgommii waancaa biyyoota Afirikaa (AFCON) 2022 kaameeruun kessaaattii qophaa'uuf darbuun isheetiin , ajaa'ibsiifattootni 500 olii fi gaazexessitootni ispoortii 25 qophii gaggeefamuuf jedhu hirmaachuf.
data.som: Ka dib markii ay u soo baxeen Xulka Qaranka Ragga Itoobiya (Walias) oo u soo baxay Koobka Qaramada Afrika ee 2022 (AFCON) ee dalka Cameroon ka dib siddeed sano oo ay ka maqnaayeen tartanka, ayaa lagu wadaa in ay ka soo qaybgalaan in ka badan 500 oo taageereyaal ah iyo 25 wariyeyaal Isboorti ah. laga bilaabo Janaayo 9 - Febraayo 6, 2022, gudaha Cameroon.
data.tir: ዋልያ እናተብሃለት እትፅዋዕ ሃገራዊት ጋንታ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ደቅተባዕትዮ ኢትዮጵያ ድሕሪ ናይ ሸሞንተ ዓመታት ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ኣብ ካሜሩን ናብ ዝካየድ ፅዋዕ ኣፍሪካ 2022 ድሕሪ ምሕላፋ ልዕሊ 500 ደገፍትን 25 ጋዜጠኛታት ስፖርትን ኣብቲ ካብ 1 ክሳብ 29 ጥሪ ኣብ ዝካየድ ግጥም ክሳተፉ እዮም።

data.eng: The Secretary General of the Ethiopian Football Federation (EFF), Bahiru Tilahun, and the owner of Sisay Aderisse Promotion, Sisay Aderisse, held a joint press conference on Tuesday, December 7, 2021 at Sheraton Hotel, where it was stated that fans will be able to attend the event.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Ibi Koqosoh Federationik Naharsi Kutbe Abe Gifta Bahru Tilahun Kee Sisay Aderisse Promotionih Leenayti Gifta Sisay Aderisse Kimali Talaatah Ciggilta Kudok 7 Sanat 2021 Sharaten Hoteelik Sittallih Maybalalaqa Yecen Taicat Tangalem Xiqtam
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ፌዴሬሽን ዋና ጸሃፊ አቶ ባህሩ ጥላሁን እና የሲሳይ አደሪሴ ፕሮሞሽን ባለቤት አቶ ሲሳይ አደሪሴ ማክሰኞ ታህሳስ 7 ቀን 2021 በሸራተን ሆቴል በጋራ በሰጡት ጋዜጣዊ መግለጫ በዝግጅቱ ላይ ደጋፊዎች መገኘት እንደሚችሉ ገልጸዋል።
data.orm: barreessaan olaanaan Federeeshinii kubbaa miila Itiyoophiyaa (EFF) ,Baahiruu Tilaahun, fi abbaan qabeenyaa mana maxxansaa Siisaay Adeerisse,siisaay Aderissee, ibsa gaazexesummaa waliinii kibxata, Mudde 7, 2021 hoteela Shaaratan bakka itti deeggartootni isaa hirmaachuu danda;u jedhametti taasise
data.som: Talaado, Desember 07, 2021 (HOL) Xoghayaha guud ee xidhiidhka kubbadda cagta Itoobiya, Bahiru Tilahun iyo mulkiilaha shirkadda Sisay Aderisse Promotion, Sisay Aderisse, ayaa shir jaraa’id oo ay si wada jir ah ugu qabteen hotel Sheraton, halkaas oo lagu sheegay in taageerayaashu ay si wada jir ah u qabteen. waxay awoodi doonaan inay ka soo qayb galaan xaflada.
data.tir: ዋና ፀሓፊ ፌዴሬሽን ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኢትዮጵያ በሪሁ ጥላሁንን ወናኒ ፕሮሞሽን ሲሳይ ኣደሪሴ ዝዀኑ ሲሳይ ኣደሪሴን ብሰሉስ 7 ዲሴምበር 2021 ደገፍቲ ኩዕሶ ክሳተፉ ኣብ ዝተፈቐደሉ መድረኽ ኣብ ሸራተን ሆቴል ጋዜጣዊ መግለፂ ዝሃቡ እንትዀን ኣብቲ መድረኽ ደገፍቲ ክርከቡ ተፈቒዱ ነይሩ።

data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ማህበር ከጋና ጋር ለሚኖረው የአለም ዋንጫ ማጣሪያ በደቡብ አፍሪካ እንዲደረግ ባቀረበው ጥያቄ መሰረት የጋና እግር ኳስ ማህበር በሚመጡት ሁለት ጨዋታዎች ፍትሃዊ ጨዋታ እንዲኖር ባለፈው አርብ የዓለም እግር ኳስ አስተዳዳሪ አካልን ጠይቋል።
data.orm: waldaan kubbaa miilaa Itiyoophiyaa dorgommii calallii waancaa addunyaa Gaanaa waliin Afirikaa kibbaa kessatti taasisuuf gaaffii dhiheesseen booda Waldaan Kubbaa Miilaa Gaanaa qaamaa kubbaa miilaa adunyaa bulchu jimaata darbe yeroo darban lamaanitti taphni haqa-qabeessi akka ture akka mirkaneessuf gaafatan.
data.som: Kadib codsigii xidhiidhka kubbada cagta Itoobiya ee ahaa in isreebreebka koobka aduunka ay la ciyaari doonaan xulka Ghana ee ka socda dalka Koonfur Afrika, ayaa xidhiidhka kubbada cagta Ghana waxa uu jimcihii la soo dhaafay ka codsaday xidhiidhka kubbada cagta aduunka in ay si cadaalad ah u dhacaan labadii kulan ee u danbeeyay.

data.eng: President of the Ethiopian Olympic Committee (EOC), Ashebir Woldegiorgis (MD), announced that kenenisa Bekele will represent Ethiopia and compete in the coming Tokyo Olympics, scheduled to be held from July 23 to August 8, 2021.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Oiompik Makaadoh Prezdenti (EOC) Ashiber Woldegiorgis (MD) Kenenisa Bekkele Itiyoppiya Awlisak ditelik 23 ilaa ximolik 8 sanat 2021 gexsituwa Tokkiyo Olympikih Qalalelem Yiysixxige
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ኦሊምፒክ ኮሚቴ ፕሬዝዳንት አሸብር ወልደጊዮርጊስ ከሀምሌ 23 እስከ ነሀሴ 8 ቀን 2021 በሚካሄደው የቶኪዮ ኦሊምፒክ ውድድር ላይ ቀነኒሳ በቀለ ኢትዮጵያን ወክሎ እንደሚሳተፍ አስታውቀዋል።
data.orm: Pireezidaantiin koree olompikii Itiyoophiyaa (EOC) Ashabbir waldagiyoorgis (MD) Qananiisaa Baqqalaa Olompikii Tookiyoo Adoolessa 23 hanga Hagayya 8, 2021tti gaggeeffamuuf saganteeffame irratti Itoophiyaa bakka bu'uun akka hirmaatu beeksisan.
data.som: Guddoomiyaha Guddiga Olombikada Itoobiya (EOC), Ashebir Woldegiorgis (MD), ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in Kenenisa Bekele uu u matali doono Itoobiya kana qeyb geli doono ciyaaraha Olombikada Tokyo ee soo socda, oo la qorsheeyay in la qabto 23 ka Luulyo ilaa Ogosto 8, 2021.
data.tir: ፕሬዚደንት ኮሚቴ ኦሎምፒክ ኢትዮጵያ ዶክተር ኣሸብር ወልደጊዮርጊስ ከምዘፍለጡዎ ቀነኒሳ በቀለ ኣብቲ ካብ 23 ጁላይ ክሳብ 8 ኦገስት 2021 ክካየድ ተተሊሙ ዘሎ ኦሎምፒክ ቶክዮ ንኢትዮጰያ ክውክልን ክወዳደርን እዩ።

data.eng: In his comments, Ashebir acknowledged that the Ethiopian Athletics Federation (EAF) has the mandate to select the athletes.
data.aaf: Gifta Ashebir Yece Tummaulul Ityoppiyak Athletikis Federation Athletwa Dooraamih Reeda Leemil Yeemeneh.
data.amh: አቶ አሸብር በሰጡት አስተያየት የኢትዮጵያ አትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽን አትሌቶቹን የመምረጥ ሥልጣን እንዳለው እውቅና ሰጥተዋል።
data.orm: Yaadota isaa keessatti, Ashabir Federeeshinii Atileetiksii Itoophiyaa(EAF) kan ga'e atileetota filuu qabu galateeffatee jira.
data.som: Faalloo, Ashebir ayaa qiray in Federeeshinka Ciyaaraha Fudud ee Itoobiya (EAF) uu u xilsaaran yahay xulashada ciyaartoyda.
data.tir: ኣሸብር ኣብ ዝሃብዎ ርእይቶ ፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ ኢትዮጵያ ንቶም ኣትሌታት ናይ ምሕራይ ሓላፍነት ከምዘለዎ ሓቢሮም።

data.eng: “Passing decision on who makes the cut is the responsibility of the Athletics Federation. Our main demand is to achieve results that will raise the flag of our country. So, we can’t stand by and watch when athletes who have one of the best times are left out of the competition due to improper practices,” Ashebir said.

data.amh: “ማን ማለፍ እንዳለበት መወሰን የአትሌቲክስ ፌዴሬሽን ኃላፊነት ነው። ዋናው ፍላጎታችን የሀገራችንን ሰንደቅ ዓላማ ከፍ የሚያደርግ ውጤት ማስመዝገብ ነው። ስለዚህም ጥሩ ሰአት ያስመዘገቡ አትሌቶች ተገቢ ባልሆኑ ልምምዶች የተነሳ ከውድድር ሲወጡ ቆመን ማየት አንችልም” ብለዋል አሸብር።
data.orm: "Murteen eenyutu fiiga jedhuu irratti dabarsuun gahee Federeeshinii Atileetiksiiti. Fedhi keenya olaanaan qabxii alaabaa biyya keenyaa olqabu galmessuudha,kanaafu yeroo Atiileetonni kana dura yeroo milkaa'inaa argamsiisanii turan sababa shaakallii dogoggoraan dorgommii keessa hafuu isaanii teenyee hin ilaallu,Ashabbir akka jedhetti
data.som: "Go'aanka ku saabsan cidda goynaysa waa mas'uuliyadda xiriirka ciyaaraha fudud. Dalabkayaga ugu weyn ayaa ah in la gaaro natiijooyin kor u qaadaya calanka dalkeena. Markaa, ma garab istaagi karno oo ma daawan karno marka ciyaartoyga haysta mid ka mid ah waqtiyada ugu wanaagsan ay ka haraan tartanka sababo la xiriira dhaqamo aan sax ahayn,” ayuu yiri Ashebir.
data.tir: "መን ይሳተፍ ኣብ ዝብል ናይምውሳን ሓላፍነት ዘለዎ ፌዴሬሽን ኣትሌቲክስ እዩ። ቀንዲ ድልየትና ባንዴራ ሃገርና ሓፍ ዘብል ውፅኢት ምምዝጋብ እዩ። ብምዃኑ ዝበለፀ ሰዓት ዘለዎም ኣትሌታትና ብሰንኪ ግጉይ ኣሰራርሓ ካብቲ ውድድር ክወፁ እንትግበር ሱቕ ኢልና ኣይንርእይን"ኣይንርእይን ይብሉ ኣሸብር።

data.eng: Yonas Kinde, 39, who competed at the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics, has been training this week with a university athletics team in Tokorozawa, near Tokyo, after receiving an invitation from Tokyo Marathon organizers to run in the elite division of the race.

data.amh: በ2016 የሪዮ ዴጄኔሮ ኦሊምፒክ የተሳተፈው የ39 አመቱ ዮናስ ክንዴ በቶኪዮ ማራቶን አዘጋጆች በታዋቂ ሯጮች ክፍል እንዲወዳደር ጥሪ ካቀረበለት በኋላ በቶኪዮ አቅራቢያ በሚገኘው ቶኮሮዛዋ ከሚገኘው የዩኒቨርሲቲው የአትሌቲክስ ቡድን ጋር በዚህ ሳምንት ልምምድ ሲሰራ ቆይቷል።
data.orm: Yoonas Kindee,39,kan oloompikii Riyoo Dejeneroo 2016 irrratti hirmaate,Tokorozawaa, naannoo Tookiyoo, qindeessitoota Maaraatoonii Tookiyaa irraa murna gameeyyi dorgommichaa fiiguuf waamicha argachuun booda booda Atileetota Yuuniversitii waliin torbee kana shaakallii eegaleera.
data.som: Yonas Kinde, oo 39 jir ah, kana qayb galay tartankii Rio de Janeiro ee 2016, ayaa todobaadkan tababar la qaadanayay koox ciyaaraha fudud ee jaamacadeed oo ku taal Tokorozawa, oo u dhow Tokyo, ka dib markii uu martiqaad ka helay qabanqaabiyayaasha Marathon ka Tokyo si uu ugu soo baxo qaybta sare ee tartanka.

data.eng: Ethiopian international referee Bamlak Tessema has been selected to officiate at the FIFA U-20 World Cup which is scheduled to be held in Poland from May 23 to June 25 2019.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyayti Baad Caddoh Cakam Bamlak Tesemma Laqin alsak 23 ilaa waysuk 25 sanat 2019 polandil Gexsittuh Ekraarisen FIFA U-20 Baad Kaasa Akah Miraacisaah Doorime'
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያዊው ኢንተርናሽናል ዳኛ ባምላክ ተሰማ ከግንቦት 23 እስከ ሰኔ 25 2019 በፖላንድ ሊካሄድ በተዘጋጀው የፊፋ ከ20 አመት በታች የአለም ዋንጫ እንዲመራ ተመርጧል።
data.orm: Abbaan murtii kubba miilaa idil addunyaa Ityoophiyaa Baamlaak Tesemmaa Poolaanditti Caamsaa 23 hanga Waxabajjii 25 2019 gaggeeffamuuf saganteeffame geggessuuf waancaa addunyaa FIFA U-20'n filataman
data.som: Siidhi wadaha heerka caalami ee dalka Itoobiya Bamlak Tessema ayaa loo doortay inuu dhex dhexaadiyo ciyaaraha kubbada cagta aduunka ee 20 jirada oo lagu wado in lagu qabto dalka Poland inta u dhaxaysa Mayo 23 ilaa 25 Janaayo 2019.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያዊ ዓለምለኻዊ ዳይና ባምላክ ተሰማ ኣብቲ ካብ 23 ሜይ ክሳብ 25 ጁን 2019 ብፊፋ ዝካየድ ዩ-20 እናተብሃለ ዝፅዋዕ ፅዋዕ ዓለም ብዳይነት ከፃውት ተሓርዩ።

data.eng: The FIFA referees committee has selected 27 referees, 42 assistants and 21 video assistants for VAR technology.
data.aaf: FIFAk Cakamitte Makaado VAR Teknologih 27 Cakamittey,42 Cateenitittey Kee 21 Vidiyoh Cateenitiiy Dooren
data.amh: የፊፋ ዳኞች ኮሚቴ 27 ዳኞችን፣ 42 ረዳቶችን እና 21 ለቫር ቴክኖሎጂ የቪዲዮ ረዳቶችን መርጧል።
data.orm: koreen abbootii murtii kubbaa miilaa FIFA abbotii murtii 27,gargaartota 42 fi gargaartota suursagalee 21 tekinooloojii VAR'iif filateera.
data.som: Guddiga siidhi wadayaasha ee FIFA ayaa soo doortay 27 siidhi wade, 42 caawiye, iyo 21 caawiyayaasha muuqaalka ah ee farsamada VAR.
data.tir: ኮሚቴ ዳያኑ ፊፋ 27 ዳያኑ፣ 42 ሓገዝትን 21 ኣብ ቴክኖሎጂ ቪ ኤ ኣር ዘገልግሉ ሓገዝቲ ቪድዮን መሪፁ።

data.eng: The FIFA U-20 World Cup match officials’ capacity building preparation will focus on the wide range of topics, such as their reading of the game and football understanding, teamwork and the importance of obtaining the best position or angle.
data.aaf: FIFA karmak 20 adda tan baadak ibi koqsoh qalaylih catah duddi gablusiyyi hangi elle le ammuntitte dir yakriyeenim kee ibi koqso yafhimeenimiiy butta taama kee ta leh yan manfaqat kee afkan kinni.
data.amh: የፊፋ ከ20 ዓመት በታች የዓለም ዋንጫ ግጥሚያ የባለስልጣናት የአቅም ማጎልበቻ ዝግጅት በተለያዩ ርዕሰ ጉዳዮች ላይ ያተኩራል፤ ለምሳሌ የጨዋታውን ንባብ እና የእግር ኳስ ግንዛቤ ፣ የቡድን ስራ እና የተሻለውን ቦታ ወይም አንግል የማግኘት አስፈላጊነት ላይ።
data.orm: Qophiin ijaarsa dandeettti aanga'oota geepha adunyaa FIFA U-20 mata dureewwan garagaraa irratti xiyyeeffata, isaanis dubbisa taphaa fi hubannoo kubbaa miillaa, hojii garee fi faayidaa bakka yookin kofa gaarii argachuuti.
data.som: U-20ka FIFA ee ciyaaraha aduunka diyaarinta cobcinta awooda masuuliyiinta ciyaaraha waxay diiradda saari doontaa mawduucyo kala duwan, sida akhrintooda ciyaarta iyo fahamka kubbadda cagta, wada shaqayntooda, iyo muhiimadda ay leedahay helitaanka booska ama xagasha ugu fiican.
data.tir: ምድላዋት ህንፀት ዓቕሚ ሰበስልጣን ፅዋዕ ዓለም ፊፋ ዩ-20 ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ኣርእስትታት ዘተኮሩ ዀይኖም ንኣብነት ንቲ ፀዋታ ምግንዛብ፣ ንኩዕሶ ምርዳእ፣ ጋንታዊ ኣሰራርሓን ኣድላይነት ዝበለፀ ቦታ ወይ ኣንጎሎ ምሓዝ ዝብሉ ይርከቡዎም።

data.eng: Ethiopian Premier League Share Company has decided Mekelle 70 Enderta and Fasil Kenema football clubs to participate in the 2020/21 CAF continental club football competitions.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyah Premier League Aksiyon Egla Mekelle 70 Indarta Kee Fasil Kanama Ibi Koqosoh Dokonwa 2020/21 CFA baaxoh Caddoh Dokonwa Ibi Koqosoh Qalaylit Akah Yagalen Innah Faticisen.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ፕሪሚየር ሊግ አክሲዮን ማህበር መቐለ 70 እንደርታ እና ፋሲል ከነማ የእግር ኳስ ክለቦች በ2020/21 የካፍ አህጉራዊ ክለቦች እግር ኳስ ውድድር እንዲሳተፉ ወስኗል።
data.orm: waldaan Aksiyoona Pirimerligii Itiyoophiyaa Maqalee 70 andertaan fi gareen kubbaa miilaa Faasil Kenemaa dorgommii garee kubbaa miilaa ardii CAF 2020/21 irratti akka hirmaatuuf ,murteesse
data.som: Shirkadda saami qaybsiga Premier League ee Itoobiya ayaa go’aamisay kooxaha kubbadda cagta ee Mekelle 70 Enderta iyo Fasil Kenema inay ka qaybgalaan tartamada kubbadda cagta qaaradda ee CAF 2020/21.
data.tir: ማሕበር ኣክሲዮን ክለባት ኩዕሶ እግሪ መቐለ 70 እንደርታን ፋሲል ከነማን ኣብ 2020/21 ኣብ ዝካየድ ክፍለ ዓለማዊ ውድድር ክለባት ኩዕሶ እግሪ ክሳተፋ ኣክስዮን ፕሪምየር ሊግ ኢትዮጵያ ወሲኑ።

data.eng: Accordingly, Mekelle 70 Enderta, champion of the 2011 E.C. (2018/19) Ethiopian Premier League season, will represent Ethiopia in the CAF Champions League.
data.aaf: Tahak Ugutak Mekele 70 Indarta 2011 Heele Liggida (2018/19) Itiyoppiyah premier league Shampio Akkuk CAF Shampionisligi Ityoppiya Awlisak Edde Angalelon.
data.amh: በዚ መሰረት መቐለ 70 እንደርታ የ2011 ዓ.ም (2018/19) የኢትዮጵያ ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ሻምፒዮን በመሆን በካፍ ቻምፒየንስ ሊግ ኢትዮጵያን ወክሎ ይሳተፋል።

data.som: Sidaas darteed, Mekelle 70 Enderta, horyaalka 2011 E.C. (2018/19) xilli ciyaareedka Premier League ee Itoobiya, ayaa matali doontaa Itoobiya CAF Champions League.
data.tir: ብመሰረት እዚ ሻምፒዮና 2018/19 ዝኾነት መቐለ 70 እንደርታ ኣብ መፃኢ ውድድር ፅዋዕ ኩዕሶ እግሪ ኣፍሪካ ንኢትዮጵያ ክትውክል እያ።

data.eng: The 22-year-old has now won her second league title in Europe, with her first the Swedish Elitettan crown in the colours of Kungsbacka DFF in 2018 which she scored three goals in eight games to power her side to the Damallsvenskan for the first time, it stated.
data.aaf: 22 Sanatat Away Awrobbal Nammay Heele Liig Shampion Akkuk Teyseh Sanat 2018 Kungsback DFF Cisittel Inek Haytoh Swedish Elitettan Ayyamti Digiritteh Addal Sidooca Goal Culusak Diiror Qimboh Addah Damallsveskan Fanah Akah Gexannah Xiqsisse Axcuuk Yabte
data.amh: የ 22 ዓመቷ አሁን በአውሮፓ ሁለተኛውን የሊግ ሻምፒዮንነት አሸንፋለች ፣ በ 2018 በኩንግስባካ ዲኤፍኤፍ ቀለሞች የመጀመሪያዋ የስዊድን ኢሊትታን ዘውድ በ 2018 በስምንት ጨዋታዎች ውስጥ ሶስት ግቦችን አስቆጥራ የሷ ቡድን ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ወደ ዳማልስቬንስካን እንዲመራ አስችላለች፤ በማለት ተናግሯል።
data.orm: kan umuriin wagga 22 sun badhaasa Liigii Awurooppaa lammaffa ishee injifatte ,dabalataan gonfoo jalqabaa Swiidish Eletettaan halluu Kunngisbaakaa DFF 2018 goolii sadii taphoota saddeet irratti gama ishee Damaalisveniskanif yeroo jalqabaatiif humneessuun ,ibseera
data.som: 22 sano jirka ayaa haatan ku guuleystay horyaalkeedii labaad ee Yurub, iyadoo markii ugu horeysay ku guuleysatay horyaalka Sweden Elitettan ee midabada Kungsbacka DFF sanadkii 2018 taasoo ay dhalisay seddex gool sideed kulan oo ay ciyaartay si ay ugu awood sheegatay kooxda Damallsvenskan markii ugu horeysay, ayaa lagu yidhi.
data.tir: እታ ጓል 22 ዓመት ኣብ ሊግ ኣውሮፓ ንኻልኣይ ግዜኣ ዝተዓወተት ኰይና እቲ ፈላማይ ዓወታ ኣብ ሸሞንተ ፀዋታታት ሰለስተ ሸቶታት ብምእታው ኢሊቴታን ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ ሽልማት ስዊድን ብ2018 ዝዓተረትሉን ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ናብ ዳማልስቬንካን ዝተሰጋገረትሉን እዩ።

data.eng: Before joining for Melania Bajada’s team, the striker had returned home from Sweden to help Adama City to win its first-ever Ethiopia Women’s Premier League title and won top scorer for the fourth time, scoring 18 goals despite joining in the mid-season.
data.aaf: Hadaf Geysiise Melania Bajadas Dokonut Yagaleemik naharat Swedenik isi baaxo Fanah Adaaruk Axaama Magaala Aydaadul Qimoh Addah Itiyoppiyak Sayyo Premier League Kaas Akah Ugussaah Catem Kee Qalayli Dabaanal Gude Fanah Akah Wadbittannah 18 Goal Lowsiisak 18 Goal Lowsiisak Ferey Heele Addah Kaxxa Goal Culusak Geytime.
data.amh: አጥቂዋ የሜላኒያ ባጃዳ ቡድንን ከመቀላቀሏ በፊት ከስዊድን ወደ ሀገሯ ተመልሳ አዳማ ከተማን በታሪክ የመጀመርያውን የኢትዮጵያ ሴቶች ፕሪምየር ሊግ ዋንጫ እንዲያነሳ በመርዳት እና በውድድር ዘመኑ አጋማሽ ብትቀላቀልም 18 ጎሎችን በማስቆጠር ለአራተኛ ጊዜ ከፍተኛ ግብ አግቢ ሆናለች።
data.orm: Osoo gartuu Melaaniyaa Bajadaas hinseenis dura,taphataan fuula dura Siwiidin irraa Magaalaa Adaamaa gargaaruuf asdeebi'uun Urjii Pirimeer Liigii Dhalaa Itoophiyaa fi walakkaa waqtii taphaatti tapha eegaluu osoo hin dabalatiin goolii galmeessaa tokkoffaa goolii 18 yeroo arfaffaaf mo'achuuf eega.
data.som: Ka hor inta uusan ku biirin kooxda Melania Bajada, weeraryahanka ayaa ka soo laabtay dalka Sweden si uu u caawiyo Adama City si ay ugu guuleysato horyaalkeedii ugu horreeyay abid ee haweenka Premier League ee Itoobiya, waxaana uu ku guuleystay markii afaraad gooldhaliyaha ugu sarreeya, isagoo dhaliyay 18 gool inkastoo uu ku biiray bartamihii xilli ciyaareed ki.
data.tir: እታ ኣጥቃዒት ቅድሚ ናብ ጋንታ ሜላንያ ባጃዳ ምፅምባራ ካብ ስዊድን ናብ ሃገራ ተመሊሳ ከተማ ኣዳማ ፈላማይ ፅዋዕ ፕሪሚየር ሊግ ደቀንስትዮ ኢትዮጵያ ክትዓትር ዝሓገዘት ኰይና ዋላ እኳ ኣብ መፋርቕ እቲ ውድድር እንተተሓወሰት 18 ሸቶታት ብምእታው ንተኸታታሊ 4 ግዜ ብልፅቲ ኣመዝጋቢት ሸቶ ኰይና።

data.eng: The festival opened to local and international filmmakers and film enthusiasts alike at Vamdas Cinema and Entertainment in partnership with the Embassy of Brazil in Addis Ababa and the Association of Black Audiovisual Professionals on Wednesday July 18.
data.aaf: Vamdas sinima kee waane baaxoh adda kee baad caddoh filmi taama kee filmi tassakoote maritteh addis ababak brazil Imbassi kee black audiovisual mihratleela lluk cattimak arbaqah ditelik 18 sanat 2010 heele liggidah.
data.amh: በቫምዳስ ሲኒማ እና ኢንተርቴመንት በአዲስ አበባ የብራዚል ኤምባሲ እና ከጥቁር ኦዲዮቪዥዋል ባለሙያዎች ማህበር ጋር በመተባበር ረቡዕ ሀምሌ 18 ቀን 2010 ዓ.ም. ለሀገር ውስጥ እና አለም አቀፍ ፊልም ሰሪዎች እና የፊልም አድናቂዎች ፌስቲቫል ተዘጋጀ።
data.orm: Feestivaalichi qopheessitoota fiilmii naannoo fi addunyaa fi akkasumas jaallattoota fiilmii Vamdaas Sineemaa fi Interteenimentii Imbasii Biraazil Addis Ababaa keessaa fi Waldaa Ogummaalee Suur-sagalee Gurraachaa waliin tahuun Gaafa Roobii Adoolessa 18 baname.
data.som: Bandhiga ayaa u furmay filim sameeyayaasha deegaanka ah iyo kuwa caalamiga ah iyo dadka kahela aflaanta si isku mid ah Vamdas Cinema and Entertainment oo ay iska kaashadeen Safaarada Brazil ee Addis Ababa iyo Ururka Xirfadlayaasha Maqalka iyo muuqaalka Madow Arbacadii July 18.
data.tir: እቲ ብምትሕብባር ኤምባሲ ብራዚል ኣብ ኣዲስኣበባን ብላክ ኦዶቪዥዋል ፕሮፌሽናልስን ኣብ ቫድማስ ሲኒማን መዘናግዒን ዝተዳለወ ምርኢት ሲኒማ ዓለምለኻዊን ውሽጢ ዓዲን ስራሕቲ ፊልም ብሮቡዕ 18 ሓምለ ተጀሚሩ።

data.eng: The three-day festival kicked off with Carolina, a 2003 short film about the life of black Brazilian author Carolina Maria de Jesus and her struggles with poverty included footage of her increased popularity once her book was published.
data.aaf: Sidooca ayroh festival qimbisem 2003 karolinalluk kinnim kee data barzil author Karolina Maria De Jesus mano kee nagay aniikah abte giclok ux filmih kitab orbissek lakal leh tan kacanu edde tubluuse taswiir edde yan.
data.amh: የሶስት ቀኑ ፌስቲቫል የጀመረው በ2003ቱ አጭር ፊልም ካሮላይና ሲሆን ስለ ጥቁር ብራዚላዊቷ ደራሲ ካሮላይና ማሪያ ዴ ጄሱስ ህይወት እና ከድህነት ጋር ስላደረገችው ትግል መጽሃፏ ከታተመ በኋላ ያላት ተወዳጅነት ያሳየችበትን ምስል ያካትታል።
data.orm: Feestivaalichi guyyaa sadii Kaaroliinaa, fiilmii gabaabaa bara 2003 waa'ee jireenya barreessituu gurraacha lammii Biraazil Mariyaa de Jiisas fi waraabbii ishee erga kitaabni ishee maxxansamee beekamtii ishee dabale dabalatee waldhaansoo ishee hiyyummaa wajjin gooteen jalqabame.
data.som: Bandhiga saddexda maalmood ka ah ayaa lagu bilaabay Carolina, filin gaaban oo 2003 ah oo ku saabsan nolosha qoraaga madow ee Brazil udhalatay ee Carolina Maria de Jesus iyo rafaadkeedii faqriga ayaa waxaa ka mid ahaa muuqaallo muujinaya caannimadeeda oo kordhay markii buuggeeda la daabacay.
data.tir: እቲ ንሰለስተ መዓልቲ ዝፀንሕ ምርኢት ብዛዕባ እታ ፀላም ብራዚላዊት ደራሲት ካሮሊና ማርያ ዴ ጄሱስ ብዝትረኽ ካሮላይና ዘርእስቱ ፊልሚ ዝተጀመረ እንትኾን እቲ ፊልም እታ ደራሲት ካብ ድኽነት ንምንጋፍ ዝገበረቶ ቃልሲን ዳሓር መፅሓፋ ምስተሓተመ ዝረኸበቶ ህዝባዊ ተቐባልነትን ዘመልክቱ ምስሊታት ዘካተተ እዩ።

data.eng: Mulatu Astatke’s trailblazing album, Mulatu of Ethiopia, was officially rereleased on Friday May 19.
data.aaf: Mulatu astatke kattat album mulatu ze itiyoppiya qagitaak jumqaatah may 19 qagitaak ruuben.
data.amh: የሙላቱ አስታጥቄ ፈርቀዳጅ አልበም ሙላቱ ዘ ኢትዮጵያ በድጋሚ አርብ ግንቦት 19 በድጋሚ ተለቀቀ።

data.som: Albumka raadraaca Mulatu Astatke, Mulatuga Itoobiya, ayaa si rasmi ah loo sii daayay Jimcihii May 19 keedii.

data.eng: Recorded in New York, the album from 1972 arrived at a time when Mulatu had begun to master the delicate fusion of styles needed to create Ethio jazz.
data.aaf: Newyorkil qulen album 1972 gufe mulatu ethio jazz bicisuh faxximtah tan delication style agle lowsiisuh qimbiseh yan waktik sugte.
data.amh: በኒውዮርክ የተቀዳው፣ የ1972 አልበሙ የደረሰው ሙላቱ ኢትዮ ጃዝን ለመፍጠር የሚያስፈልጉትን ጥንቃቄ የሚፈልጉ የስታይል ውህደቶችን መቆጣጠር በጀመረበት ወቅት ነበር።
data.orm: Niwu Yoork keessatti kan waraabame, albamichi bara 1972 irraa yeroo Miulaatuun Itiyoo Jaazii uumuuf gosoota muuziqaa sirriitti walitti makuu jalqabe qaqqabe.
data.som: Waxaa lagu duubay New York, albamkan oo laga soo bilaabay 1972 ayaa soo gaadhay waqti uu Mulatu uu bilaabay inuu barto isku dhafka jilicsan ee qaababka loo baahan yahay si loo abuuro Ethio jazz.
data.tir: እቲ ብ1972 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ኒዉዩርክ ዝተቐረፀ ኣልበም ሎሚ ሙላቱ ኣስታጥቄ ዝረቐቁ ስልቲታት ኣዋሃሃዱ ኢትዮ ጃዝ ኣብ ዝማሃዘሉን ኣብ ዝመለኸሉን እዋን እዩ ዕላዊ ኮይኑ።

data.eng: The release of one of the most acclaimed artist Teddy Afro’s album, entitled “Ethiopia,” definitely is one of the stories that “broke the Internet” (went viral) among Ethiopians and the Ethiopian diaspora.
data.aaf: "Itiyoppiya" diqsita Teddy Afroh album kaxxannah yossokooten teddi afroh album doqaysimem nummak ityoppiya kee ityoppiyah diyaspoorah fanal "internet yiggilek" ( vayreih tature) aydaadi inkittu kinni.
data.amh: “ኢትዮጵያ” የተሰኘው የታዋቂው አርቲስት ቴዲ አፍሮ አልበም መመረቁ በእርግጠኝነት በኢትዮጵያውያን እና በኢትዮጵያውያን ዲያስፖራዎች መካከል “ኢንተርኔትን ከሰበረ” (በሰፊው ከተሰራጨ) ታሪክ አንዱ ነው።
data.orm: Gadhiifamuun albamii artistii baayyee jajamu keessaa tokko kan Teedii Afroo, moggaasi isaa "Itoopiyaa," seenaawwan "interneetii cabse" diyaasporaa lammiiwwan Itooopiyaa fi Ertiraa gidduutti (hedduminaan babal'ate) keessaa sirriitti isa tokkodha.
data.som: Siideynta mid ka mid ah albumka fannaanka Teddy Afro ee aad loogu ammaanay, La cinwaan baxay "Itoobiya," xaqiiqdii waa mid ka mid ah sheekooyinka "jabiyey Internetka" (aad loodawaday) dhanka itobiyaanka iyo qurba joogta Itoobiya
data.tir: እቲ ''ኢትዮጵያ'' ብዝብል ርእሲ ተዳሊዉ ዝተፈነወን ካብቶም ውራያት ሓደ ብዝኾነ ብስነጥበባዊ ቴዲ ኣፍሮ ዝተሰርሐን ኣልበም ኢትዮጵያዊያንን ዲያስፖራ ኢትዮጵያዊያንን ኣብ ኢንቴርኔት ዝቀባበልዎ እቲ ዝልዓለ ሙዚቃ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።

data.eng: On the one hand, the song “Ethiopia” was criticized for preaching the grand narrative of Ethiopian nationalism without deconstructing the historical injustice, thereby denying the existence of oppression.
data.aaf: Inki kabuk "ityoppiya" diqsita gadi aydaadi gadli maliino dadalekal,uma xinto sadak ityoppiyah agatiyyo kaxxa saare yaabak saariseh.
data.amh: በአንድ በኩል “ኢትዮጵያ” የተሰኘው ዘፈን ታሪካዊ ኢፍትሃዊነትን ሳያብራራ፣ የጭቆናን መኖር በመካድ የኢትዮጵያዊነት ብሄርተኝነትን ትልቅ ትርክት በመስበክ ተወቅሷል።
data.orm: Karaa biraan, faaruun isaa "Itoopiyaa" jedhu seenessa guddaa sabboonummaa biyaalessaa Itoopiyaa utuu haqa seenaa hin muffin labsuun, jiraaachuu cunqurfamuu gane jedhamee qeeqamaa tureera.
data.som: Dhinaca kale, heesta “Itoobiya” ayaa lagu dhaleeceeyay inay faafisay sheeko balaadhan oo ku saabsan qarannimada Itoobiya iyada oo aan hoos loo dhigin cadaalad darrada taariikhiga ah, taas oo lagu dafirayo jiritaanka dulmiga.
data.tir: ብኻሊእ ገፅ ድማ እቲ ''ኢትዮጵያ'' ብዝብል ርእሲ ዝተፈነወ ሙዚቃ ነቲ ዘይፍትሓዊ መዳይ ታሪኽ ሓቢኡ ነቲ ዝነበረ ጭቆናን ኣድልዎን ብምክሓድ ንዕሙት ኢትዮጵያዊ ብሄርተኝነት ጥራሕ ዝሰብኽ ብምኳኑ ነቐፌታ ቀሪብዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: In his new work entitled "The Massacre of Debre Libanos Ethiopia 1937; the Story of One of Fascism’s Shocking Atrocities", the author yet again presents the events surrounding both the assassination attempt in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia on 19 February 1937, and the reprisal killings and massacre that occurred in the days and months that followed.
data.aaf: Kaatib "debrelibanos itiyoppiyal awrobbah loowok 1937 yekke ambaxiyyay, fascismik xiddo le uma aydaaduy" diqsita ammontal xayyose qusba taama caxah alsak 19 sanat 1937 addis ababah magaalal ytekke sugte qidim gabbatu kee cane rabih caagiida qagisaak xayyose.kee ciggilta ayroora kee alsitte addat yekke sellimiyya.
data.amh: ደራሲው “በደብረ ሊባኖስ ኢትዮጵያ 1937 እልቂት፤ የፋሺዝም አስደንጋጭ የግፍ ታሪክ” በሚል ርዕስ ባዘጋጀው አዲስ ስራ የካቲት 19 ቀን 1937 በአዲስ አበባ ከተማ የተካሄደውን የግድያ ሙከራ እና በቀጣዮቹ ቀናት እና ወራት ውስጥ የተከሰተው እልቂት እና የበቀል ግድያ ታሪክን በድጋሚ አቅርቧል።።
data.orm: Hojii isaa haaraa "Ajjeechaa jumlaa Debire Libaanos Itoopiyaa 1937; seenaa hammeenya Faashistii Nama Naasisu keessaa tokko" jedhamee waamamu keessatti, barreessichi ammas irra deebiin taateewwan yaalii ajjeechaa 19 Guraandhala 1937 Addis Ababaa, Itoopiyaa keessaa, fi ajjeechaawwanii fi ajjeechaa jumlaa ija bahumsaa isa guyyootaa fi ji'oota itti aananii dhufan keessatti tahe dhiyeessa.
data.som: Shaqadiisa cusub ee ciwaankeedu yahay "Xasuuqii Debre Libanos Itoobiya 1937; Sheekadii Mid ka mid ah Xasuuqii Fashiistaha ee naxdinta daraa", ayaa haddana qoraagu mar kale ku soo bandhigayaa dhacdooyinkii ku wareeganaaa isku daygii dil ka ee Addis Ababa, Itoobiya 19kii Febraayo 1937, iyo dilalkii aargoosiga ahaa iyo xasuuqii dhacay maalmihii iyo bilihii xigay.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ''ጭፍጨፋ ደብረ ሊባኖስ ኢትዮጵያ 1937 ሓደ ካብቶም ብፋሽሺታት ዝበፅሐ ዘደንግፅ ጭፍጨፋ'' ብዝብል ርእሲ ዝተሓተመ ሓዱሽ መፅሓፍ እቲ ደራሲ ብ19 የካቲት 1937 ዓ.ም.ፈ ብዛዕባ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ዝተኻየደ ፈተነ ቕትለትን ንዕኡ ስዒቡ ኣብ ዘለዉ መዓልቲታትን ኣዋርሕን ዝተኻየደ መቐተልቲን ጭፍጨፋን ብዝርዝር ኣቕሪብዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: The author in his book presents a traumatic and detailed account of the extent of the massacre, which resulted in the deaths of more than two thousand monks, priests, and local residents at the monastery.

data.tir: ኬንያ ማእኸሉ ዝገበረ ናሁ ሓላፍነቱ ዝተወሰነ ውልቀ ማሕበር ምስ ቱባ መልቲ ሚድያ ዝተብሃለ ኩባንያ ውሽጢ ዓዲ ብምትሕብባር መደባት ተሃድሶ ዘቕርብ ናሁ ቴሌቭዥን ጣብያ ከምዝኸፈተን ፈተነ ፈነወ ከምዝጀመረን ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: The independent satellite channel is currently producing 12 different programmes, incorporating psychology, law, music and drama, the publication reported.
data.aaf: Currik yan satellite channel awayih uddur mesenkacaay,madqaay gada kee ransa edde anuk 12 takke baxabaxsale programitte bicisak geytimam matbaqata qaddose
data.amh: ነፃው የሳተላይት ቻናል በአሁኑ ወቅት ስነ ልቦና፣ ህግ፣ ሙዚቃ እና ድራማን በማካተት 12 የተለያዩ ፕሮግራሞችን እየሰራ መሆኑን ህትመቱ ዘግቧል።
data.orm: Chaanaaliin satalaayitii walabaa kun yeroo ammaa xiinsammuu, seera, muziqaa fi diraamaa dabalachuun sagantaalee garagaraa 12 qopheessaa akka jiru maxxansichi gabaase.
data.som: Kanaalka sateliteka ee madaxbannaan ayaa hadda soo saaraya 12 barnaamij oo kala gadisan, oo ay ku jiraan cilmunafsiga, sharciga, muusikada iyo riwaayadaha, daabacaadda ayaa sheegtay.
data.tir: እቲ ናፃ ጣብያ ሳተላይት ኣብ'ዚ ሐዚ እዋን ስነ-ኣእምሮ፣ ሕጊ፣ ሙዚቃን ድራማን ዘካተቱ 12 ዝተፈላለዩ መደባት እናፍረየ ከምዝኾነ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: This time around however, Festal Tigray was for the first time celebrated colorfully in Mekelle the capital city of Tigray National Regional State.
data.aaf: Laakin ta udduru festal tigray qimboh addah tigray rakakyih doolatak inaytah tan mekelle magaalal laqinuk yessekexxen.
data.amh: በዚህ ጊዜ ግን የፌስቲቫል ትግራይ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ በትግራይ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስት ርዕሰ መዲና መቀሌ በድምቀት ተከብሯል።
data.orm: Haata'u malee, yeroo kana, Feestaal Tigraay yeroo jalqabaaf Maqalee magaalaa guddoo Mootummaa Naannoo Tigraay keessatti haala ho'aa taheen kabajame.
data.som: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, markan, Festal Tigray ayaa markii ugu horeysay si heer sare ah looga xusay magaalada Mekelle ee magaalo madaxda deegaanka Tigray.
data.tir: ኣብዚ ሎሚ ቅነ ምርኢት ትግራይ ንፈለማ ግዜ ኣብ ርእሰ ከተማ ክልል ትግራይ ኣብ መቐለ ብድሙቕ ኣገባብ ተኻይዱ።

data.eng: The festival also included entertainment activities accompanied with musical extravaganza presented by renowned Tigrian musical artists such, as the late kiros Alemayehu and the late Iyasu Berhe and many other new talented musicians as well.
data.aaf: Tama festivalal tamixxigeh tan Tigay gada abeenitiiy raboyta kiros Almayyu kee Raboyta Iyyasu Bereheh gaditte kee kalah mangoh tan qusba agirtah tan gadaaba xayyosseh tan gaddi tretwalluk waane bicitte xayyosen..
data.amh: በፌስቲቫሉ ላይ በታዋቂ የትግርኛ ሙዚቀኛ አርቲስቶች እንደ ሟቹ ኪሮስ አለማየሁ፣ ሟቹ ኢያሱ በርሄ እና ሌሎች በርካታ አዳዲስ ጎበዝ ሙዚቀኞች ከቀረቡ የሙዚቃ ትርኢቶች ጋር በመዝናኛ ዝግጅቶችን አካትቷል።
data.orm: Feestivaalichis hojiilee bashannana muuziqaa bifa hawwatuun artistoota muuziqaa Tigiraayii bebbeekamoo, kanneen akka kabajamoo Kiros Alemaayyoo fi kabajamoo Iyyaasuu Barihee fi weellistoota dandeettii qaban haaraa baayyeen dhiyaates dabalateera.
data.som: Bandhiga ayaa sidoo kale waxaa ku jiray waxqabadyo madadaalo ah oo ay wehelinayeen fanniyeyaal ka baxsan fanka oo ay soo bandhigeen fanaaniinta caanka ah ee Tigreega sida Kiros Alemayehu iyo Iyasu Berhe ee geeriyooday iyo fannaaniin kale oo badan oo karti sare leh.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ምርኢት ብዙሓት ንጥፈታት ተሃድሶ ዝቐረቡ እንትኾን ብፍላይ ናይቶም ውሩያት ተጋሩ ሙዚቀኛታት ነፍስሄር ኪሮስ ኣለማዮህን ነፍስሄር እያሱ በርሀን ከምኡ እውን ናይ ካልኦት ሓደሽቲ ክኢላታት ስነጥበበኛታት ስራሕቲ ሙዚቃ ቀሪቦም እዮም።

data.eng: Ethiopia’s first success at the Cannes Film Festival tells a simple tale, but the film’s director has set his sights on the world stage thanks to support from the French film industry.
data.aaf: Ityoppiya Kannes filmi festivalal tukutube qimboh hadaf aydaaditte warissam kee takkay ikkah filmi direktor fransayak filmi industri abte qokolul inti baad gudgudul daffese.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ በካነስ ፊልም ፌስቲቫል ያስመዘገበችው የመጀመሪያ ስኬት ቀላል ታሪክን ይነግረናል ነገርግን የፊልሙ ዳይሬክተር ከፈረንሳይ የፊልም ኢንደስትሪ ባደረገው ድጋፍ አይናቸውን በአለም መድረክ ላይ አስቀምጠዋል።
data.orm: Milkaa'inni jalqabaa Itoopiyaa Festivaalaa Fiilmii Kaannes irrattii oduu durii salphaa tokko hima, garuu galata industirii fiilmii Faransaayi daarikeeterri fiilmichaa ija isaa waltajjii addunyaa irra kaa'e.
data.som: Guushii ugu horreysay ee Itoobiya ay ka gaarto Bandhigga Filimada Cannes ayaa sheegaysaa sheeko fudud, laakiin agaasimaha filimku wuxuu dhigay aragiisa masraxa adduunka isagoo uga mahadcelinaya taageerada shirkadaha filimada Faransiiska.
data.tir: ኣብ ምርኢት ፊልም ካነስ ዝተመዝገበ ፈላማይ ዓወት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ንእሽቶ ታሪክ ዝተመስረተ እንትኾን እቲ ኣላዪ ፊልም ግና ብሳላ ደገፍ ኢንዱስትሪ ፊልም ፈረንሳይ ንሓሳባቱ ኣብ መድረኽ ዓለም ንምቕራብ ክኢሉ እዩ።

data.eng: Having successfully premiered “Lamb” in the director’s home city of Addis Ababa earlier this month, the filmmakers have turned their attention to their next important release: in France on September 30.
data.aaf: Aalsak qimbol "lamb" direkterik ubukya magaala addis ababa dudda bicitteliiy yublen, filmi taamoomi muhummi ciggiltah tan tuxxiq le gexsitil axcih fransayak september 30 heen.
data.amh: በዚህ ወር መጀመሪያ ላይ "ላምብ" በዳይሬክተሩ የትውልድ ከተማ አዲስ አበባ በተሳካ ሁኔታ በማሳየት ፊልም ሰሪዎቹ ፊልሙን ለማሳየት ትኩረታቸውን ወደ ቀጣዩ ጠቃሚ ቦታ ማለትም በፈረንሣይ መስከረም 30 ላይ አድርገዋል።
data.orm: Milkaa'inaan "Laamb" erga magaalaa jireenyaa daarikteerichaa Addis Ababaa keessatti jalqaba ji'a kanaa gadhiifamee, qopheessitoonni fiilmichaa xiyyeeffannoo isaanii gadhiisuu murteessaa itti aanu: Gaafa Fulbaana 30 Faransaay keessatti tahu irra ka'aniiru.
data.som: Iyagoo si guul leh ugu soo bandhigay "Lamb" magaalada uu ka soo jeedo agaasimaha ee Addis Ababa bilawgii bishaan, filim sameeyayaashu waxay fiiradooda usii jeediyeen siidaynta xigtaee muhiimka ah: Faransiiska Sebtembar 30.
data.tir: እቲ ''ላምብ'' ዘርእስቱ ፊልም ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ትውልዲ ከተማ እቲ ኣላዪ ፊልም ንፈለማ ግዜ ዝተርኣየ እንትኾን እቶም ሰራሕቲ ፊልም ኣብ ፈረንሳይ 30 መስከረም ነቲ ፊልም ንምቕራብ ምድላዋቶም ወጊኖም እዮም።

data.eng: The Addis Ababa City Beautification, Park and Cemetery Development Agency announced that it will soon inaugurate six mulita-purpose parks in the city, which include features satisfying all age groups.
data.aaf: Addis Ababah Magaalak Qaxmaqaaneey,parkitte kee kabritte daddosih Ejensi qaddosse. Magaalal getimtah tan leceey takke mango qalaama le parkitte xayi uddurih addat dooqayseloonum warsen.
data.amh: የአዲስ አበባ ከተማ የውበት፣የፓርኮችና የመቃብር ልማት ኤጀንሲ እንዳስታወቀው በከተማው የሚገኙ ሁሉንም የእድሜ ክልል ያማከሉ ስድስት ሁለገብ ፓርኮች በቅርቡ እንደሚመረቁ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Magaalaa Addis Ababaa Miidhagsuu, Paarkii fi Ejensiin bakka Owwaalcha Misoomsu dhiyootti paarkiiwwan dhimma garagaraa ja'a, kan waan garee umrii hunda gammachiisu of keessaa qabu magaalattii keessatti akka eebbisiisu beeksise.
data.som: Wakaalada horumarinta bilicda, jardiinooyinka iyo xabaalaha ee magaalada Addis Ababa ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in ay dhawaan furi doonto lix jardiinooyin ujeedoyin badan leh oo laga hirgaliyay magaalada, kuwaas oo ay ku jiraan kuwo ay ku qanci donaan da’kasta.
data.tir: ልምዓት ጽባቐ፣ፓርክን ቀዋሚ መዕረፊን ከተማ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ቀረባ ንኩሎም ዓይነት ዕድመታት ዘገልግሉ ሽዱሽተ ዘርፈ ብዙሕ ፓርክታት ኣብታ ከተማ ከምዝምረቑ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: These parks are designed to have swimming pools, basketball courtyards, amphitheaters and cafes, according to the Agency.
data.aaf: Ta parkitte giiri aroocaay, gaba koqosoh aroocaay,amphitherateritte kee makciyatitte akah tallennah acsubuk abeenim kinnim ejensiiy qaddosse.
data.amh: እነዚህ ፓርኮች መዋኛ ገንዳዎች፣ የቅርጫት ኳስ ሜዳዎች፣ አምፊቲያትሮች እና ካፌዎች እንዲኖራቸው ታስበው የተሰሩ መሆናቸውን ኤጀንሲው ገልጿል።
data.orm: Paarkiiwwan kunneen puulii bishaan daakaa, dirreewwan kubbaa kachoo, ampiitiyaateriiwwan fi kaaffeewan qabaachuun saxaxaman, akka Ejensichaatti.
data.som: Jardiinooyinkaan loo sahmiyay in ay lahadaan barkadaha dabaasha, barxadaha kubbadda koleyga, aamfitiyaatarrada, iyo kafateeriyada, sida ay sheegtay Wakaaladdu.
data.tir: እቶም ፓርክታት መሐመሲ፣ ሜዳ ኩዕሶ ስክዒት፣ ቤተ ተዋስኦ ኣደባባይን እንዳ ቡንን ሻሂን ክህልዎም ከምዝትተለመ እቲ ትካል ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: MultiChoice Ethiopia, a South African company that operates the DStv satellite television service, announced plan to significantly increase its investment in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: DSTV satellite televizion afffaf tangagayye Multi Choise Ityoppiyak diqsitta gabbi afrikah kombani itiyoppial le investementi kaxxa caddol akah dadlissannah ekraarisseh tanimiiy qaddosse.
data.amh: ዲኤስቲቪ የሳተላይት ቴሌቪዥን አገልግሎትን የሚያስተዳድረው ማልቲቾይስ ኢትዮጵያ የተሰኘው የደቡብ አፍሪካ ኩባንያ በኢትዮጵያ ያለውን ኢንቨስትመንት በከፍተኛ ደረጃ ለማሳደግ ማቀዱን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Maltiichooyiz Itoopiyaa, kampanii Afrikaa Kibbaa isa tajaajila televeejinii satalaayitii DStv adeemsisu, investimentii isaa Itoopiyaa keessa gaashaan akka guddisu beeksise.
data.som: MultiChoice Ethiopia oo ah shirkad laga leeyahay dalka Koonfur Afrika oo maamusha adeega talefishinka Satelite ka ee DStv ayaa ku dhawaaqday qorshe ay si weyn uugu kordhinayso maal gashigeeda Itoobiya.
data.tir: ግልጋሎት ሳተላይት ቴሌቪዥን ዝህብ መልቲ ቾይዝ ዝተብሃለ ኩባንያ ደቡብ ኣፍሪካ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዘካይዶ ስራሕቲ ኢንቨስትመንት ከምዘዕቢ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: The company said in a statement that it is looking to extensively expand its reach, investment in people and infrastructure in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Ta kambani maybalalaqal elle qaddosennalaay ityoppiyal leh tan wadbaay ummattal investimentitte kee daddos taamoomi baarluk akah baarisan innah taamitak geytimta.
data.amh: ኩባንያው በመግለጫው እንዳስታወቀው በኢትዮጵያ ያለውን ተደራሽነት፣ በሰዎች ላይ ኢንቨስትመንትን እና መሠረተ ልማቶችን በስፋት ለማስፋት እየሰራ ነው።
data.orm: Ibsa isaa keessatti kampanichi qaqqabiinsa isaa babal'isuu akka barbaadu, namootaa fi ijaarsawwan irratti Itoopiyaa keessatti akka invest godhu dubbate.
data.som: Shirkadda ayaa bayaan ay soo saartay ku sheegtay inay raadinayso inay si xoogan u ballaariso isgaadhsiinteda, maalgashiga dadka, iyo kaabayaasha dhaqaalaha ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: እቲ ኩባንያ ኣብ ዘውፅኦ መግለፂ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ሰባትን ኣብ መሰረተ ልምዓትን ፅዑቕ ስራሕቲ ኢንቨስትመንት ንምግፋሕ ተሊሙ ኣሎ።

data.eng: It is also planning to provide support to Ethiopian content and content creators including investing heavily in local content as part of its hyper local content strategy.
data.aaf: Tonnah baaxoh addah mabbuuxul kaxxa investimenti abeenim edde anuk ityoppiyalmabbux kee mabbux gineenitih qokol aboonuh ikraariseenih yanin.

data.tir: ኣካያዲት ስራሕ ራስ ትያትር ዝኾነት ሜሮን ተሻለ ንግ.ዜ.ኢ ከምዝገለፀቶ ስነጥበብ፣ ሓድነት ኣብ ውሽጢ ብዝሃነት ክሰጥም ናይ ምግባር ሓይሊ ዘለዎ ኣብ ርእሲ ምኳኑ ብዝሃነት መሰረት ሰላምን ውህደትን ከምዝኾነ ዘመልክት እዩ።

data.tir: ንሳ ወሲኻ ከምዝገለፀቶ ስነግጥሚ፣ ሙዚቃን ሳዕስዒትን ካ ብ ካልኦት ብዝተፈለየ ብውሑድ ቃላትን ብምህዳስን ኣቢሎም ንሕብረተሰብ ብዛዕባ ፅባቐ ብዝሃነት ንምስትምሃር ኣገደስቲ መሳርሒታት እዮም።

data.eng: Gohe peace and unity award 2021 has been awarded for 11 eminent person,including gammo fathers, inter-religion council of ethiopia and ethiopian traditional leaders council in a colorful ceremony that took place on Sunday
data.aaf: 2021 gohe salaam kee inkittinaaneh acwal gamoh abbobtiiy,diini abbobtiiy,diini abbobti kee ityoppiyak dumaahih miroctih kobox edde anuk 11 takke tamixxige maritteh caddi ayroh laqin tadderal acwa yecen.
data.amh: የ2021 የጎህ የሰላም እና የአንድነት ሽልማት የጋሞ አባቶች ፣የኢትዮጵያ የሀይማኖቶች ጉባኤ እና የኢትዮጵያ ባህላዊ መሪዎች ጉባኤን ጨምሮ 11 ታዋቂ ግለሰቦችን እሁድ እለት በደማቅ ሁኔታ ሸልሟል።
data.orm: Badhaasi Nagaa fi Tokkummaa Gohee bara 2021 Abboota Gamoo, Mana maree Amantaalee Itoopiyaa fi Mana Maree Geggeessitoota Aadaa Itoopiyaa dabalachuun namoota kabajamoo 11'f qophii bareedaa Dilbata godhame irratti kenname.
data.som: Abaalmarinta Nabadda iyo Midnimada Gohe ee 2021 ayaa la guddoonsiiyay 11 qof oo caan ah, oo ay ku jiraan Aabbayaasha Gammo, Golaha Diimaha ee Itoobiya, iyo Golaha Hogaamiyeyaasha Dhaqanka ee Itoobiya, xaflad si heersare ah loo soo agaasimay oo Axaddii dhacday.
data.tir: ጎህ ሽልማት ሰላምን ሓድነትን 2021 ብሰንበት ኣብ ዘካየዶ ድሙቕ ስነስርዓት ን11 ፍሉጣት ሰባት እንኮላይ ንሽማግለታት ጋሞ፣ ንቤት ምኽሪ ሃይማኖታት ኢትዮጵያ፣ ንቤት ምኽሪ ባህላዊ መራሕቲ ኢትዮጵያ ሸሊሙ።

data.eng: The award was given as symbol of their unwavering commitments towards promoting peace and unity in their localities and the country at large.

data.eng: With the celebration of the UNESCO registered Timket fesival approaching, restoration of Jan-Meda, the open field where the festival is celebrated, has been intensified, Addis Ababa City Deputy Mayor Adanech Abiebie said today.
data.aaf: UNESKOL yuskutuben timket qiidih assakoxxa assakaxxuk yemeeteenimih qiid elle yassakaxxen jan-meexa qagitak akah bicisan innih taama diggaluk foocah intem addis ababah magaalak ciggilta kantiba gifti axanesh abiebe asaakuy qaddosse.
data.amh: በዩኔስኮ የተመዘገበው የጥምቀት በዓል አከባበር እየተቃረበ በመምጣቱ በዓሉ የሚከበርበትን የጃን-ሜዳ መስክን መልሶ ማቋቋም ተጠናክሮ መቀጠሉን የአዲስ አበባ ከተማ ምክትል ከንቲባ ወይዘሮ አዳነች አቤቤ ዛሬ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Kabaji Feestivaala cuuphaa isa UNESCO'tti galmaa'ee dhiyaachuun walqabatee, Jaan-Meedaa, bakkee banaa itti festivaalichi kabajamu haaressuun jabaatee itti fufeera jette Itti aantuun Kantiibaa Magaalaa Addis Ababaa Adaanech Abeebee har'a.
data.som: Iyada oo ay soo dhowdahay dabbaaldegga xafladda Timket ee ka diwaangashan UNESCO, ayaa waxaa la xoojiyay dib u habaynta Jan-Meda, oo ah goobta bannaan ee xafladda looga dabbaaldegayo, ayay maanta sheegtay ku xigeenka duqa magaalada Addis Ababa Adanech Abiebie.
data.tir: እቲ ብዩኔስኮ ዝተመዝገበ በዓል ጥምቀት ዝኽበረሉ መዓልቲ ብምብፅሑ እቲ በዓል ዝኽበረሉ ጃንሜዳ ንምፅጋን ዝካየድ ዘሎ ስራሕቲ እናተሳለጠ ምኳኑ ምኽትል ከንቲባ ኣዲስኣበባ ኣዳነች ኣበቤ ሎሚ መዓልቲ ገሊፃ።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with ENA, the deputy mayor said besides being a place where Timket is celebrated, Jan-Meda is a place for hosting many social events and sports.
data.aaf: Ciggilta kantiiba eziyallih luk sugte angaarawal jan-meda timket qiid elle yassakaxxen arac kinniimih ossotinah mangoh tan ayyuntiino bicitte kee xagar diig elle aban arac kinnimt yabte.
data.amh: ምክትል ከንቲባዋ ለኢዜአ በሰጡት ልዩ ቃለ ምልልስ ጃን-ሜዳ የጥምቀት በዓል የሚከበርበት ቦታ ከመሆኑ በተጨማሪ በርካታ ማህበራዊ ዝግጅቶች እና ስፖርቶች የሚስተናገዱበት ቦታ ነው ብለዋል።
data.orm: Af-gaaffii addaa ENA waliin gooteen, itti aantuun kantiibaa bakka itti ayyaanni Cuuphaa kabajamu tahuun alatti, Jaan-Meedaatti qophiiwwan hawaasaa fi ispoortii baayyeen akka geggeessamu dubbate.
data.som: Guddoomiye ku xigeenka oo wareysi gaar ah siisay ENA, ayaa sheegtay in marka laga soo tago in ay tahay goobta laga xuso Timket, Jan-Meda ay tahay meel lagu qabto munaasabado badan oo bulsho iyo ciyaaro.
data.tir: እታ ምኽትል ከንቲባ ምስ ግዜኢ ብፍሉይ ኣብ ዝገበረቶ ቃለ መሕተት ከምዝበለቶ ጃን ሜዳ በዓል ጥምቀት ዝኽበረሉ ቦታ ኣብ ርእሲ ምኳኑ ዝተፈላለዩ ማሕበራዊ መደባትን ስፖርትን ዝተኣናገደሉ እውን እዩ።

data.eng: Ambassadors of different countries to Ethiopia and various diplomatic corps have attended cultural music, dances and fashion shows on Saturday at National Theater.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyal baxa baxsale baaxooxah ambasadderitte kee baxa baxsale diplomasih xagaritte tature sabtih agat theateril qaada gaditteey,danci kee fashion treatitteliiy geytimen.
