data.orm: Ambasaaddaroonni biyya adda addaa Itoopiyaattii akkasumas gareen dippilomaatotaa Gaafa Dilbataa Tiyaatira Biyyaalessaatti sirba aadaa, shubbisaa fi faashinii hordofaniiru.
data.som: Safiirada dalal kala duwan u jooga dalka Itoobiya iyo qaar ka mid ah diblomaasiyiinta kala duwan ayaa ka qayb galay bandhig faneedka ciyaaraha hidaha iyo dhaqanka, ciyaaraha iyo moodooyinka Sabtidii shalay ka dhacay xarunta Tiyaatarka Qaranka.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ኣብ ብሄራዊ ትያትር ዝቐረበ ባህላዊ ሙዚቃ ሳዕስዒትን ምርኢት ፋሽንን ኣምባሳደራትን ልኡኻት ዲፕሎማሲን ዝተፈላለያ ሃገራት ተረኺቦም።

data.eng: The show, which was colorfully staged in the event organized by Ministry of Culture and Tourism, hopes to capture and portray diverse cultural heritages, traditional music and fashion from country’s nations, nationalities and peoples.
data.aaf: Qaada kee Turuzim Malak bicise bical laqinuk yessekexxen ta bici baxabaxsale dumaahih cissitteey, dumaahi gaditte kee fashinitte baaxoh addah agat kee agattiinaay kee ummatta bicisiyya kee xayyoosiyya abak geytimta.
data.amh: የባህልና ቱሪዝም ሚኒስቴር ያዘጋጀው በድምቀት የቀረበው ትዕይንት፤ የተለያዩ ባህላዊ ቅርሶችን፣ ባህላዊ ሙዚቃዎችን እና ፋሽንን ከሀገር ውስጥ ብሄሮች፣ ብሄረሰቦችና ህዝቦች በመቅረጽ እና በማቅረብ ላይ ይገኛል።
data.orm: Agarsiisichi, qophii Ministiriin Aadaa fi Turiizimii qindeesse irratti kan agarsiifame, hambaalee aadaa adda addaa, sirboota aadaa fi faashinii saboota, sablammootaa fi ummattoota biyyattii akka qabatu fi muldhisutu abdatame.
data.som: Bandhigan oo si heersare loo soo agaasimay oo ay soo qaban qaabisay Wasaaradda Dhaqanka iyo Dalxiiska ayaa rajaynaysa in lagu soo bandhigo laguna soo bandhigo hidaha iyo dhaqanka kala duwan ee hidaha iyo dhaqanka, fannaanka hidaha iyo dhaqanka iyo moodooyinka ka soo jeeda qowmiyadaha, jinsiyadaha iyo shucuubta dalka.
data.tir: እቲ ብሚኒስትር ባህሊን ቱሪዝምን ዝተዳለወን ደሚቑ ዝቐረበን ምርኢት ንብዝሃ ቅርሲ ባህሊ፣ ባህላዊ ሙዚቃን ፋሽንን ብሄር ብሄረሰባትን ህዝቢታትን እታ ሃገር ዘንፀባረቐ ከምዝኾነ ተስፋ ተገይሩ ኣሎ።

data.eng: President Sahle-Work Zewde has met with the General Manager for Africa of CANAL+ Group who presented the company’s work in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Prezdenti Sahle Work Zawde Afrikak kanal+Buttak edde caba taama gexseenalluk angooruwuk kobbani taama ityoppiyal xayyosen.
data.amh: ፕሬዝዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ ኩባንያው በኢትዮጵያ ውስጥ ያለውን ስራ ያቀረበውን የካናል+ ግሩፕ የአፍሪካ ዋና ስራ አስኪያጅን አግኝተዋል።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin SaahileWorqi Zawudee Geggeessaa Olaanaa Garee CANAL+ Afrikaa isa hojii kampanichi Itoopiyaa keessatti hojjechaa jiru ibseen wal argan.
data.som: Madaxweyne Sahle-Work Zewde ayaa lakulantay maareeyaha guud ee Afrika ee CANAL+ Group oo u soo bandhigtay shaqada ay shirkaddu ka qabato dalka Itoobiya.
data.tir: ፕሬዝደንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ ምስቲ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዘሎ ስራሕቲ እቲ ኩባንያ ዝውክል ዋና ኣካያዲ ስራሕ ካናል + ግሩፕ ኣፍሪካ ተራኺበን።

data.eng: CANAL+ Group has made a significant investment in the entertainment industry.
data.aaf: Kanal+Butta entertainmentih industrih addat kaxxa waane aben.
data.amh: ካናል+ ግሩፕ በመዝናኛ ኢንደስትሪው ውስጥ ትልቅ ኢንቬስትመንት አድርጓል።
data.orm: Gareen CANAL+ industirii bashannanaa keessatti investimentii guddaa godhe.
data.som: Kooxda CANAL+ ayaa maalgalin weyn ku samaysay warshadaha madadaalada.
data.tir: ካናል+ ግሩፕ ኣብ ዘፈር መዘናግዒ ኢንዱስትሪ ኣገዳሲ መዋእለ ንዋይ ዘፍሰሰ ኩባንያ እዩ።

data.eng: President Sahle-Work appreciated the commitment of the company to incorporate Ethiopian content and content creators on the platform and highlighted the importance of using such platforms for education as well as entertainment.
data.aaf: Prezdent sahle worke kumbani ityoppiyak mabbux kee mabbux gineenit gudgudut yasgalloonuh loonuh yanin fayxi assakootuk tannah tanih tan gudgudittet baritto kee entertainmentih yantifiqeenim leh tan tuxxiqitte tescesse.
data.amh: ፕሬዝዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ኩባንያው ኢትዮጵያዊ ይዘት እና የይዘት ፈጣሪዎችን በመድረኩ ላይ ለማካተት ያለውን ቁርጠኝነት አድንቀው እንደዚህ አይነት መድረኮችን ለትምህርት እንዲሁም ለመዝናኛ መጠቀም ያለውን ጠቀሜታ አመልክተዋል።
data.orm: Pirasdaantiin SaahileWorqi Zawudee qabiyyeewwanii fi qabiyyee uumtota Itoopiyaa miidiyaa isaaniitti makuuf kutannoo kampanichaa jajuun barbaachisummaa bashannanaan alatti miidiyicha barnootaaf itti fayyadamuu barbaachisa akka tahe ibsan.
data.som: Madaxweyne Sahle-Work ayaa aad ugu mahadcelisay sida ay shirkadu uga go’an tahay in ay madasha ku soo biirto hal-abuurka Itoobiyaanka ah, waxaanay tilmaantay muhiimadda ay leedahay isticmaalka goobahan waxbarasho iyo weliba maaweelada.
data.tir: እቲ ኩባንያ ንትሕዝቶ ኢትዮጵያን ንመሃዝቲ ትሕዝቶ ውሽጢ ዓዲን ብምክታቱ ፕሬዝዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ ኣመስጊነኖኦ።

data.eng: The second channel of Oromia Broadcasting Network (OBN), a regional broadcaster headquartered in Adama, has started trial transmissions today.
data.aaf: Inaytoh arac adaamal heeh yan Oromiya Broadkasting Network (OBN) nammey heele channelik gabbati transmission asaaku qimbise.
data.amh: ዋና መስሪያ ቤቱን አዳማ ያደረገው ክልላዊ ማሰራጫ የኦሮሚያ ብሮድካስቲንግ ኔትወርክ (ኦቢኤን) ሁለተኛ ቻናል የሙከራ ስርጭት ዛሬ ጀምሯል።
data.orm: Chaanaaliin lammaffaa Oromiyaa Broodkastiing Neetwoork (OBN), tamsaasi televiijinii naannoo waajjira isaa ijoo Adaamaa godhatee, har'a tamsaasa yaalii isaa eegaleera.
data.som: Kanaalka Labaad Ee Shabakada Wararka Oromiya (OBN) ee xarunteedu tahay magaalada Adama, ayaa maanta si tijaabo ah u bilawday baahinta wararka.
data.tir: እቲ ማእኸሉ ኣዳማ ዝገበረን ክልላዊ ፈነወ ጣቢያ ዝኾነን ኦሮሚያ ብሮድካስቲንግ ኔትዎርክ (ኦቢኤን) ፈተነ ካልኣይ ጣብያኡ ሎሚ መዓልቲ ጀሚሩ።

data.eng: The new channel, called ‘OBN Horn Of Africa’ as per the decision of the regional state, targets strengthening unity and fraternity among people in the east African region, according to Adisu Arega, head of social cluster with the rank of Deputy Chief Administrator of Oromia.
data.aaf: Rakaakay doolatih margaqaak uguta "OBN afrikah gaysal" diqsita channel ayro mawqah afrikah cuduudih ummattah fanal yanih yan inkittinaane kee tobokiinu diggoosuh qalaama le axcuk oromiyak ciggila edde caba miraaciinih bilhadal ayyuntiino kilaster saqal gifta Addisu Aregga qaddose.
data.amh: ኦቢኤን ሆርን ኦፍ አፍሪካ' የተሰኘው አዲሱ ቻናል በምስራቅ አፍሪካ ቀጠና ህዝቦች መካከል ያለውን አንድነት እና ወንድማማችነት ለማጠናከር ያለመ ነው ሲሉ የኦሮሚያ በምክትል ዋና አስተዳዳሪ ማዕረግ የማህበራዊ ክላስተር ኃላፊ አቶ አዲሱ አረጋ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Chaanaaliin haaraa, akka murtee mootummaa naannichaan 'OBN Hoorn of Afirikaa' jedhamuun waamamu ummata naannoo baha Afirikaa gidduutti tokkummaa fi jaalala jabeessuuf kan xiyyeeffateedha, akka sadarkaa itti aanaa Bulchaa Olaanaa Oromiyaatti hogganaa kilaastera hawaasummaa, Addisuu Araggaa jedhanitti.
data.som: Kanaalkan cusub oo loogu magac daray 'OBN Horn Of Africa' sida uu dhigayo go'aanka dowlad deegaaneedka, ayaa bartilmaameedsanayaa xoojinta midnimada iyo walaaltinimada dadka ku nool gobolka Bariga Afrika, sida uu sheegay Adisu Arega, madaxa kooxda bulshada oo darajadiisu tahay ku xigeenka madaxa maamulka. Oromia.
data.tir: ኦቢኤን ሆርን ኣፍሪካ ዝብል ስያሜ ዘለዎ ካልኣይ ጣቢያ ብመሰረት ውሳነ እቲ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ኣብ መንጎ ህዝቢታት ምብራቕ ኣፍሪካ ሓድነትን ሕውነትን ንምጥንኻር ዝዓለመ ከምዝኾነ ብምኽትል ርእሰ ምምሕዳር መዓርግ ሓላፊ ዘፈር ጉዳይ ማሕበራዊ ኦሮሚያ ኣይተ ኣዲሱ ኣረጋ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The Meskel Square-Addis Ababa City Hall Project that mainly contains the refurbishment of Meskel Square is the most iconic public gathering space in the modern history of Addis Ababa that has been hosting several cultural, religious, political, entertainment and sports activities for more than 60 years.
data.aaf: Amobeyak meskel shaariqih aqusbusiyyal geytima meskel shaariq- addis ababah magaalah Xiinisso projekti addis ababak qusba aydaadih addat 60 Sanatak daga takke mangoh tan qadaay,diiniiy,siyaasay,waane kee xagar diig angagoyya oggolak sugte ummatta koboxih araca kinni.
data.amh: በዋነኛነት የመስቀል አደባባይን እድሳት የያዘው የመስቀል አደባባይ - አዲስ አበባ ከተማ ማዘጋጃ ቤት ፕሮጀክት በአዲስ አበባ ዘመናዊ ታሪክ ውስጥ እጅግ በጣም የሚደነቅ የህዝብ መሰብሰቢያ ቦታ ሲሆን በርካታ ባህላዊ፣ ሀይማኖታዊ፣ ፖለቲካዊ፣ መዝናኛ እና ስፖርታዊ እንቅስቃሴዎችን ከ60 አመታት በላይ ሲያስተናግድ የቆየ ቦታ ነው።
data.orm: Pirojektiin Galma Adda Babahii Masqalaa Magaalaa Addis Ababaa kan irra caalmaatti haareffamuu Adda babahii Masqalaa hammatu, seenaa ammayyaa Addis Ababaa keessatti bakka walitti qabama hawaasaa isa ijoo tahe kan hojiilee aadaa, amantii, siyaasaa, bashannanaa fi ispoortii baayyee waggoota 60 oliif keessumeessaa tureedha.
data.som: Mashruuca dhismaha fagaaraha Meskel Square Addis Ababa oo inta badan ka kooban dib u habaynta fagaaraha Meskel waa goobta ugu caansan ee ay dadweynuhu isugu yimaadaan taariikhda casriga ah ee Addis Ababa kaas oo in ka badan 60 qof lagu qabtay hawlo badan oo isugu jira dhaqan, diimeed, siyaasadeed, madadaalo iyo ciyaaro. sanado.
data.tir: እቲ ፕሮጄክት ኣዳራሽ ከተማ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ዝኾነ ኣደባባይ መስቀል ብዝዓበየ ነቲ ኣደባባይ ናይ ምሕዳስ ውራይ ዝሓዘ እንትኾን እቲ ኣደባባይ ኣብ ዘበናዊ ታሪኽ ኣዲስኣበባ እቲ ዝበለፀ ዓይነታዊ መአከቢ ህዝቢን ንልዕሊ 60 ዓመታት ምርኢታት ባህሊ፣ ሃይማኖት፣ ፖለቲካ፣ ተሃድሶን ስፖርትን ዘተኣናገደ ስፍራ እዩ።

data.eng: Meskel Square annually hosts the Meskel-Demera Religious Festival which has already been inscribed by UNESCO as world’s intangible heritage.
data.aaf: Meskel shaariq kulli sanatah uniskol xaggime sinni cissi akkuk yuskutuben meskel-demera Diini Qaffayda elle yassakaxxen.
data.amh: መስቀል አደባባይ በየዓመቱ በዩኔስኮ የማይዳሰሱ ቅርሶች ሆኖ የተመዘገበውን የመስቀል-ደመራ ሃይማኖታው በዓልን ያስተናግዳል።
data.orm: Adda Babahiin Masqalaa waggaa waggaadhaan Feestivaala Damaraa Masqalaa isa UNESCO'tti akka hambaa addunyaa harkaan hin qaqqabatamneetti galmaa'e ni keessumeessa.
data.som: Fagaaraha Meskel sanad walba ayaa lagu qabtaa Bandhiga Diinta ee Meskel Demera kaas oo ay UNESCO ay u diwaan galisaly dhaxalka aan la taaban karin ee aduunka.
data.tir: ኣደባባይ መስቀል ነቲ ብዩኔስኮ ከም ዓለማዊ ዘይድህሰስ ቅርሲ ኮይኑ ዝተመዝገበ ስነስርዓት በዓል ደመራ መስቀል በብዓመቱ ዘተኣናግድ እዩ።

data.eng: The name Meskel derives from the Amharic term Holy Cross.
data.aaf: Meskel iyya migaq amaarah afak saytun Qambilet Iba diqsita migaaqak been.
data.amh: መስቀል የሚለው ስም የአማርኛው ቅዱስ መስቀል ከሚለው የተወሰደ ነው።
data.orm: Maqaan Masqal jedhu jecha afaan Amaariffaa Fannoo Qulqulluu jedhu irraa dhufe.
data.som: Magaca Meskel wuxuu ka yimid erayga Amxaariga ah ee calaamada kiristanka.
data.tir: መስቀል ዝብል ስያሜ ቅዱስ መስቀል ካብ ዝብል ቃል ኣምሕርኛ ዝመጸ እዩ።

data.eng: President Sahle-Work Zewde received Imtiaz Patel, Chairperson of the Board of Multichoice Group.
data.aaf: Predenti sahle worke zawdu multi choise buttak bordi kobaahiseenah yan Imtiza pateliiy oggolte.
data.amh: ፕሬዝዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ የመልቲቾይስ ቡድን የቦርድ ሰብሳቢ ኢምቲአዝ ፓቴልን ተቀብለዋል።
data.orm: Pirasdaanti SaahileWorq Zawudee Imtiyaaz Paatel, dura ta'aa Boordii Garee Maltiichooyizii simatan.
data.som: Madaxweyne Sahle-Work Zewde ayaa qaabishay Imtiaz Patel, oo ah Guddoomiyaha Golaha Sare ee Kooxda Multichoice.
data.tir: ፕሬዚዳንት ሳህለወርቅ ዘውዴ ንኣቦመንበር ቦርድ መልቲቾይዝ ግሩፕ ንኢምትያዝ ፓቴል ኣዘራሪበን።

data.eng: Multichoice Group has made sizable investments in Ethiopia both in improving access to the many information and entertainment products that they have but also in supporting local content creation in sports and entertainment.
data.aaf: Multichoice butta ityoppiyal lon mango oyta kee waane murtitteh wadba yaysiiseenimih gital kaxxa gadda edde caxeenih geytiman takkay ikkah xagar dig kee entertainmentih addat baaxoh addah mabbux biciseenim qokolaanah.
data.amh: መልቲቾይስ ግሩፕ በኢትዮጵያ ያላቸውን በርካታ የመረጃ እና የመዝናኛ ምርቶች ተደራሽነት በማሻሻል ረገድ ትልቅ መዋዕለ ንዋይ አፍስሷል ነገር ግን በስፖርት እና በመዝናኛ ውስጥ የሀገር ውስጥ ይዘት መፍጠርን ይደግፋል።
data.orm: Gareen Maltiichooyizii Odeeffannoo fi oomishaalee bashannanaa isaan qaban baayeen akka argatamu fooyyeessuun akkasumas ispoortii fi bashannana irratti qabiyyee naannoo uumuu deggeruun investimentii guddachuu danda'u Itoopiyaa keessatti gochaa ture.
data.som: Multichoice Group waxa ay Itoobiya ka samaysay maalgashi la taaban karo si ay u wanaajiso helitaanka macluumaadka badan iyo agabka madadaalada ee ay haystaan, laakiin sidoo kale taageeridda abuurista waxyaabaha maxalli ah ee ciyaaraha iyo madadaalada."
data.tir: መልቲ ቾይዝ ግሩፕ መደባት ሓበሬታን ተሃድሶን ተበፃሕነት ክህልዎምን መደባት ስፖርትን ተሃድሶን ትሕዝቶኦም ናይ ዓዲ ውሽጢ ክኸውንን ብምዕላም ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣገዳሲ መዋእለ ንዋይ ዝሰልዐ ኩባንያ እዩ።

data.eng: Fana television will migrate to SES satellite as of December 31st, 2020.
data.aaf: Faanah televizion ciggilta kudok 31 sanat 2020 xabba haanam SES satellite fanah korele.
data.amh: ፋና ቴሌቪዥን ከታህሳስ 31 ቀን 2020 ጀምሮ ወደ ኤስኢኤስ ሳተላይት ይዛወራል።
data.orm: Televiijiniin Faanaa Mudde 31ffaa, 2020 tti gara satalaayitii SES'tti ni dabarfama.
data.som: Telefiishanka Fana ayaa u guuri doonaa satalitka SES laga bilaabo Diseembar 31st, 2020.
data.tir: ፋና ቴሌቪዥን ካብ 31 ታሕሳስ 2020 ዓ.ም.ፈ ጀሚሩ ፈነውኡ ብሴስ ሳተላይት ከካይድ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiosat is Ethiopia’s first-ever dedicated free-to-air (FTA) TV platform, hosted on SES’s NSS-12 satellite.
data.aaf: Ethiosat SES's NSS-12 satellite oggolam ityoppiyah aydaadul qimboh addah currik taamita ( FTA) tv gudgudu.
data.amh: ኢትዮ ሳት የኤስኢኤስ ኤንኤስኤስ-12 ሳተላይት ላይ የሚስተናገድ በኢትዮጵያ በታሪክ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ በነጻ የሚሰራ (ኤፍቲኤ) የቲቪ መድረክ ነው።
data.orm: Itiyoosaatiin waltajjii TV Itoopiyaa isa jalqabaa Firii tu eeyir (FTA)'f kutate, kan satalaayitii NSS-12 SES irratti keessummeeffamuudha.
data.som: "Ethiosat waa madal TV-ga xorta ah (FTA) ee Itoobiya ee ugu horreysay abid, oo lagu qabto satellit SES's NSS-12."
data.tir: ኢትዮ ሳት ፈላማይ ናይ ኢትዮጵያ ፈነወ ናፃ ኣየር (ኤፍ.ቲ.ኤ) ዝኾነ መድረኽ ቴሌቪዥን እንትኾን ኣብ ሴስን ኤን.ኤስ.ኤስ.12 ሳተላይት ዝተኣናገድ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiosat currently delivers 65 channels to Ethiopian homes, with 16 of those channels already in high definition (HD) quality.
data.aaf: Ethiosat awyih uddur 65 channelitte ityoppiyah buxaaxih tatrusak geytimtam kee ta chnnelitteh addak 16 dumaak kaxxa maxxat (HD) maxxat le.
data.amh: ኢትዮሳት በአሁኑ ጊዜ 65 ቻናሎችን ለኢትዮጵያ ቤቶች የሚያስተላልፍ ሲሆን ከእነዚህ ቻናሎች ውስጥ 16 ቱ ቀድሞውኑ ከፍተኛ ጥራት (ኤችዲ) ሆነዋል።
data.orm: Itiyoosaatiin ammatti chaanaalota 65, kan 16 isaanii qulqullina oolaanaa (HD) qabuu tahe gara manneen lammiiwwan Itoopiyaatti ni dabarsa.
data.som: Ethiosat waxay hadda gaadhsiisa 65 kanaal guryaha Itoobiya, iyadoo 16 ka mid ah kanaaladaas ay hore u ahaayeen kuwo tayo sare leh (HD).
data.tir: ኢትዮ ሳት ኣብ'ዚ ሕዚ እዋን ኣብ ሕድሕድ ገዛታት ኢትዮጵያ ዝፍነው 65 ጣቢያታት ዘለውዎ እንትኾን እቶም 16 ጣቢያታት ብዝለዓለ ፅርየት (ኤች.ዲ) ዝፍነዉ እዮም።

data.eng: KUTU was formed as a result of a meeting in Addis Ababa between French violinist Théo Ceddaldi and Ethiopian new age singers Hewan Gebrewold and Haleluya Tekletsadik with band members Valentin Ceccaldi on bass, Akemi Fujimori on keyboards and Cyril Atef on drums.
data.aaf: Kutu bictem addis ababak french violinist theo seddaldi kee ityoppiyak qusba dabanih gadaabenit hewan gebruweldu kee halloliya teklesadik bandi afteenitik valentin sekaldi bazzal,akemi fujimori keyboardi kee karbol syril atefil aben koboxul ugutteh sugteemi.
data.amh: ኩቱ የተቋቋመው በአዲስ አበባ ፈረንሳዊው የቫዮሊን ተጫዋች ቴዎ ሴዳልዲ እና የኢትዮጵያ አዲስ ዘመን ዘፋኞች ሄዋን ገብረወልድ እና ሃሌሉያ ተክለጻድቅ ከባንድ አባላት ቫለንቲን ሴካልዲ በቤዝ፣ አኬሚ ፉጂሞሪ በኪቦርድ እና ሲሪል አቴፍ በድራም ባደረጉት ስብስብ ነው።
data.orm: KUTU'n bu'aa marii Addis Ababaatti vaayolinistii lammii Faransaayi Tiyoo Sedaldii fi weellistoota yeroo haaraa Itoopiyaa Hewaan Gebirewold fi Haaleluyyaa Tekiletsaadiq gidduutti miseensonni baandii Vaatentin Sekaaldii beezii irratti, Akemii Fuujimori kiiyboordii irratti akkasumas Saayiril Ateef diraamii irratti tahuun godhameen kan hundaa'eedha.
data.som: KUTU waxa lagu aasaasay kulan Addis Ababa ku dhex maray violinist ga Faransiiska ee Théo Ceddaldi iyo fannaaniinta da’da cusub ee Itoobiya Hewan Gebrewold iyo Haleluya Tekletsadik oo ay weheliyaan xubnaha kooxda Valentin Ceccaldi oo baas ku dheggan, Akemi Fujimori oo kiiboodhka ku dheggan, iyo Cyril Atef oo durbaan tumay.
data.tir: ኩቱ (ኬይ.ዩ.ቲ.ዩ) ዝተመስረተ እቲ ፈረንሳዊ ተፃዋቲ ቫዩሊን ቲዮ ሴዳልዲ ምስ መናእሰይ ደረፍቲ ሄዋን ገብረዋህድን ሃሌሉያ ተኽለፃዲቅን እንኮላይ ምስ ኣባላት እቲ ባንድ ምስ ቫሌንቲን ሴሳልዲ ተፃዋቲ ባስ፣ ኣዜሚ ፍጁምሪ ተፃዋቲ ኪቦርድ ከምኡ እውን ሲይሪል ኣቴፍ ወቓዒ ከበሮ ኣብ ኣዲስኣበባ ኣብ ዝተራኸበሉ እዋን እዩ።

data.eng: The KUTU tour set out to embody the magic they have created through this alliance, with upcoming performances outside of Ethiopia and within Ethiopia as well.
data.aaf: Kutu gufnet ta aglet bicisen sicri oroonuh ugutte ityoppiyak iro kee ityoppiyah iroh xayih aboonuwaan bicitte kinni.
data.amh: የኩቱ ጉብኝት በዚህ ጥምረት የፈጠሩትን ውበት ለማሳየት የተነሳው በኢትዮጵያ ውስጥ እና ከኢትዮጵያ ውጭም በቅርቡ በሚደረጉ ዝግጅቶች ነው።
data.orm: KUTU'n tokkummaa kanaan waan addaa isaan uuman qophii agarsiisa Itoopiyaan alaa fi Itoopiyaa keessaattis dhufaa jiru irratti agarsiisuuf saganteessaniiru.
data.som: Socdaalkii KUTU waxay u sammeeyeen sixirkii ay ku abuureen isbahaysigan, iyadoo ay soo socdaa bandhig faneedyo ka baxsan Itoobiya iyo weliba gudaha Itoobiya.
data.tir: ዑደት ኩቱ ነቲ ዝፈጠርዎ ምትሃታዊ ጥምረት መሰረት ብምግባር ስራሕቶም ኣብ ኢትዮጵያን ካብ ኢትዮጵያ ወፃኢን ንምቕራብ ዝዓለመ እዩ።

data.eng: The set included multilingual music from within Ethiopia, incorporating love songs, breakup anthems and folk songs in different languages.
data.aaf: Ta bicat bax baxsale afittek tewqe kacni gaditteey, kacni gaditte kee ummatta gaditte edde anuk mango afitteh yabta gaditteeta edde sugte.
data.amh: ዝግጅቱ ከተለያዩ የኢትዮጵያ ቋንቋዎች የተውጣጡ የፍቅር መዝሙሮችን ፣የመለያየት ዜማዎችን እና መድብለ ቋንቋ የህዝብ ዘፈኖችን ያካተተ ያካተተ ነው።
data.orm: Qindoominichi kan hammatu muuziqaa afaan garagaraa Itoopiyaa keessaa, faaruuwwan jaalalaa, faaruu adda bahuu fi faaruuwwan maatii afaan garagaraan hammata.
data.som: Qaybtan waxa ka mid ahaa muusiga luuqadaha badan ku baxa ee laga keenay gudaha Itoobiya, oo lagu daray heeso jacayl, heeso jabin, iyo heeso wadani oo luuqado kala duwan ku qoran.
data.tir: እቲ ዑደት ብዝተፈላለዩ ቋንkታት ኢትዮጵያ ንዝተሰርሑ ሙዚቃታት፣ ናይ ፍቕሪ ደርፊታት፣ መዝሙራትን ብዝተፈላለዩ ቋንቋታት ዝተዳለዉ ባህላዊ ደርፊታትን ዘካተተ እዩ።

data.eng: Nowadays multiple skateboarding parks have been built in recognition of the culture after years of the youth skating in unauthorized and dangerous streets due to the unavailability of proper venues.
data.aaf: Awayih udduurul mangoh tan skateboardingih parkitte qaadah mamaxxaga cayuk xissimte sanootah qunxaaneyti skating keenih amriseweeniih gibdah tan gitittel faxximta arooca anewaytaamih sabbatah.
data.amh: በአሁኑ ጊዜ በርካታ የስኬትቦርዲንግ ፓርኮች ለባህሉ እውቅና ሰጥተው የተገነቡት ትክክለኛ ቦታዎች ባለመኖራቸው ለዓመታት ወጣቶች ስኬቲንግ ባልተፈቀደላቸው እና አደገኛ መንገዶች ላይ ስኬት ካደረጉ በኋላ ነው።
data.orm: Waggootaaf bakki mijataan dhibuun erga dargaggoonni daandiiwwan hin eeyyamamnee fi hamoo tahan irra isteek godhanii booda, yeroo ammaa kana paarkiiwwan isteekboordiing baayyeen aadichaaf beekamtii kennuun ijaaramaniiru.
data.som: Maalmahan waxaa la dhisay jardiinooyin badan oo iskeyboarding ah si loo aqoonsado dhaqanka ka dib sanado badan oo dhalinyarada barafka ku dhexjirtay wadooyin aan la ogolayn oo khatar ah taasoo ay ugu wacan tahay iyadoo aan la heli karin goobo sax ah.
data.tir: ኣብዚ ሕዚ ግዜ ነቲ ስፖርት ኣፍልጦ ብምሃብ ሸተታ ቦርድ ዝካየደሉ ፓርክታት እናተሰርሑ እንትኾን እዚ ድማ እቲ ንዓመታት ብሰንኪ ንዕኡ ዝተዳለወ ሜዳ ዘይምህላዉ መናእሰይ ፎቖዶ ፅርጊያታት ዝገብርዎ ዝነበሩ ሸተታ ቦርድ ዘትርፍ ከምዝኾነ ተኣሚኑሉ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Amongst the list of people and institutions responsible for the growing culture is ‘Kushineta skates.’
data.aaf: Dadalak gexxa qaadal akah essertimata maritte kee exxaaxih qadadih addat "kushineta skates edde geytima.
data.amh: እያደገ ለሚሄደው ባህል ተጠያቂ ከሆኑ ሰዎች እና ተቋማት ዝርዝር መካከል ‘ኩሽኔታ ስኬትስ’ ይገኝበታል።
data.orm: Tarree namootaa fi dhaabbatoota aadichi akka guddatu godhan keessaa 'Kushineettaa isteeks' tokko dha.
data.som: Liiska dadka iyo hay'adaha ka mas'uulka ah dhaqanka sii kordhaya waxaa ka mid ah 'Kushineta skates'.
data.tir: ስፖርት ሸተታ ቦርድ ክተኣታቶ ኣስተዋፅኦ ካብ ዝገበሩ ሰባትን ትካላትን ሸተታ ኩሽኔታ ብኣብነት ይጥቀስ።

data.eng: “Kushineta is opening up its first store in megenagna and that’s a huge step forward,” said Yared, hoping the future is wide open for the industry.
data.aaf: "Kushineta qimboh dukkan addah entertainmenti fakak geytima tah kaxxa maqatta" iyye Yarid yamaate uddur industrih baara le fakimit gacelemeemil kibal hee.
data.amh: "ኩሺኔታ የመጀመሪያውን ሱቅ መገናኛ ውስጥ እየከፈተ ነው እናም ይህ ትልቅ እርምጃ ወደፊት ነው" ሲል ያሬድ መጪው ጊዜ ለኢንዱስትሪው በሰፊው ክፍት እንደሚሆን ተስፋ አድርጓል።
data.orm: "Kushineettaan mankuusaa isaa isa jalqabaa megenaanyaatti banate kun tarkaanfii guddaa gara fuulduraatti godhamedha," jedhe Yaareed, fuuldurri industirichaa baayyee bal'aa akka tahu abdachuudhaan.
data.som: “Kushineta ayaa furaysaa dukaankeedii ugu horreeyay ee megenagna taasina waa tallaabo weyn oo hore loo qaaday," ayuu yiri Yared, isagoo rajeynaya in mustaqbalka uu u furan yahay warshadaha.
data.tir: ኩሽኔታ ፈላማይ መኽዝን ኣብ መገናኛ ዝኸፈተ እንትኾን እዚ ሓደ ስጉሚ ንቅድሚት እዩ ዝበለ ያሬድ ንምስፍሕፋሕ እቲ ኢንዱስትሪ ዘለዎ ተስፋ ይገልፅ።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with FBC, a member of the Afro-Ukrainian hip hop trio Fo Sho, Betty Endale said that their group has a plan to promote immense tourism potentials of Ethiopia to the rest of the world.
data.aaf: Afro-ukrainian hip hop trio fo shouh afteenah tan Betti Endale FBc luk abteh sugte yaabal ittemihiiy ken butta ityoppiyak nabah yan turuuzim dudda raaqeh yan baad akah yaysexeexegen innah ekraaro lemit yabte.
data.amh: የአፍሮ ዩክሬን ሂፕ ሆፕ ትሪዮ ፎ ሾ አባል የሆነችው ቤቲ እንዳለ ከኤፍቢሲ ጋር ባደረገችው ልዩ ቃለ ምልልስ ቡድናቸው የኢትዮጵያን ግዙፍ የቱሪዝም አቅም ለቀሪው አለም ለማስተዋወቅ እቅድ እንዳለው ተናግራለች።
data.orm: Af-gaaffii addaa FBC wajjin godheen, miseensi hip hooppii Afroo-Yukiraniyaan tiryoo Fo Sho, Beetii Indaalee gareen isaanii qabeenya tuurizimii guddaa Itoopiyaa addunyaa bal'aatti beeksisuuf karoora akka qaban dubbatte.
data.som: Waraysi gaar ah oo ay siisay FBC, xubin ka tirsan kooxda Afro-Ukrainian hip hop trio Fo Sho, Betty Endale waxay sheegtay in kooxdoodu ay qorsheysay sidii ay kor ugu qaadi lahayd fursadaha dalxiiska ee baaxada leh ee Itoobiya aduunka intiisa kale.
data.tir: ምስ ፋና ብሮድካስቲንግ ብፍሉይ ኣብ ዝገበረቶ ቃለ መሕተት ኣባል ስሉስ ጉጅለ ሂፕ ሆፕ ኣፍሮ ዩክሬይን ፎሾ ዝኾነት ቤቲ እንዳለ ከምዝገለፀቶ ጉጅለአን ነቲ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዘሎ ሰፊሕ ዕቑር ሃፍቲ ቱሪዝም ንካሊእ ዓለም ናይ ምልላይ ትልሚ ኣለዎ።

data.eng: The Afro-Ukrainian hip hop trio consisting of the three Ethiopian-Ukrainian sisters, Bethlehem (Betty), Miriam and Siona Endale have already left an imprint on the Ukrainian hip-hop scene.
data.aaf: Afro-ukrainian hip hop triolul sidoc takke itiyoppiyah xaylo-ukrainian maqanxix Betthlem (betti), maryam kee siyon endalen ukren hip-hopih mayballal raataa daffesen.
data.amh: ሶስቱ ኢትዮጵያዊ-ዩክሬናዊ እህቶች ቤተልሄም (ቤቲ)፣ ሚርያም እና ሲዮና እንዳለን ያቀፈው የአፍሮ-ዩክሬን ሂፕ ሆፕ ትሪዮ በዩክሬን ሂፕ-ሆፕ ትእይንት ላይ አሻራ ጥሏል።
data.orm: Hip hooppiin Afroo-Yukiraniyaan tiryoo obbolowwan durbaa lammii Itoopiyaa fi Yukireen sadan of keessaa qaba, Beetileem (Beetii), Miriyaamii fi Siyoonaa Indaalee seenaa hiip hooppii Yukiraniyaan keessatti ashaaraa hambisan.
data.som: Saddexda fannaan ee Hip-hop ka ee Afro-Ukrain oo ka kooban saddexda walaalaha ah ee Ethiopian-Ukrainian, Bethlehem (Betty), Miriam, iyo Siona Endale ayaa mar hore ka tagay sawir goobta hip-hop ee Yukreeniyaan.
data.tir: ሰሉስ ጉጅለ ሂፕ ሆፕ ኣፍሮ ዩክሬይን ፎሾ ሰለስተ ኣሓት ኢትዮጵያዊያን ዩክሬናዊያን ማለት እውን ቤተልሄም፣( ቤቲ) ማርያምን ሲዮናን እንዳለ ብኣባልነት ዝሓዘ እንትኾን ኣብ ጥበብ ሂፕ ሆፕ ዩክሬይን ናይ ባዕሉ ፅልዋ ኣንቢሩ እዩ።

data.eng: “In Africa we are one, to show unity in diversity; we may have different borders like Ethiopia, Nigeria, Egypt, and Central Africa Republic but Africa is one.
data.aaf: "afrikal inkim kinnino baxsi addat inkittiino nablasuh,ityoppiyah innay,nageeriyaay,masri kee fanti afrikah republikih innah tan baxa baxsale cuduudwa tanim bictah takkay ikkah afrika inkitto.
data.amh: "አፍሪካ ወስጥ አንድ ነን፣ በልዩነት ውስጥ አንድነትን ለማሳየት እንደ ኢትዮጵያ፣ ናይጄሪያ፣ ግብፅ እና መካከለኛው አፍሪካ ሪፐብሊክ ያሉ የተለያዩ ድንበሮች ሊኖሩን ይችላሉ ነገርግን አፍሪካ አንድ ነች።
data.orm: "Afirikaa keessatti nuti tokko, adda addummaa keessatti tokkummaa agarsiisuuf; daangaa adda addaa akka Itoopiyaa,Naayijeeriyaa, Gibxii, fi Rippaabilikii Giddugaleessa Afirikaa qabaachuu dandeenya garuu nuti Afrikaa tokkodha.
data.som: "Afrika waxaan nahay hal, si aan u muujinno midnimo kala duwan; Waxaa laga yaabaa inaan yeelano xuduudo kala duwan sida Itoobiya, Nigeria, Masar, iyo Jamhuuriyadda Bartamaha Afrika laakiin Afrika waa mid.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ንሕና ሓደ ኢና ከም ኢትዮጵያ ናይጄርያ፣ ግብፂን ማእኸላይ ሪፕብሊክ ኣፍሪካን ዝኣመሰሉ ዶባት ክህልዉና ይኽእሉ እዮም ንሕና ግና ኣብ ውሽጢ ብዝሃነት ሓድነት ዘለና ኢና።

data.eng: In our diversity there is a lot of unity among us, so we want to spread that unity,” he noted.

data.eng: Ethiopia will participate for the first time at the 2019 Cannes Film Festival in the African Pavilion, Tourism Ethiopia announced.
data.aaf: Ityoppiya qimboh addah 2019 Kannes filmi festivalal afrikak pavilionut angalelem turuzim ityoppiya qaddosse.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ በ2019 የካን ፊልም ፌስቲቫል በአፍሪካ ፓቪሊዮን እንደምትሳተፍ ቱሪዝም ኢትዮጵያ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Itoopiyaan yeroo jalqabaaf Festivaala Fiilmii Kaannes 2019 irratti Paviloon Afrikaa keessatti akka hirmaattu Tuurizim Itoopiyaan beeksise
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa markii ugu horeysay ka qeyb gali doonta Bandhiga Filimada Cannes ee 2019 ee Pavilion Africa, Dalxiiska Itoobiya ayaa ku sheegay.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ኣብቲ ብ2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ዝካየድ ምርኢት ፊልም ካነስ ኣብ ደምበ ኣፍሪካ ንፈለማ ግዜ ከምእትሳተፍ ቱሪዝም ኢትዮጵያ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Briefing journalists today, Tourism Ethiopia CEO, Lensa Mekonen said partnered with local and Diaspora film professionals, Ethiopia is ready to participate in the Film Festival which will be held in France next week.
data.aaf: Asaaku xaagu qawah maybalaalaqa yece turuuzim itiyoppiyak edde caba taama sele gifta lensi mokonnin ityoppiya baaxoh adda kee Xiyaspoorak filmi mihratleela luk cattimak ciggila ayyaamah faransayal gexsituwa filmi festivalat tangaluh bical tanimitiiy yaabe.
data.amh: ዛሬ ለጋዜጠኞች መግለጫ የሰጡት የቱሪዝም ኢትዮጵያ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚ ሌንሳ መኮንን ኢትዮጵያ ከሀገር ውስጥ እና ከዲያስፖራ የፊልም ባለሙያዎች ጋር በመተባበር በሚቀጥለው ሳምንት በፈረንሳይ በሚካሄደው የፊልም ፌስቲቫል ላይ ለመሳተፍ ዝግጁ መሆኗን ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Gaazexeessitootaaf gaafa ibsa kennitu, CEO'n Tuurizim Itoopiyaa, Leensaa Mekonnin ogeessota fiilmii naannoo fi Diyaasporaa wajjin michummaa uumuun, Itoopiyaan Feestivaala Fiilmichaa kan torban dhufu Faransaayitti geggeeffamu irratti hirmaachuuf qophiidha jette.
data.som: Madaxa Dalxiiska Itoobiya Lensa Mekonen oo maanta waiyaha la hadlay ayaa sheegay in iyada oo kaashanaysa khubarada filimada gudaha iyo qurba joogta, Itoobiya ay diyaar u tahay in ay ka qaybgasho Bandhigga Filimada oo toddobaadka soo socda lagu qaban doono Faransiiska.
data.tir: ዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕ ቱሪዝም ኢትዮጵያ ኣይተ ሌንሳ መኮነን ሎሚ መዓልቲ ንጋዜጣኛታት ኣብ ዝሃቦ መብርሂ ምስ ሰብ ሞያ ፊልም ውሽጢ ዓዲን ዲያስፖራን ብምትሕብባር ኢትዮጵያ ኣብቲ ኣብ ፈረንሳይ ኣብ ዝቕፅል ዘሎ ሰሙን ዝካየድ ምርኢት ፊልም ንምስታፍ ድልውቲ እያ ኢሉ።

data.eng: A few weeks after the controversial draft law establishing the Office of the Federal Attorney General got the approval of members of the parliament (MPs), the government has submitted yet another controversial draft law to provide for the computer crime.
data.aaf: Agay Wagayak Yan Federalak Naharsi Madqah Gaaroyseh Sooloh Madqa Faaticisemik Dagoo Ayyaamittek Lakal Parlamah Afteenit (MPs) Doolat Kompeter Baatil Xayyossuh Gersi Daqwissah Tan Madqa Xayyosse.
data.amh: አወዛጋቢው የፌዴራል ጠቅላይ አቃቤ ሕግ ማቋቋሚያ ረቂቅ ሕግ ፓርላማ አባላት ከፀደቀ ከጥቂት ሳምንታት በኋላ መንግሥት ሌላ አከራካሪ የሆነ የኮምፒዩተር ወንጀል ረቂቅ ሕግ አቅርቧል።
data.orm: Erga wixineen seeraa walfalmsiisaan hundeeffama Waajjira Abbaa Alangaa Federaalaa mirkaneessa miseensota paarlaamaa (MP) argatee torbanoota muraasa booda, mootummaan ammas yakka kompiwuteraaf dhiyeessuuf wixinee seeraa walfalmisiisaa kan biraa galche.
data.som: “Dhowr toddobaad kadib markii uu sharcigii muranka dhaliyay ee lagu dhisay Xafiiska Xeer Ilaaliyaha Guud ee Qaranka uu ansixiyay xubnaha baarlamaanka (Xildhibaannada), dowladdu ayaa soo gudbiyay sharci qabyo kale oo muran badan dhaliyay si uu u caddeeyo dembiyada kombiyuutarka”.

data.eng: Ethiopia first introduced cybercrimes in the 2004 Criminal Code which penalizes only cybercrimes of ‘hacking’, ‘dissemination of malware’ and ‘denial of service (DoS) attacks’.
data.aaf: Ityoppiya Sayber Baatilitte Qimboh Addah Sanat 2004 Qimbisse Baatil Kooxe Sayber Baatilittek "Hucking" Baxcissam Kee Affaf Angodda ( DoS) Maysattakooki Dibuk Digaalta.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ ለመጀመርያ ጊዜ በ2004 በወንጀለኛ መቅጫ ህግ ላይ ያስተዋወቀችው የሳይበር ወንጀሎች የሚቀጣቸው ‘መጥለፍን’፣ ‘ማልዌር ማሰራጨትን’ እና ‘የአገልግሎት መካድ ጥቃት’ ወንጀሎችን ብቻ ነው።
data.orm: Itoopiyaan yakka saayiberii kan 'hanna interneetaa(hacking)', 'vaayirasii kompiteraa raabsuu' fi 'haleellaa tajaajila dhorkachuu (DoS)' qofa adabsiisu yeroo jalqabaaf Seera Yakkaa bara 2004 keesatti beeksifte.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa markii ugu horreysay soo saartay dambiyada kusaabsan khadka sannadkii 2004 tii Xeerka Dambiyada kaas oo ciqaabaya kaliya dambiyada khadka ee ‘hacking’ ga, ‘faafinta malware’ ka iyo ‘diidada adeegga (DoS) weerarada.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ገበን ሳይበር ንመጀመርታ ግዜ ዘተኣታተወት ብቲ ንምዝራፍ መርበብ፣ ምዝርጋሕ ሓደገኛ ሶፍትዌርን ጥቕዓት ምኽልካል ግልጋሎትን ዝቐፅዕን ብ2004 ዝወፀን ሕጊ መቕፅዒ ገበን እዩ።

data.eng: Seven law enforcements officers and an unknown number of armed protesters were killed in the series of clashes that happened on Monday in West Arsi zone of the Oromia Regional State.

data.amh: ሪፖርቱ የተዘጋጀው በኢትዮጵያ እና በሱዳን መንግስታት ጥያቄ ሲሆን ከአፍሪካ ቀንድ በሊቢያ በኩል ወደ አውሮፓ እየተካሄደ ያለውን ህገወጥ ተግባር “አደገኛ እና የተደራጀ ህገወጥ ንግድ” ሲል ገልፆታል።
data.orm: Gabaasichi kan qophaa'e gaaffi mootummoota Itoopiyaa fi Sudaan irratti hundaa'uuni akkasumas inni hojiilee seeraa alaa Gaanfa Afrikaa irraa kahuun karaa Liibiyaa Awurooppaa seenu "daldala seeraan alaa hamaa fi qindaa'e" jechuun ibsa.
data.som: Warbixinta ayaa lagu soo diyaariyay codsi ka yimid dowladaha Itoobiya iyo Suudaan waxayna ku tilmaantay dhaq dhaqaaqyada sharci darrada ah ee ka socda Geeska Afrika ee la sii marinayo Liibiya ilaa Yurub “ganacsi sharci darro ah oo khatar ah oo abaabulan”.
data.tir: እቲ ፀብፃብ ብመሰረት ሕቶ መንግስታት ኢትዮጵያን ሱዳንን ዝተዳለወ ኰይኑ ካብ ቀርኒ ኣፍሪካ ብሊብያ ኣቢሉ ናብ ኣውሮፓ ዝግበሩ ዘይሕጋዊ ምንቅስቓሳት "ሓደገኛን ዝተወደበን ሕቡእ ንግዲ" ዝትንትን እዩ።

data.eng: The 39-page report entitled, “Human Smuggling and Trafficking on the Horn of Africa-Central Mediterranean Route” was made public February 19, 2016 during a consultation meeting organized by the new ISSP office, which was opened in Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: " afrikah gaysal-fanti mediterianih gital ummatta gexay kee gaco " iyya ammontal caxah alsak 19 sanat 2016 xayyowte 39 gali takke reportil, addis ababal fakkiime qusba ISSP kutbeh buxa xayyosse walal gudgudul qaddosen.
data.amh: “ከአፍሪካ ቀንድ-መካከለኛው የሜዲትራኒያን የሰዎች ኮንትሮባንድና ዝውውር” በሚል ርዕስ የቀረበው ባለ 39 ገጽ ሪፖርት፣ የካቲት 19 ቀን 2016 በአዲስ አበባ በተከፈተው በአዲሱ አይኤስኤስፒ ጽሕፈት ቤት ባዘጋጀው የምክክር መድረክ ላይ ይፋ ሆኗል።
data.orm: Gabaasichi fuula-39 mata dureen isaa, "Daddabarsa namaa seeraa alaa fi kontribaandii Karaa Gaanfa Afrikaa-Mediteraaniyaa Giddugaleessa" tahe gaafa Guraandhala 19, 2016 yeroo walgahii maree waajjira ISSO haaraan qindeeffame, kan Addis Ababaa keessatti baname irratti ifa tahe.
data.som: Warbixintan ka kooban 39 bog oo ciwaankeedu ahaa, “Ka ganacsiga dadka iyo ka ganacsiga marinka Geeska Afrika iyo Bartamaha Mediterranean ka” ayaa la shaaciyay 19 kii February 2016, intii lagu guda jiray shir wadatashi ah oo uu soo qabanqaabiyay xafiiska cusub ee ISSP, kaasoo ka furmay Addis Ababa.
data.tir: እቲ "ዘይሕጋዊ ምስግጋርን ንግድን ደቅሰባት ካብ ቀርኒ ኣፍሪካ ክሳብ ማእኸላይ ሜዲትራኒያን" ዘርእስቱን 39 ገፃት ዘለዎን ፀብፃብ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ዝተኸፈተ ሓድሽ ቤት ፅሖፈት ኣይ ኤስ ኤስ ፒ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ 16 ፌብሩዋሪ 2016 ኣብ ዘካየዶ ምምኽኻር እዩ ንህዝቢ ዕላዊ ተገይሩ።

data.eng: But as of Thursday, a wave of protester and unrest has been observed in Finote Selam and Bure, towns in West Gojam Zone of the Amhara Regional State, becoming the latest regions to join the mood of protest in the regional state.

data.amh: በአማራ ክልል ምዕራብ ጎጃም ዞን ፍኖተ ሰላም እና ቡሬ ከተሞች የተቃውሞ ሰልፈኞች እና ሁከቶች እስከ ሀሙስ ድረስ ተስተውሏል ፣ይህም የክልሉን የተቃውሞ ስሜት የተቀላቀሉ አዲስ ቦታዎች ሆነዋል።

data.som: Balse laga bilaabo Khamiis, ayaa magaalada Finote Selam iyo Bure oo kamid ah magaalooyinka Galbeedka Gojam ee dowlad deegaanka Axmaarada laga dareemayay mawjado mudaaharaad iyo rabshado ah, kuwaas oo noqday goboladii ugu dambeeyay ee kusoo biiray dareenka mudaharaadka ee ka socda dowlad deegaanka.

data.eng: The ruling Ethiopian Peoples' Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF) and opposition parties have recently put their differences aside and have agreed to come to a roundtable to find ways of redeeming the already tense political environment.
data.aaf: miraacissa Itiyoppiyah Ummattak Amobbaxxaqah Ximokraasih Fooci ( EPRDF) kee sadi partitte xayih baxsa gambih gcabah taqabit suge siyaasa xinisso catoonuh bica fanah akah yamaaten innah sittin gey aben.
data.amh: ገዢው የኢትዮጵያ ህዝቦች አብዮታዊ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ግንባር (ኢህአዴግ) እና ተቃዋሚ ፓርቲዎች በቅርቡ ልዩነታቸውን ወደ ጎን በመተው ውጥረት ላይ የነበረውን የፖለቲካ ምህዳር ለመታደግ ወደ ድርድር ለመምጣት ተስማምተዋል።
data.orm: Addi Diimokiraatawaa Warraaqsa Ummattoota Itoopiyaa (EPDRF) fi jaarmiyaalee mormitootaa dhiyeenya kana garagarummaa isaanii cinatti dhiisuun waliin ta'anii karaa haala siyaasaa durayyuu hammaate ittiin furan barbaaduuf waliigalan.
data.som: Xisbiga haya talada dalka Itoobiya ee EPRDF iyo xisbiyada mucaaradka ayaa dhawaanahan meel iska dhigay khilaafaadkii u dhaxeeyay, waxayna ku heshiiyeen in ay isugu yimaadaan shirweyne lagu raadinayo sidii looga soo fursan lahaa jawiga siyaasadeed ee markii horeba kacsanaa.
data.tir: እቲ ገዛኢ ውድብ ወያናይ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ግንባር ህዝብታት ኢትዮጵያን ተቓወምቲ ውድባትን ኣብዚ ቀረባ እዋን ኣፈላላያቶም ናብ ጎኒ ብምግዳፍ ንቲ ውጥረት ዝበዝሖ ኩነታት ፖለቲካ ንምፍታሕ ዝከኣለሎም መገድታት ኣብ ዙርያ ጠረጴዛ ንምፍታሽ ተሰማሚዖም።

data.eng: The parties have so far been discussing on modalities of negotiation, which would serve them as a bylaw for their future dialogue.
data.aaf: missoynaani ciggilta walalittel edde xinta akkuk edde yantifiqoonuwaan bicittel ahamfanah walalakaay sugen.
data.amh: ፓርቲዎቹ ለቀጣይ ውይይታቸው መተዳደሪያ ደንብ ሆኖ የሚያገለግላቸውን የድርድር ዘዴዎች ላይ እስካሁን ሲወያዩ ቆይተዋል።
data.orm: Jaarmiyaaleen sunneen haga ammaatti karaalee marii, marii fuulduraaf seeraatti isaan gargaarau irratti mari'achaa turan.
data.som: Dhinacyada ayaa illaa hadda ka wadatashanaya qaabka wada xaajoodka, kaas oo u adeegaya xeer hoosaadkii wada hadalkooda mustaqbalka.

data.eng: Nonetheless, the parties are finding it hard to agree on some points, which would be the legal framework.
data.aaf: Takkay ikkah missoynaani inki inki ximmoomal siita geyaanam xiiqeweenim kee tak kaadu madqa gitakaay akkele.
data.amh: ሆኖም ፓርቲዎቹ በአንዳንድ ነጥቦች ላይ ለመስማማት እየተቸገሩ ሲሆን ይህም የሕግ ማዕቀፍ ይሆናል።

data.eng: President Sahle-Work Zewde has been selected as one of the World’s Most Powerful Women of 2019 by Forbes.
data.aaf: Prezdenti sahle work zawdu forbes 2019 baadak kaxxam caylaleelah tan sayyok tiyak teena akkuk doorimte.

data.eng: Ahmed Shide for his part said “the Cooperation Framework is the planned support of the UN Agencies to the national development priorities of Ethiopia as shown in the Ten Years Perspective Plan and the Home Grown Economic Reform.”
data.aaf: Acmad shide isi kabuk iyyemihii " sittin qokol mabbuxu galli maroh eglaalik tabna sanatih Ekraaro kee baaxoh addal taabuke qidaddo maysasa akah tanbalennah ityoppiyah baaxoh daddosul qimbo akah tacee caagiidal aboonuh ekraarisen qokol kinnimiiy warse.
data.amh: "የትብብር ማዕቀፉ የተባበሩት መንግስታት ድርጅት ኤጀንሲዎች በአስር አመት እይታ እቅድ እና በሀገር በቀል ኢኮኖሚ ማሻሻያ ላይ እንደታየው ለኢትዮጵያ አገራዊ ልማት ቅድሚያ የሚሰጧቸው ጉዳዮች ላይ የታቀደ ድጋፍ ነው" ብለዋል አቶ አህመድ ሺዴ።
data.orm: Ahmed Shidee gama isaan "Caasaan Waldeggersaa deggersa ejensiilee UN irraa guddina biyyoolesaa Itoopiyaa dursi kennameef akka Karoora Waggoota Kudhan gara fuulduraa fi Rifoormii Diinagdee Biyya Keessaa keessatti agarsiimetti karoorarfameedha.
data.som: Axmed Shide ayaa isna dhiniciisa yidhi “Hab shaqeedka iskaashigu waa taageerada qorshaysan ee hay’adaha Qaramada Midoobay ku siinayaan mudnaanaha horumarinta qaranka ee Itoobiya sida ka muuqata Qorshaha Tobanka Sano ee Aragtida iyo Dib u habaynta Dhaqaalaha Guriga”.

data.eng: The Finance Minister hailed the signing of the cooperation framework which comes at a time when Ethiopia is undergoing a major strategic shift to embark on a transformational growth while fighting against the pandemic.

data.eng: The one-day exhibition is part of the annual celebrations to mark the 120th anniversary of the diplomatic relations between Ethiopia and the Russian Federation.
data.aaf: Inki-ayroh walalal itiyoppiya kee ruusiyah federationik 120 heele diplomaasih angaarawih qaffaydah sabab abaak yassakaxxen sanatih qiidi kinni.
data.amh: የአንድ ቀን አውደ ርዕይ የኢትዮጵያ እና የሩሲያ ፌዴሬሽን 120ኛ አመት ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ግንኙነት የምስረታ በዓልን ምክንያት በማድረግ የሚከበረው ዓመታዊ ክብረ በዓል አካል ነው።
data.orm: Agarsiisi guyyaa tokko sun qaama qophii waggaa waggaan walitti dhufeenya dippiloomaasii Itoopiyaa fi Federeeshinii Raashiyaa gidduu 120ffaa yaadachuuti.
data.som: Bandhigan oo soconaya maalin ayaa wuxu qeyb ka yahay dabaaldaga sanadlaha ah ee lagu xusayo 120 guurada kasoo wareegtay xidhiidhka diblumaasiyadeed ee u dhaxeeya Itoobiya iyo Federaalka Ruushka.
data.tir: እቲ ናይ ሓደ መዓልቲ ኤግዚቪሽን ኣካል እቲ መበል 120 ዓመት ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ዝምድናታት ኢትዮጵያን ፌዴሬሽን ሩስያን ንምኽባር ዝካየድ ዓመታዊ ፅምብል እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopia and the Russian Federation established diplomatic relations in 1898, just after the Battle of Adwa.
data.aaf: Ityoppiya kee ruusiyah federation fantaaxaw qimbisem qaxwah carbiik lakaay sanat 1898 kinni.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እና የሩሲያ ፌዴሬሽን ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ግንኙነት የጀመሩት ከአድዋ ጦርነት በኋላ በ1898 ነው።
data.orm: Itoopiyaa fi Federeeshiniin Raashiyaa walitti dhufeenya dippiloomaasii bara 1898 keessa, Waraana Aduwaa booda hundeessan.
data.som: Itoobiya iyo Federaalka Ruushka ayaa xidhiidh diblumaasiyadeed sameeyey 1898dii, wax yar ka dib dagaalkii Adwa.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ፌዴሬሽን ሩስያን ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ዝምድና ዝመስረታ ብ1898 ልክዕ ድሕሪ ኲናት ዓድዋ እዩ ነይሩ።

data.eng: Abiy, who recalled EPRDF’s decision to limit the term of office, said an amendment that would help to limit the term of office for the Prime Minister will be added in the constitution shortly.

data.eng: The Nobel Committee awarded the prize for Abiy for his efforts to achieve peace and international cooperation, particularly for his decisive initiative to resolve the border conflict with neighboring Eritrea last year, three months after he came to power in April 2018.
data.aaf: Noobil makaado acwa akah tecem abiyyi salaam akah baarisanna kee baad caddoh qokol baarisuh abeh yan macalay baxsaluk tature sanat cugganeh tan eretrallih boddeh sugte cuduud booditte yafdiguh yubluuseh yan baxsaleh yan uguugusu qasa dirrik 2018 reedah yemeeteemik sidooca alsaak laka kinni.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የውሃ እና መስኖ ሚኒስትር ስለሺ በቀለ፣ የሱዳን የውሃ ሀብትና መስኖ ሚኒስትር ሙአታዝ ሙሳ፤ እና የግብፅ የውሃ ሃብት እና መስኖ ሚኒስትር መሀመድ አብደል አቲ በስብሰባው ላይ ተገኝተዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Bishaanii fi Jallisii Itoopiyaa Siileshii Baqqalee, Ministeerri Qabeenya Bishaanii fi Jallisii Sudaan Mu'aataaz Muusaa; fi Ministeerri Qabeenya Bishaanii fi Jallisii Gibxii Mohaammed Abdel Atii walgahicha hirmaachaa turan.
data.som: Guddiga Nobel ka ayaa abaal marintan ku abaalmariyay Abiy dadaalkiisa nabadda iyo iskaashiga caalamiga ah, gaar ahaan dadaalkiisii go’aansanaa ee uu ku xalliyey colaadda xuduudka ah ee uu la wadaago dalka ay deriska yihiin ee Eritrea sannadkii hore, saddex bilood kaddib markii uu xukunka qabtay bishii Abriil 2018 kii.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ማይን መስኖን ኢትዮጵያ ስለሺ በቀለ፣ ሚኒስትር ሃፍቲ ማይን መስኖን ሱዳን ሙዓታዝ ሙሳንሚኒስትር ሃፍቲ ማይን መስኖን ግብፂ መሓመድ ዓብደል ዓጢን ኣብቲ ኣኼባ ክሳተፉ ፀኒሖም እዮም።

data.eng: The PM is the 100th winner and was selected from 223 private and 78 organization nominees.
data.aaf: Naharsi malaak 100 heele yeyse kinnim kee 223 canka kee 78 eglah qalaleenitiki doorime.
data.amh: አብይ ሰላምን ለማስፈን እና አለም አቀፍ ትብብርን ለማምጣት ላደረጉት ጥረት በተለይም ከጎረቤት ኤርትራ ጋር ባለፈው አመት ወደ ስልጣን ከመጡ ከሶስት ወራት በኋላ የድንበር ግጭት ለመፍታት ላሳዩት ወሳኝ ተነሳሽነት በሚያዝያ 2018 የኖቤል ኮሚቴ ሽልማቱን ሰጥተቷቸዋል።
data.orm: Koreen Noobelii badhaasicha Abiyyiin, tattaaffii inni nagaa fi waldeggersa addunyaa fiduuf godheef, keessumaa kaka'umsa isaa murteessaa waldhabdee daangaa biyya ollaa Ertiraa wajjin ture furuuf waggaa darbe fudhateef, Eebla 2018 keessa gara aangootti dhufee ji'oota sadii booda badhaase.
data.som: Guddiga Nobel ayaa abaal marintan ku abaalmariyay Abiy dadaalkiisa nabadda iyo iskaashiga caalamiga ah, gaar ahaan dadaalkiisii go’aansanaa ee uu ku xalliyey colaadda xuduudka ah ee uu la wadaago dalka ay deriska yihiin ee Eritrea sannadkii hore, saddex bilood kaddib markii uu xukunka qabtay bishii Abriil 2018 kii.

data.eng: The 10th criminal bench of the Federal Supreme Court granted police 14 days additional time for further investigation on Abdi Oumer Mohammed, former president of the Somali region and accomplices.

data.eng: The lawyers of the defendants contested the request for additional time. However, police requested for the additional time, arguing that the case demands deep investigation.

data.eng: The joint forces have taken control of the Zobl mountainous area and other very significant towns including Arjo, Fokissa and Boren.
data.aaf: Yengele Cayli Zoobil Qaleelih Dariifa kee Arjo,fokis kee Borena edde anuuk kaxxa caddabna leh tan magaalol edde anuuk lowsisi gubat heen.

data.eng: The United States Agency for International Development (USAID) has launched a 52 million dollars five year program to help pastoralists in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: United state badda caddoh daddoosih ejensi (USAID) ityoppiyal geytimta dacarsittoh xiina catoonuh 52 milliyonih dollaraka koona santih taddeera yiyxixxigen.
data.amh: ጥምር ሃይሉ የዞብል ተራራማ አካባቢ እና አርጆ፣ ፎቂሳ እና ቦረንን ጨምሮ አስፈላጊ የሆኑ ከተሞችን ተቆጣጥሯል።
data.orm: Humnoonni tokkooman naannoo gaarreen Zoobilii fi magaalota baayyee murteessoo tahan akka Arjoo, Fokkisaa fi Booren to'atan.
data.som: Hay’adda Maraykanka u qaabilsan horumarinta caalamiga ah ee USAID ayaa daah furtay mashruuc shan sano ah oo ay ku caawinayso xoolo dhaqatada Itoobiya, kaas oo ay ku baxayso lacag dhan 52 milyan oo dollar.
data.tir: እቶም ሓይልታት ጥምረት ንበረኽቲ ከባበረኽቲብታት ዞብል ከምኡ'ውን ንኣርጆ፣ ፎኪሳን ቦረንን ሓዊሱ ንኻልኦት ኣገደሽቲ ከተማታት ተቈፃፂሮም።

data.eng: The program called “Pastoralist Areas Resilience Improvement and Market Expansion – PRIME” is jointly designed with global climate change initiative and will be implemented from October 2012 up to 2017 in 36 districts found in Oromia, Afar and Somali regions.
data.aaf: Dacarsittoh Xiina Dariifa Yaysiiseenim elle Xiiqan dudda kee qadaaga baarisiyya-pime diqsitta taddera baad caddok silayti milaagih ugutmalluk sittallih mexeenim kee kaxxa garabluy sanat 2012 ilaa 2017 fanah oromiyaay,qafaray kee soomali rakaakayittel geytimta 36 takke daqortil abtol asisoonuwaanamaay qaddosen.
data.amh: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ዓለም አቀፍ የልማት ኤጀንሲ (ዩኤስኤአይዲ) በኢትዮጵያ የሚገኙ አርብቶ አደሮችን ለመርዳት የ52 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የአምስት ዓመት መርሃ ግብር ጀምሯል።
data.orm: Ejensiin Guddina Addunyawaa Yunaatid Isteetis (USAID) tikfattee bultoota Itoopiyaa keessa gargaaruuf sagantaa waggaa shanii doolaara miliyoona 52 eegale.
data.som: Barnaamijkan oo loogu magac daray "Kobcinta u adkeysiga Degaanada Xoola dhaqatada iyo Balaadhinta Suuqa - PRIME" ayaa si wada jir ah loogu nashqadeeyay hindise isbadalka cimilada aduunka waxaana laga hirgalin doonaa bisha October 2012 ilaa 2017 36 degmo oo laga helay gobolada Oromia, Canfarta iyo Soomaalida.
data.tir: ዓለምለኸ ትካል ልምዓት ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ንኣርባሕቲ ከፍቲ ንምሕጋዝ 52 ሚልዮን ዶላር ዘውፅእ መደብ 5 ዓመት ኣበጊሱ።

data.eng: Ethiopia is building a $4.3 billion, 6,000-megawatt hydropower plant on the Blue Nile River, the main tributary of the Nile River that provides Egypt with most of its water.
data.aaf: Ityoppiya 4.3 Billiyoonih dollraat 6000 megawatt cayla racisuwa blue nayilih daqaaralay xisak geytimta Xisnet Masrih Dudda Le Lee Akak Geytuwaytam Warse
data.amh: “የአርብቶ አደር አካባቢዎችን የመቋቋም አቅም ማሻሻል እና የገበያ መስፋፋት - ፕራይም” የተሰኘው መርሃ ግብር ከአለም አቀፍ የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ ተነሳሽነት ጋር በጋራ የተነደፈ ሲሆን ከጥቅምት 2012 እስከ 2017 ድረስ በኦሮሚያ፣ አፋር እና ሶማሌ ክልሎች በሚገኙ 36 ወረዳዎች ተግባራዊ ይሆናል።
data.orm: Sagantichi "Damdamannaa Fooyyessuu fi Gabaa Babal'isuu Naanno Tikfattee Bultootaa - PRIME" jedhame kaka'umsa jijjiirama qilleensaa addunyaa wajjin waltahuun kan saxaxamee fi Onkoloolessa 2012 irraa haga 2017'tti aanaalee naannoolee Oromiyaa, Affaarii fi Somaalee 36 keessatti hojiirra oola.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa dhisaysa wabiga Niilka Buluuga ah, warshad korontada oo dhan 6,000 oo megawatt oo kubaxayso lacag dhan 4.3 bilyan oo doollar, taasoo ah marinka ugu weyn ee webiga Niil oo Masar inta badan ay ka hesho biyaha.
data.tir: "ምምሕያሽ ተፃዋርነትን ምግፋሕ ዕዳጋን ሰበኽ ሳግም" ተባሂሉ ዝፅዋዕ እዚ መደብ ምስ ዓለምለኻዊ ተበግሶ ከባቢያዊ ለውጢ ብሓባር ዝተወጠነ ኰይኑ ካብ ጥቅምቲ 2012 ክሳብ 2017 ኣብ 36 ወረዳታት ኦሮሚያ፣ ዓፋርን ሶማሌን ክትግበር እዩ።

data.eng: The dam, to be completed by 2017, has raised concerns in Egypt that it will cut supplies of water allocated by accords put in place more than five decades ago.
data.aaf: Awrobbah loowok sanat 2017 gaba kaluwa karawwada Kontom Sanatak Naharal dffeye sitta elle geen sittin geyili amrisen leeh qadada masril bohoy xiiniseh geytima.

data.som: Itoobiya ayaa dhisaysa wabiga Niilka Buluuga ah, warshad korontada oo dhan 6,000 oo megawatt oo kubaxayso lacag dhan 4.3 bilyan oo doolar, taasoo ah marinka ugu weyn ee webiga Niil oo Masar inta badan ay ka hesho biyaha.

data.eng: Biratu Yigezu, director general of CSA, told FBC yesterday that preparations are nearing completion to undertake the census after two months.

data.amh: በዚህ ወር ሊጀመር ታቅዶ የነበረው ቆጠራ በተለያዩ የቴክኒክ ችግሮች ምክንያት ወደ መጪው የካቲት መራዘሙን ኤጀንሲው አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Lakkoofsi ummataa, ji'a kana keessa akka eegalamu karoorfame, sababa rakkoolee teekinikaa gargaraaf ji'a Guraandhala itti aanuttu dabarfame, akka ejensichi jedhetti
data.som: Tirakoobka oo qorshuhu ahaa in uu bilowdo bishan ayaa dib loo dhigay bisha soo socota ee February sababo la xiriira cilad farsamo oo kala duwan, sida ay sheegtay hay’addu.
data.tir: ዋና ዳይሬክተር ሲ ኤስ ኤ ቢራቱ ይገዙ ትማሊ ንፋና ብሮድካስቲንግ ኮርፖሬት ከምዝገለፅዎ ንቲ ምቊፃር ህዝብን ኣባይትን ድሕሪ ክልተ ኣዋርሕ ንምክያድ ምድላዋት ኣብ ምዝዛም ይርከቡ።

data.eng: Ethiopia and Equatorial Guinea today signed a reciprocal visa waiver agreement for holders of diplomatic and service passports.
data.aaf: Ityoppiya kee ekuatorial guinea diplomaatik kee affaf passporti tabbixe korta visah sittin geyil asaaku gili heen.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እና ኢኳቶሪያል ጊኒ የዲፕሎማቲክ እና የአገልግሎት ፓስፖርት ለያዙ የጋራ ቪዛ የመሰረዝ ስምምነት ዛሬ ተፈራረሙ።
data.orm: Birraatuu Yigezuu, daarikteerri waliigalaa CSA, lakkoofsa ummataa sana ji'oota lama booda geggeessuuf qophiileen xumuramuu gahaa akka jiran kaleessa FBC tti hime.
data.som: Biratu Yigezu, oo ah agaasimaha guud ee CSA, ayaa u sheegay FBC shalay in diyaar garowgu uu gabo gabo ku dhow yahay in la qabto tirakoob labo bilood kadib.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ኢኳቶርያል ጊኒን ናይ ዲፕሎማሲን ኣገልግሎትን ፓስፖርትታት ንዝሓዙ ዜጋታተን ብዘይ ቪዛ ናብ ሃገራተን ክኣትው ክኣትው ዝፈቅድ ስምምዕ ሎሚ ተፈራሪመን።

data.eng: The agreement was signed by State Minister Hirut Zemene and Don Simeon Oyono, Minister of Foreign Affairs of Equatorial Guinea.
data.aaf: Sittin geyil ciggilta malaak Heerut zemene kee ekuatorial guineak iroh caagidah malaak Don Simeon Oyono giliiy heen
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ እና ኢኳቶሪያል ጊኒ የዲፕሎማቲክ እና የአገልግሎት ፓስፖርት ለያዙ የተገላቢጦሽ ቪዛ ስምምነት ዛሬ ተፈራረሙ።
data.orm: Itoopiyaa fi Iqu'itoriyaal Giiniin har'a namoota paasportii dippiloomaasii fi tajaajilaa qabaniif gama lachuun visa'n akka hin barbaachifne godhu mallatteessan.
data.som: Itoobiya iyo Equatorial Guinea ayaa maanta kala saxiixday heshiis ka tanaasulid fiisaha isdhaafsiga ah ee dadka haysta baasaboorka diblomaasiga iyo midka adeegga.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያን ኢኳቶርያል ጊኒን ናይ ዲፕሎማሲን ኣገልግሎትን ፓስፖርትታት ንዝሓዙ ዜጋታተን ብዘይ ቪዛ ናብ ሃገራተን ክኣትው ክኣትውዝፈቅድ ስምምዕ ሎሚ ተፈራሪመን።

data.eng: On the occasion, President Dr. Mulatu Teshome congratulated the newly appointed Ethiopian Ambassadors on their appointment and wished a successful tenure.
data.aaf: qaffaydah aracal prezdinti Dr Mulatu Teshome qusubih muggaaqisen ityoppiyah ambasadderitteh unkaqiinoh farmo tatruse.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ዜጎች ለማህበራዊ ፍትህ፤ ከአርበኞች ግንቦት 7፣ ከኢትዮጵያውያን ዴሞክራሲያዊ ፓርቲ (ኢዴፓ)፣ ከመላው ኢትዮጵያ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ፓርቲ (መኢዴፓ)፣ ከሰማያዊ ፓርቲ፣ ከአዲስ ትውልድ ፓርቲ(አትፓ) ፣ ከጋምቤላ ክልል ንቅናቄ (ጋክን) እና ከአንድነት ለፍትህ እና ለዴሞክራሲ ፓርቲ (አንድነት) ውህደት መፍረስ የመነጨ መሆኑ ታውቋል።
data.orm: Sochiin Haqa Hawaasaa Lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa diigamuu Arbanyooch Caamsaa 7, Jaarmiyaan Dimokiraatawaa Itoopiyaa (EDP), Jaarmiyaan Dimokiraatawaa Lammiiwwan Itoopiyaa Hundaa (AEDP), Jaarmiyaan Semaayaawwii, Jaarmiyaan Dhaloota Haaraa (NGP), Sochii Naannoo Gaambeelaa (GRM), fi Jaarmiyaan Tokkummaan Dimokiraasii fi Haqaafii (UDJ) irraa akka dhufe hubatame.
data.som: Muwaadiniinta Itoobiya ee Caddaaladda Bulshada waxay ka soo unkameen burburkii Patriotic Genbot 7, Ethiopian Democratic Party (EDP), All Ethiopian Democratic Party (AEDP), Semayawi Party, New Generation Party (NGP), Dhaqdhaqaaqa Gobolka Gambella (GRM), iyo Midnimada Dimuqraadiyada. iyo xisbiga cadaalada (UDJ), ayaa laga bartay
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያዊ ዜግነት ንማሕበራዊ ፍትሒ ዝተመስረተ ሃርበኛ ግምባር ግንቦት 7፣ ኢትዮጵያውያን ዴሞክራሲያዊ ፓርቲ (ኢዲፒ)፣ መላእ ኢትዮጵያ ዴሞክራሲያዊ ፓርቲ (መኢዴፓ)፣ ሰማያዊ ፓርቲ፣ ሓድሽ ወለዶ ፓርቲ (ኤን ጂ ፒ)፣ ክልላዊ ምንቅስቓስ ጋምቤላ (ጂ ኣር ኤም) ከምኡ'ውን ሕብረት ንዴሞክራስን ፍትሕን (ዩ ዲ ጄይ) ንዓርሶም ምሰፍረሱ እዩ።

data.eng: President Mulatu noted that the Ambassadors shoulder great responsibility in promoting Ethiopia’s tourism, attracting investment in a bid to support developmental activities.
data.aaf: Ambasadderitte ityoppiyah turuzim yaysexexegoonu kee daddos angagoyitte qokoloonuuy investimentitte yacsuboonuh kaxxa masquulioyyat loonum prezdenti dokter mulatu qaddose.
data.amh: በበአሉ ላይ ፕሬዝዳንት ዶ/ር ሙላቱ ተሾመ አዲስ የተሾሙትን የኢትዮጵያ አምባሳደሮች የእንኳን ደስ ያላችሁ እና የመልካም ምኞት መልዕክታቸውን አስተላልፈዋል።
data.orm: Qophicha irratti, Pirasdaanti Dr. Mulaatuu Teshoomee muudama isaanii irratti Ambasaaddaroota Itoopiyaa haaraa muudamaniin baga gammadan jechuun bara hojii milkaa'aa hawwaniif.
data.som: Munaasabadan waxaa ka hadlay Madaxweyne Dr. Mulatu Teshome oo u hambalyeeyay safiirada cusub ee Itoobiya loo magacaabay, isagoo u rajeeyay in ay guul ku gaaraan.
data.tir: ኣብቲ እዋን ፕሬዚደንት ዶክተር ሙላቱ ተሾመ ንቶም ሓድሽ ዝተሾሙ ኣምሳደራት እንኳዕ ደስ በለኩም ድሕሪ ምባል ዕውት ግዜ ስራሕ ተመንዮምሎም።

data.eng: The Commercial Bank of Ethiopia (CBE) announced that it is ready to serve the 1 million Ethiopian Diaspora expected to come to their home country for twenty-four hours seven days a week and provide several financial services.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Tellemmo Bank (CBE) 1 milliyon takke itiyoppiyah diyaspoora baaxo fanah amaatuk ayyamat malcina ayroorah labatanna kee affara saaqatah affaf yacuh bicieh geytimam yiysixxige
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ንግድ ባንክ (ሲ ቢ ኢ) ወደ ሀገር ቤት ይመጣሉ ተብለው የሚጠበቁ 1 ሚሊዮን ኢትዮጵያውያን ዲያስፖራዎችን 24 ሰዓት፣ 7 ቀን በሳምንት ለማገልገል እና በርካታ የፋይናንስ አገልግሎቶችን ለማቅረብ ዝግጁ መሆኑን አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Baankiin Daldala Itoophiyaa (BDI) Diyaaspooraa lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa miliyoona 1 gara biyyaa isaanitti ni dhufu jedhamanii eegamaniif torbeetti guyyaa torban sa'atii digdamii-afuriif tajaajiluu fi tajaajila maallaqaa garagaraa kennuuf qophaa'uu isaa beeksise.
data.som: Bangiga Ganacsiga ee Itoobiya ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in uu diyaar u yahay in uu u adeego 1 milyan ee Qurbajoogta Itoobiya ee la filayo in ay dalkooda yimaadaan afar iyo labaatan saacadood todobaad ka oo dhan, isla markaana ay bixiyaan adeegyo maaliyadeed oo kala gadisan.
data.tir: ባንኪ ንግዲ ኢትዮጵያ ነቶም ናብ ኢትዮጵያ ክመፁ ትፅቢት ዝግበረሎም ሓደ ሚልዮን ኢትዮጵያዊያን ዲያስፖራ ዝተፈላለዩ ኣገልግሎታት ገንዘብ ንምቕራብ ዘኽእል ናይ 24 ሰዓታትን ሸውዓተ መዓልቲታት ኣብ ሰሙንን ምድላው ከምዝገበረ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Speaking to ENA, Commercial Bank of Ethiopia CEO, Abie Sano said the visit of 1 million Ethiopian Diaspora is a good news to the bank and the bank is making preparations to further develop packages and refresh services.
data.aaf: Iziyah yece maybalaalqal Itiyoppiyak tellemmo bankik eddecaba taama sele gifta Abie Sano akah iyyennahaay 1 milliyon takke diyaspoora gufne abtam bankih meqe xaagu kinnim qaddoosaak banki ciggilta baakeejitte ginak affaf akah yaqusbuusennah bicitte abak geytimam warse.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ንግድ ባንክ ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ አቢ ሳኖ ለኢዜአ እንደተናገረው የ1 ሚሊዮን ኢትዮጵያውያን ዲያስፖራ ጉብኝት ለባንኩ መልካም ዜና መሆኑን እና ባንኩም የጥቅልና መዝናኛ አገልግሎቶችን የበለጠ ለማጎልበት ዝግጅት እያደረገ ነዉ።
data.orm: ENA'tti dubbachuun, Hojii-gaggeessaa Olaanaan Baankii Daldala Itoophiyaa, Abii Saanoon daawwannaan Diyaaspooraa Itoophiyaa miliyoona 1 baankichaaf oduu gaarii fi baankichis tajaajiloota kuufamaa fi haaromsaa dabalataan dhiyeessuuf qophii irraa jira jedhaniiru.
data.som: Maareeya guud ee bangiga Ganacsiga Itoobiya Abie Sano oo la hadlay ENA ayaa sheegay in socdaalka 1 milyan ee Qurbajoogta Itoobiya uu yahay war wanaagsan oo bangiga u soo diraya, bangiguna uu isku diyaarinayo sidii loo horumarin lahaa guntimaha iyo adeegyada cuscusub
data.tir: ዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕ ባንኪ ንግዲ ኢትዮጵያ ኣይተ ኣብዪ ሳኖ ሓደ ሚልዮን ኢትዮጵያዊያን ዲያስፖራ ናብ ሃገሮም ዝኣትዉ ምኳኖም ንዓና ፅቡቕ ዜና እዩ ስለዝኾነ ድማ እቲ ባንኪ ዝተፈላለዩ ጥሙርን ሓዱሽን ኣገልግሎታት ንምብርካት ምድላው ገይሩ ኣሎ ኢሉ።

data.eng: The bank has launched a booking system called Gate Rooms, which enables the diaspora to book hotels from where they are, the CEO revealed, adding that members of the diaspora who come to Ethiopia could easily make booking, pay, and book online.
data.aaf: Ta banki Gate Rooms diqsita sisteem biciseh yan. Tah diyaspoora elle aninnaan rikeek hotel akah yabbixeenim xiiqaanah yanin innah xiqsissaama iyyeh yan eddecaba taama sele ityoppiya fanah tamaateh tan diyaspoora caatih mesmeril buuking abaanam kee mekla kee kutbe abaanam xiiiqaanamaay warse.
data.amh: ባንኩ ዳያስፖራዎች ካሉበት ቦታ ሆነው ሆቴል ለመያዝ የሚያስችል ጌት ሩም የተሰኘ የመዝገበያ ስርዓት ስራ ላይ እንዳዋለ ዋና ስራ አስኪያጁ የገለፀ ሲሆን ወደ ኢትዮጵያ የሚመጡ የዳያስፖራ አባላት በቀላሉ መመዝገብ፣ መክፈል እና በኦንላይን መመዝገብ ይችላሉ።
data.orm: Baankichi sirna bakka-qabannaa Get Ruums jedhamu gadlakkiseera, kunis diyaaspooraan bakka jiranii hoteelota akka qabatan ni dandeessisa, hoji-gaggeessa olaanaan ifoomsuun, miseensonni diyaaspooraaa gara Itoophiyaa dhufan bakka-qabannaa, kaffaltii, fi toora irratti bakka akka salphaatti qabatan dabalaniiru.
data.som: Bangiga ayaa daah furay nidaam la yidhaah Gate Rooms, kaas oo u sahlaya qurba joogta in ay hoteelada ka qabsadaan qolal halka ay joogaan, maareeyaha guud ayaa shaaca ka qaaday, isaga oo intaa ku daray in xubnaha qurba joogta ah ee yimaada Itoobiya ay si fudud u sii qabsashada, lacag bixinta online ah.
data.tir: እቲ ባንኪ ዲያስፖራ ኣብ ዘለውዎ ኮይኖም ሆቴል ንምሓዝ ዘኽእሎም ጌት ሩምስ (ክፍሊ መደቀሲ) ዝብል ሓዱሽ ስልቲ ምዝገባ ከምዝጀመረ እቲ ዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕ ዝገለፀ እንትኾን ብዘይካ እዚ ናብ ኢትዮጵያ ዝመፁ ኣባላት ዲያስፖራ ምዝገባ፣ ክፍሊትን ብኦንላይን ደፍተር ባንክ ዘውፅኡሉ መስርሕን ከምዝተመቻቸወ ኣብሪሁ።

data.eng: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) has introduced a contractionary monetary policy that would be effective as of today.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Agat Banki (NBE) asaakuk xabba haanam abtol assuwayta kunturaat lakqo polisi yeysexeexegen.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ብሔራዊ ባንክ (ኤን ቢ ኢ) ከዛሬ ጀምሮ ተግባራዊ የሚሆን 'ኮንትራክሽነሪ' የገንዘብ ፖሊሲ አውጥቷል።
data.orm: Baankiin Biyyoolessaa Itoophiyaa(BBI) imaammata maallaqaa kontiraataa har'a eegalee bu'a qabeessa ta'u beeksise.
data.som: Bangiga Qaranka Itoobiya (NBE) ayaa soo bandhigay sharci lacageed oo qandaraas ah oo dhaqan geli doonta laga bilaabo maanta.
data.tir: ሃገራዊ ባንክ ኢትዮጵያ ካብ ሎሚ መዓልቲ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ስራሕ ዝውዕል ፖሊሲ ገንዘብ ኮንትራክሽን ኣውፂኡ።

data.eng: A contractionary monetary policy increases interest rates in order to slow the growth of the money supply and bring down inflation.
data.aaf: Kunturat lakqo polise maaliyyah xayyoosiyyih dadal bicisaanam kee qadaagah ossotina akah oobisaak ribah caddooda fayya hayta.
data.amh: ኮንትራክሽነሪ' የገንዘብ ፖሊሲ የገንዘብ አቅርቦት እድገትን ለማዝገምና የዋጋ ግሽበትን ለመቀንስ ሲባል የወለድ መጠንን ይጨምራል።
data.orm: Immaammatni maallaqaa kontiraataa dabaluu dhiyeessii maallaqaa fi qaala'iinsa gabaa gadi buusuuf saffisa dhalaa ni dabala.
data.som: Sharciga lacagta qandaraaska ayaa kordhisaa heerka ribada si loo yareeyo kobaca saadka lacagta oo hoos loogu dhigo sicir bararka.
data.tir: ፖሊሲ ገንዘብ ኮንትራክሽን ኣብ ልቓሕ መጠን ወለድ ብምውሳኽ ኣብ ዕዳጋ ዝዘዋወር ገንዘብ ብምቕናስ ዝቕባበ ክትሕት ዝገብር ስልቲ እዩ።

data.eng: This can slow economic growth and even increase unemployment but is often seen as necessary to cool down the economy and keep prices in check.
data.aaf: Tah qidaddo dadal addah haytam takkemak kalah taama wayto osissama xiqtah takkay ikkah qidaddo xabbacosaanam kee limo lowsis aboonuh mango uddur faxximta kinnim tamballe.
data.amh: ይህ የኢኮኖሚ እድገትን ቢያዘግምም እናም ብሎም ሥራ አጥነትን ቢጨምርም ብዙ ጊዜ ኢኮኖሚውን ለማረጋጋትና ዋጋዎችን ለመቆጣጠር አስፈላጊ ሆኖ ይታያል።
data.orm: Kun guddina diinagdee suutessuu danda'a fi hoji-dhabdummaayyuu guddisuu danda'a garuu yeroo baayyee diinagdee qabaneessuu fi gatii toora irratti eeguuf meeshaa barbaachisaadha.
data.som: Tani waxay hoos u dhigi kartaa kobaca dhaqaalaha iyo xitaa kordhinta kartaa shaqo la'aanta laakiin inta badan waxaa loo arkaa inay lagama maarmaan tahay in la qaboojiyo dhaqaalaha iyo in laga war hayo qiimaha.
data.tir: እዚ ስልቲ ንዕብየት ቁጠባ ዘዛሕትልን ሽቕለት ኣልቦነት ዘጋፍሕን ዋላ እኳ እንተኾነ ንቁጠባ ኣብ ምርግጋእን ዋጋ ዕዳጋ ኣብ ምቁፅፃርን ግና ረብሓ ኣለዎ።

data.eng: Ministry of Mines and Petroleum disclosed that it has earned 513 million USD from export of mines during the last ten months.
data.aaf: Maqaadin kee siraglele malak taturteh tabna santih addat iroh ruubeenimik 513 miliyoonih USD dollar culentah geenih yaniinim yiysixxigen
data.amh: የማዕድንና ፔትሮሊየም ሚኒስቴር ባለፉት አስር ወራት 513 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ማዕድንን ወደ ውጭ ከመላክ እንዳገኘ ገልጿል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Albuudaa fi Peetirooliyeemii ji'oota kurnan darban keessatti dolaara Ameerikaa miliyoona 513 albuuda biyya alaatti erguuu irraa akka argate ifoomse.
data.som: Wasaaradda Macdanta iyo Shidaalka ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in tobankii bilood ee u dambeeyay ay ka soo gashay dhoofinta macdanta lacag dhan 513 milyan oo doollar.
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ማዕድንን ነዳዲን ኣብ ዝሓለፉ ዓሰርተ ኣዋርሕ ካብ ዝላኣኾም ማዕድናት 513 ሚልዮን ዶላር ኣሜሪካ ኣታዊ ከምዝረኸበ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: Briefing journalists today, Mines and Petroleum Minister Takele Uma pointed out that the income is remarkable when compared to same period of last Ethiopian year, which was 90 million USD.
data.aaf: Asaaku xaagu qawah maybalaalaqa yece maqaadin kee siraglele malak gifta takkale uma culenti taturte Itiyoppiyah sanatittek toobislewaktittelluk qalalisnawak 90 milliyonih dollar geenimmiy yiysixxige.
data.amh: የማዕድን ና ፔትሮሊየም ሚኒስትር ታከለ ኡማ ዛሬ ለጋዜጠኞች በሰጠው መግለጫ ገቢው ካለፈው የኢትዮጵያ ዓመት ተመሳሳይ ወቅት ጋር ማለትም 90 ሚሊዮን ጋር ሲነፃፀር ከፍተኛ ነው።
data.orm: Har'a gaazexissitootaaf ibsa kennaniin, Ministeerri Albuudaa fi Peetirooliyeemii Taakkalee Uumaa galichi yeroo walfakkaataa bara darbee waliin walbira yeroo qabamu aja'iibsiisa ta'uu isaa heeraniiru, inni USD miliyoona 90 kan tureedha.
data.som: Wasiirka Macdanta iyo Shidaalka Takele Uma oo maanta war gayska la hadlay ayaa tilmaamay in dakhliga soo gala uu yahay mid aad u wanaagsan marka loo eego isla muddadaas sannadkii hore ee Itoobiya oo ahaa 90 milyan oo doollar.
data.tir: ሎሚ መዓልቲ ንጋዜጠኛታት መብርሂ ዝሃበ ሚኒስትር ማዕድንን ነዳዲን ኣይተ ታከለ ኡማ እቲ ኣታዊ ምስ እቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ተመሳሳሊ ዓመት ዝተመዝገበ 90 ሚልዮን ዶላር ኣሜሪካ እንትነፃፀር ኣድማዒ እዩ ኢሉ።

data.eng: Out of the total revenue, USD 504.7 million was obtained from gold export, he added.
data.aaf: Sittat geytimeh yan culntak 504.7 milliyonih USD dollar dahab exportik geytimtem kinnim qaddose.
data.amh: ከጠቅላላው ገቢ ውስጥ 504.7 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ወርቅን ወደ ውጭ በመላክ መሆኑን አክሏል።
data.orm: Galiin walii galaa keessaa, dolaarri Ameerikaa miliyoona 504.7 warqee alatti erguu irrra argame, jechuun dabalee jira.
data.som: Wadarta Dakhliga guud waa, 504.7 milyan oo doolar ayaa laga helay dhoofinta dahabka, ayuu raaciyay.
data.tir: ካብ'ቲ ዝተረኸበ ሓፈሻዊ እቶት እቲ 504.7 ሚልዮን ዶላር ኣሜሪካ ካብ ሰደድ ወርቂ ዝተረኸበ ምኳኑ ንሱ ወሲኹ ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: Inhabitants around the recently inaugurated Genale-Dawa III Hydro-power said the project has opened immense opportunity for them, besides benefiting the country.
data.aaf: Xayih Doqaysimte Genale-Dawa 3 Haydro caylih dariifal geytimta maritte ittemihiiy ta projecti baaxoh tuxxiq takkemik kalah baar leh tan saamitte keenih ginteh tanimit yaaben.
data.amh: በቅርቡ በተመረቀው ገነሌ-ዳዋ 3 ሀይድሮ ፓወር አካባቢ የሚኖሩ ነዋሪዎች ፕሮጀክቱ አገርን ከመጥቀም ባሻገር ከፍተኛ እድሎችን እንደከፈተላቸው ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Jiraattonni naannoo humna-bishaanii Gannaalee-Daawaa III dhiyeenya eebbifamee pirojektichi carraa addaa akka isaanif bane, biyyatti fayyaduun biratti jedhaniiru.
data.som: Dadka ku dhaqan agagaarka dhismaha cusub ee tmarta lagadhaliyo Genale-Dawa III oo dhawaan la daah furay ayaa sheegay in mashruucan uu u furay fursado aad u badan, ka sokow faa’iidada dalka.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ሎሚ ቕነ ዝተመረቐ ገናሌ ዳዋ ቁፅሪ ሰለስተ ሓይሊ ማይ ከባቢ ዝነብሩ ዜጋታት ከምዝበሉዎ እቲ ፕሮጄክት ንሃገር ኣብ ልዕሊ ምጥቃሙ ንዓኣቶም እውን ዓብዪ ዕድል ፈጢሩሎም እዩ።

data.eng: Genale-Dawa III hydropower project, which generates 254 MW, was inaugurated by Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed this week.
data.aaf: Genale-Xawwa 3 leecaylih raceenah projecti 254 mega wat racissa projecti ta ayyamih addat nahrsi malak abiyyi acmad dooqayse.
data.amh: 254 ሜጋ ዋት የሚያመነጭው ገናሌ-ዳዋ 3 የሃይድሮ ፖወር ፕሮጀክት በጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር አብይ አህመድ በዚህ ሳምንት ተመርቋል።
data.orm: Pirojektii humna-bishaanii Gannaalee-Daawaa III, kana 254 MW maddisiisu, torbee kana Muummeecha Ministeeraa Abiy Ahimediin eebbifame.
data.som: Mashruuca tamarta laga dhaliyo ee Genale-Dawa III, kaasoo ka dhalinaya 254 MW, ayuu todobaadkan furay Ra'iisul Wasaare Abiy Axmed.
data.tir: እቲ 254 ሜጋዋት ዘመንጩ ሓይሊ ማይ ገናሌ ዳዋ ቁፅሪ ሰለስተ ኣብ'ዚ ሰሙን ብቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣብዪ ኣሕመድ ተመሪቑ እዩ።

data.eng: Among the inhabitants residing around the dam, Abdi Haji told ENA that “the power project plays immense role in their lives in terms of road connectivity, irrigation, energy as well as job opportunity.”
data.aaf: karawwad dariifal geytimta marittek tiyakteenah yan gifta Abdi cajji izih elle warsennalaay " koorana caylih projecti gitiitehfantaaxaway,buqreey, cayla kee kalah taama saamih manoh addal kaxxa doori digirtaamataay Nigatu Mammu yaabe.
data.amh: በግድቡ አካባቢ ነዋሪ ከሆኑት መካከል አንዱ አብዲ ሀጂ ለኢዜአ እንደተናገሩት "የፓወር ፕሮጀክቱ መንገድ በማገናኘት፣ መስኖ፣ ሀይል እንዲሁም የስራ እድል ረገድ በህይወታቸው ከፍተኛ ሚና ይጫወታል።" ብለዋል።
data.orm: Jiraattooa naannoo hidhicha jiraatan keessaa, Abdii Hajii " piroojektiin humna ifaa gama qunnamtii daandii, jallisii, anniisaa akkasumas carraa hojiitiin shora olaanaa taphata" jechuun ENA'tti himeera.
data.som: Cabdi Xaaji oo ka mid ah dadka deggan agagaarka biyo-xidheenka ayaa u sheegay ENA in "mashruucan korontadu uu door weyn ka ciyaarayo noloshooda marka loo eego isku xidhka waddooyinka, waraabka, tamarta iyo sidoo kale fursado shaqo."
data.tir: ካብ መንጎ ኣብ'ቲ ግድብ ከባቢ ዝነብሩ ሓደ ዝኾነ ኣብዲ ሓጂ ንግ.ዜ.ኢ ከምዝገለፆ እቲ ፕሮጄክት ሓይሊ ብፅርግያ ክራኸቡ ብምግባር ብመስኖ፣ ብኤሌክትሩክ ከምኡ እውን ዕድል ስራሕ ብምፍጣር ኣብ ህይወቶም ዓብዪ ለውጢ ዘምፀኣሎም እዩ።

data.eng: All pluses and other commodities which are trading through the Ethiopian Commodity Exchange (ECX) are set to be mandatory starting from this Ethiopian budget year, according to the authority.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak meqe qadaagah kabuuk(ECX) qadaagan all pluse kee kalah tan murtitte akah yibbixeenih yanin miizaaniyyat liggigidak xabba haanam dirki kinnim dooalt xagar qaddose.
data.amh: እንደ ባለስልጣኑ ከዚህ የኢትዮጵያ በጀት ዓመት ጀምሮ በኢትዮጵያ ኮሞዲቲ ኤክስቼንጅ (ኢ ሲ ኤክስ) የሚነግዱ ሁሉም ጥራ ጥሬዎችና ሌሎች ሸቀጦች ግዴታ ሊደረጉ ነው።
data.orm: Qabeenyonni hundi fi meeshaalee biroon karaa Daldala Oomishaa Itoohiyaa (DOI) daldalaman bara baajataa kanaa qabee dirqama ni ta'u, akka abbaa taayitichaatti.
data.som: Dhammaan badeecooyinka dheeriga ah iyo badeecadaha kale ee ka ganacsanaya suuqa kala iibsiga ee Itoobiya (ECX) ayaa lagu wadaa inay noqdaan kuwo qasab ah laga bilaabo sanadkan miisaaniyada Itoobiya, sida ay hay’addu sheegtay.
data.tir: ብልውውጥ ሸቐጥ ኢትዮጵያ (ኢሲኤክስ) ዕዳጋ ዝካየደሎም ዓተራትን ካልኦት ሸቐጣትን ካብ'ዚ ናይ ኢትዮጵያ በጀት ዓመት ጀሚሩ ግድን በቲ ትካል ኣቢሎም ክሽየጡ ክግበር እዩ።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with ENA, ECX Corporate Communications Manager Netsanet Tesfaye said the trading of all pluses through the authority starting this Ethiopian budget year will help combat contraband.
data.aaf: ECX Korporate Angaarawak taama gexseena gifta Nisanet Tesfaye iziyalih luk suge walalal elle qaddosennalaay doolat saqal miizaaniyyat sanataak xabba haanam all pluse badaaqat kontorobanxah uwwaytitte akah waasan innah cato lem qaddosen
data.amh: የኢ ሲ ኤክስ ኮርፖሬት ኮሚኒኬሽን ሀላፊ ነፃነት ተስፋዬ ከኢዜአ ጋር ባደረገችው ቃለ ምልልስ ከዚህ የኢትዮጵያ በጀት ዓመት ጀምሮ የሁሉም ጥራጥሬዎች ንግድ በባለስልጣኑ ስር መሆን ኮንትሮባንድን ለመከላከል ይረዳል።
data.orm: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliiniitiin, DOI hogganaan sab-quunnamtii xindocha Natsaannat Tasfaayee daldalli qabaanyaa hunnda karaa abbaa taayitichaatin ta'u bara baajataa Itoophiyaa kanaa qabee kontirobaandii ittisuuf ni gargaara jedhaniiru.
data.som: Wareysi gaar ah oo ay siisay ENA, maareeyaha isgaarsiinta shirkadda ECX Netsanet Tesfaye ayaa sheegtay in ka ganacsiga dhammaan waxyaabaha lagu daray ee maamulka laga bilaabo sanadkan miisaaniyada Itoobiya uu gacan ka geysan doono la dagaalanka waxyaabaha kontarabaanka ah.
data.tir: ሓላፊ ጉዳያት ርክብ ልውውጥ ሸቐጥ ኢትዮጵያ ኣይተ ነፃነት ተስፋዬ ንግ.ዜ.ኢ ብፍላይ ኣብ ዝሃቦ መግለፂ ኣብ'ዚ ናይ ኢትዮጵያ በጀት ዓመት ዓተራት በቲ ትካል ኣቢሎም ክሽየጡ ምግባር ኮንትሮባንድ ንምቅላስ ንዝግበር ፃዕሪ ዝሕግዝ እዩ።

data.eng: All stakeholders, including ministries of Revenues and Trade& Industry will follow up the implementation process in accordance with the agreements reached.
data.aaf: Culenta,tellemmo kee inxustri malaak edde anuuk inkih wagitah yan xagaritte sitta elle geyteemik ugutak ellecabo kattaatele.
data.amh: ሁሉም ባለድርሻ አካላት የገቢዎች የንግድና ኢንዱስትሪ ሚኒስቴሮችን ጨምሮ የአፈፃፀሙን ሂደት በተደረሰው ስምምነት መሰረት ይከታተሉ።
data.orm: Qooda fudhattoonni hundi, Ministeera Galiiwwan fi Daldalaa& Industirii dabalatee hojiirra oolmaa sirnicha walii galtee irra ga'ame irra hundaa'uun ni hordofu.
data.som: Cid kasto oo ay khusayso, oo ay ku jiraan wasaaradaha Dakhliga iyo Ganacsiga & Warshadaha, waxay la socon doonaan hannaanka hirgelinta si waafaqsan heshiisyada la gaadhay.
data.tir: ኩሎም መዳርግቲ ኣካላት እንኮላይ ሚኒስትሪታት ኣታዊን ንግድን ኢንዱስትሪን ብመሰረት እቲ ዝተበፅሐ ስምምዕነት ንከይዲ ኣፈፃፅማ እቲ ልውውጥ ክከታተሉዎ እዮም።

data.eng: Addis Ababa January 23/2019 Prime Minster Abiy Ahmed said that Ethiopia is working to enhance the engagement of the private sector in order to ensure more inclusive and socially sustainable growth.
data.aaf: Addis ababa agda baxissok 23/2019 ityoppiya kaxxah tan gabah assagolla kee eglaalih assakatle dadal diggossuh canka ludditteh gabah assagolla dadlissuh taamitak geytimtam nahrsi malak abiyyi acmad qaddose.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ የበለጠ ሁለንተናዊና ማህበራዊ ቀጣይነት ያለው እድገት ለማረጋገጥ የግል ዘርፍ ተሳትፎን ለማጎልበት እየሰራች መሆኗን ጠቅላይ ሚንስተር አብይ አህመድ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Finfinne Amajjii 23/2019 Muummichi Ministeeraa Abiy Ahimed Itoophiyaan guddina caalaatti haammataa fi hawaasummaan walitti fufaa ta'e mirkaneessuuf hirmaatumma seektaroota dhuunfaa foyyeessuuf akka hojjeechu jirtu dubbataniiru.
data.som: Adis Ababa Jannaayo 23/2019 Ra’iisul Wasaaraha Itoobiya Abiy Axmed ayaa sheegay in Itoobiya ay ka shaqeyneyso sidii kor loogu qaadi lahaa ka qeybgalka ganacsiga gaarka loo leeyahay si loo xaqiijiyo kobac loo wada dhan yahay oo bulsho ahaan waara.
data.tir: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣብዪ ኣሕመድ 23 ጥሪ 2019 ዓ.ም.ፈ ከምዝገለፅዎ ኢትዮጵያ ኣሳታፊን ውሑስ ዕብየት ሕብረተሰብን ንምርግጋፅ ግደ ሰብ ውልቀ ሃፍቲ ንምዕባይ እናሰርሐት እያ።

data.eng: Speaking at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, the Premier said that bringing vitality to the economy is part of the sweeping reforms that the country has been undertaking.
data.aaf: Naharsi malak siwizerlandik Davosul gexsitte Baadak Qidaddoh Formu elle yescessennalaay qidaddol tuxxiq bahnuk baaxo gexisak geytimtah tan milaagi gexsit exxak tiyak teena kinnih tanimiiy kassise.
data.amh: ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትሩ በዳቮስ ስዊዘርላንድ የዓለም ኤኮኖሚ ፎረም ላይ ባደረጉት ንግግር፣ ኢኮኖሚውን ማጠንከር አገሪቷ እያካሄደች ያለችው ተሃድሶ ነው።
data.orm: Waltajjii diinagdee Adunyaa Daavos, Siwizerlaandii irratti dubbii taasisuun, Muummichi darbee jiraattuummaa diinagdeetti fiduun qaama riifoormiiwwan haarawoo biyyatti gochaa turteeti jedhaniiru.
data.som: Isagoo ka hadlayay shirka dhaqaalaha adduunka ee ka socda magaalada Davos ee dalka Switzerland, ayuu Ra’iisul Wasaaruhu sheegay in dib u habeynta dhaqaalaha ay qeyb ka isbadalka ballaadhan ee uu dalka ku tallaabsaday.
data.tir: እቶም ኣብ ስዊዘርላንድ ኣብ ዳቮስ ኣብ ዝተዳለወ መድረኽ ቁጠባ ዓለም ዝተረኸቡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር እቲ ቁጠባ ክጥንክር ምግባር ኣካል እቶም ኣብ መስርሕ ክትግበሩ እታ ሃገር ዝቐረፀቶም ፖሊሲታት ተሃድሶ እዩ።

data.eng: The Premier elaborated to the Forum that the economic reform is aimed at leveraging the collective power of Ethiopians specially, women and youth.
data.aaf: Naharsi malak ta foromuh adda fakoot abewaka qidaddo maysaasa ityoppiyah xaylooy baxsaluk sayyo kee qunxaaneytah sittalluk aliyyi caylat affaf akah geyna inna kinnih tanim yescesse.
data.amh: ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትሩ የኢኮኖሚ ተሀድሶው የኢትዮጵያውያንን በተለይም የሴቶችና የወጣቶችን የጋራ አቅም ተጠቃሚ ለማድረግ የታለመ መሆኑን ለፎረሙ አብራርቷል።
data.orm: Muummichi Waltajjichaaf riiformiin diinagdee humna walee lammiiwwan Itoophiyaa keessumaa, dubartootaa fi darggaggoo fayidaa irraa oolchuuf akka kaayyeffate ibsaniiru.
data.som: Ra’iisul Wasaaruha ayaa madasha u sheegay in dib u habaynta dhaqaalaha looga talo leeyahay ka faa’iidaysiga awoodda guud ee Itoobiya gaar ahaan haweenka iyo dhallinyarada.
data.tir: እቶም ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ነቲ መድረኽ እንተብርሁ እቲ ቁጠባዊ ተሃድሶ ዕላምኡ ነቲ ሓባራዊ ዓቕሚ ኢትዮጵያዊያን ብፍላይ ንዓቕሚ ደቂ ኣንስትዮን መናእሰይን ምጉልባት እዩ።

data.eng: Turkish investment in Ethiopia is increasing as more companies interested in doing business in the Horn of African country, Turkish Ambassador to Ethiopia Fatih Ulusoy said.
data.aaf: Afrikah gaysah baxooxal tellemmo taama abtuh fayxi leh tan mango kobbanitte turki investimentitte ityoppiyal ossimak yemeeteenim ityoppiyal turki ambasadderih yanih yan fatih ulusoy qaddose .
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ የቱርክ አምባሳደር ፋቲህ ኡሉሶይ በአፍሪካ ቀንድ ንግድ ላይ መሳተፍ ፍላጎት ያላቸው ኩባንያዎች መብዛት በኢትዮጵያ የቱርክ ኢንቨስትመንትን እየጨመረ መቷል ብሏል።
data.orm: Investimentiin Turkii Itoophiyaatti dhaabbattoota dabalataa daldala Biyya Gaanfa Afirikaatti hojjechuuf fedha qaban guddisaa jira, Itoophiyaatti Ambaassadarri turkii Faatii Uluusooy jedhaniiru.
data.som: Maalgashiga Turkiga ee Itoobiya ayaa sii kordhaya iyadoo shirkado badan ay xiisaynayaan inay ganacsi ka sameeyaan Waddan geeska Afrika ah, Safiirka Turkiga u fadhiya Itoobiya Fatih Ulusoy ayaa sheegay.
data.tir: ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣምባሳደር ቱርኪ ፊይዝ ኢሉሶይ ከምዝበሎ ኢንቨስትመንት ቱርኪ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ እናወሰኸ ኣብ ልዕሊ ምኳኑ ብዙሓት ኩባንያታት ኣብ'ዛ ቀርኒ ኣፍሪካዊት ሃገር ንግዲ ናይ ምክያድ ድልየቶም እናዓበየ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopia, the largest investment destination for Turkey in Africa, has attracted close to half of the latter’s investment in the continent.
data.aaf: Afrikak nabah yan turki investementik wadba tekkeh tan ityoppiya baaxol tanih tan wadir heele investimentik qaxi gide takkem hirigteh geytimtamaay qaddosen.
data.amh: በአፍሪካ ትልቁ የቱርክ የኢንቨስትመንት መዳረሻ የሆነችው ኢትዮጵያ በአህጉሪቷ ከምታረጋቸው ወደ ግማሽ የሚጠጉ ኢንቨስትመንቶችን ስባለች።
data.orm: Itoophiyaa, ga'umsa investimentii guddicha turkii Afrikaatti, investimentii ardichaa walakkaatti siqatu hawwateetti.
data.som: Itoobiya, oo ah goobta ugu weyn ee uu Turkigu ku maalgashaday Afrika, ayaa soo jiidatay ku dhawaad kala badh maalgashiga dambe ee qaaradda.
data.tir: እታ ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ዝዓበየት መዕለቢ ኢንቨስትመንት ቱርኪ ዝኾነት ኢትዮጵያ ነቲ ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ካብ ዝፈሰሰ ናብ ፍርቂ ዝፅጋዕ ሃፍቲ ኣብ ባዕላ ክውዕል ገይራቶ እያ።

data.eng: In an exclusive interview with ENA, Ambassador Ulusoy said, Turkish foreign direct investment in Ethiopia has continued to increase.
data.aaf: Ambasadder ulusoy iziyallih abeh yan walalal elle qaddosennalaay turkik iroh investementi udduuruuh udduuruh osak yemeetemit yaabe.
data.amh: አምባሳደር ኡሉሶይ ከኢዜአ ጋር ባደረጉት ቃለ ምልልስ በኢትዮጵያ የቱርክ ቀጥታ የውጭ ኢንቨስትመንት መጨመር ቀጥሏል ብሏል።
data.orm: Afgaaffii addaa ENA waliiniitiin, Ambaassaddar Uluusooy, investimentiin alaa kallattii Turkii Itoophiyaa keessatti dabaluu itti fufee jira jedhaniiru.
data.som: Safiirka Ulusoy oo war bixin gaar ah siiyay ENA ayaa sheegay in maalgashiga tooska ah ee Turkiga uu ku sameynayo Itoobiya uu sii kordhayo.
data.tir: ኣምባሳደር ቱርኪ ኢሉሰይ ንግ.ዜ.ኢ ብፍላይ ከምዝበሎ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ዝካየድ ዘሎ ቀጥታዊ ኢንቨስትመንት ወፃኢ ቱርኪ እናወሰኸ እዩ።

data.eng: Ministry of Mines announced that it will be implementing a policy change that will give metal and steel manufactures access to local iron ore in order to produce steel bars.
data.aaf: Birta kee biriitaay biriita bicissa kambanitte birta kee biriita ginoonu ken xiqsissa polisi milaagitte abtol asisaanam faxaanam maqaadin malaakaay qaddose.
data.amh: የማዕድን ሚኒስቴር የብረታ ብረት አምራቾች ብረት ለማምረት አካባቢው የሚገኙ የብረት ማዕድናትን እንዲጠቀሙ የሚያደርግ የፖሊሲ ለውጥ ተግባራዊ እንደሚያደርግ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Ministeerri Albuudaa jijjiirama immaammataa oomishtoota sibiilaa fi hojii sibiilaa albuuda sibiilaa naannoo akka argatan dandeessisu kabala sibiilaa hojjechuuf dandeessisu hojiirra oolchaa jira.
data.som: Wasaaradda Macdanta ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in ay dhaqan galin doonto isbedel sharciyeed oo keenaya in biraha iyo warshadaha biraha soo saara ay helaan birta dalka si ay u soo saaraan biraha.
data.tir: ሚኒስቴር ማዕድን ፋብሪካታት ሓፂንን ቆርቆሮን፣ ቆርቆሮ ንምስራሕ ሓፂን መሸጢ ዓዲ ክጥቀማ ዝገብር ለውጢ ፖሊሲ ተግባራዊ ከምዝገብር ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Mines Minister Engineer Takele Uma said that the implementation of the new policy will eliminate the struggle manufacturers are facing including lack of raw material and forex.
data.aaf: Maqaadin malak Injineer Takkale Uma qusba poliisi abtol assam uwwayti wayto kee iro tellemmo edde anuk giclo doorititte waaswlemiit yaabe.
data.amh: የማዕድን ሚኒስትር ኢንጂነር ታከለ ኡማ የአዲሱ ፖሊሲ ተግባራዊ መሆን የጥሬ ዕቃና የውጭ ምንዛሬ እጥረትን ጨምሮ አምራቾች እያጋጠማቸው ያለውን ችግር ያስወግዳል ብሏል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Albuudaa Injiinar Taakkalee Uumaa hojiirra oolmaan immaammata haaraa dhamaatii oomishtootni kunneen meeshaa dheedhii fi sharafa dhabuun isaan mudataa jiru ni balleessa jedhaniiru.
data.som: Wasiirka Macdanta Injineer Takele Uma ayaa sheegay in hirgelinta sharcigan cusub ay meesha ka saarayso kurbooyinka soo wajaha oo ay ka mid yihiin alaab la’aan iyo sarifka lacagaha qalaad.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ማዕድን ታከለ ኡማ ከምዝበሎ ተግባራዊነት እዚ ሓዱሽ ፖሊሲ እቶም ሰብ ፋብሪካ ጥረ ኣቕሓን ሸርፊ ወፃኢን ንምርካብ ንዝገብርዎ ዝነበረ ቃልሲ ዘወግድ እዩ።

data.eng: We are visiting our manufactures today to discuss this with them and urge them to continue to focus on what matters during this critical time of our historic trajectory and continue our initiative to use our natural resources.
data.aaf: Asaaku ninni fabrikaakit gufne abak geytimnam takkay ikkah ta caagidit kenllih walallu kee ta aydaaduk tan gexol faxxima wakti muhummi cayuk fooca fanah akah gexanna kee gino gaddittet akah nantifiqennah gexsit diggaluk fooca fanah akah gexannah esserna axcuk kassise.

data.tir: ሎሚ ናብቶም ሰብ ፋብሪካ ብምብፃሕ ብዛዕባ እዚ ሓዱሽ ፖሊሲን ኣብ'ዚ ታሪኻዊ መገጣጥም ኣብ ኣገደስቲ ጉዳያት ጠመተ ብዛዕባ ዝገብሩሉን ተፈጥሮኣዊ ሃፍትና ክጥቀሙ ንዘቕረብናዮ ተበግሶ ክትግብሩን ክንዘራረብ ኢና ድማ ኢሉ።

data.eng: Tourism Ethiopia Director, Sileshi Girma told The Ethiopian Herald that they have identified 50 potential sites for investment in the coming 10 years in the tourism industry.
data.aaf: Turuuzim ityoppiyak direkterih yan shileshi girma itiyoppiyak heraldih elle qaddosennalaa turuzim industrih addat Yamaate 10 sanatah investementi doorititte meexeenih yaniinim qaddose.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ቱሪዝም ዳይሬክተር ስለሺ ግርማ ለኢትዮጵያ ሄራልድ እንደተናገሩት በቱሪዝም ኢንዱስትሪው በመጪዎቹ 10 ዓመታት ለኢንቨስትመንት የሚሆኑ 50 ቦታዎችን ለይቷል።
data.orm: Daayirekterri Tuurizim Itoophiyaa, Silashii Girmaa bakkeewwan mijaawoo ta'an 50 investimentiif waggaa 10 dhufan keessatti industirii tuurizimii keessatti akka adda argatan Tajaajila Oduu Itoophiyaatti himaniiru.
data.som: Agaasimaha Dalxiiska Itoobiya, Sileshi Girma ayaa u sheegay wargeyska The Ethiopian Herald in ay ogaadeen 50 goobood oo macquul ah in la maalgashado 10 ka sano ee soo socda waaxyada dalxiiska.
data.tir: ዳይሬክተር ቱሪዝም ኢትዮጵያ ኣይተ ስለሺ ግርማ ንኢትዮጵያን ሄራልድ ከምዝገለፆ ኣብ ዝቕፅሉ ዓሰርተ ዓመታት ንኢንቨስትመንት ዕቑር ዓቕሚ ዘለዎም ናቑጣታት ተላሊዮም እዮም።

data.eng: He stated that the participation of the private sector in tourism and hospitality sectors has been good over the past years.

data.eng: The Soflet Malt which joined the Bole Lemi Indistrial Park with an outlay of 70 Million Euros has finalized preparations to start production on coming March 2021.
data.aaf: 70 milliyonih yiirot xissiime Bole Lemi Industrial Parkit tengele soflet malt yamaate qado dirrik 2021 murti qimboh addah bicak gaba kaleh yanim qaddosen.
data.amh: ቦሌ ለሚ ኢንዱስትሪያል ፓርክን በ70 ሚሊየን ዩሮ የተቀላቀለው ሶፍሌት ማልት በመጪው መጋቢት 2021 ምርት ለመጀመር ዝግጅቱን አጠናቋል።
data.orm: Sooflet Maalt kan baasii Yuuroo miliyoona 70'tiin paarkii Industirii Boolee Lammiitti makame oomisha Biootessa 2021 oomisha eegaluuf qophii xumuree jira.
data.som: soufflet Malt oo ku biiray xerada Warshadaha ee Bole Lemi oo ay ku baxday 70 Milyan oo Yuuro ayaa dhsmaystiray diyaar garowga uu ku bilaabayo wax soo saarka soo socda Maarso 2021.
data.tir: እቲ ብ70 ሚልዮን ዩሮ ወፃኢ ዝተሃነፀን ኣብ ቦሌ ሌሚ ኢንዳስትሪያል ፓርክ ዝተሓወሰን ሶፊ ማልት ኣብ መጋቢት 2021ዓ.ም.ፈ ፍሪያት ንምጅማር ምድላዋቱ ወዲኡ።

data.eng: The Soufflet Malt Ethiopia which is a French family-owned business based on collecting and adding value to agricultural raw materials is building malt factory at 10 ha of land in the industrial park.
data.aaf: Buqre murtittel murti kobxisaanam kee murtitte osisoonuh faransay buxah marih uwwaytu yanih yan souffet malt Itiyoppiya Industri Parki 10 hektar takke baaxol fabrika xisak geytima
data.amh: የግብርና ጥሬ ዕቃዎችን በመሰብሰብና እሴት በመጨመር ላይ የተመሰረተው የፈረንሳይ ቤተሰብ ንብረት የሆነው ሱፍሌት ማልት ኢትዮጵያ በኢንዱስትሪ ፓርኩ ውስጥ በ10ሄክታር መሬት ላይ የማልት ፋብሪካ እየገነባ ነው።
data.orm: Sooflet Maalt Itoophiyaan kan daldala maatiin-dhuunfatamee lammiiwwan Faransaay kan ta'e kan meeshaalee dheedhii qonnaa walitii qabuu fi foyyeessuu irratti hundaa'e paarkii industirichaa keessatti warshaa biqilaa lafa hektaara 10 irratti ijaaraa jira.
data.som: Soufflet Malt Ethiopia oo ah ganacsi ay leeyihiin qoys Faransiis ah oo ku salaysan ururinta iyo qiimo ku kordhinta alaabta qaydhiin ee beeraha ayaa ka dhisaysa warshad macsarada ah 10 hektar oo dhul ah oo ku taal beerta warshadaha.
data.tir: እቲ ብፈረንሳዊያን ቤተሰብ ዝውነንን ኣብ ጥረ ሕርሻዊ ፍሪያት ክብሪ ኣብ ምውሳኽ ዝተዋፈረን ሶፊ ማልት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ውሽጢ ቀፅሪ ኢንዳስትሪያል ፓርክ ኣብ 10 ሄክታር መሬት ፋብሪካ ማልት እናሃነፀ እዩ።

data.eng: Soulfflet Malt Ethiopia has already created production supply chain for 25,000 farmers, and will increase number of beneficiaries to 40, 000 when its factory goes fully operation in the future, the information from Industrial Parks Development Corporation.
data.aaf: Soulfflet malt itiyoppiya 25000 takke buqreh xiinah murti xayyosiyyih bica gineenim kee, ciggila uddur fabrika inki tanuuk taama fanah cultawak catta maritteh qadad 40,000 fanah fayya heelem industri parkittek daddos korperationik geytime oytiiy yascasse.
data.amh: ከኢንዱስትሪ ፓርኮች ልማት ኮርፖሬሽን በተገኘው መረጃ ሶልፍሌት ማልት ኢትዮጵያ እስካሁን ለ25,000 አርሶ አደሮች የምርት አቅርቦት ሰንሰለት የፈጠረ ሲሆን ፋብሪካው ወደፊት ሙሉ በሙሉ ስራ ሲጀምር የተጠቃሚዎቹን ቁጥር ወደ 40, 000 ከፍ ያደርጋል።
data.orm: Sooflet Maalt Itoophiyaan hidhata dhiyeessioomisha qonnaan-bultoota 25,000f uumeera, fi lakkoofsa fayyadamtoota gara fulduraatti yeroo warshichi guutummaa hojii eegalu gara 40,000 ni guddisa, odeeffannoo Korpoorashinii Guddina Paarkii Industirii irraa argame.
data.som: Soulfflet Malt Ethiopia waxa ay hore u abuurtay silsilad sahayda wax soo saarka 25,000 beeralay ah waxana ay kordhin doontaa tirada ka faa’iidaystayaasha 40,000 marka ay warshadeeda si buuxda u shaqeyso mustaqbalka,sida ay xogta ku heshay wakaalada horumarinta seeraha warshadaha.
data.tir: ሶፊ ማልት ኢትዮጵያ ዛጊድ ን25,000 ሓረስቶት ናይ ኣቕርቦት መስመር ዝዘርግሐ እንትኾን እቲ ፋብሪካ ምሉእ ብሙሉእ ስርሑ እንትጅምር እዚ ቁፅሪ ናብ 40,000 ተጠቀምቲ ከምዝዓቢ ካብ ኮርፖሬሽን ልምዓት ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርክ ዝተረኸበ ሓበሬታ የረድእ።

data.eng: According to Industrial Parks Development Corporation, Soulfflet Malt Ethiopia will have a capacity of producing 100,000 metric tons of malt per annum.
data.aaf: Soulfflet malt ityoppiya sanatat 100,000 mitirik tone yakke malt orbisaanamih dudda allelem industritte parkik daddos korperation yiysixxige.
data.amh: እንደ ኢንዱስትሪ ፓርኮች ልማት ኮርፖሬሽን፣ ሶልፍሌት ማልት ኢትዮጵያ በዓመት 100,000 ሜትሪክ ቶን ማልት በአመት የማምረት አቅም ይኖረዋል።
data.orm: Akka Korporashinii Guddina Paarkii Industiriitti, Sooflet Maaltin Itoophiyaa dandeetti waggaatti meetirik toonii 100,000 oomishuu ni qabaata.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigtay Hay'adda Horumarinta xerada Warshadaha, Soulfflet Malt Itoobiya waxay heli doontaa awood ay ku soo saarto 100,000 metrik ton oo malt ah sannadkii ba.
data.tir: ካብ ኮርፖሬሽን ልምዓት ኢንዳስትሪ ፓርክ ዝወጸ ሓበሬታ ከምዘረድኦ ሶፊ ማልት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዓመት 100,000 ሜትሪክ ቶን ማልት ናይ ምፍራይ ዓቕሚ ኣለዎ።

data.eng: Ethiopian gold exports surged after the central bank offered higher prices for the metal in a bid to curb smuggling and as part of wider efforts to spur investment in mining.
data.aaf: Contro Banxil yangicilloonuh maqaadin dagta investementittel aydukumusoonuh abeenih yanin baar le macalal fanti banki birta kee biriitah kaxxa limo xayyooseek lakala ityoppiyak dahab expert oseh geytima.
data.amh: በድብቅ የሚገባውን ለመግታትና የማዕድን ኢንቨስትመንትን ለመቀስቀስ በሚደረገው ሰፊ ጥረት አካል ማዕከላዊ ባንክ ለብረቱ ከፍተኛ ዋጋ ከሰጠ በኋላ የኢትዮጵያ ወርቅ ኤክስፖርት በከፍተኛ መጠን ጨምሯል።
data.orm: Ekispoortiin warqee Itoophiyaa erga baankiin giddu galeessaa gatii olaanaa sibiilichaaf kontirobaandii dhorkuu fi yaalii investimentii albuudaa irratti jajjabeessuuf taasifamuu irratti dhiyeesseen booda kaka'umsa godheera.
data.som: Dhoofinta dahabka Itoobiya ayaa sare u kacday ka dib markii bangiga dhexe uu soo bandhigay qiimo sare oo lagu iibinayo birta si loo xakameeyo tahriibinta iyo dadaallada ballaaran ee lagu dhiirigelinayo maalgashiga macdanta.
data.tir: ማእኸላይ ባንክ ዘይሕጋዊ ምስጋር ወርቂ ንምምካትን ኣብ ማዕድን ዝግበር ኢንቨስትመንት ንምትብባዕን ዓሊሙ ዝልዓለ ዋጋ ምስኣቕረበ ሰደድ ወርቂ ኢትዮጵያ ወሲኹ።

data.eng: Ethiopia’s gold industry is currently dominated by small-scale artisanal miners, but Newmont Corp. and Australia’s Allied Gold Corp. are among the companies exploring for the precious metal in the Horn of Africa nation.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyak dahab industri awayih uddur dagoo gaba mihrat le tutaaxago fayyo lecaddok yibbixeenih yaninim kee afrikah gaysal kaxxa caddo le biriitah goran abak geytimta kumbanittek Newmont korperation kee awostraliyak allied gold corp digsitta eglaali edde geytimta.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የወርቅ ኢንዱስትሪ በአሁኑ ወቅት በአነስተኛ ማዕድን ቆፋሪዎች በበላይነት ቢያዝም ኒውሞንት ኮርፖሬት እና የአውስትራሊያ አላይድ ጎልድ ኮርፖሬት በአፍሪካ ቀንድ ያለውን የከበረ ብረት የሚፈልጉ ኩባንያዎች መካከል ናቸዉ።
data.orm: Industiriin Warqee Itoophiyaa yeroo ammaatti albuuda baastota sadarkaa-xixiqqaatiin dhuunfatamee jira, garuu Niwmont Korp. fi Korporeeshinii walta'oo warqee Awustiraaliyaa dhaabbilee sibiila gati-jabeessa biyya Gaanfa Afiriikaa keessatti barbaadaa jiran keessa tokko.
data.som: Warshadaha dahabka ah ee Itoobiya ayaa wakhtigan waxa gacanta ku haya farsamo yaqaano yaryar, balse Newmont Corp. iyo Australia’s Allied Gold Corp. ayaa ka mid ah shirkadaha sahaminta macdanta qaaliga ah ee qaranka Geeska Afrika.
