data.tir: ንሱ ብተወሳኺ ከምዝበሎ እቲ ስርዓት ካዳስተር ኣብ መንጎ ማሕበረሰብ፣ ኩባንያታትን መንግስቲን እምነት ዝፈጥርን ርክብ ዘስጥምን ምቹው ናይ ኢንቨስትመንት ሃዋህው ዝሃንፅ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopia collected some $318 million from the export of flowers and other horticulture products Ethiopian fiscal year, which ended July 7, 2019.
data.aaf: Awrobbah loowok ditelik 7 sanat 2019 gaba kale ityoppiyak mizaaniyyat sanatal qobor kee caxaaxuwi murtitteh exportik 318 milliyonih dollarih gide takke lakqo gabooseen.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ ሐምሌ 7 ቀን 2019 ባበቃው የኢትዮጵያ በጀት ዓመት የአበባና ሌሎች የዕፅዋት ምርቶችን ወደ ውጭ በመላክ ወደ 318 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ሰብስባለች።
data.orm: Itoophiyaan dolaara miliyoona 318 abaaboo fi oomisha qonnaa biroo biyya alaatti erguu irraa bara baajataa Itoophiyaa kan Adoolessa 7, 2019 dhumetti argatte jirti.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa $318 milyan oo doolar ka ururisay dhoofinta ubaxa iyo waxsoosaarka kale ee dhirta sanad miisaaniyadeedka Itoobiya, kaas oo dhamaaday July 7, 2019.
data.tir: ክሳብ እቲ 7 ሓምለ 2019 ዓምፈ ዝዛዘም በጀት ዓመት ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፣ ኢትዮጵያ ካብ ሰደድ ዕምበባን ካልኦት ፍረምረን 318 ሚልዮን ዶላር ኣሜሪካ ኣታዊ ረኺባ።

data.eng: The Public Relations Director remarked that over a hundred companies have been engaged in the cultivation of flowers, fruit, and vegetables as well as herbs and supply of high-quality products to the international market.
data.aaf: Ummattah angaarawih direkter akah iyyennahaay booluuk daga takke kambanitte qobooruuy,caxa miru kee caxaaxuwaay toonah caxaxuwai murtil maxxat leh yan murti baad qadaagah xayyoosoonuh taamal geytimaanam qaddose.
data.amh: የህዝብ ግንኙነት ዳይሬክተሩ ከአንድ መቶ በላይ ኩባንያዎች በአበባ ፣ በፍራፍሬና በአትክልት እንዲሁም ቅጠላ ቅጠላ ቅጠሎችን እና ጥራታቸው ከፍተኛ የሆኑ ምርቶችን ለዓለም አቀፍ ገበያ በማቅረብ ተግባር ላይ መሰማራታቸውን ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Daayirekterri Sab-quunnamtii dhaabbileen dhibbaa ol ta'an oomisha abaaboo, fuduraa fi kuduraa akkasumas muduraa fi oomisha qulqullina olaanaa qaban gabaa adunyaatiif dhiyyeessuu irratti hirmaataa jiran ibsaniiru.
data.som: Agaasimaha Xidhiidhka Dadweynaha ayaa uu sheegay in, in ka badan boqol shirkadood ay ku hawlanaayeen beerista ubaxa, khudaarta iyo sidoo kale dhiraynta iyo keenista badeecado tayo sare leh oo loo soo iib geeyo suuqyada caalamka.
data.tir: እቲ ዳይሬክተር ርክብ ህዝቢ ከምዝበሎ ኣብ ምፍራይ ዕምበባ፣ፍረምረ፣ ኣትኽልቲን እፅዋትን ኣማኢት ኩባንያታት ተዋፊሮም ዝልዓለ ፅርየት ዘለዎ ምህርቲ ናብ ዓለምለኸ ዕዳጋ እናቕረቡ እዮም።

data.eng: Ethiopian horticulture products' main export destinations are the Netherlands, Saudi Arabia, UK, USA, Japan, Norway, Germany, UAE, Belgium, and Italy.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyak caxaxuwi murtitte iroh rubeenih yanin baxooxa nizerlandiiy,saqud qarabiyaay,ingliziiy, ameerikay,jappan,norwayiy, garman, emeretiiy,beljium kee taliyaana kinni.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የሆርቲካልቸር ምርቶች ዋና የኤክስፖርት መዳረሻዎች ኔዘርላንድስ፣ ሳዑዲ ዓረቢያ፣ዩ ኬ፣ ዩ ኤስ ኤ፣ ጃፓን፣ ኖርዌይ፣ ጀርመን፣ ዩ ኤ ኢ፣ ቤልጂየም እና ጣሊያን ናቸው።
data.orm: Ga'umsi biyya alaatti erguu muummeen oomisha qonnaa Itoophiyaa Neezerlandii, Sawudii Arabiyaa, Engilaand, Ameerikaa, Jaappaan, Norwey, Jarman, Yuunaytid Arab Imireet, Beeljiyeem, fi Xaaliyaani.
data.som: Waxsoosaarka beeraha Itoobiya meelaha ay u dhoofiso waxa ugu badan waa Netherlands, Saudi Arabia, UK, USA, Japan, Norway, Germany, UAE, Belgium, iyo Italy.
data.tir: ፍሪያት ሆርቲካልቸር ኢትዮጵያ ዝላኣኹሎም ቀንዲ ሃገራት ኔዘርላንድ፣ ስዑድ ዓረብ፣ ኢንግሊዝ፣ ኣሜሪካ፣ ጃፓን፣ ኖርወይ፣ ጀርመን፣ ሕቡራት ዓረብ ኢምሬትስ፣ ቤልጅምን ጣልያንን እዮም።

data.eng: Ethio-telecom has announced new tariff cuts on international voice calls and short text-messaging.
data.aaf: Ethio-telekom baad caddok anay seeco kee ux farmol mekla addah akah haan innah aben.
data.amh: ኢትዮ-ቴሌኮም በዓለም አቀፍ የድምፅ ጥሪዎችና አጭር የጽሑፍ መልዕክቶች ላይ አዲስ የታሪፍ መጣሉን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Itiyoo Telekoom hir'isa taarifaa haaraa bilbila sagalee fi erga gabaabaa adunyaaleessa irratti taasise beeksise.
data.som: Ethio-telecom ayaa ku dhawaaqday in ay qiimaha dhimi doonto cusub ee wicitaanada codka ee caalamiga ah iyo fariimaha gaaban.
data.tir: ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ኣብ ዓለምለኻዊ መልእክቲ ድምፂን ሓፂር መልአክቲ ፅሑፍን ቅናሽ ከምዝገበረ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: In a press conference today, CEO of Ethio-telecom, Firehiwot Tamiru, said the company had made 10-40 percent reduction on international voice calls.
data.aaf: Itiyo-Telekomuk edde cabta taama seleena gifti firehiwot tamiru asaaku tece maybalaalqal ta kumbani baad caddok anay seecol booluk 10-40 gaba addah heniimit yabte.
data.amh: የኢትዮ-ቴሌኮም ዋና ስራ አስኪያጅ ፍሬህይወት ታምሩ ዛሬ በሰጠችው ጋዜጣዊ መግለጫ ኩባንያው በዓለም አቀፍ ድምጽ ጥሪ ላይ ከ10-40 በመቶ ቅናሽ አርጓል።
data.orm: Har'a ibsa gaazexesummaa irratti, hojii gaggeessa olaanaan Itiyoo-telekoom, Firewoot Taammiruu, dhaabbatichi hir'isa gatii dhibbentaa 10-40 ta'u bilbila sagalee adunyaalessa irratti taasisee jira.
data.som: Shir jaraa’id oo uu maanta qabtay maareeyaha guud eed shirkadda Ethio-telecom, Firehiwot Tamiru, ayaa sheegay in shirkaddu ay hoos u dhigtay boqolkiiba 10-40 wicitaannada codadka caalamiga ah.
data.tir: ሎሚ መዓልቲ ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ጋዜጣዊ መግለፂ ዋና ኣፈፃሚ ስራሕ ኢትዮ ቴሌኮም ፍረ ህይወት ታምሩ ከምዝበለቶ እቲ ኩባንያ ኣብ ዓለምለኻዊ መልአኽቲ ድምፂ ካብ 10 ክሳብ 40 ሚእታዊ ዋጋ ቀኒሱ እዩ።

data.eng: She also announced up to 51 percent tariff cut on international short text-messaging.
data.aaf: Baad caddok ux kutbe farmol booluk 51 gaba addah heenim tiysixxige.
data.amh: ዓለም አቀፍ የአጭር ፅሁፍ መልዕክት ላይም እስከ 51 በመቶ ታሪፍ እንደሚቆረጥም አስታውቃለች።
data.orm: Akkasumas hir'isa gatii erga gabaabaa irratti hanga dhibbentaa 51 gahu ta'uu isaa ifoomsiteetti.
data.som: Waxay sidoo kale ku dhawaaqday inay dhimayso boqolkiiba 51 qiimaha fariimaha gaaban ee caalamiga ah.
data.tir: ንሳ ብተወሳኺ እቲ ኩባንያ ኣብ ዓለምለኻዊ ሓፁር መልአኽቲ ፅሑፍ 51 ሚእታዊ ናይ ዋጋ ምቅናስ ከምዝገበረ ዕላዊ ገይራ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian economy will maintain its growth lead for the East African region according to the latest World Bank report.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyah qidaddo ayro mawqaha afrikah cuduudul dadal miraaciinu foocak haytam kinnim Baad Bankik xayi uddurih oyti yascasse.
data.amh: በቅርቡ የዓለም ባንክ ዘገባ መሰረት የኢትዮጵያ ኢኮኖሚ በምስራቅ አፍሪካ ክልል የዕድገት መሪነቱን ይቀጥላል።
data.orm: Diinadgeen Itoophiyaa dursummaa guddina naannoo bahaa Afiriikaatiif akka gabaasaa dhiyeenyaa Baankii Adunyaatti ni tursiisti.
data.som: Dhaqaalaha Itoobiya ayaa sii wadi doona kobaca hogaaminta gobolka Bariga Afrika sida lagu sheegay warbixintii ugu dambeysay ee lagasoo xigteeyey Bangiga Adduunka.
data.tir: ከም ፀብፃብ ባንክ ዓለም ቁጠባ ኢትዮጵያ ዕብየቱ ብምቕፃል ኣብ ምብራቕ ኣፍሪካ መሪሕ ኮይኑ ክፀንሕ እዩ።

data.eng: The latest forecast puts Ethiopia at a percentage point behind Ghana.
data.aaf: Xayi uddurih faalal ityoppiya gaanak persenti ximmoh ciggilta.
data.amh: የቅርቡ ትንበያ ኢትዮጵያን ከጋና በአንድ በመቶ ነጥብ ኋላ ላይ አስቀምጧታል።
data.orm: Raagni dhiyeenyaa tuqaa dhibbentaatin Itoophiyaa Gaanaa duuba kaa'a.
data.som: Saadaashii ugu dambeysay ayaa Itoobiya ka dhigaysaa boqolkiiba in ay dhibic ka dambeeyaan Ghana.
data.tir: እቲ ናይ ቀረባ ትንበያ ከምዘመልክቶ ኢትዮጵያ ብሒደት ነጥቢ ድሕሪ ጋና ተሰሪዓ ኣላ።

data.eng: The West African nation is forecast to grow at 8.3% as against Ethiopia’s 8.2%.
data.aaf: Ayroh culmah afrikah baaxo booluk 8.3% dadalelem faleenim kee ityoppiyak booluk 8.2% luk qalalisan wak .
data.amh: የምዕራብ አፍሪካ ሀገር ከኢትዮጵያ 8.2% አንፃር በ8.3% እንደሚያድግ ተተንብይዋል።
data.orm: Biyyi dhiha Afiiriikaa 8.2% Itoophiyaa waliin wal bira yeroo qabamuu 8.3%'n akka guuddattu raagameera.
data.som: Dalka Galbeedka Afrika ayaa la saadaalinayaa inuu kori doono 8.3% marka loo eego Itoobiya oo ah 8.2%.
data.tir: እታ ምዕራባዊት ኣፍሪካ ብ8.3 ሚእታዊ ክትዓቢ ዝተተንበየ እንትኽውን ኢትዮጵያ ድማ ብ8.2 ሚእታዊ ክትዓቢ እያ።

data.eng: “Among East African countries, Ethiopia is likely to remain the fastest growing economy, but growth is expected to soften as it takes measures to stabilize government debt.”
data.aaf: "Ayro mawqah afrikah baaxooxa ityoppiya sissik qidaddo alluk foocah axcele takkay ikkah doolat mago diggossuh maqatta beytawak tet dadal aysuk gexele axcuk qambaalan.
data.amh: «ከምስራቅ አፍሪካ ሀገራት መካከል ኢትዮጵያ በፍጥነት የሚያድግ ኤኮኖሚ ሆና ትቀጥላለች ነገር ግን እድገቷ የመንግስት ዕዳን ለመመለስ ሲባል ሊቀዘቅዝ ይችላል።»
data.orm: "Biyyoota Baha Afiriikaa keessaa, Itoophiyaan diinagdee guddina saffisaa qabachuu dandeessuudha, garuu guddinichi haala mootumma liqaa isaa tazgabbeessuuf taasisuun ni laafa jedhamee eegama."
data.som: "Wadamada Bariga Afrika, Itoobiya waxay u badan tahay inay sii ahaato dhaqaalaha ugu kobaca badan, laakiin kobaca ayaa la filayaa inuu jilciyo marka ay qaadayso tallaabooyin lagu xasilinayo deynta dawladda."
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ መንጎ ምብራቓዊ ሃገራት ኣፍሪካ እታ ቅልጡፍ ምዕባለ እተመዝግብ ሃገር ኮይና ምፅናሓ እኳ እንተይተረፈ ዕዳ መንግስቲ ንምርግጋእ ብእትወስዶ ስጉምቲ ግና እቲ ዕብየት ክዛሓሓል ይኽእል እዩ።

data.eng: The addition of Habesha Petroleum, JR-Petroleum Plc, Kernel Oil Trading Plc and Kalub Oil Ethiopia, pushed the total number of oil retail companies in the country to 22.
data.aaf: Cabasha Petroliyem,JR-petrolium masquliyyat beyteh Tan cankah egla Plc kernel oil masquliyyat beyteh tan cankah egla kee kalub oil PLc Itiyoppiya tama baaxol tan siraglele keefiyyih eglaalih qadad ila 22 fanak fayya haytem qaddosen.
data.amh: የሀበሻ ፔትሮሊየም፣ ጄ አር ፔትሮሊየም ኃ/የተ/የግል ማህበር፣ ኬርነል ነዳጅ ንግድ ኃ/የተ/የግል ማህበር እና ካሉብ ኦይል ኢትዮጵያ መጨመር በሀገሪቱ ያሉ የነዳጅ ችርቻሮ ኩባንያዎችን አጠቃላይ ቁጥር ወደ 22 ገፍቶታል።
data.orm: Ida'amni Peetirooliyeemii Habashaa, Petirooliyeemii-JR IKM, Dhaabbata dhuunfaa daldala boba'aa Kernel fi Boba'aa Kaalub Itoophiyaa lakkoofsa walii galaa dhaabbilee raabsaa boba'aa biyyaatti gara 22 buteera.
data.som: Ku darida Habesha Petroleum, JR-Petroleum Plc, Kernel Oil Trading Plc, Kalub Oil Ethiopia, ayaa tirada guud ee shirkadaha tafaariiqda shidaalka ee dalka ka dhigtay 22. shirkadood.
data.tir: ሓበሻ ነዳዲ፣ ጂኣር ነዳዲ ውልቀ ማሕበር፣ ኬርኔል ንግዲ ነዳዲ ውልቀ ማሕበርን ካሉብ ነዳዲ ኢትዮጵያን ናብ ዕዳጋ ብምእታዎም ነቲ ኣብ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ስራሕቲ ምዕዳል ነዳዲ ዝተዋፈሩ ኩባንያታት ቀፅሪ ናብ 22 ክዓቢ ገይሩዎ ኣሎ።

data.eng: JR-Petroleum is the latest entrant among the four companies opening its doors on December 25, 2017.
data.aaf: JR-petroliyum decemperik 22 sanat 2017 albaab neh fakteh tan affara kumbanih fanak ellecaboh culte egla kinni.
data.amh: ታህሳስ 25, 2017 በራቸውን ከሚከፍቱ አራቱ ኩባንያዎች መካከል በቅርብ የተቀላቀለው ጄ አር ፔትሮሊየም ነው።
data.orm: JR-peetirooliyeemiin dhaabbilee afran Mudde 25,2017 banaman keessaa seenaa isa dhumaati.
data.som: JR-Petroleum waa ka soo galayaashii ugu dambeeyay ee afarta shirkadood ee albaabada u furay 25 kii Diseembar, 2017.
data.tir: ካብ መንጎ እተን ኣብ 25 ታሕሳስ 2017 ዓ.ም.ፈ ናብ ዕዳጋ ዝኣተዋ ኣርባዕተ ኩባንያታት ጂኣር ነዳዲ ድሒሩ ዝኣተወ ኩባንያ እዩ።

data.eng: The company was established with a 21 million Br capital and is headquartered in Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Ta egla 21 milliyonih kapitalat ginnimem kee kaxxa arac akak addis ababal geytima.
data.amh: ኩባንያው የተመሰረተው በ21 ሚሊዮን ብር ካፒታል ሲሆን ዋና መስርያ ቤቱ አዲስ አበባ ነው።
data.orm: Dhaabbatichi kaappitaala Birrii miliyoona 21 tin fi teessoo isaa Finfinnee godhachuun hundaa'e.
data.som: Shirkadda ayaa lagu aasaasay 21 milyan oo Birr xarunteeda dhexna waxay kutaala Addis Ababa.
data.tir: እቲ ብ21 ሚልዮን ቕርሺ ርእሰ ማል ዝተጣየሸ ኩባንያ ዋና ቤት ፅሕፈቱ ኣብ ኣዲስኣበባ ይርከብ።

data.eng: Founded by three partners engaged in distributing fuel from Nile Petroleum under a franchise arrangement, JR currently runs eight filling stations.
data.aaf: Nile petroliyumik franchise bicih innala siraglele kuriyyala taamitak geytimta sidoc takke eglaali edde bicte JR awyih uddur bacaar takke siraglele madiyittel taamitak geytima.
data.amh: ነዳጅን ከናይል ፔትሮሊየም በፍራንቻይዝ ስምምነት በማከፋፈል ላይ በተሰማሩ ሶስት አጋሮች የተቋቋመው ጄ አር በአሁኑ ጊዜ ስምንት የመሙያ ጣቢያዎችን ያስተዳድራል።
data.orm: Michuuwwan sadiin kan hundaa'e kan boba'a Naayil irraa eeyyama waliigaltee raabsaatiin raabsuu hojjetu, JR yeroo ammaatti buufata raabsaa boba'aa saddeet qaba.
data.som: Waxaa aasaasay saddex shuraako ah oo ku hawlan qaybinta shidaalka Niil Petroleum iyada oo la raacayo habayn ganacsi, JR hadda waxa ay maamushaa siddeed xarumood oo buuxin ah.
data.tir: እቲ ብሰለስተ ሰባት ሽርክና ዝተመስረተ ኩባንያ ካብ ናይል ነዳዲ ውክልና ተቐቢሉ ነዳዲ ዝዕድል እንትኾን ጂኣር ሕዚ ሸሞንተ መዐደሊ ኩባንያታት ዝወነነ እዩ።

data.eng: Ethiopia's year-on-year headline inflation crept up to 8.8 percent in June, up from 8.7 percent the previous month, the statistics office said on Tuesday.
data.aaf: Ityoppiyak sanataak santih xaagi waysi alsah ilaa 8.8 Gaba fanah maaddeh tan limoh ossotina tature alsah booluk 8.7 gaba ossotinah tubluusem statistics kutbeh buxa talaatah tiysixxige.
data.amh: ማክሰኞ ዕለት የስታትስቲክስ ቢሮው የኢትዮጵያ ከዓመት ዓመት አጠቃላይ የዋጋ ግሽበት ካለፈው ወር ከነበረው 8.7 በመቶ በሰኔ ወር ወደ 8.8 በመቶ ማሻቀቡን ገልጿል።
data.orm: Qaala'iinsi waggaa-gara-waggaa Itoophiyaa Waxabajjiitti gara dhibbentaa 8.8tti suutan dabaleera, dhibbentaa 8.7 kan ji'a darbee irraa dabaluun, waajjira istaatistiksiitu Kibxata dubbate.
data.som: Sicirbararka dalka Itoobiya sanadba sanadka kasii dambeeya ayuu kor u kacay ilaa 8.8 boqolkiiba bishii June, halka uu ka ahaa 8.7 boqolkiiba bishii hore, xafiiska tirakoobka ayaa sheegay Talaadadii.
data.tir: ቤት ፅሕፈት ስታቲክስ ብሰሉስ ከምዝገለፆ እቲ ንኢትዮጵያ ዓመት ካብ ዓመት ዘጋጠማ ዝቕባበ ኣብ ግንቦት ካብ ዝነበረ 8.7 ሚእታዊ ኣብ ሰነ ናብ 8.8 ሚእታዊ ደይቡ ኣሎ።

data.eng: Food inflation slowed to 11.2 percent in June from 12.3 percent the previous month, it said. Non-food inflation was at 6.7 percent in June, up from 4.7 percent in May.
data.aaf: Tature alasah elle sugte boolu 12.3 gabak maqiddi linoh ossotina waysi alsah booluk ilaa 11.2 gaba fanah addah intem qaddose. Waysi alsah 6.7 gabak sugte maqot axawah tan duyyeeyah limoh ossotina laqini alsah elle sugteh tan ikkek booluk 4.7 gaba ossotinah tubluuse.
data.amh: የምግብ ዋጋ ግሽበት ከዚህ ወር በፊት ከነበረው ከ12.3 በመቶ በሰኔ ወደ 11.2 በመቶ እንደቀዘቀዘ ገልጿል።
data.orm: Qaala'insi gatii nyaata Waxabajjiitti dhibbentaa 11.1 tti dhibbentaa 12.3 ji'a darbee walii wal bira yoo qabamu gadi bu'eera, jedheera. Qaala'insi gatii nyaata hin taane Waxabajjiitti dhibbentaa 6.7 irratti 4.7 dhibbentaa Caamsaa irrra dabalee jira.
data.som: Sicirbararka cuntada ayaa hoos u dhacay 11.2 boqolkiiba bishii Juun halka uu ka ahaa 12.3 boqolkiiba bishii hore, ayay tidhi. Sicir bararka aan cuntada ahayn ayaa ahaa 6.7 boqolkiiba Juun, halka uu ka ahaa 4.7 boqolkiiba bishii Maayo.
data.tir: ናይ ምግቢ ዝቕባበ ካብ'ቲ ብግንቦት ዝነበረ 12.3 ሚእታዊ ኣብ ሰነ ናብ 11.2 ሚእታዊ ዝወረደ እንትኾን ምግቢ ዘይኮኑ ጠላባት ድማ ብግንቦት ካብ ዝነበርዎ 4.7 ሚእታዊ ኣብ ሰነ ናብ 6.7 ሚእታዊ ደይቦም ኣለዉ።

data.eng: The Ministry of Trade has disclosed that it has planned to gain about 1.2 billion birr from the export of oilseeds and pulses this year.
data.aaf: Asanatak iroh ruuben subac daroora kee plusesik 1.2 billiyoonih birri gufta lakqo culentah geyoonuh ekraariseenim Tellemmo malaak qaddose.
data.amh: የንግድ ሚኒስቴር በዚህ ዓመት የቅባት እህል እና ጥራጥሬዎችን ወደ ውጭ በመላክ ወደ 1.2 ቢሊዮን ብር ለማግኘት ማቀዱን ተናግሯል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Daldalaa bara kanatti midhaan zaayitaa fi boloqqee alatti erguu irraa qarshii biliyoona 1.2 argachuuf akka karoorse ifoomse.
data.som: Wasaaradda ganacsiga ayaa shaaca ka qaaday in sanadkan ay qorsheysay in 1.2 bilyan oo Birr ay ka faa’ideysato dhoofinta Shidaalka iyo Hilibka.
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ንግዲ ኣብ'ዚ ዓመት ካብ ሰደድ እኽሊታት ቅብኣትን ካብ ዘርኢታት ዓተርን 1.2 ቢልዮን ቕርሺ ኣታዊ ንምርካብ ከምዝተለመ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: Crop production and Marketing Directorate Director with the Ministry, Mulugeta Muhammed, told WIC that the country has planned to export 98.233 thousand tons of oilseeds and pulses this year and gain the stated amount of income.
data.aaf: Tama malak daro morti kee limmosiyyi Xayrektorih Xayrektor gifta mulgeta macammad waltah elle qaddosennala baaxo asanatah 98.233 alfih toon sukat daroora kee duyyeeya iro baaxo fanah ruubak culenti caddo akah geytannah ekraariseenih yaniinim qaddose.
data.amh: በሚኒስቴሩ የሰብል ምርትና ግብይት ዳይሬክቶሬት ዳይሬክተር ሙሉጌታ ሙሃመድ ለዊክ ሀገሪቷ በዚህ ዓመት 98.233 ሺህ ቶን የቅባት እህል እና ጥራጥሬ ወደ ውጭ በመላክ የተባለውን የገቢ መጠን ለማግኘት እንዳቀደች ተናግሯል።
data.orm: Daayirektoreetni Daayirekteera oomisha fi gurgurtaa midhaanii Ministeerichaa, Mulugeetaa Mohaammad, biyyaattin midhaan zaayitaa fi boloqqee toonii kuma 98.233 alatti erguu fi galii heerame argachuuf karoorsuu ishee WIC'tti himaniiru.
data.som: Agaasimaha Agaasinka Wax soo saarka Dalagga iyo Suuq geynta ee Wasaaradda, Mulugeta Muxamed, ayaa WIC u sheegay in waddanku uu qorsheeyey in sannadkan laga dhoofiyo 98.233 kun oo Tan oo Midhaha saliid, isla markaana laga helayo dakhliga la sheegay.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ሚኒስቴር ዳይሬክተር ፍርያት ኣዝርእትን ዕዳጋን ኣይተ ሙሉጌታ መሓመድ ንዋልታ ኢንፎርሜሽን ማእኸል ከምዝገለፆ እታ ሃገር 98,233 ቶን እኽሊታት ቅብኣትን ዘርኢታት ዓተርን ሰደድ ንምግባርን እቲ ዝተጠቐሰ መጠን ኣታዊ ንምርካብን ተሊማ እያ።

data.eng: The planned amount of export has increased by 26 percent as compared to the same period last year.
data.aaf: Ekraariseenih yanin iro baaxoh badaaqatih caddo taturse sanatalluk qalalisanwak booluk 26 gaba osiseh yanim yescessen.
data.amh: የታቀደው ወደ ውጭ የተላከው መጠን ከባለፈው ዓመት ተመሳሳይ ወቅት ጋር ሲነፃፀር በ26 በመቶ ጨምሯል።
data.orm: Hangi biyya alaatti erguu yeroo walfakkaataa bara darbee waliin yeroo wal bira qabamu dhibbentaa 26'n dabaleera.
data.som: Qadarka la qorsheeyay ee dhoofinta ayaa kordhay 26 boqolkiiba marka loo eego isla muddadaas sannadkii hore.
data.tir: እቲ ተተሊሙ ዘሎ መጠን ሰደድ ካብ'ቲ ዝሓለፈ ዓመት ተመሳሳሊ ጊዜ እንትነፃፀር ብ26 ሚእታዊ ወሲኹ እዩ።

data.eng: The drastic increase of Ethiopia’s debt stock has been a source of debate among policymakers, researchers and political analysts in Ethiopia for the last half a decade.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyal abuud caddo kaxxam ossotina taturte tabna sanatitteh itiyoppiyak polisih yayyaaqe maraay,kusaq abeenit kee siyaasa tutaaxagoh fanal anaakarak raceena tekkehiiy sugte.
data.amh: ላለፉት ግማሽ አስርት ዓመታት የኢትዮጵያ የዕዳ ክምችት በከፍተኛ መጨመር ኢትዮጵያ ባሉ ፖሊሲ አውጪዎች፣ ተመራማሪዎችና የፖለቲካ ተንታኞች መካከል የክርክር መነሻ ሆኗል።
data.orm: Haalaan dabaluun kuufama liqaa Itoophiyaa qopheesitoota immaammataa, qorattootaa fi xinxaltoota siyaasaa Itoophiyaa gidduutti walakkaa waggoota kurnan darbaniif madda falmii ta'uun tureera.
data.som: Korodhka daran ee kaydka deynta Itoobiya ayaa ahayd isha dood ka dhex dhalisay siyaasad dejiyeyaasha, cilmi baarayaasha, iyo falanqeeyayaasha siyaasadeed ee Itoobiya nuskii 10 ka sano ee la soo dhaafay.
data.tir: እቲ እናወሰኸ ዝኸይድ ዘሎ ውህሉል ዕዳ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ፍርቂ ክፍለ ዘመን ኣብ መንጎ ሓንፀፅቲ ፖሊሲ፣ ተመራመርቲን ፖለቲካዊ ተንተንትን ፍልፍል ክትዕ ኮይኑ ፀኒሑ እዩ።

data.eng: As the country’s total debt surpassed 50 billion dollars since 2017, the country has become among the most indebted economies in Africa.
data.aaf: Awrobbah loowok 2017 xabba haanam ta baaxol tan mago 50 billiyonih dollarak daga takke lakqo teetil taniimih ta baaxo afrikal kaxxa abuud elle yan baaxooxat gacteh geytimta.
data.amh: ከ2017 ጀምሮ የአገሪቷ አጠቃላይ እዳ 50 ቢሊዮን ዶላር በመብለጡ አገሪቷ በአፍሪካ ውስጥ በጣም ባለዕዳ ከሆኑ ኢኮኖሚዎች አንዷ ሆናለች።
data.orm: Haaluma liqiin walii galaa biyyatti doolara biliyoona 50 2017'n as darbeen, biyyattin Afirikaa keessatti diindageewwan liiqaan liqimfamn keessaa tokko taateetti.
data.som: Iyadoo wadarta guud ee deynta dalka lagu leeyahay ay kor u dhaaftay 50 bilyan oo doollar tan iyo 2017, waddanku wuxuu ka mid noqday dalalka Afrika ugu deynta badan.
data.tir: እቲ ውህሉል ዕዳ ክሳብ 2017 ዓ.ም.ፈ ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ 50 ቢልዮን ዶላር ዝሓለፈ እንትኾን በዚ ድማ ኢትዮጵያ ካብተን ኣብ ኣፍሪካ ዝለዓለ ዕዳ ዘለዎን ሃገራት ሓንቲ ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: Especially the tendency of the central government to undertake mega projects with finance secured from external creditors, even with a high interest, coupled with the critical foreign currency shortage in the country have weighed negatively on the country’s ability to meet its debt obligations
data.aaf: Baxsaluk fanti doolat kaxxa projektitte irok abuud yaace marak geytimte faynanciala, kaxxa riba akak raaqekal gexsissa afkanitte, ta baaxol yan gidbah tan iro baaxoh sherfih wayto sittat gacak baaxok mago dirkittek tawqem akah xiiqewaytannah baxsale uma xukko teetil kataase.

data.eng: “Hurting the wider business community just to cripple few illegal money operators is not fair. Of course, weakening the parallel market is a step in the right direction but adopting a radical measure will cause more problems,” said Wujrayib Yibgeta, Vice President of Addis Ababa Traders Forum.
data.aaf: " gita maliinoh lakqoh operationitte akah yaclisen innah mangoh tan tellemmo maritte biyakaanam qadliino hinna maca gita maliino qadaagog akah yaclisen inna kee gitak yanih yan jaahat fanah gexxa maqatta takkemih sarrimaane alle sinni maqattooti beyaanama gidbih tan taqabitte katassama kinnimi addis ababak tellemmo abeenit foromuk ciggila prezdenti gifta wujirayib yibgeta qaddose.
data.amh: "ጥቂት ሕገወጥ የገንዘብ ኦፕሬተሮችን ለማክሰም ሲባል ሰፊውን የንግድ ማኅበረሰብ መጉዳት ፍትሀዊ አይደለም። እርግጥ የመሰል ገበያውን ማዳከም ወደ ትክክለኛው አቅጣጫ የሚወሰድ እርምጃ ቢሆንም የከረረ እርምጃ መውሰድ ግን የበለጠ ችግር ያስከትላል" ብሏል የአዲስ አበባ ነጋዴዎች ፎረም ምክትል ፕሬዚዳንት ውጅራይብ ይብጌታ።
data.orm: "Hojjeettoota maallaqaa seeran alaa muraasa naafessuuf hawaasa daldalaa bal'aa miidhuun haqa-qabeeessa miti. Dhuguma, daldala gabaa gurraachaa dadhabsiisuun tarkaanfii gara sirriitti garuu tarkaanfii fiinxalaa madaqsuun rakkoo dabalataa fida", Itti aanaa Pirexidaantiin Foramii Daldaltoota Finfinnee Wujraayib Yibgeetaa jedheera.
data.som: "In la dhaawaco ganacsatada ballaaran si loo curyaamiyo dhowr ka mid ah dadka ku shaqeysta lacagaha sharci darrada ah maaha cadaalad. Dabcan, daciifinta suuqa isbarbar dhigga waa tallaabo loo qaaday jihada saxda ah laakiin qaadashada tallaabo xagjir ah waxay keenaysaa dhibaatooyin badan,” ayuu yiri Wujrayib Yibgeta, Guddoomiye ku xigeenka Madasha Ganacsatada Addis Ababa.
data.tir: ምኽትል ፕሬዝዳንት መድረኽ ነጋዶ ኣዲስኣበባ ኣይተ ውጅራይብ ይብጌታ ከምዝገለፆ ንውሑዳት ዘይሕጋዊ ገንዘብ ኣቀባበልቲ ንምድኻም ተባሂሉ ነቲ ሰፊሕ ማሕበረሰብ ንግዲ ምድኻም ፍትሓዊ ኣይኮነን፤ ነቲ ዘይሕጋዊ ንግዲ ምድኻም ቅኑዕ እኳ እንተኮነ ናብ ፅንፊ ዝኸደ መምርሒ ምሕንፃፅ ግና ዝገደደ ፀገም ዘስዕብ እዩ።

data.eng: Given the repercussions of the transaction limit, which some experts refer to as a draconian measure, it is simple to understand how desperate the government is to increase remittance flow, which averaged USD5.7 billion over the last five years.

data.amh: አንዳንድ ባለሙያዎች ድራኮንያን እርምጃ ብለው የሚጠሩት የገንዘብ እንቅሰቃሴ ገደብ መዘዞች መሰረት መንግሰት ባለፉት አምስት ዓመታት በአማካይ 5.7 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ያስገኘውን የሪሚታንስ ፍሰት ለመጨመር ምን ያህል እንደተጠማ ለመረዳት ቀላል ነው።

data.tir: እቲ ገሊኦም ዝተመጣጠነ መምርሒ እዩ ዝብልዎን ንምንቅስቃስ ዕዳጋ ናይ ምዕጋት ውፅኢት ዘለዎን ሕጊ ዘመልክቶ ነገር መንግስቲ እቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ልዕሊ 5.7 ቢልዮን ዶላር ዝነበረ ዋሕዚ ምልእኣኽ ክውስክ ኣዝዩ ዘድሊ ከምዝኾነ እዩ።

data.eng: A decade ago, ETB17 was equivalent to a dollar. As the years rolled and following the repeated devaluation of the currency in order to boost the international competitiveness of the import-dependent country, the value of the Birr has been reduced by as much as 130%.
data.aaf: Tabna sanataak naharal itiyoppiyah 17 birri inki dollaralluk inki gidek sugte sanoota taturak gexxewak kee lakqoh sherfi qagqagitak lakqo daggowtewak irok culussa maritte kee ken gaba qambalta baaxo baad caddoh qalayla akah dadlissannah lakqo limo booluk 130% daggosse.
data.amh: ከአስር ዓመት በፊት 17 የኢትዮጵያ ብር አንድ ዶላር ነበር።
data.orm: Waggaa kudhan dura, Birriin Itoophiaa 17 dolaara tokkoon qixxeedha. Baroonni haaluma darbanii fi maallaqicha gatii dhabsiisu walitti fufaa dorgomummaa adunyaalessaa keessatti galchuu irratti hundaa'e guddisuuf ta'e hordofee, gatiin Birrii 130% gadi bu'eera.
data.som: Toban sano ka hor, ETB 17 ayaa u dhigmay hal dollar. Iyadoo sanadadu ay is daba socdeen oo ay daba socdeen qiimo dhacii soo noqnoqday ee ku yimid lacagta si kor loogu qaado tartanka caalamiga ah ee dalka ku tiirsan wax soo dejinta, waxa hoos u dhacay qiimaha Birr-ka ilaa 130%.
data.tir: ቅድሚ ዓሰርተ ዓመት 17 ቕርሺ ኢትዮጵያ ማዕረ ሓደ ዶላር ኣሜሪካ ነይሩ። ዓመታት ምስሓለፈ እታ ኣብ ኣምፃእነት ዝተደረኸት ሃገር ዓለምለኻዊ ተወዳዳርነታ ምእንቲ ክዓቢ ተባሂሉ ተደጋጋሚ ምንካይ ዋጋ ቕርሺ ምስተገበረ ዋጋ ቕርሺ 130 ሚእታዊ ክንኪ ተገይሩ እዩ።

data.eng: According to Abayneh, this time, the zonal administration livestock and fishery office is finalizing all the necessary preconditions to relocate people who live in the surrounding areas to other places.

data.amh: እንደ አባይነህ ከሆነ በዚህ ጊዜ የዞኑ ከብቶችና የዓሣ አስተዳደር ቢሮ በአካባቢው የሚኖሩ ሰዎችን ወደ ሌሎች ቦታዎች ለማዛወር የሚያስፈልጉትን ቅድመ ሁኔታዎች ሁሉ በመጠናቀቅ ላይ ይገኛል።

data.aaf: Amobeyak chencha,dita,gacho baba, kee bonki boqre taama elle gexsiisiisoonuwan baaxooxak baaxok baali kinni.
data.amh: ለምሳሌ ቼንቻ ፣ ዲታ ፣ ጋቾ ባባ እና ቦንኪ እርሻ እየተካሄደባቸው ካሉ ተራራማ አካባቢዎች አንዳንዶቹ ናቸው።

data.som: Tusaale ahaan, Chencha, Dita, Gacho Baba, iyo Bonki waa qaar ka mid ah meelaha buuraleyda ah ee beeraleydu ka socoto.
data.tir: ንኣብነት ጨንቻ፣ ዲታ፣ ጋቾን፣ ቦንኪን ገለ ካብቶም ሕርሻ ዝካየደሎም ጎቦታት ዝበዝሖም ከባቢታት እዮም።

data.eng: Mati Multiplex, the first state-of-the-art cinema house in the country, has launched a plan to expand nationwide with branches across six major regional towns while Bahir Dar becomes the first town outside Addis Ababa to have 3D Cinema facility.
data.aaf: Baaxok qimboh qusba sinimah buxa tekkeh tan mati multiplex leceey takke rakaakay magaaloolih luddal baaxoh caddol baarisoonuh ekraaro yeyyeqeenih yaniinimik amakkaquk Bahri Xaar magaalal addis ababak iroh 3d sinima buxa inek hayto tekke.
data.amh: በሀገሪቱ የመጀመሪያው ዘመናዊ የሲኒማ ቤት የሆነው ማቲ ሞልቲፕሌክስ በስድስት ዋና ዋና የክልል ከተሞች ቅርንጫፎች በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ የማስፋፋት ዕቅድ ያስጀመረ ሲሆን ባህር ዳር ከአዲስ አበባ ውጪ የመጀመሪያው 3ዲ ሲኒማ ቤት ያላት ከተማ ሆናለች።
data.orm: Maltipileksii Maatii, mana sinimaa aartii jalqabaa biyyatti, karoora babal'inaa biyyoleessa dameelaa jaha magaala gurguddoo naannolee keessatti Baahir Daarin magaala jalqabaa Finfinneen alatti tajaajila siniima 3D argattu jalqabaa taasisuun banuu jalqabe.
data.som: Mati Multiplex oo ah gurigii ugu horeeyay ee shineemooyinka casriga ah ee dalka laga furo ayaa bilaabay qorshe lagu balaadhinayo dalka oo dhan iyadoo laamo ku yeelanaysa lix magaalo oo waaweyn oo deegaanka ah halka Bahir Dar ay noqonayso magaaladii ugu horaysay ee ka baxsan Addis Ababa ee leh xarun shineemo 3D ah.
data.tir: እቲ ኣብ'ታ ሃገር ፈላማይ ኣዝዩ ዘበናዊ ዝኾነ ማቲ መልቲ ኮምፕሌክስ ቤተ ሲኒማ ኣብ ሽዱሽተ ከተማታት ክልላት ጨንፈራት ንምኽፋት ዘለዎ ትልሚ ዝገለፀ እንትኾን ባህርዳር ካብ ኣዲስኣበባ ቀፂላ ፈላመይቲ ስሪ ዲ ናውቲ ሲኒማ ዝወነነት ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: Although Mekele, the seat of the Tigray Regional State, is the first regional town to host the first branch of the Cinema chain a year ago with 35mm movie screening cinema facility, another regional town Bahr Dar has taken the lead in hosting the 3D Cinema infrastructure outside of Addis Ababa.
data.aaf: Tigray rakaakayak daffeynah tan mekelle sanootaak naharal qimboh addah sinimah fantaaxawih luddi 35mm filmih mablaasal sinimal xayyosse qimbo rakaakyitte magaala akkuk gersi rakaakay magaala kaadu bahri xaar magaaal 3d sinimah innal daddos bicisak qimbo tekke addis ababaak iroh.
data.amh: የትግራይ ክልላዊ መንግሥት መቀመጫ መቀሌ ከዓመት በፊት የመጀመሪያውን የሲኒማ ቅርንጫፍ በ35 ሚሊ ሜትር የፊልም መስኮት ሲኒማ ተቋም በማዘጋጀት የመጀመሪያዋ ክልላዊ ከተማ ብትሆንም ሌላ የክልል ከተማ ባህር ዳር ከአዲስ አበባ ውጪ ያለውን የ3ዲ ሲኒማ መሰረተ ልማት በማቅረብ ቀዳሚ ሆናለች።
data.orm: Teessoo Mootummaa Naannoo Tigiraay kan taate Maqaleen bara darbe argii fiilmii 35mm'tin keessumeessun magaalaa naannoo hidhata siniimaa damee jalqabaa taatee jirtu, magaalaa naannoo biroo Baahir Daar dursummaa ijaarsa sinimaa 3D Finfinnee alaa keessummeessuu qabattee jirti.
data.som: Inkasta oo magaalada Mekele oo ah xarunta dawlad deegaanka Tigreega ay tahay magaaladii ugu horaysay ee sanad ka hor laga furo laantii ugu horaysay ee silsilada shineemada oo leh goob shineemo 35mm ah oo lagu daawado filimada ayaa haddana magaalada kale ee gobolka Bahr Dar ayaa hogaanka u qabatay marti galinta shineemada 3D. kaabayaasha ka baxsan Addis Ababa.
data.tir: ዋላ እኳ እታ ርእሰ ከተማ ክልል ትግራይ ዝኾነት መቐለ ቅድሚ ሓደ ዓመት 35 ሚሊ ሜትር ዓለባ ምርኢት ዘለዎ ጨንፈር ቤተ ሲኒማ ዝወነነት እንትኾነት እታ ካሊእቲ ዋና ከተማ ክልል ዝኾነት ባህርዳር ካብ ኣዲስኣበባ ቀፂላ ስሪ ዲ ናውቲ ዘለዎ ቤተ ሲኒማ ዝወነነት ፈላመይቲ ከተማ ኮይና ኣላ።

data.eng: Addressing Climate Ambition Summit 2020, Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed said that Ethiopia has taken bold leadership on climate action by launching its ambitious climate resilient green economy strategy that aspires to build a carbon neutral and resilient economy by 2030.
data.aaf: Sanat 2020 silayti milaagih caagidih koboxul abe yaabal ityoppiya awrobbah loowok 2030 karboonuk currik aboonu kee gexekalit akke sinni qidaddo xisoonuh muhummi haytem kee silayti milaagimiyyah gexekalit akke sinni anxaxin qidaddoh steratiji ugusaak silayti qaynatal aliliyya leh tan mirocti maqatta beyte
data.amh: በ2020 የአየር ንብረት ምኞት ጉባኤ ላይ ባደረጉት ንግግር ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር አብይ አህመድ ኢትዮጵያ በ2030 የማይበገር አረንጓዴ ኢኮኖሚ ስትራቴጂዋን በማስጀመር ከካርቦን ነፃ የሆነ እና የማይበገር ኢኮኖሚ ለመገንባት በአየር ንብረት ርምጃ ላይ ደፋር አመራር ወስዳለች።
data.orm: Walgahii Fedhii Haala Qilleensaa 2020 irratti yeroo dubbatan, Muummeen ministeeraa Abiyyi Ahimed Itoopiyaan tarsiimoo diinagdee magariisa jijjiirama qilleensaa dandamatu kan kaarbonii irraa bilisa tahee fi diinagdee damdamatu ijaaruuf kan kaayyeffatu jalqabuun geggeessummaa jabaa haala qilleensaa irratti fudhatteetti jedhan
data.som: Isagoo ka hadlayay shirweynaha hamiga cimilada 2020, Ra’iisul Wasaare Abiy Axmed ayaa sheegay in Itoobiya ay qaadatay hoggaan geesinimo leh oo ku aaddan tallaabada cimilada iyadoo billowday hammigeeda u adkeysiga dhaqaalaha cagaaran taasoo rajaynaysa inay dhisto dhaqaale carbon dhexdhexaad ah iyo dhaqaale adkaysi leh 2030ka.
data.tir: ኣብቲ ትምኒት ንብረት ኣየር 2020 ብዝብል ቴማ ዝተኻየደ ዋዕላ ዝተረኸቡ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስትር ኣብይ ኣሕመድ፣ ኢትዮጵያ ኣብ 2030 ዓ.ም.ፈ ካብ ካርቦን ዝፀረየ ጠንካራ ቁጠባ ንምህናፅ ዘኽእላ ትምኒታዊ ስትራቴጂ ጠንካራ ንብረት ኣየርን ቆፅላዋይ ቁጠባን ንምትግባር ዝሕግዝ ቆራፅ ተግባራዊ ስጉምቲ ኣብ ምውሳድ መሪሕ ኮይና ኣላ ብምባል ገሊፆም።

data.eng: Over the last two years, Ethiopia’s green economy strategy has been fully mainstreamed into the recently launched yet 10 year perspective development plan, which runs from 2021 to 2030, Prime Minister Abiy noted.
data.aaf: Taturte namma sanatih addat ityoppiyal anxaxin qidaddoh steratiji 2021 ilaa 2030 fanah yanih yan 10 sanatih dadal ekraaroh addat inkih akah haan innah abeenim naharsi malak abiyyi acamd qaddose.
data.amh: ባለፉት ሁለት ዓመታት የኢትዮጵያ የአረንጓዴ ኢኮኖሚ ስትራቴጂ ከ2021 እስከ 2030 ባለው የ10 ዓመት የእድገት እቅድ ውስጥ ሙሉ በሙሉ እንዲካተት ተደርጓል ሲሉ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር አብይ አመልክተዋል።
data.orm: Waggoota lamaan darban, tarsiimoon diinagdeen magariisaa Itoopiyaa karoora guddinaa waggaa 10 itti fufaa bara 2021 haga 2030 tti turu dhiyeenyatti jalqabsiifametti guutummaatti dabalamuu Muummeen Ministeeraa Abiyyi dubbatan.
data.som: Labadii sano ee la soo dhaafay, Istaraatiijiyadda dhaqaalaha cagaaran ee Itoobiya ayaa si buuxda loogu soo daray qorshaha horumarinta fiirada 10 ka sano ee dhowaan la bilaabay, kaas oo soconaya 2021 ilaa 2030, Ra'iisul Wasaare Abiy ayaa xusay.

data.orm: Yeroo qophichaa, waliigalteen walhubannaa P4G. Guddina Magriisaa fi Galma Addunyaa bara 2030 michoomuu kan kaka'umas Denmaarkii fi Kooriyaa Kibbaa dabalachuun biyyoota humna giddugaleessaa 12 fis mallatteeffame ture.
data.som: Intii ay socotay munaasabadu, waxaa sidoo kale heshiis is afgarad ah loo saxiixay P4G, Iskaashiga kobaca cagaaran iyo himilooyinka caalamiga ah ee 2030 kaas oo ah hindise ay iska kaashanayaan 12 dal oo quwada dhexe ah oo ay ku jiraan Denmark iyo Kuuriyada Koonfureed.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ስነስርዓት ኣብ ጉዳይ ጥምረት ንቆፅላዋይ ዕብየት (ፒ.ፎር.ጂ) ማለት እውን ኣብ 2030 ዓ.ም.ፈ ቆፅላዋይ ዕብየት ንምምዝጋብ ንዴንማርክን ደቡብ ኮሪያን ሓዊሱ 12 ኣብ ማእኸላይ ዕብየት ብዘለዋ ሃገራት ተበግሶ ኣብ ዝተዳለወ ሰነድ መባእታዊ ሓበራዊ ስምምዕነት ተፈሪሙ።

data.eng: Ethiopian Environment and Forest Research Institute announced a plan to cover the Abay Gorge areas ranging from Kere Goha to Dejen town.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyah dariifak dessoh daddosih inistitute kere hohaak ilaa dejen magaala tan abbay booloh dariifa fanah alifoonuh ekraaro yibbixeenih yaniinim yiysixxige.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ አካባቢና ደን ምርምር ኢንስቲትዩት ከከረ ጎሃ እስከ ደጀን ከተማ ያሉትን የአባይ ገደል አካባቢዎች ለመሸፈን እቅድ ማውጣቱን አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Inistitiyuutiin Qorannoo Eegumsa Naannoo fi Bosonaa Itoopiyaa naannoowwan Abbay Gorgee kan Kerre Gohaa fi magaalaa Dejen gahu uwwisuu karoorsuu beeksie.
data.som: Machadka cilmi baadhista deegaanka iyo kaymaha Itoobiya ayaa ku dhawaaqday qorshe ay ku doonayso in ay ku daboosho deegaanada Abay Gorge ee u dhexeeya Kere Goha ilaa magaalada Dejen.
data.tir: ትካል መፅናዕቲ ከባቢያዊ ኣየርን ዱርን ኢትዮጵያ ካብ ካሬ ጎሃ ክሳብ ከተማ ደጀን ንዘሎ ከባቢ ሽንጥሮ ኣባይ ብኣድዋራት ናይ ምሽፋን ትልሙ ዕላዊ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Located on the boundary of Oromia and Amhara region, the Abay Gorge is a serios of gorges to a depth of some 1,500 meters.
data.aaf: Oromiya kee amaarah rakaakayih cuduudul geytima abbay boolok ilaa 1,500 mitir ullulluh takke boolala kinni.
data.amh: በኦሮሚያና በአማራ ክልል አዋሳኝ ላይ የሚገኘው አባይ ገደል ተከታታይ እስከ 1,500 ሜትር የሚደርስ ጥልቀት ያለው ገደል ነው።
data.orm: Daangaa naannoo Oromiyaa fi Amaaraa irratti kan argamu, Abbay Gorgeen sulula walitti fufaa gafa meetira 1,500 gadi fagaatuudha.
data.som: Dooxa Abay ayaa ku yaalaa xadka deegaanka Oromia iyo gobolka Axmaarada, waana doox taxane ah oo qoto dheer ilaa 1,500 mitir.
data.tir: እቲ ንክልላት ኦሮሚያን ኣምሓራን ኣብ ዘዋስን ቦታ ዝርከብ ሽንጥሮ ኣባይ ንዝትተሓሐዙ ሽንጥሮታት ዘካተተን ክሳብ 1,500 ሜትሮታት ዕምቆት ዘለዎን እዩ።

data.eng: A research that will serve as a roadmap for afforestation of the Abay Gorge has been jointly conducted by Ethiopian Environment and Forest Research Institute, Selale University, Debre Markos University and Forest and Climate Change Commission.
data.aaf: Abbay boolok desso daddosuk karta akkuk edde yantifiqoonu waan kusaq kee fokkaqo itiyoppiyak dariifa kee garbo fokkaqoh inistitute,selale jaamiqat,debre markos jaamiqat kee desso kee silayti milaagih komishin sittalluk gacaak gexsisse.
data.amh: የአባይ ገደል የደን ልማት ፍኖተ ካርታ ሆኖ የሚያገለግል ጥናትና ምርምር በኢትዮጵያ አካባቢና ደን ምርምር ኢንስቲትዩት፣ በሰላሌ ዩኒቨርሲቲ፣ በደብረ ማርቆስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ እና በደንና አየር ንብረት ለውጥ ኮሚሽን በጋራ ተካሂዷል።
data.orm: Qorannoon akka karoora deebisanii bosonaan uwwisuu Abbay Gorgeetti fayyadu Inistitiyuutiin Qorannoo Eegumsa Naannoo fi Bosonaa Itoopiyaa, Yuunivarsitii Salaalee, Yuunivarsitii Dabre Maarqosii fi Komiishinii Bosonaa fi Jijjiirama Qilleensaan waltahuun geggeeffame
data.som: Cilmi-baadhis u noqon doonta qorshe hawleed lagu dhirayn karo dooxa Abay ayaa waxa si wada jir ah u sameeyay machadka cilmi baarista deegaanka iyo kaymaha Itoobiya, Jaamacadda Selale, Jaamacadda Debre Markos iyo guddiga isbeddelka kaynta iyo cimilada.
data.tir: እቲ ከም ፍኖተ ካርታ ግረባ ዘገልግል መፅናዕቲ ሽንጥሮ ኣባይ ብትካል መፅናዕቲ ከባቢያዊ ኣየርን ዱርን፣ ብዩኒቨርሲቲታት ሰላሌን ደብረማርቆስን ከምኡ እውን ብኮሚሽን ዱርን ለውጢ ንብረት ኣየርን ብሓባር ዝተዳለወ እዩ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Soil Information System (EthioSIS) project was launched in 2012 to transform the agriculture sector by improving the fertility of farming soil to support agricultural transformation.
data.aaf: Buqre transhformotion qokoloonuh buqre ballaqeh ceelo yaysiisoonuh buqre ludditte yaysiisoonuh Itiyoppiyak Ballaqeh Oytih Siirat (ethioSIS) projecti sanat 2012 taama qimbisse.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ የአፈር መረጃ ስርዓት (ኢትዮሲስ) ፕሮጀክት የግብርና ትራንስፎርሜሽን ለመደገፍ የግብርና አፈር ለምነትን በማሻሻል የግብርናውን ዘርፍ ለመለወጥ በ2012 ተጀምሯል።
data.orm: Pirojektiin Sirna Odeeffannoo Biyyee Itoopiyaa (EthioSIS) gabbina biyyee qonnaa fooyyessuun tiraanisfoormeeshini qonnaa deggeruuf sektera qonnaa jijjiiruuf bara 2012 keessa eegalame.
data.som: Mashruuca Nidaamka Macluumaadka Ciidda Itoobiya (EthioSIS) ayaa la bilaabay 2012 si loo beddelo qaybta beeraha iyada oo la wanaajinayo bacrinta ciidda beeraha si loo taageero isbeddelka beeraha.
data.tir: ፕሮጀክት ስርዓት ሓበሬታ ሓመድ ኢትዮጵያ (ኢትዮ: ሲስ)) ንልምዑነት ሓመድ ሕርሻ ብምምሕያሽ ስግግር ሕርሻ ንምምዝጋብ ዓሊሙ ብ2012 ዓ.ም.ፈ ዕላዊ ዝተገበረ መደብ ስግግር ዘፈር ሕርሻ እዩ።

data.eng: The system has been supporting agriculture by developing soil fertility maps for more than 18,000 rural kebeles in the country and providing up-to-date soil fertility data as well as recommending the best type of fertilizer for soil in each region, Tegbaru said.
data.aaf: Ta Siirat Tama baaxol 18,000 daga yakke barri magaloolih kebelaalil ballaqe daddosih karta bicisaanam kee ballaqeh ceeloh oyta bicisak buqre daddoosuh qokol abak geytimam kee kulli rakaakayal ballaqek meqeh tan weelo wagittaamal walalak geytimaanam gifta tegbaru qaddose.
data.amh: ተግባሩ እንዳሉት፤ ስርአቱ በሀገሪቱ ከ18,000 በላይ ለሚሆኑ የገጠር ቀበሌዎች የአፈር ለምነት ካርታ በማዘጋጀት እና የአፈር ለምነት መረጃን በማዘጋጀት ለግብርና ልማት ድጋፍ እያደረገ ሲሆን በየክልሉ ለአፈሩ ተስማሚውን ማዳበሪያ በመምከር ላይ ነው።
data.orm: Sirnichi kaartaalee gabbina biyyee gandoota baadiyyaa 18,000 olii biyyicha keessaa qopheesuun daataa gabbina biyyee yeroo yeroonii dhiyeesuufii gosa xaa'oo gaarii tokkoo tokkoo biyyee naannichaaf tahus gorsa kennuun qonnaa deggeraa akka ture, Tagibaaruun dubbate.
data.som: Nidaamku wuxuu beeralayda ka taageerayay khariirada bacriminta ciidda in ka badan 18,000 oo xaafadood oo miyi ah oo dalka ah iyo bixinta xogta bacriminta ciidda ee casriga ah iyo sidoo kale talinta nooca ugu wanaagsan ee bacriminta ciidda gobol kasta, ayuu yidhi Tegbaru.
data.tir: እቲ ስርዓት ሓበሬታ፣ ካርታ ልሙዕ ሓመድ ብምስንዳእ ን18,000 ቑሸታት ኣብ ርእሲ ምቕራቡ መረዳእታ ልሙዕ ሓመድ ብምሃብ ከምኡ እውን ንሕድሕድ ሓመድ ዝስማማዕ ዝበለፀ ድኩዒ ብምሕባር ንሕርሻ እታ ሃገር ከምዝሓገዘ ኣይተ ተግባሩ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: Geo-hazards are affecting agricultural products and human life in selected areas of Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples Region (SNNPR) of Ethiopia, according to Geological Survey of Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Gabbi agat kee agattiina ummattah rakakayal dooreenih yanin dariifal buqre murtitte kee sehdayti manol geo-qawwalaylah bohoy ginak geytimtam itiyoppiyak geologikal survey qaddose.
data.amh: በደቡብ ብሔር ብሔረሰቦችና ህዝቦች ክልል በተመረጡ አካባቢዎች በተመረጡ አካባቢዎች ጂኦ-አደጋ በግብርና ምርቶች እና በሰው ህይወት ላይ ጉዳት እያደረሰ መሆኑን የኢትዮጵያ ጂኦሎጂካል ሰርቬይ አስታወቀ።
data.orm: Balaan lafa keessa bakka muraasa Naanoo Saboota, Sablammootaa fi Ummattoota Kibbaa (SNNPR) Itoopiyaa keessatti oomishaalee qonnaa fi jireenya namaa miidhaa jira, akka Qorannoo Jiyoolojii Itoopiyaa jedhetti.
data.som: Khataraha dhulka ayaa saameeynaysa wax soo saarka beeraha iyo nolosha bini'aadamka ee deegaanada laga soo doortay ee Shucuubta Koonfureed ee Itoobiya, sida ay sheegtay Sahanka Juquraafiga ee Itoobiya.
data.tir: ትካል ስነምድሪ ኢትዮጵያ ከምዝሓበሮ ኣብ ዝተፈለዩ ቦታታት ክልል ብሄር፣ ብሄረሰባትን ህዝብታትን ደቡብ ኢትዮጵያ ዘጋጥሙ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ሓደጋታት ኣብ ምህርቲታት ሕርሻን ኣብ ህይወት ሰብን ጉድኣት እናብፅሑ እዮም።

data.eng: According to the study conducted in collaboration with Czech Geological Survey, areas around Arbaminch, Leku, Dilla and Mejo are highly affected by erosion, floods, landslide and rock falls due to occurrence of ground fissures, high gradient reliefs and intensive deforestation.
data.aaf: Czeha geologikal survey luk cattimak yekke qusaaqal arbaminchiiy,lako,xilla kee mejo dariifal tan ballaqe gexo,weeqay baaxoh angoyyaa kee boolal darimil kaxxa qawwalayla edde tekke baaxoh qanxixuy girbah tan garbo qaruuy kinni.
data.amh: ከቼክ ጂኦሎጂካል ሰርቬይ ጋር በመተባበር በተካሄደው ጥናት በአርባምንጭ፣ለኩ፣ዲላ እና ሜጆ ዙሪያ ያሉ አካባቢዎች በከርሰ ምድር መሰንጠቅ፣ከፍተኛ ተዳፋት ጎርፍ እና በፍተኛ የደን መጨፍጨፍ የተነሳ በአፈር መሸርሸር፣በጎርፍ፣በመሬት መንሸራተትና በአለት ናዳ ከፍተኛ ጉዳት የደረሰባቸው ናቸው።
data.orm: Akka qorannoo fi qo'annoo Qorannoo Jiyoolojii Cheek wajjin qindoominaan godhameetti, bakkeewwan naannoo Arbaaminc, Leekuu, Diillaa fi Moojoo dhiqama biyyee, lolaa, mucuca lafaa fi kufaatii dhagaan sababa caccaba lafa keessaafi, soofamu hamma olaanaa fi manca'uu bosonaa guddaan baayyee hubamaa jira.
data.som: Sida laga soo xigteeye daraasaad oo ay iska kaashadeen Czech Geological Survey, deegaannada ku wareegsan Arbaminch, Leku, Dilla iyo Mejo waxaa aad u saameeya nabaad guurka, daadad, dhul go’a iyo dhagxaanta soo dhacaya oo ay sababaan in ay dhacaan dildilaacyo dhulka ah, hoos u dhac aad u sarreeya iyo xaalufka xooggan ee dhirta.
data.tir: ምስ ትካል ስነምድሪ ቼክ ብምትሕብባር ዝተገበረ መፅናዕቲ ከምዝሓበሮ ብሰንኪ ምንቃዕ መሬት፣ ፀድፊታትን ፅዑቅ ብርሰት ኣግራብን ኣብ ከባቢ ኣርባ ምንጭ ዝርከቡ ቦታታት ሌቡ፣ ዲላን ሜጆን ብፍግረ መሬት፣ ብውሑጅ፣ ብሸታሕታ ምድሪን መደረጓሕን ዝተጠቕዑ እዮም።

data.eng: The National Disaster Risk Management Commission warned about a potential flash flood in some parts of the country due to torrential rains in the coming days.
data.aaf: Agatak qawwalayla bohoyih komishin iyyemihiiy Tamaateh Tan Ayroorat raduwah yan kaxxa roobut inki inki dariifal garciik weeqi qawwalayla boddam takkem wagsiisak cubbi abita iyyen.
data.amh: በሚቀጥሉት ቀናት በሚጥለው ከባድ ዝናብ ምክንያት በአንዳንድ የሀገሪቱ አካባቢዎች ድንገተኛ የጎርፍ አደጋ ሊከሰት እንደሚችል የብሄራዊ አደጋ ስጋት ስራ አመራር ኮሚሽን አስጠንቅቋል።
data.orm: Komiishinin To'aannoo Balaa Biyyaalessaa kutaalee biyyattii baayyee keessatti lolaa guddaan sababa rooba guyyoota as adeemaa jiran keessa tahuun jiraachuu akka malu akeekkachiise.
data.som: Guddiga qaranka ee ka hortagga khatarta musiibooyinka ayaa ka digay fatahyo ka dhalan kara roobab mahiigaan ah oo maalmaha soo socda ka da’aya deegaanada dalka qaarkood.
data.tir: ኣብ ቀፀልቲ መዓልቲታት ብሰንኪ ዝወቅዕ ብርቱዕ ዝናብ ኣብ ውሱን ከባቢታት እታ ሃገር ውሑጅ ከጋጥም ከምዝኽእል ሃገራዊ ኮሚሽን ምምሕዳር ስግኣት ሓደጋ ኣጠንቒቑ።

data.eng: In a presser he gave today, Deputy Commissioner Damene Darota said that some parts of Amhara, Oromiya, SNNP and Tigray as well as most parts of Gambella regional states are vulnerable to flash flood.
data.aaf: Ciggila komishin Damene darota yece maybalaalaqal inki inki amaaraay,oromiyaay,gabbi rakaakay(SNNP) kee tigrayaay tonnah gambellak mango qaxi edde anuk garik bodda weeqi qawwalaylah bohoy leemit yaabe.
data.amh: ምክትል ኮሚሽነር ዳመነ ዳሮታ ዛሬ በሰጡት ጋዜጣዊ መግለጫ አንዳንድ የአማራ፣ ኦሮሚያ፣ ደቡብ እና ትግራይ እንዲሁም አብዛኛው የጋምቤላ ክልል አካባቢዎች ለድንገተኛ የጎርፍ አደጋ ተጋላጭ ናቸው።
data.orm: Ibsa har'a kenneen, Itti aanaan Koominerii Daammenee Daarotaa kutaalee Amaaraa, Oromiyaa, SNNP fi Tigraay muraasi akkasumas kutaalee mootummaan naannoo Gambeelaa lolaaf saaxilamoo akka taha dubbate.
data.som: War saxaafadeed uu maanta siiyay gudoomiye ku xigeenka Damene Darota ayaa ku sheegay in qaybo ka mid ah Amxaarada, Oromiya, SNNP iyo Tigray iyo sidoo kale inta badan gobolada Gambella ay u nugul yihiin fatahaadaha.
data.tir: ምኽትል ኮሚሽነር ዳመነ ዳሮታ ሎሚ ኣብ ዝተውሃበ ጋዜጣዊ መግለፂ ከምዝሓበሮ ውሱን ከባቢታት ክልላት ኣምሓራ፣ ኦሮሚያ፣ብሄር፣ ብሄረሰባትን ህዝብታትን ደቡብን ትግራይን ከምኡ እውን ዝበዝሕ ክፋል ጋምቤላ ንጋሻ ውሕጅ ዝተቓልዑ እዮም።

data.eng: Areas close to Awash, Baro-Akobo and Nile river basins and tributaries are also exposed to flood risks, he added.
data.aaf: Awashaay,baro akkobo kee Qabbay weeqaytu kee gubaraqta daqooritih dariifal tan baaxooxal weeqi qawwalayla boddeh geytimtam dayrkter tahallihiiy qaddose..
data.amh: ለአዋሽ፣ ባሮ-አኮቦ እና አባይ ተፋሰሶችና ገባር ወንዞች አቅራቢያ ያሉ አካባቢዎችም ለጎርፍ አደጋ የተጋለጡ መሆናቸውን ዳይሬክተሩ ጨምረው ገልፀዋል።
data.orm: Naannolee Awwaash, Baaroo-Aqooboo fu laga Naayili fi itti yaa'ileetti dhiyaatan balaa lolaa saaxilamoodha, jedhe itti dabaluun.
data.som: Aagagga u dhow Awash, Baro-Akobo iyo webiga Niil iyo biyo mareennada ayaa sidoo kale la kulmay khataro fatahaad, ayuu raaciyay.
data.tir: ንሽንጥሮታት ሩባታት፣ ኣዋሽ፣ ባሮ ኣኮቦ፣ ኣባይን መገብቶምን ቀረባ ዝኾኑ ቦታታት እውን ንሓደጋ ውሕጅ ዝተቓልዑ ከምዝኾኑ ወሲኹ ሓቢሩ።

data.eng: Several actors and experts in the wildlife sector, including from regional and international organizations partaken on the workshop, which among other things discussed on opportunities and challenges of the wildlife in Ethiopia.
data.aaf: Kusaaqalaay baaxo kee baad caddoh eglaalik tewqeh tan marittey garbo dubaalih luddal taamitta mangoh tan maritte kee mihrat leela edde tengelem kee tamahak famak ityoppiyak garbo dubaalak saamitte kee taqabittel walalen.
data.amh: በአውደ ጥናቱ ላይ ክልላዊ እና አለም አቀፍ ድርጅቶች የተውጣጡ በርካታ በዱር እንስሳት ዘርፍ የተሰማሩ ተዋናዮችና ባለሙያዎች የተሳተፉ ሲሆን ከተለያዩ ርዕሶች በተጨማሪ በኢትዮጵያ የዱር እንስሳት ዕድሎችና ተግዳሮቶች ላይ ተወያይተዋል።
data.orm: Dhaabbatoota naannoolee fi Addunyaalessaa irraa dabalachuun hojjetoonni fi beektonni sektera bineensota caakaa muraasi leenjicha irratti hirmaatan, waan biraa keessaa waa'ee carraalee fi yaaddoowwan bineensota caakkaa Itoopiyaa keessaa mari'atan
data.som: Dhowr jilayaal iyo khubaro ku xeel dheer arrimaha duur joogta oo ay ku jiraan hay’ado heer deegaan iyo heer caalami ah ayaa ka soo qayb galay aqoon iswaydaarsigan, kaas oo ay ka mid yihiin waxyaabo kale oo lagaga hadlay fursadaha iyo caqabadaha ka haysta duurjoogta Itoobiya.
data.tir: ኣብ ዘፈር እንስሳ ዘገዳም ተሳተፍቲ ዝኾኑ ብዙሓት ኣብቲ ጉዳይ ተዋሳእቲን ክኢላታትን እንኮላይ ካብ ከባቢያዊን ዓለምለኻዊን ትካላት ዝተወከሉ ኣብ'ቲ ኣብ ፀጋታትን ፈተናታትን እንስሳ ዘገዳም ኢትዮጵያ ኣተኹሩ ኣብ ዝመያየጥ ዓውደ መፅናዕቲ ተሳቲፎም።

data.eng: Professor Masresha Fetene, from the Ethiopian Academy of Science, told journalists that despite its untapped natural resources, the country is facing some challenges in wildlife conservation.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak saynis akkadaamik yemeete professer Masresha Fentahun xaagu qawah elle qaddosennalaay inkinnah amruteween gino gaditte baaxok garbo dubaalih mabbuuxul inki inki taqabitte kataasak geytimtam qaddsose.
data.amh: ከኢትዮጵያ ሳይንስ አካዳሚ የመጡት ፕሮፌሰር ማስረሻ ፈጠነ ለጋዜጠኞች እንደተናገሩት፤ ምንም እንኳን ያልተነካ የተፈጥሮ ሀብት ቢኖራትም ሀገሪቱ በዱር እንስሳት ጥበቃ ላይ አንዳንድ ተግዳሮቶች እየገጠሟት ነው።
data.orm: Pirofeeserri Maasreshaa Fexxenee, Akkaadaamii Saayinsii Itoopiyaa irraa kan tahe, leecalloo uumamaa hin tuqamne jiraatanus, biyyattiin eegumsa bineensota caakkaan walqabatee yaaddoowwan muraasa akka qabdu qaazexeessitootti hime.
data.som: Professor Masresha Fetene, oo ka tirsan Akadeemiyada Sayniska ee Itoobiya, ayaa u sheegtay suxufiyiinta in inkastoo aan laga faa'iidaysan kheyraadka dabiiciga ah, in waddanku wajahayo caqabado la xidhiidha ilaalinta duurjoogta.
data.tir: ካብ ኣካዳሚ ሳይንስ ኢትዮጵያ ዝተወከሉ ፕሮፌሰር ማስረሻ ፈጠነ ንጋዜጠኛታት ከምዝበልዎ እታ ሃገር ዋላ እኳ ዘይተተንከፈ ተፈጥሮኣዊ ሃፍቲ ዝወነነት እንትኾነት ኣብ ጉዳይ ምዕቃብ እንስሳት ዘገዳም ግና ፈተንቲ ፀገማት ገጢምዎም እዮም።

data.eng: Kenya’s firefighting helicopter that has the capacity to hold 1200 liters of water starts sprinkling on a blaze that rage the Semein Mountains National Park.
data.aaf: 1200 litrih lee tabbixeemih dudda le kiniyak gira qawwalaylah helegobter kilbatti qaleelak agat parkil ugutte giral leecaxxam qimbisseh.
data.amh: 1200 ሊትር ውሃ የመያዝ አቅም ያለው የኬንያ የእሳት አደጋ መከላከያ ሄሊኮፕተር የሰሜን ተራሮች ብሄራዊ ፓርክን በሚያነደው እሳት ላይ መርጨት ጀመረ።
data.orm: Helikoopterri ibidda dhaamsituu Keeniyaa kan dandeetti bishaan liitira 1200 qabachuu qabu labooba Ibiddaa Paarkii Biyyaalesaa Gaarreen Sameen gube irratti facaasuu eegale.
data.som: Diyaaradda Helicopter-ka ee Kenya oo awood u leh inay qaado 1200 oo litir oo biyo ah ayaa billowday inay ku rushayso dab ka kacay beerta Qaranka ee Buuraha Semein.
data.tir: እቲ 1200 ሊትሮ ማይ ናይ ምሓዝ ዓቐሚ ዘለዎ ናይ ኬንያ ሓዊ መጥፍኢ ሄሊኮፕተር ኣብ ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ጎቦታት ሰሜን ንዘጋጠመ ባርዕ ሓዊ ንምጥፋእ ማይ ምንፃግ ጀሚሩ።

data.eng: The helicopter and 12 Israeli wildfire experts have arrived this morning at the national park to support the eradication process of the wildfire raging in the national park.
data.aaf: Helegobter kee islaailik urta girah mihrat leela agat parkit bodde urta gira badisoonuh abak geytiman macal qokoloonuh asaaku agat banki fanah gulen.
data.amh: ሄሊኮፕተሩ እና 12 እስራኤላውያን የሰደድ እሳት ባለሙያዎች በብሔራዊ ፓርኩ የሚደርሰውን ሰደድ እሳት ለማጥፋት የሚደረገውን ጥረት ለመደገፍ ዛሬ ማለዳ ወደ ብሄራዊ ፓርኩ ገብተዋል።
data.orm: Helikoopterichii fi ogeessonni ibidda caakkaa Isiraa'el 12 tahan adeemsa ibidda caakkaa paarkii biyyaalessichaa gubaa jiru dhabamsiisuu gargaaruuf ganama kana paarkii biyyoolessichaatti argaman
data.som: Diyaarada Helicopter ka ah iyo 12 khubaro ah oo ku takhasusay dab damiska Israa’iil ayaa saaka soo gaadhay beerta qaranka si ay u taageeraan hannaanka ciribtirka dabka ka kacaya beeraha qaranka.
data.tir: እቲ ሄሊኮፕተርን 12 እስራኤላዊያን ክኢላታት ባርዕ ሓዊን ነቲ ኣብቲ ሃገራዊ ፓርክ ዝጋፋሕ ዘሎ ለበዳ ሓዊ ንምጥፋእ ኣብ ዝግበር ዘሎ ፃዕሪ ንምስታፍ ሎሚ ንጉሆ ኣብ'ቲ ሃገራዊ ፓርክ በፂሖም።

data.eng: As wildfire has been ravaging the Semein national park for a couple of weeks, Ethiopia has called the international community for support to contain and extinguish the blaze.
data.aaf: Kilbatti Pgat Parkil Namma Ayyaamih gideh urta gira gexak geytimtah tan udduru,gira lowsiisoonu kee badisoonuh baad caddoh maritte qokol akah abtannah esseren,
data.amh: የሰሜን ብሄራዊ ፓርክን ለሁለት ሳምንታት የሰደድ እሳት እያቃጠለ ባለበት ወቅት፣ እሳቱን ለመቆጣጠር እና ለማጥፋት የአለም አቀፉ ማህበረሰብ ድጋፍ እንዲያደርግ ኢትዮጵያ ጠይቃለች።
data.orm: Torbanoota muraasaaf akkuma ibiddi paarkii biyyaaleessaa Semeen gubaa ture, Itoopiyaan hawaasi addunyaa ibiddicha to'achuufi balleessuuf akka gargaaru gaafata turte.
data.som: Iyadoo dabku uu baabi'inayey beerta qaranka ee Semein muddo dhowr todobaad ah, Itoobiya waxay beesha caalamka ugu baaqday in laga taageero sidii loo xakameyn lahaa loona damin lahaa dabka.
data.tir: ቅድሚ ሒደት ሰሙናት ኣብ ሃገራዊ ፖርክ ሰሜን ለበዳ ሓዊ ምስተባረዐ ዓለምለኸ ማሕበረሰብ ኣብ ምጥፋእ እቲ ባርዕ ሓገዝ ክገብር ኢትዮጵያ ጻውዒት ኣቕሪባ እያ።

data.eng: Ethiopia's Environmental Analysis conducted by World Bank, Forest, Environment and Climate Change, Finance and Economic Cooperation ministries and Ethiopian Development Research Institute was launched here today.
data.aaf: Baad Banki,dessooy,dariifa kee silayti milaagiyya,itiyoppiyak dariifa dacayrol kusaq gexsite. Faynansiiy Kee qidaddoh Kooperation qokolih malak kee ityoppiyak daddos kusaaqih inistitute asaaku qimbisen.
data.amh: በአለም ባንክ፣ ደን፣ አካባቢ እና የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ፣ ፋይናንስ እና የኢኮኖሚ ትብብር ሚኒስቴር፣የኢትዮጵያ ልማት ጥናትና ምርምር ኢንስቲትዩት የተካሄደው የኢትዮጵያ የአካባቢ ትንተና እዚህ ዛሬ ተጀምሯል።
data.orm: Xiinxalli Eegumsa naannoo Itoopiyaa Baankii Addunyaa, Ministeerota Bosona, Eegumsa Naannoo fi Jijiiram qilleensaa, Faayinaansii fi Tumsa Diinagdee akkasumas Inistitiyuutii Qorannoo Guddinaa Itoopiyaan geggeeffame harra asitti eegalsiifame.
data.som: “Waxaa maanta xagan lagu daahfuray falanqaynta deegaanka ee Itoobiya oo ay fulinayaan Bangiga Adduunka, Kaymaha, Deegaanka iyo Isbadalka Cimilada, Wasaaradaha Maaliyadda iyo Iskaashiga Dhaqaalaha iyo Machadka Horumarinta Itoobiya.
data.tir: ብምትሕብባር ባንኪ ዓለም፣ ሚኒስቴራት ዱር፣ ከባቢያዊ ኣየርን ለውጢ ንብረት ኣየርን፣ ገንዘብን ቁጠባዊ ምትሕብባርን ከምኡ እውን ትካል መፅናዕቲ ልምዓት ኢትዮጵያ ዝተዳለወ ትንታነ ከባቢያዊ ኣየር ኢትዮጵያ ሎሚ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ዕላዊ ኮይኑ።

data.eng: According to the Environmental Analysis lack of integration among the sectoral ministries and regional bureaus, problems of value addition in using natural resources and lack of strategy on green industry are identified as the main challenges that hamper effective actions against environmental climate change related actions.
data.aaf: Dariifa dacayroh adda fakot kee sekter taamah buxaaxi kee rakaakay biroorah fanat tanih tan agle anewaytam,gino gaddih mantafaqal tamballeh tan cawlayitte osissamih taqabitte kee anxaxin industrittel steratiji daggowtam kaxxa kaxxa taqabitte silayti milaagimiyya luk sittat anuk beyaanah yanin abtootat adaf akkuk geytimtam qaddosen.
data.amh: የአካባቢ ትንተናው መሰረት በሴክተር መሥሪያ ቤቶችና በክልል ቢሮዎች መካከል ውህደት አለመኖሩ፣ የተፈጥሮ ሀብት አጠቃቀም ላይ የሚስተዋሉ የእሴት መጨመር ችግሮች እና በአረንጓዴ ኢንዱስትሪ ላይ ያለ የስትራቴጂ ማነስ ከአየር ንብረት ለውጥ ጋር ተያይዞ የሚወሰዱ ተግባራትን የሚያደናቅፉ ዋና ዋና ተግዳሮቶች እንደሆኑ ተጠቁሟል።
data.orm: Akka Xiinxala Eegumsa Naannootti hanqinni walsimannaa sektera ministirootaa fi biiroowwan naannolee gidduudhaa dhibuun, rakkoowwan leecalloolee uumama fayyadamuudhaan faayidaa dabaluu fi hanqinni tarsiimoo industirii magariisaa akka yaaddoowwan ijoo kan tarkaanfilee faallaa tarkaanfilee jijjjiirama qilleensaa eegumsa naannoon walqabate danqe tahuu adda baafamaniiru.
data.som: Marka loo eego falanqaynta deegaanka la'aanta isdhexgalka ee wasaaradaha waaxyaha iyo xafiisyada gobolka, dhibaatooyinka qiimaha dheeriga ah ee isticmaalka kheyraadka dabiiciga ah iyo la'aanta istaraatiijiyad la'aanta warshadaha cagaaran ayaa loo aqoonsaday inay yihiin caqabadaha ugu waaweyn ee caqabada ku ah falalka wax ku oolka ah ee ka dhinaca ah ficilada la xiriira isbedelka cimilada.

data.eng: The Addis Ababa City Administration Environment Protection and Green development Commission said that it has shut down two factories, which it accused of polluting the environment.

data.tir: ኣብ ምምሕዳር ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኮምሽን ሓለዋ ከባቢያዊ ኣየርን ቆፅላዋይ ልምዓትን ንብኽለት ከባቢያዊ ኣየር ጠንቂ እዮም ዝበሎም ክልተ ፋብሪካታት ክዕፀዉ ገይሩ።

data.eng: Environment Commission Director with the Commission, Bayu Tola, the two factorie–Hansen Glass Factory and Dire leather factors got closed after they repeatedly failed to warnings to make corrections.
data.aaf: Ta komishinik dariifa dacayroh direktor Bayu tola namma fabrika hansen-cayyari fabrika kee dire leather sababitte qag qagitak akah massosan innah mabitina geweenimih alfimteh.
data.amh: የኮሚሽኑ የአካባቢ ጥበቃ ኮሚሽን ዳይሬክተር ባዩ ቶላ ሁለቱ ፋብሪካዎች ሀንሰን ብርጭቆ ፋብሪካ እና ድሬ ሌዘር በተደጋጋሚ ማስጠንቀቂያ ተሰጥቷቸው እርማት ባለማድረጋቸው ተዘግተዋል።
data.orm: Daarikteerri Komiishinii Eegumsa naannoo Komiishiniii, Baayyuu Tolaa wajjin warshaalee lamaan - Warshaa Burcuqqoo Hansenii fi warshaalee gogaa Dirree erga irra deebiin akeekkachisa akka sirreessaniif kenname guutu dadhabanii booda kan cufame.
data.som: Agaasimaha komishanka ee deegaanka Bayu Tola, labada warshad Hansen Glass Factory iyo Dire warshada maqaar ka ayaa la xidhay ka dib markii ay kasoo bixiwaayeen digniino lagu celceliyay ku saabsan in la saxo.
data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ኮሚሽን ዳይሬክተር ዘፈር ከባቢያዊ ኣየር ዝኾነ ኣይተ ባዩ ቶላ ከምዝገለፆ ሃንሰን ፋብሪካ መስትያትን ድሬ ፋብሪካ ቆርበትን መአረምታ ክገብሩ ንዝቐረበሎም ተደጋጋሚ መጠንቐቕታ ብዘይምኽባሮም ክዕፀዉ ተገይሮም።

data.eng: Government Communication Affairs Office Minister, Bereket Simon, stressed the need to further consolidate soil and water conservation so as to protect the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam from silt and sediment.
data.aaf: Doolat angaarawih caagiidah kutbeh buxah malaak gifta bereket simoon,ballaaqe nagay diggoosaanam faxximtam kassise. nabah yan ityoppiyak asqassabe karawwad ballaqe gexo kalaloonuh ledacayro.
data.amh: የመንግስት ኮሙዩኒኬሽን ጉዳዮች ፅህፈት ቤት ሚኒስትር አቶ በረከት ስምኦን ታላቁ የኢትዮጵያ ህዳሴ ግድብን ከሲልት እና ደለል ለመከላከልየአፈርና የውሃ ጥበቃን የበለጠ ማጠናከር እንደሚያስፈልግ አሳስበዋል።
data.orm: Ministeerri Waajjira Dhimma Koomunikeeshinii Mootummaa, Bereket Simoon, Hidha Guddicha Haaromsa Itoopiiyaa cirrachaa fi kuufama biyyee irraa eeguuf eegumsa biyyee fi bishaanii caalmaatti jabeessuun akka barbaachisu dubbate.
data.som: "Wasiirka Xafiiska Arrimaha Isgaarsiinta Dowladda, Bereket Simon, ayaa carrabka ku adkeeyay baahida loo qabo in la sii adkeeyo ilaalinta ciidda iyo biyaha si loo ilaaliyo Biyo xireenka Grand Renaissance Dam ee ciidda iyo wasakhda."
data.tir: ሚኒስትር ጉዳያት ኮሚኒኬሽን መንግስቲ በረከት ስምኦን ምእንተ ኣብ ህዳሰ ግድብ ኢትዮጵያ ደለልን ሓሸዋን ከይውህለል ስራሕቲ ዕቀባ ሓመድን ማይን ተጠናኺሩ ክቕፅል ኣገንዚቡ።

data.eng: Bereket, who is also secretary of the National Council for the Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam Project, said soil and water conservation and natural resource protection should be undertaken in Amhara, Oromia and Benishangul Gumuz states towards the same goal.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak nabah yan asqassabe karawwadih projectik agat malah buxak kutbe abeena gifta bereket amaaraay,oromiya kee benishangul gumuz rakaakayittel ballaqe kee lee dacayro kee gino gaddih dacayroh taama taamitaanam faxximtaamat yaabe.
data.amh: የታላቁ የኢትዮጵያ ህዳሴ ግድብ ፕሮጀክት ብሄራዊ ምክር ቤት ፀሃፊም የሆኑት አቶ በረከት በአማራ፣ ኦሮሚያ እና ቤንሻንጉል ጉሙዝ ክልሎች የአፈርና ውሃ ጥበቃና የተፈጥሮ ሃብት ጥበቃ ስራ ለተመሳሳይ ግብ ሊሰራ ይገባል ብለዋል።
data.orm: Barakat, barreessaa Mana Maree Biyyoolessaa Hidha Haara'umsaa Guddicha Itoopiyaas kan tahe, kunuunsi biyyee fi bishaanii fi eegumsi leecalloolee uumamaa naannolee Amaaraa, Oromiyaa fi Benishaangul keessatti kaayyoo tokkichaa hojiirra ooluu qaba jedhe.
data.som: Bereket oo sidoo kale ah xoghayaha golaha qaranka ee mashruuca biyo xidheenka Grand Ethiopian Renaissance Dam ayaa sheegay in ilaalinta ciidda iyo biyaha iyo ilaalinta khayraadka dabiiciga ah ay tahay in laga sameeyo gobolada Axmaarada, Oromia iyo Benishangul Gumuz si loo gaadho hadaf isku mid ah.

data.eng: Ethiopia has pledged to provide one billion tree seedlings to the Neighboring countries in its belief that climate change and desertification in the region demands Regional solutions.

data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ በአካባቢው የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ እና በረሃማነት ቀጠናዊ መፍትሄዎችን እንደሚጠይቅ በማመን አንድ ቢሊዮን የዛፍ ችግኞችን ለጎረቤት ሀገራት ለማቅረብ ቃል ገብታለች።

data.tir: ኣብ'ቲ ዞባ ንዘሎ ለውጢ ንብረት ኣየርን በረኻነትን ንምቕያር ብምዕላም ኢትዮጵያ ሓደ ቢልዮን ፈልሲታት ንጎረባብቲ ሃገራት ንምክፍፋል ቃል ኣቲዋ።

data.eng: Ethiopia has planted 20 billion trees to build a climate-resilient green economy and assist the Global efforts to respond to the Earth’s climate change and its adverse effects.
data.aaf: Ityoppia silayti milaagih taqabih addah gacewayta anxaxin qidaddo disoonu kee baaxol silayti milaagul raddi yacoonuh abaanah yanin macal cattuh 20 milliyonih coox baaxcisseh tan.
data.amh: ኢትዮጵያ ለአየር ንብረት ለውጥ የማይበገር አረንጓዴ ኢኮኖሚ ለመገንባት እና ለምድር የአየር ንብረት ለውጥና አሉታዊ ተፅእኖዎቹ ምላሽ ለመስጠት የሚደረገውን ጥረት ለማገዝ 20 ቢሊዮን ዛፎችን ተክላለች።
data.orm: Itoopiyaan diinagdee magariisa jijjiirama qilleensaa damdamatu ijaaruu fi tattaafffi addunyaa jijjiirama qilleensaa Dachee fi miidhaalee inni fiduu danda'uuf deebii kennuu gargaaruuf biqiltuu mukaa biliyoona 20 dhaabde.
data.som: Itoobiya ayaa beeratay 20 bilyan oo geed si ay u dhisto dhaqaalle cagaaran oo adkaysi u leh cimilada iyo in ay gacan ka geysato dadaallada caalamiga ah ee wax looga qabanayo isbeddelka cimilada dhulka iyo saameyntiisa xun.
data.tir: ኢትዮጵያ ቆፅላዋይ ቁጠባ ንምህናፅ ዝሕግዝን ለውጢ ንብረት ኣየር ዓለም ንምክልኻል ንዝግበር ዘሎ ዓለማዊ ጻዕሪ ንምድጋፍን ዒስራ ቢልዮን ፈልሲታት ተኺላ።

data.eng: The Ethiopian Metrology Agency said that the heavy rainfall is expected to continue in September, and warned the public over the sudden flooding incidents.
data.aaf: Qunxa garabluh rade kaxxa robu fooca fanah axcelem qaddosse Itiyoppiyak Metrologih Ejensi garccik baooda weeqi qawwalaylak isinni akah dacrisan innah qaddosen.
data.amh: የኢትዮጵያ ሜትሮሎጂ ኤጀንሲ በመስከረም ወር የጣለው ከባድ ዝናብ ሊቀጥል እንደሚችል ገልጾ ከድንገተኛ የጎርፍ አደጋ ህዝቡን አስጠንቅቋል።
data.orm: Ejensiin Meetiroolojii Itoopiyaa roobni ulfaataan ji'a Fulbaanaa keessa itti fufuu akka eegamuu hime akkasumas balaawwa lolaa tasaairraa ummati akka of eeggatu akekkachiise.
data.som: Hay’adda cimilada dalka Itoobiya ayaa sheegtay in la filayo in roobabka xooggani ay sii socn doonaan bisha Sebtembar, waxayna uga digtay shacabka khatarta degdega ah ee fatahaadaha.
data.tir: ኣብ መስከረም ብርቱዕ ዝናብ ዝቕፅል ምኳኑ ብምትንባይ ህዝቢ ካብ ሃንደበታዊ ውሕጅ ንዓርሱ ክከላኸል ትካል ሜትሮዎሎጂ ኢትዮጵያ ኣፍሊጡ።

data.eng: The weather forecast compiled during the month of August shows that there will be heavy rain in coming months. The Agency advised the people to be cautious of possible sudden flooding.
data.aaf: Waysi alsah dayyosen silayti afkanih faalal Yamaateh Yan alsitteh Addat kaxxa rob yanim xiiqimelem tablaase.ejensi ummatta garciik bodda weeqi qawwalayala akah akkewytannah cubbi akah abitan innah fayisse.
data.amh: በነሀሴ ወር የተጠናቀረው የአየር ሁኔታ ትንበያ በመጪዎቹ ወራት ከባድ ዝናብ ሊኖር እንደሚችል ያሳያል። ኤጀንሲው ህዝቡ ሊከሰት ከሚችል ድንገተኛ ጎርፍ ጥንቃቄ እንዲያደርግ መክሯል።
data.orm: Raagi haala qilleensaa ji'a Hagayyaa keessa walitti qabame ji'oota dhufu keessa roobi cimaan akka dhufaa jiru agarsiisa. Ejensichi ummati lolaa tasaa jiraachuu malu irraa akka of eeggachu gorse.
data.som: Saadaasha cimilada ee la soo aruuriyay inta lagu guda jiro bisha Ogosto ayaa muujineysa in ay jiri doonaan roobab culus bilaha soo socda. Hay’addu waxay dadka kula talisay inay ka digtoonaadaan fatahaadda degdega ah ee macquulka ah.
data.tir: ኣብ ወርሒ ነሓሰ ዝተጠመረ ትንበያ ኩነታት ኣየር ከምዘመልክቶ ኣብ ቀፃሊ ኣዋርሕ ብርቱዕ ዝናብ ክወቅዕ እዩ፤ እቲ ትካል ድማ ህዝቢ ካብ ሃንደበታዊ ውሕጅ ክጥንቀቕ ኣገንዚቡ።

data.eng: Flash floods killed five people in the Ethiopian capital Addis Ababa in the last two days, the city’s Addis ababa city fire and emergency prevention and rescue agency official said today .
data.aaf: Addis ababal taturte namma ayroh addat gufteh sugte weeqi qawwalaylat koona num edde rabtem addisa ababah magaalak gira kee garciik takke qawwalaylah kalalu catiyyi ejensih mirac asaaku qaddsoe.
data.amh: ባለፉት ሁለት ቀናት ውስጥ በኢትዮጵያ ዋና ከተማ አዲስ አበባ ላይ በደረሰ ድንገተኛ የጎርፍ አደጋ አምስት ሰዎች መሞታቸውን የአዲስ አበባ ከተማ እሳትና ድንገተኛ አደጋ መከላከልና ማዳን ኤጀንሲ ባለስልጣን ዛሬ አስታወቁ።
data.orm: Magaalaa guddoo Itoopiyaa Addis Ababaa keessatti guyyoota lamaan darban lolaan tasaa namoota shan ajjeesuu, hoogganaan ejensii ittisa ibiddaa fi balaa tasaa fi baraartuu magaalaa Addis ababaa har'a dubbate.
data.som: Daadad xooggan ayaa shan qof ku dilay caasimadda Itoobiya ee Addis Ababa labadii maalmood ee la soo dhaafay, sida uu sheegay sarkaal ka tirsan waaxda dab damiska iyo ka hortagga degdegga ah ee Addis Ababa.
data.tir: ትካል ምክልኻል ሓዊን ሃንደበታዊ ሓደጋን ምምሕዳር ኣዲስ ኣበባ ሎሚ መዓልቲ ከምዝገለፆ ኣብ ከተማ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ ዝሓለፉ ክልተ መዓልቲታት ብዘጋጠመ ሃንደበታዊ ውሕጅ ሓሙሽተ ሰባት ሞይቶም።

data.eng: Among the 11 people four were swept away as they tried to cross a river in the Nifas sil Lafto suburbs of the city Hana mariam particular area, Nigatu Mamu, spokesman for the city’s fire and emergency division said.
data.aaf: To magaalak nifaas silki lafto magaalak baxsa leh yan darifik nifas silki lafto magaalk Hana Mariam darifil daqaarak tabtam gabbatte 11 yakke marak fereeyi beeh axcuk magaalak gira kee garciik takke qawwalaylah exxak afak yaabenah yan nigatu mamoy qaddose.
data.amh: በከተማዋ ንፋስ ስልክ ላፍቶ ዳርቻ ልዩ ቦታው ሃና ማርያም አካባቢ ወንዝ ለመሻገር የሞክሩ ከ11 ሰዎች መካከል አራቱ ተወስደዋል ሲሉ የከተማዋ የእሳትና ድንገተኛ አደጋ ክፍል ቃል አቀባይ ንጋቱ ማሙ ተናግረዋል።
data.orm: Namoota 11 keessaa afur qarqara magaalaa Nifas Silk Laaftoo keessumaa bakka Haannaa Mariyaam jedhamutti utuu laga qaxxaamuruuf yaalanii lolaan fudhatamuu, dubbi himaan kutaa ibiddaa fi balaa tasaa magaalitti dubbate.
data.som: 11 ka mid ah afarta qof ayaa daadku qaaday iyagoo isku dayaya inay ka gudbaan webi ku yaala xaafada Nifas sil Lafto ee magaalada, Hana mariam gaar ahaan aaggaa ah, Nigatu Mamu, oo ah afhayeenka waaxda dab damiska iyo xaaladaha degdegga ah ee magaalada ayaa sheegay.
data.tir: ካብቶም ኣብ ንፋስ ስልክ ላፍቶ ሩባ ከቓርፁ ዝፈተኑ 11 ሰባት እቶም ኣርባዕተ ብውሕ ጅ ከምዝተወሰዱ ኣፈኛ ትካል ምክልኻል ሓዊን ሃንደበታዊ ሓደጋን እታ ከተማ ኣይተ ንጋቱ ማሞ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: Stored agricultural and industrial chemicals at various institutions in Addis Ababa and regional towns are posing health hazard and environmental pollution, experts warn.
data.aaf: Addis ababa kee rakaakayitte magaaloolul geytimta bax baxsale eglaalil addal geytimta magaalooluk bure kee industri kemikaalitte qafiyatal saduk tanim kee dariifa akah bayissanah abak geytimtam tutaaxago qaddosse.
data.amh: በአዲስ አበባ እና በክልል ከተሞች በሚገኙ የተለያዩ ተቋማት የተከማቹ የእርሻ እና የኢንዱስትሪ ኬሚካሎች ለጤና ጉዳት እና አካባቢን ለብክለት እየዳረጉ መሆናቸውን ባለሙያዎች አስጠንቅቀዋል።
data.orm: Keemikaalonni qonnaa fi industirii dhaabbata garagaraa Addis Ababaa fi magaalota naannoo keessatti kuufamanii jiran yaaddoo nagaeenyaa fi faalama qilleensaa akka uuman, beektonni akeekkachiisan.
data.som: Kiimikada beeraha iyo warshadaha ee lagu kaydiyo xarumaha kala duwan ee Addis Ababa iyo magaalooyinka deegaanada ayaa keenaya khatar caafimaad iyo wasakhaynta deegaanka, khubaradu ayaa ka digay.
data.tir: ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባን ኣብ ከተማታት ክልላትን ኣብ ዝተፈላለዩ ትካላት ዝተኸዘኑ ቀመማት ሕርሻን ኢንዱስትሪን ንጥዕና ዝፃባእን ንከባቢያዊ ኣየር ዝብክልን ስግኣት ከምዝፈጠሩ ክኢላታት ገሊፆም።

data.eng: This was disclosed at a three-day training held this week in Addis Ababa on chemical weapons control and chemical safety and security management facilitated by Organization for Prevention of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) for member states.
data.aaf: Ah qaddooseenim ayyaamah adiis ababal sidooca ayro sugte kemikal carbi silaacih lowsis kee kemical nagay aniika kee mabbuxul ohoxix afteenitit baxooxah aiiqili aydadakaakanal geytiman.
data.amh: ይህ የተገለጸው በዚህ ሳምንት በአዲስ አበባ ለሶስት ቀናት በቆየው የኬሚካል ጦር መሳሪያ ቁጥጥር እና የኬሚካል ደህንነት እና ጥበቃ አስተዳደር ላይ የኬሚካል ጦር መሳሪያዎች መከላከል ድርጅት(ኦፒሲደብሊው) ለአባል ሀገራቱ ባመቻቸላቸው ስልጠና ላይ ነው።
data.orm: Kun leenjii guyyaa sadii Addis Ababaa keessatti to'annoo meeshaalee waraanaa keemikaalaa fi bulchiinsa nageenya keemikaalaa Dhaabbati Ittisa Meeshaalee Waraanaa Keemikaalaa (OPCW) biyyoota miseensotaaf kenne irratti ifoome.
data.som: Arrintan ayaa lagu sheegay tababar socday saddex maalmood, toddobaadkan oo lagu qabtay magaalada Addis Ababa, kaas oo ku saabsanaa xakamaynta hubka kiimikada iyo ilaalinta badbaadada kiimikada iyo ilaalinta ammaanka oo ay fududaysay ururka ka hortagga hubka Kiimikada (OPCW) ee dalalka xubnaha ka ah.
data.tir: እቶም ክኢላታት ነዚ ዝገለፁ ኣብ'ቲ ብሓልዮት ውድብ ምክልኻል ቀመማዊ ኣፅዋራት ዝተሰናድአን ኣብ ምክልኻል ቀመማዊ ኣፅዋራትን ኣብ ምምሕዳር ቀመማዊ ድሕንነትን ፀጥታን ኣተኹሩ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኣብ'ዚ ሰሙን ኣብ ዝተኻየደ ስልጠና ሰለስተ መዓልቲ እዩ።

data.eng: In the side line of the workshop, environment experts told The Reporter that with the increasing use of agricultural inputs and the thriving manufacturing sector, the threats of environmental pollution is increasing from time to time.
data.aaf: To kusaqak gambi gambit dariifa dacayroh mihratleela reportih elle qaddosen innalaay,buqreh uwwaytittet mantafaqat kee dadalak temeeteh tan manufakturing ludditte,dariifa baatih bohoyitte uduuruuk udduruh osak geytimta.
data.amh: በአውደ ጥናቱ ጎን ለጎን የአካባቢ ጥበቃ ባለሙያዎች ለሪፖርተር እንደገለጹት፣ የግብርና ግብአቶች አጠቃቀምና እያደገ የመጣው የማኑፋክቸሪንግ ዘርፍ፣ የአካባቢ ብክለት ሥጋት ከጊዜ ወደ ጊዜ እየጨመረ ነው።
data.orm: Workishooppicha cinatti, beektonni eegumsa naannoo dabalaa dhufuu itti fayyadama galteewwan qonnaa fi guddachuu sektera manufaakcheriingiin walqabatee, sodaan faalama qilleensaa yeroodhaa gara yerootti dabalaa dhufu Ze Rippoorteritti himaniiru.
data.som: Dhinaca aqoon is weydaarsiga, ayaa khubarada deegaanka u sheegeen war faafinta iyadoo la kordhinayo isticmaalka agabka wax soo saarka beeraha iyo wax soo saarka kobcaya, khataraha wasakhowga deegaanka ay sii kordhayaan marba marka ka dambaysa.
data.tir: እቲ ዓውደ መፅናዕቲ ኣብ ዝተኻየደሉ እዋን ክኢላታት ንጋዜጣ ሪፖርተር ከምዝገለፅዎ ኣብ ዘፈር ሕርሻን ኣፍረይቲ ትካላትን እታወታት ምጥቃም እናወሰኸ ምስ ምምፅኡ ተታሓሒዙ ስግኣት ብኽለት ከባቢያዊ ኣየር ካብ ግዜ ናብ ግዜ እናወሰኸ እዩ።

data.eng: Visiting Addis Ababa this week, Sara Terry, senior policy advisor to the Office of Air Quality Planning and Standards under the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), has brought her team to initiate the work of air quality management system in the capital.
data.aaf: Ayyamah Addis Ababat gufne abte US dariifak Dariifa Dacayrih Ejensi silayti mexxatih ekraaro kee caddodak kutbe buxak polisih fayu abeena Sara Terry kay butta magaalal silayti maxxatih miracsih siirat taama akah qimbisan innah abteh tan.
data.amh: በዚህ ሳምንት አዲስ አበባን የጎበኙት በዩኤስ የአካባቢ ጥበቃ ኤጀንሲ የአየር ጥራት እቅድ እና ደረጃዎች ጽህፈት ቤት ከፍተኛ የፖሊሲ አማካሪ ሳራ ቴሪ ቡድናቸው በመዲናዋ የአየር ጥራት አስተዳደር ስርዓት ሥራ እንዲያስጀምር ያደርጋሉ።
data.orm: Torban kana Addis Ababaa daawwachuun, Saaraa Teerii, gorsaa olaanaan imaammataa Ejesnii Eegumsa Nannoo (EPA) US jalatti waajjira Istaandardii fi Qulqullina Qilleensaa Karoorsuu, hojii sirna bulchiinsa qulqullina qilleensaa magaala gudditti keessatti jalqabuuf garee ishee fidde.
data.som: Booqashada Addis Ababa toddobaadkan, Sara Terry, oo ah lataliyaha sare ee siyaasadda ee Xafiiska Qorshaynta Tayada Hawada iyo Heerarka Hay'adda Ilaalinta Deegaanka ee Maraykanka (EPA), ayaa keentay kooxdeeda si ay u bilaabaan shaqada nidaamka maamulka tayada hawada ee caasimadda.
data.tir: ኣብ ትካል ሓለዋ ከባቢያዊ ኣየር ኣሜሪካ ዝለዓለት ኣማኻሪት ፖሊሲ ቤት ፅሕፈት ፅርየት ኣየር፣ ትልሚን ደረጃን ዝኾነት ሳራ ቴሪ ኣብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ስርዓት ምምሕዳር ፅርየት ኣየር ንምትእትታው ብምዕላም ምስ ጉጅላኣ ኣብዚ ሰሙን ናብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ መፂኣ።

data.eng: Speaking to The Reporter on Friday, Terry said that within the coming two years Addis Ababa is expected to devise a policy to institutionalize air quality management system under the city’s Environmental Protection Authority (EPA).
data.aaf: Arbaqh Ayro Ribborter lih Abeh Yan Yaabal Terry iyyemihiiy yamaate namma santih addata silayti maxxatih miraacih sirata magaalak dariifa dacayroh mirac ( EPA) gubat exxah hoonuh polisit arteh axcuk qambaalan.
data.amh: አርብ ዕለት ከሪፖርተር ጋር ባደረጉት ቆይታ፣ ቴሪ በመጪዎቹ ሁለት ዓመታት ውስጥ አዲስ አበባ የአየር ጥራት አስተዳደር ሥርዓትን በከተማዋ የአካባቢ ጥበቃ ባለሥልጣን (ኢፒኤ) ሥር ተቋማዊ ለማድረግ ፖሊሲ ትነድፋለች ተብሎ ይጠበቃል።
data.orm: Gaafa Jimaataa Ze Rippoorteritti dubbachuun, Teeriin waggoota lamaan dhufan keessatti Addis Ababaan Abbaa taayitaa Eegumsa Naannoo (EPA) magaalattii jalatti sirna bulchiinsa qulqullina qilleensaa dhaabbatawaa gochuuf imaammata qopheessuu akka maltu dubbatte.
data.som: Terry oo la hadashay wargayska The Reporter Jimcihii, ayaa sheegtay in labada sano ee soo socda Addis Ababa la filayo in ay dejiso siyaasad lagu saleeyo nidaamka maamulka tayada hawada ee hoos yimaada Hay’adda Ilaalinta Deegaanka ee magaalada (EPA).
data.tir: ቴሪ ብዓርቢ ንጋዜጣ ሪፖርተር ከምዝበለቶ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ብትካል ሓለዋ ከባቢያዊ ኣየር እቲ ከተማ ኣቢለ ኣብ ዝቕፅሉ ክልተ ዓመታት ስርዓት ምምሕዳር ፅርየት ኣየር ትካላዊ ዝገብር ፖሊሲ ክትቀርፅ እያ።

data.eng: Officials of the Guji Zone in the Oromia Regional State has denied plans of transferring the Kenticha Tantalum Mine to youth associations saying that it was “merely an idea to entertain rather than an actionable plan” and that it had no intention of depriving the federal Mining, Petroleum and Biofuel Corporation off its mining concession and processing facility.
data.aaf: Oromiyah Rakaakayih Doolatak guji-zonih saqolti kenticha Tantalum Mine qunxaaneyti egla fanah akah korisan innah ekraaro yeyyeeqeenim " abtoh ekraarok kalah rufto mabla kinni" axcuk federaalak maqaadin daddosih malak tah akke kaluh qalaama akah mayyu axcuuk kassiise, petrolium kee biofuel korperation maqaadin consession kee bicissoh exxaka yewqeh.
data.amh: በኦሮሚያ ክልል የጉጂ ዞን ኃላፊዎች የቅንቲቻ ታንታለም ማዕድን ወደ ወጣቶች ማህበራት ለማዘዋወር እቅድ ማውጣቱን "ተግባራዊ እቅድ ከማውጣት ይልቅ ሃሳብን ለማንሸራሸር ብቻ ነው" በማለት የፌደራል ማዕድን ልማት፣ ፔትሮሊየም እና ባዮፊዩል ኮርፖሬሽንን ከማዕድን ኮንሴሽንና ማቀነባበሪያ ተቋሙ የመከልከል አላማ የለንም ሲሉ አስተባብለዋል።
data.orm: Aangawoonni Godina Gujii Mootummaa Naannoo Oromiyaa karoora Bakka Albuuda Tantalum Baasuu Kentichaa gara waldaalee dargaggootti dabarsuu 'karoora hojiirra oolu utuu hin taane yaada bashannanaa salphaa ti' jechuun haale akkasumas Korporeeshinii Albuudaa, Peetirooliyemii fi Baayoofiyuulii Federaalaa hojii albuuda baasuu fi dhaabbaticha deemsisuu dhowwachuuf karoora akka hin qabnes beeksise.
data.som: Masuuliyiinta deegaanka Guji ee ismaamulka Oromada ayaa diiday qorshaha lagu wareejinayo macdanta Kenticha Tantalum ee ururada dhalinyarada iyagoo sheegay in ay tahay kaliya fikrad lagu maaweelinayo halkii ay ka ahaan lahayd qorshe la hirgalin karo” isla markaana ayna wax niyad ah u haynin macdanta federaalka. Petroleum and Biofuel Corporation waxay meesha ka saartay ka tabashada macdanta iyo xarunta farsamaynta.
data.tir: ሰብ ስልጣን ክልል ኦሮሚያ ዞባ ጉጂ ከምዝገለፅዎ ንማዕድን ታንታለም ኬንቲቻ ንማሕበራት መናእሰይ ከረክብዎም እዮም ዝተብሃለ ጌጋ ከምዝኾነ፣ እቲ ጉዳይ ብሓሳብ ደረጃ ዝተልዓለ እምበር ተግባራዊ ከምዘይኸውን ከምኡ እውን ንፈቓድን ናውቲን ፌዴራል ኮርፖሬሽን ማዕድን፣ ነዳዲን ባዮፊዩልን ናይ ምሕዳግ ዕላማ ከምዘይብሎምን እዩ።

data.eng: However, according to the head of the zonal administration, Tilahun Warda, the youth residing in the surrounding of the Tantalum Mine are posing series question as to their benefits from the natural resource and said that as long as the Corporation is willing to address this demand, there will be no problem.
data.aaf: Takkay ikkah zone miraacih saqal gifta Tilahun warada elle qaddosennalaay tantalum maqaadin dariifal geytimta qunxaaneyti gino gaddak geen tuxxiq wagsiisak qagqagitak esseroora ugusak geytimaanam kee korperation ta essero gacisuh fayxi akah yallenim fanah hebelto taqabi anewaama qaddose.
data.amh: ይሁን እንጂ የዞኑ አስተዳደር ኃላፊ አቶ ጥላሁን ዋርዳ እንደተናገሩት በታንታለም ማዕድን ዙሪያ የሚኖሩ ወጣቶች ከተፈጥሮ ሀብቱ የሚያገኙትን ጥቅም በተመለከተ ተከታታይ ጥያቄዎችን እያነሱ ሲሆን ኮርፖሬሽኑ ይህንን ጥያቄ ለመመለስ ፈቃደኛ እስከሆነ ድረስ ምንም ችግር እንደማይኖር ገልጸዋል።
data.orm: Haatahu malee, akka hogganaa bulchiinsa godinichaa, Xilahun Waardaatti, dargaggoonni naannoo Albuuda Tantalam baasuu jiraatan leecalloo uumaamichaa irraa fayyadamuuf gaaffii jabaa kaasaa jiru akkasumas haga Korporeeshinichi fedhii kana guutuuf eyyamamaa tahetti, rakkoon hin jiraatu jedhe.
data.som: Si kastaba ha ahaatee, sida uu sheegay madaxa maamulka deegaanka Tilahun Warda, dhalinyarada ku nool agagaarka deegaanka Tantalum ayaa is weydiinaya su’aalo taxane ah oo ku saabsan faa’iidada ay ka helaan kheyraadka dabiiciga ah, waxa kale uu sheegay in mar haddii ay shirkaddu diyaar u tahay inay wax ka qabato baahidaas, wax dhibaato ah ma jiri doonto.
data.tir: ርእሰ ምምሕዳር እቲ ዞባ ኣይተ ጥላሁን ዋርዳ ወሲኹ ከምዘብርሆ ኣብ'ቲ ታንታለም ማዕድን ዝወፀሉ ከባቢ ዝነብሩ መናእሰይ ክረኽብዎም ኣብ ዝግባእ ረብሓታት ሕቶ ዘልዐሉ እንትኾን እቲ ኮርፖሬሽን ንሕቶታቶም ዝምልሰሎም እንተኾይኑ ግን ፀገም ከምዘይብሎም እዩ።

data.eng: A multi-sectoral stakeholders’ platform joined hands to rescue over 131,000 cattle on the verge of death in Borena zone of southern Oromia.
data.aaf: Gabbi Qaxih Oromiyak Borena zoonul Rabak Sugte 131,000 Dagah Laahitte Catoonuh Mangoh Tan Wagitah Yan Xagortitteh Gudgud Gaba Gabah Sitta yibbixen..
data.amh: በደቡብ ኦሮሚያ ቦረና ዞን በሞት አፋፍ ላይ ያሉ ከ131,000 በላይ ከብቶችን ለመታደግ የበርካታ ባለድርሻ አካላት መድረክ እጅ ለእጅ ተያይዘዋል።
data.orm: Waltajjiin abbaa dhimmaa seketera garagaraa godina Booranaa Kibba Oromiyaa keessattin beeylada 131,000 qarqara du'aa irra jiran oolchuf harka walqabatan.
data.som: Madal daneeyayaal badan leh ayaa gacmaha isku qabsaday si ay u badbaadiyaan in ka badan 131,000 oo lo' ah oo qarka u saaran inay dhintaan gobolka Borena ee koonfurta Oromia.
data.tir: እቲ ንብዙሓት መዳርግቲ ኣካላት ዝሓወሰ መድረኽ ነተን ኣብ ደቡባዊ ኦሮሚያ ዞባ ቦረና ኣብ ኣፍ ደገ ሞት ዘለዋ ልዕሊ 131,000 ከፍቲ ንምድሓን ጥምረት ፈጢሩ።

data.eng: These cattle can stand and walk only with human support as deadly drought takes hold in Borena.
data.aaf: Ta laahitteh solla itteh gexxam elle xiqtama dibuk sinam qokol kinnimih taagah boronal qidah yan qabaar radeh geytima.
data.amh: በቦረና አደገኛ ድርቅ በመከሰቱ እነዚህ ከብቶች ቆመው መሄድ የሚችሉት በሰው ድጋፍ ብቻ ነው።
data.orm: Hongeen hamaan Boorana waan qabateef beeyladoonni kunneen deggersa namaa qofaani ka'uufi deemuu kan danda'an.
data.som: Lo’dan waxa ay istaagi karaan oo socon karaan oo keliya iyagoo taageero bini’aadmi wata, iyadoo ay abaaro dad badan ku dhinteen ay ku habsadeen Borena.
data.tir: ኣብ ዞባ ደቡብ ኦሮሚያ ኣብ ከባቢ ቦረና ዝርከባ ከፍቲ ብድርቂ ስለዝተጠቕዓ ካብ ዝዔማሉ ዝላዓለን ዝስጉማን ብሓገዝ ሰባት ከምዝኾነ ተገሊፁ።

data.eng: Over 71,000 livestock have already died since the drought began.
data.aaf: Ta qabaar qimbisem kee akkeh 71,000 daga takke buxah saqitte edde rabte.
data.amh: ድርቁ ከጀመረ ወዲህ ከ71,000 በላይ የቤት እንስሳት ሞተዋል።
data.orm: Erga hongichi jalqabee kaasaa beeyladoonni 71,000 ol tahan du'aniiru.
data.som: In ka badan 71,000 oo xoolo ah ayaa hore u dhintay tan iyo markii ay abaartu bilaabatay.
data.tir: እቲ ድርቂ ካብ ዝጅምር ኣትሒዙ ዛጊድ 71000 ከፍቲ ሞይተን ኣለዋ።

data.eng: The current drought occurred in Borena, West Guji, Guji, East Bale, West Hararge zones, and it exists as an alert stage in East Hararge and Bale, according to Ketema.
data.aaf: Awayi waktil radeh geytimah yan qabaara boronaay,ayroh culam guji,gujjiiy, Ayro Mawqa Baale, ayroh culma harargeh zoonittel radeh geytimah yanim kee ayroh culmah harargeh Zoon kee baaleli maabitinah caddol geytimam gifta katama qaddose.
data.amh: በአሁኑ ወቅት የተከሰተው ድርቅ በቦረና፣ ምዕራብ ጉጂ፣ ጉጂ፣ ምስራቅ ባሌ፣ ምዕራብ ሀረርጌ ዞኖች የተከሰተ ሲሆን በምስራቅ ሀረርጌ እና ባሌም በማንቂያ ደረጃ መኖሩን ከተማ አስታውቋል።
data.orm: Akka Kataman jedhetti, hongeen ammaa zooniiwwan Boorenaa, Gujii Lixaa, Gujii, Baalee Bahaa, Lixa Harargee keessatti kan mudate, akkasumas Harargee Bahaa fi Baalee keessatti sadarkaa akeekkachiisaa irra jira.
data.som: Abaarta hadda jirta ayaa ka dhacday Borena, Galbeedka Guji, Guji, Bariga Bale, deeganada Galbeedka Hararge, waxana ka jirtaa marxalad feejignaan ah Bariga Hararge iyo Bale, sida ay sheegtay Ketema.
data.tir: ኣይተ ከተማ ከምዝገለፆ እቲ ድርቂ ኣብ ዞባታት ቦረና፣ ምዕራብ ጉጂ፣ ጉጂ፣ ምብራቕ ባሌን ምዕራብ ሃረርጌን ዝበፅሐ እንትኾን ኣብ ምብራቕ ሃረርጌን ባሌን ድማ እቲ ሓደጋ ኣብ ደረጃ መጠንቀቕታ ይርከብ።

data.eng: Excessive level of water at Ethiopia’s giant hydropower dam, Gibe III, has prompted officials at Ethiopian Electric Power (EEP) to commence a controlled release of the water as of the coming week.
data.aaf: Itiyoppiyak Kooran Cayli Raceeah Karawwad Gibe sidoc Tan Caddok Taturte Leeh Caddo Ityoppiyak Kooran Caylih(EEP) Mirac Ciggila Ayyamak Xabba Haanam Lee Lowsis Gubat Haanam Akah Qimbisan Innah AbeCayli.
data.amh: በኢትዮጵያ ግዙፉ የሀይል ማመንጫ ግድብ ጊቤ ሶስት ያለው ከመጠን ያለፈ የውሃ መጠን የኢትዮጵያ ኤሌክትሪክ ሃይል ባለስልጣናት ከቀጣዩ ሳምንት ጀምሮ ውሃውን በቁጥጥር መልቀቅ እንዲጀምሩ አድርጓቸዋል።
data.orm: Hidha humna ibsaa guddicha Itoopiyaa Gibee III, keessatti bishaani sadarkaa humnaa olii gahe, Aangawoota Humna Ibsaa Itoopiyaa (EEP) akka isaan torban dhufaa jiru keessa bishaan to'annoo gadi lakkisuu jalqaban isaan godhe.
data.som: Biyaha xad dhaafka ah ee biyo xidheenka weyn ee Itoobiya ee Gibe III, ayaa ku kalifay masuuliyiinta Korantada Itoobiya (EEP) inay bilaabaan siidaynta xakamaynta biyaha usbuuca soo socda.
data.tir: ሓይሊ ኤሌክትሪክ ኢትዮጵያ ካብ ዝቕፅል ሰሙን ኣትሒዙ ኮነ ኢሉ ማይ ካብ ግድብ ከምዘፍስስ ገሊፁ።

data.eng: The hydropower plant that entered in to its commissioning phase six months ago was unable to generate in full capacity owing to the low level of water caused partly by the EL Nino induced drought in the country.
data.aaf: Laca alsaak naharat taama fanah culteh tan lee caylih raceena EL nino baaxol radeh sugeh yan qabaarih sabbatah boddeh sugte addah tan leeh caddoh sababah inkih yan duddal ractamaay maxiiqinna.
data.amh: ከስድስት ወራት በፊት ወደ ስራ የገባው የውሃ ሃይል ማመንጫ በኤልኒኖ ምክንያት በሀገሪቱ ተከስቶ በነበረው ድርቅ በተፈጠረው ዝቅተኛ የውሃ መጠን ምክንያት በሙሉ አቅሙ ማመንጨት አልቻለም።

data.som: Warshada Korontada ee soo gashay wajigeeda shaqo lix bilood ka hor ayaa awoodi wayday in ay si buuxda u dhaliso biyo yaraan taas oo ay sababtay abaartii EL Nino ee dalka ka dhacday.

data.eng: The aftereffects of the drought caused heavy rain falls in many parts of the country that consequently threatened overflow of the Gibe River on top of the dam.
